[{"Name":"Fuzzy Nemo","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWMhjGNDhI-RZYgIiVRXnRDEQCiyyP-dsVjb7EhBkcymNr9MvYi0A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"It's a small little place,  but definitely a gem.  I have been here a few times for lunch already and they never disappoint.

We had The Crispy Fried Chicken Sandwich, a little bland, extra crispy and they came with a tray of condiments to accommodate.   We also had The Greek Chicken Gyro, which was not my first time,  but it did not disappoint.   Both came with a side,  but we chose fries.  Both lunch meals were $21 each, so not cheap, but for the quality, it was reasonable compared to all the restaurants in the same neighborhood.

Staff was super friendly and very knowledgeable about the menu.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMYp7FRhpAcs9yLqmlOuBNm9de5JYADXtLNiNzh&fid=0x0:0x401b742271d8ba4b"],"When":"2024-10-18"},{"Name":"Chang Wun","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXinnRETbtdmwq0G3dzHpocXq4c0y1kT8tCLTmXT5-MPrsCx3WH9g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We sat outside the patio, the restaurant is dog friendly, they prepare water and treats for our dog which is really nice. The foods are surprised! All of them taste sooo good! The portion is big and the price is reasonable! Definitely will revisit üíØ","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNkYvjCpmvwCretR_zPW5eEekY0ccHfVWsdHKsz&fid=0x0:0x401b742271d8ba4b"],"When":"2024-8-6"},{"Name":"Dani","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUBK_VPJmM3HNw92FZJ3qfBOxBY84qgJshYwRUeK3lDNNEfHm0mIg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We came across this gem on the way to a hike and were pleasantly surprised. The service was very friendly, cute patio and the portion size and value was great.
We can't wait to come back and try the bakings which are made in house.
The angel bread breakfast sandwich was amazing!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMzWy5PHh7Wawx7gZgHxJN6HVAFp9iAcizVmevn&fid=0x0:0x401b742271d8ba4b"],"When":"2024-6-23"},{"Name":"Joe 147","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK7qiu1e06TZY7jLmAyImwsWW8IF-0-goWbOUGJ_X4nZEfhrw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Make sure to catch the lemonade and the scone. They are insanely good!!

The smoked salmon bagel and the yoghurt were perfect and the service really good! We loved it here.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMhpmx7sb9TFHU9NwmGpiCTYCFehtZCkZplmR6G&fid=0x0:0x401b742271d8ba4b"],"When":"2024-9-7"},{"Name":"Tobias Jesso (Goppy)","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUT-U1SeJBIuIfNLgjRTrgvGzFZdyRlfCnLGz-s-BqPh11ZSiZ_=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Food great, portions fine for my appetite, service ok, and atmosphere a little wanting. Not the best location or space aesthetically. I will come back if I‚Äôm in the neighbourhood but I probably would not go out of my way like today.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM8wAbKWlwsXf8Y48y_3vrKbsj-3Va5FCDikWs1&fid=0x0:0x401b742271d8ba4b"],"When":"2024-10-15"},{"Name":"Steven Olmstead","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWtGPLsUg7ybhRCsA9-VeVYuyaFqArSeyzqddnDm9gdPpsZ3M0=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Was looking for a place we hadn't yet visited in Lower Lonsdale and chose Kitchen Craft Eatery based on the glowing reviews on Google.  We had the Hoisin Meatloaf Banh Mi and the Greek Chicken Gyro (no photo) with tomato soup. The soup was delicious and served piping hot.   The sandwiches were flavourful and generously portioned.  The key lime pie dessert was creamy and quite luxurious.

Service was very friendly and accommodating as we were allowed to delay our reservation as we were running late.

Would recommend unequivocally!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO9SCcRrWnKwny4ekl_WffN63mkMw51xgrMs8rh&fid=0x0:0x401b742271d8ba4b"],"When":"2024-5-10"},{"Name":"Shane O Connor","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVxH6u1_tnZCeXgDA6KapqtZ-7t8U483wdPPBanRGYpbIdBxVnw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We tried the eatery today for the first time today, hidden gem, great service and food, fair price point, being able to bring our pup on the patio was a great bonus! Highly recommend, we will be back!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM_1TKP2ltZ1PxBgI4TskiXFigSgtg3Tn5BOztd&fid=0x0:0x401b742271d8ba4b"],"When":"2024-9-30"},{"Name":"Jana Kht","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUKPys-mtCkm58mY_uPV8uDvmkNSNYLEbVO6k50cRNPJ-wVPXe5=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Honestly, one of the best places we‚Äôve ever tried in Vancouver, we drive all the way from Burnaby to eat here and it is so worth the drive. Their service is very fast and they have the best Caesar salads in town. Their fries are very crispy and delicious and the big cheese is one of our favourite sandwiches. Atmosphere is great they play good music and on a sunny day. It‚Äôs the perfect place to be.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPA45CCGzI66FGCWVz3G9puEtfskosPaZ053KrG&fid=0x0:0x401b742271d8ba4b"],"When":"2024-5-9"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"M Ko","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL3SLRQ7GpEHn44kmQJwvAZOKpGxEPoyKfPiKnR9-KG7sdBVw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Very nice happy hour. Food was tasty. Oysters were very fresh and tasty. Cocktail was good. Service was good.

Went there again for Hh last week. Our usual server was nice as usual (sorry, forgot his name). But there was another lady server who had a very bad attitude and didn‚Äôt have patience to hear the customer and didn‚Äôt know much about the food they served. She‚Äôs just terrible!!!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNt0OZ1fMG56cX3NrmjhlTd_2SwUrj19a7ot8TW&fid=0x0:0x46f34abd8e759908"],"When":"2024-10-4"},{"Name":"Charlotte Ahern","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWIPiozrQvoE9VHwHlHplLKf8CwHn2sxLmtNEQA3XBtEU3mCI2D=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I had an incredible evening at Seaside Provisions! Their newly expanded room is absolutely stunning‚Äîlarge, beautifully designed, and with a unique concept where you can build your own charcuterie board. The wine list is extensive, and the staff are incredibly knowledgeable when it comes to pairing recommendations. Sebastian, our host for the evening, went above and beyond to make sure we had a fantastic experience.

The cocktails were top-notch, and the dessert‚Äîbread pudding‚Äîwas a true standout, one of the best I‚Äôve ever had! If you‚Äôre visiting, I highly recommend trying the oysters and the wagyu carpaccio. And don‚Äôt miss their fancy cheese and meat counter‚Äîit‚Äôs a high-end foodie experience you won‚Äôt want to miss!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOfB2iWkxxtSMKUaQEHiddVKyKFCUaauXZR-W-n&fid=0x0:0x46f34abd8e759908"],"When":"2024-10-10"},{"Name":"Robin Clements","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV9PmsLxITJmMMeaAz28FAyYktWqAc6468HB42trXKaraHdb6JS=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We came here for happy hour because of the $1.50 oysters. We ordered 2 dozen oysters and a few other appetizers (mushroom flatbread not pictured but it was delicious). The shrimp cocktail and the brussel sprouts were nothing to write home about, but the burrata salad was incredibly tasty and had me writing down what was in it so I could recreate it at home. The oysters were fresh and full of flavour, exactly what we wanted. The interior of the restaurant was nice but we were sat in a corner so we didn‚Äôt get to see much of it. Our waitress also kept trying to upsell us and recommended the most expensive items on the menu which was a little off putting but easy to shrug off. We will definitely be back to try more things on the menu.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOX-Q9gt34kmUcIkZ2uc3BU6Zoo_aRsHTnb-z5p&fid=0x0:0x46f34abd8e759908"],"When":"2024-7-24"},{"Name":"E","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVkLPbuR2Lbk_N-PtXNVGF1nDc7UOQmEl0cDxsJheipcOTu3i85=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"What an INCREDIBLE place for happy hour!  Located within walking distance from the seabus, this lovely establishment went above and beyond to ensure my experience with them was top-notch.  My server Veronica was friendly and attentive, as well as the host/manager who took extra measures to ensure all my needs were met (my friends say Vadim goes above and beyond and deserves a shoutout too!).  I loved that the oysters were all meaty kuushis packed with fresh flavour.  Word of warning to those sensitive to spice: there is a little spicy kick to the cocktail sauce, so be careful when dipping your prawn cocktail!  Super tasty, though, to those who don't mind a flavourful kick to the palate.

Bread pudding I had to send back even though it was recommended as the best.  First time trying this dish as a dessert (closest thing Ive had before this was yorkshire pudding as an entree accomaniment) and I originally wanted the tiramisu, but the hostess mentioned either the chocolate cake/bread pudding stood out more for her personally.  While I loved the non-featured items of the plate like fresh fruit, salted caramel, and vanilla ice cream with the graham cracker crumb bottom, perhaps I'm simply not a fan of "bread pudding" itself so the feature completely turned me off, and that's not the establishment's fault.  Reasons: weird consistency (half cooked/half doughy bread, kinda dry even with salted caramel drizzled on top, mine felt stale but i could be wrong since I have nothing to compare it to) with conflicting infused flavours.  This one had raisins/nuts, and the profile wasn't harmonious with everything going on the plate.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNXENBzpBtHj53YXiHsX0WJJIlYpAAxJQiMeOMf&fid=0x0:0x46f34abd8e759908"],"When":"2024-9-28"},{"Name":"Azadeh Garshasbi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXSKv91Pi7o2_mQbbXgqbr5BSJDbhdVlEzNhFVj8FxdApwFCc4=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Seaside provisions is a fantastic spot for food lovers. With a warm, cozy atmosphere, it‚Äôs the perfect place to relax and enjoy a great meal .They served fresh veggies as appetizer, our dinner, the catch of the day, fish and vegetables, was super tasty, and the desserts were a great way to finish the meal. It‚Äôs a go-to place for a delicious and satisfying meal. I was thrilled to celebrate my birthday at Seaside provisions. Head Chef Donya was incredibly kind and prepared something special just for me.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOopS5B_WWc11-UyWPf1eE5ov7-dx-Ab0uK6jCz&fid=0x0:0x46f34abd8e759908"],"When":"2024-6-20"},{"Name":"Emma F","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW0dlt8ocxLH7yPca2ojNkGI_PBBfsXKMNtqOXZnh4xc0FK3htC=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We absolutely loved the oysters and charcuterie boards. We arrived at happy hour and we're treated to wonderful service. The cocktails were perfectly crafted. We will definitely return again to sample more of the menu.

Did I mention happy hour and extremely well priced?","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMMKgWWh_Iy4sUbbjLXb3oZ1RZESztp1jPmma6N&fid=0x0:0x46f34abd8e759908"],"When":"2024-9-24"},{"Name":"Chloe MacDonald-Chow","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV5zL1-YjQshAAOOXLHLzCgNRwSlewF18GbUfuF6yTdawXHi8nN=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"1 star‚Ä¶ not best service overall, then server rolled their eyes when we selected a tip. Biggest disappointment was that we came from Burnaby just to have oysters special and they limited us to 6 per table saying they were low. (There were three of us.. can‚Äôt imagine a table with more people). And then when we asked if we could have more since it‚Äôs the only reason we came, they said no they only had six left, which sounded like a lie. No compassion.

Besides this, delicious food, great aesthetic, great location, has paid parking below! But I wouldn‚Äôt go back.

When I go to a restaurant, I go to have a good time not to feel unwelcome just because of feeling disappointment. If a customer feels disappointed, the servers should show empathy and say that they totally understand that we took a whole trip to get here and they‚Äôre very sorry that they don‚Äôt have any more oysters. Or something along those lines. At least that‚Äôs how I treated people when I served and hosted. Instead, I felt like we were in the wrong for being disappointed that we travelled so long just to come to a place that doesn‚Äôt have what we want even though it‚Äôs a huge part of their restaurant.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNC_vE8iTZ6mUysa0guReNv21aD-CnpcACPPMtu&fid=0x0:0x46f34abd8e759908"],"When":"2024-6-22"},{"Name":"Bryce Bastiaanssen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUkGTAJckOfugyPlMouHfeWGFBHilkVoxMyQNhFu3i8GXkTovk=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"One of the best fine dining establishments in North Vancouver, my waitress today was Emily she was brilliant,  service always comes with a smile! And the food is nothing short of delicious, today I had the steak frites cooked to a perfect medium rare, and the mushroom flatbread both dishes were rich with flavour & fresh ingredients, the steak melts in your mouth! 10/10","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP0c6BCn24HGj8UXR5ozFFLScSsccuh-PcZxug8&fid=0x0:0x46f34abd8e759908"],"When":"2024-8-17"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Colin Embree","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJemh8_zg8cMqAdL5tG0k_m025Sb06g7v22KOyFR_3NSNWYyA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Came for a birthday on a rainy Sunday evening. The inside is beautiful and feels a bit more dressed up than the other options on the North Shore. We tried a few drinks from their Negroni menu and were impressed. The salads and squid we ordered for starters were fantastic. All of the pasta dishes were delicious. The portions were surprisingly large, which was nice. Overall a great spot at the bottom of lonsdale for some higher class Italian.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNnafYhOn8Nn7-I-f-LwbLyqgN3VezumwIc9OGM&fid=0x0:0x13823003b4dff702"],"When":"2024-11-11"},{"Name":"Margarita Wyld","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVT3G-w3JgS-inerNOsld0u8R2bqYbX9IFT-VytYM9Bre31LUo-=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Our family has dined here a number of times and always had a wonderful meal. The pastas are so so so delicious - perfectly cooked, great flavours, and the wine list is really nice as well. The waiters provide a warm and knowledgeable service, they are very friendly! I also appreciate the Italian music that is played. This restaurant can be good for fancy nights or more casual family nights - yes it‚Äôs white tablecloths and upscale, but never stuffy - definitely try the pastas!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNSaFijkIJQesHURdioU10SXiu5-vAi3Ylo12au&fid=0x0:0x13823003b4dff702"],"When":"2024-10-8"},{"Name":"Mark Nagy","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXNIrIe0ghYGH-XQcU9eUuwXGybf__prXFTcPPiHKoPlElLdGE=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Magnifico!
Probably our best meal for the trip!
So good!
A big shout out to our waiter Bibby for the awesome service! We appreciate the suggestions they were first class!üôÇüòâ","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNAt9NBnkByePxOXd2hC4aYZO6vRlUWAH0x7g6y&fid=0x0:0x13823003b4dff702"],"When":"2024-8-31"},{"Name":"A L","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUcWvY2Pd19Eeci2K4O3hkkV0s9bHnGUU-wE3SepzT8O_esP-Xj=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Such a wonderful experience dining at Sempre Uno for the first time!

The atmosphere was perfect.  Some people were dressed casually, others a little fancier but no pressure either way. The staff greeted us right away and seated us at our table. There is both indoor and outdoor seating. I believe their outdoors is heated for the cooler days.
Overall great layout.
There‚Äôs an open kitchen and bar which is nice as well, feels very welcoming.

Onto the service and food! The menu read very well, and it was hard picking. Our waiter recommended a few options, plus went through some daily specials which all sounded AMAZING.
We ended up starting with the carpaccio, oysters (that were on special)  and a classic ceasar salad.
Everything was delicious. Our daughter had a smaller order of their Ragu bolognese and it was possibly the best bolognese we‚Äôve ever had. (Highly recommend a full order!)

For mains we had the Lobster Tagliarini , mussels/clams in a Yuzu curry base (was one of the appetizer specials) and Scallop and Prawn risotto. Every dish blew it out of the park. They were SO delicious. It‚Äôs hard to find a place where every single dish is a hit. This was it.

For dessert we shared the lemon cheesecake and the Budino. Hard to pick which one was better but if we had to, the Budino!

The service was also amazing. Our waiter was very attentive and friendly.
The whole vibe of the place and staff were superb.

We will definitely be back!!

üçù üçù üçù üçù üçù
5/5 experience (possibly even 6).","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNmuHEwfsDs0EEH7CzXBTjwVxwStXqyuFEpxqt1&fid=0x0:0x13823003b4dff702"],"When":"2024-5-12"},{"Name":"Maya Andersen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJww3WBH6tsz_E81NCJeGrd0C_P6fT5K_IDQgvF3sXSJdJ5vnk=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Went to Sempre Uno for a dinner with my mom and we had a lovely time. The food was great we had the special burratta salad, prawn salad as appetizers and lamb special as a main and seafood pasta - UNREAL! Not to mention my non-alcoholic cocktail was super fun and yummy! Loved the vibe. Sophie was our server, coming back for Valentine‚Äôs Day and will be requesting her as my server again!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNUd38sS5MF3UWYFFv5aDziIr6Af5-PtQwmQKxe&fid=0x0:0x13823003b4dff702"],"When":"2024-1-21"},{"Name":"Jennifer Thornton","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXxGkwZGNAlwKbi0bc9qqTJZsWoyAsXFmtNcwgpfNCHexwdoC9z=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This was a great experience for our wedding anniversary. Most important thing, be prepared for an expensive meal. If you go in with any other expectation, you‚Äôre going to be disappointed. That is not a negative by any means it‚Äôs just an expectation. The service is top-notch and I would definitely like to give a call out to our server Morris, he was excellent and definitely added to the experience of the evening. The food was really good, lovely presentation, excellent flavours and cooked to perfection. My husband had the lamb and I had veal and they were both excellent. Just a heads up the lamb is spicy, which was unexpected and would‚Äôve wrecked my dinner, but my husband said it was excellent. My husband had the testarossa cocktail and it was fun, definitely worth ordering for the presentation. It was a very busy night so we ended up being sat out on the patio, which we were hesitant about at first. It is very comfortable on the patio, warm and heated, our seat had a peekaboo of the ocean. You do need to be OK with people walking by but we enjoy watching people so that worked out fine. I have read some comments where people said it had an Italian ‚Äúfeel‚Äù. We personally don‚Äôt agree with this, the inside of the restaurant is very cold and does not have an old Italian restaurant feel at all. It is the total opposite decor of the restaurant that was there before which definitely captured the old Italian feel.  It‚Äôs very modern so we were happy to be put outside. Two suggestions, we found it kind of cheeky that we had to pay for bread at the table, considering the cost of all the other menu items and they definitely need to take the scented candles out of the little bathrooms. Haha I know this sounds weird, but it‚Äôs a small space and it was way too much smells.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM2VZuyd_BQ_mMg8a2lBeHPlzG08W6IzWL6Npk_&fid=0x0:0x13823003b4dff702"],"When":"2024-4-15"},{"Name":"George Chatzivasileiou","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVvjVY_pLjYmxuEPhQ3w-uqtevJGoASxAG9o0qGG16ii5MmWAOn=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Loves the risotto - great flavour! Enjoyed a modern approach to prosciutto and melon served on a bed of arugula and topped with Parmigiano. I enjoyed it with an order of fresh bread which I quite liked - foccacia with herb inclusions. For dessert, although I am not a big cherry person, I did try the Ciliegie Filate but its not for me. Having said that it was a nice combination of textures and if you do like cherry, you ll probably love it! Lastly great service which I really appreciated.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOcD_ZOZeMEHqkt5ojsr54NqAdDFBOkx8EDckSo&fid=0x0:0x13823003b4dff702"],"When":"2024-6-21"},{"Name":"Kristy Chen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWEfZ2rjxNiODjhooQ3vu4wU52UFmMssx1nBEw-QrGtiP3D8nPb=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Very authentic atmosphere and ambience that reminded me of restaurants in Italy. However, the food was not amazing. I really enjoyed the beef carpaccio and the risotto was not bad. But the scallop was a tad overcooked, the dessert was a blend of ingredients thrown together that did not compliment each other and I did not love their cocktails. Overall, not a bad experience but I probably would not go back again.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM0HwagjnPn6Zc0YW67sdNPkJg1rn8jG3_Uoq5J&fid=0x0:0x13823003b4dff702"],"When":"2024-3-21"}]

user_reviews: [{"Name":"Angie h","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUK5-Eyg-HKdLqH6Sh0Yu5AouPT5bxsEAkZr27lVeLcEluqhYqm=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The staff and service is the highlight of this joint! Sooo lovely and friendly (shoutout to Alexis)! The tropical pineapple-mango beer is a must try if you like fruit sour beer. The portions are huge and fries are superb! Pulled pork was a hit, the burger was alright but best not to expect a regular burger. Mushroom wings were okay but I wouldn‚Äôt order again. It‚Äôs a bit of an eclectic menu but definitely worth the visit! Be sure to have the fries and gravy in your meal! There‚Äôs indoor and outdoor seating but it does get busy, so go early to beat the rush.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOi1_JjLDGsJl0cnUonLqE_QhO6fKxqcdKU-Tih\u0026fid=0x0:0xed361f21fa92bec6"],"When":"2024-9-30"},{"Name":"YJ K","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUBPuQFnODlS32_YTAMV0B-4x5XKOmAKQ998gbZqE5DPsuartXYjA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Chop \u0026 Chew is one of the feel-good restaurants in my neighbourhood. It's a casual hangout, but they serve hearty, homemade foods that are absolutely delicious! Must try their sausage platter,  mushroom wings, and loco moco! Chicken schnitzel and mac\u0026cheese were so good, too. Recommend having a cold slaw as a side to add extra freshness and crunch.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPlsBHL45-LCLvmJP3eU1_Sz7ellkid-3Okj1pS\u0026fid=0x0:0xed361f21fa92bec6"],"When":"2024-10-27"},{"Name":"Steven Olmstead","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWtGPLsUg7ybhRCsA9-VeVYuyaFqArSeyzqddnDm9gdPpsZ3M0=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"We sampled several \"small\" plates on our recent visit to Chop and Chew, most of which would qualify as meals in themselves.  Definitely like the options to mix and match a vaiety of menu items.  Especially liked the beet salad, mac n cheese and the herbaceous chorizo sausage. Only real down side was the very uncomfortable seats.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNWJEB48YnZlAx-Qooduygs0vs-oyk_5cqXa_UK\u0026fid=0x0:0xed361f21fa92bec6"],"When":"2024-8-15"},{"Name":"Mike Plumb","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXr0v1e8g5LcqnZOR_AM6yTlveusuWHa22G8NP1F9SgGonebTGlxw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Shayan and the team always treat my buddies and I so nice. We pop by every 2-3 weeks for a meal and a few drinks. Recently, they set up for Oktoberfest at Wildeye Brewing, was solid as usual. Look forward to visiting whenever we can. Keep it up üëå","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMN-jQNBGvPViCd0QaSJmnnth-tZsZEH4rDJIsU\u0026fid=0x0:0xed361f21fa92bec6"],"When":"2024-12-2"},{"Name":"Sally Chan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV0eyDDwZ49vPjmipVMdwmg8FMdCNV5-4V_Kwq3zs9up_IjFIZ5=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"It was my 2nd time having dinner at Chop and Chew 2 Friday nights in a row! :D\nThe sausage platter was a must try if you have never been there. Drinks were great too! The service was warm and friendly, price was very reasonable.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP1nerN4azHxRicibg_3A5tVJqHdxvIFz1qeieC\u0026fid=0x0:0xed361f21fa92bec6"],"When":"2024-7-20"},{"Name":"Scotty Gage","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXnx8QAnWBepNPQXpflBV6y0wKk4pj1WiNQlJh7MZJm0bK2ois=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Had a great time at Chop and Chew.  First of all, the service was incredible.  The staff was beyond friendly and took great care to share with us the menu, their favorites, and recommendations for the day.  We split the mushroom wings, which were a great way to start.  For dinner, I had the Chop and Chew plate with a brat and the beef Guiness sausage, and they were fantastic.  The homemade slaw was great as well.  My wife had the chicken schnitzel, and it w\nas delish...And to top it off, we had a great conversation with Alexis, learning a little more about Canada and Vancouver.  If you get a chance to stop in, as ask for him...and ask him what makes him Brilliant!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNDsAC9Q8G1A5x0dGiPRKrtcBi8sNf_ztDyN4Ko\u0026fid=0x0:0xed361f21fa92bec6"],"When":"2024-8-26"},{"Name":"TIC B.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIKoDw0SO9Mj_ObKiLRsAbWm7j96Yo6uQRuqj2UBi1nVAeycw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We just had our Diner there and it was fantastic. We had the chef glazed salmon and the chop and chew platter with the Oktoberfest sausage. The food is really good and the folks are extremly friendly, it was more like visting your buddies, we really enjoyed the atmosphere. I also can recommend the black kettle pale ale from tap.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN8HcOVsDmbLiwLw0Yg_v98CvaGMQ8QdzHNN2r-\u0026fid=0x0:0xed361f21fa92bec6"],"When":"2024-9-30"},{"Name":"Wing Wing Lam","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUM-NblQ23wPMIDbEZG4qLeVHUJU9mowQi7hKxpBL0edQSZtY9w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I had a delightful experience at this restaurant during dinner. You have the option to dine on the patio or inside, and it's pet-friendly! The food was not only tasty but also arrived promptly. The comfortable seating and friendly service made the meal even more enjoyable. With reasonable prices, this restaurant is definitely worth a visit. If you're seeking a satisfying dining experience with great views, give it a try. You must try the sausage!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO7IEyL5i_4fKIuA5hXT7dV6L9GzfihAQlNWG6Y\u0026fid=0x0:0xed361f21fa92bec6"],"When":"2024-6-14"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Danba","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVLKKxlenCkUbH6ejyEg9EfB6IrkOt9pNRns5g0TQjqk77Hvg0s=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We went on Saturday night, it was not really busy. The atmosphere and service is crazy good. We ordered 4 dishes, everything was super good. You can choose your spicy level, over the medium-hot is pretty spicy (I'm Korean). But it was nice experience. Highly recommend this restaurant.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNZMrrrWrX74G-UJy_bazTy5xQPnHbwZdV_4f8n&fid=0x0:0x1fc9129fb196d572"],"When":"2024-7-7"},{"Name":"Tanya Gandhi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJhUB2_lQRhJBQXvHafnecmJ_rAFAuu0MxYv-nCxLX3-PHKrA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My restaurant choices have been a 10/10 lately! The food , the ambiance and service was all amazing.
I can‚Äôt eat too much spice so it was amazing that I got to choose my spice level. They have mild, medium and hot so you can adjust according to your tolerance. I recommend the tandoori wings , they were my favourite.

Seating inside of the restaurant was completely booked so my friends and I sat on the patio which was really cute. Inside though was beautiful and it smelled so good. I‚Äôd definitely do a gathering or a party here - the decor is really elegant and sets a good vibe.

The service was also excellent. Our server , Ajin, was extremely attentive and even gave us a little dessert on the house which was so so good.

Overall a great experience. I wasn‚Äôt drinking tonight so I didn‚Äôt get to try their cocktails but they looked delicious so I‚Äôll definitely be back to check them out.

Pricing is also very reasonable, my friends and I split two curries and an appetizer between us and got some roti,naan and rice and it all came to $25 before drinks!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMDJ4lSOqrpuEf7Gbu1d22XZlVmOmH7sQ9H1RsD&fid=0x0:0x1fc9129fb196d572"],"When":"2024-8-9"},{"Name":"Elisa Cheung","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV2KnuzcVu8y_F-Ig0pQTw681CuVq4SxWE7iJrVGkkU0asuUQkf=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Our new favorite Indian Go To Restaurant! Located on Commercial Drive, this Indian Restaurant was an amazing experience. We went on a Saturday night and had a reservation. The restaurant was full, full, full - we recommend making a reservation. Award winning establishment as reflected on the wall when you enter. Bravo and congratulations.

We had Fish Pakora and the Sula Chat (Appetizer) Platter. Our mains included Garlic Naan, Chicken Masala, Lamb Biryana, Butter Chicken, and Mattar Paneer. Soooo good! Mango Lassi and Chai team were spot on! Service is excellent and given how busy it was, the staff are still super friendly.

Reservations are recommended. Family friendly, able to sit both small and large parties. Space is tight within the restaurant. Street parking available.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPhpffXJChdvzgfz37kLERzMRgrfjpAiQFsAR0N&fid=0x0:0x1fc9129fb196d572"],"When":"2024-8-3"},{"Name":"April Skillman","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjULH2tUlOpxcEeMxZBUtBG5D1NqeutlYpW22IxLu02BidLRytdu=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"I was at the Davie Street location not the commercial Drive location.
The food drinks and service were impeccable. But my server went above and beyond, she‚Äôs knowledgable in all aspects of the drink and food menu, and some gems! She‚Äôs also the bartender, the next time I go, I‚Äôll be sitting at the bar!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN5hlnWr_G3AKDM7T1jUKA8Y5SvYb5oolhNRVQz&fid=0x0:0x1fc9129fb196d572"],"When":"2024-9-5"},{"Name":"Dunja Meckic","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUkvelRZ9n6usKq8Ijq2JeTfIGJ2_ycj3xC_t6f754feiULCvK5-Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Excellent food and service. We went on a weekday without a reservation and were seated immediately. Good selection of dishes, we got two starters 3 mains, garlic naan and rice on the side. Everything tasted amazing truly 10/10 would recommend","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOu49gMovljgSgpCacfLybWtjZz4sU7AcJFcrD2&fid=0x0:0x1fc9129fb196d572"],"When":"2024-5-22"},{"Name":"Akshay Busa","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXo2MtMEEHOPEiz31Tswx0anyrFnUVK52ky6D0mnn5aod-zB-wR=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Good ambience and really great service. But I guess the hype was too much for the food. I felt the food was Ok compared to the prices. We order many vegetarian dishes. Paneer tikka was really good. But the dahi puri was too sour. The kofta gravy and others were too spicy. Order Normal spices food because we asked to make more spicy so they made it spicy at the cost of taste.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOpHwtuJen3C1zqLV504u3T0_wP5FKPNb5-Oy2Q&fid=0x0:0x1fc9129fb196d572"],"When":"2024-5-26"},{"Name":"Danish Danish","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXDaf_FSw08_d92JhdLyIpYlGuz53Nt6Weh1q1wfnRSDuJI3hNy=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Our friends organized a farewell dinner for my wife and me at Sula Indian restaurant! Opting for Sula was an excellent decision, and we all had an amazing time enjoying both vegetarian and non-vegetarian options. The each bite of appetisers and delicious curries were bursting with flavor, leaving us wanting more.
The waitress provided outstanding service, assisting us throughout the meal and even taking great photos of us. The ambiance and decor added to the overall experience. I highly recommend Sula to anyone who love vegetarian food and Indian cuisine!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM1erz14cM1RLMxNQhdVpQ4vzCt5oViD8FUk13N&fid=0x0:0x1fc9129fb196d572"],"When":"2024-4-11"},{"Name":"aden carpenter","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXn2UNNRexmeqDTbiNQu1woYgtFzPRdO2N1Z1vtprtA34CqdOxK8A=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The atmosphere is awesome. Fabulous food excellent service and the best Tandori chicken platter ever. We had a truly uniqie appetizer which was so good. All their food is beautifully presented. One of the best resturants in Vancouver. Wonderful service which added to our dining experience.
On a subsequent visit  August 15/2024 we had  the Tandori rack of lamb, cucumber salad and we were so pleased. Sulu has an excellent wine selection as well. They even offer the carafe size of wine.
The ambience and service are awesome","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOd1IABtiNs18N0H7ideW43jwISKmMyUGtpogrn&fid=0x0:0x1fc9129fb196d572"],"When":"2024-5-24"}]

[{"Name":"Syeda A","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLLA1b-5WhasR1TM5GKZxAAXbVs_p0jRSvE9SGmvE7yNJo7qQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I recently dined at mehman wonderful restaurant, and I must say, it was an exceptional experience from start to finish. The food was not only delicious but also beautifully presented. The service was top-notch, with attentive staff who made the dining experience even more enjoyable. The ambiance was cozy and inviting, creating the perfect setting for a memorable meal. Overall, I had a fantastic time and can't wait to return!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNy0HFUxl3czgeGW118iFdU0qkoNxr3KkMW1Tit&fid=0x0:0x71b4c4b229f124fe"],"When":"2024-7-28"},{"Name":"Sameera Thilakarathna","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUYH2HlvznSHM5eDKRYBfXJd81lY8LS-lnOduo3uvXHcfViqR_E=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I have tried almost every persian restaurant in North Van. Here's my experience with Mehman. Food was ok. Got the Lamb shank it was good. But it could be a bit more tender and more stew.  Not sure what her name is. The lovely girl who served suggested an appetizer with Youghurt, which paired with Lamb shank pretty well. I went there after a hard hike and she was sight for sore eyes. Very kind and welcoming.  She deserves a raise. I will be coming back just to try out other foods she recommended in the menu. Thank you for making my day.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP9CQX7V9eymaxCJC9e1mwMKNYhcZYShkddZbfq&fid=0x0:0x71b4c4b229f124fe"],"When":"2024-8-31"},{"Name":"Jalal Khouhak","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVclqVH87OZmLXh208eHQQGPnJIjocfhvuF158JR0_LSB-gls0t=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"We got ‚ÄúJegar‚Äù with their amazing freshly baked bread! The Jegar was great but if they serve it in smaller piece it will be cooked better! The staff are super nice and polite, with their amazing hospitality. Btw, their washroom was not clean! They should clean it more often:)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOaC2ati51neqiTngUkQrVL7TPq-qu23f4bB_jO&fid=0x0:0x71b4c4b229f124fe"],"When":"2024-9-2"},{"Name":"mojee m","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWRCV36UAR_R_b9Ypj9Hj4QQlgjImyCyMTqSKbZtDvaDWFrQU5f=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"‚≠ê 1/5

I had a very disappointing experience at Mehman Restaurant. First, I was surprised to find that we had to pay for our order before eating, with an expectation for a tip without even tasting the food. There was nothing particularly special about the food or service to justify that approach.

The worst part was seeing a mouse in the dining area. When I informed the staff, the response was very casual; the server just mentioned she was scared. When my wife asked if the manager had been informed, the server said the manager was aware and "sorry," but there was no direct apology or acknowledgment from the manager. This lack of concern for hygiene and customer service is unacceptable and made for a very unpleasant dining experience. I hope the management takes this seriously and addresses the hygiene and service issues immediately.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOdsj7wH3UrV8cmHEGQPRMiVoL0jXfB2J4CFYuS&fid=0x0:0x71b4c4b229f124fe"],"When":"2024-9-7"},{"Name":"khaza hamim","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW9AEIsqGhRBU9-8ZP8dsEWjs0v_mQC8tOGcd3U8_leaxEx5fOOoQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"One of the best persian resturant around Vancouver! The price to portion ratio is amazing! Each order comes with extra Nan with butter and other vegies. Taste is delicious, one of the best for koobideh dishes! This was my 2nd visit and I plan to go there again. Highly recommended!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMd0HYPQajewj_mCUvPBgnygUwCbOfoaT1GUL8N&fid=0x0:0x71b4c4b229f124fe"],"When":"2024-9-29"},{"Name":"Sam John","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWEQkBEQv7b1GBbxGySzoDQyABH9L76RKafkp3_QByEtFRfCRfj=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I traveled out of town to visit this restaurant that I found on Google Maps. It had positive reviews, so we decided to give it a try since many reviewers mentioned the delicious food. The reviews were accurate, and the food was indeed excellent. However, the customer service was lacking. The waitress was impolite and displayed a poor attitude. When we requested a bag, she refused, claiming they did not have any and suggested we leave if we were finished. We will not be returning to this establishment. I do not recommend this restaurant to others. I suggest looking for an alternative dining option.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPoOp1-hUFp_A7uY3UTDspt8I1GdE2H3UAwQOqK&fid=0x0:0x71b4c4b229f124fe"],"When":"2024-8-12"},{"Name":"Maedeh Behzadi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWaQz5DeXesp--15ZlYHwDg5zOLKGTyvvlZv25YKv3rThE4eS6i=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I visited Mehman Restaurant recently, hoping for a good experience, but unfortunately, it didn‚Äôt meet my expectations. The liver and heart dishes were overcooked and dry, which completely ruined their flavor. For the prices they charge, I expected much better quality. The food simply didn‚Äôt match the value, and I left feeling disappointed. I hope they take this feedback seriously and improve their food quality.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Hesam","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIsSWm-_6hhkE6bD94fUqhqJw4TlmFL3ou8wx1p9TCHnQ6oAo6r=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Service was absolutely great and so was the food. I‚Äôll be back!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNiGFXA37i0Rx0Zv4qDlU-P3lkeP4whZ91L2r1C&fid=0x0:0x71b4c4b229f124fe"],"When":"2024-9-30"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Amy Watt","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXtFx0Lt1_G_UCsXyvg1o5eSDevhehAM8wUiop0lPf09tXNft4k=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Great addition to the Shipyards! I wish there were more restaurants like this on the North Shore, as it really makes a difference having good places to eat that aren‚Äôt chains like Joeys or Browns. The pizza is always delicious, and they're very accommodating with vegan and vegetarian options‚Äîeven if it's not on the menu, just ask and they'll make it happen. They're especially vegan-friendly and will make you a vegan pasta or pizza on request. There‚Äôs often a table available for walk-ins, but I‚Äôd recommend booking ahead as it can get really busy.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOx9KAjBDTBb-oPd_WJDi3v2mxMbwKq-g4YtWH1&fid=0x0:0xfbfd2b39076c805f"],"When":"2024-10-21"},{"Name":"E J","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUrvh4CbdP6FQQxMyj7Ing9kTE03rzh86JIpgFN_ZRhysfntmzi=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Had great time at Nook it feels like only real restaurant in the shipyards compared to the rest of the corporate style restaurants near by, even though there are other nook locations here the feel at this location was like real mom and pop shop the vibe was banging.üëç

The interior is so real, like I didn't expect it to be so cozy it felt like it had been lived in.

We had the whipped riccotta crostini, and it was so lovey like a desert that it reminded me of hazelnut spread with hints of black pepper. I wouldn't have mind having that for dessert ‚≠êÔ∏è

I had the rigatoni Boscaiola pasta
but vegetarian and it was delicious& filling like mushrooms strongnoff‚≠êÔ∏è

A lot of the dishes can be turned vegetarian if need be, and some were vegetarian.

Overall, I had a wonderful time and will 100% comeback‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOEWFdhXSPuqeUSZhyISlLO5jpoOpKmoOizImW2&fid=0x0:0xfbfd2b39076c805f"],"When":"2024-10-10"},{"Name":"Elaine S","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXw0NZVlw-DYhg6yu3CwCqawu2sEc8yv_yDRJNRZHiHpXsjuXCx=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"October 12, 2024: we had to go back for the wonderful pizza for lunch on Saturday and once again enjoyed the great view on the patio, and wonderful service from Chris and Justine. Thank you!

October 5, 2024: My family has been to Nook a few times and I finally had a chance to join them. Now I know why they love it so much!

We sat outside - I was a bit worried it would be too chilly but with the heaters and blankets I felt toasty warm. It was so nice being out in the open with the beautiful view of the area!

The food was excellent! We ordered Spaghetti Bolognese, Rigatoni Boscaiola, and Pepperoni Pizza and all were delicious! I think this was one of the best pizzas I have ever had - the crust so light and tender, just the right amount of cheese and tasty pepperoni!

And the service was fantastic! Thank you to Brad for making sure my drink was just the way I like it and Kirsten for your extraordinary and friendly service. You helped to make it it extra special - thank you so much!

I appreciate that my family introduced me to Nook - now I understand why it is a favourite of theirs! We will be back!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOQDVbGbgMKIpXX7sHcChmONcF0IGGuB2yfamwo&fid=0x0:0xfbfd2b39076c805f"],"When":"2024-10-6"},{"Name":"Talid Jalbout","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVXaUeHBH7AVJdkjB_vmutMGnZKiS_gwPrWTjeXNr8SoSvPSvNMCQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Everyone really enjoyed themselves, the interior is nice and welcoming. If you're brave enough to eat outside in winter, they do have blankets you can borrow to keep you warm. Service was good and food came out quickly. I'd recommend sharing your mains. Everything tasted great, the pizza was Neapolitan style, with a great crust. My very minor observation was that the orecchiette looked more like smooth conchiglie.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO5qc2kAA_TQiohFb9jeSJ4jQFpBtvyb0fTWELt&fid=0x0:0xfbfd2b39076c805f"],"When":"2024-1-29"},{"Name":"Shirley Fung","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXSf2s-kJuEfRzH7n0u0o-Ty-eDTJZIvAb-cR6BzmkEs9eHNYN_=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"the mushroom pizza is really good!! i love the cream sauce and the ample amount of mushroom toppings. the crust is fresh and the bread is soft in the middle.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMiq_6B5g5_led59wV-t_iXHxhmNIdc5sAYQPIJ&fid=0x0:0xfbfd2b39076c805f"],"When":"2024-4-29"},{"Name":"Balkaran Matharu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVknnRHfA6loJ3mArT1IlYiyOJz3vf2-Ol7OlNcvA5NbbbPFusi=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We came here with a group of 5 and we had a great experience at Nook! Our server was Daisy and she was phenomenal! Service was fantastic and the food was delicious! Love the ambience and atmosphere of the restaurant as well, it's very modern and cozy. I highly recommend visiting during happy hour, as they have tons of options during happy hour, and at a terrific price. We had a great time dining at Nook, the food was so yummy!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Pooneh Ashja","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXLvYCv83fYH_2cvB_GvPGsx-cWB3nHtTpKcJM5kyhA3XmSl58N9Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Mushroom pizza was excellent. The Rigatoni Boscaiola pasta was tasty too but the Rigatoni itself was a bit undercooked.
Nice atmosphere with seats both inside and outside. Servers were friendly. A bit hard to get their attention. Overall, it was a good experience.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN69LSxcuHnw4N4kKdXj4mD0TZlmCRmdREs9vpU&fid=0x0:0xfbfd2b39076c805f"],"When":"2023-8-17"},{"Name":"Jasmine Kizilkaya","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjViAq0AwN_mcRX6CQC9qJrZthtN9bAt3YfEvW4fOgWwuI0AAcFR=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Superb experience. One of my favourite Italian places in Vancouver. Loved sitting outside with the sea view.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNDuk8-qhNRfqc0KW-hQLxJD7V7b9CI8Y0Hxlr9&fid=0x0:0xfbfd2b39076c805f"],"When":"2024-10-4"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Shahrzad M","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVhv00VZcEcvdRA0F_XVDemsk3WIUKEYeyLQgQoMuDyNohRh7lQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My first time ordering thanksgiving meal from a restaurant & Im so glad we gave it a chance. The food was excellent, very easy to put together and it was delicious. There was salad, turkey, veggies, stuffing, dinner rolls, yummy mashed potatoes, cranberry sauce, gravy. For dessert there was apple pie & ice cream. Four of us ate & we have leftovers. Thank you for making our thanksgiving meal a special one. We definitely had more time to spend with family rather than spending hours in the kitchen & Im grateful for that.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN0m7zcsUwkQa5UImi0GQs3xCitU8hTWp2XFBOO&fid=0x0:0xaaf02f9bd527580d"],"When":"2024-10-15"},{"Name":"Jason Brawn","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXGJaU20iM-ZTxKU88Eh8aQ0G6FeQUBkbo4O84nuTWj3KUf3yIR=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Friday night we headed to Joey for date night, and we‚Äôre both happy we did. As with any Joey location we‚Äôve visited before, it‚Äôs upscale casual done right. The atmosphere is perfect, with a colour palette, furnishings, music, and lighting that are all on point. As with other Joey restaurants in our experience, they‚Äôve also done an excellent job of choosing great staff ‚Äì both the hostesses and our server Harrison were excellent.

The food was quite good. We started with the Scallop & Prawn Ceviche, the presentation of which was excellent, and even for someone like me who hates cilantro, it was awfully yummy. I can‚Äôt say for sure if the tortilla chips were made fresh in the back, but they sure tasted like it. As far as starters go, this one is a 10.

We followed that by sharing the Chicken Parmesan ‚Äì not something we‚Äôve ever ordered, and perhaps not as enticing as some of their other offerings, but we simply wanted something different. Despite not being big pasta eaters, we still really enjoyed the dish. Chicken is often overcooked, but they nailed it, and it was juicy and delicious. Nothing fancy or notable here, just a very serviceable version of a classic dish. If this is a dish you‚Äôre familiar with, you won‚Äôt be disappointed.

We always consider the restroom when rating a restaurant, and for the most part Joey did a great job ensuring it was clean and classy. Our only complaint was the absurdly awkward hand dryers. We both walked out of the restroom at the same time, looked at each other, and our first comment was about how we had to use the dryers from the side instead of how they're meant to be used ‚Äì from the front. A small thing they could consider fixing.

Overall a wonderful place to enjoy date night, with excellent service, good food, and a great atmosphere for enjoying time and conversation with your favourite human.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP6SNv5V8UxuErHGPWC-EBdzfIbGVyVOultsVsi&fid=0x0:0xaaf02f9bd527580d"],"When":"2024-10-13"},{"Name":"Shahrzad Matin","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXr3Y2zjCIPyX_qS5DOamXBuLhPj_aJnaUF2sdw1Z1ZeFtoSqs=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Had a late lunch there today with my son. We were greeted at the door by a lovely young man who was super kind with a welcoming smile who took us to an accessible yet lovely table(I‚Äôm in a wheelchair). Our server Rowen greeted us with a lovely smile. She was super friendly and helped us choose our lunch. Excellent service, excellent food. Thank you joeys for such great food & lovely staff. Thank you Rowen. See you soon ü•∞","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPdxVcQJZ2giA7GBfhRaQr-3sXnxAhtFycQf1xm&fid=0x0:0xaaf02f9bd527580d"],"When":"2024-9-29"},{"Name":"Charls Robles","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIlkUSD6f4vZ8oeSmwQ2M-U6nR7EWAZ2ehK2pFda2Z0MUNJVQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Andrea was an awesome server.  She has good smile and polite and good service.  The manager was very kind to accommodate our request.  The staff are amazing and food as well. Mike the manager was great and the BEST. Never met a manager like him.  I like going to Joeys when I‚Äôm at Lonsdale quay. Good atmosphere and food.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNe_fs4FaBRjvqbvysJ7NhU2nKcNxnCq4yQ48Zh&fid=0x0:0xaaf02f9bd527580d"],"When":"2024-11-30"},{"Name":"S L","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWV3dRExUU6CcyKh7lSLVNfnclkZ3QvSxHjyu6gjmW4Ii5hPUY7lg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"If you find yourself in North Vancouver, especially on a Friday evening, make sure to visit this fantastic spot.

The tuna poke bowl is a standout‚Äîits flavors and textures surpass even some of the poke I've had in Hawaii. The bowl features a delightful mix of fresh vegetables and a perfectly balanced dressing with just the right amount of spice.

The sushi cone, unfortunately, fell short of expectations. It was rather basic and lacked any distinctive flavor or impressive kick. I wouldn‚Äôt recommend ordering it; there are better options on the menu to explore.

The steak frites is also worth a try. While it may not be the best steak you've ever had, it's still quite enjoyable. I‚Äôd suggest taking advantage of the happy hour deals to get the most value. The combination of stunning views, a vibrant atmosphere, and flavorful food makes this place a must-visit.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM6U9Zz2V_F2eA8QGFJQylJSZSx6_C_LnCUawAL&fid=0x0:0xaaf02f9bd527580d"],"When":"2024-8-10"},{"Name":"Elle Skoglund","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUIzrqrMzsoDfYpbXgZI7ICFFX8qNfR49ykTaTYn60qviitXfE=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Absolutely incredible place for a meal.  The staff is top notch and absolutely delightful in every way.  The food is beyond amazing.  The drinks are refreshing and on point.  We loved it so much we came back the next day.  Get the lettuce wraps.  Get the supernova.  And tip your server!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNDdXxL7IlSFSdoOOh7S7G5LdLdu7rBIGW5naI_&fid=0x0:0xaaf02f9bd527580d"],"When":"2024-7-10"},{"Name":"Luigi Muscat Filletti","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVA3UBWKfPQQszCf2znnF2E_INq5m_-87yISLCewg_fQ6oCtmhG0g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great dining experience, the steak and  ravioli was a show-stopper, recommended.

I particularly enjoyed the s‚Äômores dessert with biscuit crumble and rosemary ‚Äî a well-structured dish, it has complements.

The ambience carries a good vibe, with dim lighting and good beats. Service was very good and professional, however inconsistent at times where some staff were forgetful over our requests.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPdQX4dC6yWN2Jb8InZGyXn6tGUpHD2S4r5cSY-&fid=0x0:0xaaf02f9bd527580d"],"When":"2024-8-19"},{"Name":"Hillary Violet","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVAE5u2PNaWM7_9R062Jln-phqfbg4ElrT3NOT98lQQucajrfIScw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great visit. Great service. Amy F was our server and such a joy! Not everyday in Vancouver the service staff is so enthused to be of service and serving great drinks and food. The welcome bubbles while we waited only two minutes for the table was awesomeüôèüòä Was my second time here and will come again","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNpX2egnRfFIcEPch8DkbAtLxJCdRjO7p7KsfAQ&fid=0x0:0xaaf02f9bd527580d"],"When":"2024-11-24"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Jakob Doucet","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLvofelJL9DMQO43NTBLUtMq8yqA9fyytPXRNeiw-nIQnMASg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Where do I even start? What a great experience last night at My Cucina. Cipriano, the owner, was great to us. All he cared about was making our experience the best it could be, and he delivered. The food was super fresh and authentic! We started with an assortment of appetizers, and then we all transitioned into pasta for our mains. The liquor prices were super affordable, and all the glasses came chilled. For dessert, the tiramisu on the homemade macaron was unbelievable! I highly recommend you give this place a try; you will not be disappointed!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMWjIrp6vznmNyTvSL8KTFyY7QAFR62dSfZxwGH&fid=0x0:0x64c1a3ddeb0f39bb"],"When":"2024-7-19"},{"Name":"Eliza Sonsini","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWZcbcldSupxcMDc3nsDOy1_bAWPNf73-QntcdRCZpXaug6Cc0n=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I recently dined at this Italian restaurant and was thoroughly impressed. The food was exceptional, with the burrata and prosciutto salad being particularly amazing and the pesto with pistachios perfectly executed. The portion sizes were generous, providing excellent value for money, and the gelato was both delicious and impressively large. The service was outstanding and truly five-star. While the timing was a bit slower than what you might find in Vancouver, it wasn‚Äôt an issue for me but could be a consideration for those accustomed to faster service. Overall, it was a fantastic dining experience that I would highly recommend","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOYR_KyYBMq1nBqtjXRCvGHRq8rAEHRKbXq13Rg&fid=0x0:0x64c1a3ddeb0f39bb"],"When":"2024-8-5"},{"Name":"Chandra Alahari","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV8t-WPE0jEmdCqsZQMxB7cUZaHP-26VBy6yh9dAb2EW-3AadqJ6g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"An excellent place for authentic Italian food. The atmosphere is cozy, and the food is outstanding. The appetizer, pizza, and spaghetti all exceeded my expectations. The service was good too; Mackenzie took great care of us. I would definitely recommend this place if you're interested in trying pure Italian cuisine.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOYA5c69kThz3xTHcZwDAfRcC65m1SpYLcBNryW&fid=0x0:0x64c1a3ddeb0f39bb"],"When":"2024-9-30"},{"Name":"Vicki Morrison","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ5PphYbOEz_S6Y5pjGfVKEpc03pY6JxVEF8aMKHbLyQZAegw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My Aunt and I had a fabulous evening.  We were warmly greeted by the owner.  He assisted us in selecting a lovely robust Italian red wine that paired beautifully with our meal and explained the menu items to us in detail.  I enjoyed the carbonara while my aunt had the tagliette with tomatoes and burrata, both were presented beautifully and very delicious.  We finished off our evening by sharing their scrumptious Tiramisu.  I will definitely return next time I am visiting.   Thanks for a fabulous experience!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPylP98fHkOaxC2Zk5dguKXpyvzn3yAyVQDvfRw&fid=0x0:0x64c1a3ddeb0f39bb"],"When":"2024-11-27"},{"Name":"S C","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLRMl2YKAAKc7sPmSvGp3PQTTe7EIYxMhTechNTB9PTQolChQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I was looking for a dog friendly spot to eat in North Van after a hike and this was one of the options I had. No regrets with giving them a try. I had a great experience. The staff members were super friendly. Put 2 tables together for us outside and checked up on us. Good pasta with a decent portion size. A generous amount of mussels compared to what you would get at other restaurants. Recommend. If you sit out, no alcohol can be served. They also serve Gelato!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNaS_1EiFUJ5R6rb9G9w3bOysOgtFny18FV157J&fid=0x0:0x64c1a3ddeb0f39bb"],"When":"2024-7-29"},{"Name":"Hsieh Karen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIhW3l2BNOrcwoWjXM_gL9tH9CdoN7kn3tptRftQsqmOSEcwyY=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We came for lunch with 2 young children, and one of my boys is allergic to gluten. The staff was very friendly to let us know that they could tailor some dishes to gluten-free. Although it took a while for the dishes to be served, we really enjoyed the dishes.My boys ate lots. We also got a scoop of strawberry Gelato to go.The gelato for sure was the icing on the cake!

If we are around next time, definitely would like to try out other dishes.

*Excuse for the first photo, cause my kids can't wait to dig in.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOCHKu6JKP0-4R-lhOWgWwXysDs-orMRDaXJPRk&fid=0x0:0x64c1a3ddeb0f39bb"],"When":"2024-8-11"},{"Name":"David Le","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUYWwbbj5xYvMxtEEq5HNMw_xynPQLHyq4Oq1zkZVKlnUQ0hjx8=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Our favourite place to have a nice dinner in North Vancouver. My Cucina is owned and operated by a friendly and extremely knowledgeable chef named Razvan. He is a part of the North Vancouver community.  He sources a number of his ingredients from Italy as well.

Everything on the menu is wonderful. On the starter side, we love the bruschetta with mango and prosciutto, and the prosciutto with burata cheese & arugula.

For mains, our kids love the Tagliatelle al Ragu alla Bolognese and the Pizza della Casa (Chef's Pizza). Our kids have allergies to eggs and nuts, and the staff are always outstanding at checking on allergies and preparing dishes in a way that is safe for them.

My personal favorite entrees are Spaghetti alle Cozze (Spaghetti with Mussels, garlic, and white wine), Spaghetti al Pesto con Pomodorini, and the Rigatoni con pesto di Pistacchio e Guanciale. The gnocchi is also fantastic, and the carbonara is a pleasure.

There is now a new lunch special as well.

We love this spot, and come back often. Great food and service, and a local business worth supporting.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPpEe3FNe9qLSUjj1iwhHIrBVy_DSnYUgMTM7qZ&fid=0x0:0x64c1a3ddeb0f39bb"],"When":"2024-8-29"},{"Name":"W","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIl73j4Tlojzv_ajj1iOCjnMkET0DPwHfRtrMjXlVWUCtjOqA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Yesterday we went this restaurant. The food we ate was the best. We ate¬† pizza and pasta. It was so so delicious with deep flavor. It was little bit salty for my husband's pasta and expected thirsty later but he didn't feel thirsty at all until this morning.¬† When my husband mentioned that his pasta was bit salty and owner made new pasta for him.¬† We really impressed that owner's kindness and confident for the food that he uses very good ingredient. They don't use salt but uses generous ingredients...
They tried best to please¬† customer. we felt comfortable and¬† relax ... atmosphere.¬† Anyway we all enjoyed happy moments while having lunch there.¬†¬†¬† We want to go back again...üëçüèºüëçüèº","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMcndPZMFSAzsoDzgmlozIXS905ks3tlfISqI4h&fid=0x0:0x64c1a3ddeb0f39bb"],"When":"2023-12-31"}]

[{"Name":"Dooyi Kim","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXE04OH6QJwbK2otI-LkstRX0Vl5gtBCif5z_TRvh0lKaV_Koej=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Excellent pizza with a crust. We really enjoyed our meal in their cozy space and would definitely come back for future dinners. Thanks üòä","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOynPxmj5ouk9MdFd2QSlJ1EgftVhLD77MHUjNy&fid=0x0:0xa1e04530bd390beb"],"When":"2024-9-3"},{"Name":"Afreen J","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWL1ZeweaycOte33MDbmpSg8MtgerWXZP23M-ogg8fCZaa9zvz8=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great service, great pizza.

Had the brussel sprouts pizza, definitely a new flavour for me since it had honey on it. Nice ambience to the place to dine in.

There are only 2-3 vegetarian options for pizza.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOudjzVr12LensYGoJzga0WYqLzcegxyu3EYxIs&fid=0x0:0xa1e04530bd390beb"],"When":"2024-9-15"},{"Name":"Panteha Ebrahimii","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWp1neZmF9TAV9Mm2SPPocowHUnqOs_JTslv6MT8SBP5-H-Z0A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I‚Äôve been to Scratch another location before, so I was excited to try their new Lonsdale branch. I‚Äôm happy to say it was just as good, if not better.

This branch has a modern and cozy feel. The lighting is warm, and the seating is comfortable. It‚Äôs a nice place to relax and enjoy a meal.
The staff were friendly and helpful. Our waiter knew a lot about the menu and gave us great suggestions. We felt well taken care of during our visit.
Just like at the other branch, the food here was amazing. We ordered the marinated crispy tofu bowl , which was perfectly cooked. It was amazing experience for me and I will definitely go back for another delicious meal.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP7_IU9dKBpG455FBaXo3c2sM5VClAtaNYeRNj5&fid=0x0:0xa1e04530bd390beb"],"When":"2024-5-17"},{"Name":"Ivan Katz","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLCPAXGm5aKjoGRQJlcvnDyKo8EfNmRz0gWSENU5FNE415ZLA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Found this new spot and it's a gem. My dad  loved the Bombay at Butter Chicken pizza, and he is not necessarily the most adventurous eater. My prosciutto pizza was spot on. The dough is very high quality and cooked to perfection. Many Neapolitan pizza places end up with soggy dough centres, not this one. Great undercarriage. We're hooked and keep coming back. Service was excellent too. Oh, and don't miss the kale salad and peking duck pizza ‚Äì they're amazing too. Worth a visit for sure.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMDEDK8rzzf5OUNKt02ShGYNVYxAP_6frO0rWiC&fid=0x0:0xa1e04530bd390beb"],"When":"2024-4-1"},{"Name":"Guido Katz","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW756N_y_XbKgSp669VUrJgIDk83KNLFkLGHJ4L5Ux8Kkgzc9eL=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We were 4 adults for dinner. Excellent customer service awesome pizzas, delicious and original. Fair price. If you like pizza you have to try Scratch.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMB6IGgvVZgLnWCAvitysifcW6G9jP5I26SsjnT&fid=0x0:0xa1e04530bd390beb"],"When":"2024-3-27"},{"Name":"Remy Herda","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVfm5sXYwW47IliNtGu2OTHHy1kMw43KNo8u-P1TLws07MSbXs=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The food was delicious especially the Buttermilk Fired chicken üêî amazing and the pizza of the day","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNQyQNfwUSADUtRU8cwfyco_ME2uNRiifvzxvKC&fid=0x0:0xa1e04530bd390beb"],"When":"2024-9-21"},{"Name":"Sogol Khalessi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIZzS1R7nD7nEM-UDueuf7_uZtW7ppi49MRjWO7fmPpxJv4=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Very disappointing  experience with our recent delivery order from Scratch Lonsdale. I had guest and I ordered mushroom Pizza , the mushrooms were burned and pizza was impossible to eat . Unfortunately upon calling them, I received a rude & dismissive respond they just offered a voucher for next order. Poor customer service.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPk8Xlet7jGx9U2XWRE534Hcn9h29JonJ1Xwm4&fid=0x0:0xa1e04530bd390beb"],"When":"2024-8-12"},{"Name":"Darya Ostad","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJrY8Bp3vZFa9a7YflsxnTMdQeJTEsOyf_wXKgsrzzFnO164A=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Sophia was our server and she was amazing! Like a fairy that comes to your table and gives you everything you need (:

Food was great ‚Äî not easy to find good gluten free pizza!
I like the lighting for the atmosphere. It‚Äôs a cozy and intimate spot

Will def visit again.","Images":null,"When":""}]

title: Bori Korean Restaurant
address: 2039 Lonsdale Ave, North Vancouver, BC V7M 2K4

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Emma F","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW0dlt8ocxLH7yPca2ojNkGI_PBBfsXKMNtqOXZnh4xc0FK3htC=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Love it. It's been several years since I visited here.I was at first sad that the previous Korean restaurant had closed. I was not disappointed with the current iteration that operates in this. Love the food choices, we were not disappointed and left with a pile of take home for later. Quick and friendly service at a wonderful price.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMu6XY0bgvJyE5I54WbpJTsKdtzq7lW0Cc6Akwy&fid=0x0:0x7e1c5a0e477e91dc"],"When":"2024-9-21"},{"Name":"John Kim","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJregxc3_fCZvjsOnXVnua2b7W3a62231b72eOiaC_v0L6ydg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great quality of food with authentic Korean taste - can't praise enough the cold noodles (naengmyeon) and braised spicy chicken (dak-dori-tang). It's definitely one of my go-to places when I'm in the area!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNjKe1r9fZzBoAT5ODlkN13Al1yaAfrU0uXy6Iz&fid=0x0:0x7e1c5a0e477e91dc"],"When":"2024-8-2"},{"Name":"Kimberly Pham","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWO1dARYUL2Mzc-rZaF6IoFRL6CQVAIOAT6Zusl515wQAooebafSw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"During our journey to Whistler, we made a pit stop in this area to recharge my car, and we took the opportunity to grab some lunch. With everyone in our group expressing curiosity about this place, we ultimately decided to give it a try. The establishment appeared to be well-maintained, and the service was friendly, albeit a bit slow. However, my friends were disappointed with their meals, finding them lacking in flavor and too plain. While my noodle dish was enjoyable, it didn't quite justify the high price considering the portion size. It felt like this Korean restaurant deviated from the traditional experience I usually seek. One aspect I particularly appreciate in Korean restaurants is the variety of side dishes, but here they only provided three small ones, and we had to repeatedly request more kimchi. Considering the overall cost, we concluded that the value for money was not satisfactory. If we find ourselves in the area again, we'll probably opt for a different restaurant.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMkJluxGw-da_OpOqjKxgg74UL-u6Is-N1JRE_n&fid=0x0:0x7e1c5a0e477e91dc"],"When":"2023-7-5"},{"Name":"Dooyi Kim","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXE04OH6QJwbK2otI-LkstRX0Vl5gtBCif5z_TRvh0lKaV_Koej=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Everything was delicious, and in pretty good quantity for the price. Quality of food was great, and presentation of the side dishes was superb! The ambiance was such that it made this the perfect spot for korean restaurant.
Would highly recommend!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNmVxfVSvB2EjB3Tizi4UbWhbMUN6lKTbvnnKgG&fid=0x0:0x7e1c5a0e477e91dc"],"When":"2022-8-9"},{"Name":"samuel shin","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKU1HICEqG2-PG1AHaMAu5dqiogGfb2-vZSdEhP6Q9-OBGFbw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"We dined in on a Saturday night an hour before close where the business was quite empty with two other parties. We came in with eight people and the server looked already quite agitated that we came in with so many people, even though there were seats available.

Already sitting down, the restaurant forgot to give us utensils for the entire group, we had to ask on two separate occasions to provide us with the utensils.

When it came to the meal we ordered the soondubu, bulgogi, japchae kimchi fried rice. The fried rice and bulgogi wasn‚Äôt terrible, just very salty. While the japchae never even made it out of the kitchen as the server had completely forgotten to even put it into the system. When it came to the soondubu, the soup came out and the visual was very unappetizing. Taking my first bite, a large clump of what looked like gum came out and it was very unsettling. When I asked the server what that was, she took it to the back and I was informed that it was a block of seasoning that was not dissolved. But to me, if a block of seasoning that big can make it into the dish, then it wasn‚Äôt cooked properly.

The server then asked me ‚Äúwhat should they do about it‚Äù. Which perplexed me, because if a customer is complaining that their food that they know wasn‚Äôt cooked properly, the first course of action should be to replace. Also they never even bothered to apologize for the incident.

Throughout the entire meal, the service was abysmal. When we would ask questions or need anything brought to the table, the server wouldn‚Äôt even respond and walk away. We would need to walk to the kitchen to order additional bowls of rice as the server had never came by to check on our meals.

Overall, this was the worst experience I‚Äôve had at a Korean restaurant in Vancouver, let alone worst experience at a restaurant in general. Take your money anywhere else than here. Hire some better staff or give them the most basic training in customer service and hospitality.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Kanako Sakurada","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKYybgPjG_d3LYq66Ui47Ocd_2PMrfkKaju5V_L0IyVTR19lQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Cold noodle season is here! It‚Äôs so refreshing in summer.

We also had a bibimbap and small mixed fried set. The fried set was nice mixture of pancakes and jeon. It would be perfect with beer or soju.

I found this place versatile‚Ä¶ could be a quick noodle lunch place, full set dinner place, or Izakaya drinking place. Good selection of foods on menu.
Open lunch to 9:30 pm","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN6v3sTHCv5D_oEk7tYrM_LBPIazlmSuwqsEqmT&fid=0x0:0x7e1c5a0e477e91dc"],"When":"2023-7-10"},{"Name":"Kara P","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUjg1k6HQ3dTSLd6-3GD__tca76hpSq2TW047xZX9CkdCgr848=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is my first visit here, the foods were all good!
Especially the Dakdori-tang was perfect~
and also server was kind, The atmosphere here is also good. I love bori restaurant! I assure you, I‚Äòll definitely come back~","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOJVMQjMoHNyyP9fuDk3Sxqsg1dpCwJhyWiC7ND&fid=0x0:0x7e1c5a0e477e91dc"],"When":"2024-4-11"},{"Name":"Josephine Ma","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW4ctBP8R2rm9S8Aa5NyuULMapTvyTQYakS6AvI9Cd025oSy86H=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"My husband and I went out for lunch with my mom at Bori Korean Restaurant. We  ordered: Deep Fried Chicken, Seafood Pancake, Japchae noodles (vegetarian), and Hot Pot Rice with Fish Roe.

Flavourful, warm, hearty food on a cold winter's day. Everything was delicious but our favourite was the Hot Pot Rice with Fish Roe. We'd never seen this on a Korean menu before and it was wonderful. I always love colourful dishes and this dish was colourful. It was also a nice change of pace from ordering the standard Bibimbap rice dish that we usually order at Korean restaurants. Fish Roe are tiny but it's amazing how such a tiny ingredient can make such a huge difference to food. It really elevated this dish to another level.

Service: Could have been better
Parking: Free parking on Lonsdale or on some of the side streets
Location: 2039 Lonsdale Ave., North Vancouver","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNs2Gz6e1uRIr43tTed9hp9A1XyfNhtdzK_rrJG&fid=0x0:0x7e1c5a0e477e91dc"],"When":"2023-3-15"}]

descriptions: Totem-decorated spot serves classic Canadian comfort food made with free-range eggs & organic beef.
