user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Bradley Jones","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWQSjOdt_NCThfrgQQSPCAI9c1m2q4Cia70lWTZMyAGLNwKu8R3=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I used to come here as a little kid, more than 45 years ago, and stepping inside now feels like flipping through an old photo album. The room? Just the same as I remember it, frozen in time. The Reuben? Toasty, warm, and exactly the kind of comfort food you crave when you want to relive the good old days. On those rainy days, the Tomahawk‚Äôs your cozy refuge. Slip into a booth or pull up a bar stool, and let the simple, hearty cooking take you back to simpler times.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOnjiwooRhoX1_KSB_YD2QmChq15EgU5xSx7Tq-&fid=0x0:0xdef40704411305d0"],"When":"2024-10-1"},{"Name":"Daniel Hartwick","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXGbMgned5NZXuB7Pp9t-LEbvQhn64_MkABaDDfp5UM293vUa1K=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Wow ! I almost met my match as a ' clean your plate ' generation dude, baby boomer ! I had the mixed platter. And ok, when you see a pic of what you order, it normally looks bigger than what you get BUT this breakfast was HUGE, GIGANTIC...but, I'm still undefeated, finished it. Food quality EXCELLENT,  Environment inside great, service very very good. Son, had the steak breakfast combo, Wow!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMq_4T7x7yI54B_hemBOmQBAh7GaEaIZUGfuCBZ&fid=0x0:0xdef40704411305d0"],"When":"2024-8-3"},{"Name":"John Pavich","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXHek5v_fSX8duNwx8Lk4q5we1_sn_ea56cGbxqkYRBa9BZuAW0LQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This restaurant has been operating by the same family for 98 years, quite something. The place is decorated with native carvings etc on the walls and ceiling.
They even have a free cardboard headband which looks like a native Indian headress. When I was a kid they were made of real feathers really cool. We would play with them for weeks until they fell apart.
Now about the food everyone gets a large bottle on their table with  mint leaves after you are seated. Their yukon breakfast features many slices of back bacon and delicious cube potatoes and free run eggs.
My favourite dish is the Salisbury steak with creamy mashed potatoes with tasty gravy and eldente mixed vegetables, my mouth waters everytime I think of this organic Salisbury  steak.
It's the best Salisbury steak I have ever tasted and I've tried many but this is the best!!!
Their burgers are also very good!!
All the food is very tasty as well as their desserts, lemon meringue pie, etc","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPNiXl18dRk3z-e0exR3u0mWNKR-znwsF78HIve&fid=0x0:0xdef40704411305d0"],"When":"2024-7-26"},{"Name":"Munro Stuff","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWj0Wcuk6ox5dfAeJ4fAaMbhX_F-nzzt3p5oc_f0hBd0NpbGSM=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Classic setting and menu. Had a good breakfast here. Nice touch with mint in the water! And of course the decor is steeped in nostalgia and history.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOpfoKqEWjDjUjAEaNg6JMrm-I7VKdV9UrEK7gR&fid=0x0:0xdef40704411305d0"],"When":"2024-10-29"},{"Name":"Mahshad Refahatnia","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV0MWQXxK5H2ziADPybrpxrMcK2Wslz2Div7r7YjJ_M8wxhH16N=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Perfect experience! I ordered Hot-Outta-The-Pan from breakfast menu and that was amazing. Delicious foodü§§ perfect service, and very nice staffüòç. I enjoyed everything. It has always been my choice.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPwbUlUqydNTzXfnADpcjXyE6FZxgDYHveCj40a&fid=0x0:0xdef40704411305d0"],"When":"2024-7-31"},{"Name":"Michael Tillman","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVIqH_3syZwokgngl1kBc3IT8skyBdxdvC20Biu1xB7LDCpAINrmA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Beautiful old building with wood trusses supporting the ceiling. It was a Jahovah Witness lodge before becoming a restaurant.  They serve breakfast all day, and their omelets were terrific. The staff was very friendly. Bathrooms were clean, as was the restaurant. It is a very popular spot. The outside only shows the street number, 1540 aside from the two totem poles. We drove past it. It is like a museum with hundreds of native West Coast indigenous objects hanging from the support beams and along the bar. The two paddles in the picture, on the top, are over 80 years old.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOHUQTXQO8gbgitEJbbJUlt-wq4PFNJY4DFAzZu&fid=0x0:0xdef40704411305d0"],"When":"2024-6-15"},{"Name":"Dav Szeto","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUYmubZvWNenXzrOujgiR1RnE_-widEcaQTYFg-BfnKxIp473k=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Always like this kitschy place indigenous theme diner apparently opened since 1926. Good diner food, hardy breakfast and staples like meatloaf and roasted turkey dinner. A must try place for all foodie. Just a heads up that although the place is clean it is older and does require some deep cleaning as it's filled with memorabilia. The forced air heating definitely needs service as it smell of mustiness.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Melanie E","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUR0bJcxqNkJt-i1wxCH3EaQXevncA86panZszfT__NAs_0KWRp=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I hadn't been here in at least 7 years. What an improvement! Better and tastier food. We dined in for lunch & shared the Organic Turkey Clubhouse and organic Simon Baker burger with fries.

Food: 5/5 - fantastic prices considering you're getting organic beef and turkey. They even offer a couple of lunch specials ranging from $15 to $20. They also offer dinner specials at $35 on Fridays, Saturdays, & Sundays. If you like burgers, this is a must order. Food came out hot and was fresh. Good selection of breakfast and lunch items.

Service: 5/5 - friendly server who came to our table a few times asking if we needed anything

Atmosphere: 5/5 - great ambiance. You feel like you're in a museum of beautiful Indigenous art & baskets. Nice vibe to the place. Lots of history here.

Parking: 5/5 - parking in front of the building or on the street

We'll be back for the dinner! Note: they are closed on Mondays. Hours on Fridays, Saturdays and Sundays: 9 am to 8 pm and Tues and Wednesday: 9 am - 4 pm.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOWWFEl5THuLti4MN4wLEeWpQIi3eywOh13OW8m&fid=0x0:0xdef40704411305d0"],"When":"2024-3-12"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Mehdi sh","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXF_EQWBFWXmLJdRcBV-MtJ8SEv8MdCMD8PjQwKUYACMRzackID=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Everything was in excellent condition. The food was perfectly cooked, juicy, and tender. The restaurant is clean, offering a relaxing and cozy environment where you can enjoy your meal while listening to beautiful Persian music. The lady owner was kind and professional, giving us peace of mind that the restaurant is managed by someone who truly knows how to run it.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNb3BuVv0XOhGepgIZmxly8g6U6AMjxCFfhjpeM&fid=0x0:0x3392f1f66d9e55db"],"When":"2024-11-24"},{"Name":"Devan Chi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUtSt6qsdZUTz39ri5BiZcQQns5LUWm5IHqVD6KnrmgK57waSw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Excellent and memorable meal. Great taste and presentation, nice interior (and really comfy chairs), clean, and friendly owner. Try the baklava!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNZd_-Uhj-HayPzgSv20rj9sf1feeR3Lig5Cj_d&fid=0x0:0x3392f1f66d9e55db"],"When":"2024-11-17"},{"Name":"Vancouver Foodie","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI8w6jkWQhHhs1Z246avVvoKQqrR4N6KZDvvFaklq629YACSQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"A hidden gem of Persian food in North Vancouver.

Lots of great dishes. If you are close by, it's worth a try.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPJJQBVkB1fWV4OwcCAATsA0jTxFqMlb7QRm43V&fid=0x0:0x3392f1f66d9e55db"],"When":"2024-7-21"},{"Name":"Michael Sayyad","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUnZoB3LAHhC30kzCYvZX844CLVY2QcbcHc_FgoerhWXrYctwQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Amazing food and service. Quality of the beef and chicken were top and cooked perfectly. Juicy and tasty... Baklava was amazing. Rice was perfect. Best experience ever!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMjqg2ocD1V71DQ6h-_YZmMn03aW7QByA9KmbF2&fid=0x0:0x3392f1f66d9e55db"],"When":"2024-6-17"},{"Name":"Danial Emamhosseini","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW5yG-bMHoqbxyxcViS4vlLPGdzC7_8fQszfYP-souswf40xgFM=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Fresh food and great taste with a friendly staff. I also Highly suggest Baklava.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPo8BFy1ZeRMadVUv7RoIi5Tro0SF7xMHQ0Hwwy&fid=0x0:0x3392f1f66d9e55db"],"When":"2024-10-8"},{"Name":"Paris","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU0WPazoJBCdtRqTbBzCZwEk_hqahECBnbuv3HHVvW2_zNHbRKn=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Last night, we experienced a memorable night at this restaurant.
Saboo is a cozy spot filled with Persian charm. As we entered, the warm lights and Persian d√©cor made us feel right at home.

The kebabs stole our hearts. Each skewer was packed with flavor, taking us on a culinary journey to the bustling streets of Tehran.

The staff at Saboo were friendly and attentive, making our dining experience even more enjoyable. Plus, with plenty of parking available, we could relax and savor every bite without worry.
They also had a beautiful decoration for Nowruz."
Saboo is more than just a restaurant; it's a place where Persian flavors shine bright, inviting everyone to taste a piece of Iran.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMju0r7hg9PTDWmRAmnwpg8B_7WuwuAjstQ3R7H&fid=0x0:0x3392f1f66d9e55db"],"When":"2024-3-22"},{"Name":"Hana Kadri","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUr6wpOlRJ4zXMoxHED5VrxaqD67fPnr8qNYNa_JwMWJQEgS00f=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The best Persian food I‚Äôve ever had. Amazing staff. Amazing service. Restaurant is clean and the food is amazing! Great portions and perfect seasoning. Definitely recommend.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNitYgb0-S0F1YflGQWnvEQVPjaICZ-gbmw5X0q&fid=0x0:0x3392f1f66d9e55db"],"When":"2024-8-4"},{"Name":"Aoife Dowling","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVvABFb6XaP6q7RHIG7RcWPWoka_1aD70S1Mvez-ZjbmhV02p6Z=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"What a find! So, it‚Äôs a little hard to find the parking (on a main road - you need to go to their back door) and it was a bit quiet as we are the only ones there in a Tuesday night, but my oh my, worth the effort. Their rating is well deserved.

We had their Kabab Koobide ($19)
2 Skewers of Saffron Marinated Ground Beef & Rice, and their breaded shrimp (8 pieces) we shared this between two of us and it was plenty unless you‚Äôre starving. The rice was incredible saffron crunch in the top. The meat was really tasty and tender. Follow the advice to sprinkle some of the sour salt spice on top.

The dipping sauce for the prawns wasn‚Äôt my favourite but the shrimp more than made up for that. Nice draft beer as well. Very friendly service. Can‚Äôt recommend enough. We‚Äôll be back for certain.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMoOqUqeZ3QSBOizHZ7gdbzJCCRjvsSrjmw66vD&fid=0x0:0x3392f1f66d9e55db"],"When":"2023-5-31"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Dharmendra Awasthi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIV4bH4pruWuwHwvFeVB2D5sgfuAyTLFuB7xlIyVnDZPxnWyw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I had the pleasure of enjoying breakfast every morning at Medley‚Äôs Grill, and it became one of the highlights of my stay in North Vancouver! The food was consistently fresh, flavorful, and perfectly prepared.
Special thanks to Mr. Raj, who greeted me warmly every day, adding a personal touch that made me feel right at home. Kudos to the chef as well‚Äîthe attention to detail in each dish was impressive, and every bite was a delight. Highly recommend Medley‚Äôs Grill for anyone looking for a great start to their day with excellent service and delicious food! You cab find pictures of items with great taste!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNHeoZAHkecFZGc2t9kYVjZnfQkw6y9xW0Jk5Hu&fid=0x0:0x8536bf29b5adce11"],"When":"2024-11-9"},{"Name":"Paul Jacobson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI2HBD4f00h5UqewL3-ewcwTM9EcFvhH1ajV3fIuVz6NgDWYQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"One of the best lunch places associated with a hotel. Servers were attentive and pleasant. The meals were ample and delicious..
Nicely presented. A bit noisy, but someone was having a special birthday:)  oh yes, the extensive menu made selecting a meal a challenge.  I guess we will have to go back on our next visit.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOXfDvbWS33b7aX3pCmLfs1_VxUgqGMNtBE2Y2X&fid=0x0:0x8536bf29b5adce11"],"When":"2024-3-23"},{"Name":"Panteha Ebrahimii","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWp1neZmF9TAV9Mm2SPPocowHUnqOs_JTslv6MT8SBP5-H-Z0A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I recently had breakfast at Medley‚Äôs Italian & Grill Restaurant. While the food was good, with delicious pancakes, perfectly poached eggs, and tasty potatoes, the experience was slightly marred by the bread arriving very late. Despite this hiccup, I still enjoyed my meal and would consider returning for another visit.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOxUgEQ3qvGoqblczSCWypNPQ3-yI3vuX4mlIzU&fid=0x0:0x8536bf29b5adce11"],"When":"2024-6-18"},{"Name":"Curtis Austin","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVCGZZ1k_-A-MlN3V02dyIx4v40F_dyXIMvpPUn1-FFT0Kr2iZg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Very weird experience with Medley‚Äôs!

I ordered Fish and Chips on Skip the Dishes, menu description says that it comes with two pieces of cod. Only 1 piece arrived.

I ate what arrived and it was DELICIOUS, and very well cooked, would 100% go into the restaurant and order this again.

I then filed a report with Skip letting them know that there is a mistake with the menu description and there was a lot of confusion. If it is only supposed to be one piece then please please edit the description on the app.

I specifically said I enjoyed the food and didn‚Äôt require a refund, and just wanted them to notify the restaurant of the error - however a full refund was applied anyway.

Great food! Will visit in person very soon!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNloLk76eMx7HHYWFyZQFvIMmEXTqTFyOdEXXQT&fid=0x0:0x8536bf29b5adce11"],"When":"2024-11-9"},{"Name":"Amar Shan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLOVcxE45W_CVBLTCgWqUwvlVQzo2kDNYjNrHgzI_ctbcqVZA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Wow!!!    Just.... wow!    The chef at Medley's is a true artiste - every food item delivered is an example of "food as art".

I had lunch here, expecting a standard hotel diner experience.  Boy, was I surprised!   The calamari was exquisite - perfectly fresh, the dipping sauce nicely matched - and a lovely balance of colours with peppers that made the presentation as good as the taste.

Next up was my schnitzel.   Super!!!  Easily up to the standards of a German restaurant.  (I asked the waitress about it - it turns out, the chef recently immigrated from Germany, where he was a master chef. I have no doubt that, once he's saved up some money, he'll open a ultra high end restaurant rivalling the best in the city.  Meanwhile, this really is your chance to enjoy fine dining at a bargain price.)

One of the friends with whom I was dining had the butternut squash ravioli.  She commented the pasta was cooked al dente, to perfection, and the sauce was fantastic.   Topped with prawns that were apparently delicious as well.

Trying to lose weight, but this place was too good to skip dessert.   The creme br√ªl√©e is made in house and I can report that it came up to the standards of the rest of the meal!!  Forgot to take a picture though.

I think I have a new favourite restaurant!  :)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMYOfvolr3kEvDoC1kdPnPzyt9WIbDx6MI5QYSm&fid=0x0:0x8536bf29b5adce11"],"When":"2023-8-24"},{"Name":"Kyle James-Patrick","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX2KmLqnKw5OuLPD3VmvEWziRB1HxsCYMBA4SJkhviIYoPHiTXf=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Take a Dennys, paint it grey, make the plates massive and cut the portions by half. Drop the food quality and  are looking at the most miserable overpriced breakfast. Avoid.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOQ1uLLytqkgufkyXo4Ra2UNbeWbFN2o-7CHnf3&fid=0x0:0x8536bf29b5adce11"],"When":"2024-8-25"},{"Name":"Simay Seydanoglu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVfokMeINg0SamF1_jc_J_mOJcC6WJBJiCx4j-of7tkFk5w5Y3h=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My husband and I had a wonderful time at Medley's. The place felt cozy and friendly as soon as we walked in. ‚ù§Ô∏è The service was really attentive, making us feel taken care of. We ordered salmon carpaccio and steak with prawns. The carpaccio was super tasty and delicate. The steak with prawns was the highlight though ‚Äì it was cooked perfectly and had a great mix of flavors.

The staff was also really nice and knew a lot about the menu. ‚≠êÔ∏è

We left with happy hearts and full stomachs, excited to come back again. üéâ","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPd1NtsQQj3hsJArejpCZGIzlpU920B1zlXT5SE&fid=0x0:0x8536bf29b5adce11"],"When":"2023-8-22"},{"Name":"Nancy Eng","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWcGv6gtuGoB4q0FH36loktozWsI0RrX0uz_jnCkvW-6ItYAw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"What a nice place!  Never heard of it and only tried it because of the Google reviews.

It was good food, the juiciest pork chop, even the kids like it.  Good value kids meal, with entree, aide, pop and ice cream.    Great service,  very attentive and polite.   Decent prices,  good variety of entrees,  good service,  makes 5 stars!  I would eat here again and recommend it to friends.

It's a bit hard to find the entrance,  but it's tucked in behind the Seymour Pub.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPYVOZEagMfJoLvlCKNeUKg7iJ9_fagdboimVk&fid=0x0:0x8536bf29b5adce11"],"When":"2022-8-19"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Jizelle Garcia","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJyzSeMMMmQJNd8WDethczxr3uXNdjORpbX-butxHOVp0pXxetz=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Some of the best pizza I've had in a long time! The toppings were very creative, flavourful, and generous, and the dough was perfectly fluffy yet crisp. However, I do wish there was a vegan protein option for the pizzas. As for the salad it was a bit plain, and could use salt and some citrus, sweet, or creamy element but other than that I love it here! It was clean, cozy, modern and the service was great. They refilled my water before I even noticed it was getting empty, which is rare, and made conversation with us. Super sweet and attentive and the menu was accomodating for vegans. If the other pizzas are just as good as this one it'll definitely be my new go-to pizza spot! Will be back for sure.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMcvNmtsIkLhcyj8JI6yUt7uQnvyfkT5VRXrazo&fid=0x0:0x5b0831c3c22b0f30"],"When":"2024-7-6"},{"Name":"Jacki Steenken","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW9lMdLA_qxtmWTAQxT5wEGeD8f4GuKMxB8fTHyr7TGaIRX-Vt7=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Pizza is delicious!!  Original brussel sprout is definitely a favourite.  Hand tossed crust, always fresh.  Service is friendly, timely and unobtrusive.  Casual atmosphere, good wine choices, if a bit expensive.  Devon is awesome!!!  We have seen this place go through transformations and its current character and menu is the best!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"TJ Bar","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVNV5JMIsKH69fAGV6iM37bM0CI-DVYRNcijWMK-jJBIbmjr1g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Nice little Place great comfy vibe menu is a bit small not much selection but must say the Buffalo Cauliflower Wings are By Far best thing on the menu..","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNWwzmqMTGv036UKxUNe_VBSfTGsP7-qYDJqKOC&fid=0x0:0x5b0831c3c22b0f30"],"When":"2024-10-28"},{"Name":"Tal Gill","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXdcX5lteMW7YGdoBC5XzBwLnJaPXqogWXPCXIWpiTDj9lk9pSg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I recently had the pleasure of dining at Scratch Kitchen, and I must say it was an exceptional experience. From the moment my wife and I walked in, we were greeted with warm hospitality and a cozy ambiance. The star of our dining experience, however, was undoubtedly our fantastic waitress, Jacoba. Her attentive and friendly service truly enhanced our evening.

One of the highlights of our visit to Scratch Kitchen was undoubtedly the pizza. The moment our pizzas arrived at our table, we knew we were in for a treat. The flavors were out of this world, and the attention to detail was evident in every bite. The crust was perfectly crispy on the outside while remaining delightfully chewy on the inside. Each slice was generously topped with high-quality ingredients, creating a medley of flavors that danced on our taste buds.

What impressed us even more was the restaurant's commitment to catering to different dietary preferences. My wife, being a vegan, was thrilled to find a variety of options tailored to her needs. Her vegan pizza was a masterpiece in itself, with a delectable combination of plant-based cheeses, fresh vegetables, and a flavorful tomato sauce. It's not easy to find vegan pizzas that taste this good, and Scratch Kitchen exceeded our expectations.

Beyond the exceptional food, the atmosphere at Scratch Kitchen was warm and inviting. The rustic decor and cozy seating added to the overall charm of the restaurant. The staff members were attentive and friendly, and it was evident that they took pride in providing a memorable dining experience for their guests.

Overall, I highly recommend Scratch Kitchen to anyone seeking a remarkable dining experience. Whether you're a pizza lover or have specific dietary preferences, this restaurant caters to a variety of tastes and will leave you craving more. Make sure to request Jacoba as your waitress for exceptional service. With its phenomenal pizzas, commitment to dietary options, and inviting atmosphere, Scratch Kitchen truly stands out as a culinary gem.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOK0K5gpP7ptzf4xbCBZ-G_2uArYscd_dPS7qzs&fid=0x0:0x5b0831c3c22b0f30"],"When":"2023-6-1"},{"Name":"Adele Barnett","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJlKeNpkF3-ajmNXl3fkiMG0jQqNqTy_pscUNVSFDGdQdanzA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We love Scratch Kitchen! First of all they‚Äôre at Dollarton Village so parking is never an issue. The restaurant indoor outdoor seating is so comfortable. The tables are nicely spaced so that you don‚Äôt feel like you‚Äôre sitting on top of each other. We are always very warmly welcomed by our name every time we are there. And we know some of their names too; Eric, Devin, Jacoba, Danielle. Sorry we can‚Äôt name everyone. Whether you order their fabulous pizzas which ARE made from scratch, or their delicious share plates, salads or bowls, there‚Äôs something for everyone whether you‚Äôre a meat eater or vegetarian. It‚Äôs a lovely neighbourhood restaurant, which means we bump into our neighbour friends as well. Sometimes we keep to ourselves, and other times our friends join us. We love Scratch Kitchen. Best neighbourhood restaurant ever.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Daniel Silver","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJawI80c4qwvuA-pWmht_nhIypwFKNS8vUDHnZIepoqs0gJvft7=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Excellent pizza with a soft enjoyable crust. We really enjoyed our meal in their cozy space and would definitely come back for future dinners.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPfwwxKf8bQDDZp19lXXh_K30U9pKBrZGDrP0eG&fid=0x0:0x5b0831c3c22b0f30"],"When":"2024-4-2"},{"Name":"Sonja","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLjBZDaWPBNPaPEd5AwjWtwX_kHcgIVbDfxt0-hFAUFEb5QuA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"First time here. It was such an amazing experience. I saw their google review score 4.9. They deserve it. We ordered Cauliflower wings (happy hour), Wake N bacon pizza, and Beef burger. Cauliflower wings were very soft inside but crunch outside. Pizza dough was really chewy! Best pizza ever in Vancouver. I forgot to take a picture of the burger but burger's bun was chewy too. Service is also perfect. Food was just amazing. I will definitely come back.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP_DWTvNA77xVQzwChzxLuCDjrURqQSFCqEEh50&fid=0x0:0x5b0831c3c22b0f30"],"When":"2019-3-24"},{"Name":"Natalie Wong","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXVdMEZao-67POAEux-SFUvHf6mNIJZCHK8pVj8oEkwUqt-4SZfdQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Lovely space, tasty food, and friendly staff. On a weekday afternoon, there were a few tables, but definitely not super busy. They have quite a lot of seating from along the window, to the bar, and high tops too. I liked the light fixtures and plants along the wall.

We decided on getting the fried chicken, a mushroom, and a brussel sprout pizza. The fried chicken was plated nicely and smelled amazing. The chicken was crisp and still very tender on the inside. I just wish it was a tad crisper on the  outside. I loved the pairing with grainy mustard, honey, and pickles. It was a well balanced dish and definitely something I would order again. The pizzas arrived and they're quite large. The crust looked and tasted good. It had doughiness and a crispness. I liked the brussel sprout pizza. It was a mix of sweet and savoury. The onion jam added a nice sweetness along with the honey. The added walnuts gave a nice crunch. I hadn't had a pizza like this before and was glad I tried it. Also, you can ask for chili oil. I thought it would come in a bottle that I could just drizzle on. However, it came in a little container with actual pieces of chilis in the oil. I really liked this and it added a nice kick to my pizza.

Overall, I was satisfied with my meal. Service was fantastic and makes me want to come back.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO5AF5MTpk5VGLmEQEpPWoBTrl9vaHkdwXG8I3-&fid=0x0:0x5b0831c3c22b0f30"],"When":"2019-3-1"}]

title: Burgoo Bistro Lonsdale
address: 3 Lonsdale Ave, North Vancouver, BC V7M 2E4
descriptions: Relaxed bistro serving traditional comfort food with global touches in a rustic, country setting.

Our server was very attentive and took great care of us! ‚ù§Ô∏è","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPsU4Ov-C0ZbVsPHq9rJ1bLFEy6mrFfbHe1gK_D&fid=0x0:0x3f8230865e7c7fcf"],"When":"2024-10-21"},{"Name":"Craig Weiner, D.C.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUVq6SWqDBPOR8Lttun3-AOWep_DApMArIEgXjE5ZD3t-AfzEmq=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Happened to be walking by exploring off the water bus looking for good food and not overwhelmed by crowds and this fit the bill‚Ä¶it was quant and comfortable‚Ä¶the French onion soup was fabulous and filling to share and the banana bread pudding was unique and delicious!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMH3wGu0YG_p4Yl0gb74yA-xRtgZt_8W8WLR6P3&fid=0x0:0x3f8230865e7c7fcf"],"When":"2024-11-18"},{"Name":"Micah Limpin","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVLhsdN2QmMAoen3ek_Kgx9NIv5ddQAQOYPFxh6MDY3fnkpu6piBw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I recommend this place to anyone who isnt sure what they want to eat! They almost have everything I wanted to try. A must visit! Our server Anais was great and we felt welcome. She was patient and wonderful server.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP24shA9cGFhrCgzMazRte89qJ51f6ZJy-SFYi_&fid=0x0:0x3f8230865e7c7fcf"],"When":"2024-8-4"},{"Name":"M. A","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXLCC1RNpkYVL_wmAKVl8CVTBHMM0HswNTdpuCsVi3nWEHRpCVa=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We tried "Lobster + Mac & cheese" it was so soft & smooth & delicious.
I also ordered the "tasty chicken" sandwich & it was so yummy...
The staff were sweet, friendly & helpful with a perfect vibe.
We will come back soon to try the other tasty items on the menu !
Thanks for a perfect evening...","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPIhsKiFQIYU9gdBzOjEHzCgPusWX4RGhm0kaH6&fid=0x0:0x3f8230865e7c7fcf"],"When":"2024-5-4"},{"Name":"Fuzzy Nemo","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWMhjGNDhI-RZYgIiVRXnRDEQCiyyP-dsVjb7EhBkcymNr9MvYi0A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This has always been my place to go to when I need comfort food,  or when I need hangover food.  They never disappoint.  They have all these specials for lunch, that are reasonably priced.   I always get their onion soup with a side salad and both are my absolute go to when I come here.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMjmu_FnhoqzErHNj8GRK9dDmKNIcxcRhUj8OuF&fid=0x0:0x3f8230865e7c7fcf"],"When":"2024-7-6"},{"Name":"David Sarmiento","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVwRJgSVaaTo-qHosXRCOQi0cqgNL2HZQzFyszXyzzkpD7W8UhzIw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The location is excellent if you are visiting North Vancouver. Very good welcome service, onion soup is a very good option, I also recommend the Goulash and for a refreshing sangria or strawberry lemonade.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNSW9qHnb2WhbNWCLjxi7YAbZlK87eVJ8sXNGRm&fid=0x0:0x3f8230865e7c7fcf"],"When":"2024-11-14"},{"Name":"Dylan Cross","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVtfVeXjQlnK5T99663C9YYE_YDxjbxdchJLj1vgrCc7iAlHlwX=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The food blew my mind! The different flavors of each dish were phenomenal. The service was friendly and she was very helpful. The atmosphere is nice and relaxing. The fireplace is a wonderful touch. This place is the perfect place for comfort food and to just relax and have conversations with whomever you go with.

Wish I could give this place a higher level of stars!!","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Ava Yeganeh","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW9tl4gIIPMFy4hyI3W3ymgXIBHQie_SI-ZoGmo1bKQu2C_kEFzqA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è

I had an amazing experience at Carpe in Shipyards, North Vancouver! From the moment I walked in, the atmosphere was welcoming and vibrant, with a cozy yet modern vibe that fits the waterfront setting perfectly. The service was top-notch‚Äîfriendly, attentive, and fast without feeling rushed.

Now, the food! I tried their signature burger, and it was absolutely delicious. The patty was cooked to perfection, juicy and full of flavor, with fresh toppings that took the taste to the next level. Their fries were crispy and seasoned just right. You can really tell they use high-quality ingredients. They also have a great selection of drinks to complement the meal.

Overall, Carpe is the perfect spot for a casual but unforgettable meal. If you're in the Shipyards area, this place is a must-visit. I'll definitely be back!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNjLkOHy6V0wmcEgsutWyeiNdl3qOSGOxGhf9i6&fid=0x0:0x73a62c47e9773bd2"],"When":"2024-9-2"},{"Name":"Matt Ajami","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUi9BqP3Uoggyl9CoDZ49GUHGNhsvtfvA0HT8_vA6UVRGNbpoAk=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I had the pleasure of dining at Carpe in North Vancouver, and I must say, it was an unforgettable experience. As someone who eats out frequently and travels a lot, I‚Äôve tried burgers from coast to coast, but the burger at Carpe stands out as the best I‚Äôve had in Canada.

The flavors were incredibly well-balanced, the ingredients were fresh, and the burger was cooked to absolute perfection. Every bite was juicy and flavorful, with just the right combination of toppings to enhance, not overpower, the patty. Even the bun was spot on ‚Äì soft but held everything together without falling apart.

What made the experience even better was the cozy atmosphere and warm service. The staff were friendly, attentive, and genuinely passionate about the food they served, which made the meal all the more enjoyable.

If you‚Äôre ever in North Vancouver, don‚Äôt miss the opportunity to stop by Carpe. Whether you‚Äôre a local or just passing through, this little gem will surprise you with its quality. I‚Äôll definitely be back soon!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNnBcovr2z8N8nnfV2bhEFYKlD4weJkyaijAWiV&fid=0x0:0x73a62c47e9773bd2"],"When":"2024-10-14"},{"Name":"Christopher Okello","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjURoZz9P8978akI8LKPljYFy3CjE0nvUvm4EXFPukSVElffAzcB=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My family and I visited Carpe burger on Wednesday and had a great experience! Staff are very friendly & willing to help, the food is delicious! The smash burger was our favourite. It‚Äôs conveniently located for both inside dining or if you just want to grab the food and go walk on the pier. Highly highly recommend & cannot wait to visit again! Thank you team Carpe!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPbW8OplWIWBrH84hbDVEgKQyHwGPUZvdaurYFP&fid=0x0:0x73a62c47e9773bd2"],"When":"2024-7-20"},{"Name":"D Smurt","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKFMn_dqAOyQbOGs70jceToQMFxlTqwAZ_CpS19c2RhS51FXQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Wow! Being a former Lolo local I can safely say that I've eaten at nearly every restaurant in the area, an expensive and delicious adventure to say the least.

The service, these are some darn good people that deserve your business. They care and their food and establishment speaks loudly to their commitment. Friendly and welcoming.

The restaurant, CLEAN! Like spotless clean. Between their kitchen area and service area the place is spotless. Well done!

The food, expensive and worth it! I am willing to pay any amount to eat the best food that is available to me. The ingredients are the pinnacle of fresh, the quality exceptional. In the top list of best tasting smash burgers I've had, and I've had a lot üòÖ I had my go to burger spot, known for massive food and amusingly bad service (part of its charm) at a similar price point... I will come to Carpe hands down every time I'm in the area going forward.

Exceptional quality food is the result of high quality ingredients that are prepared by people who care, all of which comes at a premium that I am willing to pay. Oh, and they are licensed... Enjoy!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM3KkbgqFqtVZDbTLbgVA5MPpdfoIi-M42TjwIj&fid=0x0:0x73a62c47e9773bd2"],"When":"2024-8-19"},{"Name":"M. A","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXLCC1RNpkYVL_wmAKVl8CVTBHMM0HswNTdpuCsVi3nWEHRpCVa=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"If you read my reviews or follow my favorites in google, my favorite foods are Kebabs & Burgers , and I tried almost every burger in the area! This "Shipyard Burger" is "THE BEST",  "BY TASTE" !
Juicy &Delicious without adding any more sauce! Try it ! You'll realize why I'm suggesting it !!! They offer it with or without fries or salad, you can choose if you want to order fries or not...
Nice & cool staff üëå(Dog friendly)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPhWQ_7QWEt7RwU96o6KBf3fDRgoKdxPOaJawxV&fid=0x0:0x73a62c47e9773bd2"],"When":"2024-9-22"},{"Name":"Sevil Nail","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUXIrvvJX3HFMWi1bSlO-kvLug2gAo8Wxk3y0twzyMftsk-E3I=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"‚ÄúI recently dined at Carpe Burger and had an amazing experience. The burgers were cooked to perfection, juicy and flavorful, and the toppings were fresh and generous. The service was excellent, with friendly and attentive staff who made sure we had everything we needed. The restaurant has a cozy and welcoming ambiance with a modern and clean design. Their signature Shipyard burger is a must-try, with a delicious blend of flavors that stands out. I highly recommend Carpe burger for anyone looking for a great burger experience. I‚Äôll definitely be back soon!‚Äù","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMa4AUHHCHsibZG1eV0BfTbvZyspx2HzQLZNbRU&fid=0x0:0x73a62c47e9773bd2"],"When":"2024-7-20"},{"Name":"M. RA","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIgnrdgN2E0osF7UjMGdY9rCa28cO2-aoqMORSfjK16076rCKc=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Omg I can‚Äôt say enough good things. The burger was beyond amazing! The fries were soo good great crunch.  The service was wonderful getting to meet the owner and let him know how happy we were!! Can‚Äôt wait to come back","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOxM5Qpbs3OkUNPOoi1N0ZKzsqToKd1E8Ha-lfR&fid=0x0:0x73a62c47e9773bd2"],"When":"2024-9-8"},{"Name":"zhina molla","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKc9ELKThL9_ziyY3CZ-GvBCIWgJlLElUwtfd4WjGT4lHwTOQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Had such a great experience at Carpe grill, they have 4 different combos which is truly  worth it. Such a tasty burger and the prices are reasonable and the fact that they are  open until 12 is amazing  definitely going back.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPoD1kQ9Y_uDBAurWwV3ltS1lC0PkmlvOqoKAWp&fid=0x0:0x73a62c47e9773bd2"],"When":"2024-7-28"}]

Nonetheless, the service is consistently great!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Andrea Telfer","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUMZyDwIXqYSPKspkyfuFeDUK5Imol4YuwfyrXHbzawmTQg0ZEAkA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Love browns! Great food and drinks, especially at happy hour. They have two couch areas at this location which are prime spots and a nice patio that's heated in winter and exposed in the summer. Plus it's all in an enclosed area so you don't have any cars rushing around you. Fantastic people watching. Very family friendly.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Patti Faris","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJp-lBdi1GuWDGTYGfyIXq6COYhUpF6yigU_eqOpMm5hrR5qA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This review is a long time coming.  At browns prob weekly.  Awesome food and the absolute best service u can ever have.  We really like how they alter their happy hour menu occasionally for variety. I have dealt with bar Mgr via email to find out a brand of liquor they serve.  Browns is our go to...obviously cuz weekly!  Well done Browns team!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Flix","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUotE971eC9NXQ19LtELCVYjXaY3p36j-yOdIqSO-H042buFtk=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Very nice restaurant located in a relaxed environment away from the tourists. The food is great, the price is fair and the servers are very friendly and open. Very good stop after a trip to the Lynn Canyon!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN0ekfDA-nR1SGZfcPQ62VMZxEayZFtR_fjFSGj\u0026fid=0x0:0x35811d542d1f09a0"],"When":"2023-8-14"},{"Name":"Robert Florian","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXC99wu_jojbPTpuNohgOCSJCmvEXgUntaYaPDDVMweuL-D0nL3=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"After the staff noticed myself, my wife, and my mother looking after a lost child just outside the restaurant, they took it upon themselves to pay it forward, and treat us with extra special kindness. The chef came to our table to commend us, as did Connor the manager. He gave us our dessert on the house, and also made us feel like we did something special towards another human being. Aside from all that, the food was all excellent, well prepared, and the staff all super kind and helpful. [{"Name":"Vincent Lee","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKGxT_7YYsdwd-q2nq07nBadC0HJNLzjjBpP5GFZFRg6x3O_w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"What a delicious treat for lunch. So convenient if visiting the hospital. I love the location. What a big restaurant. Very pleasant counter staff. Polite and friendly always leaves a good impression with us.
We like Nandos because of the Peri Peri flavors. We also love the lemon and herb sauce... Yum
Half chicken is my pleasure . My friend like the legs.. üòã","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPWz6wWwukNNfCZuomrJl51LvFOPb3neG9IRfsp&fid=0x0:0xb8cabe2f7225b477"],"When":"2024-10-26"},{"Name":"Metrotown Active Health","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWBAbFRqDXYnBwFWHzF8WEt57vEbfrTKFT0jSUSlRTfhJkbhMw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I recently ordered food for a work dinner from Nando's North Vancouver, and I had the best experience! We ordered food for 15-18 people, and everything was incredibly smooth from start to finish. I spoke with Rachel over the phone to explain what we were looking for, and she went above and beyond to meet our needs.

Although I traveled all the way from Metrotown to pick up the food from North Vancouver (based on a colleague's glowing recommendation of this location for large events), it was worth every bit of the 45-minute traffic. Despite the long drive, the food was still hot, fresh, and absolutely delicious when I got back. Everything tasted amazing and exactly as we requested.

This is definitely one of the best Nando‚Äôs locations I‚Äôve visited. The service was outstanding, and the food quality was top-notch. Huge thanks to Rachel and the team for making this such a great experience!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Brianna Tomlinson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVSwjPN24T3vl-vr_ZqrFASFhDBvkLPqZC8zFXyepDuzklQfWQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This was our first visit, and we ordered a variety of food (the rainbow bowl, a chicken wrap, a sandwich, and a half chicken, as well as multiple sides). The staff was helpful and patient while we all figured out our order. We ordered the chicken with the mango-lime, medium, and hot.

The hot sauce wasn't too hot for us, but luckily they have bottles of their hot sauce out so we could add to our food. The chicken all tasted amazing. The sweet potato, brussel sprouts, corn, and cauliflower were all good. The peas were almost... Minty? We all really enjoyed our food. We'd definitely come here again.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNh__iqS0UCxP0tGbqUH1eZ4pWwNkdQpG8lLCqN&fid=0x0:0xb8cabe2f7225b477"],"When":"2024-4-12"},{"Name":"Nando‚Äôs Pilgrim","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX4zwwkoWmWsHfz1cl8KKLAUH93_UxhD2jVjULdV2Xu3YRKngvo=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We went straight from the Airport to this wonderful Nando‚Äôs on the north shore. This location is fantastic. It was clean and well maintained with a nice spacious layout. The staff was super friendly and helpful and the food was magnificent. Nothing beats hot peri-peri chicken!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOGrkO7Maq6MVY2CuOC5Ba0hhtAKCg51xFAiUzU&fid=0x0:0xb8cabe2f7225b477"],"When":"2023-11-10"},{"Name":"John Kim","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK3apzVtdO8coK0BUZjWGjFoV9JmifZUKGsIVSrB5BoIUuSWw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Chicken barely fits half the bun.. definitely not worth $14+

AWFUL","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPSjNFOaCT19ayrllsV7OCXM9YrG0vCWYdyR4ly&fid=0x0:0xb8cabe2f7225b477"],"When":"2024-6-12"},{"Name":"Johnny Oliva","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKsNQZ-_Eu2jC-xojVDttXGaxjppK0mGgG9KR-yqgrFVRupDA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This was my first time ever trying Nando‚Äôs and all I can say is the food and service is AMAZING! I highly recommend the chicken thigh as it is super juicy and delicious. The staff is super attentive and friendly. I will definitely be coming back o. My next visit to Vancouver! 10/10!!!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNRHl5_FkozoWZtZL7W365e9sgfA2EH3VgXt1Sn&fid=0x0:0xb8cabe2f7225b477"],"When":"2023-12-30"},{"Name":"Zauhreen Adatia","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV2F_O8TDwW6OL16L7YteoGu-IobBJTa0_LEgKOQipqB2LMmG_C=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"0000 stars if possible Placed an online order online that needed to feed a family of 5 and I thought I orders plenty cause I order 2 full chicken meal with 2 large sides of fries and 2 large sides of casa salads that I paid an extra 2.25 for and garlic bread and I also ordered 2 skewers and a side of peri fries. When I got home with my food I was very disappointed by the large side of fries and the large salad. The fries were half full and the salad did not look like a large salad for a family meal.  I called and spoke to a girl called mandeep who was adamant that‚Äôs how it is and they follow orders from head office. I have been a customer for a long time since they were at the location across the street and never have I have ever had the need to complain. I know julie who has been with them go a long time and have never been disappointed. When I asked for a manager or asked for an owners they were on vacation I gave my number and have asked for a call back in a couple days when they are back.
I will NEVER order from this location ever again!!!! Unless I get a call and this is corrected !!!
I will take my business to barcelos in north van who have excellent customer service and staff or nandos west vancouver instead.
Looks the pics how is that large fries and large salad????????","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMPiSULXMCUQUrC0L8baeNvLNLqOftcG6Odgzku&fid=0x0:0xb8cabe2f7225b477"],"When":"2023-9-9"},{"Name":"ellis mcdaele","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUYMlHWT9QC-O3sWw2lZG7bP8zYVutLjro3oLz2GXbSKdrEQJNK=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I‚Äôm extremely disappointed with my recent visit to this Nando‚Äôs location. Compared to Nando‚Äôs Park Royal, this was a terrible experience. We asked for Peri-Tamer because the chicken was a little too spicy for us, but they outright refused, which felt very inconsiderate, considering that park royal branch gives Peri-Tamer to tame the spicyness. The guy at the front taking our order was rude and made the entire experience unpleasant. Customer service is clearly not a priority here. I will never come back to this location again. Stick to Park Royal if you want better service and a more accommodating staff.","Images":null,"When":""}]

[{"Name":"Jamie Coo","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWMtT8SYH3ODglSdZyhsIz5N_cesns6jNpwE2VJCXq0WPBgF9EA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Came here on a Saturday for dinner and we were the only table when we walked in. Food was good but nothing too impressive. We order the duck breast and the braised beef along with the onion tart and a mushroom tartine. Before the food came, we were given some bread with butter to start. The mains were both not as tender as we expected, although the flavour of the dish was done pretty well. The onion tart was good but the tartine was lacking a bit of flavour. Service was quick and friendly. Since we don't live in the area, we probably won't drive all the way to come here again.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO4hDs3XDMw_oVQhAPkVxsU-AH84PwZQqvd-vsd&fid=0x0:0x1b1585927bd8e4ec"],"When":"2024-9-20"},{"Name":"Robin Clements","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV9PmsLxITJmMMeaAz28FAyYktWqAc6468HB42trXKaraHdb6JS=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Such a fantastic little restaurant hidden in a quiet North Vancouver neighbourhood. I came here with my partner for brunch after he had been talking it up for ages, and it still exceeded my expectations. The Alsacienne Onion Tart was so incredibly rich and decadent, it immediately had me looking up recipes to try and recreate it at home. The duck salad had a perfect balance of flavours and the meat was tender and crispy all at once. This is a must-go restaurant!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN9Oy_NHdoL_H3cgJ-yI2zP_NDVpsj9IKBGHYd3&fid=0x0:0x1b1585927bd8e4ec"],"When":"2024-9-14"},{"Name":"Katherine Lee","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ_fbiyyufWMqoCFysCuKDQEuZRz-jR8Hk5G3BPhWwM2YISMQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"A little French bistro tucked away in an industrial area. Jeff, the server has a wonderful service.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOlgSakBO7KV9QBIKWz4818IXlVFJVy8Tjhjems&fid=0x0:0x36b8f243dd8b10ab"],"When":"2024-11-26"},{"Name":"Kevin Vu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVRlInPPESjD7KbYbuiMssEuSwDqZH8bTBQfIu4E3fLv0_Wky0t=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Great atmosphere off the water front and short walk away from the Quay. The food was cheaper for is due to exchange rate. It was good Thai food. We enjoyed the quiet, darker, moody environment.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNSDWra8vCcSj1O3CVQLLt8tvMmh7MTRnhnvpnQ&fid=0x0:0x36b8f243dd8b10ab"],"When":"2024-5-30"},{"Name":"Elsa Gray","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUxWLNCQ4_ombl7NqJYPlDIIAXYci_vOM0JN64IiWvI2oOsuDQ6=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great food and amazing staff, our server took great care in explaining the ingredients of the different dishes available for my vegetarian mom and was very warm and friendly - prices were also quite fair!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOg95MWxOM3S54sMcaKBiz9Ju1jZMDXDSTDnqfQ&fid=0x0:0x36b8f243dd8b10ab"],"When":"2024-10-29"},{"Name":"Wesley Nelson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXJCWnrm6Ikquh7xSH0FIqLtDwnmUf7oMAZZRMD4-7T9uMf1fIh=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Came in hungry late Saturday evening at 8pm. The service was great and ordered a Traditional Pad Thai for my son and a glass noodle soup (with pork) for myself. We also thought we'd share a duck lettuce wrap. Food was fantastic. The portions were substantial so we wound up taking a fair bit home.

Can't recommend it enough!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP63pZqqG_N3IeNJSfV57f09jZFSi7uact542o2&fid=0x0:0x36b8f243dd8b10ab"],"When":"2024-5-26"},{"Name":"Elle N","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIGbOcGsaQSlrEBFLH15vmcEa_H0yjRJR8lfupxajXqqVNihA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I appreciate that they have a good lunch menu/deal. The spring roll is crispy and tasty relative to other Thai places. The red curry with beef was suggested, but the red curry didn‚Äôt have enough flavor and tasted too fatty and lacked that special touch. I had only two spoons and did not enjoy. The chicken cashew nut was good and was a generous portion and higher than usual number of cashew nuts. I appreciate they cut the cucumber Thai style in fried rice but didn‚Äôt try it so cannot comment (my friends order). In general I was happy with here. The curry was not was I was hoping for though and I hardly ate it/did not enjoy. The rest was good. In general one big drawback with this restaurant is that it is really dark and I never get a pleasant feeling walking in. I am very familiar with Thai food and the competition in Vancouver so 4 stars by me means it‚Äôs good. I‚Äôm considering taste and cost. The atmosphere is super super dark and would lower the score heavily if considered important. The personal experience I had was the service was good and thankfully they don‚Äôt charge or make a big deal for containers.
Based on other reviews I would not try the pad Thai. Also I heard the owners are Chinese and thus not authentic but personally I have had Thai food that was really bad by Thai owners in Vancouver so that‚Äôs not what I consider.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMt--O-mHtmhzARPbHeAiXGnE4h1GQhqXjR7m7q&fid=0x0:0x36b8f243dd8b10ab"],"When":"2023-6-27"},{"Name":"Yuen Man Chan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWT_q7sVSjzZETYsKUTINR0iUXRjPeUIedbgF9CysStAEsoqP21fA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The rice and noodles were the best; the sauce in the noodles was good. Also we really liked the shrimp cake and fish cake. Food tastes like Thailand, and we will definitely eat here again!üëçüèºüòã","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPcSdbKiZwhhLdZ9uZIv4FriEQ3duZYHXbR8L-w&fid=0x0:0x36b8f243dd8b10ab"],"When":"2024-1-20"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Min T","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKHBCvyhMdMuGm8ISXRxIPWaPtZa7hX9LVxvDW4OOAn-tBBWA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Brown's Social House has a nice atmosphere that makes it a comfortable place to relax. Unfortunately, the food was just okay, and I did find hair in my dish, which was disappointing. However, I appreciate how the staff handled the situation‚Äîthey were prompt and professional in addressing the issue. Overall, it was an average experience with good service, but I hope for better food quality next time.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOSel8OSS8cfrmpOfAOpvub3lGj_qBm0tauF5dK&fid=0x0:0xad164437db490613"],"When":"2024-10-25"},{"Name":"Hamid","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWZeCAMeEgy6nfEH_q_cdx_kw6M9nQkJXu6z624ESesXG758gNKQQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Here‚Äôs an imThe food was decent, and the service was quite good. However, the main issue is the ventilation system. The dining area was filled with visible smoke, and there was a strong smell of burnt oil, which really affected the overall experience. If they improve the ventilation, it would make the visit much more pleasant.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPH8YGDiZK1YRzf69AGElkF-TI5k1H-cz_aPKrz&fid=0x0:0xad164437db490613"],"When":"2024-9-22"},{"Name":"Patrick Graham","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWPGn-0rnYhibroPawC7crdZgRFkVYU_Vh2ofycQ4wRGDS96B-5jg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We came here for Mother‚Äôs day brunch. I had previously found that it wasn‚Äôt too busy because they didn‚Äôt open until 11am. We had our choice of tables and we sat on some higher bar stool in the lounge area by the front window as most people were sitting in the booths. There were about 5 other tables full here so there was still plenty of space.

My mom had the Super Avocado Eggs Benny while I had the Southwest Brunch Bowl which was like a Benny but without any meat. It was like a cross between Eggs Benny and a taco salad. We both had fresh orange juice to drink which was refreshing.

My mom enjoyed her Benny but was not able to finish the tasty potatoes so she took those home. I love eggs Benny so the Southwest Bowl was a fresh take on it. It had the poached eggs and potatoes like the Benny but the corn, black beans, avocado salsa, feta and mole gave it a completely different flavour which I loved! The thin, crispy tortilla strips added a nice crunch to the bowl.

The service was great as they periodically checked up on us. I‚Äôd highly recommend this place for brunch or any other meal as I always get great food at Browns!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOpWUNS7Q-LmySTOG8lYyJPYJ027mIPZVbKc_OF&fid=0x0:0xad164437db490613"],"When":"2024-5-13"},{"Name":"Everardo Ortiz","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKEGjTelJpW_JTajFrpH8OZV074v6opFDLkMnN1S0SeRrFuhkY6=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"With a very nice and cosy atmosphere and excellent service this restaurant is definitely one of those you just keep coming back to. Their menu options are also very varied and sure to satisfy anyone.

I would highly recommend their margaritas but order them spicy. The spicy touch adds an extra punch with out them being too hot to handle. Both the raspberry and original spicy margaritas were fantastic!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNAGBVn6U2X4xc_zqJCZqOqJrWFHHggCqkfIEGp&fid=0x0:0xad164437db490613"],"When":"2023-11-24"},{"Name":"Heather Donaldson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUlD-oqBvTzRy0gepqEFBGkkyEZsNFlfeRAotLYJPuwo9EwEgc9Tg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I gave  five stars for the atmosphere today. Got the summer chill vibe going on the outdoor patio with the sun shining, summer breeze , bright, red umbrellas, music, and friendly service.

Some food items were prepared well,  like the cod , but my salad had so much tough kale in it that was not chopped up much, so I kind of felt like a rabbit   chewing away at the tough leaves.
Presentation was nice, if not exceptional.
4.5. Overall.
Servers were enthusiastic and made the effort to please.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMWIKVmfFy83Ikw_sChPDzv40EltpOHuGFlZCKd&fid=0x0:0xad164437db490613"],"When":"2023-7-4"},{"Name":"Andre Lucas Ribeiro","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV2l3it4qX5GvR2JgWz7xhUa1RENuyJXMFWUxXb_IzzZ_Na_z9fhQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Very nice pub with a very polite crew. Rotating beers on tap were very good! Did not eat though.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOdt9JSA5MMSdZs5PNiGVdufBxSHfr5U3e6nUh8&fid=0x0:0xad164437db490613"],"When":"2024-5-25"},{"Name":"Pam Delfino","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVou97WNj_X-lZ_I6WAUZr7ELzzqVVEd-LYy7ydp9dEDslErRA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Met a friend here for a drink, and had an awesome time! I ordered a Fat Tug and was super happy to see it on tap at this location! They have a number of rotating taps, so some nice brews to choose from! Excellent service!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Shakeel Prasad","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXy16cyAgV7oOj1bFwjRZ1_Fb0PCxlvGq_rpdigvtpd8QGDD0HGOA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Got the butcher burger and yam fries with the brownie for desert. Brownie was warm but tasted extremely sweet so it‚Äôs not worth 12$ to me highly recommended to NOT buy it , butcher burger was perfect but yam fries were not cooked fully and sauce it came with was not good as well very runny / thin and too spicy for a sauce with yam fries. Staff here were amazing happy with my burger but not happy with brownie and yam fries especially for the higher price for this place. Just get the burgers and maybe a drink if you go here I question the quality and value of everything else here .","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM1Snelao06hY69vjrfwAvH4Yq3-QJtI3xqK3iH&fid=0x0:0xad164437db490613"],"When":"2023-7-13"}]

The quantity is definitely more than I expected and the quality didn‚Äôt disappoint either. A must visit for authentic Persian food at great prices. Can‚Äôt wait to be back! üòç","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN93pS12suYM36na4PTWlorXoDMYxsyRDPgeYGE&fid=0x0:0xf7debfdea9af5a91"],"When":"2024-11-2"},{"Name":"Alireza Mahdian","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW0UiNNVRyZjtmU8TuMFZWagjDEpOucA4a-KVpCiuYYILJ-rcBw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Grab and Go is a Persian takeaway restaurant in North Vancouver that offers some solid options for a quick meal. The kabab is particularly good, perfectly grilled and packed with flavor. However, I was disappointed with the lamb shank; it had an off-putting smell that affected my enjoyment of the dish.

Overall, while there are hits and misses on the menu, the kababs make Grab and Go worth a visit for those craving Persian cuisine.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPbAHFHHWjg1Ypl7oedVWz0eAZewra93hqEAm8X&fid=0x0:0xf7debfdea9af5a91"],"When":"2024-10-16"},{"Name":"ali mohamadghasem","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUjRt8FHH-eWGWTluYKlrERbXaVUdDMBGo2wXBfEcz6KeyGcJmF=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Amazing food
I made an order 1 kobide and 1 ghormesabzi.
Crispy rice so delicious.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNXHUpgHpguBQyqBr972AJgR_5rwZldyJ5fK8vC&fid=0x0:0xf7debfdea9af5a91"],"When":"2024-11-25"},{"Name":"Haideh Arabkhani","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWpkjO6NxSb2woGoo6IOdwwP9G7OAWTKN2JUEKISz_6ZZiIE1Q=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Absolutely loved the experience! The food was fresh, flavorful, and perfectly prepared. The service was outstanding ‚Äì quick, friendly, and professional. Even though it‚Äôs a takeout spot, the outdoor atmosphere was clean, inviting, and well-organized. Highly recommend for anyone looking for great food and exceptional service!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Lanie Zulueta","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXIjacOZZNFIlv1T1yr25Te9nNNi1G78MhV6gOT7cCRO1Lr8sw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"If you‚Äôre craving Persian meals then this is the place to go to. They have generous servings of freshly grilled kebabs that are affordable.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNLoY4fLBe-bwQD8OogA4S6Gn4tUrYp0G48_leR&fid=0x0:0xf7debfdea9af5a91"],"When":"2024-9-30"},{"Name":"Sepehr Givi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIfgLcnOTAgOuI2blrR749cBelWOEPBgaLq_rI48-Gm9gc89ew=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Such a pleasant experience. Very kind staff; they were friendly and polite. The food tastes great. Something that made me so impressed was their new bags that was truly amazing.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Arash Jafari","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXHX7GUzf7P2LiXZ6mP6rD-TvUZcDe6H2HA0vg0oTwGNVbEwUQhxw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"We ordered kebabs with rice and tomatoes (take away) , but unfortunately, my grilled tomato was moldy from the inside. I could smell the mold while eating it, but it wasn't visible until I turned the tomato upside down and saw that it was full of mold! Now, even after a day, I still have the smell of mold in my nose. It was a very unpleasant experience!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNNs3_dsPgKgtMVqAP6-P9jQyXOl2fFDjRXvRrs&fid=0x0:0xf7debfdea9af5a91"],"When":"2024-9-7"},{"Name":"Aggarwal Family","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVUjYgjiaTTiySFcNlNlZUyERwjN1An3jqtf4pMul5ngPukOFs=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":""Discovered this gem while strolling by, and what a pleasant find! The initial draw was the enticing prices showcased in their advertising, prompting us to give it a shot. Three highlights stood out: first and foremost, the unbeatable prices; secondly, the accuracy between the advertised dishes and what we were served; and lastly, the food's delightful and wholesome taste truly made our evening enjoyable. Highly recommend for a satisfying and budget-friendly Persian dining experience!"","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMbkvpNpfk4ORenTbTNQJCJbhj4pwhaPFJ2X0ew&fid=0x0:0xf7debfdea9af5a91"],"When":"2023-12-1"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Rabab Khan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWanivbucCyNNTwR7jdzWUysTNBjVH3jiDRy0qZpiTFX8Imrw74=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"# A Delightful Family Dining Experience at Cazba

Our recent visit to Cazba was truly exceptional. From the moment we arrived, the staff made our family feel genuinely welcome and valued.

The service was impeccable throughout our meal. The waitstaff were attentive without being intrusive, ensuring we had everything we needed while allowing us to enjoy our time together.

The food was the highlight of our evening. Each dish was expertly prepared and presented, showcasing the chef's skill and attention to detail. The flavors were harmonious, and the quality of ingredients was evident in every bite.

What truly set this experience apart was the relaxed atmosphere. Unlike some establishments that rush diners through their meals, Cazba allowed us to savor our time together. We never felt pressured to finish or leave, which made our family gathering all the more special.

Cazba provided us with an outstanding dining experience. The combination of exceptional food, top-notch service, and a welcoming atmosphere makes this restaurant a perfect choice for family gatherings or special occasions. We left feeling satisfied, appreciated, and eager to return.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMtIF-UvqOtziZ2xw4fIWvJ7HIc8w3vfC4dV1vt&fid=0x0:0xdcb521200bdd5e0b"],"When":"2024-9-6"},{"Name":"Hani Azmarino","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX-7etwQf0eCefmJsSEHm9q3sA7rsXP3aQEYP4pafAtARBaifM=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I had an excellent experience here! The food was absolutely amazing, served to perfection. The staff were incredibly attentive, and the owner treated us with great hospitality. user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Mr. D3stiny","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVmzIhx_TbGLr99K-XazqSInw-sDwp6qXMiqUHcvxMgi154KCBl=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This was my wife and I first time there. We did have a reservation sometime ago but had to cancel.
The service was good and the food was great. They sat us by a window to see the amazing view. We had the Fried Cod and Chips and an order of prawns. The prawns were delicious and the cod and fries were cooked well. All and all the atmosphere is a lil quiet needs some music üé∂ but otherwise very nice place to eat and enjoy a beautiful view.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNR0Lmdnq8ezWQrzaYe0nTMrK8iyBr8zzhB6jDt&fid=0x0:0x1e267aa5b333b845"],"When":"2024-9-2"},{"Name":"Miguel A","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXwoTpd5iqD69MdqJUPNBD26Yl2kRX5Wn4tiTAcVAZZubBKF6XU=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My husband and I held our wedding ceremony and reception at Pier 7 on November 10.
We couldn‚Äôt have been happier with the restaurant - the view was amazing, the food was spectacular, and most of all the service was just top notch - shout out to the manager, Eddie, and the two lovely servers who took care of us on our special day, Nina and Erica( I could be wrong with the second name, I‚Äôm sorry for that. you both were so lovely)

The communication with Eddie was just amazing, he was very helpful throughout the week leading up to our wedding. On the day itself he was there making sure we are looked after.

The food - my guests were very very happy and full after the wedding.

We couldn‚Äôt be more happier and words cannot express how grateful we are for the team (and not to forget to mention the amazing kitchen/BOH) for giving us such a wonderful memory to look back at to.  I wish we had photos of the food to add to the review. But we were so busy with our guests.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM4zrZKc0GjnZh_FwuMmWBEOyiOWpFHCYc1K7NF&fid=0x0:0x1e267aa5b333b845"],"When":"2024-11-20"},{"Name":"Haran Raj","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU7bNYpY-eZMT6groh2iRJoDILIekiKkfhmMv0OgHOkdN9ql-BSoQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Beautiful view. Great service and the food is authentic. We had the prime burger, calamari and their seafood chowder. Note: the fried jalape√±o in the calamari has some kick to it.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMFqCqLwaRemrSXlmqmA25Udtt4CM1PNxhyqy3v&fid=0x0:0x1e267aa5b333b845"],"When":"2024-9-26"},{"Name":"Pedro Sousa","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWYb24yb8LNBET4mbZ6yPa15qx1UDwKQkvKn98fIN2RQXModeD5=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"What a great meal with the ocean right by your side. The service from the servers was amazing, attentive, friendly and very professionals from start to finish!
A very relaxed dinner focused on seafood, and a great conversation, two ingredients for a great time. And the pier area was just a very good surprise, lots of fun and movement!
Strongly recommend for you to give it a try :)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOSZsnWWropQ3dgxXFNcLoiwEwv3Av9M_aef2dX&fid=0x0:0x1e267aa5b333b845"],"When":"2024-6-20"},{"Name":"Genesis Jeru","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXDlbnM1zs4MNddfJfHGvlyBUZyvNGTsBaqXNQ1SMZ7mv_ckeBI=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is an updated review.

The first couple of experiences I had with Pier 7 wasn‚Äôt really great to the point where I never considered coming back. However, after the last time I went here the manager reached out to me and asked about what happened. Keon, the manager. professionally handled the complaint and went above and beyond to fix multiple issues I had regarding the service.

Invited me back and saved a table for me on a busy weekend with a really great view. We‚Äôve ordered the chicken spaghettini, steak frites, prawn cocktail and the pier 7 oyster trio. I didn‚Äôt really raise my hopes up, but this time it was a really great experience. The checkbacks were consistent, food was great (steak frites could‚Äôve been more softer). The dessert was also pretty good. As a restaurant manager myself, this service recovery‚Äôs pretty good and again, Keon did a very great job.

I‚Äôm just hoping that for my next visit, the service won‚Äôt change and be able to keep it consistent.

Thank you Pier 7. See you every weekends!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPqCi6o3_Z_AdnKld4004bGqg2ycFEjA0uf1f-s&fid=0x0:0x1e267aa5b333b845"],"When":"2024-8-25"},{"Name":"Davin Gegolick","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVvBcMLpi2napCKTzG6RZY93OeqjytMfWgeTria7T9nsbg9Be-7Og=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"There was 6 of us traveling to Vancouver from Edmonton for the first time and this was one of our first stops. We got lunch on the outdoor patio which had stunning views of the industrial shipyard‚Ä¶very cool. Great food, drinks, and atmosphere!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPFoeFoj2-wK_jLtt5DQcz2mGpMH3CxY1Jh4bSd&fid=0x0:0x1e267aa5b333b845"],"When":"2024-11-19"},{"Name":"Carolin Chen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV6UTw8MiPD4lMns2KEwQKDCBNWoS11pESIXB034eh8riDIAVWn=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I had a table beside the window on the ground floor. Although it's only a partial harbor view, it's still enjoyable on a sunny day. The food was good, and some dishes came with a lot of potatoes. The waiters seemed very busy, and it took time to flag down our server.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN9hEt74Wh-uxcVSPmDRbGF2YaeXjG5tppxwmpI&fid=0x0:0x1e267aa5b333b845"],"When":"2024-5-19"},{"Name":"Steve Ody","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUgDBZZqM1U0qxSyRgiy8liONCA7pVQ_tskfmEXOwgKAYqDgcl1dw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Steak sandwich and the steelhead salmon was delicious. Not certain that the chowder was made in house but overall it was a good dinner. Service was excellent, thanks!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOcpnM-EzTVuprrkWI3ugOXFUktM8pecHlEyP6T&fid=0x0:0x1e267aa5b333b845"],"When":"2024-9-1"}]
