user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Matthew England","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLefDZJi8WmrC-ShTwI9UiCbeEAgFyt_VqDvBwugmpvhgsgJQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This shout out goes Brannon who, at my request, went off menu to creat a meal of his choosing. I asked him to make anything he wanted with no restrictions.

I was expecting pasta or seafood. What I got was a sandwich.

An outstanding, tender and delicious steak sandwich with a cabbage topping, garlic and chive fries.

I spoke to the manager after I finished eating and recommended he add this to the menu.

I have no idea what he called the meal but it's something special he makes for his mom.

Well done Brannon and thank you!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPjvYQMrUpuEnmJ3WpyeyqYu9NSqBdIWZC2a-vD&fid=0x0:0xa7b10313a9ef7534"],"When":"2024-3-8"},{"Name":"Taslim Burkowicz","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXATcZsxf9xZMj07so-ZCTEpid83qpp6oPDjHkM1z_waNAOOIOD=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This pub is the best kept secret in North Van. The staff is made up of unique and genuine characters that will keep you thoroughly entertained throughout the night. It has great authentic pub food and drinks (I recommend the Mai Tai). Come in the day for food but stay at nights when there is a DJ and enjoy dancing to the hottest tracks!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPxplYnYVykCmlT40mpVvFhcLyACqmTvBAxy9xX&fid=0x0:0xa7b10313a9ef7534"],"When":"2024-3-18"},{"Name":"Shahryar Vafaei (MR REVIEW)","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJDQVBc0RstWfsl33qsRF971wa7HXuUPnyg6k5pqZAmhHNldg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"It was a very cozy place with a nice atmosphere. The tables were a bit close to each other, and the prices were slightly high. The quality of the food wasn't exceptional but could be considered above average. We went on a Monday, not during the weekend, so it was quite empty, which I assume is due to the day. However, I liked the decor and interior vibe; it had a good ambiance. There was plenty of parking available nearby and in front of the place, so I guess even on busier days, parking wouldn't be an issue. Overall, I recommend it for meetings or get-togethers that require a quiet, cozy space, especially on weekdays.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"scubaspears","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWNJIvEco2qNZqA9j7ir5r4oiSYfNoS1TAgp_Rgfh3qQoFLoEE0=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"It feels like a dive bar but extremely clean, including the sh@tters. Bud light on tap you can tell the lines are clean and beer is ice cold. Food is bomb. Waitresses are cute and friendly. This is honestly my new favourite place","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Mahdi Bagheri","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUfqVUIHw1jWjM94Vskpd3sDLGv1YyVtiNeq8NINvEIv69WvgsE=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Seymour's Pub is unrivaled in this neighborhood, next to the Holiday Inn Hotel!
Hot wings are always on point, paired perfectly with a diverse selection of quality beers.
What sets them apart is their family-friendly atmosphere. Feel free to bring your little ones along with you worry-free!
At the end, don‚Äôt forget Wednesday‚Äôs beer and wings!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOGadd5SnDPxmORqIWRF6uU-i0V9Sy9xwS3DLpy&fid=0x0:0xa7b10313a9ef7534"],"When":"2024-3-28"},{"Name":"carol mc gregor","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXZAMwacQU_BVDovGrlIoiRTnzsV56mWbelyuOZpu3E729Ovjk=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Food was good but pricey chicken wings were great and on special but I think $12.50 for an order of yam fries is a bit much . Plus I was charged an additional 2.50 for dipping sauce.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Gal N","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX2XdfDYCPt_cgiBt8j8cM6zHcI87DNDsylR1wlksYltRZLpynHnA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"The food was ok, not the best. The service was a bit slow but pleasant. There is a parking lot for free.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNP12Q9dDPbs1hTlmbOaLJ1nsgKEfQHlba_lHmg&fid=0x0:0xa7b10313a9ef7534"],"When":"2023-9-8"},{"Name":"tracey Mcfacey","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIQctmHHRfo0DPt7MmA5W297hYWb-HCJu3yvg2ZVlyQizKd=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"If I could leave no stars for everything I would. I ordered samosas, they were rock hard and over fried. So I ordered the chicken tenders and they were almost black.
Our server, Sophia, was so rude, telling me they weren‚Äôt overcooked and walking away.
We had to go get our own bill and she was rude then as well.
I‚Äôll never go back, my friends are in the neighborhood and I‚Äôll drive elsewhere to go for a drink. DO NOT ORDER FOOD HERE! Gross and overpriced.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMrV2EMgYZNd4g71G1SRAns_2AS_LLBYojHCc8&fid=0x0:0xa7b10313a9ef7534"],"When":"2024-3-12"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Ronald F.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJfsVcRI7BpIjuooS8UbIVDIvWFBIiILIgqvCpWDbg_S_TALw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Used a groupon - Deluxe Date Night + Wine for TWO.
0.5L of wine, 1 appetizer, 1 dessert, 2 entrees.

We didn't drink alcohol so we were offered a mocktail each.  Our friend who went the week before was offered 2 mocktails each, additional appetizer, additional dessert.

So for value, it was poor.

Food:
blackened creole chicken breast - overcooked, dry, hard as a rubber sole, pretty salty.  0/10
Steelhead salmon - steelhead are trout, not salmon. It was overcooked, but less dry than the chicken. 6.5/10
Wagyu carpaccio - all the accompaniments overwhelmed the taste of the raw beef. I could only taste the arugula, capers, mayonnaise, toast, and none of the beef. It's okay. 5/10
Creme brulee - French macron was hard and not tasty. The sugar had an off taste. The creme was brown - due to gingerbread being mixed in. Overly sweet.  3/10.
Seasonal mocktail - tasted strongly of cinnamon, with some fruits mixed in, that's all I can say. Cinnamon was not listed on the menu as an ingredient. 1/10.

Pretty disappointed. Service was mediocre. Food was bad. Value was terrible. I probably wouldn't come back even if the meal was free.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP2a56UoP4duG124CriKe_SvNz-PNfZGUaiG7_S&fid=0x0:0x909b21f1647df7ab"],"When":"2024-11-30"},{"Name":"Munro Stuff","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWj0Wcuk6ox5dfAeJ4fAaMbhX_F-nzzt3p5oc_f0hBd0NpbGSM=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Solid Happy Hour at The Lobby. Good selection of drinks and food. Fish taco was tasty - ask them to pan fry the fish if you'd rather not have deep fried. And the cauliflower was good and filling.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPTEZrKBNCOfVVDWCT3MycQpdvaf-iEMwr39cyk&fid=0x0:0x909b21f1647df7ab"],"When":"2024-11-22"},{"Name":"Brenda Kim","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWAtWERG6b8Dr_KgsnfDrxwX3wtjwE5xBesQ1Bq1-CobeE2TmKw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We visited this restaurant to celebrate my husband‚Äôs birthday. The food (we ordered prim rib special and sable fish)was outstanding, and the service exceeded our expectations. Ji was exceptionally knowledgeable and friendly, providing a memorable experience. We look forward to returning in the future.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNGGwr_zCQ3WxAudfRdMPSu3ZKY1Etf83D4vUQX&fid=0x0:0x909b21f1647df7ab"],"When":"2024-10-7"},{"Name":"Pam Delfino","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVou97WNj_X-lZ_I6WAUZr7ELzzqVVEd-LYy7ydp9dEDslErRA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Tasty food and amazing service always! Loved the gyoza and garlic parm fries! So glad my friend introduced me to this place! ‚ù§Ô∏è","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM5ehC_IRQ6Ioy0hWn9_-y3mOpeetIC-FaTyA0c&fid=0x0:0x909b21f1647df7ab"],"When":"2024-10-21"},{"Name":"Kunal Seth","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVWdDRAcDowkwjEZaJvFCyiv0CIEY7JSPh_sU8un3Er3D5lhx4K=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Not super impressed by this restaurant. The service is pretty okay and the food portions were pretty small too. The cost for the food is not worth it too, i would rather just eat on a restaurant on the pier.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNIxFy6LGrCZaqNuf51PYrKb74o9OYjWaSepHzL&fid=0x0:0x909b21f1647df7ab"],"When":"2024-7-6"},{"Name":"Steven Olmstead","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWtGPLsUg7ybhRCsA9-VeVYuyaFqArSeyzqddnDm9gdPpsZ3M0=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Update May, 2024 Mother's Day Three Course Dinner
We tried everything on the menu except the spinach salad.  The highlights were the cauliflower and truffle veloute, the prime rib and the desserts.  All were outstanding.  The ahi tuna carpaccio and Haida Gwaii halibut were also very good.  The Fraser Valley duck was just okay, one of the two pieces of breast was a little rubbery and the portion was on the small side.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN6spTkF9hx-9ZuIXjaCW5yh7VrwYW2vn_wrnaY&fid=0x0:0x909b21f1647df7ab"],"When":"2024-5-14"},{"Name":"Max Carter","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXbjiegI59Eg59ykUflDHPD8_pJMJrbDl5s3kDw0SKQb1p-y1Q-=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"We went to The Lobby Restaurant for Christmas dinner, and they did not disappoint. We needed to make a reservation beforehand as the restaurant was very busy. We had a private room to have dinner in, which was pleasant, although it was right near a footpath and the room had big windows, so it wasn't very private. The waitress was lovely and was a great caterer, but she did seem quite stressed, perhaps because it was a busy night. The food took a while to come but it was delicious. There was a lot of flavour in every bite. However, it might be best not to come with kids, as the food options were not very kid friendly (raw meat). For starters, I had the Wagyu Beef Carpaccio, which was delicious, and my first taste of raw beef. As for the main, I had the Fraser Valley Turkey. It was a bit dry but still very tasty and filling. As for the dessert, I ordered the Eggnog Cheesecake, which was tasty but very rich. Besides the cost of everything, this was a very memorable Christmas dinner.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOlFCzvlrOraCXqJtJF_dYQ-ONfZUF_EFu8YWAk&fid=0x0:0x909b21f1647df7ab"],"When":"2023-4-28"},{"Name":"Kenie m","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWD9U_h9zKo_74t3zs1PioW-fQ_pHhruLiklqu2BECKyj1_UD-UKA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Incredible food of the highest standard, artfully presented in a stunning environment. The meals were excellent, and each of the drinks served was a unique and original piece of art in its own right. You have our utmost gratitude for helping to ensure that this year's celebration of our anniversary will be lovingly recollected by every one of our cherished friends and family members!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPUxEL3FJLBsLNL9WuvVF20MB8Mh3z0UQ2RatNI&fid=0x0:0x909b21f1647df7ab"],"When":"2022-11-4"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"mohammad reza yousefi darestani","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWsy8CJRnn1CcomsiOhYyyjYhOlusGo_zB0m7tBxqTptjJMlMxS=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"5 Stars ‚Äì Fantastic Food and Excellent Service!

My family and I had a wonderful dining experience at Pomegranate in Deep Cove. We ordered the pizza and burger, and both were absolutely delicious! The quality of the food was outstanding, with fresh ingredients and perfect flavors. The service was equally impressive‚Äîattentive, friendly, and right on time. The staff truly made us feel welcome, and we appreciated the promptness of everything. If you're in the area, I highly recommend stopping by for a fantastic meal. We‚Äôll definitely be coming back!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"sagar mahla","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKPYX3KHhJl4gqJe_6G1q2Bd0WF6R4ghufa7Gzv2_idY4gp8g=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I recently visited Pomegranate Restaurant and ordered pizza, which turned out to be a huge disappointment. The pizza had the cheapest, store-bought base, topped with nothing but basic tomato paste. It tasted worse than a frozen pizza, yet it was priced at an outrageous $23. For that amount of money, one would expect a freshly made pizza base, not something that feels mass-produced and low quality. I will never return to this place again. The quality was incredibly poor and not worth the price at all.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP_xaCkezD0Zp3fdhFeu_h136Jv7cWur4pBcDg6&fid=0x0:0xffb63d0c8b6cba7f"],"When":"2024-7-20"},{"Name":"Usman USI","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWbMG17262mDE18bbJW_RD28PaWd5-X0d02KHtLAat3j6g6PqCO=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"It was alright. Nothing out of the ordinary. My cousin‚Äôs favourite spot, though he mentioned that the quality has decreased since the son took over the business.

Makes sense since the master chef makes their dish like none other. Very overpriced relative to what you get, very small fries portion too. Would not go back.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM5fHN6oLVOcz89cT5JByHGnGPJbnA_tK-nF9Xz&fid=0x0:0xffb63d0c8b6cba7f"],"When":"2022-7-19"},{"Name":"Keith Ver","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXVdqxLCf1LEt0AU82myo-eUqDcb2LcbdnfhupJTEW0sPAQ-qQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"One of the few restaurants we visited when we were in North Van! If I remember correctly, I think it was the owner who served and cooked our pizza - AND IT WAS GOOD! Being able to see the owner prepare the whole thing was definitely the charm of the restaurant for me! Looking forward to coming back and trying their other dishes soon!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNAGG0TCeY2ByEQUmVlF6aXjDTk3RuaQFfWMWzM&fid=0x0:0xffb63d0c8b6cba7f"],"When":"2023-6-1"},{"Name":"Amar Shah","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKowN3tGXOqBDfEHvl0-4YjOSSJ0dbfPt-HZm4ZXYf8HJSLFA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"oh heck! I don't know where to start from. first of all, the owners and chefs made great personal relationships with us! secondly omg the burger!!!!!!! even though it's pricey it was so worth it. these burgers they make is so unique. and also the pizza! we ordered 8 pizzas I think. and boy, it was so tasty! I have decided everytime I go to deep cove I'm going back to this place.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOxsl15q-3iFfETHNonp4VNs8o9PtICphJjuWPy&fid=0x0:0xffb63d0c8b6cba7f"],"When":"2018-6-17"},{"Name":"Sukhpal Sall","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLkPv4fTd5APKQH29j_BziP8NJxRv1CFyH98VwsHK5Vub-87w=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"We recently went to Pomegranate Grillhouse & Cafe on July 27th, 2024. We were very disappointed from the service, the food, the communication from the store owner. We were charged $46 for 2 burgers and 2 fries. We asked why the fries were so little less than the Happy Meal from McDonalds and his answer was "i follow my rules, if you don't like it then don't come". We personally think, this old man doesn't care about customers and i noticed not much cleanup in the kitchen entrance area. I think this place needs to be inspected for safety. I would not recommend this place to anyone.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Josh Kepkay ‚Ä¢ Vancouver Real Estate Today","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUJaguQP22OtWiYJoI6jEXyGEyQ9JUOqQIvkT5i6uFHFxJVRTqz7g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"What I love about the Pomegranite Grill is that the food is homemade and tastes like the chef takes the time to make sure the burgers and tasty and juicy, the fries crispy and the pizza crust just right. The atmosphere is friendly and unassuming. It‚Äôs an awesome Deep Cove restaurant that you should visit after a kayak or hike.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMwwbq1SqlaoDzXjhVjfueWAK555zf1w-xYS94R&fid=0x0:0xffb63d0c8b6cba7f"],"When":"2022-6-15"},{"Name":"sara pourjavad","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWqWvs0BWJpOiMN_fQTkARtOmSiarAkZM2nk73rYNZOFMgn2N4n=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"They have very tasty burgers and the apple pie was also very tasty, the vegetable pizza was also very tasty, the owner of the shop was very kind, we will definitely come back to eat the burger again.","Images":null,"When":""}]

[{"Name":"Soroush Izadi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU4msDfeVCmxhAyXYp-MC4amgs16Iw-whrXDzT2XXvTe58BdbXv=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This place deserves more than just five stars! The food is incredibly delicious, the staff is friendly and welcoming, and the atmosphere is fantastic with beautiful decor. Their accolades truly reflect their excellence. You all are the best! I will definitely be returning.üç∫üåÆüçñ","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOz5OB_XrjjZ5utZlQp68WH-G5RmaaNhFUI0kjo&fid=0x0:0xbf897c463fd6a7f8"],"When":"2024-10-20"},{"Name":"‰∏çÁæ°‰ªôLet's Play","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX9jFXiat_5VlqessqqODl95Z60bvmkweY23MCGCJHNvN04PR4=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"A highly recommended restaurant, the manager is very nice, often coming over to chat and joke with us. I really like him. The food is simply outstanding; it feels like the best ribs and sandwiches I've ever had.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO7nNtmK2Y-DHg6AGQstTKo1RWKFHGxFKx717th&fid=0x0:0xbf897c463fd6a7f8"],"When":"2024-8-18"},{"Name":"Mauricio","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIQCeBI__-ADFeb2mcVXcZfR_gWkXVdXNkNsI2olML3maTuNvk=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The brisket and burger were excellent, and the service was friendly, clean, and organized. However, the open table did not work for reservations; it is better to call them.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPblNTAAIbnxtUJGRL-I_CL2jYfohW9QYEJxidX&fid=0x0:0xbf897c463fd6a7f8"],"When":"2024-11-7"},{"Name":"Lunch Vlogs","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU2Y9QETN3ZvCf6nTuIWwY8yyIg2r0SE4_QfsDgUYPXwSH1nw4=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Amazing BBQ. Friendly service and amazing smoke rings. Will be coming back to try everything on the menu. $5 all day beer too what a win!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPR6n05k7MS3ZAPG6x0oLHxBzLlW6PKtTHucElS&fid=0x0:0xbf897c463fd6a7f8"],"When":"2024-8-15"},{"Name":"Amanda Song","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWQ_386UL-HlNq9-UHDiJ3GhUuGmPHsCiTMMiJAaZJ5-sqcRSs=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Super nice food! Would come here again! Ordered the two meat combo and all tasted super delicious. Owner is super nice, love the vibe","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMKLvRCCOONstAHzsvUq47oENhhx3tDLwYVEGwT&fid=0x0:0xbf897c463fd6a7f8"],"When":"2024-9-28"},{"Name":"C U","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUzSPBMxEzsF_wRao-B0ehPm0Kpk-alk1Mkg9m47N6NCeIvQISE=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"The food is really good but the prices to the portion size are pretty bad.  I paid $30+ for pulled pork and fries. When it came it looked alright but after I moved it around so my fries wouldn't get as soggy, the portion size was disappointing, it just looked like a lot when it covered the fries.. lies!!. Like come on. Also the corn bread muffin isnt the best. I don't recommend it for the $6","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNGGUXQh58ndzAe4LA4pQUR_n-AB6jsFUSFEbEh&fid=0x0:0xbf897c463fd6a7f8"],"When":"2024-5-29"},{"Name":"D S","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUiwZP5uC5CzBgSahQQVkTqGSd5rHWgB0GVCkCWen4FIy1S7JRp=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Had the platter for 4! Excellent BBQ ribs, chicken, beef brisket, fries, potato salad, beans, and corn bread.

Definitely recommend enjoying this for dine in or take out.

The other menus with cheaper prices are over 7 years old, I've posted the most recent as of May 2024, use those menus and note the current prices.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNf3qjrcOONIeZVNVXz3KR3C7_a_eL2onK33s2h&fid=0x0:0xbf897c463fd6a7f8"],"When":"2024-6-4"},{"Name":"Sima Abdollhapour","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKAcrIjeZeHy3U_8MQxpE7YHz2Xc-Rq_u5OEJqKiK9WR9mo0g=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"If you‚Äôre looking for a spot that feels like a warm hug from a smoky grill, Smoke and Bones is the place to be! My husband, my son, and I had the pleasure of trying their brisket and ribs, and let me tell you‚ÄîWOW. The brisket was tender perfection, and the ribs? Fall-off-the-bone magic!

Not only is the food fantastic, but the atmosphere is cozy, and the staff? Absolute legends. They make you feel like family.

Smoke and Bones, you‚Äôve officially stolen our hearts (and our appetites). We‚Äôll be back for sure‚Äîsave us a rack!","Images":null,"When":""}]

The actual flavor is pretty good as well, just lacking something for the full 5 stars but I would be keen to return for another go","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPtRhNR1GVtEoKb0lMC_nS8EA8eJE92O5d_XY8c&fid=0x0:0x6e2c938210a1abf"],"When":"2024-9-27"},{"Name":"MelIcia","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ94Agtw4l23RP9-_8KdG4izI-oP5yjugdF_vUbzwR1RiDbxg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Extremely fresh meals. Well prepared. Tempura batter is light and not soaked. The deep fried roll was so good and different from others I have tried. Great texture, flavor and filled me up.
Lots of choices to choose from. Quick service and extremely polite.
Will definitely be back to try other dishes!
Thank you üôè","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Marc De Vinci","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXcOJ8mRMqlnBdsa6zASLgWNyKUnRRXZtxhrNdX2W80TpZxpOE=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I‚Äôve been coming for 20 years. Never been disappointed. Fish is always fresh, great selection of traditional fare and more creative rolls. Run by Japanese people!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO9NDQdXAksNQwd04y0ismlh_gsChCw78qKJH21&fid=0x0:0x6e2c938210a1abf"],"When":"2024-11-1"},{"Name":"Kristy Chen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWEfZ2rjxNiODjhooQ3vu4wU52UFmMssx1nBEw-QrGtiP3D8nPb=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Quality of ingredients here are quite good, although I‚Äôm not sure if I would call it amazing. The grilled salmon belly is my favourite, as well as the toro. The soft shell grab tasted fresh, although a tad too salty for me and I quite enjoyed their rolls. I found that the sashimi slices were a bit thicker than I would‚Äôve liked, but overall, quite yummy and I wouldn‚Äôt mind coming back. Service is good and the restaurant is clean and tidy.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPzDe2n7vflAvWNQMN-AWa2_MSndhFLyF1RQtqc&fid=0x0:0x6e2c938210a1abf"],"When":"2024-1-31"},{"Name":"Lyubka Krasteva","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVyK1DCK3Ze-EiSYqmbHpnqcl2kgY7-HDuLhP-wDVSJWQ3ysYkftA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I‚Äôm not sure if my experience is because I went to pick up only an hour before they closed. But for my meal I ordered no rice and extra veggies, I got a total of 1 broccoli, 2 pieces of red peppers and 1 carrot and a ton of bean sprouts. I genuinely was looking forward to eating vegetables and chicken. Not bean sprouts and chicken. I personally was expecting a lot more colorful vegetables. The chicken in my dish was decent. The other meal that we ordered, the chicken looked like it was breaded and soggy. I was very disappointed. I‚Äôve attached pictures for reference. I couldn‚Äôt go back to the restaurant to fix the issue as they would‚Äôve been closed by the time I drove back to them.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPSjUxIPZnuuP42PUU_Ehacy7diVpt-D-xPO87D&fid=0x0:0x6e2c938210a1abf"],"When":"2023-12-29"},{"Name":"Chairy Cheung","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWIgb3-eKMpbc6ue-9iwe1cRFjqtJ9BoRbV9bBPdPp2zu7JAaTB=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Very good sushi. Agetashi tofu is so crispy and so is the tempura. Service was great and we got the food quickly. It was not too loud. We will definitely come again :)","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Steven Olmstead","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWtGPLsUg7ybhRCsA9-VeVYuyaFqArSeyzqddnDm9gdPpsZ3M0=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"On a cool November evening we decided to focus on hot dishes at Hachi Hana.  We ordered chicken yakisoba, spicy agedashi tofu, BBQ salmon cheeks and belly and the Hachi Hana sushi combo. The yakisoba came out sizzling hot; a fairly generous portion and quite tasty. And proper buckwheat soba noodles. The salmon was likewise a good portion. Would have been perfect if the skin was crunchier. Not much to say about the agedashi and sushi.  The agedashi had just the right amount of broth so the tofu stayed nice and crisp.  The sushi combo was fresh and good value.

Service was attentive and polite. We were cheerfully greeted on entry, the server helpful about menu questions and tea was refilled promptly.

Overall a very good experience and will return again.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOOeJxX47fUb156vZat2RvvXdgi8vSXO6q9vbR6&fid=0x0:0x6e2c938210a1abf"],"When":"2023-11-19"},{"Name":"Ayla Hoeve","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXkcJ559OPGRSi4GuTsii0Sfqu0-QxY4yOKRosKgAjVhnayjE5m=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"It was very good, we personally loved it, but if you are planning on going there be ready to pay a pricey amount, but the fish is super fresh and the sushi did taste amazing. We got 2 of the special rolls and 6 pieces nigiris, seaweed salad and miso soup. It almost came up to 100$, but it was definitely worth it for us because it was a really special anniversary dinner date for us. We personally loved the sushi. Earing the lime on the sushi was strange but in a very good way it was a nice new discovery for my taste buds üòã.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPfmQbgcGhLuXKGD6ZtFNBuSl2USVMrypdoI4UT&fid=0x0:0x6e2c938210a1abf"],"When":"2022-11-6"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Tim Crawford","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWe3SGOEkSF3XrCAmNjNXRKCIj9Sf5U8-D6a9GM780W786-7O0RSQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Came here from google searches and extremely pleasantly surprised with the malaysian curry laksa. Omg i finished the whole thing with the soup, it‚Äôs huge. Packed with seafood. Yummm‚Ä¶.More reasons to come back to north van‚Ä¶ Louis is super cool. Vibe is good. I found a new go-to for lunch when I‚Äôm around!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOLWikv7Tdyy24t8ejZawU2_YrDtWvgwSc2rMMJ&fid=0x0:0xe54699419a6445a7"],"When":"2024-10-21"},{"Name":"Arlene Herauf","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWSUCmMRdwMoYQntB6EcL6CeEXmF0TqoTuc39Uhv-Lit4l7kGYQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We visited Tamarind Hill twice now and enjoyed our meal there both times. The first time we went for dinner and found it to be quite dark and cold inside. The restaurant is small with not too many tables but enough to still get a seat though it's quite close to each other, which we didn't like.

The second time we attended a family birthday party dinner and the seating was again, very tight. They pushed the smaller tables together by the bench against the wall and it was hard to get in and out, especially with a baby car seat.

The food was delicious with a large variety of Malaysian dishes.  We were glad to see that there were spicy and non spicy dishes, some more flavourful than others.  We ordered all kinds of meat and veggie dishes like laksa, satay, coconut rice, fish etc etc. The food was fresh and hot and everyone enjoyed eating. The AC was turned off and it became quite hot and stuffy especially after eating spicy dishes. The service was excellent and AC was turned on promptly. Overall we enjoyed our dinner and will return again.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNux6c6eAOSRPw9r3es0O0qt25X59RZUBOhAQ8B&fid=0x0:0xe54699419a6445a7"],"When":"2022-10-25"},{"Name":"Sandra Martin","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXy1lUFtw_zuiqbUdz24zqemK2qXm7x8ZGgzNdi3qENuU0BjgqQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This place is always excellent. Food is amazing and service is always good. A bit dark inside, and could use a good dusting. Doesn‚Äôt stop us from going. In fact, we are headed there today for laksa.  Update **** lighting has been updated. No longer dark. Amazing improvement. Whatever else that was changed, it sure got rid of the dust. If you‚Äôve not eaten here, you‚Äôve seriously missed out in life so far.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Steven Olmstead","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWtGPLsUg7ybhRCsA9-VeVYuyaFqArSeyzqddnDm9gdPpsZ3M0=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Update

Recently revisited Tamarind Hill and found the food to be excellent, the decor getting a little worn and the service perfunctory.  I reckon the server really doesn't want to be there, he was so lacking in interest or enthusiasm.  The food, however, was better than ever.  Two of us shared the green papaya and mango salad to start followed by Hainanese chicken, mee goreng and eggplant in spicy chili garlic.  All served piping hot and in generous portions.  The food definitely is worth returning for despite the service issue.

Been to Tamarind Hill several times but haven't visited in quite awhile so decided to have lunch there the other day.  Three of us shared a mango and green papaya salad, calamari, Hainanese chicken and nasi goreng.  The salad was very enjoyable - just a little bit spicy in a good way. The calamari was pretty good, though the portion size was on the small side. Hainanese chicken was very moist and tasty, would order again. The nasi goreng was meh, not a lot of flavour. Service was good and despite arriving under an hour before closing, we were not rushed out. The place is very small and even though only a few tables occupied it was very noisy.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP-Prxyezgcz_9QsNE-sVmKov7A7pgTk51l_WXL&fid=0x0:0xe54699419a6445a7"],"When":"2024-4-22"},{"Name":"Caroline Toledo","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXh3C31P2xpvptcJtW3gyJhOcWchMyln7AA1tszj9jcCHqbcoW_=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"We ordered satay chicken which was okay but the Laska soup was very good and also Mee goreng was amazing. I really loved it. It looks likes a family owned restaurant.  Just the service was not the best.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNBSAw-KIswKjUjGO3gPCMCXKZ2MMsmv3jttNOh&fid=0x0:0xe54699419a6445a7"],"When":"2023-11-3"},{"Name":"Jonny","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJShSgCHbmme6GLETHZczdb6MWGsJKCwpKUqZlkj3SXYWukfA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Finally was able to try Tamarind Hill Malaysian Cuisine. Tried two previous times but they were randomly closed.

Already were out of several staples (roti canai, hainanese chicken and beef rendang).

- Sambal beef with asparagus ($22.00) - beef was salty. Small, unsatisfying dish that wasn‚Äôt worth the price point.
- Nasi goreng ($16.75) - standard fried rice. Lacked wok hei.
- Malaysian laksa curry ($16.00) - good heat to the laksa. Decent amount of vermicelli. Broth was well rounded.

Would only return to TH to try their other  laksa options.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOezg4Gauv20Ixz65L4XIhAaDK1DZ7qr9nh7_Fx&fid=0x0:0xe54699419a6445a7"],"When":"2023-7-20"},{"Name":"maddiee S","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV90veXNAU1i9Hf4dfq1SicvJn9s4y2wYBqGkvKs6SdglCRmFwD=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"I was craving for authentic Malaysian food and found this place through Yelp. I ordered the classic Nee goreng which were tasty and reminded on street noodles in India so unexpectedly served a different nostalgic purpose. My husband opted for Char kway Teow and Singaporean shrimp wasn't too excited about the flavour profiles and taste. All in all, an average experience.

My rating:
Flavour: 3
Ambience: 3
Service: 3
Uniqueness: 2
Cost: 3
Vibe: 3","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMJqlk1RykJ-0HV9NztIbXIn9Lo8KQUW_MUNMk7&fid=0x0:0xe54699419a6445a7"],"When":"2021-11-14"},{"Name":"Anjstacansi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXxfxd7NedIKrSKbEThR9bCPUg8DXPAGue7SfEQVr5kqeRxyA8a=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Everything is 5!! Kind server nice atmosphere and FANTASTIC food! The flavors are perfect!! Will come back again.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNVssvN1FoIMY83ScJNNvFT6A5anvmjuavVCZ15&fid=0x0:0xe54699419a6445a7"],"When":"2024-8-10"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Zoe Ching Yi Ho","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKrEFs9z7jmBIZq4_UMaJz8TrH2ZwH9DR3LSa5lTDnxUcXdpQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This restaurant is absolutely my new favourite from now! Firstly, my friend and I ordered the Spicy Spaghetti (with shrimp & meat) and Penne Chicken (with goat cheese), both are remarkably fantastic creations in reasonable prices! Secondly, big shout out to our server Amie! Her hospitality and cares are excellent who deserves a 10/10! WILL DEFINITELY COME BACK AND RECOMMEND FRIENDS TO COME! Keep it up Chefs!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOnl7rCQuYGVOcsja0q9I6o7dJIrv6eek-gW8TC&fid=0x0:0x276d6733595b2a04"],"When":"2024-12-2"},{"Name":"Caitlyn Mah","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU23oPs6bp630i4HnRsvlmDM8OHCc6tCmjkktp0TTzRYVRaKdEDRg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Came here for brunch on a sunny Sunday morning and sat out on the patio. Loved the vibes and location near the water üòä We ordered the coconut mussels to share, the Mediterranean bowl and the spicy spaghetti. This was for 2 people and definitely was a good amount, almost was too full but the food was so delicious! My favourite dish was the coconut mussels - it was 11/10!!! The sauce was so tasty and had a good coconut flavor that went well with the mussels. The fries were great with it and the portion was a good size. Would definitely come back here for mussels!!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMOLw5WLOFSHXgHbMU16nh7wW0v6gj1dWPccJi5&fid=0x0:0x276d6733595b2a04"],"When":"2024-7-9"},{"Name":"Snoopy Kitchen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU3h-I-trbYva-Tzrs-UNhkQe4Nn1jgsblAcoQ0hPrnUWvugM3Y=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"We had brunch there before hiking.  Potato was done pretty good. Crispy outside and very soft inside.  I am a bit surprised this restaurant is called Bistro as it‚Äôs as big as a restaurant and served like a restaurant.  The only thing is we were not asked how we would like the benny done and didn‚Äôt let us know until we had them.  They are all medium so if you don‚Äôt like medium, better ask when order.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNQfdYDZTucWSXK_PCK0BmUkRVycWDEJcZbq_UN&fid=0x0:0x276d6733595b2a04"],"When":"2024-10-23"},{"Name":"Sandy Y. (CameraGourmet)","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJQ9J8ig1HwUQBJbXRdKDIwR0OrTw3YtQtyHDEaRuCN8XnUDg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"We recently spent a perfect day paddleboarding in Deep Cove, a peaceful spot with its unique geography and calm waters.  After our paddling adventure, we headed to Arms Reach Bistro‚Äîa cozy gem right by the water in Deep Cove Village.

We love dining on their outdoor patio, where the heaters and blankets keep things comfy.  This time, we ordered the Wagyu Beef Carpaccio with Crostini (so flavorful!), crispy Calamari Frito with a mild spicy marinara, and Spicy Spaghetti with Chorizo and Argentinian Prawns (a must-try!).  Great portions for sharing!

Overall, we had an amazing night.  We highly recommend this spot after a day on the water!

üìùüìù

The food plating is splendid, but the taste was just okay, except for the Wagyu beef capriccio, which was excellent.

It took quite a while to get our food. We waited more than 30 minutes for the main dishes after the starter.

The staff were kind and professional, and the view from the restaurant is amazing.

Overall, it wasn't a bad experience, but I don't think I would return.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPZDCcXjA-D6bAROFAWVdQm0d2auMkMms4I0IaW&fid=0x0:0x276d6733595b2a04"],"When":"2024-6-1"},{"Name":"Tully Giles-Cook","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXk1s8-oDyiiPa2Lv8qE_iiPpyRcX3uHAD3rn-19C0516p8kUen=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"So we had the beef carpaccio it was ridiculously good like they must lace it with cocoaine it was that good. We ordered another beef carpaccio after dinner it was that good. We also ordered the duck special and the scallops. They were absolutely delicious. The portion sizes could be a fraction bigger but I feel like the prices were appropriate as it's 2024 and costs of everything is high. The service was actually excellent. Super attentive to our needs and even flagged potential dietary flags in regards to any food allergies. Food and drinks all came out very quickly too. And yes there were lots of other patrons.
Like I dunno if they are always this on point but they were next level for us. They have the warm patio heaters and blankets for everyone. Desserts were also delicious.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOtbawaDxjxPpys7NqjjM1VAKOy7XZyWxVby2tn&fid=0x0:0x276d6733595b2a04"],"When":"2024-9-21"}]

We were so happy that their patio was open & they turned on the heater for us & our pup. I ordered the pi√±a colada üçç ü•• üçπ & huevos rancheros with a side of summer sausage. While my husband ordered a burger & she staff accommodated his request to make the order vegan. The food came out quickly & was HOT. üçΩÔ∏è the summer sausage caught my eye as soon as the staff brought it out: it was colourful & looked juicy. And after taking a bite: I knew it wasn‚Äôt just store-bought/ a ready to cook sausage. It juicy & burst with flavour with each bite, & was so good that I had to ask if it was house-made or a specialty order. One of the staff said it was indeed house-made & took lots of recipe-tweaking. My cocktail was refreshing after finishing up a walk around Mahon Park & felt like I was in a tropical country. üå¥ And my cast iron plate of huevos rancheros was filling, scrumptious & definitely made our stroll worth it. My husband was happy with a full belly with his burger. üçî

Highly recommend Raglan‚Äôs for their friendly staff, colourful & heated patio, & yummy food. üíØ","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM-icNJ49hd6iczJBfPJ9d1SQca59BQ7ddM4XE&fid=0x0:0xf141558e0568e0e9"],"When":"2024-2-26"},{"Name":"Mahsa Al","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVlnjaaMlHVt2QE6J6dPuqgGlG4byySFGE-wInaKC9mdbYcfG73=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Very cool place in the north van. user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Isobel Tan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXofkM9cPKs8xyZpd85Bu-2sn6hgHkpFK93thNaHtY_yZwzPhuf=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The food and service here at Mythos are certainly deserving of their glowing reviews. My husband and I popped in for dinner one evening, and we ordered the moussaka and the roast lamb shoulder, as well as the hummus to start. All three dishes were executed to perfection.

The hummus was so creamy, and such a generous portion as well. It came with two pieces of pita bread, but we were even asked if we wanted more to finish our hummus with as well.

The roast lamb was the star of the evening; tasty and fork tender. The moussaka was excellent as well. Both came with sides of a fresh Greek salad and potatoes, and portion sizes were so generous we struggled to finish our plates (and not without trying; they were that good).

Service here was amazing as well. From start to end, we were well taken care of by Raul, who also made sure to check that we were comfortable and that we enjoyed our meal. The food was served really fast as well; just how we like it.

We definitely recommend Mythos to anyone who wants a tasty, authentic Greek dining experience here.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPBqF-jsp2MxI_YLKkRBoeT7hQnY5S42Q6bBcK2&fid=0x0:0x32f9d74a3095cbc7"],"When":"2024-9-23"},{"Name":"Lucas Currie","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKdjwmwgEnlE6FRohkM26CFbDskWj7Kd_pG7u-VZu-TqBIKdg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The service from start to finish was incredible.  Food was served quick, fresh and hot! Large portions, the tastiest food you will find. The lamb was HUGE, and melts off the bone, and the flavour WOW.  Moussaka is also top notch, and the potato is one of the best I've had. We both quite literally licked the plates clean.  Compliments to the chef! The food was so good we HAD to order dessert. Unfortunately we were so pumped to eat it we forgot to take a photo üòÖ baklava sundae is sizeable, and they don't skimp on the baklava. Recommend the Roast Lamb, Moussaka and Baklava sundae.  5/5","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNDQYHpS8CbQ2n_piqrHXmdpZed1uhdvl9_ZNA3&fid=0x0:0x32f9d74a3095cbc7"],"When":"2024-6-24"},{"Name":"Jayanti Hunter","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXyoJdadazExRVSUdtLZfXeiC-vnYqojxLpaMyAxYs5O4jSyuni=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Let me tell you, this place is amazing. Not only is the restaurant absolutely gorgeous, the vibe and ambiance of the place is so inviting. The servers were charismatic too, which was lovely.

Now onto the food. Probably the most amazing lamb and pasta we‚Äôve had in a long time if not ever. The lamb was so succulent and pulled apart from the bone so easily and the potatoes were sublime. The pasta was just perfect. The sauce to pasta ratio was just right and the seafood was perfectly cooked! Could not recommend this place more. Has definitely become a favourite in Vancouver.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPqD45Wr2d4qmDqH3u45wakXPzoilZS9vq1FAYd&fid=0x0:0x32f9d74a3095cbc7"],"When":"2024-5-24"},{"Name":"Shannon O'Neill","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWgZBvtwtmtw4Poaj3MQR1873q0qP1OZPsSVl0-1Tntj68YkC7M=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This restaurant is unbeatable! Top service, atmosphere and food was unreal!! It was all so fresh, healthy and delicious! We felt like we were in Greece üá¨üá∑ definitely recommend this place and will be coming back again for sure!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMAd6FIY5ySFRN8PbPNPV1TtE2kL-EgfiEHUmki&fid=0x0:0x32f9d74a3095cbc7"],"When":"2024-11-4"},{"Name":"deanna chan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWdwGSeqcEDo0rzi9pPXRf03hCYRI1KvG9IJoiZWuj-jvO-Qppmfg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"When in town visiting and in the mood for lamb, I come here.

The first time I came here, the food ruined it for me getting lamb from anywhere else. It is not the same any more when I go back to Saskatchewan, it is not that good anywhere else.

I always order the Roast Lamb. My husband always has the Lamb Shank. There is a lot of food there and if you add on an appetizer and / or dessert... I have a hard time walking out the door.

The service is always good. Somehow we always have a choice of rooms to sit in and we usually pick that back room where it is usually the cooler of them all during a heat wave in BC.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOxCx6Y20g89E_EUXayzj0K9gyTZ0SLf2dDgbEb&fid=0x0:0x32f9d74a3095cbc7"],"When":"2024-8-9"},{"Name":"Jaida Regan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVnJLf-7_be7JVPiOtQt4GL2o6z7IS8fEsMHUYulFcDNSxRYDWx=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Amazing meal! We split one appetizer and entree and it was the perfect amount of food.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP0QJTqa6oZiRxYEuUgsH0tfppfVK7CQOkwxmRL&fid=0x0:0x32f9d74a3095cbc7"],"When":"2024-9-18"},{"Name":"Rose","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJSL4vktPKNFoHU_qemcEmny8UpQEiE7NhD561JAlKgq7PhZQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"It's my favorite place. The food is really good, the servers are really nice, and the atmosphere is really good. ‚ù§Ô∏è","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOf7hgfI-gXh-W1etnsFaCO_aNz943e4wAPpkW8&fid=0x0:0x32f9d74a3095cbc7"],"When":"2024-10-22"},{"Name":"Ahmad Elmoussa","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXKYDmw5dw_9JVxNrc9m73Fn8tlquKO_2E2SHV9qf0G31UEYMDg1g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I just visited this incredible Greek restaurant, and I‚Äôm still blown away! From start to finish, everything was absolutely amazing. The food was phenomenal ‚Äî every dish was bursting with authentic flavors, cooked to perfection, and presented beautifully. I highly recommend trying the moussaka and grilled lamb ‚Äî they were absolute standouts!

What really made the evening unforgettable was our waitress, Andrea. She was attentive, warm, and her positive energy truly elevated our entire dining experience. She anticipated our every need, gave great menu recommendations, and her friendly smile made us feel at home. Andrea, you made our night!

If you're looking for authentic Greek food with top-notch service, this place is a must-visit! I‚Äôll definitely be coming back soon! ÿµÿ≠ÿ© ŸàŸáŸÜÿß","Images":null,"When":""}]

title: Anatoli Souvlaki

[{"Name":"Saeed Sabeti","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV9BB0ZOMFykYbcyhdylHgAX94mk7AelIyWlm2AxrBPlkVbqjcQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"You could never expect to have this food experience if you walked past this restaurant. We‚Äôve been living in the neighbourhood for years but never tried the food. I‚Äôm blown away by how different and delicious Greek food is! I believe what we ordered is one of their traditional cuisines. High quality, fresh ingredients and experience üëçüèª","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNjhra-bdw1A0L7pptvyFqM4vkK9lHaXS0bgcNX&fid=0x0:0x8778d34e1ec9df96"],"When":"2024-8-3"},{"Name":"Don R Campbell","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUlaWij7xrbYcwkz7FscJMnAIxuYixNyVFja7O780zWpDE5h2f7rQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Lunch visit.

Just next to Londsdale Quay, this long time family run restaurant still serves up a hearty and healthy lunch. (Attached pictures are of lunch portions. Souvlaki lunch and Calamari lunch)

The service was very friendly and very informed on food allergy options.

Good food, cooked fresh.

Indoor and outdoor seating.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNrNmioeF-WMAwOpTTkSx4ygiKEAzl5E_pcsfhN&fid=0x0:0x8778d34e1ec9df96"],"When":"2024-10-17"},{"Name":"Romantic Spirit","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXCOCvFxjQApDCEXk-a-OPAkRV025OSNERq20H9bHjJEdlqY0el=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Loved my food, time and the fun belly dancer they had for entertainment. The servers were cheerful, helpful and on point.

Good People and great food.
We had the perfect night.

Thanks guys! üôè","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNuzTaFX0OYFJQnmRwuteBNAzjxvhjLuHJSK_d6&fid=0x0:0x8778d34e1ec9df96"],"When":"2024-11-23"},{"Name":"Brandon Bear","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVQx8UvsjjXLMQ9vuoUAke7WFOu1cDMwUYDJ2CgSYYU9ZBvW1k=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Anatoli Souvlaki is the perfect hidden gem. The warm, inviting atmosphere and soft music provides the perfect environment for a charming date night. The service was incredible (Sam) with well dressed and mannered staff, prompt service and tasty drinks. The food was perfectly prepared, with fresh ingredients and authentic flavors. We were not expecting this level of professionalism but were certainly pleasantly surprised. Anytime we're back in North Van we'll be sure to make a visit back at Anatoli.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMewD5fU1dz4Z9jTjSZzxIPM8PaNnngDH01R_-J&fid=0x0:0x8778d34e1ec9df96"],"When":"2024-10-1"},{"Name":"Nicole C.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVNZcAIQ4qr7hn5gxjgCqqDZnmoGrKcOcXa6nrEAFlT4Kmg7hPu=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"**Update: Rating Changed from 2 to 5 stars**

After leaving a negative review (bottom) due to a bad dining experience, Anatoli's manager (Georgia) immediately reached out. She gave me a call, listened to my experience, relayed what she had learned after speaking to staff, apologized sincerely for our experience, and invited my friends and I back for a chance to make things right.

We returned to Anatoli's last night and everything was 10/10. The service was outstanding the food was wonderful‚Äîa complete 180 from our previous dining experience. Our server Tim was very attentive, friendly, and ensured we all had a good time.

We tried multiple dishes with everything tasting superb! (I wish we had taken more photos but we started eating as soon as the food arrived!) Our highlights were definitely the watermelon salad and the grilled humboldt squid.

I understand mistakes can happen at restaurants and I believe a big indicator on a business' professionalism is how they try to make things right with the customer.

Georgia and her team went above and beyond to give us a true taste of what dinner at Anatoli's is like.

We will definitely be coming back!

***
After reading so many positive reviews and having this restaurant strongly recommended¬†by close friends, I was so surprised to have experienced such awful service. Off the top, I want to say our issue was not with our server (who was great!) but with the kitchen. Our group of five waited 45 minutes for our mains (no appetizers were ordered) and one of our guests received her meal 10 minutes after everyone else's. The big issue though was that all of our food (rice, meat, and potatoes) were cold. When I brought this to the server's attention, she apologized, spoke to the kitchen and then shockingly returned to tell me that "they don't believe¬†me." She said the kitchen staff had said plates can get cold while people wait to eat, so the plate was probably cold but not the food. I was stunned at this response as I wasn't trying to send my food back, just have it warmed up. I had tasted everything on my plate before speaking to the waitress and even asked guests at our table to confirm it was cold. The server was noticeably embarrassed and offered to take my plate back to be warmed up. After about five minutes the plate returned and the meat and rice were the exact same cold temperature and the potatoes had, at best, increased from cold to mildly warm. At this point, we were well over an hour into our dinner, my friends had been eating for 15 minutes, so I told the server the food was still cold but that I didn't want to wait any longer. She apologized profusely, said she would speak to the manager and when she returned she said they had offered to give us each a dessert. I felt it would have been more professional if the manager had come over to speak to our table personally but I appreciated the gesture. And it was not just our table experiencing issues with the kitchen. A table of eight directly beside us made multiple complaints about how long their food was taking and then had their mains arrive 10-15 minutes apart. The restaurant is gorgeous and our server was very professional but when you're charging $30 for a main, making guests wait 45 minutes, serving cold food, and then having your chefs openly dispute your claim that the food is cold and argue with their own staff, it leaves customers with a tremendously negative experience.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMFxCU5hTp7-ao8szjvj-dDoaESq78t9vmriKgQ&fid=0x0:0x8778d34e1ec9df96"],"When":"2024-6-13"},{"Name":"Nadir Zulqernain (Broker Nadir)","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWhEJmar-xPGvkChLjdSk0W2wzn9BfvbU7Rx_M524YyfDxob5mQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Anatoli Souvlaki at the Lonsdale Quay is a great spot for Greek food. If I am not mistaken, it used to be inside the market before the major overhaul of that entire area.

This spot has inside and outside seating areas and seats at the bar. The food is excellent. Service is fast and courteous‚Äîno wonder it gets pretty busy.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMU587YmkF9xbtavySXMQmboAFq6No0CtJoszHG&fid=0x0:0x8778d34e1ec9df96"],"When":"2024-5-31"},{"Name":"April Heyman","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUzhK8ZI-LCFNEN2-quYoNjfEii33Wm3ajB65Q4iGUbScPkyz7w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Fantastic service! Fantastic food!
My fianc√© and I don't get a chance to go on dates very often, so when we do, it's nice when it feels special. We had the restaurant to ourselves when we first arrived for happy hour on a Monday afternoon, but it filled up with customers by the time we were done. The food was delicious and flavourful. We love Greek food and this really was extra yum! The calamari was perfectly crispy and fresh. The lamb kabab was killer, so much flavour. And can't beat that saganaki. Spiery is an amazing server. Nice guy, very attentive and funny. Made our date very memorable! We will be back for sure. :-)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO0sSelrGNBXGCIMbXzpCgtz6ALhryklnRxR_Qb&fid=0x0:0x8778d34e1ec9df96"],"When":"2024-5-30"},{"Name":"Srikantha Kalaghatta","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX7kV3vSmU11E2VJr6yMSYBtHLByJ47CPuwfOKoc_5xVBiEfsZQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Anatoli Souvlaki is a Greek spot that‚Äôs pretty upscale. The place was packed when we went‚Äîdefinitely book ahead. We ordered Hummus, Vegan Calamari, Vegan Souvlaki Dinner, and Baklawa. The Vegan Calamari was a standout‚Äîit‚Äôs a must-try. The dips were also really good.

It‚Äôs on the pricey side, but the food is worth it. The vibe is nice too. The only downside was waiting a bit despite having a reservation. Overall, a solid choice for a special night out.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPH8AvVrcKZdqjuVm0-ZhuCgzbi6M4RIxMIWbKG&fid=0x0:0x8778d34e1ec9df96"],"When":"2024-4-20"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Green Green","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXvGkkQWLTgP6ZpLfyQFVTIZWmT7INBi5IdhvmkSI6w7pFFIwWw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Let's be honest, people. You have the right to legitimately complain, but it doesn't make sense when you talk about the quality or the taste of the food here. It is THE best sushi in upper North Van, no doubt. Maybe it's not the type of service expected in this country, but I can get the service needed and amazing sushi that matters.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMoH_kw3tm5nCfrfoDvFN0CHClH9dtvF-Uc0cSx&fid=0x0:0x231e5d3daab3bf8c"],"When":"2024-7-28"},{"Name":"Carly Robertson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKCqhryI6ZUTIxU-KW88Oe6lMSc890BDY1V-uW4U3dziPvffg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I decided to pop in for a quick bite before I started work next door, and immediately felt a weird and unfriendly vibe from who I assume is the owner? There was no one in the tiny restaurant and he wanted me to sit at the bar. I said no thanks I prefer a small table.. I tried to order a dish and he informed me they don‚Äôt have it. Fine. I‚Äôll just take a California roll and he says that‚Äôs not enough and I‚Äôll need to order more? I don‚Äôt want a big meal as I just need a snack. There‚Äôs a small sign saying ‚Äú$10 minimum‚Äù Ive never heard of such a thing. As someone who works in the service industry I would never treat a guest this way. I hate to dog on a small business, but these days you really do rely on your customers to keep your business afloat. If you are going to be rude, annoyed and enforce ridiculous rules, then don‚Äôt be surprised to see the negative outcome. There are dozens of bad reviews here for a reason. Disappointing and unnecessary.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"parmin langroudi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIKrgBrvjkp97BManyZQhfi-u7QZrwlzpR4v5ExFuztVNy3Hg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"food was really good and comforting! one star off for atmosphere cause it was pretty quiet lol. service was speedy and our server was very kind","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Johanna Simmons","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUBhOcMtEjSKzdRmSK2wTVd2aRCKv0h5vA0DKYcnEG7338r4JGQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I am appalled by the tone of many of these reviews. This is not the place to take revenge on a business owner because you have a view about the racist, mistreatment that he received from a local resident. I am honestly disturbed by theses behaviours.

This aside, this mom and pop restaurant is a gem in Edgemont Village and on the North Shore for that matter. The owners are hard-working, honest people who take great pride in the food that they serve. I have always had a great meal there over the last 20 years. The restaurant is CLEAN and the food is always FRESH. The owners value high quality ingredients and this is exactly what you get.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Viktoria Krestinova","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocItLswYKEtM1nCvt7ejp_deoui0NsyyEDxYngEjRPbeCSaQIw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I recently visited this restaurant and was immediately put off by the lack of hospitality. When I arrived, I greeted the chef, who was cooking right in the middle of the dining area, and asked where I could sit. Unfortunately, he didn‚Äôt acknowledge my greeting and simply told me to find a spot myself.

I ordered a dynamite roll and was then informed that I needed to order more than $10 worth of food to dine inside, otherwise, I would have to take my food to go. This policy was not communicated clearly, and it was actually another guest who had to explain it to me, as the chef had difficulty speaking English. Although there were plenty of free tables, I reluctantly agreed to take my order to go, even though, with tax, my order totaled more than $10.

When I received my food, the container was very small and so cheaply made that they had to use a rubber band to keep it closed. To make matters worse, the sushi was dry, and the portion consisted of only five small pieces. Overall, the experience was disappointing, and the quality of the food did not match the price.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"ANDREW M","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVG9agQfsf2VlRasUvSJDkvAdvVhPr6aFh5du22zmW7_fab1zI=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Went to a causal lunch. Slow service. When I was ready to order, I don‚Äôt know who my server is. And also food came slowly. I ordered lunch combo. Main dish was amazing. But the chicken nuggets and other deep fried things were cold and tough. I think those were pre made. Nobody do quality check until I asked for my bill.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPKReRtxyeR_cOOLdKRZcVdGIJy-YpU_nXhj5Y4&fid=0x0:0x231e5d3daab3bf8c"],"When":"2019-7-17"},{"Name":"Diana R","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXnAtgSAssytVhvDWZv0asfMtkgzlZZAkzo4FFRM6tpiUJ-BWRM=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I don‚Äôt recommend you to visit there. I went there very quiet time. No other any customers there except me but I ordered a sushi (donburi) to go. Then a lady asked me to have a seat the chair in front which was very uncomfortably one.
I just wondered why they let me have a seat since I‚Äôve never seen this restaurant was busy but when I asked to have a chair with table, they said no. I was like why???? For what?
Then few minutes later I‚Äôve got sushi (donburi) and it made me disappointed since it had few pieces fish slices on the rice and it didn‚Äôt cover rice at all. Then I paid $30 was too expensive
I shouldn‚Äôt come there. Taste was not good as well","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Paula Vallejo Arpi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVELNXTdUo_VHSxTkWtDpqxToucLuGSOd9caCCN5boLENg0hsk0=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"The miso soup and sushi were great! Unfortunately, the level of service was not as good as expected which makes the atmosphere a bit uncomfortable. We really liked the food but the place sadly lacks hospitality.","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Jennifer Kim","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXW33no9zwbMBMFgyg1l_vTTdf3A3UbVTlHeeFD7hCYvVb1HuTr=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"The service was great! Sadly the food was severely lacking... It tasted like some of the food was just microwaved instead of fresh.

Middle-of-the pack viet food here: if they used fresher ingredients it might elevate the flavour

However for the pho, it definitely needs to be cooked longer and hotter. My bean sprouts were still cold in the broth and I was disappointed. The coffee was burnt rather than strong... i don't think they had the slow drip press.

End of the day, it's still alright - always room for improvement

I like that its open late tho! :)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN9dYdH2ccbytJBD1uNcjyG5AU1a27Nmx1WEdG1&fid=0x0:0x5b0d98989e6f450"],"When":"2024-12-2"},{"Name":"Susana C","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLbX_QKuaEf6ecbnocWzjer3WudYneLMe_JJVgbs8i0ijFAVg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"I ordered a banh mi, portion size was quite small, taste was ok. My friends ordered pho which according to them was pretty good. Service was quite slow despite not being too busy, but the food came in around 15-20min.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMkQx7P3Zoefp4lSedPdjR7BnN_6jrkn4PA7srA&fid=0x0:0x5b0d98989e6f450"],"When":"2024-6-8"},{"Name":"pianato","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVVLXbdZkOc7b1QO4yfZn-lTBqUHNrLiNXg2vC4QFUcBR8PXtLaHg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Came here today in the morning with a friend! Food tasted great! Loved the service! The Vietnamese spring rolls were my favorite!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP43MCAhavtNZaRmjQb07LmroJfJodLJSKVpueA&fid=0x0:0x5b0d98989e6f450"],"When":"2024-8-6"},{"Name":"Bank Apisit Suparan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWLVGZqooX70iTAVXuVWOQdxzltdpf5cSOqPks98JPcrI0saeTz=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I recently dined at V Nam Restaurant, and it exceeded my expectations in several ways. First and foremost, I appreciate that it‚Äôs a Vietnamese restaurant open till midnight, making it a fantastic late-night dining option.

One standout feature of V Nam Restaurant is the generous portion sizes they offer. You certainly won‚Äôt leave hungry, and the best part is that it comes at a reasonable price. It‚Äôs a budget-friendly option for those looking for a satisfying meal without breaking the bank.

The flavors of the dishes at V Nam are bold and packed with Vietnamese goodness. While some might find it more intense than expected, I personally enjoyed the flavorful experience. The authenticity of the taste is evident, and it adds to the overall charm of this restaurant.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNXxBJ8rqNW_ddtvZ5Pe9R2YH1cZigCmVA8E8WH&fid=0x0:0x5b0d98989e6f450"],"When":"2023-10-8"},{"Name":"Chris Smithson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV7ZPoi52jJsVk3YfvB72BCAyHy11qZAAdFY0afBmDsM-cd3x8C-A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Friendly service and great food, especially their spicy beef soup, but the Pad Thai was good but not great.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP2RkCAR4g_TGids1QzXgsP5PahkUkYKPhkHNN-&fid=0x0:0x5b0d98989e6f450"],"When":"2024-7-24"},{"Name":"Legend Jeri","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV6MYkC-gehfX9m3YYJTQmTtqno291H98WwfQYtrJ5OQ5cDyOI=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This hidden gem of a Pho spot truly exceeded all expectations. From their convenient operating hours, extending until midnight, to the impeccable quality of their dishes, there's nothing but praise to offer.

The soup portions are perfectly sized, and the sandwiches make for convenient, quick bites. For those craving a classic beef soup, #41 is an absolute must-try. Meanwhile, if you're in the mood for a veggie-packed delight, #56 is the way to go.

The appetizers are a delight, with the spring rolls and salad rolls accompanied by a delectable peanut sauce that's simply irresistible. Their Guza and deep-fried squid are equally delightful additions to any meal.

Don't miss out on their Vermicelli options, especially #63 and #66 for those who love prawns. The fried rice #90 and Hawaiian #92 offer tantalizing flavors that won't disappoint.

For those craving something heartier, the Chicken Chow Mein #73 and the Grilled Short Ribs #99 are sure to satisfy any appetite, even your furry friends won't be able to resist!

The staff here are incredibly attentive and friendly, contributing to a fast-paced yet welcoming environment. Whether you're dining in or grabbing takeout, the prices are reasonable, making it accessible to all.

In conclusion, if you're on the hunt for a fantastic Pho spot that won't break the bank, look no further. This place offers an unforgettable dining experience that's sure to keep you coming back for more.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN9ItlEmPkvQwAT_PWhJjHGfWDse40wTvOhGA7Q&fid=0x0:0x5b0d98989e6f450"],"When":"2024-5-7"},{"Name":"Ashley Westenberg","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJtyhRtwmaNa3gRoxeO1UQTCAhOaE_GDLgGfEov12cWVmu2VQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Ordered for the first time off uber eats.... veggie peanut pho, veggie vietnamese spring rolls, and shrimp pad thai! Delicious and will definitely order again. My only complaint is that there is hardly any protein, 3 pieces of tofu with the pho and 4 shrimps with the pad thai. The sizes are huge, but mostly carbs.
I was very happy to receive lime wedges with the pad thai, and the basil was very fresh with the pho!
(I've already eaten a spring roll in this photo and some pad thai)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMjJwiPwQ873vF3qtrDtbJLW8a76Kjqyj6QPrF4&fid=0x0:0x5b0d98989e6f450"],"When":"2024-1-4"},{"Name":"Estairia Hong","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXmDLygqZ3OT1WagVoz_S7MOF1DNcLc8uEquGumaFc59ZLDHz6l=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Came here for lunch with a friend. It‚Äôs a good place to go if you want to be able to chat without having to talk over music or the crowd but maybe we were too loud for the place? Lol when I was looking over the menu at first I thought the prices were a bit high but then when the food came out the portion sizes are huge! The picture of the vermicelli I took after I was a few bites into my bowl (I forgot to take a picture before I ate). As for the service nothing spectacular, they never once came up to our table to check in on things. You pretty much have to wave them down if you need anything.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMrCm79vYOrFIGi0OrIg7oFd45FKrtCsDpQ9bFt&fid=0x0:0x5b0d98989e6f450"],"When":"2024-2-3"}]

[{"Name":"Julia Esteves","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKZrjMpWV5hOHGhBUwImJ_Bsyza2Hax_XPh7OFiZJPsPYwxiqA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Very clean place calm and peaceful ambiance. Pizza is delicious! Staff is friendly but lack in attentiveness. They spend most their time talking behind the counter and not aware when guests need something.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNBTVpZdn1_LfzSOgmdc6spE7BUCyC0x5jQ0K3v&fid=0x0:0xf4adc12a0ef89f16"],"When":"2024-10-10"},{"Name":"Melanie Dekker","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVZWOVby0mjxg_a0S6eqeAGCK2KQNcgM-5_mfCOxgIdTCNbKSq_=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Service, style, food were all excellent! And the tables themselves are gorgeous; pictured here. This place (albeit a bit bright) will look so much better full, so I wanted to share our great experience.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNgLcAfDC59zq42_hWQkTg86DZU_oSJ0vDu_Kp5&fid=0x0:0xf4adc12a0ef89f16"],"When":"2024-8-16"},{"Name":"Ramin Khatami","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJLg5w2wLoMRqRwcwJDN1XDYwnNQ1xOHafXQekgbpEwCereqQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Delicious food and nice staff. We ordered their Margherita, Capricciosa, and Pollo Verde Pizza which were delicious. Highly recommend this place.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPwZodMsuFXHN7EKxRKTJOrYjmMFw7DjRj3mv75&fid=0x0:0xf4adc12a0ef89f16"],"When":"2024-11-4"},{"Name":"Thomas Chu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWNZNQuwcaLkFru0OocnWV-ZkIhoG7pqFK9NkXkK54RwAUt8wE=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I found a very delicious Italian restaurant in North Vancouver on late Saturday night. I went there for the first time and ordered a safe dish meatball spaghetti, a slice of focaccia and white wine. The portion of the spaghetti was just right, and the focaccia was better than expected, so I ordered another piece of focaccia. What surprised me was that there was a gentleman performing live on Saturday, or weekend perhaps. The waiters interacted with every guest politely and confidence. Table, seats and washroom were very clean. I will try other dishes next time with family & friends next time.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN9rJ401FTmdKVfD1nn3Xu9aN8JjocckTJb6HZz&fid=0x0:0xf4adc12a0ef89f16"],"When":"2024-4-8"},{"Name":"param parkash","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX4GjTwUYwzDq_M1KDsLxtYNUaLlLQSsnVHDF3ZC-Xyz-4wozxNZQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Such a good place. Me and friends had pizza and pasta plus garlic bread ü•ñ. I love the garlic bread üòçüòçüòçüòç and pizza (38) from menu.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMHTuUIVdU7-r0Ld5Vr_BERGFuplSC-TRAxnxNq&fid=0x0:0xf4adc12a0ef89f16"],"When":"2024-6-24"},{"Name":"sam brg","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIbEqqcNeVd2LJwxudiAJz8SRD-u_C3GjZYE1yl_aDaTKtRRQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Outstanding Pasta, Full of Flavor
Rom adelivers the best pasta experience! The pasta is cooked to perfection, with rich, flavorful sauces that complement every bite. The ingredients taste fresh, and the portions are generous. The ambiance and friendly service only add to the charm. If you love authentic Italian pasta, this place is a must-try!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Kimmy M","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWqFvnLEM0whRo4uH8lPTjoTlgz4S_H2fMA3TF6e0k3D16y34LT=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My partner and I really enjoyed our dinner at Roma!
Firstly we were greeted right away and had great service from our server.
To start we tried the focaccia bread which was so fluffy and filled with seasoning.
I decided to get lasagna since I haven‚Äôt had one from a restaurant in years, and it seriously did not disappoint. It does take 20 mins for the lasagna (as said on the menu) but it was worth the wait (plus there was live music so that kept us entertained). My boyfriend had the carbonara pasta and he said it was delicious.
We‚Äôre looking forward to dining here again!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOD7VZ5WyzYLsKG_vbwqBfDYcurs_2l1np52w9w&fid=0x0:0xf4adc12a0ef89f16"],"When":"2024-4-6"},{"Name":"Kait","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUdQWrOBSno6mfsV7fmOW5mfAt3rZRYPI9EocQUfyWsIPgnCtrs=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"We came in as a party of 2.  The restaurant was not busy.  The corner we were sat in was freezing cold and once the food was served we were not checked on even once.  Could not ask for anything since no one came to ask how the meal was, my water was empty the entire meal.  The pizza crust was soggy and greasy.  The meal and the service were very underwhelming. I‚Äôd get it if the restaurant was busy but it was pretty much empty. We couldn‚Äôt even get our servers attention to ask for the bill.","Images":null,"When":""}]
