user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Ryan Broumand","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUQ8Qe_F9uy5zhbH23gYYByVGJNkf2yERtRuKQ71jjYwmM5sbjY=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"The owner is very kind and personable, but I have to be honest about the food quality and value.
For the super size $17, you get the same quantity on a platter as you would get for $11-14 and any other Donair shop w same quality or much better.
The quality is not bad, but also not great. Chicken is a bit dry which is not common for donair, and the lamb/beef is not very good in taste.
In addition, their ‚Äústeak‚Äù donair is misleading with the photo of an actual steak vs just sliced processed lamb and beef that are fried to attempt crisp them.

I hope the shop can improve because the owner is a kind Persian man.
Maybe only selling chicken and another kind of meat will keep things fresh.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMrnfrMaPSJgb6N3DYsLEFwoFArzKMGd6V3ivqA&fid=0x0:0x87f9f644efed9681"],"When":"2024-9-13"},{"Name":"Alireza","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUFO8S_5bnJ1Gbxa0DrJ-JDnEI06M_5nz8TkqZ51KiwdQjq5mRr=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Momo Donair serves some of the most delicious donairs in Vancouver. They offer a wide variety of flavorful and fresh options, and every bite is truly satisfying. On top of that, the staff are incredibly polite and always make sure you have a great experience. Whether you‚Äôre in the mood for a quick bite or a filling meal, this place never disappoints. Highly recommended for anyone who loves quality food with excellent service","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPlvs8YEwdLQYblV7gr6Lp9QyatmHynoL9PAPtI&fid=0x0:0x87f9f644efed9681"],"When":"2024-10-8"},{"Name":"Nasim Yousefi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXWtFJYE2BnCXlIXcLOK5rDCE2MeW-Fdmu3YQ2gy8dbEC6F7Ybt=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This review is for Momo Danair. Love the taste of their chicken donair and the warm hospitality. Thank you for the kind and generous gesture. They served us tea and sweets once we finished dining. We were not excepting. Will be back and take more friends with me üôÇ","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNqloC-gOPMKxxGhdfr07bGba5olTzN22lpYUvb&fid=0x0:0x87f9f644efed9681"],"When":"2024-6-10"},{"Name":"M D","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVPK9QUUFXT7ydVST5OkxvNJhzpqheNwHS4xUGaB53pG1rfQwVr=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The donair special with fries and a coke is great deal! $14.99  The staff are very nice too. My only nitpick is the meat quality could be better. The meat quality used to be a better in the past. I wish this restaurant great success üëçüëç.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Martina Southern","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUBNFmCp0ZCrYrcxu2UouqAvzWfCz4RtFed2AqJIEX8lUAVkMlq8A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We found this place by fluke, and what a pleasant surprise. The food was delicious, with great taste and generous amounts. The ambiance was clean and welcoming. The prices were good, and the service was friendly.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMqvIFPmckWoKPY5W-xT2bp6BgyBn437VRyCidk&fid=0x0:0x87f9f644efed9681"],"When":"2024-7-21"},{"Name":"Lucy Q","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVmYYCv91nGypEOH5i4zNNIgItYKA60aITY7qlGegel7t5goZaFNw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Definitely the best donair I've had in Vancouver! Super fresh and delicious and very well priced. Don't forget your tub of hummus for only $7 (at the time of this review). When we were here it was very busy and there was quite a lineup, but the staff kept things moving and they were all very calm, didn't get flustered and remained friendly. Seems like this is mainly a to-go place but we hung out inside where there is a reasonable selection of tables and bright decorations. Air conditioning keeps it cool in the summertime.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"DLF","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX9EFOlgMuOL55yqsaQ6NiAsJ4nsERtjOjGMuEVwNeqf2hPuHSB=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I have consumed many of donair in my time, and recently visited this fine establishment.
Thee Best Donair By Far!!
Great Value, Large Proportions, And Everything Was Fresh!!
Very Friendly, And Polite Owners, Clean Family Run Establishment.
Certainly Not My Last Visit!!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"sarah","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKsmMzEHH2TCJdi7_9_wE76d-6LiqLzDaVvb1yJz_pEhuCsZw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Cheapest and most delicious place to get a donair in north van. Super sweet woman behind the counter, very large super sized beef donair for $12. Toppings are fresh,sauces are fire and the price is crazy for the taste. Nice solid wrap job aswell! After trying most if not all shops out here, this is my new go to. 3rd time coming to see consistency, and I'll forsure keep coming back!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPw-F6TTr6sKc3EzARRh4EuFplVWEzS8hxyc-qA&fid=0x0:0x87f9f644efed9681"],"When":"2024-1-5"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Steve Lloyd","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX5mSZbHG3POhBmEwMM-hOBEYT_rfM4l_81Z3bGYN7YJSopu5E=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I ordered from a delivery service online and not knowing the spice level ordered medium. One of the dishes was far to spicy to eat. I called the restaurant directly and they prepared the dishes again in mild and delivered the order themselves very quickly.

I was blown away by this level of service. Oh...and the food is awesome as well!! They have earned a new and loyal customer.

I'd highly recommend Pawan's Indian Kitchen for the quality of the food and service.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Sonu Sonu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJctAYaJFYcj-HgkXwJuJyVD2zlkZbG_OwFHpjkK81qq7NUUg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"I have my review for Chicken Biryani. No way near to Biryani .Their chef don‚Äôt even know the B of biryani . Plain  yoghurt  with black pepper on top is their Raita . They just mixed chicken rice . Disappointed .üòî","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPJxYcd8WUW-bRJ6ADtJi8D9wHArqpNfuVPuXDn&fid=0x0:0xeb921982c7e39622"],"When":"2024-8-15"},{"Name":"Nathan Huesmann","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVNRce5JVBVtdVN6lBs0ZUeDDEgRpOnHc99Jm9PETBsJks8Zzfm=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This was our first dining out experience during our vacation to Vancouver and it did not disappoint! Food was delicious and the service was spectacular. Super nice family run business, everyone was very warm and welcoming, and the food came out fast. Highly recommend!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Panteha Ebrahimii","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWp1neZmF9TAV9Mm2SPPocowHUnqOs_JTslv6MT8SBP5-H-Z0A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I had the pleasure of dining at Pawan tonight, and I must say, it was an exceptional experience. From the moment I entered, the warm and inviting ambiance set the stage for a delightful meal.

The menu offered a wide variety of traditional Indian dishes, each bursting with flavor and expertly prepared. I particularly enjoyed Channa Masala and veggie rice which was perfectly spiced and cooked to perfection. The flavors were rich and vibrant, leaving a lasting impression.

Moreover, the staff were incredibly friendly and attentive, ensuring that every aspect of the dining experience was top-notch. Their knowledge of the menu and willingness to accommodate dietary preferences was commendable.

Overall, my visit to exceeded my expectations in every way. I highly recommend it to anyone seeking a taste of authentic Indian cuisine served with warmth and hospitality.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMTSlvn-6JkO9OHB1qG4WvU263wwTihrY_SRQgD&fid=0x0:0xeb921982c7e39622"],"When":"2024-3-14"},{"Name":"Raj Johri","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXYg0zXO_IFR1pd6WRS0bw1N_QUZDh5uf0OddKHTZEyMbRwAqU9=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"It would be 5 star but the goat curry was meh.

Butter chicken, tandoori chicken and butter nan were 5 star!!

Will come here again.

I didn‚Äôt like choley in the thali.

Lassi is awesome too.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOin-219vahqRX7dMbMgX3zUIWhXL_kteCwQEhT&fid=0x0:0xeb921982c7e39622"],"When":"2024-6-4"},{"Name":"Naveen Aila","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW9AsBs7USBCSKUQXnUwUz862ZnRwiBeiDBFeUAV_RATSJpXS_a=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Hidden gem of Indian restaurants. Thalis here are tasty and healthy. They have right portion size. Would update my review after trying other dishes.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNRUT9CJcqcG0tTr8_5ZCyAno3VYPHYOBnnl1p7&fid=0x0:0xeb921982c7e39622"],"When":"2024-1-26"},{"Name":"Raymond Albrecht","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUdcq1cgTlz2jM8KoacrOUDbgVs4z5r0XqeHF9B9u-6RMjzCQQK=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The food was amazing. The pricing was fair. The service was very attentive. It was actually so good props to them","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN9GvFChIHpK5iCk64CQDH_3B3ksI5JyzyXjDFT&fid=0x0:0xeb921982c7e39622"],"When":"2024-6-30"},{"Name":"Jas Randhawa","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVu0SKP_PuDdAZnY1KwFXzK080qXR6UT1-3Hn9ljx-eLxNVM0J_=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great experience at this restaurant! The food is delicious, bursting with flavor, and beautifully presented. The staff are incredibly friendly and attentive, making us feel right at home. Will come back!","Images":null,"When":""}]

descriptions: Locally sourced produce appears on the cafe & bistro menus of this laid-back venue with live music.

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Alexandra L","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKwE8vLQGn7eqDG4vM1HzIzqfJalD8a3eRglR5ZQZx8pKm6MXc=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Visited here on a Sunday morning around 10am - place looks very cute from outside and located in a local neighborhood. I think this place has a lot of potential but the experience fell short during my visit.

- Firstly, there were very limited selection of food available during the visit in the display case and multiple items in the breakfast menu not available. Display case was almost empty (3 cookies and < 15 items in fridge). Breakfast menu (benny / scramble eggs etc) also was not all available. Avocado toast and benny were not available and shop keeper doesn‚Äôt seem to know the menu well.
- I don‚Äôt think that I visited during off hours which might contribute to this issue.. However, beyond the above, there were some many fruit flies everywhere when I sit down to eat which made the visit quite unpleasant.

I was really looking forward to the visit as I think this place has a lot of potential but between the unpreparedness of staff and unclean environment I will not be returning any time soon for coffee/breakfast.

Noted the place also has a small fridge with selection of convenience store like items (canned beverages, milk) which I imagine is convenient if you live in the neighborhood.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Sanaz","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKTNtImUpOds22CA2SEG4A_S7XMKtajkKHWUk0YXw9U-soQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Amazing local coffee shop with great coffee, sandwiches and sweets. The scones, although not overly sweet, were incredibly tasty.
The cozy atmosphere was so pleasant, as well.
Highly recommended.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPvQtwBU_jPuq2y5CNAiQZw0_XwVqhxMvg13tg&fid=0x0:0xec2dfa93a9300da8"],"When":"2023-12-13"},{"Name":"Soefae Chen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWO7ZNgUf5Dwk1W_QTwOUDH5IE-lT_O8VF-ftw5oM5hbRZ-8oOz=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I loved the food and the atmosphere so much! The open space really emphasized the great neighbourhood! The food was slow to be served but, nevertheless, I recommend trying out their their breakfast menu!! I will definitely be coming back here again :)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOWGaHLlgP1sN_4RCvsiM2kHGHQCZGn1921Pegf&fid=0x0:0xec2dfa93a9300da8"],"When":"2023-7-15"},{"Name":"Jacob Pope","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWwLf5bdkAI-kRTPCovp1KP7kp23I4rgHTspKwNIPJlm-xmk0enuA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"I visited the Corner Stone before and after the renovations. Prior it was a nice place to grab a rather affordable brunch. After the renovations (which look amazing) I was a bit annoyed by the service, which took over 5 minutes to even get acknowledged and seated with a mostly empty restaurant. Once seated I got friendly service, however the food left much to be desired. I ordered the chilaquiles (divorced to try both salsas) and I've never been so underwhelmed by a version of this dish. The salsa was cold and tasted like it was from a bottle. Chilaquiles are supposed to be served hot after stewing the tortillas briefly in the hot salsa, and that was what I was expecting. The refried beans likewise seemed like they were from a can and were bland. For the price I paid it was a disappointing meal. Perhaps it was an off day, but it is unlikely I will be back.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPLpKu5EFEvFrjavJ72aXYuQgvIb21--o3RMY1i&fid=0x0:0xec2dfa93a9300da8"],"When":"2024-1-18"},{"Name":"Penny Rusty Sophie","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUkGfXMIDqwS_yD1axTk6tkHoLsnybE2ErvKrHMoMIElMJWekI_=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Cute little bistro nestled in a fairly residential area of North Vancouver. They also have a small grocery store section.

The Mexican Benny had tasty crumbled chorizo and the side order of bacon was perfectly crispy. While the hash browns weren't exactly crispy, they were still pretty good and worked well to sop up the sauce and runny yolks.

Ham and cheese breakfast bowl was quite filling. The food seemed to take a while to come out so a good idea to order something to drink while you wait like the London Fog or hot chocolate with whipped cream.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOyJYmMlrhHD_fS7xWCEBWx-8jkDNltamh7r61v&fid=0x0:0xec2dfa93a9300da8"],"When":"2023-5-7"},{"Name":"Tricia C","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIS8jxdORXKJaAWhct8yqQ3gE8qhWdlJFJL5jsz8u98jLVDfw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Was hoping to try out the brunch menu here but it was not offered on the day we visited. We were limited to the display case items and pre-made sandwiches.

I was pleasantly surprised with the creamy latte that had a smooth finish using beans from JJ Bean. The Turkey Brie sandwich was also tasty.

Looks like a fun neighbourhood spot to visit in the summer when you can sit out on the patio.

It is also serves as store that carries pre-made soups, drinks, candies, chips and other packaged items.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPkHQMB8_RMhC9JnVKckeQZWg6dez5togbkPeH8&fid=0x0:0xec2dfa93a9300da8"],"When":"2022-12-30"},{"Name":"Minu Ak","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKpx6V6dzD6tisu6tWSZcHe3Ev1skK55mygxtuEg2Ryek5VqA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We ordered a burger and pasta, and both dishes were delicious‚Äîjust like homemade food. The staff there are very kind and welcoming. The only downside was that the portion size of the burger and salad was a little small.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Gemma Boothroyd","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUYT33iilC0hUrH_Kx1DApSbirTimOoVbSL3BKh-5kba7gU_FY=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"A great time at Corner Stone's live music night! Dawn Pemberton was undoubtedly the showstopper of the evening, but the food and service was also fantastic. Had the salmon with salad, and it did not disappoint. Really cute spot in the middle of the neighbourhood!","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Jennifer Prout","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVFG3sID5k_iSx0qDGMNZngrrubg3FxZW14ndy5NF7i2PEedUWi=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This place feels like you have been transported to Italy. Wonderful community feel, kind staff, reasonable pricing, and impeccable quality. I always get so excited to come here, order a litre of great wine and have just impeccable vibes. Recently I asked for extra lemony pasta and they absolutely delivered. Please go here to discover your new favorite Italian restaurant.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMXDHqw3O-4vPULpDAqZ2CuaJqheN2RuwM9b4yr&fid=0x0:0x155d62137f341471"],"When":"2024-8-7"},{"Name":"Mark Olexson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVP0MMCJueIkT7Ny9a3t1yKGlm9DzCi8EhIjL62H0o1vjup2dfe=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Amazing food and excellent service in a cozy environment. Plenty of options but the fettuccine in lobster and shrimp rose sauce is my favourite! Don't fill up on the fresh baked bread, although it's very tempting.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMgqj-4b9eWPhzXoIuSCC-ebV8yuFDkXH_svdEY&fid=0x0:0x155d62137f341471"],"When":"2024-6-26"},{"Name":"Chloe Rachel","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWgExGuK1W-XgQc1tPnrQlqQkWxCTaNhdz977uVTTY3zjpsAzs-=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Had an enjoyable dinner here for a work gathering! Service was attentive and friendly. Our food and drinks came out in a timely manner for our whole group. I've had their linguine in a creamy curry sauce multiple times, and it never fails in its flavour. However, I ordered the Vitello Forestiera to try something new (veal medallions with mushrooms). The meat was tender and lathered in sauce. The meal started with a daily special salad, and the refreshing fruits (pineapple, mango) balanced off the walnuts and soft brie cheese. The mango cheesecake for dessert was fairly decadent, but made the perfect sharing dessert to end a meal.

Always like coming here for work gatherings and would return for a special occasion, as prices are more on the high end. Restaurant is in a good and convenient location!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOuWaL7xzyEQj-9Kki-gFHSPhnYvZy0hSLfXqjq&fid=0x0:0x155d62137f341471"],"When":"2023-6-30"},{"Name":"Norman Farrell","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWOKauCUm-k2P6JXZbVaCjI514xmAUd8cPqhMzakFQdELGnjKWj0g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Warm late-spring day made the outdoor patio a pleasant spot to dine in early evening. Lonsdale, with noisy motorcycles, siren blaring police vehicles and other urban traffic, may not be perfect  but there are plenty of happy places to eat on this street. Bravo Cucina has been a fixture for many years and has outlived many other good restaurants in North Vancouver.
Two of us shared a Caesar salad and warm bread accompanied by a delicious white bean, garlic and olive oil paste. She had veal-stuffed cannelloni and I had the seafood special: prawns and scallops in a light sauce with vegetables. Except for the lightly-seared and slightly over-cooked scallops (my preference is a hard-sear and barely warm centre), all was well prepared. Server was a delight and prices reasonable. Worth a return visit.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipORlEok2FS4k7J4LBj4pAWnptuu08TikyR8Ez1S&fid=0x0:0x155d62137f341471"],"When":"2023-6-7"},{"Name":"Munro Stuff","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWj0Wcuk6ox5dfAeJ4fAaMbhX_F-nzzt3p5oc_f0hBd0NpbGSM=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Hadn't been to Bravo for years, after too many disappointments, but I returned after hearing that some of its long-time servers are now actually running the restaurant! You can see and feel the changes happening - a long overdue breath of fresh air. The Fettuccine Cascardi (chicken in lemon cream) was delicious. Looking forward to returning and sampling more of the menu. Hope they start using an online reservation system soon!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNPPBtGghyOO_OY9i6jb4HBFdUZNHcUNqrFYfWc&fid=0x0:0x155d62137f341471"],"When":"2024-3-1"},{"Name":"R.J. L.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKLqR-Rrdyc2QEw_AUdjsyS2U7WpDGt0CW5CVan-yfTkuHkWQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"I read previous reviews and wonder if I went to the right Restorante. Bravi Cucina, is quite run down. Therefore, what is call a Trattoria or sometimes Locanda nelle Italiano, where is served basic food. The service was quite ordinary and just polite as it should be. If they own the restaurant, they may want to considered clean up the bathroom area with all its clutter. The music background was loud enough for our server to only remember us when and another sever attended us. They may also take some basic Italian class. I had a tomato salad away by far from any Italian standard, the chicken with the mushroom was tasty with overcooked vegetables and soggy roasted potatoes. This restaurant and its personnel (owners?) need to pick up the loose ends. I do recommend this restaurant for value and basic Italian food not for outstanding dishes described in my readings.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Brittany","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUaTw3mnOK8l8haAjS6bfO1ye0bRyF4XKnDg89neYDPBoOw4QlgPQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Modern share plates - good for groups.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMfzhNOL8UZBxWoXFb5Y35EjaKWT4nU9V55DAp5&fid=0x0:0x155d62137f341471"],"When":"2024-9-30"},{"Name":"Hanif M","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUffyC8zNMufrv130HoQIUZhrgzgxk_iDPTgtNVSsLcoEZ6LvtH=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The food and service and attention to the guest experience is excellent. The Bolognese sauce I had was delicious. Very friendly neighborhood Italian restaurant.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPaCk62V1hTc8TFWzCe9SS3sQ8AiHPrqLNnvg2f&fid=0x0:0x155d62137f341471"],"When":"2021-4-6"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Kanako Sakurada","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKYybgPjG_d3LYq66Ui47Ocd_2PMrfkKaju5V_L0IyVTR19lQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great happy hour menu! Some actual meals instead of mere snacks. Sometimes your dinner is not till 10 pm on a busy day‚Ä¶Enjoyed blacken chicken and steak frits. Great service and nice patio seating as well!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO8c99jZ2R6Zmn8hgvzxuc66JAtWEJV6_brYoLp&fid=0x0:0x4d4b73103ae07de5"],"When":"2024-6-28"},{"Name":"Marty Jordanov","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVRQTqQECV2Pav8LRQrUOrCKWKNZ5au2gP_ah7iBw-Ju-MmlPug=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The sirloin steak was tender and prepared to order. The kale salad was fresh and quite good. I‚Äôd never had a grilled avocado before; not sure the grill added anything to the avocado, other than an element of novelty. The hazy IPA on tap was delightful. Cool atmosphere and friendly staff. Overall, a great experience. Recommended.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNXGNEjudKN6t5ssE8z2dK3dcFyFTgiWAHliN35&fid=0x0:0x4d4b73103ae07de5"],"When":"2024-1-31"},{"Name":"Tony Neumeyer","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUUXdQgqHHRA0Xwn61cd9dSU65TN_lKM6TEuHYJTJ3WUWQ_kdtShw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Love stopping by the original Cactus Club location. Very friendly staff provide great team service.

The Calamari is good, but could use a little "pop" with either a different dip or a little more spice in the batter. We liked the wing dip better with it, so ask for that. I found the craft pilsner to be very good, but would like to see a free main stream beers as alternate choices.

We'll be back again.

https://amzn.to/3YNoIZv","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNycc73aopfJRK7hnlg0tCowo4BmSNXM9ihOAle&fid=0x0:0x4d4b73103ae07de5"],"When":"2022-2-8"},{"Name":"VanCityHapa *","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXyqeCy-Qc7wvuSMqZPsDGraElzpVaobtw2RTIuwsGPG00W9l4=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Was looking to reconnect with this place after moving out of North Van a few years ago. Super glad to see them mostly keep the original layout and ambience of the place. Reception was pleasant and accommodating of my request for a booth inside (looking for AC on a 30c day!), as the inside was only about half full. Went right into menu and ordered one of of my go to items. Server C.K. was unsmiling and a bit snappy but I chalked it up to the heat and maybe a hectic lunch hour earlier. Food was great as always! However as I was looking to catch up with some work emails, server kept checking on me to ask curtly how the food was (the first couple times) and if I was done /needed a box which I thought was strange considering my food wasn‚Äôt even halfway done and I was there about half an hour. I‚Äôm quite mindful of overstaying, and I kept checking my watch as it was a late working lunch for me. One time she asked so loudly the customers at the next table couldn‚Äôt help but look at us. When done, I asked for the bill and because I felt the service was not up to par from my recollection, I lowered gratuity to 12% from the recommended 18%. I thought that was fair, given the food was great, reception and other staff were nice except my server. C.K. was not happy at all. She printed out my receipt, left it rolled on the table, quickly turned around and left in a huff without saying a word. Not judging her by this one incident, as she may have had a challenging day, but why take it out on your patrons? Not keen on going back in the future. Unpleasant experience today erased all the fun memories of this place for me. Maybe the 12% tip was too high.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Victor Hugo Vazquez","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWojsdNl9B01ttsDJjgBc8v89Jqfn3KZXh9u8vNgqFZgXLC7Ns=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This isn't the first time this team has made me feel truly happy! Jade, our server, was incredibly accommodating, Simon was exceptionally professional, and Joe's warm smile and friendly demeanor brightened our experience. A huge thank you to everyone for going above and beyond to ensure we felt welcomed and cared for. Your efforts don‚Äôt go unnoticed!

P.S. Thanks for my chiles toreados, Mexican style.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Vanessa L","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJn5-wWxex9aO-Mi9xid8mfp6Oc29KrF3vWBmCWD0VaoF9BhSw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We had a lovely and funny server and there‚Äôs lots of inside and outside/shaded seating. The menu is changing as of today so many old favourites are gone like the frozen cosmo (frozen aperol spritz now) and the chili chicken among many others. the vegan/plant based menu will remain the same for now. i love cactus club and this is one of the many locations i love although there are no views like at english bay","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPjBL3nyu5ZrQcr-jvxeDnZroBxja8iGtzv7fIS&fid=0x0:0x4d4b73103ae07de5"],"When":"2023-5-30"},{"Name":"Tannaz Taheri","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJQ3G4OEPaVjWKmP9POl7aP13awHnDOJpL-qdfAfp5rd9--Lg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"I'm a fan of Cactus Clubs since I'm in Vancouver, however in my last experiences, their service has really shocked me.
First of all, their volume of meal portions has significantly reduced compared to 2-3 years ago while the prices increased!
Secondly, from the moment the waiters bring the food to the table until they hand over the bill, they keep checking in, asking if you need anything. It‚Äôs nonstop, and they don't let you enjoy your meal or time to chat with your friends‚Äîit‚Äôs honestly annoying!
Last week, right in the middle of an important conversation with my boss, and while I was still eating my lunch, the waiter came over for the third or fourth time, and interrupted me to ask if I needed a to-go box!!!!!üò≥ He completely threw off my conversation and didn't allow me to even enjoy my food and time!
I think Cactus really needs to train their staff for a respectful behavior and customer service!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Elaine S","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXw0NZVlw-DYhg6yu3CwCqawu2sEc8yv_yDRJNRZHiHpXsjuXCx=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I thought I had left a review a while ago but can't find it so this is long overdue!

I always enjoy the food here and the service is consistently great. I get cravings for the fish tacos with yam fries and stop by when I feel the need for a treat.

I have been served by Kianna several times and it is time to give her special thanks for always taking great care of me!

I also want to thank Joe for taking great care of my daughter and I one day when we had to be somewhere and didn't have much time.","Images":null,"When":""}]

[{"Name":"Jennifer Neelands","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJnVPZR3x-5AHDkcDBjX2tcJyv7gZhGfQ0joeWMfxBkXz1I7g=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Best fish and chips I have ever had. Fresh, fluffy, and the batter is perfect not too thick or greasy. The owner is so friendly and professional. Definitely would recommend this place. Would definitely travel nine hours again just for their food. The town is beautiful and should be explored. Wonderful little escape to paradise.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM5yTdYjp18OqbTkBLP82hOFtsyRvU4ZIHnCC2R&fid=0x0:0xa24d2cdfe3b4e32e"],"When":"2024-8-5"},{"Name":"Marco A. Perez","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVmJ8brZ0tcBiAiO82M7o3FdFly8q-WRFngrSIKxSQGaI2Ki1mvTg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great spot to grab a burger after a hike. We had the salmon burger and Baja fish sandwich. The staff is very friendly.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN2Kh6b4RLctHt3h_HlUl7xyHjv0FCU8y2xWG-v&fid=0x0:0xa24d2cdfe3b4e32e"],"When":"2024-8-11"},{"Name":"Elisa Eugenia Sierra Casta√±eda","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU0UEHfW8jzKcAVeWmeWHYRCPUX02QJ6RMDuzNwCpULV8KyZyc=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My food was a tad bit bland but the beer was great. The service was fantastic, the guys gave my puppy so many treats and told her she was super cute.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM0lRlsOVQ45r0K0BZvI8olMqlSezaEqAoXSiLF&fid=0x0:0xa24d2cdfe3b4e32e"],"When":"2024-6-24"},{"Name":"Jordan Ho","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW11-xeEA0Ih57ocfphXt0C50QwI614ll6t2qknklEqHoDt3aVy=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Small bar with a nice selection of comfort foods that tasted great after a long hike. The fish and chips were especially good; crispy and not too oily, and the accompanying fries were shoestring and crispy. The cod tacos were decent, but in comparison to the fish and chips, not as impressive. Would be interested in trying a different taco filling next time though and maybe change my overall rating. Solid place to eat overall, with good service. Small patio area, but accommodated our dog as well while we ate. Would recommend for a post-hike bite!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM_icMGUb_m36duRFTVeEvDpmlUt_UZ_3snhsEE&fid=0x0:0xa24d2cdfe3b4e32e"],"When":"2023-8-5"},{"Name":"Robbie Carter","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKMFnfxOQxXjuyQpGQ3yov5aBSk5JXLRaIWnqWuULkZDZ0SPg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"A fun little locals spot. The owners are awesome - super friendly and there such a great range of beers on tap too!

The new street patio is great for late afternoon / evening soon too!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMSBINpngSDdnYPcYaYP9hFueHR-kpZVIiB_A-_&fid=0x0:0xa24d2cdfe3b4e32e"],"When":"2024-6-25"},{"Name":"Alice Kan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIw_vu4i828qPUqo7hV1cQDFcKukMRacneeZcyJy4SaZPHW9A=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Fantastic, attentive, and quick service. The fish and chips and dry run wings were delicious. And can't beat the view!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOwHIlA4p6k1izzaphB0EHIdMkXeIJNdZLOV-HH&fid=0x0:0xa24d2cdfe3b4e32e"],"When":"2024-9-21"},{"Name":"Melissa Floreani","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXAun7usQMsVbphipTfv-mgfdxiD5sG_0SLhvvky-I4OI22HoE=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We went to Deepwater Micro Eatery to watch the Monday NFL game.  Shout out to Ryan who served us some great beers, wine and a delicious meal.  The Halibut and chips were outstanding and I highly recommend it.  Very cozy atmosphere without the ‚Äúsports bar‚Äù  vibe.

Lots of locals with their dogs were at the bar and it was nice to feel like we were part of the Deep Cove Scene.  (Very chill!) It was difficult to get back to the reality of life in the GTA after experiencing this little slice of heaven.  Thanks Ryan!!  Hope you get Oasis tickets :)","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jin C O","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV2N6nKIXLeiEOdmMvNaKDJCCv0hUBvN-K7vIgeLjjmNgxwGMg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Small but has cute character. Tacos are amazing.  Not sure the owner is the chef, who works hard and their ingredients seems quite fresh.  My husband and I love their tacos.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN1UVDNler3zdW5M0c3mfOzcPBog_t349jR3Xrp&fid=0x0:0xa24d2cdfe3b4e32e"],"When":"2023-7-1"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Amanda","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWgns71Wwx6NVkNf9GQpJ10RBJwKb5qVVrA2QVDPL-B4GrUQnbsOA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"What can I say, this iconic, institution of a restaurant has made a complete turn around! I used to dine here often, because at this very least, it was decent.
But what I never expected was to be completely satisfied with the entire experience!

The staff have always been attentive, friendly and accommodating. What lacked for me was the quality of food.

Today my boyfriend and I enjoyed the Los amigos hash ( I added some avocado and an extra egg). My boyfriend got his usual- the door crasher.

Our eggs were cooked perfectly with glorious orange yolks that oozed with luscious goodness, the food was hot, fresh and well seasoned. We also order a half order of pancakes which were hot and fluffy and to sweeten the experience, Chef Wes gave us some chocolate chip cookies to end our meal.

Really great to see the whole team doing well! So, thank you all for making our breakfast a memorable one. We look forward to supporting the team, service staff Chef Wes & his team as well as  the current owners refreshed vision of the Eighties Restaurant in the future. Kudos to you all. üëèüèΩ

Best,
M & M
ü•Ç","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP-7HDFxoYgqZaV2ft0vNBHErr4rHGhkMus43b4&fid=0x0:0x9634a5c3e54afc8f"],"When":"2024-11-17"},{"Name":"Mark V. Sinclair","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW6ve_wQQ4uxBt3cYQW8cTfAQRrRZkQ44mckIfxzATcnSTXi0wz=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Headed over to Lower Lonsdale to run an errand after long gym session. Had heard of the "80s Restaurant" so headed up to Civic Plaza at 14th Street to check it out.

Nice low-key vintage vibes -- think classic homey diner feel with wrap-around balcony outdoor seating for warm/summer days. Bar and screens for watching hockey/football matches. Friendly welcoming people and amazing waffles, French toast and eggs  benny on the all-day breakfast part of their menu. Dinner section also features veal cutlets, fish & chips, Salisbury steak etc.

Great convenient central Lonsdale location and great people.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOO6-BoQn5c8ZBpjqHGbd1JddLqaOk237wGbN1v&fid=0x0:0x9634a5c3e54afc8f"],"When":"2024-9-20"},{"Name":"Gaelle","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUkHC4Kik2QOded9IwuhEFnrBRrvsR3NqlrLDqb_Ld_0eDutzQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"I‚Äôve ordered delivery from here several times, and it‚Äôs been very tasty! Always the vegetarian omelette. Today I think the cook just wanted to go home. Potatoes burnt on the outside yet somehow still mushy on the inside. Flavourless. Omelette was even worse, salt and pepper couldn‚Äôt even save it! I don‚Äôt know how you make food with so many ingredients have such non-existent taste?? It‚Äôs honestly an impressive feat, somebody call in Ripley‚Äôs !!

Two stars simply because the toast was acceptable and the omelette wasn‚Äôt burnt- otherwise this was a truly embarrassing meal. I could‚Äôve made something 12x tastier at home and I wish I would‚Äôve. What a waste of 20 dollars. Please, save your cash and go to Cora‚Äôs instead. Your brunch cravings will NOT be satiated here.

Edit: Thank you for the offer but I am extremely reluctant to eat anything else made here, no offence!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMmxScDFWNdcl2sc2rcBiuLGeA4wAkCJPIc6q0Q&fid=0x0:0x9634a5c3e54afc8f"],"When":"2024-8-15"},{"Name":"Alvin Wong","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWe7GNAcDD_olIxPvjJNxL1Hm7Qi7x4Wh-Txa7EiT1fdDm_8c2Y=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"With a decor that looks like it survived since the 80s, Eighties Restaurant is a chill and relaxed lunch spot that offers made to order food that does push any borders of the imagination.  It arrives hot, fresh and quickly, which are the main pros of the place, plating could use some care,  fries dumped on top of the sandwich is rarely a benefit.   Don't come for the atmosphere unless you love the used pub/diner decor, service is fine and functional, and you can understand that regulars are abound in a place like this.  Nothing pushed boundaries and this place operates as a safe space in both the mental and physical capacities.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Michelle de Smidt","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWybLPECXS8PlJVUMt3Oi1wytfr4gYRsg_5zaqzk2S3zQNm-mqn=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I've been coming to Eighties for years, and it‚Äôs still one of my absolute go-to spots. When the girls and I get together for Sunday brunch, we almost always end up here. The team is so friendly and welcoming to our whole crew‚Äîeven the little ones! Esteban especially, always smiling and happy to chat, making you feel like family from the moment you walk in. Eighties is filled with so many good memories, and I can‚Äôt wait to be back to make more.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Munro Stuff","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWj0Wcuk6ox5dfAeJ4fAaMbhX_F-nzzt3p5oc_f0hBd0NpbGSM=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Update Jul.24: I believe the 80s changed ownership once again, so you'll see some different menu items. Still feels the same. Eighties Scramble now has tasty potatoes on the side.  Lost Amigo Hash is a new 'bowl' addition. Still as satisfying.
----
Jul.22: The 80s was recently purchased by the Smoke & Bones folks. Still looks the same, some of the same staff, some of the same menu items but a different looking menu. Loved that you could customize your omelette fillings (not possible in the past without upcharge) though I did miss cheese as a basic filling. The 80s Special Scramble, however, had the addition of hashbrowns but noticeably fewer eggs on top and was disappointing. We'll keep coming back to try our favs!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMSkR3Vm8o4AchxyAO7ScXpW5qCUYYPQaO4TpWr&fid=0x0:0x9634a5c3e54afc8f"],"When":"2022-2-11"},{"Name":"Ghazal Rezaei","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW5O6-Zbkuo3NXJW7y3MwOjCi8gsa93KhzuF3d8619TmBbqhqUS=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is one of my favorite brunch and lunch places in the city. The prices are reasonable and although the place has an 80s vibe, it's very clean. The staff are friendly and the food feels healthy and home cooked. The toasts and burger buns are super chewy and flavourfull! Fries were also crispy and fresh. Overall, I always enjoy my time here!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM0QmxgZd7MU4KCw2OwcI0ddjQZ1qw_FxXidYvV&fid=0x0:0x9634a5c3e54afc8f"],"When":"2024-4-3"},{"Name":"Akar Ahmed","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKMcD4U-_2My1RCz6U_uQojvd51WedgBVAY5sdF4cRrlKb4=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Had brunch at Eighies Restaurant yesterday. Located on the best areas North Vancouver on a lovely little side street. I was greeted warmly when I arrived and given a choice of seating. The server immediately made sure I had water and  The menu while not expansive does offer a variety of (predominantly) cuisine choices. Once my friend arrived we were given time to scan the menu and make our choices. I ordered the burger üçî Fries üçü The food arrived in good time - We both enjoyed our meals and found them satisfying and tasty. The only tiny complaint I might have is I think the presentation of the food could be turned up a notch. Following our main course we both shared the Pepsi , Overall we really enjoyed our meal. We were helped by a couple of servers and both were outstanding! Thank you we will be back.","Images":null,"When":""}]

[{"Name":"Sharon Sa","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV-ZatOwc0o-_pcFCHW6F3-vZav6E45c9r8cCGUjqpf-G46H7p8=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I sent my partner on a mission to get fried chicken as our late night snack and we were both pleasantly surprised with the quality and service. The strips tasted homemade, cozy. It was a dry rub (which is exactly what I was looking for), with perfect paprika seasoning and not greasy at all. Tons of fries & the burger is THICC. A true North Shore gem indeed!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPmf04xQWU-8pLOB7Dua_QinfT5GGUvQUhnLWzR&fid=0x0:0x9cd2c350c480bbda"],"When":"2024-12-3"},{"Name":"Joaquin Surijon","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXRl_0NnJWTKW0CwMobY87xpQkHv9cGa_klyETq6yYZG_js2HZ1=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I was with a friend and the manager let me stay late to finish my food because I did come a little late, he also let me stay to wait for my friends dad to pick us up.

The food also taste INCREDIBLY good and has the best fries in the world, I'm not even joking.

The atmosphere is also good because it's not messy, and it's comfortable.

Really good and deserves the best reviews possible.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMYJ3wwMi9FMqZtFGF9ykiVxJrwGwjpZDFuP2lg&fid=0x0:0x9cd2c350c480bbda"],"When":"2024-11-23"},{"Name":"amin sharifkhani","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVMTgfDWY5t5B0505ZKtuOzmoiK_kJcbZee_v7o-9xVgyDyuVRTog=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I recently visited Fryingpan Express for Hot Chicken, and unfortunately, the experience left much to be desired. The restaurant is an open space with minimal design, featuring extremely cheap decor and tables that don‚Äôt create a welcoming atmosphere. While it wasn‚Äôt dirty, it also wasn‚Äôt very clean, which added to the overall lackluster ambiance.

For the food, I ordered a mild hotness chicken burger with fries and a Coke. The presentation was very basic‚Äîfries were dumped in a basket with the burger on top, reminiscent of something you might get at a diner. The portion size was disappointing; the burger was quite small, and the fries were nothing special.

The chicken in the burger was thick and juicy, which was a plus, but the flavor left a lot to be desired. The ‚Äúmild‚Äù hotness was overwhelming, and I‚Äôm someone who enjoys spicy food. It seemed like the heat was used to mask the blandness of the chicken. The burger itself was very basic‚Äîjust the chicken and bread, with a tiny portion of coleslaw and a single slice of pickle drowned in condiments.

Even the little things, like the ketchup packets and napkins, screamed cheap. The ketchup was in single-use packets like you‚Äôd find at a fast-food joint, and the napkins were the flimsy type you might see in a gas station restroom.

Overall, Fryingpan Express for Hot Chicken seems to cut corners at every opportunity, which shows in both the service and food quality. I wouldn‚Äôt recommend it unless you‚Äôre in a pinch and have no other options.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPrWnw_UQryGeGd16JMQ64crZ69r8IhOB4fEUxH&fid=0x0:0x9cd2c350c480bbda"],"When":"2024-8-16"},{"Name":"Taylor","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLvTieCyaoAYyvUnI3OUHNKjWCcqK4N_iCIOFS8aC16shbIuw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Friendly staff with quick service.

I had the chicken bits and waffles, the chicken was super crispy with lots of flavor. The waffles were crispy with a fluffy center. I wish more syrup was given with the meal otherwise it was amazing!

My husband ordered the chicken sandwich in fire. Overall the sandwich was good, but the heat level didn‚Äôt match its description. Good flavor, but not a lot of heat.

The lemon ade is so refreshing. I was expecting a fresh squeezed lemonade and it‚Äôs so much more. It is carbonated. I highly recommend. I was not as fond of the orange one.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOYmgHQLmo2KqD8-zZJD-qHaDnOnQ5bqUBybsUS&fid=0x0:0x9cd2c350c480bbda"],"When":"2024-4-29"},{"Name":"Harsimran Singh","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUDa1UNDMjPgv8WXJwYPcX6bLZjELBQG9JAUIMHAF1dX03GPxu_PA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Great place for spicy chicken lovers
Their sandwich and chicken poutine with fries were delicious.
Chicken was juicy, nicely cooked and had a good taste.
The spice level was good as we ordered the hot one.
They serve beer on taps. Nice place to dine in.
Definitely recommend","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPR29BEOemLoqvIoOpVmJ8x7kVWS8jImoNfKo3t&fid=0x0:0x9cd2c350c480bbda"],"When":"2024-5-27"},{"Name":"EMMANUEL OSORIO","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVcR60Obi3Qu_DWCW8RKTw8OcXnjpKX3Z790F8OcvqBRS4aPu2O=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Don‚Äôt waster your time and money ordering bulgogi, beef is hard to bite, and flavour is meh!
On the other hand, chicken is very good, medium would be good for someone who likes spicy food but can‚Äôt really handle spicy food. Hot and Fire, is where the real heat is!
No regrets with chicken!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMVLAsowM_RZqvCVvYlNLLVryiMDk2qTbG_XaoH&fid=0x0:0x9cd2c350c480bbda"],"When":"2024-6-3"},{"Name":"James Kim","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVZRyjsM-pHopHIRypyRiKUToycChueMK4kZIYB7aJBPnVKlY-A=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I came here with my family for lunch, and I tried the Chicken Sandwich (mild), Waffles N Chicken Bites (zero), and the Orange Ade.

Starting out with the drink, it was refreshing, and you could clearly tell the use of fresh oranges from the taste. It tasted like it came straight out of a dessert cafe instead of a chicken restaurant. The sides (potato and sweet potato fries) were salted to the extent where they weren't flavourless, but not too salty, right in the middle. They were very well done.

The burger had excellent portion (I am a heavy eater, and I was very pleased with how filling it was), and the chicken breast was tender and juicy. The burger was a perfect combination of chicken, relish, and the sauce also complimented the flavour well. I would recommend to order either the zero or mild spice level for others who don't necessarily handle spice well like myself. It didn't leave a greasy after taste at all, which is exactly what I seek in a chicken sandwich.

Moreover, the chicken and waffles also offered great portion, and I was particularly impressed by the waffles. They were soft, and the vanilla cream was especially tasty and addicting, effectively balancing out the chicken flavour to go well hand in hand.

In addition, the staff were friendly, enthusiastic, while the interior offered a clean, spacious, and cozy atmosphere that accompanied the dining experience competently. Overall, I had a wonderful time eating here, and I can't wait until I am in the North Vancouver area again to bring my friends here as well. I highly recommend the restaurant to anyone else nearby!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOawMkNCKpMmxw9oFdNBQmtrCPpLL59XNmwy_cj&fid=0x0:0x9cd2c350c480bbda"],"When":"2023-5-10"},{"Name":"francheska villena","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXk8G5xamKHeXLCEmVtQZdx7YAoeeNPRdAwCojoJWSzWGpHRCA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Me and my mother went to Frying Pan and it was one of the best experiences I‚Äôve ever had. Costumer service was really good. Employees and the owner were very friendly and nice. The food was delicious. I liked everything!! The strawberry milkshake tasted amazing. The owner even offered us free dessert :> That too tasted delightful.
This restaurant is one of my top five when it comes to serving chicken. I would recommend getting a drink to refreshen your palette to savour the food even more. Strawberry shake addict here and I‚Äôd say that their shake is bomb!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPOU0YnjYeLoql0Y5--c3Fp6aR4o2FFlFfD5VOC&fid=0x0:0x9cd2c350c480bbda"],"When":"2023-11-16"}]

[{"Name":"Talid Jalbout","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVXaUeHBH7AVJdkjB_vmutMGnZKiS_gwPrWTjeXNr8SoSvPSvNMCQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"There aren't many options for a beer and food that are left in the area with a few recent closures, so I was looking forward to trying this pub. The best thing about it was the food, delicious! But the service was slow! While sitting outside is a nice option, you do get like you're in the middle of the busy traffic. I wish they had some sort of green hedge to cut down on the view and sound. The interior is more on that modern side, it's nice.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNbvDdgnkbGZDlp5ffgWpoMI9tP-vSmAKWdkOeL&fid=0x0:0xcc510ef5babdf252"],"When":"2024-6-14"},{"Name":"Mikael ._.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWbxWviqZgDtp6hMNJaTvNicXMcuJoZBO3UeljKUJOwQg2bg15x=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Guess how much for those 14 wings? $45. For mediocre, over salted and heavy priced wings. Absolutely astonishing that they‚Äôd be able to sell these to customers. On top of that, asking for a tip. Unbelievable, never coming again.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOylx3vrSX3bAY5QX7C0DF4NiTnaluHteLN2hSa&fid=0x0:0xcc510ef5babdf252"],"When":"2024-8-31"},{"Name":"Harsimran Singh","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUDa1UNDMjPgv8WXJwYPcX6bLZjELBQG9JAUIMHAF1dX03GPxu_PA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"The Atmosphere for this place was great and service as well.
About food, we ordered Wings, Nashville Hot Chicken burger and Smashed burger. Only the wings were Okish but expensive rest everything looked good and smelled good but no taste at all.
Yes fries which came with burgers were great üëç
Go here just for casual drinks.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMyIUHibsRmScGvcR5dp43nAv2_wDveukzpNnLv&fid=0x0:0xcc510ef5babdf252"],"When":"2023-11-3"},{"Name":"Shell Scrambles","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI4JztJnv5QSaOLm6kofBnVtcL0xif4ZZjI-s1pwPwr2npL2Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"My partner and I came here for Sunday brunch. They were really nice to accommodate our request to order something(grilled avocado salad) from the non-brunch menu. They have great salads, amazing burgers and we love the staff.  The tacos are great too! The staff are attentive and they never bug us during our meals to ask how our food is.
And they have clean bathrooms too!

**Edit:  Had to change the stellar review as we came back for dinner a few nights later.  I believe they really dropped the ball here.  A few friends joined us for dinner, we moved to a bigger table and they took our order but I'm pretty sure they forgot our food.  We inquired on the food after waiting about 20min, and within minutes, our food came out.  We were disappointed there wasn't any apologies and that they forgot about our order.  The food was still good.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNwZ_G0Lkgd_9cFAMwhZfRZcAGjcgSq8t7LpXLc&fid=0x0:0xcc510ef5babdf252"],"When":"2022-8-30"},{"Name":"Ali Zareei","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUS5oT270-CXm7QId9MduBnllPgDk-gFBxk8Px09cWUWXdLbXoV=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Good Co. Northwoods in North Vancouver is a fantastic spot for a great meal and a good time. The atmosphere is lively and inviting, with a modern, stylish decor that makes you feel right at home. The menu offers a wide variety of delicious dishes. The staff are friendly and attentive, ensuring that your dining experience is top-notch. Whether you're out for a casual meal or a night out with friends, Good Co. Northwoods is a must-visit.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPsx5aRcWa8DZvpWPUDhUnS-hxXF9l7jIMlmh36&fid=0x0:0xcc510ef5babdf252"],"When":"2024-5-21"},{"Name":"Rafael Lopes","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVkDTIl1S-Gddt0ZGUULfA_20DMpDPAwmVLJ4dvkONf7LxsDthEsA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"We had a great time with friends at the place, but the waitress who served us left us waiting for 20 minutes without coming to our table for payment. We went to the bar to ask if someone could assist us, and a server kindly went out of his way to help. Shortly after, the waitress returned and gave the server who helped us a hostile look. We felt so uncomfortable that we don‚Äôt want to return to that place again due to this unpleasant experience with the waitress. This occurred at 10 pm on Friday, August 30, 2024.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"W T","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVaQJv6abeGknGaOko5p5gf6lnqQRb47mzuRcAh_Hh7gelymks3=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Good Co is quite decent, the happy hour was good value. It's more of a speakeasy than a place to watch sports but it has a nice feel and one of only 3 beer spots  in the neighborhood. Give it a shot!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Sarah Grace","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX0P_FT3n0HZdmLMDEJ6UcRFNPyHbE7QJ8GW3gOL-SGGTFh-sFdQw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba8-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Nice room, one large open area and three booth/ lower seating areas around the perimeter. Delicious cocktails and a full bar with rotating beer. Brunch available, dinner, and dessert. Nice natural lighting, patio when it‚Äôs sunny and warm. Food is good, but not made from scratch! Prices are fair. Parking lot in back! Good size portions for sides! Hostess and waitresses were friendly and attentive, along with the food service was quick! Nice outdoor area and bar!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOv3zGHmLy_6Nhb-6tMkLQYOOFVysLfbWM9AVoT&fid=0x0:0xcc510ef5babdf252"],"When":"2020-8-4"}]

[{"Name":"Sunny Yerra","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWwX9GsGvRD4Rmzpnxnt1YRL-Eg5T-wGNmWnsfNs3vgSTgJL4bc9Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Kokomo offers a cozy dining experience with a focused menu. While I initially aimed for their Nashville-style burger, this particular location didn't have it available. Opting instead for the buffalo wrap with soy curls, I was pleasantly surprised. The wrap was a delightful blend of slightly spicy buffalo sauce complemented by a cool white sauce, possibly ranch, creating a heavenly combination. The soy curls served as a satisfying and chewy substitute for chicken. Additionally, I highly recommend trying their chocolate brownie, especially when heated for 5-10 seconds for an extra gooey texture.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN7Obf4CVK4nPH7-HdRPW7rgI0B82QYu7kuA5oI&fid=0x0:0x78eb5f0b1b7b2fac"],"When":"2024-3-1"},{"Name":"asdfxyz","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUwt2ZWdKG273C2kpn4zigA9_GrtHOyHmibUoiZ_mPtRc9wsLc=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I ordered the Green giant smoothie online 30 minutes before closing at the pickup there was a girl working alone in the front. Not sure if she was new or she was in a hurry - the smoothie tasted good but these very hard unbiteable chunks inside that was very distracting and I had to keep spitting it out. I looked at the ingredients list of the menu and I couldn‚Äôt find anything that could be this so I‚Äôm confused.. While writing halfway through the smoothie I also found a piece of hair lol. The acai bowl here was amazing but will not be ordering any smoothies from here.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOPDrO9OBSNcEqT_Hww3MefowLLiuEHcjFyR3Ib&fid=0x0:0x78eb5f0b1b7b2fac"],"When":"2024-9-20"},{"Name":"Lee Van","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUkdc0b5WROtpnJCruJpetIegq6Snt_2bGm0A5pSa9cqY1SCXL5=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"My friend recommended this place for a post hike, late lunch, and I'm so glad that she did. While parking is a bit tricky, I managed to find a 2 hour parking spot 5 minutes away. There are lots of yummy options to choose from. I ordered the koko burger with kettle chips and my friends both got the shawarma bowl. Food was great but my preference would have been fries with my burger. The inside seating area is lovely and they also have seats outside. I highly recommend this place and will be back for sure. I'm keen to try the acai bowl next.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMVoAMoa3D9fUUUePq26qWMgJ38X3gbU1a-Z54o&fid=0x0:0x78eb5f0b1b7b2fac"],"When":"2024-5-19"},{"Name":"Faidra Berda","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL7qj6rx3TeHWUei0UrpZ84ZN1TacjQuzs75wQAYHlcyzCz7w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Yesterday I decided to walk through Edgemont Village at night to enjoy all the small businesses and streets lit up for Christmas. Absolutely stunning at night!

I stopped into Kokomo as it‚Äôs one of my favourite places to take out salads and other healthy meal options. I love their food, but I was absolutely blown away by the customer service I received by Harper who was working yesterday. We chatted for a bit and I was amazed at how knowledgeable she was about Kokomo and what an incredible ambassador she is for their brand. She has only been working there four months, but you‚Äôd think she‚Äôd been there for years. I was even more amazed to find out she was only 17 years old. Harper has a bright future at whatever she decides to do. I offered her a job in my business, so I‚Äôm hoping she‚Äôll take me up on the offer!

My favourite dishes at Kokomo are the Chickpea Curry, Coastal Macro, Beet Poke Macro, Golden Laska Noodles and I love their Power Malt for breakfast. You can also get some items like the Chickpea Curry frozen. I always have a few of these in the freezer, as my husband loves their food too.

Kokomo offers a great product, a relaxing environment, and warm and friendly  service. Harper, you are outstanding at customer service and my job offer stands anytime you‚Äôre interested.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOh-iePTxIzOxRPzgdJOYTb_-x8V7zO9zI4mW8G&fid=0x0:0x78eb5f0b1b7b2fac"],"When":"2023-12-28"},{"Name":"Kevin Shah","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUZeZ_Qfy0NGjKudQd0GIBf3b-6aq2LbpWAmbs5BaH4vCoNC-wE=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"A community vibe that is well designed. Enjoyed a light lunch and a refreshing milkshake. The baked goods weren‚Äôt too sweet - just to our liking.

It was a little break we took before heading to grouse mountain. Simple, easy, quick and tasty.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNIBLyAQV5LjP7Gr3koxWQ0AcyvncT6IPLyX8lm&fid=0x0:0x78eb5f0b1b7b2fac"],"When":"2023-11-24"},{"Name":"Leya E","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUPMEjpXUs-_xzos_qGHvk4l7M7xlbdXo1Tjq0QyJ9PdNqfi1Lr=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Hearty, healthy clean food I feel good about eating. Friendly staff and nice bright space.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOs-1bOgAEiYWANKR8-Vo9e2M5CtTJrgMfY2gUC&fid=0x0:0x78eb5f0b1b7b2fac"],"When":"2024-9-18"},{"Name":"Virginia","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVa3XydPQq_glhUlXkwfatkhEWerdrPxg8tI4QaTCqozHt4m0gw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Their bowls are tasty but not very filling. The menu was can be improved by adding more salad/bowl options. Customer service is great and friendly. The location is prime. The inside of the store is not that spacious for large groups. Their energy bites are so tasty!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMIGsmJaQKI6VZtFzW3gCnTeJ-xEhraUlUUNDs1&fid=0x0:0x78eb5f0b1b7b2fac"],"When":"2023-1-12"},{"Name":"Ryan Lundgren","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIZBC2-rmR55tlMOlwbD6XP7RMtRFIEqNtXbkmIbFhrgps5cw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Amazing food in store, NEVER order online. This restaurant has great vegan food, but absolutely takes advantage of out of store customers. My friend and I spent $34 on a bowl and a wrap with free delivery and they were both half sized, just because we weren't present. Never order online at this establishment, unless they stop cheaping out their customers who order out.","Images":null,"When":""}]
