user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Elham Shahbandy","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU8v0FqiWfwrKZlKpvymmkhzMYhJ-PBGxv_Ot_SbQhp9uNsQ3Yb=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"The best within four dishes which we ordered was egg plant dish. Shashlik was good but because of happy hour, only two pieces served. I have no idea how many pieces comes in a usual dish.
Unexpected and not welcoming service.. while we were dining the server started vacuuming the restaurant!!!! Unbelievably she was fixing her hair while she was cleaning cutlery!!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO0Jn7cdjev5PQXuThj_KArtsupbrtas2k_Qr3p&fid=0x0:0x4944696c782d40"],"When":"2024-9-3"},{"Name":"Ghazal","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWUxPjakfUDfUlOphLX0NHrhY3j03bOfl1WB2qtK88VIEBoxSUc=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Went back to this restaurant after 5 years! The quality of the food is still very good and the portions are just right. We ordered Baghali polo with lamb shank and Chenjeh kabob for mains and both were really good.

The dough comes in a huge cup which is a plus. The Shiraz salad wasn‚Äôt traditional though. The vegetables were chopped too big and it was made with lemon juice instead of grape juice.

The patio is always nice and relaxing.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipML4xUT89SvvZfF8g540iQpPbrQc-9pnvmsUzIB&fid=0x0:0x4944696c782d40"],"When":"2024-7-21"},{"Name":"Ryan Goodrich-Hurlbut","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX5XXtQFA63yhnJknOwudTWTXiRQFfKATpErVaQVSOUauEimK_i=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Came here for an impromptu lunch and had an amazing experience.

Our server Zeynab knew the menu very well and was able to identify which items would have been a problem for my nut allergy.

We started with the mirza ghasemi, and had the loghmeh and lamb shank to eat. Everything was spiced perfectly and came in very large portions.

Lastly, the patio was very pretty, especially considering that the restaurant is in a mall.

Would definitely recommend this place for anyone in the area.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP6fCVNrSR9ciewCbX9GaEY7Gh_2-yuSU0FC_Cj&fid=0x0:0x4944696c782d40"],"When":"2024-6-25"},{"Name":"venus amooei","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLNorwxRDJ6lNJ6Dz8nHMtSXN4-R2AOzJQLlwFtKs2Zt2Ygxw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Food tastes delicious, and the place has a great vibe, and the decor is on point.
The staff is super friendly.
It's perfect for small get-togethers or even formal meetings.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPdlmo6LwCUdAi4sfwE1UFoyqOUqwAb6aIJGz8o&fid=0x0:0x4944696c782d40"],"When":"2024-10-2"},{"Name":"soorena makan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVHFm6t_TcT2T0Pvjwg-kRipat8sfeO6yOeY9AH1Xp_8MSjy7dP=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I recently had the pleasure of dining at KHAGHAN, and it was an exceptional experience from start to finish. The ambiance is warm and inviting, with traditional Persian d√©cor that adds to the authenticity of the experience.

The menu is diverse, offering a variety of classic Persian dishes that are rich in flavor and beautifully presented. I started with the Kashk-e Bademjan, which was perfectly seasoned and a fantastic way to begin the meal. For the main course, I had the Chelo Kabab Koobideh, which was tender, juicy, and seasoned to perfection. The saffron rice and grilled tomatoes were the perfect complement, adding to the richness of the dish.

What truly stood out was the service‚Äîattentive, friendly, and always with a smile. The staff made us feel like family, explaining the dishes in detail and ensuring that our experience was nothing short of perfect.
If you‚Äôre looking for authentic Persian cuisine with excellent service, [Restaurant Name] is the place to be. Highly recommended!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO-vt7f0FPIajjEl3Iq7vgnyrvTTEtdN1RT18wx&fid=0x0:0x4944696c782d40"],"When":"2024-9-30"},{"Name":"Yavar Nanbakhsh","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW81N2WiBda0sPseNqtrthpo6PtCwkZFXNiB4HrEDC9DTFdTcWJ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great first experience! We recently visited from San Diego and had a wonderful experience. The owner was very welcoming upon arrival, and Mohammad did a fantastic job explaining the menu and ensuring we had everything we needed. The food itself was delicious, and the atmosphere was fantastic. We'll definitely visit here couple times before we head back home.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMxRT_Wf1I-f6bigykAKtjwTL3Tn78osHw6yKLo&fid=0x0:0x4944696c782d40"],"When":"2024-5-12"},{"Name":"Jaeyeon Lee","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJt56D-XyBGBMhgvuCWEDwTLAAks9HnGVL67In3FH-5sarydX0=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"It was such a lovely dinner! Zeinab was  a very friendly and professional server. She made our dinner just so much better! Very much appre iated with the service. The food was amazing and flavourful, the seating outside by the waterfall was just peaceful. It was a beautiful dinner. Thank you!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPmiRp73I7ecpPX9sFBH9jRTzVNu_xBJ693NLlh&fid=0x0:0x4944696c782d40"],"When":"2024-5-14"},{"Name":"Nazanin Hosseinpoure Bahoush","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKeJek2scg5DN-BuvpiWa7irHGQGVyWp_IJyluUxZp1fJ6bmys=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Today May 11th, we had reservations at Khaghan.
The food‚Äôs quality was good. But they charge people a lot! As you see the photos they haven‚Äôt done even a good design for a marriage anniversary and they wanted to charge it for $100!
Honestly that was very simple.
The other is entrance fee! When I booked a table on the phone they didn‚Äôt told me that they will charge for that as well! Also they charge service fees as well. All of restaurants have their own servers so why they have to charge for that. Was it a restaurant or self service?! The other thing is why the service should bring the bill before the customer mentioned? That was my first experience there and it‚Äôll be last! So regret to choose this place! Salad shirazi must have some sour flavour but that even didn‚Äôt have salt.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNTz6p6jSrd8h669LHxTnAKqCQqdgeQ5muwPf5F&fid=0x0:0x4944696c782d40"],"When":"2024-5-12"}]

title: Alloz Grill
address: 149 E 3rd St, North Vancouver, BC V7L 1E5
about: [{"id":"service_options","name":"Service options","options":[{"name":"No-contact delivery","enabled":true},{"name":"Delivery","enabled":true},{"name":"Takeout","enabled":true},{"name":"Dine-in","enabled":true}]},{"id":"accessibility","name":"Accessibility","options":[{"name":"Wheelchair-accessible washroom","enabled":true}]},{"id":"offerings","name":"Offerings","options":[{"name":"Coffee","enabled":true},{"name":"Small plates","enabled":true}]},{"id":"dining_options","name":"Dining options","options":[{"name":"Breakfast","enabled":true},{"name":"Brunch","enabled":true},{"name":"Lunch","enabled":true},{"name":"Dinner","enabled":true},{"name":"Dessert","enabled":true}]},{"id":"amenities","name":"Amenities","options":[{"name":"Washroom","enabled":true}]},{"id":"atmosphere","name":"Atmosphere","options":[{"name":"Casual","enabled":true}]},{"id":"payments","name":"Payments","options":[{"name":"Credit cards","enabled":true},{"name":"Debit cards","enabled":true},{"name":"NFC mobile payments","enabled":true}]},{"id":"children","name":"Children","options":[{"name":"Good for kids","enabled":true}]}]
user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Kate Choi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIjE4MSAa0c4Uqc8iOt1LfqIkJDL1ULa2Z17gRh4YDWMExQ1A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Filipino food scene is scarce in the north shore! So nice that there is one for me to try.

The lady serving was super nice. I got the 2 item combo with plain rice for $12.99 which is very cheap. Places in vancouver and burnaby are around $15-16 with the same portions. My husband tried their lechisilog for $17.49.

Beef kaldereta - Would like it more tomato-y. Some pieces of beef were harder and not tender.

Dinakdakan - I'm used to it being more mayo-y and white. The flavor was ok but different than other places.

Lechon - this is what you have to come for! This is the best that I have eaten here in the lower mainland. Often, the skin is too fried that it is hardened. This place is perfect. The meat is so tender too. We even ordered an extra side of it for $14.50

Payment is cash or debit only. I should have paid attention when she was punching in the numbers because I only realized after that she charged me extra $1.50 for garlic rice when I only got plain rice. Total bill was $48.80 instead of $47.23.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPgw1dMQ0DvttzuzcizBI_C-KbQcpmcO-V8lNmS&fid=0x0:0xe17b9bc15a2105e1"],"When":"2024-4-22"},{"Name":"Daphne Tan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUFl0Yhgq4gfIzbp1sVYSvcWKz0h-TptSZZakd1VETzAGGL8sBL=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Finally got a chance to visit this place and food was comforting and delicious. It felt home-cooked and serving size was large! It‚Äôs debit or cash only so be ready for that. Can‚Äôt wait to go back to try other dishes!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMbN-bqwsFGr-sNpJ562rAX4YENkwey3YrnRveM&fid=0x0:0xe17b9bc15a2105e1"],"When":"2024-4-23"},{"Name":"Ahmed Shaaban","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJWAh7WyO5IvMmmyNdPrFTOQN3AlHAKZuDGnXq54MJ7wQ7olw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Alloz Grill may just be the single best place to get brunch in Vancouver. The place is run by a very wholesome filipino couple that clearly knows how to do things right. For just $16, you can get 2 eggs, a crazy amount of garlic fried rice, and perhaps the crispiest, juiciest pork belly (lechon) you‚Äôll ever eat! My girlfriend got the beef tapa, which was just as much food and somehow even more flavourful!

It‚Äôs a 45 min drive from my place on a busy day, but still, I might just be coming back every weekend for this. The photos speak for themselves. Highly recommend, easy 5/5.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMXNPoLjkK3ETn0Lv3hjB7t2vc_R7Oaoi9xGxvE&fid=0x0:0xe17b9bc15a2105e1"],"When":"2024-4-7"},{"Name":"Mike Apps","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXK4NTUWFZLhkFLxM81d4_8GBlkbBee1-es0ki-eSv9K8nXP5VU=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Fantastic Filipino food, really nice staff. Would very much recommend! Make sure you bring cash or have a Canadian debit card since they don't take credit.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"A","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUomFsXvYjG0EIxaT73OXulCIDZKU3_pKPaDhbaPIHNOgRf0sc=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I've never had Filipino food so I cannot say if it's authentic. But I heard 2 people order in Tagalog so that was a good sign.

Lechon with garlic rice: really yummy, stayed crispy until many hours later. We got more garlic rice to go because it was that good, probably my favourite from everything we got

Adobo chicken and pork: good flavour, tastes like there's a lot of ingredients

Pork and tomato stew: This was good too

Plain rice: I mean I guess it's good too

We also got the pork blood stew to go because they said it was their favourite! Have not eaten it yet but I'm sure it tastes good.

Next time I will try the laing!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMz3VU0LrWCCrpHNRJccVguUhjRs43UKeO9FFNq&fid=0x0:0xe17b9bc15a2105e1"],"When":"2021-11-15"},{"Name":"Carol Jane","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLljmBtFdVeKtgNkBXqnXE2AmhITeRnkRt2DZQrqdJCd5B5Upc=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We love the GRILLED SQUID STUFFED SISIG, LITSON BELLY and ROTISSERIE CHICKEN from Alloz Grill. The food was great, freshly cooked, tasty and well presented. Price is reasonable. The restaurant has clean and pleasant ambiance, will definitely come back again and will recommend to anyone! They also serve turo-turo and party trays, perfect for upcoming holidays and gatherings.
#filipinofood","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP0wqvLLDzlehGipG4sSgQea1rXNfWz3QzhgKEM&fid=0x0:0xe17b9bc15a2105e1"],"When":"2019-10-4"},{"Name":"toffy concepcion","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVYhf6f6Tr-b7ekbkXxFz9ueDreb1BCkopv3RQXbcpm54DeMfYl5g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The chef Alvin used to be the chef of truffle house in Dundarave so he has a fusion take on Filipino cuisine. He maintained the assortment of Filipino pre-cooked food which are favorites of the local Filipino community. A bit of caution, these dishes may not appeal to non-Filipinos. Laing (taro leaves cooked in coconut milk), dinuguan (pork blood and innards stew), pinakbet (Filipino vegetables come with shrimp paste), grilled fish among many others. More appealing to non Filipinos are grilled pork belly, grilled squid stuffed with pork. He also has a fusion benny  breakfast assortment on weekends. Roast chicken basted in soy, lemon and lemon grass or in lemon garlic are very popular. They also have a Filipino ice dessert called halo-halo made from sugar preserved fruits and beans in shaved ice, milk and ice cream. I came back for the Belly good Benny, grilled pork belly on a ham Benny with soft boiled egg and hollandaise sauce and it was great unfortunately only available on weekends.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNJtNbzAV2WX6gu-u-_cxvjJLPNKQgLOkNRVIC8&fid=0x0:0xe17b9bc15a2105e1"],"When":"2019-5-10"},{"Name":"Malcolm Richards","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVoA6ptH2bLi8v3vz-sXeK7Le4D5DsjvNpPGsR69mjao6_LoA9Z=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great portions, reasonably priced, really good food. I ordered the barbecue platter for a get together and my guests loved it. Their breakfast meals are also fantastic","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Kelly Hrelja","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUVWh8qmVdPEfqahFaQ6ox93SOukCBaQIQqwS9jEApuOOnHfC4ZzQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Super cute brewery! I really enjoyed all of their sours - some were quite tart but still fruity and delicious! The burrito bowls were also tasty. Would definitely go back for more!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNlNA_-Ws3Uza143lEef-qQv4DmrXH68SXZq6ep&fid=0x0:0xf3aeb2269697e898"],"When":"2024-10-26"},{"Name":"Saul George","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ8jz4Qn_4S6XSEPIldz0kEElylnamanCf2J6bY64D2Nm9WTQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Cute little brewery with a wide range of taps. Huge fan of their classic salted lime lager, and would definitely recommend the cafe cold brew lager for a new experience.
We also grabbed one of each taco, most of which were fantastic! Some interesting options like a jackfruit taco, as well as all the classics.
It gets quite busy on the weekends, but it wasn't too long of a wait if you're willing to brave chilly North Van!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNsqHJ0Gpr6QPkwRbmOGnyQh_1jVv2oXszdWdwW&fid=0x0:0xf3aeb2269697e898"],"When":"2024-11-19"},{"Name":"Kanako Sakurada","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKYybgPjG_d3LYq66Ui47Ocd_2PMrfkKaju5V_L0IyVTR19lQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Cute little brewery in NS brewery district!
Charming Greek style tile decor and casual Mexican foods such as tacos, nachos, and quesadillas.
Their beer is great (5 stars), very easy to drink. My favorite is Paloma grapefruit lager but others including stout, ipa, and sour are all pretty good. Foods were ok (3 stars) and reasonably priced.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNJYABbiykpqVoMnDmu4ilhHev64OFjRgiHKVh9&fid=0x0:0xf3aeb2269697e898"],"When":"2024-4-23"},{"Name":"Gaye Gibson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJkd-8-39Y7Ze2zneOhZUjswZZdlIsvc_dBeY5dyHwqVNHy=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"I went to La Cerveceria for the first time tonight. The salted lime lager was really good, nice and refreshing. I shared a burrito with my friend and it was good. The nachos however, were awful! They used liquid cheese (Velveeta?) instead of real cheese and it was so disappointing. Instead of being crunchy, the chips were limp from the cheese. I would not recommend the nachos at all, but the beer was good.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMXQOMsv4McsnwXYakgvNcb1DC1umP1jXM9VRc&fid=0x0:0xf3aeb2269697e898"],"When":"2024-6-20"},{"Name":"Ash","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWqRwI_N5-jlH21SdZ5KzhdsDV_6bnCmnnvRAc7A0vTSwLG2a0=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I love their beer especially the salted lime larger. The food was tasty. I tried the jackfruit taco. It was good. It's my first time trying a jackfruit taco in Vancouver so I was happy with the overall taste. The beef burrito was tasty too. The staff is friendly. I liked the atmosphere. Highly recommend üëå","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPTgm4pOpIS7EKsOTaFA9zrOkeOaiGAh0UGwFxc&fid=0x0:0xf3aeb2269697e898"],"When":"2024-4-23"},{"Name":"sharon ghirra","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVPvROyUaJgsxMl-PUsuzPJtPb7HdAgT8ROIN1ej-TzcbU8RK9GNQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Went for the highly raved salted lime beer. It was good but not as hyped as I had read other reviews about. The staff were really sweet and the food was a sizable portion to have while drinking","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMk_aY6LcOb4UBSC_WYA4RkRgnlDMDT1PqHsuOk&fid=0x0:0xf3aeb2269697e898"],"When":"2024-8-26"},{"Name":"Victor Duarte","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU45NbOuvQypPhF0qF7M9tZX1zgmLDqGB5jBfn441RLXeQyXBWi=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Beer is great! One of my favorite breweries their salted lime lager and grapefruit lager are a cant miss. Their food is kind of mid tho and could definitely improve but is good enough while drinking","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPFT4WlwI0zft5VcdwoMygXcuVZtP-MtVgZR-29&fid=0x0:0xf3aeb2269697e898"],"When":"2024-3-26"},{"Name":"J M","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIrCYdAMWhFRMQrSlIuWU1NLDwQKlJVjzAIT4Ccn-c59_I1bQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Staff was good, friendly enough. Beer is pretty mid, none of the 6 we tried were bad, but none were worth returning for either. We ordered nachos and I mean‚Ä¶.yikes. Movie theatre level. So if ‚Äújust fine‚Äù is your thing, then you‚Äôve found your spot.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMkkilfjYZcmcnQmOf-iG-owTzLRimmdzJFVf9K&fid=0x0:0xf3aeb2269697e898"],"When":"2024-6-22"}]

user_reviews: [{"Name":"Sergey Vor","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWDI4NOfhPVAE3-fqrARMrlxN8iJAfNfLVWB_eosHKvPlzOQh6M=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We were super hungry after an 20km walk from around Stanley park and stopped here for meat on our way home. Wow, what a delicious roast beef it was and very well prices! Lloyd was super friendly and efficient, we got our food very quickly and enjoyed it in the common dining area by a large window which was perfect for a rainy day. On our way back Lloyd told us to come back for their specials on Tuesday and Friday which we would definitely do. Highly recommend!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNmOzXg2MFtqNFt0bF3ZdBZ3lS0_sHIRMPGiM1O\u0026fid=0x0:0x7e213415c56b3382"],"When":"2024-9-23"},{"Name":"Anna Xu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWlGMHoRuVkqtdfldW-aOAK5IiCbdzBGVFxNL0vXj7x8Y1m-Yo=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We LOVE their roast beef and perogies!! The roast beef and perogies were absolutely delicious‚Äîsome of the best we've ever had.\nThe staff, especially Loyd, was so friendly and welcoming. Highly recommend this place for great food and wonderful serviceü•∞","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNB-o71xnA9eGDW5ysM_XwiINzEaRwa8vVQUeN3\u0026fid=0x0:0x7e213415c56b3382"],"When":"2024-10-19"},{"Name":"Mel Reyes","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXItE3paY-FL0Hh9KrSxbZb5wPJgYlr9BreCnplkPcrc_KaeHjF=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Sharkys was AMAZING! Portions are great for the price and the quality of everything was great! Very worth it! The food was DELICIOUS and I would love to come back again. Staff was also incredible! Thank you Lloyd and team for being kind and friendly!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNcuPT50gW3LI1XeTA7T-L4ds5yiZnVe-VEkRNI\u0026fid=0x0:0x7e213415c56b3382"],"When":"2024-10-23"},{"Name":"suyash marwah","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWl12iSDWBaA16mXAR47zjT5tmWNp5GuXlk9_OjUS6zTmdx0nI=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Last two times I have taken the regular meal combo, the meat has been extremely chewy and bad. I used to love sharkys for it it‚Äôs beef roast and sweet and chilli chicken but lately I can‚Äôt even eat it. I spent 16 dollars for nothing as I had to throw most of the meat away cause it was inedible. Extremely dissatisfied and disappointed.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNaoQxKVN5UIWgeTPROwNwz_JXTiyViAw57x3E\u0026fid=0x0:0x7e213415c56b3382"],"When":"2024-7-2"},{"Name":"Lester Lorenz Bahillo","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJGY4JxjxdF9vnMO98Lo4rdF8fI9i6gEkt0LK7kp-CwyTecgg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The food was phoenamenal and suprisingly fresh, but what really caught my attention was the exemplary service that Lloyd has shown me and my wife that made our experience more enjoyable and pleasant. Will definitely comeback hoping to taste more of the food and to feel the great customer service of Lloyd.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"E L","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXRfCnD4glp2Y7fnMf_T3o2dqT9zEVUnsnfPC7bkTaEjp0P3tr4=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We got the ham with smash potatoes and pierogis. Their gravy is amazing and the pierogis had sour cream and green onions! Really appreciated the two workers there today and loved the service and knowledge of the staff! I‚Äôm going to tell friends about this place so keep up the solid work.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOSEdP4Ap_oOSB-qu9ocv2i4BUayvL86blUjg6O\u0026fid=0x0:0x7e213415c56b3382"],"When":"2024-4-14"},{"Name":"Daniel","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJpNyvrxCSIFzaWXsvbh60FJcbwdzgmNlwUQG23SnZxq6dIQWI=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Really good and friendly service. That was the first thing that stood out to me. Staff explained how everything was cooked and how the macros were for each food item. Then they gave us a discount on buying the Pork Hock and also provided us a free sampler meatball. Apart from the service the food tastes amazing, with large portions. I recommend their perogies and mash potatoes, and for the meats, any single one of them is sublime. Also a good place to purchase raw meat.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"anastasia ignatova","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJXWhpxSfEunYvWWZ15uIaz4QcVM3a_jHd_dyqGB9rfg7Hbug=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Delicious food and great service! Highly recommend if you‚Äôre in the area and looking for a good quality bite. I‚Äôll definitely be back! Thanks Lloyd!","Images":null,"When":""}]

title: Orto Artisan Pasta
address: 1600 Mackay Rd, North Vancouver, BC V7P 2M4
descriptions: Homey, family-operated restaurant offering handmade pasta, Italian-style fare & a seasonal garden.

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Jennifer Thornton","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXxGkwZGNAlwKbi0bc9qqTJZsWoyAsXFmtNcwgpfNCHexwdoC9z=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This was a great experience. Our friends have told us about this place for a couple of months, describing the venue, the quality of the food and the beautiful garden atmosphere. We finally found a time to visit and we were not disappointed. Unfortunately, it wasn‚Äôt a nice summer night so we had to sit inside but it was still awesome. Eclectic, fresh, great atmosphere and our server was funny, witty and engaging. I wish I‚Äôd asked her name but I will next time I go back, which is a guarantee!! The food was excellent! Rich, fresh‚Ä¶.you could tell there was thought put into each dish & the process. I felt like I had stumbled across an incredible little restaurant in a small Italian village. To find a gem like this in North Van is amazing. I‚Äôll be back again and again. Top picks: calamari, Caesar salad, squid ink seafood pasta, gnocchi & tiramisu. Not to mention how reasonable the prices are. Four of us had appetizers, 4 mains and two desserts, including a bottle of wine and our bill was $150 per couple, including tip.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN8Q9M2hQoB7YtK0Syc431RKkikMinO5a0d5-dy&fid=0x0:0xf6e8aa51f45b12b4"],"When":"2024-9-12"},{"Name":"Jo-Anne Lodermeier","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLtPOeJ4LCMgl6Pb7aa1JrjQcuslbDpk7fgJTybJImHlEhldg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Orto is a delightful restaurant that truly deserves its five-star reputation. From the moment we walked in, we were greeted with a warm and inviting atmosphere. The decor is modern yet cozy, making it an ideal spot for both intimate dinners and casual gatherings. We arrived during the opening hours, which allowed us to enjoy the space without the hustle and bustle that often comes later in the evening.

The service at Orto was exceptional. Our server was attentive without being intrusive, providing us with insightful recommendations that showcased the restaurant‚Äôs commitment to quality. Each dish we ordered was a masterpiece, reflecting the chef's dedication to using fresh, local ingredients. The presentation was stunning, and every bite was a celebration of flavor.

One standout dish was the bolognese which was perfectly cooked, with just the right amount of seasoning. The accompanying Ceasar salad was vibrant and added a delightful crunch. Another highlight was the grilled calamari, which was tender and infused with a beautiful flavor that complemented the dish beautifully. Each plate was thoughtfully crafted, demonstrating not only culinary skill but also a passion for the art of cooking.

The location of Orto is another significant advantage. Nestled in a charming area, it‚Äôs easily accessible yet feels like a hidden gem. While parking can be a bit challenging, it‚Äôs worth the effort to experience the culinary delights that await inside. The ambiance is relaxed, making it a great place to unwind and enjoy a meal without feeling rushed.

While dining, it was noticeable that the clientele shared a similar background, creating a unique community feel within the restaurant. This added to the overall experience, as it fostered a sense of connection among the guests. However, the atmosphere remained inclusive and welcoming to everyone.

Overall, Orto is a restaurant that excels in every aspect. The combination of outstanding dishes, impeccable service, and a pleasant environment makes it a must-visit. Whether you‚Äôre a local or just passing through, this restaurant is sure to leave a lasting impression. I highly recommend making a reservation, as it‚Äôs bound to become a popular spot once word gets out about its incredible offerings.

In conclusion, if you‚Äôre looking for a dining experience that combines exquisite food with exceptional service, Orto is the place to be. From the moment you step through the door until the last bite of dessert, you are treated to a culinary journey that is both memorable and satisfying. We left with full bellies and happy hearts, eager to return and explore more of what this fantastic restaurant has to offer.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOA6PIKcNZatAactDc_-8GlAWxxiKhzDO2ZZ9cq&fid=0x0:0xf6e8aa51f45b12b4"],"When":"2024-10-27"},{"Name":"Jordan Steinberg","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXnvXZLxwwpYfgue59KTCiZiY4cXmCjOYXG6LTHpjW9QFbBIQ9N=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"What a lovely place. All local ingredients and freshly made food. Service was perfect and quick. Definitely want to make a reservation but absolutely worth it. Went for our anniversary and had a wonderful time.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPB-H07jNs_5M4CXdKbFm7uPpwSYjUKhoilUVzH&fid=0x0:0xf6e8aa51f45b12b4"],"When":"2024-8-11"},{"Name":"A Sabbagh","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUUL-2va_MHC5Mgh04vuVhmt6hFnG9YfVPuqkR-OMbWb_bkNoxXuQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We weren‚Äôt aware that pre-booking was required, however, we were warmly welcomed by the owner, Brigitte. Thank you, Brigitte, for your hospitality!

The restaurant has a cozy indoor seating and a beautiful garden-style outdoor patio, which is simply amazing. While there was a small hiccup with our order, the overall charm of the place, the delicious food, and the friendliness of the owner and the staff, more than made up for it.

A lovely restaurant with fantastic food and great staff. Highly recommended!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMRN8aChnWAgQXkOpqRWowmbMbiazs50Hb5AUOP&fid=0x0:0xf6e8aa51f45b12b4"],"When":"2024-7-7"},{"Name":"Chi Nguyen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIG_YAsoeyvRTVt3BDDgEIzENhMLFfB2DKDNLYoaUdvWjrxnA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Very cute place with a great atmosphere. The staff were super friendly and service was quick. Came for dinner and we ordered the duck leg special and the mushroom Alfredo pasta, with a glass of prosecco. Both were delicious and will definitely be back to try other items.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMgowY8lQcuxzcKpmb8FCooeo76wZmZPEquBcaQ&fid=0x0:0xf6e8aa51f45b12b4"],"When":"2024-8-5"},{"Name":"E J","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUrvh4CbdP6FQQxMyj7Ing9kTE03rzh86JIpgFN_ZRhysfntmzi=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Lovey restaurant, the patio is beautiful, especially in the summertime full of greenery.

The appetizers were so good and filling that we barely had room for the mains.

The pasta was so fresh that every bite was a power bomb.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOptmAd_cFZhN8iGvciPRrdknF2eXephhw7mwN8&fid=0x0:0xf6e8aa51f45b12b4"],"When":"2024-9-7"},{"Name":"Joanna","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVrXb95qfbQUY_ky2rvPrKOi7C4CghRsA9FJ40UdGCwTvoer-e0=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"A favourite for authentic pasta on the north shore. Pasta is always fresh and small menu means the items have been perfected. Love sitting in their garden during summer months.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNQJijdk9ggPNCeUrqYVK8vXzD4vLaXwPlaPYA2&fid=0x0:0xf6e8aa51f45b12b4"],"When":"2024-11-12"},{"Name":"Olivier Vincent","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKqGJlsJmAYfUvOb1AXweeUPU9mtP_hSSeFlGe_yyGyu8u1VA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Another great meal at Orto. After dining there several times, we tested lunch and were equally happy.
The pasta dishes really feel like high quality cuisine and refinement, in a casual setting.
And a very friendly and professional service!
I am recommend this place to all my friends.","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"San Wayne","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWjFb2dB41O9n_VFwgfqlyajgDnGhNggu7YKnObZ04VikDc3OZS=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We see many dishes empty but we need to wait for 15mins. And the receptionist is not allowed us to wait inside even outside is raining and nobody is waiting inside. A bit disappointed on this without any consideration. We have no umbrella and wait outside. Besides this, I appreciate the waiter serving us very good with smile and love. The food is also good. Hope to consider more the customer instead of robust thinking.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOx9qMyPxPr7sRqrrqEL_HLwnlo9NiEri7h-cEX&fid=0x0:0x2e718799528755b8"],"When":"2024-8-26"},{"Name":"Angela Cruikshank","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWQfp5et78JyhQ7mCDPsK3BFFhFDsPsNTC8zygD-TpS9GJBKdG9iw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"What a lovely breakfast spot!!! I had no knowledge of this chain and I will be back for sure.
I love a basic breakfast and theirs was wonderful.  I showed up before 9 and got to take advantage of their early morning breakfast special‚Ä¶$12.
Nice touch was extra bit of butter.  And as I rarely finish a whole breakfast was grateful for only one piece of delicious sourdough toast. Decor is so cute.  Bathrooms for ‚ÄúEveryone‚Äù.  Coffee mug is huge!
Super close to Lion‚Äôs Gate Hospital.
Really truly I have nothing bad to say. üëèüèª","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipML9ZeSoNsKbtKS3axHa21xGKZ9bXj4hY82s5Kt&fid=0x0:0x2e718799528755b8"],"When":"2024-7-2"},{"Name":"Kelly Argue","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVHguvt2mUYK3ZLLT7t42H3YMBdzPp4wF0FbC-_ZBGyrnECZG3faw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I got to go, and within 30 minutes of closing so I'm taking that into consideration.
I have never been to this franchise before but I was pleasantly surprised by the very large and varied menu. They apparently have some really good breakfast poutine, lots of different egg dishes but I went with the banana cream pie french toast and it was quite good üëç It wasn't super hot, which again I was coming in very close to closing so I'm taking that into consideration. The display was beautiful but it didn't have a super strong taste for being banana. There was a lot of whipped cream.
I was most impressed with my greeting as I walked through the door, the host or manager that welcomed me was super friendly, I gave me a lot of different recommendations on the menu as I'm a vegetarian, took my payment and assured me that my food would be ready within 10 minutes so I could get to my next business appointment.

I would like to try it again not so close to closing and be able to sit down.

All in all very happy with my service and food.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO_2zlkmoQA4VMVgyNzUUQNZwC3gc_dG7zwgf-5&fid=0x0:0x2e718799528755b8"],"When":"2024-9-16"},{"Name":"Brittany","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJs_km6RslliP6cTTiQcv7eI3BYv9_LkkJf-8xS0POhDRp70O4=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Highly suggest putting your name on the wait list before heading to this place!  Quite busy. Very filling and very tasty dishes. Fantastic breakfast/brunch restro, all their locations have been consistent with good service and well made food.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNhluvZZ3BE-urOvIbWRXPL4K2u6aNcYlGYlog6&fid=0x0:0x2e718799528755b8"],"When":"2024-8-6"},{"Name":"Chloe Rachel","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWgExGuK1W-XgQc1tPnrQlqQkWxCTaNhdz977uVTTY3zjpsAzs-=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"First time dining at this OEB! Very busy during lunch hour, so we were sat at a high table with bar seats. Love the decorative interior with high ceilings, wall art and various seating options. Our server was attentive and friendly. No problems with sharing an entr√©e (Truffled Squash Benny) between two people as a lighter lunch! We really liked the use of a croissant as opposed to the regular English muffin for the base of the benny. It was nice and flakey, and the squash was braised well. Would return!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP2TC_Ofia4pZnH7_KEQnwE1xDfSoJ8cOsPGwBD&fid=0x0:0x2e718799528755b8"],"When":"2024-6-30"},{"Name":"JJ","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVUHVlV6bJsWbJvCsygRpLBGWRv5c7O7lOsekjNsIqfLzjiZQSTRg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Perfect brunch spot on the way from the mountain. Parking along both side of the street was very easy.

We arrive around 1pm so not too crowded during that time. Opted for outdoor patio seating to enjoy the sun. Also indoor music was a bit loud.

Our server was very courteous, she offered to go over the entire menu since it was our first time at OEB.
Classic breakfast didn't wow with the plate, but taste good.
Farmer's john delight with the omelets is very good with fruit on the side.
Soul in a bowl poutine is a must-try or you may try other combination of the poutine. Perfect seasoned potatos with chunks of bacons, cheese & eggs on top + hollandaise sauce. Mouth watering good.

Total bill came to about $60 plus tips for 2 people, good price considering the quality/portion of food.
Will be trying out other locations when in the area.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM-_GQN9uNGU8LhAYVyk_WkwUgaUpo-qNkASdvs&fid=0x0:0x2e718799528755b8"],"When":"2024-8-6"},{"Name":"YJ K","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUBPuQFnODlS32_YTAMV0B-4x5XKOmAKQ998gbZqE5DPsuartXYjA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"It's lovely to have a good breakfast within half an hour of waiting on weekends. You can even put your name on a waitlist using Yelp- how exciting!

I always love savouring the blueberry bangers. Added crunch waffles this time. Yum yum~~

New menu Wake'n Bacon- love at first bite!! üòç Maple glazed bacon lardons complement the sweet but savoury salted caramel bread pudding. Strawberries add freshness and colours, and sliced almonds add some crunch to the dish. Just unforgettable!

It is my personal wish that many other restaurants, too, will wow their customers by introducing new menus from time to time. I left OEB North Vancouver dreaming of returning and having one more bite of Wake'n Bacon üòã","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM-P9SXUXi2KgEh_VZOTJhbdykaWldzCHHd_xfs&fid=0x0:0x2e718799528755b8"],"When":"2024-11-28"},{"Name":"AdrianLee263","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXXAhMYzY2_PZAqB1pKWjI7kxSq9mPV0Ra40Vu_zkWmXxnpaX4kiQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Nice place for breakfast, expect line up but its worth to wait.
Quick service, and friendly server, plus yummy breakfast !
Definitely will coming back here again!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMDwalXaqrigTitfEsr3RKJBly8CECGZVzmN2SZ&fid=0x0:0x2e718799528755b8"],"When":"2024-9-21"}]

[{"Name":"Roja Andii","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWiU2kkNRvcx2AWGX87jP0xQL3-D5Ecc9G7UykBg_ttiiyd2UEW=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We enjoyed our meal; the quality was excellent, and the service was pleasant. The atmosphere was nice, but we would have preferred more of an authentic Korean experience regarding the atmosphere.

Generally, we‚Äôll go back there again.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNa7oPKxl1nQ0uBwiAlI_M9U_TfGuiKehKwurJs&fid=0x0:0xea2e4bf47d5189f6"],"When":"2024-9-6"},{"Name":"Hanan Arab","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJcfw3vWTebVqbghiiqOsFiI9mSwHxeibdNavhwakZ-sy2IPQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great food. Very friendly staff. And excellent service.

FYI, though, the MENU HAS BEEN UPDATED.  So, lots of the pictures on here are no longer available.  I have attached photos of the current menu.

We ordered the bibimbap and the soy garlic chicken. Both were absolutely delicious!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMoq64q2nYKImYuEHgK8XBrG5IRvgM_0z2uSnTF&fid=0x0:0xea2e4bf47d5189f6"],"When":"2024-7-7"},{"Name":"Aila Sin","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL8MgZXJGh2Udq48mzaMNH8FqwzoLdEJITvzQVTvQsse2QChQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Absolutely disgusting. ü§¢

I ordered the tuna kimchi jiggae. It was so stinky, smelt like rotten fish. The soup itself was SO SALTY!! My lips were stinging a few minutes after I began eating from the ridiculous amount of salt. I paid a whopping 18$ for a bowl of stinky, fishy, salty dirty dishwater.

I don‚Äôt know who the cooks or owners of this restaurant are, but if the owners and cooks are Korean, I have a question for you guys:

Do you have any pride in being South Korean? Do you have any pride in your culture‚Äôs cuisine? If you do, why are you fooling customers and serving such rotten, MSG laden, salty food? And calling it ‚ÄúKorean food‚Äù?

I lived in Seoul so I know how incredible real Korean food tastes. Please don‚Äôt go to this restaurant - it‚Äôs garbage food.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOCRqpKAd6H90EeLisJI6DFhNzoUYxl-qOol1Lx&fid=0x0:0xea2e4bf47d5189f6"],"When":"2024-10-26"},{"Name":"Tommy Byun","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXQhlW94B8T2fhww-HWh0iFh-RYIvFitfF4mjJX2E5t_heAv3Lb=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"UPDATE OCT 2024:

The menu completed changed since I visited last year, so I was a bit disappointed for not being able to get the dish I liked, so me and my 3 other friends ordered fried chicken, ÎπÑÎπîÎÉâÎ©¥, ÎöùÎ∂à & ÎèºÏßÄÍ≥†Í∏∞ ÍπÄÏπòÏ∞åÍ∞ú.

fried chicken & ÎöùÎ∂à was alright, but ÍπÄÏπòÏ∞åÍ∞ú was subpar, and ÎπÑÎπîÎÉâÎ©¥ was shockingly bad. No taste at all on the noodles, and only thing you could taste is the spicy flavour. I am a believer of no-food waste and I usually dont leave any leftovers, but the ÎÉâÎ©¥ was so bad that I couldn't finish it. It was the worst one I had in my life pretty much.

I have told the server after paying for everything, that the ÎÉâÎ©¥ needs to improve to be able to sell. Hope it gets better in the future, and I will give one more try ordering other dishes, and I really hope they are good, because this used to be my favourite restaurant before the menu change.

Question to the restaurant: did the chef change along with the menu?

2022 REVIEW:

A great place for a Korean dinner over a wide selection of drinks on Lonsdale.

Could feel a bit pricey, but the food definitely makes up for it. Some menus are not as common as the ones you see at a typical Korean restaurant, and it was exciting to see a few creative dishes. The staff was friendly, and they had variety of dishes for us to use for different type of food we ordered.

If you order the spicy stir fried squid, make sure to ask for the fried rice with a remainder sauce!

Strongly recommended!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNGo3viVwmw0xk5vczAEReiowcGfUHcALxDz-df&fid=0x0:0xea2e4bf47d5189f6"],"When":"2022-8-13"},{"Name":"Ian Bedford","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU_F6Ox9wo8tsLpIOSDDynb4iMk7zpEHee-hkr48D4FH1TjGO0=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Wife and I came to try Bukchon and will definitely return. Service was excellent from our first male server and then from Amy - genuinely nice people. The bulgogi gimbap and ramen deal is great - lots of food and excellent value, not to mention it was delicious. Impressed. Mango Mochis for dessert were the perfect end to the meal.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO5dnnBVShLOlJqE4hcMQqgsKgIncFkHTSK266V&fid=0x0:0xea2e4bf47d5189f6"],"When":"2024-8-10"},{"Name":"Cynthia Yeung","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKIgJLEixmBFSpcdPUrxPS8B5Ns_vUpaafkJvloW58On3Jj=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Came here for dinner and was surprised the menu changed. It wasn't what I was expecting from their google review images so that was slightly disappointing. It's more like a Korean snack bar.

I would say their tteokbokki is a must try! It comes with tempura and is quite filling to share between two people. Servers were friendly!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNkz9Q8-1pSBgTfQ0wjV5HL8NX-Jlee7jInoCE&fid=0x0:0xea2e4bf47d5189f6"],"When":"2024-5-25"},{"Name":"John S. Mai","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWY2Ep7ch7V2UQQStkfKRCyZc0k9VeqhcTlPhj83vVQx0-nqsPqiQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Did not know what to eat in a Friday evening. Did a Google search for Korean food and this place stood out. Was not sure what to expect. When we got in all the servers are very friendly and kind. ordered the traditional dishes in a Korean restaurant and they were so good. Very authentic , possibly the best seafood pancake i ever had! Very good bibimbap. Food is a bit spicy so you should be aware of that but I do love my spice. Spicy seafood udon was fire. They have some craft beer on tap but next time I should get some Soju! If you like Korean food this place is one of the best in the north shore! Seafood dishes are awesome!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOqApgvrHYOGJaiQGg3SJ46KBOimqBRaa3eYbuv&fid=0x0:0xea2e4bf47d5189f6"],"When":"2023-11-26"},{"Name":"Kit Ming Lam","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI8lmjJfMTJ6-SyIQcpPEDYnmiAgSjEoxKymqZr8_LxCwPokw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Fried chicken is very good.  Juicy and crispy.  Soft tofu is good, too","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPEJHhtHgSSOmBgnss0GTaYYzXLhqRKGNYNMdhE&fid=0x0:0xea2e4bf47d5189f6"],"When":"2024-8-10"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Catherine James-Davies","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ1l9CWJB95-za20TRElqoXVF9pbwXCNVYh6OZ0kDWkNx9SDA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We had yet another wonderful meal and experience at The J√§gerhof last night. We have been many times over the years, as usual, we were warmly greeted and had exceptional service throughout the evening. We chose the Alpine Charcuterie plate and a special feature onion tartlet as appetizers,  the Expo Schnitzel and Rouladen for main courses and treated ourselves to dessert of Vienna Apfelstreudel and Cr√®me Br√ªl√©e, all were beautifully presented and so delicious. The restaurant was full and very fun! The owners Christopher and Kassandra have done a great job running a unique, family owned restaurant that offers quality food with a charming atmosphere.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNUivrhSVVSbG5RgZ9-V_RdiS9qJv-CVhSH0YDO&fid=0x0:0x653aba0057cf290a"],"When":"2024-10-12"},{"Name":"Aila Sin","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL8MgZXJGh2Udq48mzaMNH8FqwzoLdEJITvzQVTvQsse2QChQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I'm flabbergasted that this place is currently averaging '4.7' stars as the average rating. I think '2.5' stars would be extremely generous. My parter and I were deceived by the rating and decided to give this place a shot.

This has to be, hands down, the most sorry excuse for food in general (forget German food) I have ever seen or eaten in my life.

The soup of the day was a stodgy, sour, gluey mess that looked like something you'd get served if you were a prisoner of war. The "stone ground freshly made bread basket" was a couple of dry pieces of brown toast that looked it was from No Frills.

The Swiss rosti was DRENCHED in oil. I'm not being hyperbolic, but there was oil oozing out of the pancake when I pressed into it with my fork, and a thick layer of oil swimming on the plate when I lifted the rosti to look underneath. The lettuce on top of the rosti was wilted, grey, wet, and cold. My partner ordered Schnitzel - it tasted like frozen food, extremely bland with cold sides.

Service was mediocre, aside from bringing us our plates of food from the kitchen with a smile, there wasn't much else by way of "hospitality". The tablecloth and glasses were visibly stained and dirty. The ambiance was kitschy, gloomy, and stuffy.

99.9% of the clientele here on the night we visited were MUCH older folk. I'm not sure if that's the reason for the high rating - really old people with barely any teeth left or working tastebuds probably love the stodgy and bland bits fried glue the restaurant is marketing as "German food".

Not surprised this place is open only 4 days of the week from 5- 9PM/10 PM. I'm surprised this place is still in business to begin with.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNWHQeFh305YxnZsfiymxxQoL0mE_27y-ZgJ7zs&fid=0x0:0x653aba0057cf290a"],"When":"2024-9-23"},{"Name":"Connor Vadeboncoeur","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJbcvPAlRKn2JwLnXFmj0AHLwIektegOc-cSa_1fVF0vyn7Kg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"J√§gerhof is the absolute best restaurant you could ever experience. Everyone is so warm and welcoming. The server gave amazing tips on what I should try. The Austrian Beer I got recommended was amazing! I also got recommended the Daily special, and oh boy... it DID NOT disappoint... I ate my meal before I could even finish my beer. It was that good. I will be going at least once a month","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMv05c-gnYlV6T_8O6tllztPGKVgDEQ09AJ7w0N&fid=0x0:0x653aba0057cf290a"],"When":"2024-11-9"},{"Name":"Andrew","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWKyNxnZbOKuiKThmqj1fhIzFPAEzf4pHpid4eMlRu2gI0Wa3uHYA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Went on a Saturday night for the live music. The piano player was excellent and really adds to a surreal experience. Make sure to make a reservation beforehand, the place was packed! It's busy and chaotic, but that somehow adds to the experience.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMmnCifBaT_ygDlgwLyF9vAdbFpo3Udr1KczDAB&fid=0x0:0x653aba0057cf290a"],"When":"2024-9-29"},{"Name":"Daniel","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJpNyvrxCSIFzaWXsvbh60FJcbwdzgmNlwUQG23SnZxq6dIQWI=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"When we walked past the restaurant, the outside decor was amazing. Old school Bavarian style. There was also live performances inside that attracted our attention.
Stepping inside of the restaurant, the servers welcomed us very warmly. We went without a reservation at 5:00pm and at that time you didn‚Äôt need a reservation but you typically would on a Friday night so remember to book one.
Now, onto the food. The food was amazing. We ordered a beer (Czech Dark Beer) and it went really well with the meats. We were sharing so we wanted to order a bit of everything. Out of the sausage platter, the venison sausage is a must-try. The Bratwurst also tastes very authentic and went very well with the beer. The Schnitzel was alright, but the mushroom sauce elevated it to a 10/10 immediately- the sauce is a must try. The Ham was a bit salty but paired well with the Sauerkraut and the beer. The third dish was the Schweinshaxe, but it kind of disappointed . The portion is of average/smaller size, and skin was not as crispy as we‚Äôd like it to be. However, the meat was very juicy and paired amazingly well with the sauce and Sauerkraut. Perhaps it was because we were in a rush and we kind of rushed the kitchen (the Schweinshaxe would usually take 20 minutes. Ours was in 15 ish). It still tasted great nevertheless.
If you come here next time, definitely try the mushroom sauce (Jager?) and the schnitzel. Also get the dark beer with the meat (per server recommendation) and the venison sausage. If you have enough time , try the Schweinshaxe.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNcA22JgLyKa7Dd1Gs6TfoxRkPWaqjphSqaK63R&fid=0x0:0x653aba0057cf290a"],"When":"2024-8-3"},{"Name":"P W","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLI37t952iZSoPgizcFdjgFO2xcncgGmbkV0YMBQVxa95wEHg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The food was astonishing, the service top notch and the atmosphere fun. The piano player was fun and the beer was tall and cold. This was our first visit and we will be back.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP5TcQnDaynbg0XbJO_B14oHAGs_IqR56vuJRgj&fid=0x0:0x653aba0057cf290a"],"When":"2024-10-17"},{"Name":"Hwee Koh","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLhqqKEI2nFBltb_QZU0XAqm6SHevU-3iWbyTMesf5SZzl7Pg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"A lively and cozy restaurant with nice music playing. Love the atmosphere. The restaurant was busy and we were lucky to get a table without a reservation. We had the following items:
- Beet, goat cheese and apple salad
- Trio of artisan sausages
- J√§ger Schnitzel with sp√§tzle
- Schnitzel Dolce Brusco
- Bavarian Schweinshaxn
Everything we had were delicious. Wish we had room for desserts. We will return to try other dishes and desserts whenever we visit Vancouver.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOQm5MZ7QT3O6lU01RpkedpZ627WqalvfA_ZYke&fid=0x0:0x653aba0057cf290a"],"When":"2024-9-16"},{"Name":"Thomas Tricarico","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKhws5bVYDwmrI4nzI8NtjFY5tCFNmhM_PZ57tj9M9bdO7Dag=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Another great meal at Jagerhof with some Old friends. Reservations required here and they're only open a few days a week, Thur-Sun from 5PM..Reservations were made weeks in advance for this past Friday. Great service from Melanie, pleasant and knew the menu quite well and offered suggestions to try which we did. Started with gruyere speck biscuits which were very good, my Mrs had their Expo schnitzel stuffed with black forest ham and camember cheese with cabbage and spaetzle and I had the  Swiss raclette schnitzel with Jager sause with cabbage and potatoes...like the others had..The spaeztle was an ad-on. Our friends had the Wiener schnitzel and Jager schnitzel...everything was Really good. It was a complete  dinner with no room left for dessert but we did finish with specialty coffees while music began to play.  It was a most enjoyable evening again and thank you and your staff for a wonderful evening.
Mr and Mrs T.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPuuPdzWpiCCK62gxcO4hqNciFmxCV1hb7_Q9o7&fid=0x0:0x653aba0057cf290a"],"When":"2024-7-22"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Nathan Woods","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWYlKwIGO9PHjqLgc7mRGN7qYIzJ_Yb1JOij4343pL12ye4fG4D-w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"What a great place!

This little secret hole in the wall is an amazingly awesome place.

We found it on Google, and decided to make this our place to meet for breakfast today.

It wouldn't be hard to miss this place, it's a little door at the side of a building that leads into a great little space. Too friendly staff members there to greet you, we were sat down quickly...

What an amazing menu they have

I ordered the Dubliner and it was fantastic. One of us ordered the Mexican pierogi breakfast, he said it was great! And finally one of us had an omelette. We all were amazed at how good and flavorful the food was!

The breakfast potatoes are awesome!

Great staff, great place, Lynn Valley... you're lucky to have this place!!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMS6DoRjOFQZNJOVrAgpw79LXfDiRdwsgqFlc9F&fid=0x0:0x60d575c304d5f5c6"],"When":"2024-10-31"},{"Name":"Nasim permanent makeup","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXVIPQi0SxdIQGvvm6YSWPo_pM7bYM5Lehsgh1glIS4yA7XbnCg1A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This Gem is in our neighbourhood and I have not had a chance to try it. Today is my first time and I am really happy with food , service and atmosphere. Sara (our server) was very friendly and helpful. Definitely I will come back soon üôèüèª","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMng0nuXB6buBXY11QibvDJAdxkCoH3Ow424_4g&fid=0x0:0x60d575c304d5f5c6"],"When":"2024-8-18"},{"Name":"Eunice Zhao","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL_m19zpDnShMlACSrl6S-cDalRdCNjiwxQ6t6OmcK7Ajk5cQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The food was excellent last year, but it seems the restaurant is now under new management. The pierogies are still as good as before, but the sausage is a bit dry, and the French toast is very thin now. I really miss the thick-cut French toast. The new renovation has lost the vintage feeling.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNKS5CfVuD440F8Ysaqj2bwGvbPzNVrXYHaSm4&fid=0x0:0x60d575c304d5f5c6"],"When":"2024-8-6"},{"Name":"Alanna","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWkbwGOKUxhJHgK_zgF4vE9zDGKWTc3036USQZM7DkkvIJ3Hzxq=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Such a cozy spot to enjoy delicious food. The waiters are so friendly and sweet. The food is amazing. I brought my partner here for his birthday and we kept talking about how good the food was! I loved the pancakes because they tasted like the homey panfried ones. Can't wait to go back again üòç","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPUSEvgezUu2cW_oAvbCx6-1x8q8NhqE9ZBeCpT&fid=0x0:0x60d575c304d5f5c6"],"When":"2024-8-8"},{"Name":"Brynn Link","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU0Zg_I9fmiHRGf1L5KoJeWi_fuL9yKRHgc_TETcb_X6E_K7DLRjA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Tommy‚Äôs knocks it out of the park with their dinner menu. We keep going back because we won‚Äôt stop till we‚Äôve tried it all. Freakin delicious.

Curry & creole salmon pictured ü§§","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOuuOkF03wu9h3VdhoxUIXvo5uA0BtJzMh1g72U&fid=0x0:0x60d575c304d5f5c6"],"When":"2024-9-28"},{"Name":"shilpa mahey","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXnZ6zL8F42CZtwouCWKJLYTB08bq00S4QzDZxek-jG49FN7HI=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Hi
I went there with my husband for breakfast.
I must say Its all worth it .
I ordered pollo omelette , comes with hash brown and gg.
My husband ordered eggs platter.
Food was served hot and portion size was enough.
Ambience is good and peaceful with mild music
Food was beautifully places on platter which is a good sight to see the first in the morning.üíú
Must visit if looking for canadian breakfast.
Cappuccino and mocha with whipped cream were icing on the cake.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNQDWwo8MTJkMzhmb1IVHFPFHtRaI52PGK2XpvX&fid=0x0:0x60d575c304d5f5c6"],"When":"2024-10-2"},{"Name":"Robert May","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUySDFjnDHlwzGaGleq6A-8-8QnsF7RN3IqL0fVOXrIAN1RnW0=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Very awesome spot! Great Vegan options.
Breakfast- vegan bowl was so good. I was so full! Lots of Tofu and Miso Gravy was delicious, double check butter on the toast, I‚Äôm not 100% sure if I asked if it was vegan.
They also customized a breakfast burrito for my wife to make it vegan, she loved it

Lunch- vegan beyond burger, fettuccini is also vegan","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPy-7Xofj8WV565IpXiPr72fN8lqdZQ8WD2wbEL&fid=0x0:0x60d575c304d5f5c6"],"When":"2024-9-26"},{"Name":"Emily Odermatt","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUywkRbXYNcuGZN5C1HwyJkPGB4Luik6zyiyABorhQQtOBCtfWP=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Stopped by this local spot for breakfast. Service was quite slow. Food was meh.

Coffee was great and the dog friendly patio spot was also appreciated!

Open 8-8","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNJmdGCXaZUTNlJhPFCKmEB2MFlyudfH2pDyl3K&fid=0x0:0x60d575c304d5f5c6"],"When":"2024-8-26"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"S G","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWcO4F0zv_pOHr7IJrYIR3lyZcfY64r6fuPT5erJ2F6pMwsiDAD-Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Fantastic food, great ambiance, fair pricing, hospitable service - what's not to like?

Enjoyed the delicious food and the treatment. A real gem in North Van!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPQxZXFVZOSAt__AZqOMpp95CasceCMhdLtOxwR&fid=0x0:0xfd5d9cc981c7faad"],"When":"2024-12-1"},{"Name":"Natasha D","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIIlLnFPz3t1q9O7Ia-zG2_ArrxoRq3glAYLEtYSBG9z6TabA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Phenomenal food and service. My husband and I went today for happy hour/dinner and I would go back a million times. From the moment we walked in until we left it was great. Everything I tried was amazing( espresso martini, scallops, grilled octopus, halibut dinner and even the brownie for dessert). My husband had oysters, and a seafood tower. I will be coming back!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNdWMiNhe01IQCmkoWfoN5LKobXYJY2k7xf1bU3&fid=0x0:0xfd5d9cc981c7faad"],"When":"2024-10-21"},{"Name":"Megan Pellouchoud","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUMYmm_V8nptM-L_I3XJs5khn1ELKI3ygzBaBUREs0CKOj_49d87Q=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Best restaurant of our entire trip through Canada and Alaska. Stopped here with the family for dinner and had the best oysters we‚Äôve ever tasted. Each dish was delicious and was beyond expectation. Menu was diverse and unique as well as fairly priced. In addition to amazing food, we had some of the best service (especially at the bar with Tom) we ever experienced in a restaurant. We left super satisfied and happy. Thank you for such an enjoyable experience that we all won‚Äôt forget. We will be visiting again when we stop in Vancouver.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNymYjmPS3Lr1Q6PULCfyZauknXv4kog2bUCKFg&fid=0x0:0xfd5d9cc981c7faad"],"When":"2024-8-14"},{"Name":"Lien Curtis-Nguyen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXTK_-SfA4UvAUm0Vy6usn3J9Z60j0SosFxvXd2Sh9EJi37NRaH=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Delicious seafood and great atmosphere for date nights. My husband and I stayed in North Vancouver for vacation. We came here for dinner based on our host's recommendation and it did NOT disappoint, so we dined here twice before flying back to the U.S.! Our servers were polite. We loved the lingcod and paella dishes - full of flavor and cooked perfectly. The oysters were also tasty. We'd happily return in the future!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPJG_q2IH8z4Xe9Ao12sXHzyAepF-Ujuq9njAGo&fid=0x0:0xfd5d9cc981c7faad"],"When":"2024-8-30"},{"Name":"Nelia Lepska","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWvZEzOn9nFTIevpRLHoVme5AkaqZWbvxUCu0rLegZigTHPfYfh=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Cozy and gentle atmosphere.
I really liked the compliment from the restaurant in the form of warm bread and something similar to hummus for it.
I recommend the incredibly delicious fried octopus and the sea tower.

But the whole impression was spoiled by the unpolite service.
When I came at 5 pm I did not have a table reserved, but we were offered to sit for half an hour. After 40 minutes the girl said that the reservation was cancelled and you can be there for an unlimited time - we were delighted. Around 6:10 pm our waiter comes and warns that we must vacate the table at 6:40 pm, but they will save a place at the bar for us.
As a result, we were brazenly kicked out around 7:20-7:30 pm and there were no more places at the bar.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOUcp_1bQ2chiqrN7MwEdqv76lLVE-owQOb8385&fid=0x0:0xfd5d9cc981c7faad"],"When":"2024-10-21"},{"Name":"Aimee Jones","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVMq0-Jb8xz0LA437uMbxAQ0NEoqgS6sOQYwGZcq5McBfbzJPa3=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"my friend and i found this spot and it did not disappoint! the food was delicious and the staff were amazing. we ordered a caesar salad to share, lobster bisque, crispy squid and prawns, lobster mac and cheese, salmon wellington, and a cr√®me br√ªl√©e and house icecream. all of it was great and staff were very kind and attentive. the cr√®me br√ªl√©e was over cooked and ended up not being the right texture but it was no issue at all and was simply taken off our bill. in total we each paid about $70 and it was well worth it. i‚Äôm looking forward to my next trip back to vancouver so i can go again!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM_dENonHzg2tXAuX552BJhl7ROL-qCI4wBHkT9&fid=0x0:0xfd5d9cc981c7faad"],"When":"2024-12-3"},{"Name":"Paul Rondeau","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWud2O79gqkHkgkw8XLlTly4855w4zQuECqNb6Iq_cxHMS3y4p-=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"The quality of the food and seafood here is amazing but the portions are very small especially for the price. I would avoid the appetizers due to the small portions as it was tough to share them‚Ä¶ the main dishes were great. Staff were friendly but stressed out and was on the slow side for service. I‚Äôm not sure if I would return or not.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN4pL29szvg3U1ZbxhLYhYYwW3rv4WWgaVcAn49&fid=0x0:0xfd5d9cc981c7faad"],"When":"2024-6-30"},{"Name":"Norman Farrell","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWOKauCUm-k2P6JXZbVaCjI514xmAUd8cPqhMzakFQdELGnjKWj0g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Not often that I am served a dinner with a couple of misses and I want to return. Fishworks was almost full on the blustery Monday evening, a sign that good things are happening in the restaurant. Staff we encountered welcomed us with friendly greetings and offered a comfortable table in a quiet corner. I enjoyed the room's simple design, featuring tasteful wall art that reflects this North Vancouver neighbourhood. The menu is focused on sustainable seafood but includes a number of selections for diners who prefer food raised on land.

The young server was quick and attentive. My partner enjoyed Hokkaido Scallops with squash tortellini, sage butter sauce, and toasted walnuts. Scallops are easily overcooked but these shellfish well prepared. I had Sockeye Salmon Wellington and while the salmon was well cooked, the phyllo pastry was roasted beyond flaky. It was like a hard cracker. Overall though, the dinner was worthwhile.

Dessert was also mixed. Partner enjoyed cr√®me caramel but the meringue in my Strawberry Pavlova was inedible. Undissolved sugar gave it the taste and mouthfeel of a sugar cube. When I indicated dissatisfaction, an alternative dessert was offered and the Pavlova was removed from our bill. The server and the manager responded to my remarks in a thoroughly professional manner. Flaws happen in restaurants but the strength of a dining room is determined by how well the staff responds. Fishworks did that well. We will not hesitate to return.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMteKlvYqdtxie71RCWe05mczGG2Ifdi3PQ_VGW&fid=0x0:0xfd5d9cc981c7faad"],"When":"2024-11-5"}]

title: Momiji Japanese Cuisine

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Thedishdetective Lala","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKD_tj6k6xpF8R8uVmPtHQuGBgjvefVOKaKmqeE1mkWnmvdyA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Momiji Japanese Cuisine
Address: 3720 Mt Seymour Pkwy, North Vancouver, BC V7G 1C3

Food

Corn Cream Croquette
The corn cream croquette at Momiji is a standout starter. The croquette arrives perfectly crisp on the outside, with a warm, creamy interior that delivers both texture and flavor. The sweetness of the corn pairs beautifully with the balanced seasoning, making each bite enjoyable. It‚Äôs a satisfying dish that sets the tone for the rest of the meal.
Rating: 8/10

Tuna Tataki Salad
The tuna tataki salad is a well-executed dish that combines fresh ingredients with expert preparation. The tuna, lightly seared, retains its delicate texture, and the accompanying salad provides a refreshing contrast. The portion is generous, and the flavors are clean and well-balanced. The dressing complements the dish without overpowering the natural taste of the fish, making this a light yet satisfying option.
Rating: 8/10

Vegetable Roll Combo
The vegetable roll combo offers a thoughtful variety of flavors and textures. Each roll is neatly presented, with fresh ingredients that come together harmoniously. While the rolls are simple in concept, the execution is precise, resulting in a dish that is both light and flavorful. It‚Äôs an ideal choice for those seeking a healthy, vegetarian option that doesn‚Äôt compromise on taste.
Rating: 8/10

Ambiance
Momiji provides a clean and cozy dining environment that feels both inviting and relaxed. The seating is comfortable, with well-spaced tables that allow for a pleasant dining experience. While the decor is minimalist, it contributes to the restaurant‚Äôs calming atmosphere, making it an ideal spot for a casual meal. The ambiance, though not particularly distinctive, complements the straightforward and well-prepared menu.
Rating: 7/10

Service
Service at Momiji is attentive and professional. The staff are polite and efficient, ensuring that orders are taken promptly and dishes are served in a timely manner. While the service doesn‚Äôt go above and beyond, it is reliable and consistent, which enhances the overall dining experience.
Rating: 8/10

Price
Momiji offers excellent value for money. The prices are reasonable, especially considering the generous portions and the quality of the ingredients used. For those seeking affordable, high-quality Japanese cuisine in the area, Momiji strikes a fine balance between cost and culinary satisfaction.

Verdict
Momiji Japanese Cuisine stands out as a reliable dining option in North Vancouver. The food is consistently well-prepared, the service is efficient, and the ambiance is inviting, if a bit understated. With affordable prices and a menu that delivers on quality, Momiji is a great choice for a satisfying Japanese meal. At first, I thought it was food waste, but it wasn‚Äôt. I was so shocked. I wanted to ask the staff right away, but I held back because I was with my kids. Anyway, what is that? Today, we ordered to-go. One dish is almost 30dollars and half portions, compared to the last time we ordered. Nice dishes but very disappointed about their overpriced menu and portion:(","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOlNLOOirjHKxUXGG1D_2BxEsUlnyL5TarjZl1B&fid=0x0:0xaaf682f5eb853d35"],"When":"2024-8-20"},{"Name":"Ahmed Sdir","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVTf3Y9COb3E-l_3xHUIylaODlr_BvJNz4HrM-x4aDAqny5Iog=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Very authentic Korean dishes.
My wife ordered the sundae plate, the sauce and side dishes were delicious.
I had the bulgogi soup. The bowl was boiling hot. The noodle in the soup were cooked just right. We also had the Makgeolli, chilled and in a kettle.
Great experience, service was amazing. We'll be yearling here again for sure.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO0WW1HAPwYAzj6TxDFIYOneh-oKCd4KGGb4M0O&fid=0x0:0xaaf682f5eb853d35"],"When":"2024-6-21"},{"Name":"Ronald Teske","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVKBEiaeToFrrT4RbuiMZobFVsTY-oeYPotjGRmfnRMysIUG2mL=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great location on a non descript street. Here for Wrexham thrashing of the white caps. Fly in from Edmonton for the game. Daughter selected two dishes to share and she nailed. Good fast service. Quality flavours . Ordered medium heat. Daughter nailed it. Watching the front door. Customers signed name on waiting list. Neighbourhood eatery. Next time back we will be back. Wrexham schooled the caps with out Mullin. Very good prices.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNXX3JrwLS9SowmCcx0Glim9v-eaPr13zFLPQ2x&fid=0x0:0xaaf682f5eb853d35"],"When":"2024-7-28"},{"Name":"ch√¢u quy√™n","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKOOkCNFFf7XVGaPDfuU9S80WXz74JQCDNten5T0r6pP4zWdg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"South Castle never disappoint me! I come here at least once a month. Staff is friendly and this is the best korean food in town to meeee‚ù§Ô∏è","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOVK8movM24KqaIInfKVIsdPkGkf3MI1548Dd9v&fid=0x0:0xaaf682f5eb853d35"],"When":"2024-10-1"}]
