user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Hay Leigh","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU3lw-VM_9NiDkl3P2xmDBrgW_mHw454nMiYrvTPrl44QLhjbc7=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is a cute little Italian spot in North Vancouver. The service is efficient and friendly. The food is delicious and comes out quick! The only thing I would suggest is add a little more meat to the pasta dishes. The noodle to meat ratio was off, however I‚Äôd still eat here again because it was that good!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNmKXjF4nQ3VVTz28s_mSK8Whg77y3pqpjm2wMy&fid=0x0:0x7c183726e6ad9e14"],"When":"2024-10-27"},{"Name":"Robin Clements","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV9PmsLxITJmMMeaAz28FAyYktWqAc6468HB42trXKaraHdb6JS=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Cute Italian place in Lower Lonsdale. We‚Äôve passed by here several times and it‚Äôs always been very busy at dinner time, so we decided to stop here for dinner when I was craving Italian. I absolutely adore the interior, as you can tell a lot of thought went into the decor. We came during happy hour which was a pleasant surprise for us, and the restaurant began to fill up a little while after we sat down. The staff were very helpful with their recommendations, and gave us pleasant conversation. We ordered the two crostinis on the happy hour menu (both were fantastic), the calabrian chili pomodoro mussels, and the ragu di manzo and prosciutto & arugula pizza to share. The pasta and the appetizers were excellent, the pizza left something to be desired. Overall, it was a great Italian dinner!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNaN9NCgk9IyHuy69ZPDwSQ7kONfl-D2i5Vqd0z&fid=0x0:0x7c183726e6ad9e14"],"When":"2024-7-24"},{"Name":"JESSICA","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVB2i5CpRP7UX8-wv47l2MrFmMz2VuMLPi87EdWVFtliHFbqvwR=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Overall, a wonderful Italian evening.
Pastas were excellent, service was even better. Pizzas were average (we got the bubbles on the crust tho) but toppings were a little lackluster: definitely a two-hand or fold kinda slice as the crust is very droopy. Roasted veg were good but nothing special. Pastas were cooked al dente but the ragu had very little beef. Not pictured is the pesto spaghettoni but it was very good. Tiramisu is really good here!

People have commented on the noise level, but it‚Äôs nothing out of the ordinary for an open space like this. Great to see an open kitchen. The dining chairs are a little uncomfortable.

Family style meal price point is excellent: a group of 4 split the $180 of 2 appies, 2 pastas, 2 pizzas and 2 desserts","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP0GS5Fo3cO-yJyjGwd4hyMjTph8fAgAKz8q1qC&fid=0x0:0x7c183726e6ad9e14"],"When":"2024-6-5"},{"Name":"Ja Flo","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUBm3nzgSRkq6cwWE_xrOcxl6duQ0fvvCqmm-vP7hNqgTw7IxU=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"nice italian restaurant . came in for lunch .. Erin the hostess was really nice
brock our server was also cool! the birch and cedar fired oven is a hit.. u can really taste in the food ! will definitely come back to try the other pastas","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNVlubcyQkw54sX0RhDwSmHjBlc8qi-b1gA2ulJ&fid=0x0:0x7c183726e6ad9e14"],"When":"2024-9-23"},{"Name":"Anna Mitsui","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJVDTOHxKs3AIz4hkq5uV9Ev3W3K6_JqahuN3bXGAf-mSbBSt0=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I had really good experience here. My bf doesn‚Äôt usually like squid ink pasta but we tried it since the chef Marvin recommended it to us. We absolutely loved it. My bf was surprised how fresh the seafood in this pasta was. I finished all the pasta sauce by dipping the pizza we also ordered. It was too good to be wasted. In addition, all the ppl who work there are very friendly and nice. It‚Äôs a very cute place good for a date, girl night, birthday celebration and any kind of occasion. I will definitely go back! You must book a table. This place is always popular and busy.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMwrIF_KUwhsoVBnxWAqIqzTavabqjbBdnbP040&fid=0x0:0x7c183726e6ad9e14"],"When":"2024-3-13"},{"Name":"Daniel Weston","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUecq74p8L70ZxTdkww3tHexrPJtUaoST5hXjwP71CatuI_2i1w=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This was our first time at Farina a Legna and we had an amazing experience. Authentic Italian gem in the North Shore with great energy and dining atmosphere. The wood burning oven pizza is top notch quality - we loved the dough and quality ingredients. Will without question be back to dine here again. North van needs more dining options like this one!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Norman Farrell","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWOKauCUm-k2P6JXZbVaCjI514xmAUd8cPqhMzakFQdELGnjKWj0g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Friday reservation at 5:45. Restaurant was busy but we were seated quickly. Server took orders from each person but did not explain they were serving large family sized dishes. We expected individual pizzas so ended up with way too much food. One person ordered a pasta dish but was served a pizza. The restaurant did knock that off the bill and replace it with the requested dish, so no complaint about that. We found the dining experience uncomfortable because of the noise level. My decibel metering app measured over 90 a number of times and an average in the high 80s. Even the teenagers with us complained about the sound level. Ingredients are good quality but my pizza crust was made soggy with too much white sauce. Service was fine. The young people with us heard a continuous high pitched sound which they think was coming from an air-mover or compressor. It wouldn't bother older folks who've lost sensitivity to high frequencies.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNyhZ-tTk-Ymo01y_Wkj_IOTSdUh4N6YIcL5JtP&fid=0x0:0x7c183726e6ad9e14"],"When":"2023-10-28"},{"Name":"Amir Alimohammadifar","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVrMzehyYKL2N5MygYIJn0Qq0Mw_ICezrph5kn4Lgaj3XeaBUPp=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"A cozy Italian restaurant with delicious pizzas and super delicious meatballs.
I didn't have the chance to try the pasta but next time for sure I will try it.
The pizzas are very delicious but not the best
The meatballs are definitely a must to try. They are amazing and surprisingly delicious.
And yeah the in house cocktails are really tasty. The cocktails are made freshly daily so you might not have all the options cos they run out fast.
The staff are super friendly and the service is great. The restaurant environment is also nice and cozy and inside is really cool to sit and chat.
I almost forgot the tiramisu, it is DELICIOUS üòã ü§©ü§© I highly recommend the tiramisu.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNvNjE-GlEuoCF9NaYUyr6UM1ezPgVYEPjUtj3H&fid=0x0:0x7c183726e6ad9e14"],"When":"2022-8-28"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Sina A","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocImG1XHnGA_pQuHdzrDPWIi_n5QVeWW96WNVfV6rs4YcB-eIg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"As a Persian, one of the most delicious Persian restaurants I‚Äôve been to. Price is slightly high but the portions are good and it‚Äôs very high quality!

Although, they brought the wrong salads and didn‚Äôt bring my Coke Zero which kinda sucks, and we had to pack our own foods which was kinda difficult since the containers were small. Only reason why it‚Äôs not 5 stars was service, but overall still excellent","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMSOc24JXEEbn3C1INs1wsksuNR2nbCSTiHWKCh&fid=0x0:0xa36c798ce1c06dca"],"When":"2024-9-29"},{"Name":"Minoo Yoga","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWWIRBE2dsxlBQYpeqPSiOzYby0bgbCmhGq7Jy_doDnxxr5i7Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I had a great dining experience at Sadra restaurant .The food was tasty and of good quality, and each portion was served with a variety of side veggies. The staff were friendly, and the atmosphere was clean and pleasant. Highly recommend! :)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNOBat03r23Hig-aNzFqTVdSdeVlUsr3Ok4zgVB&fid=0x0:0xa36c798ce1c06dca"],"When":"2024-6-27"},{"Name":"Mehdi Karamnejad","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXA6B5oES5Aw7ts20EuYjoTDlVn9saczAthf5ZxL-LVqat7pb8G=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Food is pretty good actually. Kabab Torsh and Koobide is pretty good.
The service is meh, we were not checked on even once during the meal after we received the food. Even though they were friendly, I think they just don‚Äôt have enough servers.
They are slow it took 30 minutes to get 3 meals. Their portions are not that great. If you are going to charge for Tahdig you gotta do better with portions","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM0x58Q5lfsGle_Y8P9qg5NBb7-fgGrxkIwJD4M&fid=0x0:0xa36c798ce1c06dca"],"When":"2024-6-25"},{"Name":"Gina Grape","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKjfpAS0e1J9DlXOCRvxRrfnAvo44TyYUw59aPp0ohD7GacQA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"A great place for Persian  food.  Went for Lamb shanks that melts in your mouth with its succulent taste, and Cornish chicken that just tastes as awesome.  Relaxing ambience and good service from the staff.  We could use more bread though in the beginning  ;)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNZ6Os3nJBHI9CdXVJrjgT3MPnI2JamR2BNgkuU&fid=0x0:0xa36c798ce1c06dca"],"When":"2024-6-15"},{"Name":"Hamid Hokmabady","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV7WZLyu_HOQmlaPNp7_DM2O2xqd1gC2SZfDODd0oflh-tyDjAc=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We visited various Iranian restaurants, and our recent visit to Sadra Restaurant was quite impressive. Both the food and service were commendable. The lady serving us was incredibly warm and kind. The food quality exceeded my expectations, although I found the meat plate a bit cold; I would prefer it to be served warmer. Adding more traditional music could potentially enhance the overall atmosphere.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNPN8LuBADYpFMFvAiW8wiRmtsLI6sjqC1ANvkT&fid=0x0:0xa36c798ce1c06dca"],"When":"2023-12-26"},{"Name":"Nikta Niyazi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWyoyZ-Xgwm9UG6yz2ksxPJoiroc410BbDtNMy8qTiFrdNKspST=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"this was my second visit which also turned out to be the last visit. I ordered Gheime stew. After having very few bites I noticed the split peas were 90% half cooked and as a result difficult to chew. Also the stew felt oily and hard on salt.
Worse thing came when I saw a hair stick to my tahdig. When I told them the waiter apologized but continued making jokes about this incident and laughed at it, I didn‚Äôt know what was funny exactly. I wish I knew!
Food: not good, not clean, not fresh.
Staff: not professional, not trained properly.
Atmosphere: the music getting played there, makes you wonder if this is a Persian restaurant or a small cafe in town.
Overall:
Disappointed. Mainly that this was not handled professionally from the business owner or a manager, and ofc low quality of food.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMepwu8jXz_SMJVh5Vip8itoHjn3Gf1D-mjiFc6&fid=0x0:0xa36c798ce1c06dca"],"When":"2024-2-14"},{"Name":"Rojan Javid","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU5a5V1XXPAk1QEKUvR_bnkhWEoAgtgrwXpqrFEP-DhIGVECzRL=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Very delicious!! The portion of the dishes are great. I love how they include ‚Äútahdig‚Äù with the rice for each meal, it‚Äôs a great touch! The atmosphere is somewhat modern and the staff are very polite. We were visiting from Toronto and really enjoyed the quality of food.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOF-uBRtfOFlSXDHoTte_NxNKlBhix6IbBheeq5&fid=0x0:0xa36c798ce1c06dca"],"When":"2023-10-17"},{"Name":"Mary Amini","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU_wPdUtL-CYpV2n5n7XufIkG6LG_2JovTm8Q3k1x3ewL-tl_Zr=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I had hair in my food and I had to argue for refund. The servers said chef is not here we have to charge you. I was scared when the manager was angry asking me whats the problem. It's a nice restaurant with nice food if they could be more clean and better customer service.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMPEfPmf1cb5horhE4fa6l9vpM96kHFGK6uOvNg&fid=0x0:0xa36c798ce1c06dca"],"When":"2024-5-30"}]

[{"Name":"Raad Saadi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKlQnT-rCTufI0eWe2KZSlXk8eUcfDOi6mWMjYZfgRE2L7IdA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The food was really amazing, 10/10. It's my new favorite Persian Restaurant in town and definitely coming back.
The staff were really nice and accommodating even though the place was packed!
The atmosphere was great too and the music wasn't loud in an annoying way.
The banquettes were super comfy too, which is uncommon these days.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOgdXX4TEK9UYiFFuP8ggH7nWpcQbEzpsxholHd&fid=0x0:0x8d82164d63b14f8f"],"When":"2024-10-14"},{"Name":"Samira","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXl26_X01AKboPrIEHlsjXoj5iqcLLzL1lJnvwXaMVPIOXx9As=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We live in Montreal and when we were on our trip in Vancouver we tried this Persian restaurant.

Awesome, it was amazing unfortunately we do not have such restaurants in Montreal.
The service was good. The Staff was nice.
It was a bit packed cause it was weekend. So you need to reserve in advance.
All in all,
I love it and it reminded me of the fabulous food of my lovely country ü•∞ü•∞üòçüòò
The prices were reasonable","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOUvI84vnnnoKTbzKDgkM3fb3kA01szr5aUwuDU&fid=0x0:0x8d82164d63b14f8f"],"When":"2024-8-1"},{"Name":"Ashkan N","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKGC9QpVpAYzkuU2nETbRxXDGZW6ZxU4DFK0Bytd5fdamCstw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Visited shishlik couple of weeks ago for the first time. The restaurant offers a delightful dining experience with its great atmosphere that truly enhances your visit. The ambiance is warm and inviting.
The food, overall, is decent. The kababs are particularly noteworthy‚Äînicely cooked and delicious, showcasing the authentic flavors of Persian cuisine.
The service was generally good, with attentive and friendly staff. However, we were a bit disappointed when we requested to substitute rice with salad due to dietary preferences and were told it was not an option. It was disheartening to see all that rice go to waste. Despite this, overall experience was good","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMlj6thNaED2Dij86aQMIgifuA52Wgc4MODmXXM&fid=0x0:0x8d82164d63b14f8f"],"When":"2024-6-24"},{"Name":"Floba Design Studio","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV-3Iw6fAygwK-55KLTdpKiNjn0G3wJJpe_BKq-5VhOzS7xqg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I recently visited Shishlik Restaurant, and I must say it‚Äôs hands down the best Persian food in Vancouver! The dishes were absolutely delicious, full of authentic flavors, and beautifully presented. The staff were incredibly friendly and polite, providing excellent service throughout our visit. Whether you‚Äôre a fan of Persian cuisine or trying it for the first time, I highly recommend this place. You won‚Äôt be disappointed!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNtY2izJ1_fOGG1fIW0bUVHgqwgQe8TZ2vcYIU&fid=0x0:0x8d82164d63b14f8f"],"When":"2024-9-21"},{"Name":"Shiva Taymourian","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXqNdyWETM3uP2KtaWvAAYv4G3rzlpOWTZf3J-ia_qUUfKljiU=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"One of the best restaurants ever! If you look for most delicious tastes of Iran and our home land , here is the place! The atmosphere, decoration and presentation are top notch! You could introduce your friends and colleagues, IRAN , through this magnificent restaurant! Well done!
Looking forward to come back from Calgary !","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOhmfPCCd4zzkCB_xEwANvrxILIzFiGCxv2YWoc&fid=0x0:0x8d82164d63b14f8f"],"When":"2024-8-22"},{"Name":"Leila Daoud","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVV3JGLy4mozmFaqRXqW802KFBnAEirQlxTjnu6AhXKEh5q8KaX=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Wow! What an introduction to Persian food! This was incredibly tasty. I ordered the Vasiri combo and it was enough food for two people. Most of the time I eat chicken, but I wanted to try the koobideh ‚Äì it was truly delicious. Tender, juicy, and perfectly seasoned. I can‚Äôt get over the salty, briny, sweet, sour balance and deliciousness of the marinated olives. I‚Äôm only sad that I don‚Äôt live here or I would be here every week. Thank you for a wonderful meal!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPf1Fp8wxfUXCaL7UqI2nYiwcJOtohseRen0_Ma&fid=0x0:0x8d82164d63b14f8f"],"When":"2024-11-24"},{"Name":"Atena Razmpoush","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWDTwnpwsyCMQv83dsdwlkz2BAvureQHzZZxo2_BIzfjtUBCR_R=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We got Vaziry and Shandiz Shishlik Lambshanks with house Doogh drink. Everything was mind blowing. The environment and interior design were lovely, the staff were friendly and super helpful. The quantity of the portions were great, 2 meals were enough for 3 people.

Very reasonable prices for the food quality and quality. Highly recommended and will definitely comeback!!

Try lamb neck with dill rice!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNcdcks1cPibahOPfv1HBdqLuvEIdJ87S36pq46&fid=0x0:0x8d82164d63b14f8f"],"When":"2024-10-14"},{"Name":"Spring R","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWRbyDIx5qt7YwkZcJFTGfRNdQJryM6XSagcF6aDlAZpL7zeEXp=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I recently had a wonderful dining experience at Shishlik Grill House. From the moment we walked in, we were impressed by how clean and well-maintained the restaurant was. The staff greeted us warmly and provided excellent service throughout our meal.

We decided to try several dishes, and each one was delicious. We ordered the kebab and hot bread, which were both cooked to perfection. The kebab was tender, flavorful, and had a perfect char, while the hot bread was freshly baked and warm. We also enjoyed the Loghmeh kebab, which was juicy and seasoned just right, and the lamb neck, which was incredibly tender and flavorful. Every dish we tried was well-cooked and made with high-quality ingredients.

One of the highlights of our meal was the Doogh pitcher we ordered. It was incredibly fresh and refreshing, complementing the food perfectly. The Doogh had a great balance of flavors and was a great choice for a hot day.

Overall, Shishlik Grill House offers a fantastic dining experience with excellent food and friendly service. The quality of the dishes was top-notch, and the clean and inviting atmosphere made our meal even more enjoyable. If you‚Äôre looking for a great place to enjoy some delicious kebabs and traditional Persian dishes, I highly recommend Shishlik Grill House. It‚Äôs definitely worth a visit!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPPuBGcUenffgjtokDPNiBnyG9xEBeAEbNLN4Cy&fid=0x0:0x8d82164d63b14f8f"],"When":"2024-7-11"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Pete On The Street","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVdCPmg937wv90tlRaBXtKDK-aCTAb7FrA83Y4igLR31Qw239o=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Super quick made to order service.
Everything was fresh and hot and crispy.
I got the medium boneless sweet and spicy box which came to just over $17 all in. You get a nice heafty box which was about 10 pieces of super juicy delicious chicken.
Right of Lonsdale on 2nd super easy stop coming or going from Lonsdale Quay.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPIFajlY0hhrwm0hlaQ5-dunZenExxUbnYEUATF&fid=0x0:0x1ce6ff312a2c8007"],"When":"2024-11-24"},{"Name":"Cy L","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWkSC7lAXZCJHRSMZSUu3uZL4bOwFtDRmBGSML5V01kGqEqK5Zz=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"2024 Summer
A tiny, busy and specialty joint. Decent fried chicken and fries. Premium prices but good value for their lunch special.  Take out recommended!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOaStzAxiF9q9R1DMEk15yIzhT0TM8G5roDsx2N&fid=0x0:0x1ce6ff312a2c8007"],"When":"2024-7-12"},{"Name":"Kimberly D","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU8h7YCz4CKN35cUZuRzxi5Ui-JEII2xMD-HDnXgQelK1JZ12LY=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I have been a few times and always have the same great experience. Staff are friendly and service is quick
and efficient. The chicken is always fresh, juicy and crispy. My husband loves the chicken and waffles, I usually get a medium order of the chicken (either the cheese or soy garlic) with fries. The pickled radish is delicious too. We prefer a chicken box over other korean fried chicken restaurants in our area and will keep coming back!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"D S","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUiwZP5uC5CzBgSahQQVkTqGSd5rHWgB0GVCkCWen4FIy1S7JRp=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Juicy and tasty fried chicken!
It wasn't busy, but it should be since it's amazing.
Had the Nashville burger and it was delicious!  Should definitely eat it there nice and fresh, otherwise it'll lose its crispiness.
The chicken and waffles was off the charts!  The waffles are croissant waffles, and that makes it better than any other chicken and waffles I've had. They are missing Frank's Red hot, they should add this to their sauce line up and it would be complete.
I highly recommend this place!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOUvJJ7q2zqKpx7CPOHVgmRxT1EX13uKCzMqhty&fid=0x0:0x1ce6ff312a2c8007"],"When":"2023-4-30"},{"Name":"D Smurt","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKFMn_dqAOyQbOGs70jceToQMFxlTqwAZ_CpS19c2RhS51FXQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Amazing flavor, fresh thick juicy chicken. Some of if not the best chicken burger I've ever had. Extra spicy was the right amount of heat and the bit of sweetness with the coleslaw was prefect. First but not last time I'll eat here.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMxT_jucvth_0nEPiIggDijFRu1J4olgfTUj6G5&fid=0x0:0x1ce6ff312a2c8007"],"When":"2024-3-27"},{"Name":"Kanako Sakurada","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKYybgPjG_d3LYq66Ui47Ocd_2PMrfkKaju5V_L0IyVTR19lQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Really good chicken and waffles! The chicken was meaty and juicy. The waffles were craffle kind and light and crispy. Their sandwich was good, too, but a bit on dry and pricy side.
Several flavour choices‚Ä¶we tried crispy and honey garlic and both were good. They have other spicy kinds as well.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO3OFI3jIVF7qRN9l2EukJCtoMenboe1693MDyY&fid=0x0:0x1ce6ff312a2c8007"],"When":"2023-8-30"},{"Name":"Vincent Lau","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJjBruVeZMWvNHxHcAgBcOWppDAX9xZQU1hDbqNXgVSz0fweXbl=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Superb service! Friendly worker talked me through their menu options and told me they were very new. Everyone greeted me and said goodbye even when they were working on their stations. Lovely atmosphere.

We ended up ordering the Nashville chicken wings and a soy garlic chicken & waffles. The chicken was quite delicious with the perfect amount of crisp and crunch.  The waffles survived an entire drive home across the bridge and was still fluffy and slightly crispy.  It was a great complement to the saucy chicken.

Loved every bite. I'll be back for more!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO3bHptvrVjH858CsrrqnyCQzUshlCRzw4XK4gf&fid=0x0:0x1ce6ff312a2c8007"],"When":"2022-6-21"},{"Name":"M Mo","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLzyL2JZ81rBoW3a_xRLTcT-FsOmc5lXunJHS-FcLGrbhi7OA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"is yumüòã like the soy garlic chicken, and it's waffle is croffle","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMbmL-qqX-dZtmqGNcUmKcz6SuEj7agWSu9RZ1V&fid=0x0:0x1ce6ff312a2c8007"],"When":"2024-10-31"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Jason Gardiner","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXmYfX-ZRJM4SZ0OD4ncBAb9A84dMfn2swh03k68XM6Pw-t1BfE=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great place for food and beverages at The Wallace Shipyards!  It was a beautiful day, we were able to sit outside for an evening dinner and drinks!  üåá

Pizza was delicious and the chicken sandwich was huge!  Squid (calamari) starter was super tasty! üòã

Coconut margarita and Spicy pomegranate margarita were yummy!  The standard beer flight provides an opportunity to taste the full gamut from Cider to Dark!

Wonderful service and we‚Äôd return to try more of their deliciousness!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMMsbu5xf0IFiHjcCOuCJbXwiqfN7Q9tbgWfesN&fid=0x0:0xeedb2eaeef11268c"],"When":"2024-7-2"},{"Name":"Amanda Melo","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWNQMePiQGMRneEXwVuk8uIxOkiQDZkYzR38BVNEnOFDAoGofnV=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Had such an amazing time during the happy hour thanks to the incredible Carlan! Both of my parents are out of town visiting and we came in an awkward timing, but she made sure we were always catered to and happy, with great remarks about the food and drinks menu.

It was such an awesome summer day and we stayed for longer than we anticipated, as the atmosphere was so so good! When times like these happen we are truly appreciative, as it leaves a great feeling of joy that we carried out of the restaurant after -sadly- leaving.

I live in the city and will for sure make this my go to place, thanks again for such a great time to all staff but specially Carlan ü©µ","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMknrmCQneRPviggw08vmK0sX5f3g0rA_CRAkVM&fid=0x0:0xeedb2eaeef11268c"],"When":"2024-8-30"},{"Name":"Pam Delfino","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVou97WNj_X-lZ_I6WAUZr7ELzzqVVEd-LYy7ydp9dEDslErRA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"One of my favourite places in Lower Lonsdale to enjoy craft beer with some really tasty food! I had the Margherita Pizza this time with my Hall Pass IPA and it was fantastic! I also love the Fish and Chips and Mac and Cheese here!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMUTh9zV5e44anEMjlQ_wce3zFpkY2x00FgRcFy&fid=0x0:0xeedb2eaeef11268c"],"When":"2024-10-16"},{"Name":"Mahi Mohammadi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXqC-rZuQ76AwKkD3oY9lIbbPffPrvfajyPTndb0NlfbHCj4Y4W=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I recently visited this location of Tap & Barrel, and the experience was fantastic! The location is perfect, offering stunning views that really elevate the dining experience. The food and drinks were excellent, with a great selection to suit all tastes. But what truly stood out was the exceptional service from Felipe. Even though we were a large group, he handled everything smoothly, always with a great attitude and a welcoming smile. Highly recommend this place for anyone looking for great food, drinks, and top-tier service!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM_-Xqi9oAfOtLLGwr07pcSw92OysGjw8Yytd53&fid=0x0:0xeedb2eaeef11268c"],"When":"2024-9-7"},{"Name":"Spike Luk","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVljR41LewaD1cz5kVqUD3bmc9ybJSH00GIF-DrHusS8cKNejJe=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"We decided to stop here to avoid rush hour over the 2nd narrows bridge.   The patio had a nice view of Vancouver.   The drinks were good.  The deep fried pickles, pizza, and gyoza were perfect snacks!
Overall a good experience and would come back.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMzlrEU76XpLIlApCXlVc7vjXQ8OJsHG3U9Abrj&fid=0x0:0xeedb2eaeef11268c"],"When":"2024-7-10"},{"Name":"Veronica Antoine","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWJofqlNGnGs62PynouEOstsXFhL-drzbOhJf6e0rvYSr1v7-k=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Our first time at Tap and Barrel, and it was too good! For myself and a child we were seated quickly without reservations. Great spot out on the patio. The food was great and so were the drinks. Our server Montana was super awesome! She recommended the Korean bbq wings, new fav!
Will definitely be coming by again!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNxLfEEO9-05r47XkHI5-0xlkd-hMXPcRX-hj3-&fid=0x0:0xeedb2eaeef11268c"],"When":"2024-7-5"},{"Name":"Gabriel Nguyen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXFS1ZCZG33rDp5IgotlKkfy57sXzM1DGyM3JqdeNIkzG50bfvE=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"The service and atmosphere was fine, but the food was terribly inconsistent. The truffle waffle fries were quite bland, while the "crispy" Humboldt squid was extremely salty! Also, I don't think I'll ever make the mistake of paying $18.90 for half a portion of squid and half a portion of fried banana peppers. Phillips "For peach sake" Ale was really good though!

Consider Tap & Barrel Bridges. Better view, better food!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNyYro639I8wlOLyQTf1O44veSPssHIAGtLko6Y&fid=0x0:0xeedb2eaeef11268c"],"When":"2024-8-25"},{"Name":"Jandy Miller","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV--sdfNIkrL6bsDjtekZyxhIOhp7-O7j23eXL2WtRcWrYATPE=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I had the Caper Dill Salmon and it was by far the best meal I have had. The salmon just fell apart and was perfectly seasoned. The sauce was pure perfection. The potatoes were crisp on the outside and soft in the middle. The broccoli was the added touch of perfection. I would recommend this to anyone","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO6bsuXwRof4rX8_auBDUVlA4OvHc9fxniY6-SA&fid=0x0:0xeedb2eaeef11268c"],"When":"2024-9-10"}]

[{"Name":"Farzam","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIooZPCPPfH5D4G1f5pX_06Fqf4UZb5reyqU1DQAFjZqgdcZ04=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"We went to Cantina Norte for lunch around 12, but they only had the brunch menu available. Despite the limited options, the food was really good, and the service was excellent. The staff was attentive and friendly, making the overall experience pleasant. Would have loved to try their lunch menu, but the brunch was still a solid choice.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPimh26iWFFzkKepHTqXdadP3OPOoFBLNRueGrU&fid=0x0:0x5a84d793df6fb31c"],"When":"2024-10-27"},{"Name":"Kasra Feili","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXdWaTX9XZliZlg1I3eIYHEaYMQHVl6waF7WroHRqIPImqod_vI=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I had an amazing experience at this Mexican gem! From the moment we walked in, the vibe was so lively and welcoming. Every dish was bursting with authentic flavors that transported me straight to Mexico.
Whether you‚Äôre craving a casual lunch out or looking to dive into some seriously good Mexican cuisine, this place is a must-visit. Can‚Äôt wait to go back and try more of the menu!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNZm6lUkGtXwVeAzhPFYBwJFLA93koZsksiWlQX&fid=0x0:0x5a84d793df6fb31c"],"When":"2024-11-3"},{"Name":"Crabby Ermine","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV7ghzWacgyIAQrG2Lk7qt0s7V3r_adVAnu6EbLXS1Ck1zLBRgjvA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"LOVE LOVE LOVE this place.
First time tonight with my wife and daughter.
Everyone was perfect.
Margaritas
Chips and salsa
Taquitos
Enchiladas
Tacos
Churros
Banana Cream Pie

And our server was so nice - like old school nice and she told us that her parents had the original Cafe Norte years earlier.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOBkHw6-jbp90UI2Smp5-6No4lg5u5B7KnV-uKZ&fid=0x0:0x5a84d793df6fb31c"],"When":"2024-10-7"},{"Name":"Tom C","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKdiYc5x_E-Q2lE0z_5xM3LFSGfnEnGmUa_btawv_geQdXHww=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"They serve some chips & salsa while you wait. Dishes were well prepared and tasted great. Happy hour starts at 2pm, $9 Margheritas sure hit the spot on a nice hot day. There‚Äôs also an outdoor patio area and free parking in the area.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOuu-82Qj8q1iD65-WaeZZ4cgMblDf62XX5VkgM&fid=0x0:0x5a84d793df6fb31c"],"When":"2024-7-11"},{"Name":"Dr.Hadi Najafi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUBM9NYEZFIeHoba9emgE-Tv48BhK_6O5OW-1M4xgZ6CtkAvZpt=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Cantina Norte is one of the best places to enjoy Mexican cuisine in North Vancouver! You absolutely have to try the tortilla soup‚Äîit's an unforgettable flavor experience. The friendly service and warm, inviting atmosphere always make us want to come back. Definitely one of the best dining experiences I've had.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNoHtB7oU4KEHYCuzPoKwVD24maN5RXWonJwzqx&fid=0x0:0x5a84d793df6fb31c"],"When":"2024-8-12"},{"Name":"S Paull","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXxmkNt-NkNE3iOpigzCU5rTZ0feALLbSq5mJ8nodRivdUDSoQb=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We could not decided where to go and son said try this place!  Another friend has referred it too.  We came in and the nacho are the best I have ever had!  The interior design is fun and we sis not have to wait for a table","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMy_2hW1s0zZSs52_o5p0sjaVZu7ADZ2vn2Kjb5&fid=0x0:0x5a84d793df6fb31c"],"When":"2024-7-30"},{"Name":"SeotByul Kim","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXo1VGavC46cOilmApk6kWId36YQC9xBmXbg07KN3Lonymvohe8=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Food was fantastic! Atmosphere was enjoyable and patio seatings was excellent! Only down side was we felt so unwelcome by the male host when we first arrived. He seemed like he really didnt want to be here and didnt bother to even smile. He answered passive aggressively when i had asked a question. Thankfully our server made up for it and excelled in taking care of us during the dining experience.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOfWJ0SagQZG7x_zERKgu4BnSeB6OKMHOhKGeJv&fid=0x0:0x5a84d793df6fb31c"],"When":"2024-9-1"},{"Name":"Antonio Gil","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWLbAmEKmBvE2fZn3e5W8ukiDk-BINWaeC1MJJBzLlD36PDjvA2=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Our server was very friendly and attentive, we were a large group we got separate bill and some of us share a few things which make her life complicated, but she was very professional and accommodating. üëèüèº I forgot her name but I loved her since she asked for my ID( I'm over 30).

The food is good, some Interesting flavors and good portions, nothing really make me fall in love but it was ok.

The atmosphere is like any family restaurant.

Definitely the best part of the experience is the staff, the will make sure that you have a good timeü•≥üëèüèº","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Josephine Ma","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW4ctBP8R2rm9S8Aa5NyuULMapTvyTQYakS6AvI9Cd025oSy86H=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"This place seems to be run by Persian people as they offer a mix of traditional Western style food, along with some Persian options as well. (eg.Persian Omelette) It's got a nice vibe to it. Love the decor.

Featured here:
Egg Bacon Sandwich
Ham and Cheese Panini sandwich
Classic Avocado Toast
Earl Grey Tea
Iced Mocha
Rooibos Cherry Rose

My daughter said she couldn't really taste the cheese much in her sandwich, but still enjoyed the sandwich all the same. Her Iced Mocha was very nicely done.

I found my Avocado Toast a bit on the salty side, and wasn't impressed with the egg that sat upon it. Runny yolk is what I like to see, but the yolk in this egg was very dry.

They have a nice selection of cakes in their display case. I might come back here again to have some tea and dessert but don't think I'll bother with their savoury foods again.

Service: Good
Parking: Free parking on the street","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMXnDXKb-wcFYJXBXxITBL9tIu24WGxWves-EpL&fid=0x0:0xa1677bd9c4c33689"],"When":"2024-5-16"},{"Name":"Felipe Bautista","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXD8Ocw-BYrQmD4Za-AtjcfdB8pbtfMHowdqj-NOPSE6zWVwSI=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I spend couple hours here working and I got a piece of chocolate cake and a large latte, of course I will be back. The place is cozy, nice and very well presented. Washroom has something really closest to a Bid√© and very clean. They have internet and lots of options in their menu. Music not loud and cool for work/business chats.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNGRZbSW17qARgHTOg8Oj2222Lo49JHIpomUFTT&fid=0x0:0xa1677bd9c4c33689"],"When":"2024-5-2"},{"Name":"Mohsen Hashemi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVqWjJ3FfE5HvtSYLuezJakGo1pAZOQ-SG65pg0pJSV7FVMOaOi=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I  and my friends came echo cafe on Saturday 5th October ‚Ä¶the avocado toast was amazing.  Mushroom omelet was neat.    My selection breakfast had perfect design . All of the orders were on  time.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMwC46edvZRmeAO8688mC3UmArjrhSZRxe58Goc&fid=0x0:0xa1677bd9c4c33689"],"When":"2024-10-7"},{"Name":"Reid Gibbons","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVPjVw-w007m7wzzutBNrbjcTaaAtYRGVf12IZnYarU1U8tfwrm=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"2 for 1 breakfast sandwich? No....they just double the cost for a single sandwich. Very slimy business practices on Uber eats for subpar food. And don't tell me it's for "extra prep" or "packaging" it came in sandwich paper covered in grease stuffed in the cheapest of plastic bags. Absolute joke.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMKKQBDbQdoCrcYtnY230hOiLvouh_3ybQEYFUt&fid=0x0:0xa1677bd9c4c33689"],"When":"2024-7-9"},{"Name":"Shaghayegh Shahryary","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIT06Avonv-SEIoxbqKqVad_AYqya2ZkM4QUtBrWhU2i1hBg2s=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great coffee, great Omelette , great sweet options and most of all great service! Definitely worth it.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMsLzuVS7-Ab01osDPzJoG6wdxVj1rUEzvhqZAx&fid=0x0:0xa1677bd9c4c33689"],"When":"2024-11-26"},{"Name":"Michael Swanson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJaMDFoxtF-rRkN8FbQK8Mq6xYLFRYls0ikPMEZnKjJJv7aHg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Large open seating area, delicious cookies - a bright place that gets a large range of returning customers.

I've been back a couple times and have always been happy. I've tried breakfast, lunch, and tea time snacks and it has all been good.

The breakfast and brunch dishes cube with good portions and great taste. The panini sandwich I had last time was also delicious - that makes it win-win-win for my visits.

I was lucky enough to have a chat with Echo herself and found her to be quite sweet and kids of fun to chat with, and that makes me even happier to write about the cafe!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO96xZ0rUxPeoRxivFWyoEYpYIawI9VOXApCddg&fid=0x0:0xa1677bd9c4c33689"],"When":"2022-1-29"},{"Name":"moen ghanavati","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKfW2S_e_y724TewiSVz3aQ35U1VsCfXnkxQH-FAszC-zWA3A=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My experience at ECHO Cafe was amazing. Friendly staff, positive atmosphere, and reasonable prices.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMqwBCO06i8XtEbZR0Q8s5PVjAogSJE3KQkPqMV&fid=0x0:0xa1677bd9c4c33689"],"When":"2024-11-27"},{"Name":"Hunnie Bee","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJDB3fBl3nshvwdnuJSUyRN_RQY_ymgng94Ek9lIkRZZXEgvw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Service is ok.  Atmosphere pretty nice, but come with a big budget and small appetite.  $13 for a tiny sandwich that was zapped in the microwave...ridiculous .","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM789khB8jxqZi3khy2ALtDCQMkmDlXCS3dD3SU&fid=0x0:0xa1677bd9c4c33689"],"When":"2024-7-23"}]

A locally owned and operated D√∂ner Kebab location right near the Lonsdale Quay Sea Bus and Bus Station. Good for all backgrounds with vegan (Falafel) ü•óüßÜand Halal Meats üçóüêìü•©üêÑüçñüêë(Chicken, Beef, and Lamb).","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPXLvD8w4KhXnf7SBPmPBG4PeNxhVVHKbVGB7T3&fid=0x0:0x85a560466624cbc4"],"When":"2024-10-25"},{"Name":"Tiara","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXOGTnVSprrRfKnl8HxlMWqGPfK-EAnduRxsmD5lBjFitcsiWe8=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Absolutely love the chicken donair! I grab one every time I‚Äôm in north van. Very flavorful and filling! Everyone is really nice too. There‚Äôs a bit of a lineup but absolutely worth it.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOQGrFf1gQiPyj9kJvuwVhjUjy0GZAEJTLYZ0kF&fid=0x0:0x85a560466624cbc4"],"When":"2024-10-25"},{"Name":"Jonny Padilla","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWZfpOXfFLHuvk_h3vclfvmxp7tkDOYQk8g-euCrp8vk5GXCmN0=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Food is fresh and has great flavor! The people are kind and friendly! The staff went out of the way to make falafel to perfection! Plus it is made fresh daily! The chicken wrap is also amazing! I Would highly recommend this place.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOZIAv5VEi_--WPz6zzMBhtQwOusAGEtfrObfzE&fid=0x0:0x85a560466624cbc4"],"When":"2024-9-9"},{"Name":"Hande","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKP9N2AyeBX9W2s_3LoXlHQjAtQ5IYF4Cvhf7QwCaFxI1yr8A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We really liked the donair at SeaSide Donair Kebab. Ordered beef wrap, mix platter and chicken donair for kids. We all enjoyed our dinner by the seaside. Veggies were fresh, really liked the sauces. Another must try place. Also greatly appreciate the halal businesses like this.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMIBiyZvKjNOZ1ap947LwgjyIh7HmeUonuo1Z80&fid=0x0:0x85a560466624cbc4"],"When":"2024-7-25"},{"Name":"Michael Poon","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVkSjd152a9dCUO4PnImKzhY9WH9eKUK9V2LBwuuOvnQGB3LhYS=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Delicious! Friendly staff,  generous portions. A guest came in to collect cans from the trash and they greeted him and gave his daughter her choice of free drink. These are amazing people. Would be even better if you recycled your containers or used compostable ones!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOcIssmxbLBUOdNhrymp0TZRxHOcj4OZ17taB_R&fid=0x0:0x85a560466624cbc4"],"When":"2024-10-6"},{"Name":"Jeff Feng","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWD04N7yAqK5bQW4CKDPzu-YbWI12ot70TbAi4lhM4-9KR2NVFH-w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I think is is one of the best donair wraps I‚Äôve ever had. The family who runs this place are very friendly and puts care into their work! I highly recommend asking for the traditional toppings for your wrap as opposed to topping it yourself; the flavour was perfectly balanced. I ordered the lamb wrap but after getting a sample of the chicken I think they have a special recipe for it. Worth a detour if you are by North Van!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN1otE1rcq544yVxixtBpVXMlAtI0XvBF1YdnXR&fid=0x0:0x85a560466624cbc4"],"When":"2024-6-22"},{"Name":"Blampin","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUe_Zl-7bsR_k4aPN0CDrFm3JxQQaY2wgkXgNPVdZQs9NDoFTA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Delicious Persian Doner (Donair).
These people are very kind, friendly and respectful here of people's request to have spicy or not spicy.

You can choose between a Doner wrap or Doner platter.

I had the Lamb Platter. It was simply amazing.
They prepare all the meat here from scratch, so no preservatives are added.

Very healthy food.

Try the Persian yogurt beverage.

Thanks again guys.

I will stop in to say hi again.
üëç","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPwC4jZCe59PhIi11dGr4GxAoIl6_6yZMxEip0o&fid=0x0:0x85a560466624cbc4"],"When":"2024-9-7"},{"Name":"Matthew Carter","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXDoqaKv-7gc5LDgnf0QT65tIvKdbvB4xeXOAXaMgZs8f0CmlE=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This place SLAPS!

Don't miss out on some of the best donair in the city... scratch that, the best in the city!

The chicken platter is my go-to meal. It always fills me up, and the flavors are seriously legendary. üòã

The staff here are so nice, and they always treat you with kindness! Thanks guys.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO03ph7Vab1797DHpnlmUqxBSj-_SsNnwr2f_HG&fid=0x0:0x85a560466624cbc4"],"When":"2024-7-31"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Farhad","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUZsh7rsXskoTeFBdwx-4_jSK3VIUQ0BNWwnMfqcoyfBr3tpy_n=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Their food quality is just average. We tried Fiocchiona Pizza that was not good, a plain mixture of bread with sauce and pizza cheese. The sausage that was added to it was not good at all. You can get much better pizzas from thrifty foods just next to them with half their price !! We also tried truffle fries. This one was good. The only thing that I can recommend is truffle fries. We had a seat in the corner. That was not a good location. There were lots of propane tanks next to us that is both hazard and nothing standard in any restaurant. They charge us $10 more for bringing our own salad to our table, so instead, I had to skip paying tip. Overall not recommended.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOttq74t-FnMB7O13sfhqv8KgrJZs5hjp0pLZ8&fid=0x0:0xd63af9ffdfa7acd"],"When":"2024-8-31"},{"Name":"toffy concepcion","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVYhf6f6Tr-b7ekbkXxFz9ueDreb1BCkopv3RQXbcpm54DeMfYl5g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is a really good neighborhood Italian restaurant. Pricey but with healthy portions and friendly service. Very good wine choices. We didn't follow the traditional Italian primeri  piatti and secondi piatti and instead shared appetizers, pastas and pizzas in the middle family style.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOoyOFv9btzBzZkZQA1DRrBvIMOuxJsag4Ew05g&fid=0x0:0xd63af9ffdfa7acd"],"When":"2024-10-10"},{"Name":"Kristin L","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWuO_421d89rSC-x3YKAZ93D_1k4fCeqZBvDbw1BmEcZ2dlmQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"While service was timely and wonderful, we found the food to be underwhelming and overpriced. When we ordered the Burrata at $23 we were expecting a nice full gooey ball but were presented with a piece smaller than the palm of my hand, and firm, almost like a solid piece of mozzarella.

The ricotta and basil pizza was very bland and when I ordered balsamic for it I was charged $2.
I found this very surprising as most Italian restaurants offer complimentary bread, balsamic and oil for dipping or at least balsamic as a table condiment.

The pizza oils were also not enjoyed and were extremely bland, though my partner did enjoy his pizza.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM1ie19uXYM9I7pRnejXciKl5uqTwQMaoCjGPE&fid=0x0:0xd63af9ffdfa7acd"],"When":"2024-7-23"},{"Name":"Elson K","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUQ4aX-YHOP73VzQpZrNKTgmqafj2rfORjtiK24wdAkeFQEgEv8Jg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Food was excellent. We ordered olives, pizzas, dip, and garlic prawns. All but the prawns were from the Happy Hour menu which had a very decent selection.

Service and ambience were good. The restaurant is spacious and modern. We sat in the patio which was lovely with plants and herbs. Live music may have made it even more pleasant than it already was but it was early. I liked that we could hear our own conversation even though the patio filled up quickly after 6pm.

Edgemont Village gets busy so come early to find limited free street parking. We were lucky to find a spot. I think we noticed free underground parking when we left, below the Thrifty's.

Overall, my whole family was happy with the birthday experience. We stuck with water and our bill averaged well under $30 per person after tax and gratuity. Definitely returning, as it now ranks up there amongst my favourite Italian restaurants.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP2C28rYEljvtHRBmZNpExTWtXXppR13shHuWhl&fid=0x0:0xd63af9ffdfa7acd"],"When":"2023-5-26"},{"Name":"Brittany","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUaTw3mnOK8l8haAjS6bfO1ye0bRyF4XKnDg89neYDPBoOw4QlgPQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"A neighborhood Italian restaurant in Edgemont Village - great service and delicious meatballs, pizza and pasta. Reasonably priced, decent portions and delicious food. We enjoyed everything we had.

Great for groups, dates and happy hour. We recommend this local spot for a nice dinner with friends and family.

To the owners:  You nailed the Dine Out experience compared to 90% of the restaurants. Great options, great value on the menu, incredible experience with no pressure to choose dine out or the regular menu üëå","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipORMwO74oBJCOAXu6UGD4B8yYq29r2hySloHtrz&fid=0x0:0xd63af9ffdfa7acd"],"When":"2024-2-1"},{"Name":"saleh amini","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU6s0g4ljB9eIwjeqSSHzHlCxqBQNLfGbD8UENx5Db9gn9B70sc=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Kind waiters, great taste, fast service.
We enjoyed good white wine at their happy hours with reasonable price üòâ","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP3j1g8Jy7BQGlDeInmET4jEks7V0UZwhFLVnrT&fid=0x0:0xd63af9ffdfa7acd"],"When":"2024-10-28"},{"Name":"David Greer","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIQ0SE1MsZYkv5BeLIemQE_kGUzHTaqIDn_fZc66s0iEf0TwQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"My wife and I like to include Edgemont in our Sunday walk and Bufala has a perfect brunch menu for our tastes. Unfortunately the service is mediocre and they just can‚Äôt get the coffee right. We were there two weekends in a row and the second time, we decided just to skip the coffee, it wasn‚Äôt worth the frustration, but sure enough the couple in front of us were complaining about their coffee being luke warm. Our eggs were cooked perfectly, but the overall meal is just not hot enough. It just seems that there is a lag time from kitchen to table.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Josephine Ma","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW4ctBP8R2rm9S8Aa5NyuULMapTvyTQYakS6AvI9Cd025oSy86H=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"With two locations and a third one looming on the horizon, Bufala Edgemont serves delicious Napolitana pizza and Italian food. Featured here:

Olives
Truffle Fries
Tuscan Bean Dip
Brussel Sprouts
Rigatoni
Margherita Pizza
Calabria Pizza
Spaghetti & Burrata

Didn't taste much truffle in the Truffle Fries and it smelled a bit too strongly of pecorino romano for some of us. My husband isn't too fond of cheese in general whereas myself and our daughter both love cheese. However, even she and I found the cheese to be a bit of a turnoff this time.

The pizza on the other hand could have done with a bit more cheese on it. We love ooey, gooey, stretchy cheese but there was no "cheese pull" to be had with these pizzas.

Aside from the cheese being too much or too little, we loved the food here. My husband said his Calabria Pizza was very tasty. My daughter and I enjoyed the flavor of the Margherita Pizza, and we all loved that the pizzas had a nice, crispy crust.

Earlier this year we had dined nearby at another pizza & pasta restaurant where the pizza crust had been quite disappointing so we were over the moon when we discovered how crispy the pizza crust was at Bufala.

There were these three bottles on the table. Each one contained a different flavor of oil which the server told us was meant to be eaten with the pizza. The green oil was a Rosemary Herb flavored oil, and this same oil had been on top of our Tuscan Bean Dip. We loved this oil! It tasted awesome on the Tuscan Bean Dip and wonderful with the pizza as well.

Spaghetti and Burrata was by far, my favourite dish of the evening. It's described as having  kale pesto, Italian burrata and toasted pumpkin seeds on it; I was very sure that I could also taste lemon in it although lemon wasn't mentioned on the menu.

This place is my new favourite for pizza & pasta on the North Shore, and I very much hope to dine here again sometime!

Service: Good
Parking: Free parking on the street
Location: 3280 Edgemont Blvd., North Vancouver","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipObCjhbk6DTklj5zuZLyhDdCubyJu9KTOna8SME&fid=0x0:0xd63af9ffdfa7acd"],"When":"2023-10-27"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Lindsey","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIQyiiuHF0JaSjARZCxihi-4Fx7BgEOAVHk6EXgUDyUKg2V47Q5=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Service was quick, attentive and not overbearing. Caprese salad was fresh and flavourful. The pizzas are amazing, the cook, crisp and crust are very good with great tomatoes. Lasagna perfectly seasoned. Glad we came.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMdwaNhcAiJ33WnE4mUorJ1lsqmZ08xDoRaKgsU&fid=0x0:0x5f22477537727e6d"],"When":"2024-9-4"},{"Name":"Josephine Ma","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW4ctBP8R2rm9S8Aa5NyuULMapTvyTQYakS6AvI9Cd025oSy86H=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Alberello Pizzeria is on 15th St. in North Vancouver, just off of Lonsdale. They serve both pizza and pasta in their restaurant.

We'd been to Alberello Pizzeria once a few years ago and I remember being super impressed with the pizza there, so when the family decided to go there for dinner again, I knew I would be ordering pizza again.

In addition to pizza, I also tried some of the Rucola salad which another member of the family had ordered. The grapefruit in it definitely gave it a pop of colour, and while grapefruit isn't exactly my favourite fruit when it comes to taste, I did enjoy the juiciness of the fruit.

I ordered the Grille Pizza which came with marinara sauce, mozzarella, roasted eggplant, roasted red pepper, zucchini, fresh parsley and chili oil. Pretty sure this was the same pizza I had ordered the first time we came to this restaurant.It was super tasty and they did a good job of roasting the vegetables on top. When I eat anything with eggplant on it, I always prefer my eggplant to be cooked until it has become very soft.

My daughter however ordered the exact same pizza as me, and for some reason the veggies were not as soft on her pizza; so while I very much enjoyed my food I think this restaurant needs to work a bit on consistency since my daughter's pizza wasn't quite as enjoyable as mine.

Service: Good
Parking: Free parking on the street
Location: 115 15th St., North Vancouver, BC","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNW55Jk43ZnmtT7Gi4igL_fAK_6ZvolshYvlLQz&fid=0x0:0x5f22477537727e6d"],"When":"2024-5-8"},{"Name":"Guillaume Bourassa","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUv5-8qIsaut-K6utIhDeGMPbJTZOfr1s0gwe_bvTCBfNFlG4y9=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Food was incredible. Authentic Italian cuisine made by the loveliest mamma italian. Came for the pasta and the carbonara SLAPS and the portion size was more than I expected. Definitely need to come back for the pizzas my wife and I will keep that place as a mandatory stop every time we come to North Van.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM87n-LA8ouTc72V5CHhuU_GIhGKTSzwrZihcWR&fid=0x0:0x5f22477537727e6d"],"When":"2024-5-4"},{"Name":"Zhi Su","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWIOR9QcmuN7xVMHRRZGlnxULc0lgkhWHVqVbkqx4LTpIv5_InbCw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great pizza here. Not super busy on a weeknight but I could see seating being an issue if it busy since it‚Äôs a relatively small restaurant with limited seating. The pasta was really good and they have a kids menu.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOW1VxR5hwh1SIVMaHlilcGXFCinvQREZq4vAch&fid=0x0:0x5f22477537727e6d"],"When":"2023-12-15"},{"Name":"Sadaf Radd","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIlLrZ8kxMwI7fe5MY1IUtv_WttoukcZXK4KkakvXhzqZh-hpI=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"I recently visited this place after seeing a sign for their grilled burger, called "burger zoghali." It looked like an Italian restaurant, so I was a bit surprised when I asked the manager, who seemed to be the owner, if they had burgers. He confirmed they did, but mentioned they didn‚Äôt have a menu for them yet.

I ordered a cheeseburger with fries and a glass of Josh Cabernet Sauvignon. The burger was pretty disappointing‚Äîjust a thin beef patty with basic toppings and pretty pink in the middle which it‚Äôs not food safe in British Columbia. I‚Äôd give it a 5 out of 10. When the bill came, I was shocked to see $19 for the burger, $9 for some McCain frozen fries, and $12 for the wine (which was the price for a 9 oz serving, not the 6 oz I got). $30 burger is normal for fine dine restaurants when you get a thick patty with homemade truffle fries and a 5 star service but for some frozen meal this was absolutely disgusting.

Overall, I felt blindsided and misled by the prices for such a mediocre meal. Just not worth it.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Dave thompson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLv9qU2DUqoQaXgTQ_3A5hcDqqoa0iPpGhZlJC8WHj2R5UgyQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"3 of us went there for dinner and all agreed this was the best pizza we ever tasted. These people pay so much attention to detail from the 00 flour used for crust to the little herb garden out front where they grow leaves for your mojito! Our waitress, Morgan, was friendly, witty and did an excellent job assisting with our selections. This place sets the standard and I can‚Äôt wait to go back! Diamond Dave","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Lisa Stewart","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWo79veLnsCvDCjha0TJoTathwJUFPajJepLVXdR9rXYCLOAi7D6A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Very enjoyable pizza and comfortable atmosphere.  Our server was attentive without being overbearing.  Prices for pizza‚Äôs are fair as they are quite large and very filling.  We ordered one pizza each for three of us and we all took 3 - 4 pieces home to enjoy the following day!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNyzvg2cpVoCmDipj1lKFkVmtTG_I_ZAEIKhqMY&fid=0x0:0x5f22477537727e6d"],"When":"2021-9-9"},{"Name":"Jason May","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV2jazgHbT_ic2wRpKdw0Yjdu_4eGP1C-GnvIUYckRRJ2OaSuprMw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"In a street known for pizza this place is a must visit. Absolutely amazing food, delicious drinks and fantastic staff!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPw4CZjGY-neju1Kwk_G9HAyE6_GSPfRTbfR5k3&fid=0x0:0x5f22477537727e6d"],"When":"2024-3-15"}]

[{"Name":"Pedro Henrique Munhoz","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVHDgrUCRxsDI0QiyVrXSpD7YMiIjCu4Myp-mN5MwWyO4s-k5hcIg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My experience at this restaurant was delightful. Everything, from the exceptional service to the high-quality food, impressed me. The staff were attentive and efficient, and the fish was incredibly fresh, which added to the authenticity of the Japanese cuisine. This place is a true find, and I‚Äôm already looking forward to visiting again on my next trip to North Vancouver.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM628lzEK2pb18TgZ6T4RF6JE1qlbxNu3YLBf4m&fid=0x0:0xe2db02c1114b2494"],"When":"2024-11-24"},{"Name":"Natsuki Suzuki","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXlUENsD2ZXm-cLUARx3nxjUGjMsa5_hVZ_uT_-JIguLScDRV6rtA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"As a Japanese person and also having worked at a top notch sushi restaurant in Roppongi, I am very strict about the quality of sushi.

I tried more than 10 places here in Vancouver but hamaei is truly the most authentic and the best!!!! (Also polite, friendly and professional staff ;))

My personal recommendation are toro taku, real crab roll, umejiso and hotate!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNkkaLAJ-819xSBpcy2hsyeIOWYf0lWVBTfxfX_&fid=0x0:0xe2db02c1114b2494"],"When":"2024-11-29"},{"Name":"Claire Yeom","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI4LiIwHOIkUmd8J_gC2coCugTHLUmITcUaZPk-id0f7fycUQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Hamaei is my FAVORITE spot in North Vancouver. I often dine in, but I also enjoy ordering takeout. Every time I have their food, I'm always impressed by the freshness of the sashimi and nigiri.

If you're a sushi lover looking for a restaurant on the North Shore, I definitely recommend Hamaei. Once you visit, you'll see why ‚òª","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMLJuo2PzSvLXfZUWj0sfnYRTH1l8OLmoekH8bT&fid=0x0:0xe2db02c1114b2494"],"When":"2024-9-23"},{"Name":"Green Green","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXvGkkQWLTgP6ZpLfyQFVTIZWmT7INBi5IdhvmkSI6w7pFFIwWw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"authentic Japanese restaurant with Japanese chefs. Amazing food quality and taste. Can't say anything else. just amazing.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOykZW1CkQWNMhTzN-cOpOQdp___k8pDxr_FPp6&fid=0x0:0xe2db02c1114b2494"],"When":"2024-10-25"},{"Name":"Hannah","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocImt4iW2NMcIImQXniRUnQBDhYrZ9cxmQ4QEP_drMINdByGn2k=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This place is THE SUSHI place in the north shore! I‚Äôve been going there for the past 25 years and it really hasn‚Äôt changed much. Fresh fish and excellent service brings me back here every time. It‚Äôs a must!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOTjTd4zveGlDdsrjLCIK31m4ZwklZy8EPis4dK&fid=0x0:0xe2db02c1114b2494"],"When":"2024-6-22"},{"Name":"Kyu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIXZ85Wf0rk3NhISiA0AX-0Z14hhXGxphfxl9eGZ5PS6gWxBP-q=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I can't get enough of Hamaei. Every time I visit, this restaurant consistently delivers the freshest and most delicious sushi I've ever had. The atmosphere is cozy, and the staff always makes me feel right at home. I think I'm addicted to this restaurant. Their Saikyo yaki is also a must-try.

Highly recommended for any sushi lover!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOa1zdYG3_3tyH53HU3axNPl3h0fhY_m18grxK8&fid=0x0:0xe2db02c1114b2494"],"When":"2024-7-5"},{"Name":"andrew","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjULEr6-8-BGjnYXOUg56ARLUF4pBRjTcc53Ml-upEt4SbEZ4EU=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"One of the oldest and best sushi spots on the north shore! Hamae never disappoints. Best quality fresh fish and friendly service. Highly recommend if you want authentic Japanese food and service!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"John S. Mai","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWY2Ep7ch7V2UQQStkfKRCyZc0k9VeqhcTlPhj83vVQx0-nqsPqiQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I was told this place has the best and most authentic japanese sushi on the north shore. And got to try it out for the first time with someone who frequents the restaurant for years. It definitely stood up to the status quo because it was amazing!! So fresh and unique, they know what they are doimg here! But be prepared to pay a bit more for quality. Not only did they have imported seafood from japan such as uni! But They even have imported beer! Okinawa beer!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOm-qugfRGqo27MFCW65h0XwSILanCc7YO5dV9x&fid=0x0:0xe2db02c1114b2494"],"When":"2023-9-4"}]

descriptions: Gluten-free Indian dishes & handmade breads in a spacious dining room, plus delivery service.

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Steven H.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXK62iJj1ZUFGa-U3A8AjtI1ckQk60_9MMp9OhTpvv0nDBllSzC=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Been here a couple times, always great.

Indian buffets - especially budget friendly ones - are quite rare these days in Vancouver and nearby, that is unless one heads to Surrey.

Clean, quality and tasty.

Around 4 appetizers and main 7-8 dishes.

Come give them a try, they only have buffet during lunch time.

Lunch buffet is great and at $18 a person, can‚Äôt go wrongüëç!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM8fcopDb2MqlCbKpvClqjCiIPirekz7ao_IkDt&fid=0x0:0x23d6e7eec137875b"],"When":"2024-10-1"},{"Name":"Selena Tuytel","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX9HO_TqF9PuUeRDOCG6oJQlYy_d9C_Kpg2LTWdOUuuc0dqhm8f=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We enjoyed a meal on the outdoor patio. Food was delicious and portions were good. Service was attentive...it seems like a lovely staff. We will be back with family and also want to try the buffett. The manager(?) was funny.
Recomm: lamb rogan josh, beef vindaloo, basmati rice, garlic naan, gulab jamun","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPCxurkFb4ROjqgUpdztyaGsxz8upfNI7X_m8LB&fid=0x0:0x23d6e7eec137875b"],"When":"2024-10-12"},{"Name":"Steven Olmstead","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWtGPLsUg7ybhRCsA9-VeVYuyaFqArSeyzqddnDm9gdPpsZ3M0=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"What an excellent dinner experience we had the other evening at Palki! Have ordered take away a couple of times and it's been very good, but dining in was much better.  Naan arrived straight from the oven, steel chafing dishes kept the food hot.  Mellow Indian music added ambiance.

We started with beef samosas.  Never had beef ones before and they were very tasty.  Tasted homemade.  For mains we had chicken Madras and mattar paneer.  The chicken was amazing, with a rich and spicy tomato sauce.  The mattar paneer was a first for us and we thoroughly enjoyed it.  To finish things off we split a pistachio ice cream which capped off the dinner very nicely.

Since we live only a block away, we will definitely be returning often.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO2ZZbwRBwfpVfsGftc7iH0NJliIxRK5qiSBRwW&fid=0x0:0x23d6e7eec137875b"],"When":"2024-8-31"},{"Name":"Britta Hawkins","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXd7QboozOaef-FhzH6SuH2RodFD1eBtcGD3P9KCwTgntSRfnX8=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I had the prawn coconut curry and my husband had the chicken madala + garlic naan and everything was incredible! We ate every single bite! It was so flavorful and the waiter was a gentleman- the atmosphere was quite romantic, and the music was really cool (hip hop) and we felt great eating there. We‚Äôd 1000% recommend it to all! Such a wonderful experience!! Try it!!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO1jra4W2pRkcq6yRyqmShIO3tCY5GYi_C5awdo&fid=0x0:0x23d6e7eec137875b"],"When":"2024-9-4"},{"Name":"faratalk","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXeLO1lEo0a069YHPWZJr76UTBNXLPPOdNfYSylJC_r_D-QRDk=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"What truly sets Palki Restaurant apart is the exceptional service. The staff were attentive, friendly, and genuinely cared about our dining experience. They made us feel welcome and treated us like family, ensuring that every need was met promptly and graciously.

Overall, Palki Restaurant exceeded my expectations in every way. If you're looking for authentic Indian cuisine in North Vancouver, this is the place to go. I highly recommend Palki Restaurant and look forward to returning soon for another unforgettable meal.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPB1QC8p7PMHeAYdORjXIyFu048rFFVfyMZxpC7&fid=0x0:0x23d6e7eec137875b"],"When":"2024-6-18"},{"Name":"Joe D","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLwZzMkzkHbWtd20GGopcaoCgS-lGQDqT-80-7UlYK6YyEF=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We have been patronizing this restaurant since 2006 and it wonderful to see how they have transformed into becoming the top Indian restaurant on the shore. Celebrated my mom's 90 birthday recently with family and friends. Priceless experience. Great food, amazing value and Rahul , the manager went beyond expectations to ensure that we had a wonderful time. Hands down the best Indian restaurant in North Van.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Victoria Alcuaz","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXszeF7wkseXxhETucpSDecl9a0ZO2LYPObjXOndlfhYJJl5WUA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Love, love, love, Palki's. We come almost every week for our fix and we are partial to their lamb methi, lamb saag, lamb vindaloo, fish tandoori, vegetable biryani and spinach naan. Oh, we love Rahul, too and chai tea. Atmosphere and service are excellent - North Shore's hidden gem!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP-pO_opTLXoHuZ7tKE5aYafTLI7Z7P52ihd7vp&fid=0x0:0x23d6e7eec137875b"],"When":"2024-2-19"},{"Name":"Chloe Rachel","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWgExGuK1W-XgQc1tPnrQlqQkWxCTaNhdz977uVTTY3zjpsAzs-=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Most people in my group came here for the all-you-can-eat lunch priced at $20. The selection included different chicken and beef options plus naan bread for the table. However, there are other a la carte options on their menu. I opted for something lighter with 2 vegetable samosas. They were warm with a crispy shell and served with some condiments for dipping. The service was average; no one really checked in on how we were doing, or gave much instruction after we were sat at our table. We did appreciate how not all members in the party had to get the all-you-can-eat, which meant that those with less appetite could order separately at the same table. Would recommend returning for the food!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPhpIQ9hNw_ya1fF0vHq69K3lZQnwtM7LZ-t6Pt&fid=0x0:0x23d6e7eec137875b"],"When":"2023-12-12"}]
