user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Nadir Zulqernain (Broker Nadir)","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWhEJmar-xPGvkChLjdSk0W2wzn9BfvbU7Rx_M524YyfDxob5mQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Indian Fusion is a delightful place at the North End of Upper Lonsdale, across from London Drugs.

The food was authentic, and cooked to perfection. Most delightful was the Tandoori Fish.

We shall definately return.

Update: 10/15/24 We returned for more great food. The highlight of this meal was Grilled Platter. It was the best marinated and grilled food I have had in years.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNq-iwtYhXXKSiykpnqOxHAr009YPaxLXKGlPsg&fid=0x0:0x702aff7908674cff"],"When":"2024-10-5"},{"Name":"Sheida B","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVY_3vfIu53b6zcNLQtWUQq0oJf2HkI_n4Ig63UjDD6u7pfjnXa=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I recently visited this Indian restaurant during my trip to Vancouver, and I was thoroughly impressed. The food was outstanding and exceptionally fresh. The mango lassi, in particular, was one of the best I‚Äôve ever had‚Äîabsolutely delicious. The ambiance was warm and inviting, creating a delightful dining experience. I highly recommend this place to anyone looking for authentic Indian cuisine and a pleasant atmosphere.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNVgM1OZOq2s00m3O8NkQvbN-C7T9zMaIsPRvU_&fid=0x0:0x702aff7908674cff"],"When":"2024-8-29"},{"Name":"G N","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIK8vq04Ld7ecfN3UXJngSzrlnaZhhARbZFpOnBa-SSVn8_Sw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"One of the best Indian foods I‚Äôve ever had! And I‚Äôve had manyüòÅ always fresh food, tasty, great quality, price is great for the quality and quantity. Very clean. Owners are welcoming and kind. I certainly recommend this place for delusions Indian. I live out of country and every time in Vancouver, this place is on the top of my list.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMQ3mYR0v8kn0uC6axTf1Kpga7OL0-TNJp9UXJ-&fid=0x0:0x702aff7908674cff"],"When":"2024-8-27"},{"Name":"April Heyman","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUzhK8ZI-LCFNEN2-quYoNjfEii33Wm3ajB65Q4iGUbScPkyz7w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I've probably already made a review about this place. It's the best Indian food on the shore. We've tried them all.
My favourite dish is the vegetable biryani. Packed with flavour and all types of vegetables. Every bite is a surprise. My other favourite is the lamb vindaloo. My family thinks it's really spicy so that means extra raita An extra lamb for me :-)
We always get the garlic naan and vegetable peas as well. Extra mint chutney. All their dishes are fantastic.
The photo I added is not very good. My
fianc√© dished up my food in a container because I was working lol","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNFH9-l-1tYgUw4pHixb_cf5jX0K338lhB-enmi&fid=0x0:0x702aff7908674cff"],"When":"2024-11-27"},{"Name":"Harshal Shah","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUiN57fk4KgqPiBdHOry-0lYuHSsf0LGxdgak2hZathqPSZUvB_og=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Excellent pricing of lunch special at 13.95! I had the vegetarian version and it had palak paneer, daal makhani, naan (I swapped it for roti), rice, curd and salad. The palak paneer is very tasty and paneer is super soft and fresh! I wish the daal makhani had more lentils but I can understand that given the price point. Would recommend the restaurant to add an option of a sweet dish for couple bucks more.
Will definitely visit again for a la carte menu and try other options.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM7X3t9QvE9r_hV5mxFXE9OOXZbJpHesSZuyJkO&fid=0x0:0x702aff7908674cff"],"When":"2024-10-14"},{"Name":"B Campbell","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXG-AFIhXFz7kzMW1D6sAVQDc-xumMScnMFMoV4h79FM1tJjWI8=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great friendly service and seriously delicious food. I could eat the entire meal over again! The Chicken Palak was very tasty and the chicken was really tender. We had a a vegetarian with us and there were lots of options for him. He loves the Dal Makhani - orders it every time. The Mutter paneer was good too.
Our only suggestion for improvement is that the interior could do with something to dampen the sound as it quite noisy when the restaurant is busy.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPr0I5zOe9Y0b1N4ma-ryJC44281UHwP3_AjL7W&fid=0x0:0x702aff7908674cff"],"When":"2024-8-23"},{"Name":"Fair Review","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLhwkh4P_LiG8B2hSQNbVvq0cI63jDqwXDWBJ2ln071MkYm_Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"After 10 years of enjoying this place, I can confidently say it‚Äôs my favorite for Indian cuisine! While it may not be very traditional, the flavors are absolutely delicious and incredibly satisfying. Every dish I've tried has been tasty and full of unique twists that keep me coming back for more. If you love Indian food and are looking for something different yet delicious, I highly recommend giving this place a try! You won‚Äôt be disappointed!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Vanessa L","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJn5-wWxex9aO-Mi9xid8mfp6Oc29KrF3vWBmCWD0VaoF9BhSw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"the fish curry and roti are incredible as well as being dairy free and vegan respectively! the butter chicken and garlic naan are 10/10 according to my husband and the portions are healthy! service is fantastic too and quite fast","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Shiva Radmanesh","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX50D30SjZBR4QvfRxKL45XQxTtaGKOp6R4BwFd5j_tfXu-Hq4=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"We visited Hidra last night and had a great time! The staff were friendly, and the food was fine. We ordered the 'Maghz o Zaban' sandwich, and it did not disappoint. The place has a Persian vibe and decor that made us feel like we were back at a sandwich shop in Iran.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPEW3C_257AQshpjpN0USRS0fOA2g8PsYyDBdhh&fid=0x0:0x996a9a92dec6bd16"],"When":"2024-10-4"},{"Name":"Shahbaz Salehi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWsbgr6SmAPEhFmhmcaR78qqYW_wrDDZL7lwNuJ2NTZt_LiQl41=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Very clean restaurant. The service was amazing and the sandwiches were perfect. This is a very cute restaurant that serves nostalgic Persian sandwiches. It‚Äôs a cutely designed restaurant and it‚Äôs very clean. I highly recommend them.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOErn74Pt7sZgH0hLUznE03uML4RYzGdfG0SzQh&fid=0x0:0x996a9a92dec6bd16"],"When":"2024-8-22"},{"Name":"Atena Razmpoush","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWDTwnpwsyCMQv83dsdwlkz2BAvureQHzZZxo2_BIzfjtUBCR_R=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Super clean kitchen, tasty old-school Persian sandwiches, friendly staff, and nostalgic interior design.
We ordered Makaroni sandwich, Lamb tongue and brain sandwich, with their special Chicken Beef Burger sandwich.
Both were lovely, specially the brain-tongue.

The new sandwich ‚ÄúRoast beef with mushroom‚Äù was the best. It‚Äôs not on the printed menu yet, but you can order it.

Thank you for the service, keep what you‚Äôre doing!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP4N8s8EoKNkqvkd5cHQTTvcBQcC0pU9zPuKHoP&fid=0x0:0x996a9a92dec6bd16"],"When":"2024-3-13"},{"Name":"Fatemeh Sayadi (Tisha)","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUT0iXGjcmugjaf-sxnw_j5g7IpzISbK9kqKoWSQpUn_JCfvpEr=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"It has a nice variety of nostalgic Persian meals.

The Hidra special sandwich has chicken, burger, pickles and parsley, the toppings are the best, loved the chicken, the burger could be better though.

Bandari‚Äôs taste was nice and lovely. The portions are a bit smaller in comparison to the price.

The best thing about the sandwiches was the bun which was great, I don‚Äôt know if it was made in the restaurant or bot but it was perfect.

The special fries had mushrooms and dipped in cheddar cheese, it was nice.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPtaOv7WFzLNNvqTuhb2NvBmVZYAxgUWWfa3Klo&fid=0x0:0x996a9a92dec6bd16"],"When":"2022-12-11"},{"Name":"Andrew Walsh","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXnj4Reg2j3wZl_BVrZ8m0PZKz0M07-hvm4YX8hpgCoK4r8GHPb=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This was my first experience having a Persian sandwich and it did not disappoint! The Kotlet, Chicken, and Special Tandoori Ham were all delicious. Fresh soft bread and you can tell that great care went into the selection of ingredients for these delicious creations.

Looking forward to trying more in the future!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNeXVa_XBza53Cj5sI62UZnzA8nVOSlyPnr_btA&fid=0x0:0x996a9a92dec6bd16"],"When":"2024-7-7"},{"Name":"omid gholami","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXGCb0CGU4hU_axOltnzEe_xi71C_rO5LrLIN363P8bHtOlVHyC=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Nice design and atmosphere. Staff were really kind and respectful. For Iranian people the menu is quit nostalgic. I loved the way that they served the sandwiches. Brain and tongue sandwich was really tasty, also Bandari sandwich was great. I haven‚Äôt eat the special fries with mushrooms and cheese since we moved to Canada. I love that. I can say the price is almost reasonable with respect to the recent inflation in Vancouver.

Really recommend. At least you should try it once.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPEDld40_Of8Cy83Iki4Rzqkq7MJ358REdyLLk-&fid=0x0:0x996a9a92dec6bd16"],"When":"2023-2-20"},{"Name":"Rojan Javid","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU5a5V1XXPAk1QEKUvR_bnkhWEoAgtgrwXpqrFEP-DhIGVECzRL=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I wish there was a location in Toronto!! Their sandwiches are hands down the best and full of flavour. The place itself is very cozy and the staff are friendly. The portions are great and the bread doesn‚Äôt fall apart. There are lots of different options to choose from. We got a chance to try their fries as well with their special sauce which was perfect! Looking forward to trying more of their sandwiches during my next visit. Hope to see a location open in Toronto!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMBmokyQ6d3yliOF3Tp8R57Fv1SPcDmsF4v3Arg&fid=0x0:0x996a9a92dec6bd16"],"When":"2023-10-17"},{"Name":"Saeed Mirshekari","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWsMIZ0llu8KhQDjzcHVEnYvO-NmQHMivRM2algBKLhWD2rZhK_=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great people, great food! Unique atmosphere. A must-check-out in Vancouver. I‚Äôd come back!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN49H_FZqIK0hu8-r_6e2-irCWnmKNu7xvGtUpa&fid=0x0:0x996a9a92dec6bd16"],"When":"2024-8-6"}]

[{"Name":"Soefae Chen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWO7ZNgUf5Dwk1W_QTwOUDH5IE-lT_O8VF-ftw5oM5hbRZ-8oOz=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Came with a few friends, and the servers were super friendly and chill. Great wraps made with warm fresh meats. Nice and clean, a little chilly because they kept the windows open, but it‚Äôs understandable considering the roasting chicken and beef.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOHEVoMWmUJoWX-7uFMSskt3mQayv_UxjISYRs5&fid=0x0:0x82a9ddfcf55a1211"],"When":"2024-1-22"},{"Name":"Akram Hashdari","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVCdjEMM8SEkgqT6zwDRopN3ZZOWIhUoq-OxxdRTqaESsIOFNSxTQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"If you're craving fresh, healthy, vegetarian food in a peaceful environment with positive vibes and great prices, Lonsdale Best Falafel is the spot to visit. The taste is as authentic as it gets‚Äîtruly capturing the original flavor of Lebanese falafel. Highly recommended!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Raif Weston - Real Estate Services","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXgo3Awp_AeJN_a9cowvplRMkyhJUWl-z6wC4NgW9IYMfv2A1HHtg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"1st time here & the chicken shawarma plate was amazing, I couldn't fault it. Such great flavours from everything and the music takes you straight to the Middle East. Highly recommended!

I just returned to make sure the chicken shawarma plate was still amazing and it was even better than before! The char on the chicken was delicious and it was more food than I could eat. Absolutely amazing üëè","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNf8v5Z3YKTR6hvtYl83ZKfMIn9oKvebesSSV2t&fid=0x0:0x82a9ddfcf55a1211"],"When":"2022-10-5"},{"Name":"Georgia Campbell","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXG5Lck04a7WApEkamCJTik_GXzCj9C5fH6GktQHR94rUzxHkx7=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My go to place for excellent meal that never disappoints. The staff are lovely always very friendly and kind and always do their best to make sure I leave a very happy and no longer hungry customer. Their chicken shawarma wrap with all the fixings is my all time favourite. Always tastes fresh, chicken is rich with flavour and just a little crispy on the edges and the sauces just tie it all together, and for an added special bonus if you‚Äôre extra hungry I recommend adding the fried halloumi to the wrap for the extra cheesy richness. Also highly recommend the fruit drinks mango is my favourite. I‚Äôd recommend this place to anyone it‚Äôs just that good. See you soon best falafel, you always leave me wanting to come back again for more.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Roxana Albusel","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX8evtGokfiNno0vtrcTLJlyoINs1rXQMg92lDyK8UbX_CRFgf4=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I love Best Falafel so much, the food is always amazing, the staff there is sooooo very kind and friendly, I've never had one bad experience.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMKRq0FxHJw4JR3960_X-GwYkN7YpVyUAc5JdCi&fid=0x0:0x82a9ddfcf55a1211"],"When":"2024-7-24"},{"Name":"__","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjURtewwsqVG5PO3uKPn3OOA0FnfaP0WZtSfpikwyWKQHm8YamdS=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"After hiking nearby at Deep Cove I wanted lunch someplace nearby the Superchargers, and fortunately I found this place.

Falafels are cooked when you place your order so they are hot & fresh. Hummous, tabouleh, greek salad also fresh and delicious.

I woud highly recommend for a quick falafel lunch.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPmCzok1YWkDxSOVTAUIHSJrHQsfkHzs4j_N9BE&fid=0x0:0x82a9ddfcf55a1211"],"When":"2023-8-14"},{"Name":"Lisa Stewart","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWo79veLnsCvDCjha0TJoTathwJUFPajJepLVXdR9rXYCLOAi7D6A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Very tasty Shawarma and Falafel!  Fresh ingredients, friendly staff and fair prices.  Their falafel patties are heart shaped...that is worth going for alone!  I have been waiting for a shawarma place to open on Lonsdale and I am so glad they are here.  We have been back twice in three days!  Delicious!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMCoyVUhwv1cq0OBQOZ0_h2hpbfhg61ix24Q3SW&fid=0x0:0x82a9ddfcf55a1211"],"When":"2021-4-5"},{"Name":"Neda Bayat","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVmE0FyC2LyuC1YT443vrY_Hz-PouKHJf8wsmur31Dew1f28ERe=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Best Falafel is literally the best in North Vancouver. The falafel and veggie plates were both tasty and the right proportion.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNEXG6phG0Q_N56OYo83cP9LlBxaTShj5BbN2Aw&fid=0x0:0x82a9ddfcf55a1211"],"When":"2023-5-30"}]

[{"Name":"Melanie Dekker","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVZWOVby0mjxg_a0S6eqeAGCK2KQNcgM-5_mfCOxgIdTCNbKSq_=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Where else can you get an excellent meal, with a fabulous atmosphere, AND a dog friendly 1/2 indoor patio at 10:30 PM in North Vancouver!? This is it- an oasis! And meanwhile thier menu is extensive!  Wine was chilled, water was served with ice and a lemon wedge, table and floor were clean, lighting was good (soft and a pub vibe),, and there was lots of fresh water in a nearby dog bowl. So fabulous all round that I‚Äôm writing this at midnight!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO9jX3aAwMJgwNJdV4nD9njcVgaai7Lm6wLMwB1&fid=0x0:0x3b54814131d2b632"],"When":"2024-8-4"},{"Name":"Anthony Wong","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU8y-iBHJnCSFubkfBNOVL_UU39pQSSYxw_jDvo0eweHGXm-bpozQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"This is a great neighbourhood pub! The staff are friendly and the food is good! The Yorkshire pudding entr√©e is a real belly buster! Lots of roast beef and mashed potatoes! The selection of beers is great too!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP1cvJ-31UkwkWYoNHn1r8CgPOOq1mvdSnor_0f&fid=0x0:0x3b54814131d2b632"],"When":"2024-8-29"},{"Name":"Andrea","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIAhvNMWHr7NtAX3wxOXDIVmhGcKMtW5Tp0g5bVWE6YLRKHpZ0S=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I order to go .

Well , it was my first time trying their food . Very disappointed . Ordered a ceviche , and it was tuna turned into pico de gallo with nachos , washed up in a horrible salty lime like sauce ‚Ä¶ hideous !!!

The onion soup was the worst part, completely unappetizing looking , it looked like dog food, with a can tasted flavour and just not great.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPWLYMnilF9KH1RvAsAYlJaNlqVrIo90UZLx84S&fid=0x0:0x3b54814131d2b632"],"When":"2024-6-26"},{"Name":"Rajin Basi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK5LvMuceQXro1vKFYkHC15xH-KgMj9Bz5hUYe-FTQhCGTqxQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I visited last week with my family and we had a great experience. The food was delicious (try the beef dip), the atmosphere was amazing for the hockey game and our Server Ember went above and beyond to make sure everything was taken care of. Highly recommend for anyone looking for a place in North Van to watch the game with family and unwind.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Smokedoutmotions","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVoFOvi24k4rG06J_myJfKotur7-1AnJeQByYtl1P3iU61FVb5h=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Date night. Was chill. Good neighborhood spot. Food always fire. We asked our server to be a little more attentive to her section next time. We still tipped proper for her great attitude. Recommend üëçüèΩ","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOwS0yRN8Zhb3NypV1dI1XqYS0k-syuHLvZ8JQp&fid=0x0:0x3b54814131d2b632"],"When":"2024-5-25"},{"Name":"Gazal MN","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVxiM9vbWvs6L14I9BW2Up8YaSQRQZ2rpd1FPfeC9zqMZoQYig0=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Delicious and filling!
The Yorkshire Pudding is to die for. I would highly recommend to check this out.
I had roast beef, mashed potatoes, and veggies which all come in a Yorkshire Pudding and of course a cup of gravy which was divine. The perfect takeaway dinner!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOHay8zVBDCf4jVjonSMwY72D6SdX2uiKnAGhz4&fid=0x0:0x3b54814131d2b632"],"When":"2024-5-1"},{"Name":"Tag Mata","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVBCJgNx5xhYWW7pA1EXXxar_Zv9Iz1E_0Gv6BrqTndlA-iZiOx=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Server needed training. Didn‚Äôt know specials when asked. Drinks sat empty until asked for refills. Food was terrible. Untoasted clubhouses that went soggy from wet vegetables in the sandwich. Nachos came late, we‚Äôre cold, cheese had already hardened and they used this chicken that seemed like tuna fish. Spoke with manager, he tried to convince us to settle with desserts and a round of shots. We asked for the disappointed dishes to be removed from the bill and he removed 15% off bill. Not happy won‚Äôt be back.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Michel Slayer","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV_zPxX2_jhqWM5_IjeTswzIQArZpEYD6VJhcY6Re5ulZS8ckfk=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Overpriced menu. Food has gone downhill big time. If you want a cold pint and to watch the game, this place gets the job done but that‚Äôs it. Stay away from the food. Hopefully they will read this and do something. Kitchen needs a serious kick in the pants.","Images":null,"When":""}]

[{"Name":"Lee Van","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUkdc0b5WROtpnJCruJpetIegq6Snt_2bGm0A5pSa9cqY1SCXL5=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"My partner and I came here for dinner a few weeks ago. He ordered the teriyaki set A and I ordered a veggie combo which includes cucumber, avocado and yam rolls. The service was good and the food was yummy. The restaurant wasn't too busy so we didn't have to wait. We had some leftovers and asked for a take out container. We were asked to pay for this. Overall, we had a good time and we will be back.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO6m-_Ef_sEoYu9l8Kw__Hz527kwENDzdo3E8d6&fid=0x0:0x54af63e105f36f8a"],"When":"2024-8-15"},{"Name":"Thedishdetective Lala","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKD_tj6k6xpF8R8uVmPtHQuGBgjvefVOKaKmqeE1mkWnmvdyA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"JL Sushi & Kitchen
Location: 140 Lonsdale Ave, North Vancouver, BC V7M 2E8

Overview:
Located on Lonsdale Avenue in North Vancouver, JL Sushi & Kitchen offers a range of Japanese-inspired dishes in a casual dining setting. During our visit, we experienced a variety of items, each showcasing different aspects of the restaurant‚Äôs culinary approach. While the meal had its highlights, some dishes left room for improvement.

Service:
Upon arrival, we were promptly greeted by the hostess and seated without delay. The service throughout the meal was attentive and friendly, with our waitress making sure we were well taken care of. This level of hospitality certainly enhanced the dining experience.

Rating : 8/10

Foods:

‚Ä¢	Tako Wasabi:
The Tako Wasabi featured seasoned octopus paired with a hint of wasabi. The balance between the savory flavors of the octopus and the sharp kick of wasabi was well-executed. However, the accompanying seaweed portion was somewhat sparse, limiting its potential as a balanced side element. Despite this minor shortcoming, the dish was enjoyable and satisfying.

Rating: 8/10

‚Ä¢	JL Poke Bowl (Brown Rice & Avocado):

The poke bowl, featuring brown rice and avocado, was underwhelming. While the ingredients were fresh, the portion was smaller than expected, and the overall flavor profile lacked the depth found in similar dishes at other establishments. There was nothing particularly memorable about the dish, and it didn‚Äôt stand out amidst the other offerings.

Rating: 6/10

‚Ä¢	Lonsdale Crossing Roll:
This roll combined prawn and yam tempura with cream cheese and crab meat, topped with avocado and a special house sauce. The flavors were rich and well-balanced, with the creaminess of the avocado and crab working harmoniously with the crispy tempura. The special sauce added a delightful finishing touch, making this one of the more successful dishes of the evening.

Rating: 8/10

‚Ä¢	Katsu Don:
The Katsu Don, featuring deep-fried breaded pork and egg served over rice with Japanese soup stock, was another strong dish. The pork was perfectly fried, maintaining a crisp texture while remaining tender inside. The seasoning was well-balanced, and the dish as a whole was comforting and flavorful.

Rating: 8/10

‚Ä¢	Oyster Motoyaki:
Unfortunately, the Oyster Motoyaki was the least enjoyable dish of the night. The dish was overly dominated by mayonnaise-based sauce, which masked the flavor of the oysters. Compared to similar offerings at other Japanese restaurants, this rendition was disappointing. The portion was served in a platter-style presentation, and the overall taste failed to impress.

Rating: 4/10

Ambiance:
The ambiance of JL Sushi & Kitchen is functional but not particularly remarkable. While the space was clean and comfortable, there was nothing about the decor or atmosphere that stood out or elevated the dining experience. It‚Äôs a suitable spot for a casual meal, but it lacks the visual or experiential elements that might make it more memorable.

Price:
The prices were reasonable given the quality and quantity of food. While some dishes didn‚Äôt quite meet expectations, the pricing was in line with similar restaurants in the area, making it an affordable option for those seeking Japanese cuisine.

Verdict:
Overall, JL Sushi & Kitchen provides a decent dining experience, with a few standout dishes alongside some that could use improvement. The service was a definite highlight, and the reasonable pricing makes it a viable option for those in the area. While there were some disappointments, particularly with the Oyster Motoyaki, I would consider returning to explore more of the menu, especially given the quality of the Katsu Don and Lonsdale Crossing Roll.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP5Oh7RTFBdyeUWPm-wxLwQippuMA9bLnbi7hVu&fid=0x0:0x54af63e105f36f8a"],"When":"2024-9-17"},{"Name":"Chloe Genargue","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWcB97SzXsMD6panoq_G9yq28plXwWkj0h7AznJw7Xc37ypMfg5=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"A few blocks away from where I work. So convenient to grab a quick and affordable lunch Sets.
You are getting the quality of what you‚Äôre paying.
A massive portion and selection for the Lunch Sets.
I ordered my set with the Salmon, it was pretty dry. But still okay to eat.
I love the dynamite roll and the tempura.

The servers were so pleasant and friendly.
Glad to know Lower Lonsdale has a great neighborhood restaurants to dine.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO1m70A5jk3lJF9GJXlBuekgHn8oa91SGq8r8WL&fid=0x0:0x54af63e105f36f8a"],"When":"2024-3-20"},{"Name":"D S","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUiwZP5uC5CzBgSahQQVkTqGSd5rHWgB0GVCkCWen4FIy1S7JRp=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great sushi store! It got busy at lunch so it's not a secret that it's a gem.

[{"Name":"Amy Watt","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXtFx0Lt1_G_UCsXyvg1o5eSDevhehAM8wUiop0lPf09tXNft4k=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Best sushi on the North Shore! This place is always such a treat, and I can‚Äôt stop raving about it. Their salmon and avocado truffle oshi is my absolute go-to‚ÄîI would eat it multiple times a week if I could. Their party trays are perfect for larger groups and are reasonably priced for the quality. The restaurant is in a beautifully restored heritage house, and the staff are always so welcoming. I love dining in, but I often order online too‚Äîit‚Äôs fantastic no matter how you enjoy it! We need more places like Green Leaf on the North Shore. Don‚Äôt walk‚Äîrun!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOViveDtJgF_40X8mflw1qwddYvUTdamVOPMUaZ&fid=0x0:0x87b9d2f18f1161f0"],"When":"2024-8-23"},{"Name":"Gemma Boothroyd","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUYT33iilC0hUrH_Kx1DApSbirTimOoVbSL3BKh-5kba7gU_FY=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Oh me oh my, what a spot.

The oshi here is tremendous - and incredibly affordable for good sushi. The quantities are generous (I‚Äôve never seen more tuna in a tuna roll than I did here at Green Leaf, and I‚Äôve had a loooot of tuna rolls‚Ä¶), the service is warm and generous too.

We also had the avocado salad, not pictured here, but was fresh and flavourful as a starter! Was filled to the brim with avocado. Again, they proved they‚Äôre not skimping out in ingredient quantity and quality!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNFHwhTJOWnSOWsNmElBYj64fyVhyYYqGxm9Wku&fid=0x0:0x87b9d2f18f1161f0"],"When":"2024-7-18"},{"Name":"Chris Smithson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV7ZPoi52jJsVk3YfvB72BCAyHy11qZAAdFY0afBmDsM-cd3x8C-A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Flavourful aburi sushi, A+ plating/presentation, but far too much oil is used, and the fish is over seared on top to the point where the entire piece of fish is cooked.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPV9YdWGMLMPNS1z4HCmIhdvdkYlKhK7Fr12re_&fid=0x0:0x87b9d2f18f1161f0"],"When":"2024-7-24"},{"Name":"Angie","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIyUjdZQkz0bhaDppuQsySaOzrLROWSfhKe7zzOgxtMex30Fg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Came here for the first time - got their aburi platter - 6 rolls, 38 pieces, very filling. We liked it all except for the saba. The shrimp with pesto sauce is interesting, our favourite is the yukke tuna. All the rest are pretty standard aburi. We also ordered tako wasa - not enough wasabi.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPB9wOOqubk9BDalNOEqiHfH9k9jhe_4VFdEn-J&fid=0x0:0x87b9d2f18f1161f0"],"When":"2024-8-29"},{"Name":"LACH","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVvoWLiWB1v-C_K87w2FdiHuLSxuwdlRyOdAjMTwOJj7KtAzibI=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Phenomenal service. Waitress came over and ask each time new dish was delivered how was the food. They also refill the water 5 times without us asking.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPBwJ6_J75WVlDSCTnfsw6rpP6gI_e0DSvlp63r&fid=0x0:0x87b9d2f18f1161f0"],"When":"2024-9-8"},{"Name":"NewHigh Parallel","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWjGO8VbIakxKr3On9Tn2qzWGaPgevfkQ3K1opqLsNKWVaIhT3A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Recently, a friend and I had the pleasure of dining at Green Leaf Sushi, and it was an experience worth sharing. Opting for their Signature Aburi Platter, we embarked on a culinary journey that left us thoroughly impressed.From the moment we stepped into the restaurant, we were greeted with a warm and inviting atmosphere. The sleek yet comfortable ambiance set the stage for a memorable evening. The staff were attentive and friendly, ensuring that our dining experience was nothing short of exceptional.Now, let's talk about the sushi. Each piece on the platter was a delightful fusion of flavors and textures. The expertly seared fish added a unique depth that complemented the freshness of the ingredients. It was evident that the chefs took great pride in their craft, and it showed in every bite.What truly stood out about our visit was the perfect balance of sophistication and approachability. The restaurant manages to deliver top-notch sushi without any pretense, making it an ideal spot for both casual diners and sushi enthusiasts alike.In conclusion, our experience at Green Leaf Sushi exceeded our expectations on every level. From the impeccable food to the welcoming atmosphere, it's a dining destination that I wouldn't hesitate to recommend. Whether you're in the mood for a casual night out or a special occasion, Green Leaf Sushi delivers an unforgettable experience.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPcrgkCG6X9PC3RvsndGzDXJPA9OqQqQ1SvalbU&fid=0x0:0x87b9d2f18f1161f0"],"When":"2024-3-9"},{"Name":"Foodie Vancouver","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX6n06QAfqStqer1ZgBILsv-fiSHmrGRZuznSS1ny9iQFfb_Ognuw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The taste is as good as always, but perhaps due to inflation, the fish fillets are getting smaller. It might taste even better with a bit more sauce.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP9qEwmBh3xmeru72n25Kslk0KCfnJE8p2GhHQF&fid=0x0:0x87b9d2f18f1161f0"],"When":"2024-8-6"},{"Name":"Nuri OHN (KR_Rainmaker)","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWd1SudyL65jPyPeWcgId_TpUHmrUxBGmrxLFn_PEYkRm-9dk-A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"No complaints and perfect. It was our first time to visit and have a lunch. Taste and interior were awesome. We ordered Aburi platter. It was more ideal for 3 to 4 person. We brought half to home. Next time for sure, I will tip more. Sorry for being cheap today. If I tip afterward, I would pay more than I actually tipped today.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPfD6HY5lC7wdLbJJPl-v-82BQR6qyeLZPQEtCQ&fid=0x0:0x87b9d2f18f1161f0"],"When":"2024-3-5"}]

Of course, I recommend this place... !üëå","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPsZqsdIy-7ogWLdChVXYfQuSVHH1_XZPJ1umR-&fid=0x0:0x9e25b86dc6e87aa7"],"When":"2024-9-1"},{"Name":"Cindy Ly","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIzge4iM_AthUe2Y8lEMYg2Y2ExA0fMxlIza7QeGpuo6ooWkw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"First time trying this place out. They had a mix of korean fusion brunch. We went with a total of 4 girls each ordered a different drink to try. Most of the lattes were made very well not overly sweet. Service seemed understaffed. The waitress tried to memorize our order . I did remind her maybe to jot it down because we had a lot of different things.  Some things were missed or wrong but they did give us a free dessert as an apology, which was nice. Overall the steak bulgogi was really well cooked and I would order it again. The yuzu cronut which was free wasn't worth it, texture was overly hard and didn't have much of a yuzu flavor. Forgot to add a must order is the churros. Soft and warm with a dipping caramel.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNkchqxH7o_L19kr3BKTx9ZWBFyMydGrn_EGwhy&fid=0x0:0x9e25b86dc6e87aa7"],"When":"2024-8-30"},{"Name":"T T","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJs0oODkAvERBrISWp0p0g8VwGTl5VkzY9pryevrrHLRPDFdg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"This is really cute location in North Vancouver and is much nicer than their previous location in Vancouver. Lots of paid parking available nearby. The menu has changed a lot since I visited the Vancouver location and they have a lot of interesting options. I ordered normal brewed coffee to start and it took almost as long as our food did to come out. It looks like the bar makes all the caffeinated beverages but I don‚Äôt understand why the coffee took so long given it was in a carafe. The beans in the classic breakfast had a really odd spice to them and potato rosti was mushy. I really wanted to like the food but I would not return given the high price and slow service.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPg4FZOVYTxrNiFGU6mP8nqt1au7ewenZ5iz_lv&fid=0x0:0x9e25b86dc6e87aa7"],"When":"2024-12-1"},{"Name":"ei thu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWzOxHVYADzF2AMZ42zJKG6AVHbpHJoM4wSsT2_XxvbDNzql2br=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Highly recommended for the tasty bites! Servers are friendly and courteous. Had pulled pork and steak. Both are soo delicious with great presentation! Their raspberry cuffin is so yummy too.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPlq4SzYJR9_xFW5w_OVlRw0STvtFkiXg-YPXhX&fid=0x0:0x9e25b86dc6e87aa7"],"When":"2024-9-25"},{"Name":"Samantha Godin","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKZxwefvF8-bu-GmtrH0BSkuhWoCtcdh_v6BkVIyeFSHrqf=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Recommend you stop in for a bite here while you explore everything that North Vancouver has to offer. Love the atmosphere and vibe of this cute little corner restaurant. Food was delicious, had the Belt and my friend had the Salmon bagel, service was quick and friendly. Will definitely be coming back to try their Happy Hour specials as I was tempted by their selection of mimosas and margaritas.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNaHMYzh2mwKZbcdBPzlkOIxA5eckpA2FhNiqM&fid=0x0:0x9e25b86dc6e87aa7"],"When":"2024-8-1"},{"Name":"Rosie","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJz4H1tL3T9Bs6UQSB5pP6-85rCn7xVEwV4-7OXBlfK_rocGA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We came here for brunch, and I must say the food was delicious. The potato rosti was so good that we had to order a second one. The lemon French toast is so good and filled with delicious berries. The waffle and the chicken was absolutely delicious as well. I will definitely be coming back for other options.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO7CaOtydFCtvDfCgeJFy34VJI7MMOMD4FT8SWH&fid=0x0:0x9e25b86dc6e87aa7"],"When":"2024-10-30"},{"Name":"Vivian","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK5oIohR4fUBBrbBee_LLq3WUW8Q6ENGMJVFgSz8SVr8PH9Ag=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Came here for brunch on a weekday and it was very easy to make a reservation online. The interior is so chic and clean. Service was great and staff were friendly. They answered our questions on the menu clearly. We got the
-ICED HOJICHA PASSION LATTE
-BLACK SESAME LATTE
-KFC DUTCH BABY BAKED PANCAKE
-SALMON GRAVLAX BAGEL
-CAULIFLOWER BENNY
-PULLED BBQ PORK SHOULDER BENNY

Definitely try to KFC Dutch baby baked pancake, it's unique and taste good. Although the bagel only comes in half, but they were very generous with the smoked salmon so I was pretty full.
Cauliflower benny was very delicious as well. We also ordered their croissants. The hazelnut one was so good! I wish we bought more to take home. We spent more than an hour there and the vibe was just so relaxing. I will definitely come back!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN1h8uoGIefGrB77FpJPvYzE2Ov0pr9Fv3mRo1g&fid=0x0:0x9e25b86dc6e87aa7"],"When":"2024-8-25"}]

[{"Name":"Gordon Kwong","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKKjDehFqHA5ZT74ZkeWTLjTUZu8GTq7uesQO3c1SQIt6zn0Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"A reasonable dim sum lunch is available with a good selection. Service is welcoming and friendly. The congee was fresh and well flavored. Good range of dumplings. Radish cake was a bit soft because of too much radish vs rice flour and was not as tasty as others. Not really any other place on the north shore.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPg4UKSbac5EnAJwx1e5Lexdv26OYnS1Scz7wwg&fid=0x0:0x541cf97cc364a52e"],"When":"2024-5-14"},{"Name":"Daulton ‚ÄúVaikael‚Äù Potvin","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX6PdyI1jn-pcl2-JoCYm7Pczwh1ls0AOaOg8qyH_DeAP9uhdYV-g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Homey Chinese Food

Great stop in the West Vancouver/North Vancouver Area

Food: Always great, fresh, homey, generous portions.

"I always try a new dish everything I go and I've yet to have a bad dish."

Service: Accommodating & prompt.

Tables: a bit more space would be nice, tables for groups are great but smaller 2 or 4 person tables feel a bit too close for my taste.

Atmosphere: Feels like it's always busy, but it is fairly normal.

**I recommend you try the deep fried fish w/ garlic&salt, simply amazing!!**","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN8cDpW7pTfuzvyayJ11JCsUI_Il0NSKCtSrqin&fid=0x0:0x541cf97cc364a52e"],"When":"2024-4-9"},{"Name":"Kanako Sakurada","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKYybgPjG_d3LYq66Ui47Ocd_2PMrfkKaju5V_L0IyVTR19lQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The best dim sum on north shore! This Cantonese restaurant has been around for decades. Their foods are solid and consistent though you can find same calibre easily on the other sides of bridges. Still great when it takes more than 30 minutes sometimes to get to either bridge nowadays‚Ä¶.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMqogq12Ey9w0YeGNfRv_7g0TA7payEq0RDWJ-0&fid=0x0:0x541cf97cc364a52e"],"When":"2023-4-17"},{"Name":"applejuicecanada","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXHErTmrB60RPBz4XP-6fRmpiJU2y708fqI8tMQU3GMWVs-YK6C=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Great to be back! Having been away from this restaurant for a few years, I‚Äôm happy to be back to find their dim sum is as good as ever!
Especially, their shrimp dumplings are out standing and I also love their HK Style Fried Noodles!
Service is always friendly and efficient! During COVID-19 their social distancing arrangement has been outstanding too! Please look at the photos and you will understand!
Plenty of parking at the Mall, best to call ahead if it‚Äôs the weekend!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOMK7msoDXeZd8jIvY-ak_F8kdUcOFClBJSq95H&fid=0x0:0x541cf97cc364a52e"],"When":"2020-8-29"},{"Name":"Rob Frost","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJvk7V07qSnxN_2OcCQZp77kzRh1b1nhj5805cYGnaMMqw3bA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"We did take out for 8 last evening. Unfortunately our 1st choice take out was not available.
The food was awful, the sweet & sour pork was cook to a petrified point, the deep fried prawns had a chemical taste to them and were not edible nor were they deveined. I‚Äôve had better Chinese  food in a mall food court. I don‚Äôt know what happened but hands down the worst Chinese take out I‚Äôve ever had.
Can never eat there food again‚Ä¶. Yuk!!!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Cho Wong","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV0vTAdhqntacjNfh4cZe-qxrbbWZfqZI4BzEY4DOijj7RFtOmR=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Honestly I was surprised that North Vancouver would have such decent authentic dim sum. My only advice, don't order the siu mai. Although  a typical staple dim sum here it was dense and the server told me pork was like that ü§£ aside from that everything else was pretty good. Definitely will do it again","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPZHtjK-bqn57sxG4h-dtHxPoHpSvPzKA59fHAz&fid=0x0:0x541cf97cc364a52e"],"When":"2022-6-14"},{"Name":"steve lord","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUpSyznmeUGN41B3wjV_8UeQI6ud2VN4afA2KTaE57n9lyaMwKi=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Welcoming staff and quick attentive servers. We tried special fried rice, ribs, chicken with cashew and spicy beans. All tasted good. Portions were quite large so although around $20 a dish, there was plenty to eat. Maybe not the best food on the North Shore but still good. Very convenience so close to Highway 1 and plenty of parking. Will return sometime.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP6mKUinFfP0LParQQvwlbYwDX6OeKsC6ToNTT8&fid=0x0:0x541cf97cc364a52e"],"When":"2021-11-20"},{"Name":"Paul Lively","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLDfwbZQUfxEskrGqiwYuS1N863I503Yr6WonmowXCt6vHFjg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Last Saturday we ordered chicken chow mein as we had ordered it previously and it was delicious. Unfortunately this time it was awful. The noodles were dry and rubbery and there were hardly any pieces of chicken or vegetables in the dish. It seemed that these were left over noodles that were sold to us as a way to get rid of them rather than cook fresh chicken chow mein.","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Chloe Rachel","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWgExGuK1W-XgQc1tPnrQlqQkWxCTaNhdz977uVTTY3zjpsAzs-=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I ordered the Greek Souvlaki Chicken off their lunch menu ($15), which came with one skewer of chicken. The skewer had 4 decently sized chicken cubes, and the plate also had a generous portion of rice, Greek salad and a wedge of garlic bread. The souvlaki was well-seasoned. The dining area was spacious and open. It wasn't crowded when we went for a weekday lunch, but we imagine they have their regular customers. The restaurant has been in business for 40 years! There was a bit of a wait for our food, so it's not the best option for a quick meal or those with time constraints on a lunch break. Overall, would recommend!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNdRYl8qwrubbNEzvl3OJ0h1duFJ6nYnfMYvS35&fid=0x0:0xad34d2b59127b383"],"When":"2024-7-30"},{"Name":"Melanie Dekker","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVZWOVby0mjxg_a0S6eqeAGCK2KQNcgM-5_mfCOxgIdTCNbKSq_=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"We‚Äôve ordered here about half a dozen times. The food overloaded with cheese and not very tasty. However, tonight we ordered the pizza as I was responding to an email that said 20% off pizzas on  Fridays. That email should‚Äôve read occasional Fridays as tonight it was back to regular prices; albeit it was Friday. It‚Äôs a four star review because the pizza itself was absolutely excellent, warm and ready when we arrived to pick it up. Due to the coverings on the windows and some other decor issues, duct tape and missing lightbulbs‚Ä¶inside this place doesn‚Äôt seem too welcoming, however again if one focuses on quality of the pizza alone, it was excellent.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMakwUd-nDQYYcSkYBAQmWta5l5mJObDU-ttUOE&fid=0x0:0xad34d2b59127b383"],"When":"2024-8-24"},{"Name":"Doug P","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLx6YpxAAaIZ7Cj9PSMphfRQfkkw46YLaNdEeYIQOo495lpxg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Lasagna was delicious! Especially the cheese. There was enough sauce. I don't know if it was supposed to have meat because I barely tasted any but the sauce was tasty.
Service- on our receipt the name was Employee. I apologize if Employee has issues or is shy but he was basically non verbal. Not great qualities for a server. I was facing a corner so I don't know if Employee had other tables and was also non verbal with other customers. Employee also didn't check on our table for drink refills or extra napkins etc. There was a cheerful young woman waiting on the table behind me which amplified Employee's lack of interaction with us.
A group of us were regulars back in the '90s. It was great to revisit and find the food was as good as I remember.
To sum up; great food, but we had the one server who seemed to be forced into a position he wasn't qualified for. Perhaps he's new.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Herlie Kim","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI8SSSwQ7c_3JGugR1U7Jl7LcglaK4715UZTUEzRC8binm8Q-69=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"The most disappointing service ever. After the 10 min wait time mark, I asked the server if we could get our order, but she said she was gonna do it after she refills the water on the other table. She came back with the water but never went back to us. We were excited to get some good food, but no one didn‚Äôt even bother coming to our table. Wasted 15 minutes. As we were walking out the door, one of the attendants only said ‚ÄúI‚Äôm so sorry.‚Äù   Never coming back here!!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP7mRkThddCtHhAKK8453oQPWyyYs6sR2Q89dEk&fid=0x0:0xad34d2b59127b383"],"When":"2024-11-9"},{"Name":"Michelle Chisholm","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXukDLj_aT-skOf3-x_A0jyNb4ZHUgyuJ3nlczitM_Co2CMERQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Where to start, this was an amazing experience. I‚Äôm not sure why the reviews are so low because it was such a wonderful time.

My father and I try a lot of pizza around town to find the best ones, and we decided to try pizza at Andreas. We were not disappointed. It was delicious! Freshly made, perfect temperature and so tasty! I got a medium for myself so I could take some home and I‚Äôm glad I did.

I highly recommend this spot. The food is delicious and the service is great too! You won‚Äôt be disappointed!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPoX4dJ0WdmiCLZkaVDUjht_-yHO632wAseiqd9&fid=0x0:0xad34d2b59127b383"],"When":"2024-8-1"},{"Name":"Steven Olmstead","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWtGPLsUg7ybhRCsA9-VeVYuyaFqArSeyzqddnDm9gdPpsZ3M0=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Probably been 30 years since we last dined at Andrea's.  Living in the neighbourhood now, we decided to give it a try.  Our experience definitely exceeded our expectations, as I admit I am strongly  influenced by reviews on Google maps, which are mixed for Andrea's

We shared a platter that started with a very large Greek salad.  The ingredients were quite irregularly cut, but that's a minor quibble.  The  main platter was a very generous plate consisting of Beef Souvlaki, Chicken Souvlaki, Lamb Souvlaki, Hummus, Tzatziki, Pita Bread, Spanakopita, Rice, Roast Potato, Calamari, and Souzoukakia.  The beef was a little tough, the spanakopita was nice and  crisp, the calamari was tender and overall, a very good value for $60 for two!  Will return.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNZpBuhSORroWmQ-Bw-ixfL7A26lkzYJivXIFja&fid=0x0:0xad34d2b59127b383"],"When":"2024-6-15"},{"Name":"Michelle G,","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLq4AM7e8OMq9DuJKcyJ0tEhamYB8Qq71QV-IIa_GXyTVKVZQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Walked In on a Sunday night after being discharged from the hospital (crashed my face into the concrete during a bike ride) and this was the most perfect treat. My friend and I ordered the Greek platter and were not able to finish it (we r both athletes and eat a lot). The meat was so perfectly cooked, the chicken was not at all dry, and the server was kind. Place was super empty which was cool. Sorry my photo is mid we got too excited and started eating before deciding this place warranted this review.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPR9cKxrUVSSG0L5RJzK2G9Oh0n_v0qq8OkiBUS&fid=0x0:0xad34d2b59127b383"],"When":"2024-7-1"},{"Name":"Sarah Csapkay","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWb_kgQbGBOdQj8RmRDLUHFd1gQYNuzawSEvnUk4t3Mnnw-dzgp=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Ordered online for pickup for a family birthday party. Ordered the greek platter and an extra ceasar salad. Unfortunately their ‚Äúceasar salad‚Äù consists of a bowl of lettuce, parmesan, and croutons. ZERO CEASAR DRESSING. So it‚Äôs just a bowl of plain lettuce. Very disappointed. The greek platter was good other than the calamari being soggy but I guess theres nothing they can do about it getting soggy during transport.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNBOU__tkOadilkIEpslM0jRQTESEA2YDUBIvUS&fid=0x0:0xad34d2b59127b383"],"When":"2024-10-4"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Mark V. Sinclair","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW6ve_wQQ4uxBt3cYQW8cTfAQRrRZkQ44mckIfxzATcnSTXi0wz=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Recently discovered "Kypriaki  Mediterranean Grill" during visit of overseas family friend.  While running some final errands before heading to the airport, I decided to check out this well-known restaurant which has been in business on the Northshore for many years, and was known as "Kypriaki Taverna" in its former nearby Marine Drive location.

The restaurant is open daily between 12 - 9pm, and has both lunch + dinner menus. On-site customer parking is also available in a lot behind the building.  Kypriaki Mediterranean Grill is located mid-block near the northwest corner of Marine Drive and Bridgman Avenue and nearby Pemberton Plaza.

When we arrived at the restaurant at noon opening, we received a really great welcome.  The lunch menu was in effect with many really tasty options. I chose the generously portioned baked Italian lasagna, while the family friend had the chicken souvlaki, with rice pilaf, and Greek salad.

Greek cuisine is their speciality, and they are well-known for their tasty  Roast Lamb, Moussaka and Beef/Chicken Souvlaki, as well as Spanish Paella . Classic rich Greek  desserts like Baclava and Bougatsa are also on offer, and not to be missed.

The interior restaurant space has a great casual Mediterranean vibe: think light ochre + blue accented walls, landscape canvasses on wall / plants,  country - wood furniture, and overall warm rustic charm.

There is also a sports bar/lounge side of the restaurant with tables/comfy chairs, bar-stools, and 3 big-screens showing football/hockey games. Their daily Happy Hour drink/food specials runs between 4 - 5pm.   During Spring/Summer  there is an outdoor patio area along the front of the restaurant.

If you're looking for a casual Greek -  Mediterranean restaurant with longstanding reputation and delicious food at reasonable prices, you definitely have to check out Kypriaki.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPxOfFIjSqhLEMKiydwG22gkC4CleoBZ_LarrtG&fid=0x0:0x67e12243d5a5f6c2"],"When":"2024-11-12"},{"Name":"R M","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX_fz1ppRTsIp4sjPAQMlDnN0i9UFP0hSxVQWeP4OaNSz_YsQXRew=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"First time dining at Kypriaki Restaurant, and we had such a great time! The food was delicious, and the lunch deal of the 1/2 Chicken Souvlaki was well-plated. The portion was spot on. The flavors of the meal and the tenderness of the chicken was on point. Our server was so pleasant and welcoming, which made the experience even more memorable. We'll try to come back sometime soon! Definitely give these guys a try - you won't regret it. *There's 90-minute parking at the back of the restaurant.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNs-asOkgX7diIUlUD7bf-pFxBTNWIwUiVlmY5J&fid=0x0:0x67e12243d5a5f6c2"],"When":"2024-6-22"},{"Name":"Jadzia J","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUKNNhbLBo-4xKK8CzqF34wIX9FRCk4PNtl54buFNSiKox_n9DG=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Best food ever. You have to go here. Amazing service and the cutest restaurant. Outside seating available and amazing menu. Sharing platters are really nice if you and your group wants to try multiple things. Tzatziki And hummus are very authentic.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMFLJpr3JzJWL7EBNCHMYjFSyvqzC5fkU4GYBNe&fid=0x0:0x67e12243d5a5f6c2"],"When":"2024-9-2"},{"Name":"Gabriel Costa","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWOkCa52Vsdzq4UrhpPpvpALmn_ltBcgw4mS7qMR--pQBoMADmn=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We celebrated valentine‚Äôs there because we were craving for some authentic Mediterranean food. We hit the perfect spot for it. Good food, good portions and excellent service! The lady who helped us was extremely friendly and provided us with a top 5 stars service.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPvUTda5AXBaAaBtV5HxPNyIn3sEzRNYoQIIN1p&fid=0x0:0x67e12243d5a5f6c2"],"When":"2024-2-19"},{"Name":"Al Javer","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWJuFoJricbE5H8kdBLOXv2e97b0nXsK1KR6g0cLeYiMJHI6xB6=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Amazing food my first time at this restaurant was invited by a friend for dinner excellent food quality very big portions and reasonable price our server Joe was very nice, but a few times we asked for service from Shawn ( another server ) and Shawn was amazing very polite made us feel very comfortable. I found out in the end that he was not our server. Thank you, Shawn and Joe. Only I felt was the tables were too small for four people.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOB5_wGg-LYlHghxD9lEBYKSliYHmcl5hwzfR7G&fid=0x0:0x67e12243d5a5f6c2"],"When":"2024-5-12"},{"Name":"Hassan Makhlouf","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXYREoqUkazVJoJhrGCrjS5g1lIMahzFkhsZA1Ir7O3A-YofJyb=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"It was a nice place to have Christmas party there. Although, it was full of people attending the party but service was great. The seating area is nicely organized where the bar on one side and the seating area on other side . Decorations are great. Parking is limited but it‚Äôs easy to find a parking nearby. Food is great especially calamari and chicken souvlaki. You will like it.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPKXI9TIY-xtBBjlzFPeIwxPnNfPOtvkPSxzL11&fid=0x0:0x67e12243d5a5f6c2"],"When":"2022-12-27"},{"Name":"Ali Mehrizi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXWq9cg0fjpkngwNGme387YM4kRUdnI6Pf_Z33gzbG1mkoqze49=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Cute (but not little) Greek restaurant. The decor is pretty. There are essentially two sides; one side (pictured) is a casual restaurant and the other side is more like a lounge. Food, especially the beef souvlaki, is very good. Bread was fantastic, although a bit too greasy, but that‚Äôs a characteristic of the food. Salad and the yogurt sauce were nice additions. Service was courteous too. Overall, good experience in the North Shore with a nice unpretentious local restaurant.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNqPTsZLRRUBM50-UerM7jOEIxgiqHXacYHld1S&fid=0x0:0x67e12243d5a5f6c2"],"When":"2021-2-15"},{"Name":"Gordon Kwong","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKKjDehFqHA5ZT74ZkeWTLjTUZu8GTq7uesQO3c1SQIt6zn0Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Nice new location with some pretty good roast lamb. Today's visit, however, we were served a fried calamari which was strangely undercooked with a soggy coating that was not golden but it tasted fine although soggy and a bit floury. You can compare my photos of an earlier visit. The nice golden ones are noticably different. Not their regular light and crispy golden brown. They did apologize. The roast lamb for four was excellent and nicely seasoned, but the hummus seemed a bit rough and watery tasting.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN7d5gWKhUJQFuHXKHvERQv5j3mAO8IooNuEkZY&fid=0x0:0x67e12243d5a5f6c2"],"When":"2019-6-7"}]

[{"Name":"GH","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWjL7JVV6ausdnP45ZqwT_MXpeCtJK50ZS4aFzmUFU_4i3_4eA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is the only Korean-Chinese restaurant I go to in this area. The food is, of course, fresh and delicious, and the staff is as friendly as always. The atmosphere feels like a hidden gem outside the city, so much so that it makes me feel like I‚Äôm traveling in Korea.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNpuxHbBn0AyEdixNrxZgVQjvK6aCoKF7S3vQum&fid=0x0:0x4ef1ed265bc799d6"],"When":"2024-11-3"},{"Name":"bupoko s","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKTVXAY02lFQD8GsrbBJdEpfn3z8bGiPjw5uB17iUQmX_MCGQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The food sold here is always delicious and fresh. I felt the deep flavor that I eat in Korea.

If you are looking for a romantic atmosphere with your partner, don't expect much atmosphere, but if you want a really delicious meal, I recommend this place.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM-js-98X3cHgmiikVxlyu6I8kehQK20wElM5GJ&fid=0x0:0x4ef1ed265bc799d6"],"When":"2024-10-26"},{"Name":"Y L","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV236YiWDAw91lf0BivhX8vPLApY6lFjId9AQG1MMNy3GQCimu9=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"The food tastes healthy and home made. A little bland. Expected fire taste from wok, but not sure if they use a wok here. It's worth a visit if you live around here but definitely was not worth it for us coming from downtown.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMJrOQ_LMsOQsom3qykaRwP4Ypr_0-DefPxu2H_&fid=0x0:0x4ef1ed265bc799d6"],"When":"2024-9-30"},{"Name":"LJL Films","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXCgSeNULZxYSN1RX9TsWUKfoxsI5VRIlsDI6c8zvdgRlAQV60=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The food here is so delicious! It‚Äôs my favourite place to get jjajangmyeon! All of the servers are so nice and helpful. The L7 lunch special is my favourite! It‚Äôs a good deal and the portion is big too! Thank you to everyone at Ga Hyang Ru","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMksOKH9dQtr_0hFBC9IG6HiSsCymtrTK1McKxq&fid=0x0:0x4ef1ed265bc799d6"],"When":"2024-10-11"},{"Name":"AdrianLee263","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXXAhMYzY2_PZAqB1pKWjI7kxSq9mPV0Ra40Vu_zkWmXxnpaX4kiQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Ordered Seafood Fried Rice w/ Jajjang and Kimchi Fried Rice, the large one but in fact its not that large, tastes so so, but service is fast and friendly. Lil bit pricey.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipObnsPH9M4JpgxHDOtOXvLKmj2i1VyUJ02CfkFa&fid=0x0:0x4ef1ed265bc799d6"],"When":"2024-10-5"},{"Name":"Herschel Diego","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIyyT_031h3ILParLq2NmxWDzlzx866CmOPtNXcY80pWHqhzQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The best korean restaurant in the north shore.
Kan poon ki is definitely a family favourite, and I always buy it for family events.
Staff is friendly and always welcoming","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMzXX-lZE9-H2btRYorIm2jjWVk3KK8GAhTBj3e&fid=0x0:0x4ef1ed265bc799d6"],"When":"2024-10-14"},{"Name":"Jizelle Garcia","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJyzSeMMMmQJNd8WDethczxr3uXNdjORpbX-butxHOVp0pXxetz=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"I really really really wanted to love this place. Even after they accidentally gave me meat or seafood in my vegetarian black bean noodles multiple times, I kept going back to try to satisfy my craving and I kept being disappointed. We've ordered from here three times on doordash and there has always been a mistake and we've had to come back to get it changed. We lose so much of our time trying to get what we ordered that it's not worth it anymore. Especially, when we call and ask them if we could have it remade, which they did for us, but they suggest that we didn't order vegetarian when we did. I don't know if it's a language barrier thing but I would say be open-minded to it if you don't have any modifications to your order. They do have generous portions! The black bean noodles are very heavy on the onion if you were interested in ordering it. They could also use some more sauce to properly coat the noodles. The restaurant itself is very cozy and homey.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPR8F-vOBVXvquqJglXhZYgl8yCZS_3l1VdKKvz&fid=0x0:0x4ef1ed265bc799d6"],"When":"2024-3-3"},{"Name":"Emma Cho","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKG5hXINrTjtNVInqHSSgUFtFaRoRO71nEIk5HVZHDR4GhxnA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"One of my favourite Korean-Chinese fusion cuisine located in North Van. The portion is generous, great customer service and excellent taste. You must try the Tangsuyuk! (Sweet and sour pork)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPLXcYLtetKs5h-oLZ2lRByZCnMl28p91EFwdwN&fid=0x0:0x4ef1ed265bc799d6"],"When":"2024-6-3"}]

As a recommendation I suggest they wear a white clothes instead of black ones and serve the food more gently.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN_0do7Xv5_TxgrXSV3-6onNLsu88alvr3Wy2v5\u0026fid=0x0:0x176f6294c3726627"],"When":"2024-8-25"},{"Name":"Munro Stuff","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWj0Wcuk6ox5dfAeJ4fAaMbhX_F-nzzt3p5oc_f0hBd0NpbGSM=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Excellent variety with tons of combo possibilities (love the Super Combo option!). Fast service. Came here for many times already for sure.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNwjBSnra9p_ZDmBKDrajrz3bTqUgfthqy8YN--\u0026fid=0x0:0x176f6294c3726627"],"When":"2024-9-25"},{"Name":"L Silver","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIqgXScPFK4x2G77lwd6cJCHy5YWm8y8iZ05mzyk1VGNFx9kg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Honestly the best price around for sushi and it's not half bad if u get the basics. However if you are a clean person this isn't the place for you. I've walked in before and caught the front staff at the counter picking their nose, no I'm not joking maybe cause they opened not much earlier they thought no one would come in. I stayed away for a while. Another time I went to Yuko maki (recently) I went to the bathroom and came out the same time as staff and they did not wash their hands and went to the dinning area and carried on their duties. My stomach hurt after my most recent visit. Loved this place but after this I'm going to avoid this place once again.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Sanaz Erfanian","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU6T34fblo5pEptDgHbWM2F1C15g2hat47wtY907SndxFMI0tsB=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The food is perfect my favourite is California roll.\nThis place has both cucumber and avocado  in its California roll and it is very unique.\nHighly recommended üëå","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipODnqOEOvCPzwwFvs7ZmHldV1p3iBGjCkOMAh78\u0026fid=0x0:0x176f6294c3726627"],"When":"2024-10-7"},{"Name":"Deborah Ramnath","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUBA32LD_C1LcprxKUkxdjbBSbN2-_EsIVsWFhO4bPv970iQMr3YQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"I had the special box üç± with teriyaki beef and also a sushi special üç£. The meals were reasonably priced. Some items were very delicious and some were bland (lacking flavor/seasoning). It is a nice place to sit and eat, the service is fast. I personally found that the tempura lacked seasoning/flavor it was bland however it was very crispy and still okay. The salad ü•ó was nice and the miso soup was a good starter. The California roll is good. I would eat here again because it is convenient for me in North Vancouver, it‚Äôs reasonably priced and the service is fast.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOXPnqLdvDZlStoI21lRyMeSQGj8zwrfaaEdJog\u0026fid=0x0:0x176f6294c3726627"],"When":"2023-7-18"},{"Name":"Ethan Cap","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK0soIougKcPC2QXhngy5fg0qd4FUp8gfDZjZfoTX24jb5EEQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I love this place. Crazy value, huge portions for a price that‚Äôs remained relatively stable over the years. Yeah it might not be the friendliest service but it‚Äôs part of the experience lol. Takeout is always quick, on time, and accurate. Best sushi spot on the north shore.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Shelby McLean","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXGrJIxT_w5hI3sCYlNvQIRBmY0nhG0Y1Wwz7fnYiH39NwxA_WG=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Got the sushi special to go. Ordered and got food in 10 minutes. Good value, not the best sushi I've ever had but for 3 rolls and a miso soup for $12 I‚Äôm  fine with that lol","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNtbHyU-XACK2xct7VyEKVXPSt1bBVY87-1cOzM\u0026fid=0x0:0x176f6294c3726627"],"When":"2024-2-16"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"MandyEric C","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLxuB_JnrsZZb2fdpTBXrnzo6r9HABusbLT1YvyciVL0SlNAw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Sam was super friendly and helpful. He made great recommendations for us to try food with different dishes that will be suitable for our tastes. We ordered the lamb neck, lamb kebab, ground beef kebab, and the yellow color rose water dessert (Sholezard). The portion was huge! And the lamb neck indeed melted in your mouth as Sam mentioned. The dessert was surprisingly good! It‚Äôs sweet but not too much. It lightened up the whole meal at the end. Everything was delicious and we highly recommend this place!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPMNhdh45ZIzt2UDRUjGHmoJSfFkL1zXkx1rA9U&fid=0x0:0x99912f662b8064f1"],"When":"2024-9-2"},{"Name":"Amine BARKETI","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWoKaUb5rH4gs2BlvGFjLoE0Y2tpFOZzPD3zk4N_CBbjbpDMelA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Waw never been amazed by such food... Very sweet guy.
Food was really good
Beef Steak was one of the best I‚Äôve had outside of Iran. Very tender and very well cooked
Chicken kebob was juicy and verrry tasty.
Koobideh was a bit firm or maybe overcooked but still decent.
Will definitely try them again","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMWLWRUYSNtkqDFdencE_quu7qRRE63o25Fif6w&fid=0x0:0x99912f662b8064f1"],"When":"2024-6-23"},{"Name":"Farhad","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUZsh7rsXskoTeFBdwx-4_jSK3VIUQ0BNWwnMfqcoyfBr3tpy_n=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"We purchased chelo kabab that was nice, although more oily than expected
Tahdig dish with Gheimeh stew was nice, again more oily than expected
Tahdig dish with Ghormeh Sabzi stew was OK, not bad, again oily
Kashk Bademjan (Eggplant dish) was really bad, not palatable, and not what we expected
Yogurt cucumber mixture was so spicy üå∂Ô∏è more than any usual Persian cuisine normality
The staff were helpful, nice
The inside of the store did not have ventilation, although it‚Äôs mainly a take-out place.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNiwShK0FNyAmuecpm3sJQK0nRYimFevMOFbN8&fid=0x0:0x99912f662b8064f1"],"When":"2024-8-11"},{"Name":"Andrew Enduma (Drew)","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX9vDN56ZtpfNpzF6_D-nYXCuGa6hhrsRtYtkinWpk5R8xG6qcj=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I recently had the pleasure of enjoying Tanje Koubide Kebab, and I must say, it was an exceptional experience! The tenderness of the meat was truly remarkable; showcasing the quality and care that goes into their preparation.

The flavor was outstanding, with a perfect blend of spices that enhanced the natural taste of the meat without overpowering it.
Additionally, the portion sizes were generous, providing great value for the price!

Having tried both Tanje Koubide Kebab and Cazba, I can confidently say that I personally prefer Tanje. The combination of tenderness, flavor, and portion size makes it a standout choice for anyone craving a delicious kebab. I highly recommend giving it a try!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPPtN-DZVAFMAYg6nUsdZ5QDQvjaZWwkcz6LzCj&fid=0x0:0x99912f662b8064f1"],"When":"2024-8-21"},{"Name":"Mehdi Mashaykhi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKJltJjHUwj-9He6v6H2jjLPRoigTEMMJev-SsKHUT7wAOgMA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I recently ordered takeout from Tanije Restaurant and was thoroughly impressed. The chicken kebabs were absolutely delicious‚Äîtender, juicy, and packed with flavor. The Kashk-o-Bademjan was a standout dish, with its rich taste and beautiful presentation. Even though it was takeout, the attention to detail in the presentation and taste was evident. I highly recommend Tanije Restaurant for anyone craving high-quality Persian cuisine.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOsH9bnohqKmCj0MLQIXpZe13lHP5WASsmIixH4&fid=0x0:0x99912f662b8064f1"],"When":"2024-8-15"},{"Name":"raafa abdulla","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWWg27WMgV0cri9-zVkUqxtXhbvkjQAcWkQlzPpvLsL1UPIKry3bQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This was my first time ordering from this restaurant. I did the online order and it took them 10 minutes to complete the order which was three meals. The food was outstanding. You can see it was fresh and super yummy.  So many restaurants downgrade their standards but I am glade that Tanje kept the high standard.  They also gave my husband a cup of tea which was so delicious! I can't wait to order from them again. It is my new restaurant to go in North Vancouver.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Hadi Kamali","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWqlkm50UOVj2GSTasCDDkEl2RpU59azMU0t2UcQhG6AM44Q02q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I recently ordered takeout for a party, and I couldn't be more pleased with my choice. The food was exceptional‚Äîdelicious and of high quality. Every dish was prepared to perfection, and it received rave reviews from all my guests. The flavors were vibrant, and the presentation was impressive, even for takeout. Everyone left the table happy and satisfied. I highly recommend this place for anyone looking to elevate their event with outstanding food!","Images":null,"When":""}]
