[{"Name":"Melanie E","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUR0bJcxqNkJt-i1wxCH3EaQXevncA86panZszfT__NAs_0KWRp=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I haven't been to a good Mexican restaurant in ages until Tequila Cantina.

Food: 5/5 - food's fresh & tasty. We had their Thursday's special of any choice of meat or veggie burrito. We opted for the Birria (juicy beef) & Carnita (Pulled pork topped with pickled onions, cilantro and jalapeno). We were given nachos and sauces to start us off. They offer daily specials for each day of the week. We both enjoyed our choices. There are vegetarian and vegan options.

Service: 5/5 - our friendly server helped recommend what to order.

Ambience: 5/5 - great vibe to the place

I'll be back to try their other dishes.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMHX9zn-tqJ1ywpxeAgbVW-l3GItc2Wd9G5Zr_2&fid=0x0:0xe2f5badc5f9a7ef7"],"When":"2024-9-6"},{"Name":"Mehr Poulad","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKnMmsASCmXLOvaFhR1RoQ03vxNx7oVUBdwy_npEYvb7k7uZA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"On Friday nights there is live music and the atmosphere is amazing. It does get loud during the Mariachi band. Food is great and portions are generous.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOU79K8Z3SgGkhaipezlSbbkg04J0rr_bddquy5&fid=0x0:0xe2f5badc5f9a7ef7"],"When":"2024-10-20"},{"Name":"Georgina Gomez","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXd2Fh6FMbnZeI5RUG4-9xnwmHPPo8y6dBuG5TMruAWa-5d0jTTHg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I totally love this place. The tacos üåÆ and seafood are incredible tasty!üíñ I also love the atmosphere, the music is very fun and they have Mexican hats to put on and take some selfies with them ü§≥üèª. It‚Äôs perfect to hang out with your friends or family. And not to mention the drinks!!!! Paloma and michelada are my faves! üçπ","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOAKcORnyQ0Q8j33VAp2DbktPinE4kWHipqsgrG&fid=0x0:0xe2f5badc5f9a7ef7"],"When":"2024-7-23"},{"Name":"Amir A","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIviNUsG6QqkDN6L9ZDtMkDF4F5Mt_B71p_qWT3rDiy1wJkkw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I recently visited Tequila Cantina and had an amazing experience! The margarita and taco salad I ordered were absolutely delicious. The flavors were spot on, and the presentation was great. The staff were incredibly friendly and attentive, making the dining experience even better. I highly recommend Tequila Cantina for anyone looking for great Mexican food and excellent service. I'll definitely be coming back!

---

Feel free to adjust it as needed!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPN5o0JlcWTQ78Wkgm7Rah_GhM-WXmrBPDAp1Zd&fid=0x0:0xe2f5badc5f9a7ef7"],"When":"2024-7-10"},{"Name":"Emma F","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW0dlt8ocxLH7yPca2ojNkGI_PBBfsXKMNtqOXZnh4xc0FK3htC=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I came for the margaritas, but stayed for the Friday night mariachi band. Lovely, prompt service and a very inviting atmosphere. Started with a margarita flight to try some of the various styles, but landed on the full-size version of their Tamarind-Chamoy creation. Highly recommend if you like sweet and spicy and different.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNEE3x2BTpEb6evH0zaAxQxe3N20h7Z_jvtvlBN&fid=0x0:0xe2f5badc5f9a7ef7"],"When":"2024-9-21"},{"Name":"sanly lotf zad","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWevn8jS__cwgkkDAs-PwhWtE8tS7PYbpSrIMWGK6HIXEC7n3GE=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Tequila Cantina offers an excellent dining experience with a warm, welcoming atmosphere that captures vibrant Mexico vibes.
The friendly and attentive staff ensure guests feel comfortable and well taken care of. With superb, authentic Mexican food and drinks, it's perfect for both casual meals and festive nights out.
Highly recommended for a delightful Mexican dining experience!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN022NHCV4idwJTZePdQFvIC1L2W5J3Jmf177EQ&fid=0x0:0xe2f5badc5f9a7ef7"],"When":"2024-7-23"},{"Name":"Alborz Heydaryan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU3Vng4IUKPQE9Fep8rFk82JAhyD8hNPxcn7ENU5VDX4zRqQ7uKtw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Best Mexican food I had in Canada. Everything was perfect. For the first time at a Mexican restaurant I felt like I ate enough meat.

Visited again on a Friday and they have live music! A lot of fun!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNG4AuagtI-PnGfiYZECyxU4g1g3EqZhwe5PRye&fid=0x0:0xe2f5badc5f9a7ef7"],"When":"2024-9-21"},{"Name":"Monica Glez","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI3YU5YCEHOH6RfLDdoBNeAfDdaY-PZ81kFz8bWoGFHRrolSA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I'm from Mexico so I know how the food taste. I ordered 2 quesabirrias and they were good but I will say 8/10 which for being in Canada is a really high level. I went on a Friday around 8 pm so I was in the perfect time
For the mariachi. Fridays 7-9 they have mariachi.
The place is nice, the staff is fast, toilets are clean. I would back absolutely plus also Is a good option in north van!","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Mojgan Mousavi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVAicKYLCVK_e974ojpUkK4N5EOcUi_hE5BdHbU2Z7hohPCbzRs=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I recently had the pleasure of dining at Gilaneh Restaurant, and it was an unforgettable experience. The warm and inviting atmosphere immediately made me feel at home. The menu offers a wonderful selection of traditional Persian dishes, and every bite was packed with authentic flavors. The kebabs were perfectly grilled, and the rice, fragrant with saffron, was the perfect complement.

The service was exceptional, with the staff attentive and knowledgeable about the dishes. They truly made the evening special. Whether you‚Äôre familiar with Persian cuisine or trying it for the first time, Gilaneh is a must-visit. Highly recommend!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPgW8ypcM9KBj2uaeK0tShTc_CIWDVwESpxfY8O&fid=0x0:0xf70e6fe5e55458d7"],"When":"2024-10-7"},{"Name":"Sima","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXa1uCjxIK38PRHyykjdDBV_mHSpwBVaybw1VktpZL1KHn9RSqO=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I recently visited Gilaneh Persian Restaurant in Vancouver, and I have to say, it was an outstanding experience! The Persian dishes and kebabs were absolutely delicious, full of authentic flavors that truly satisfied my taste buds. The atmosphere was warm and inviting, making it a perfect place for a cozy meal. On top of that, the staff were incredibly kind and attentive, adding to the overall wonderful experience. I highly recommend this restaurant to anyone looking to enjoy some amazing Persian cuisine. Can't wait to go back!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP0kyGlir5bGTXbYLU6GFZB6f6tjZgTyLF_33bY&fid=0x0:0xf70e6fe5e55458d7"],"When":"2024-8-13"},{"Name":"Shiva Radmanesh","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX50D30SjZBR4QvfRxKL45XQxTtaGKOp6R4BwFd5j_tfXu-Hq4=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Gilaneh is a charming Persian restaurant with a nostalgic vibe. The d√©cor feels like stepping into a Persian grandmother's house, and every detail brought back memories of Iran. The food was delicious, and the portion sizes were generous‚Äîperfect for sharing if you‚Äôre not too hungry. While the meal was on the pricier side, the quality and quantity made it worth every penny.

At the start of our meal, we were welcomed with complimentary warm bread and feta, which was absolutely delicious and set the tone for the rest of the dining experience.

We ordered the Bakhtiari kabob (a skewer each of chicken and chenjeh kabob) and the Gilaneh special kabob (a skewer of loghmeh and kabob torsh). Both dishes were amazing, though the Bakhtiari kabob stood out with its tenderness. For sides, we enjoyed doogh and the flavorful zeitoun parvardeh.

The only downside was the service. There was only one waiter, and we often had to wait too long for attention. Despite that, Gilaneh offers a memorable Persian dining experience that‚Äôs well worth a visit.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPhn47ioTyfr9DCS_cw62DJVkwEVIuom2dIGhQh&fid=0x0:0xf70e6fe5e55458d7"],"When":"2024-10-11"},{"Name":"Farhan Umedaly","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV2hcsJxhJGlfeNAgoGToEM34YuD8-TXiLheon1Bn02AUIxVvo2=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I found this place by chance and I am happy I did! A hidden gem on the North Shore. Such kind people and lovely, fresh food. This is now my new favourite place for great priced and delicious home cooked Persian cuisine.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOoBZQnTMTQfQun3KoOxplrs7YlYDJwi2Cbhb36&fid=0x0:0xf70e6fe5e55458d7"],"When":"2024-11-16"},{"Name":"Hamid Boleydei","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUofgipij-WeBAmioY74wKuiU9RvGh41oi6L6GieDwog0ENfh15=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Gilaneh Restaurant offers a delightful atmosphere, enhanced by the soothing sounds of Iranian music playing in the background. The menu is particularly eye-catching, featuring photos of the dishes, which is especially helpful for non-Iranian clients. The food itself is tasty, with generous portions that ensure a satisfying meal. The combination of authentic ambiance, visually appealing menu, and delicious food makes Gilaneh Restaurant a great choice for anyone looking to enjoy Persian cuisine.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMHlRiMa4H4V-077yyb6LzQtHu_zvCTaZaf2zRe&fid=0x0:0xf70e6fe5e55458d7"],"When":"2024-7-11"},{"Name":"Nasim Yousefi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXWtFJYE2BnCXlIXcLOK5rDCE2MeW-Fdmu3YQ2gy8dbEC6F7Ybt=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Well! Speaking of Koobideh! You guys indeed serve the best Koobideh!!! Not only famous and popular in town but also my family who visit from Iran always ask me to take them to Gilaneh for their Koobideh. Tty "Tahdig" and "Gheimeh" as a meal and feel the taste of childhood lunch from grandma's kitchen. The service is excellent when it not too busy, but I would say when its busier, its hard for the staff to catch up with tables and good service. I also advice bringing onion with Kebab or in order to make sure it wont waste, ask the guests if they want extra onion on the side. The hot bread serves before food would have been more tasty is served with butter..... The music however is laud and sometimes nostalgic in a sad way. Please choose a nicer playlist and turn it down a bit then I would give 5 star for atmosphere!
Anyways, I go to Gilaneh almost every week. When I am exhausted from a long hike or a busy day at work, the only place I would think that may fill my tummy with satisfaction, is Gilaneh. Keep up the good work you guys. We appreciate having you in our beautiful city of North Vancouver :)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMGJFg1AdCA1w8u-0Io99vEivEflmTv5frj2Rsq&fid=0x0:0xf70e6fe5e55458d7"],"When":"2023-6-19"},{"Name":"Atlac Mdzh","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVmp8pn6U1S_KsOxdPvVN179SqKOQPaim2AxrOd-rorYkvJMKVF=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Tbh, yummy as always, the price makes sense . They have done some major renovations since 1-2 years ago the place looks much better, their kabab torsh is always good. There was only one lady waitress helping all the tables, we went there on a Thursday at 7 pm, didn‚Äôt expect to be busy, we understood that she was so busy and not enough to help all the tables that were constantly calling her. I think adding another person will benefit the business. Thanks for having us","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOSBRf2oLyVj4YZT1WLbe99swMGBMcMVmh4PfWm&fid=0x0:0xf70e6fe5e55458d7"],"When":"2024-7-6"},{"Name":"F S","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXqn2BnZMjmhHFlSOUmI5FkcW2bHUkEDUITCC0KH9S7pj8-kPI=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I ordered for delivery and they sent us 2 complete burnt dishes!! Pure black tahdig!!! user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Ali Abedini","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVbRr68ytCPfVo8PSc_cVIauSODi91rqgbkPR0poNeke2fuY4dLtw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"More than a restaurant, this is a little paradise. With 32 years of background, this restaurant offers some of the most legit and original Persian dishes. Not only the food and atmosphere, but also the amazing staff make you feel right at home when enjoying your favourite meals of all time. You know what I mean. When you know it, you know it.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPEECPlVgQnpmX7jS7cQqJEq6Oi2Dthal7vIZ8P&fid=0x0:0x4fb308bee057d235"],"When":"2024-9-6"},{"Name":"Shay","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVcjneWc_LCD45co2Cac8bHJnBcsw2HEfdzcQRnC4ndQPOjCkyC=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"We had kale pache, halim, and omlet they were all good, but my favorite was kale pache.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMNtA_BLUDeV0LAufNt6HhAYzRUbgfhFUn4zT7s&fid=0x0:0x4fb308bee057d235"],"When":"2024-7-27"},{"Name":"Shahrzad Matin","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXr3Y2zjCIPyX_qS5DOamXBuLhPj_aJnaUF2sdw1Z1ZeFtoSqs=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We have been eating at Kolbeh for as long as they have been open. A wonderful family restaurant. Always great eating there. We often bring home traditional Persian breakfast from there. Their prices & quality of their Halim & Kale pache is still better than others in my opinion.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM2j7nOyXLVmLx7LdUT4T53XNTYZkY7Wmtxd1TZ&fid=0x0:0x4fb308bee057d235"],"When":"2024-3-30"},{"Name":"Dr DD","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK7rVoqslZLLJaYceC7RbO-HwkCFHrLscKHrlTG2Kc8O8_Yfw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The service was great, everyone were super friendly. We had the Persian omelette and Ash Shole Ghalamkar with Sangak bread. All super delicious. I absolutely recommend this place for a cozy breakfast/brunch.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOZCY5Hp2hfd0HIKC8mSOXshXI2NuCQvej2CdQp&fid=0x0:0x4fb308bee057d235"],"When":"2023-12-16"},{"Name":"AA","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJwcLLeFM8_A2nmn-yiXzja7_MvlcrVHPHwx2LRAL_uYEo0Fr8=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This place is amazing! The atmosphere is warm and cozy, and the food is really good.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOH-WFLzfOb8MGKFcWBsLZXS9-3QfLLUUrZ6vsc&fid=0x0:0x4fb308bee057d235"],"When":"2024-7-2"},{"Name":"Jimjim ym","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU1PiOSVCEn9bWgSGk-UbnwgQixs1lcWf48KuIObYXL-Zzxm8pF=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"When you enter the restaurant Kolbeh.
It's not just an enter a  restaurant. You came from another time to a very pleasant and comfortable time that called Kolbeh.
we are more than welcome at Kolbeh with joy and and smile, there you see foods that you don't even think about it because the food they cooked will surprise you because all food are really beautiful and pleasant and delicious.
Foods that you just think are cooked it for sale, no not at all, they were cooked for your comfort and satisfaction like a family, foods in Kolbeh are100% homemade with beautiful smells and delicious food to you for sure.
It has an incredible event. you feel eating more after you finish your meal, but you feel as if you don't eat anything, your stomach is still ready for more food.
There's one thing matter to me is the place where customers talk to each other and enjoy each other's conversations without knowing one another mostly. the space, an excellent atmosphere where other nations eat with joy in huts and remember the name of Iranian cuisine."kolbeh"
I have never eaten before some of those food and I have experienced these foods in kolbeh restaurant and they are very, very tasty and I recommend them to all of you.Ever since I've eaten here.
Kolbeh is the only place with real Iranian food with an incredible price.
I love to eat only at the Kolbeh because I realize my money is worth it in Kolbeh .
I also feel like I'm still in my own family because the management and best team are of Kolbeh treat us so warmly from moment to moment and they want what we need and taking care of us well, that cease we're in right pleac with our own family.
it's a point that made me come and eat kolbeh every day.
also i can't  find a place with a lot of pleasing to eat and tastey with beautiful smell of food.
The great professional team talks with customers and enjoys the nice encounter of the management with the best team all there. Today, new food was added to the list of kolbeh. It was the traditional "ghrmeh sbzi" that we all really love it. You have to come here to eat ghrmeh sbzi to find out of real ghrmeh sbzi is.
I spoke with  management about how come every food in menu is incredible.
Is Kolbeh challenging with others ?
Management responded to me that" of course we challenge with nobody, but e create challenge.
Joseph s","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPAoJzXqX5kDSa8GzFJEnjFvZZgIfF9r7jBnwxC&fid=0x0:0x4fb308bee057d235"],"When":"2024-2-23"},{"Name":"Amin Sameni","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVu7gOTJPCM-cxMdKwmmGT2dzn1GqI9KyFBzJ01UvZjTN1ONfqq=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Very cool Iranian cafe/Restaurant with nice staff and pretty quick service.
Their Persian breakfasts, Haleem and Kaleh Pache are somewhat popular in the neighbourhood.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNwLWo1QboDRaZRf6jBVZyadOEcyA8V-VFQj8fL&fid=0x0:0x4fb308bee057d235"],"When":"2023-4-15"},{"Name":"morad jahanshahi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL6F75ChRPMBUwAuvazhHI_irARzS5d3upHiyfIP-Tt2A8nfQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I‚Äôve been a loyal customer for at least 25 years and just went there again couple of days ago. Unsure if I‚Äôve ever left a review. It‚Äôs probably my favourite on the North Shore for authentic Persian sandwiches but I have to mention that it‚Äôs the only place whose aash ( thick Persian soup) tastes absolutely fantastic and just like home made. The Persian delicacies are second to none, tongue, cutlet or kaleh patch√© ( sheep‚Äôs head soup) despite many bigger and fancier places that have tried and failed miserably to match the quality of Kolbeh. Family run, always welcoming with a smile. Hope they never sell the place or change how they run and prepare their goods. Salad olivier of Kolbeh must be tried. Well done Kolbeh. Never disappoints. Always excellent üëèüëèüëçüëç","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Divya Nagarajan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUwIL7QBCTxsDcTjVQjwqSiPY3foWCHrw_W5wxr0e1Yqy0CJh3k=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Unfortunately had a bad experience first time ordering here. Had a late flight into Vancouver and this was the only place open late. Ordered Matar mushroom, garlic naan and roti. The gravy was extremely oily (taste was okay) which I could eat still, but the garlic naan was abysmal. It was hard as a biscuit, even after soaking it in gravy. Very disappointed.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOqmg8XpRBFvbLvoCrYWREgtqzVs0IDgNd7yjAV&fid=0x0:0x3e06ff1afa69795a"],"When":"2022-10-10"},{"Name":"Anna Chumak","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIDbQ8jhy5NECh0YQ3SSMtt0seuI9df8Q3SPZmPpZPSq5Aa0cv9=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Ordered delivery and the whole bag was delivered oily. Everything made sense when I saw the curry, there was a layer of oil on it and only 6 small pieces of lamb in it. Really disappointing‚Ä¶couldn‚Äôt eat it.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNwLxL2zcd_2YwngwJ_d06WEpjTnGZfytny4Bqh&fid=0x0:0x3e06ff1afa69795a"],"When":"2023-3-18"},{"Name":"Koja Cafe","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU65gGF_SrJtUnucdddTz6VBtxep7nm3OQdqJPBHCaVf1hKHEw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Nice owner and staff, delicious food.
They offer us complementary Chicken Pakura. We moved on this neighborhood and find this foods here.
Highly Recommended.
If you are hungry anytime, there is open late time and you can order by all food delivery app.
DD, SK, UB.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMv7jUNg2sj-qaUn7AKvSPSVtdX_0dFi4CflgK4&fid=0x0:0x3e06ff1afa69795a"],"When":"2022-5-30"},{"Name":"Shelley Luce","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXrrZJ8WSgN7RG_pbFTMdgLI9QWZf-J1dxvMGKw-7VvBLRBridJ8Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Chicken korma and mattar paneer were delicious - quite spicy so ask for mild if you don't want hot. Big portions. Veg pakora were different than I'm used to and so good! Lightly salted on the outside, crunchy but not oily. Nice folks cooking and serving too. I'll go back.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Melanie Pennington","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIkHaYi7yzyG5Rb2EoaRDHXVg8zdjVei2csLCogRWxpKL81QA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"We love their rice + curry bowls. Great size for 1 person + leftovers. Limited flavours but we have our faves. Mild is usually medium. Fast service. Don‚Äôt order from their website, not reliable. Order from the delivery apps.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Samantha Doyle","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVuJaBK1gZGjnhYD7bJV7Gs7cl-tPvKFz65juknPXp-eyBvOfKZ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Every time my partner and I order here it is absolutely delicious and the service is relatively quick. We have not yet been in the actual restaurant but hopefully we will soon. We always oder the same things which are: either butter chicken, chicken tikka masala, vegetable pakora, plain rice, plain naan, and/or garlic naan. The chicken itself is not the best chicken I have had (in terms of tenderness and flavour), but it is always nicely cooked, there are more than 4 pieces (other places on the North Shore have a tendency to only give like 3-4 pieces of chicken lol), and the flavour of the sauces makes up for it.
The food is also well priced - it is hard to go out these days without breaking the bank so I really appreciate places like this who offer more food at a lower price. I do not have any photos yet but hopefully soon I will be able to snap some of the delicious meals! Also the photos taken (at the time this was written) do not do their food justice lol! Our dishes have always looked really yummy.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Olivebranch","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKl0y6mjiLwaORTDfeB8edypXSqDH2TA0yrbyZ79iDD8ikEfg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"3 stars for butter chicken - could HV been more thick with more cream , butter and more portion of chicken. 5 stars for tandoori chicken. I had half tandoori Chiken which was quite a good portion,they could HV given more green chutney. Flavor of chicken was v good -spicy and juicy

They must work on their butter chicken

Naan bread was also big in size

Wish this place all the best , it could be a great addition to Indian restaurants in the small community of North Vancouver","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"jaspreet walia","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWNmqj9aUIPRtCkjA1bKPO84rlVYU-KirB2E7b33gawCjhcqhNB=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We order malai lotta today it was very delicious. For sure I will order again and highly recommended!!!!!! Thanks","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPLDWdae53IzeAYbfBqG4cYVLyBvRp7AsfQ2e-R&fid=0x0:0x3e06ff1afa69795a"],"When":"2022-5-20"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Mark Turnbull","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWb3y-xYzCVR6N_Ai49HYr4STDQ454gU7LeU-LpiQKvRGfVZTU=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Great tasting burritos. We got one in a bowl and the other was a wrap. I think the ratio in the wrap could have had a touch more salsa. The water cups were also fairly small. Overall this small Mexican restaurant is worth visiting. Nice small patio to sit on when the weather is nice too.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOu5A9rNfU69uQRpUzH_2KUvSZjPk39CBBXbi-9&fid=0x0:0x43a330c54bdbbfc4"],"When":"2024-7-22"},{"Name":"Anju","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV3NBFx2EqwPeNoEkV2MebyCIf0Znuxcr0FFtfaRAHKwPRpguQHlw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The BEST vegan options. I loved my jerky bowl and my boyfriend got the kung fu burrito. The quantity was perfect and it tastes delicious, the server was very nice too. Cute inside and good price","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNm2OtiJ9JDsYVbpIcKDaSij2AmDxpe3EgGpKd3&fid=0x0:0x43a330c54bdbbfc4"],"When":"2024-10-1"},{"Name":"David Le","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUYWwbbj5xYvMxtEEq5HNMw_xynPQLHyq4Oq1zkZVKlnUQ0hjx8=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Fun spot on Lonsdale where the Menchie‚Äôs used to be. Staff was very friendly and attentive. Took our order, thoroughly checked for allergies we had, gave good recommendations, and were not pushy on drinks (we were with a non drinking group). Food was good. The burritos and tacos were fine - tightly wrapped burritos and well grilled/ toasted. Really good and not overly messy.  We have been here a couple of times, so I‚Äôd personally rate the meat Austin/ Angus > Encino/ Chicken > Wilbur/ Pork. The green sauce is yummy, the red sauce is very spicy. üå∂Ô∏è. Food wise, they don‚Äôt serve and complementary chips or anything. So, for the experience it feels like you are at a dine in restaurant, but the food portions are very basic. Food Presentation and quality are a step above Chipotle, but Chipotle has them on selection of condiments and volume. 80s retro vibes and play list was super fun. I could see this place being a fun late night eat place with a small group.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOIWP1iVc-Cw6trfd8Vr3agdehpJrMWX1IUBaFW&fid=0x0:0x43a330c54bdbbfc4"],"When":"2024-8-22"},{"Name":"Sam Nagina","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocILktP5eBAiqYEw_d9nIp88FHviF6BkjUAmdT_6_5AHNglNJw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Gringos is a great place to grab some great tasting tacos for an even better price. I recommend getting the 6 tacos for $22.50. The atmosphere is upbeat, and the music selection suits the environment. The house hot sauce is better than most places. It had a very nice kick at the end. The graphics on the table are very fitting with different taco inspired themes. Situated right on the corner with nice a street view. I suggest everyone try this place.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN2NCVzCRZq3hbeqTtFJ4s3zo1PSZUioM3fdydr&fid=0x0:0x43a330c54bdbbfc4"],"When":"2024-8-18"},{"Name":"Mauricio","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIQCeBI__-ADFeb2mcVXcZfR_gWkXVdXNkNsI2olML3maTuNvk=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Friendly service, nice place, Marguerite and nachos were tasty. Good for groups until 4.

Btw Gringo email me and they can fit groups in after 4pm too.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN-vpp8115zdWBzm22JK9G1Drx5lM5Ndm8-tEEY&fid=0x0:0x43a330c54bdbbfc4"],"When":"2024-8-4"},{"Name":"Kimberley Mac","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJzO9qR2hSxFg746yh-6H_O8QUsQ04hygUuZf8UJVqXdORAlQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Could not recommend this place enough! Came here for my Birthday in the middle of a very busy exam season and have no regrets.
The food was delicious, and very fairly priced. We were stuffed by the end of our meal. We tried the tacos, burrito, nachos, chips and queso, and margaritas. The pineapple salsa was also really tasty!
The staff and service were outstanding. We were greeted by I'm assuming the owner(?) Super great guy. Extremely friendly and energetic.
Having previously worked as a server, it‚Äôs refreshing to see a place where the staff doesn‚Äôt essentially follow the same corporate script and dull greetings. The energy in this place is lovely.

10/10 food, drinks, prices, service and decor.

This is a small restaurant, and despite just opening a few days ago, very busy. You may have to wait to be seated. The wait is totally worth it. Check it out!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOcYEQER-QVTrTCGU83IfsD9sRfxqfqx5ZxkJ1U&fid=0x0:0x43a330c54bdbbfc4"],"When":"2024-5-23"},{"Name":"¬°Mare! The blog","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUPe_Pjwnl3UCVj738z99A43kcsLgjfWkzhKKH2TU0DMHo7ykQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Honestly, this has been one of the most disappointing meals I‚Äôve had in a long time and I wouldn‚Äôt recommend visiting Gringo in terms of hospitality. During my visit I was actively ignored by the service at the place, and the food was ok, far from Mexican food or real tacos. As Mexican the vibe felt off from the moment I entered the place, no Latino music or Latino people around, lack of attention, and being actively ignored by the service are some of the things that made me had a sad experience. I've shared more about my visit in my blog.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN9LXY5ZB_4t3_-UUCt0SM3ftAVMyxrfDtr-xg1&fid=0x0:0x43a330c54bdbbfc4"],"When":"2024-6-13"},{"Name":"eakam sehgal","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVynH-jVDN67sN9PonPsgIsVc3iMD8j8WxtMCaTg6NoFtON6xuC5Q=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I visited gringos last night, and unfortunately, it was not the experience I expected. The ambience seemed promising at first‚Äîit looked like a nice taco place, but once we were seated, it became clear that the atmosphere was much lower energy than anticipated. The vibe just didn‚Äôt match the "nice taco place" feel I was hoping for.

I ordered tacos, and they were honestly below average. The flavors were bland, and the tortillas weren‚Äôt as fresh as I expected. My girlfriend tried their margarita, and it was nothing special‚Äîjust average, really.

The biggest issue, though, was the way they handled the drinks. They don‚Äôt tell you what brand of alcohol is being used, and all the bottles were covered. It made us feel really uncomfortable, not knowing what kind of alcohol was going into the drink. It came off as shady and unprofessional, and it definitely ruined the experience for us.

Overall, I won't be returning. The food wasn‚Äôt great, the drinks were mediocre, and the lack of transparency around the alcohol was a huge red flag. There are much better places in town to get tacos and drinks without feeling uneasy.","Images":null,"When":""}]

[{"Name":"John Singer","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXZVTg44KUaH8W1wpAIax1VZsEQFin93IMiG-Tmz5RO1_dl9HOS=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Just tried it for the first time tonight, amazing pizza. Price justified the quality, it‚Äôs solid. Crust is unreal ‚Äî I got the vegan one which was fantastic. Will be coming here again! Owner was also super friendly ‚Äî seems like a solid dude who likes making awesome pies.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNNY6r27E4uf0I9MEVft1DFwP1ztvEySz45SGzt&fid=0x0:0x6e2c366ae71b6779"],"When":"2024-8-11"},{"Name":"Melanie Dekker","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVZWOVby0mjxg_a0S6eqeAGCK2KQNcgM-5_mfCOxgIdTCNbKSq_=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Our first vegan pizza! Ordering pick up freshness, all OnPoint, and excellent! Large was a lot for two people but we managed! :-)
Even Fleckie had a look :-)

This place seems to have two names so for a moment the pick up was a little confusing.

Kind of wondered why a place called the rebellious tomato didn‚Äôt have tomatoes on the pizza‚Ä¶ anyway we will add to that NEXT TIME.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMn4il2QKl9H0RkO8Wmgn9wjnRKJ-U-Z2OwV7KX&fid=0x0:0x6e2c366ae71b6779"],"When":"2023-8-22"},{"Name":"Robert W","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUoAfScsjiMX4L5lOdMDplDNNeFzZPvFVlZB7oJNXXSP8qPoeY=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I have been a customer for 10 years in various locations in North Vancouver and at one time on Denman street too. Right now they are next to Queens Cross pub on Queens and Lonsdale. The pizzas here are a thin crust made with whole-wheat flour and have gf options available.

Within the next few weeks as of Aug19, Andy, the Patron showed me the new menu with exciting options reflecting regional differences in North American pizzas. Watch this space. There will also be integration with all the 3rd party delivery options. E.G. Uber eats.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMSC3aE2qVBwEjPOzkbESyv72YFPNREYomnm-Q4&fid=0x0:0x6e2c366ae71b6779"],"When":"2019-8-14"},{"Name":"Ramirez Perez","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWUJGa_NE_TC7BhInn5jYh7hr1Er1Qu8dhbytf9Vaa2KhHBx3mMxQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Seriously some of the best pizza I‚Äôve ever had. The owner is incredibly friendly and the pizza is always consistently delicious","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"maede","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU0GhSJsoxwcMKaxLWK7XC_HgTYr4xIiiJu4CiwCBYPNpfPYdzx=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"If you're looking for a high quality pizza and also good price I would definitely recommend Rebellious Tomato üçÖ
The owner is so friendly and nice .","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMsBVjE4-kx2wA7yvrVFoR9-ayMMO4myk2OKKhR&fid=0x0:0x6e2c366ae71b6779"],"When":"2022-7-28"},{"Name":"Isabel Boekel","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKhg3fMXP_nvEytyYEy9fgBh_kDXq2stQAwmDKeneXCzyrdUw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Andy is the best! The pizza was really tasteful üòä","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Tracy Adams","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ3Gxztt7XEmaRp3zjSU4arKaHFd4xfqpuyEKZJws6RUTVDpg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"One of my favourite pizza places. There used to be one in Vancouver close to my house, so we would go there a lot as a family. Although that location is closed now, we often stop at the North Van location when driving through.

Their pizza has flavourful sauce, and is the only thin crust pizza I have had without the crust getting oily/burnt. Delicious!

The reason I did not give five stars is because:
-The restaurant itself is small so there is not room inside for bigger groups, and also is not air conditioned.
-The gluten-free crusts are small as they are most likely pre-made.

However, everything else is great!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Japphet Araujo","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUxokukOYnrMJ45ALlZe29B054yIIdEArWYYE0AvwhmtNUNrv-e=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Whenever I buy pizza from somewhere else.. there is always leftovers. But when I buy from this place, pizza box is always left empty...

Come try this place out. Their pizza is great! üçï","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews: [{"Name":"Norman Farrell","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWOKauCUm-k2P6JXZbVaCjI514xmAUd8cPqhMzakFQdELGnjKWj0g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"This family-owned pizza and pasta restaurant is near Capilano University and North Vancouver's Inter River Park. The modest restaurant has been operating here for decades. We bought a plain cheese pizza with tomato sauce, another with pepperoni, and a somewhat unusual seafood pizza. Pizzas were ready promptly after a telephone order for pickup. The food was excellent and another bonus is that Westview Pizza and Pasta is not part of a national or international chain. People who want to buy local should choose outlets that aren't sending royalty payments to far-off places. This is one.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMZlkh3tlxfiR5C5UBJhqW7HCjqykA0fl2EOym5\u0026fid=0x0:0xb37200ef1f02807c"],"When":"2024-6-30"},{"Name":"Joanna Watson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVSvOBryPapBUS1wQg4EUknLYpPtsn5vipZcv3GZQ1M8tlgK6bR=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I've been all over the US, coast to coast before coming north of the border to Vancouver BC. Westview makes the best pizza I've ever had. I would even go as far as to say that I like it better than Chicago deep dish and New York style, which is saying a lot. This is the only pizzeria that I've seen where the mozzarella cheese has a subtle sour taste like it's been marinaded in vinegar. The flavor pairs well with the flavors of all the other toppings.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Vicki Gogo","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXFoREVcNCXj_ViX_AXujAt86x22eOrNPVq6Shih3JaPcT9IaE=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Delicious pizza!! Friendly staff. We ordered the medium Vegan regular crust and the small Greek on cauliflower crust. **PS they are located close to Capilano University, Holiday Inn \u0026 Superstore **{no where even close to Westview Mall}","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM12M7kNGYUMX4CgptIj_NNQTHLwDQ3xX4R2e9G\u0026fid=0x0:0xb37200ef1f02807c"],"When":"2023-10-21"},{"Name":"Krista Gray","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIbST1dWaxS-O0W2H-CoBYG0eZS6dc7eL9BJm98Vt51bvxBhg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Absolutely love this place! Delicious pizza and the workers are so nice. Might have to order tonight actually!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Gale Leitch","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUEjg3TtUewZPz6iqqgj3xHn24A56Z4LL1fyOXhgtZWQxAIeXQf=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Worst, most disgusting pizza ever! Raw crust. I feel sick just thinking about the thick raw crust. DISGUSTING.\n\nThe beige stuff under the white blobs in the photo is the uncooked, raw pizza crust. YUCK. I think all the positive reviews are fake because the pizza there is one of the worst pizzas I have ever had anywhere. Raw crust? Raw crusts can make you ill. Shame on Westview Pizza! Ugh!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM9zf_KylS4uMfZs-Xd8lJhiKZEbUSYhdHJcjSZ\u0026fid=0x0:0xb37200ef1f02807c"],"When":"2021-3-13"},{"Name":"GRADY SLIMS","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXUGhbzy_mBM5H9SmvF0ZUwLd2Ako0tTKtib4P69unABtWFzXz6=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"My guy has great pizza especially for the price. It's not an eat in kind of place orders to go","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Conrad Elander","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJqHrvlH3Ub2lOLygLs2dmXnSynMX1JtSv4L96JfobWaKXC2w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is a small family owned pizza place that always delivers good quality and well loaded pizzas. Highly recommend, the pizzas taste home made.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Scott A.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWtVUX_XWKfJmtQK-_TCrr0wQiALa-cWEGMQohNooKR4YW-3kxLuQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The gentleman (who I assume is the owner) at Westview was super helpful in preparing lunch for my camp staff (even helped me load my car). user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Ali Haji Esmaeili","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVAgsHxVY79VZXVaJdYAohrfhlcjTElHZox2tnu98VHGMwYFeCU9g=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I recently visited Haida in Vancouver and was absolutely blown away by the quality and taste of their sandwiches! As someone who has also experienced dining at their main branch in Iran, I can honestly say that the Vancouver location not only meets but exceeds expectations. The cold cuts were flavorful, while the hot sandwiches were a delightful journey for the taste buds‚Äîperfectly toasted, generously filled, and seasoned to perfection. Every bite was a testament to their commitment to quality and authenticity. It‚Äôs rare to find a place that serves food as soul-satisfying as this outside of Iran. If you‚Äôre in the area and craving an exceptional sandwich, Haida is a must-visit. Their food truly raises the bar for what good sandwiches are all about!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN_XuELKYIe-nib7TcaZOf5A3R8wolz942f5qD1&fid=0x0:0x20d2fd7c4f62c85d"],"When":"2024-11-10"},{"Name":"Alireza Adibfar","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWw0e0TPYH6ZGJ-h-9tpBv6EKeu0oq4WXMG5sJYunWQBSV6pZ-S=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We visited from Florida and have to say this place is FANTASTIC! Tastes just like Haida back in Iran and even better. Quality of food and customer care are outstanding here.
Update: we came back for dinner as well and got pizza. The pizza is so delicious here, and you enjoy every bite of it. Tastes just like Iran. The management and staff are so friendly and adorable. They respect their customers so much and this was the most important thing for me that brought me back here. Wonderful experience.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOeECs25U7BPpqgULWl-BGrEx5tlYQ91MtCd_zt&fid=0x0:0x20d2fd7c4f62c85d"],"When":"2024-7-5"},{"Name":"Alireza ghorbani","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVqLSY7yG-lKZWOCqXutzUS9yhyMZANM6kiDT1WNo6YC1E6lY5_=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I recently visited Haida and had an extremely disappointing experience. I tried two different types of pizza, and both were completely tasteless. The crust was bland, the toppings were sparse and lacked any flavor, and overall, it was a huge letdown. To make matters worse, the pizzas were outrageously overpriced. For the quality (or lack thereof), it was definitely not worth a dime. I would not recommend this place to anyone looking for a decent meal. Save your money and go elsewhere. Always read reviews.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPJ5WL41_iGYHer8LQtxjgDeTamb1HiLBTpT-PS&fid=0x0:0x20d2fd7c4f62c85d"],"When":"2024-6-3"},{"Name":"Paris","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU0WPazoJBCdtRqTbBzCZwEk_hqahECBnbuv3HHVvW2_zNHbRKn=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is truly one of my favorite spots! Every bite takes me back to Iran, from the mouthwatering sandwiches to the delicious pizzas. Everything here is superbly awesome. Plus, the prices are fair, making it even better. However, the only hiccup we encounter is parking availability. Despite this, the warm atmosphere and friendly staff always make our visits worthwhile. I highly recommend trying their Haida Royal sandwich; it's absolutely divine! One suggestion for improvement would be to consider rearranging the decor to optimize space for more customers; it could enhance the overall dining experience.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPD9puRyMMR5SlF93EDf2erVcdsJAKWG_2CrRzP&fid=0x0:0x20d2fd7c4f62c85d"],"When":"2024-3-28"},{"Name":"Paniz Tah","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKDSN0dDBYAGyl6xv4D0u3t_p22-wo9BqURgVUBvYvxZOTCtQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Haida used to be so much better. The sandwiches were so big and filling and now you can easily tell the portion of meat is 1/3 and more chips. Sadly, we won‚Äôt be coming back anymore.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMh8FwlHgdZeb_Q8p5u0WonkmWkZUT7dU8AaQx9&fid=0x0:0x20d2fd7c4f62c85d"],"When":"2024-7-9"},{"Name":"Zeeshan Sohail","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXQzSgXcEIo5d0fY039IL3LLi7k1i-9eyjB9u0xnur9BQekUdtD=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Double the meat in the sandwiches and pizza for that perfect meat to bread ratio. Decent sandwiches and all but that roast beef and mushroom pizza is one of the best pizzas in BC. Have limited seating, but still highly recommended.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNKFRjqWOPdE3FC2bxykPwmc9tG5sOT-JwRGoY-&fid=0x0:0x20d2fd7c4f62c85d"],"When":"2024-2-17"},{"Name":"Shaghayegh seyedmohammad","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK_B0ehruFZbiddMnrUrt2yH8yL99Se1mfwshAzSCSHQDVEcg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I recently visited Haida and had an amazing experience! The food was absolutely delicious, with rich flavors and generous portions. The atmosphere was warm and welcoming, and I especially loved the touch of Iranian music they played‚Äîit really added to the overall experience. The staff was incredibly kind and served us in a very polite and professional manner. I highly recommend this place to anyone looking for great food and a cozy dining experience. I‚Äôll definitely be coming back!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Salar Sedigh","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW5RjmND3ICPzng4b8UVVP7Tgc7nraBVl7BtV2Cc0vk7sIBFVDs=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Haida Sandwich in Lonsdale North Vancouver is a true culinary treasure that not only offers a unique sandwich experience for Iranians but also delights taste buds across cultures. During my first visit, I was thrilled to find the nostalgic sandwiches I had been longing for. They were nothing short of awesome, amazing, and exactly what we crave. The staff was incredibly friendly, creating a warm and welcoming atmosphere. The dining area provided a comfortable space to enjoy the delicious sandwiches. To add to the nostalgia, Haida Sandwich offers nostalgic pops like Istak (Flavored Non-Alcoholic Beer), which enhanced the experience even further.

What's truly remarkable is that our non-Iranian friends thoroughly enjoyed their visit too. The Kielbasa (Deli) they savored was bursting with taste, and the bread was wonderfully fresh. This is a testament to the quality and craftsmanship that Haida Sandwich puts into every aspect of their menu.

If you're seeking a taste of nostalgia, paired with exceptional flavors and friendly service, Haida Sandwich is the place to be. From the delightful sandwiches to the inviting atmosphere, it's an experience that will leave you satisfied and longing for more.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOEjG7RxIh78x4Az4nfkkoLRKD-8k6zfrZicl8j&fid=0x0:0x20d2fd7c4f62c85d"],"When":"2023-7-19"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Munro Stuff","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWj0Wcuk6ox5dfAeJ4fAaMbhX_F-nzzt3p5oc_f0hBd0NpbGSM=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Stopped by for a chicken noodle ginger soup. Appreciated that they had real bowls for onsite eating. Focaccia bun was a nice accompaniment. But the soup really didn't have any ginger or distinct flavours though it was hearty and filling.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNjdcunIbadRiPxaTs6Za0cTU6izc8xBV9EMnL5&fid=0x0:0x539ada25717ea047"],"When":"2024-11-22"},{"Name":"Andrew Fredericks","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWBT1QOeanTpBtlbaO932uXUw6u-VfjO_FqsPItm53WI4I6ODOB=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"When it comes to Chicken Noodle Soup, the portions of each ingredient is key.

Often enough at other places, the imbalance of chicken & noodles is disappointing.

But the soup i just got tonight, I was *pleasantly* surprised to see that there was no shortage of any ingredients in here.

Abundance of noodles, carrots, and chicken. This made my day.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Monica Glez","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI3YU5YCEHOH6RfLDdoBNeAfDdaY-PZ81kFz8bWoGFHRrolSA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The taste of the soup is incredibly good! I got the Boston seafood chowder and it was one of the best chowders I‚Äôd ever have.
The price is between $6 to $13 depending on the soup and size. It includes a piece of bread and butter.
The only thing I will suggest is that the place looks a little bit dirty and messy and as is an open area it doesn't look fine for the customers.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Ghazal Emaminia","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ_ffun6LYU_ACUi76cdipxfdQvLPVCbQHhAAjTSmSkhHuh2w=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"If you like your soup with big chunks of undercooked veggies then this is the place for you. I have tried a few soups here and they have all been disappointing. Got the lentil curry soup. It had very little lentil and way too much cabbage, carrots, and corn! Never seen a lentil curry soup with cabbage and corn. On top of that it was very sweet. Nothing like lentil soup. The two stars are for the service alone.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Julia","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXWLlEDPGAK2EvI-43a_pY4M94M9WFTB6ViCtrWjJKBm9a9Lplp=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We stopped in for a bowl of soup today.  On the menu was clam chowder and beef noodle soup. We both had the Manhatten Clam Chowder and it was delicious!  Highly recommend visiting this place.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMgef0n5d7tc4Np0GR6dhHyIk4UUAlfXe_bM5zm&fid=0x0:0x539ada25717ea047"],"When":"2023-9-27"},{"Name":"mark green","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWOmXVVG_tBZdtiUCB7LhPq1NpPTQlgKDBWCaHTwf5CZdoGwg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I‚Äôve been a customer for A LONG TIME ,
Never again !!!!!
I came from kits (on bike) to get some soup , with my purchase they charged me for a cloth bag .
On my way home THE SOUP FELL OUT OF THE BOTTOM OF THE BAG ALL OVER THE  ROAD !!!!

The birds have food now !!??

I spoke to Hugo ? And explained what happened , he said he had never heard of that happening before , thanks for the wasted words ,
if you provide a service, MAKE SURE IT WORKS
customer service is a joke

I WILL NEVER BE BACK , but and I‚Äôll make sure all of my friends and family never return","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMpVgz9njq8OpT8W7-1_kbLczmHfDXkDVo62EA&fid=0x0:0x539ada25717ea047"],"When":"2024-12-1"},{"Name":"Dvir M","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUxK6vUXIZPF_mBYpyYRstLoQm3iHWCiUkMzdVCeCCrurOmcIbk=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Update to my review from 3 years ago. My previous review it‚Äôs just in the photos that I added here. I used to be there at least twice a week.

I‚Äôm sorry to say that nephew but something in my opinion is super wrong. Raising the price at least 30% and giving only 2 sizes that they‚Äôre almost half of what it used to be, it‚Äôs not making the place better. It makes it only more profitable!!!!!
The place is very sad and seems very slow. I‚Äôm not writing this review to make you feel bad. I just want you to know that there are too many changes that they made this place to look and feel super greedy.
Leave the fact that the taste is not the same. It still good soup. Look at the sizing that‚Äôs a whiskey glass, you put only 1/3 of the amount of the chicken in the chicken soup. Very disappointing. I heard it from other regulars that they said that it‚Äôs not the same and it‚Äôs a sad place and I could understand because of the circumstances. This place used to have a lineup all the time. I‚Äôll be checking it again but probably in a year. Good luck with this","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP5hKH21X0LsKGLaVI6t47s-BQrHwHLCtzbwyBo&fid=0x0:0x539ada25717ea047"],"When":"2024-9-19"},{"Name":"Nathalie Mark-Yam","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWoQrdGaBUxO_MNnJ-iLC9WdC71OuyDLsFvoe30Bt1qowJxg6Fk=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Hearty soup with lots of stuff in it. you can taste the wholesome ingredients in the soup. Got a large size for $8 of Vegetable Mushroom Barley Soup and Italian Wedding soup. it was a perfect meal after being in the rain all day.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMiieaaVpJIhn-KZ0-IDvdruz0Uofa4Fc1ridMG&fid=0x0:0x539ada25717ea047"],"When":"2021-11-26"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Niki Attar","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVn-53AmgkmamoQrq5TfWpI9cZOB5TJBXqOHTKh-yDUINIubRYE=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"If you‚Äôre looking for an authentic taste of Iranian cuisine, Akbar Joojeh on Lonsdale Street is the place to go! The food is absolutely exceptional, and every bite feels like a journey back to Iran. Their juicy and flavorful grilled chicken, served with their signature pomegranate sauce, is truly unforgettable. The restaurant has a warm and welcoming atmosphere, and the staff are incredibly friendly and professional. Every visit here has been a delightful experience. Akbar Joojeh has quickly become one of my favorite spots in Vancouver. I highly recommend it‚Äîyou won‚Äôt be disappointed!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPfoDWGi1IOMCTwJiBYOpY3x3Z1NJ6B6K4suzxG&fid=0x0:0x61fe416c099d2950"],"When":"2024-11-20"},{"Name":"pooya m","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVO2d86SdYFU_wceKMe-VnB70h8Rur-PMALZ13lz9dK9ghMpCs-oA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Their new location (this branch) was beyond my expectations. Fantastic Iranian vibe. Carefully chosen interior design and decoration. Great food taste and quality. and as always great staff.
The only minor thing is that they were playing upbeat music. If I were them, I would play older Iranian songs like the other branch","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO0z1QHAcrqyZmgmIUrIzNMxkzngJtIqbc1TXA2&fid=0x0:0x61fe416c099d2950"],"When":"2024-11-16"},{"Name":"Mark Cheng","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLzxohj3PR44VP4AJ3NR1kDsDFST9az9dByCrml00Db5AEtnA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Went here for dinner with the family as the food photos caught my wife's attention and it seemed like an unusual hole in the wall. Most of the cooking is visible at the front of the restaurant with dining in the back and there was a frequent turning of tables.

Probably the biggest surprise at the restaurant was the portions and the food. For what you pay for, the portions are generous. Furthermore the food is fantastic, well seasoned as the beef kebab and shank were very soft and tender. Chicken tasted great but parts were a little dry.

Staff were pretty attentive and it was pretty easy to pay. Definitely would come back another time.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOJuESDMN9VFCaaMfAMkODcyfpsGL1h-YWLJ7WQ&fid=0x0:0x61fe416c099d2950"],"When":"2024-10-20"},{"Name":"Emad Ramezanie","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUyUrsSJLDhRo331k1ptB4o_9nChvokGO0Q7Yq_tlZIS6FZbrg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I recently visited Akbar Joojeh Restaurant at 1604 Lonsdale Avenue, and I loved it! The food was so delicious and full of authentic Persian flavors. Their menu is super helpful, with beautiful photos of the dishes that make it easy to pick what you want.

The restaurant has colorful chandeliers, traditional Persian decorations, and a cozy, welcoming feel.

The staff were really friendly, and the service was quick and smooth. If you‚Äôre looking for great Persian food in North Vancouver, this is the place to go.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMcw9HtREbsqED45yGIMIenWpTzxT_R2-EQXpDu&fid=0x0:0x61fe416c099d2950"],"When":"2024-11-20"},{"Name":"Sammy Hignell-Stark","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVRI_avwAYOagKX2wYUQDcJDIruyL-fsyctdUWIE4ptHecBzzui=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Absolutely delicious! The whole place smells fantastic! I especially loved dipping my kebabs in the yogurt sauce. Plenty to share and we still have leftovers that I‚Äôm looking forward to for lunch today. We will be back. Thank you!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOEWToIqU8aQIz7YNFJz2A8fLwfiPc4lQuhmi84&fid=0x0:0x61fe416c099d2950"],"When":"2024-11-13"},{"Name":"Axel Ziba","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWN8kLgZBJ7ksZBcgFu85x7nR6iYQl7F83s-3yMLwSUV0Ur83eN=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"If I could give more than 5 stars, I would! The food here is hands down the tastiest and most delicious I‚Äôve ever had. I‚Äôve dined here several times, and the consistency in both the quality of the food and the excellence of the service is remarkable. From the grill to the cash register, the staff are all incredibly friendly. This has become my new go-to spot for perfect Persian/Iranian dishes.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOGZuRyEGA2AEFsU4pqK-b7SrrBvKxOVDhC2iz4&fid=0x0:0x61fe416c099d2950"],"When":"2024-7-7"},{"Name":"Mahsa Rad","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWv2FjiCkrQk3LnGINeqPGxu3xZpoTH7lKlX1JM7QDReInJp0KL=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The food was amazing‚Äîso full of flavor, and everything was cooked to perfection. The staff made the experience even better with how friendly and welcoming they were. I‚Äôm already excited to come back and try more from the menu. Definitely one of those spots you want to keep coming back to!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMHdJjGaFJuqtNFsoVc-tF-4wPSRR42IyBj8pT5&fid=0x0:0x61fe416c099d2950"],"When":"2024-10-1"},{"Name":"Carol Song","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKIbZbb90dtvQf2UmrPvpF3lw3Fj9Whx35iyZPMjJ0cJM-RSw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The business on Sunday was so good. Although we came at 4pm, we couldn't get a table even if there was one available because we didn't have a reservation. The waiter at the door was cold and indifferent. This gave me a bad first impression. But I chose to take out because it looked really delicious. Sure enough, I was excited when I saw the food. The portion was big and fresh and delicious! I loved the grilled eggplant and grilled chicken the most. The chicken bones were grilled until soft and tasty. The free flatbread was really great with the grilled eggplant! My friends and I enjoyed it happily in the car. Next time I have experience, I will definitely make a reservation to enjoy it. Please don't miss this restaurant!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipML_xVeWKhaXmVHa025llQJjKg2UdCdkPjg8Mu6&fid=0x0:0x61fe416c099d2950"],"When":"2024-7-1"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Patrick Graham","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWPGn-0rnYhibroPawC7crdZgRFkVYU_Vh2ofycQ4wRGDS96B-5jg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Our family came here for a birthday dinner for our younger son. We had been recommended this place by a friend. It was very busy but we had made reservations based on their web site recommending it.

They brought us some green tea but we could have also had water. We were seated in a booth which has high backs so you could not see the other tables, it felt more intimate. There was a 2 seater table near which was occupied later in our dinner.

The service was great. We were seated quickly and asked if we would like something to drink. We all chose green tea which was brought out quickly. It did not take long for the food to be brought out and every so often someone would check how we were doing so the service was great!

I had the Salmon Don which was Salmon Sashimi on top of Sushi Rice. The Salmon was delicious and there was quite alot of it!

Our younger son and my wife had the Tempura & Sashimi. The Tempura was crispy and the Sashimi was smooth and flavourful!

Our older son had a California Roll and assorted Nigri Sushi which he said was
Really fresh!

We would definitely eat here again!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMiyjc5PTwzzrFfADzyJO21H1efpo3uS32yRxxS&fid=0x0:0xd66043b63639b6e3"],"When":"2024-7-21"},{"Name":"Bradley Jones","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWQSjOdt_NCThfrgQQSPCAI9c1m2q4Cia70lWTZMyAGLNwKu8R3=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Had a lunch box special . They were kind enough to swap out the California roll for the tuna roll which was great. Service was fast. A nice miso soup and I enjoyed the Goma-ae.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNyJjQ6Rw0TVcYaceBFS9f0qg4sHxjvLLWqSUrI&fid=0x0:0xd66043b63639b6e3"],"When":"2024-10-12"},{"Name":"Yoshiko C.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKtcsZOlyd8taDwX9F7EkmkehI4-UW_WG9O9oyFRNdwVNmFnuw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is really a suprise that one of the best Japanese restaurants actually located at a quiet neighborhood at Noth Vancouver. If it wasn't recommended by a friend, who is also a Japanese foodie, I wouldn't have discovered this. We ordered sashimi combo, deep fried squid appetizer, tonkatzu combo. Everything was oishiiiiii, so good! Always busy so reservation recommended.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM3E3SWyBvpSPysrnb0PEge_SXp4ny5MXz-3NnH&fid=0x0:0xd66043b63639b6e3"],"When":"2024-6-29"},{"Name":"F. D. Yang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVIKoboKBCCoVNFoBeRYNjWH_q7v3Y0TEFC_2o5biRC5M-XjcK-QA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Food 4.5/5 authentic and fresh. Portion is not small!

Service 4.8/5 attentive and friendly!

Ambience 3/5 we may be on a bad time but the floor was filthy with sauce and edamame and the chair next to us has water üò≠","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMO3LTBWSOaXrUcJu3uFayD88JSfaZCC1KnJ645&fid=0x0:0xd66043b63639b6e3"],"When":"2024-6-4"},{"Name":"Jimmie Mitchell","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocINP9l8li4c91EpOU8v7l0dUKncZ-73RKjC9aXXLSEmaM8T3A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Food was tasty and service was nice. Great experience all around. We will certainly visit again when in the area.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPyyXZLsfqAiLKYzDOQ65O9LbH8ceiaDOayBsJH&fid=0x0:0xd66043b63639b6e3"],"When":"2024-11-18"},{"Name":"Kiana Gibson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI3bcOK_qPjjRirtWadfCmHRfNY3bnjn4-5rQ5wLkcwiWbRNQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Our first time here, ate in. Would recommend a reservation as they seemed to be filling up, and had tons of pickup orders on the go.

The servers were friendly and attentive. The food came fast and was tasty. Not the best sushi I‚Äôve ever had, but no complaints. Large menu with tons of options.

This isn‚Äôt a fancy place, but it‚Äôs not trying to be that. If you want a reasonably priced spot for a quick, sit down Japanese meal, this is a great find!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jenny Chen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ-RkkQOKo91VRZKTVHEopcOUJg_9d1Id-eWYzZOKH1DOl3oMQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Price is great and so is the food and service :) really love their Matcha cheesecake ‚ù§Ô∏è and the sockeye salmon sashimi was delicious","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOpGwGCPRMOkPiaeKOqlSVKHgM_9GDz_LN2lM44&fid=0x0:0xd66043b63639b6e3"],"When":"2024-6-11"},{"Name":"B Arnold","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJI8fP1MoGexT6uiziCEMwHVIVngOxhCUjZ3dXxO_s5r0tL4A=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"I really wanted to like this place.  I ordered oily fish (sockeye, toro), which, if not fresh, is very apparent.  It was very apparent that it wasn't.  The atmosphere looked good, i ordered take-away.
The service was great; very friendly servers.  The price was fine if the food was great, but alas, it was not.  I've washed my hands several times after the meal, but the memory remains.  I only care about food quality, so it's a 2.","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Kyle Stansfeld","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXCOcLRzI3gNuuNuvLENZro3P_vwHmHUtnT9Xk5lvqAiZuUcAc=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The service is always fast, and the food is really good. Today I had the lunch combo. It started with a spring roll, followed by Wonton soup, and for my main dish was Chow Meiin and salt and pepper dry garlic chicken.. it was good!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMlZhrO5m9XMP_TmnyWKcivCS_0vgMkVzPRCaLu&fid=0x0:0xd2b940037a061558"],"When":"2024-5-17"},{"Name":"Ali Zohourian","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX4LNzU6KkPs6uY7j4P5E8uoyO7rOq4S4PXpvDnK-xmTLBWL0z_=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I recently visited and try their delicious food
The service was very fast
We tried Diced Chicken with Peanuts in Chili Garlic Sauce with Steamed Rice & Shredded Chicken Chow Mein
And we were very happy with taste and our order

I highly recommend this place and ask to help and support local please","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPosB1En8jJxPdX9c8IzCUlyEAtkWEGzCoPO8zd&fid=0x0:0xd2b940037a061558"],"When":"2024-7-22"},{"Name":"Nadyne Rousseau","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUZxLwjFP7JsOCxXJh6XqFvS3cPzfQTfnLAYMg9cNkS23Hd8LA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Food 3.5 stars, service (-)5 stars. Where do I start? First incident: pick up my order, get in my car, check my order and find a shrimp dish which I didn‚Äôt order but missing my beef dish. I went back inside and told the son of the owner about the mistake. He said I ordered it so I need to keep it but I can buy an extra beef dish. I explained to him I didn‚Äôt order this dish and would NEVER, EVER,  order a shrimp dish as my son is allergic to shrimp. I suggest he might have made a mistake with another customer‚Äôs order. He said that he did not and that was on my order. I argued with him and he finally change it for my beef dish.

Second incident: Went back because there is not much choice for Chinese food in North Van. Well, bad decision! Pre-ordered my meal ahead of time because I needed to pick up my son at soccer then drop off the food at home with my son, and drive my other son to hockey. When I got to the restaurant, the owner told me my husband already picked up my order which he didn‚Äôt. It turned out they give my order to another customer so they have to make mine from scratch again. The owner, her daughter and the cook started screaming at each other in Chinese about the mix up.

I had to tell them to stop arguing, do it when I am gone, and to hurry to prepare my order‚Ä¶‚Ä¶. I had to come back in 20 min which made me late for my son, the other one drop off, etc. The best/worse part‚Ä¶‚Ä¶ I finally came back to pick up my order and I asked for a discount on my meal (they didn‚Äôt offer) as their mix up caused me a lot of hassles. The owner offered few dollars off. I said the inconvenience they caused me worth much more than few dollars and that their customer service was sub par. I told they have no business etiquette.

The 18 yo daughter joined the discussion and told me I was insensitive to their business! Who made the mistake? I told them that they should assume their mistakes and not make the such a big deal about it. The daughter got upset and told me to get in my car. Never I‚Äôve seen a teenager speak to an adult client this way while the mom (owner) was watching.

What a family!!! Should not deal with public !","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Kyle LeGrow","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWK_MkdHm5LniyjTBLVq-wXmzzVrba1Ybvlrh0cb5mQzqHDVv6M=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Fantastic experience. Food arrived quickly, and was all delicious. The fried chili garlic beans and the sweet and sour pork were the highlights.
The atmosphere was like a lot of family run chinese restaurants, however I could tell cleanliness is important to the staff.
The location is easy to get to with enough parking out front of the store.
Thanks to the friendly staff!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOI3OGNCPpEauerXWJwB66AHX6ff0JHYVoziAni&fid=0x0:0xd2b940037a061558"],"When":"2019-4-24"},{"Name":"James Coles-Nash","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUkJrmtjWT371XtK4SkdD-gc4742YrtKT1KSibl27VRSYpTt9Yi=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Super tasty family run Szechuan style restaurant on your way back from Lynne valley. We have ordered many things over the years and they have all been very good and fresh. My favorite is the cumin lamb, but be warned it is VERY flavorful!

For people with kids they have high chairs and plastic plates forks and little cups. The only thing we have to bring is a bib and our kids!

We will keep coming back as long as this restaurant is here as it's the perfect place on our way back from the mountains.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNN5vPxyP_PV3I7SK81qMmSylj_XHFR5W1NNZp8&fid=0x0:0xd2b940037a061558"],"When":"2018-8-18"},{"Name":"Wayne Lloyd","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXvXczlh76llO-fYZcAF0qf3D1j8dsTDAeORSYb3v8bdTQEsiwW=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Food is ok, but nothing great. Lady at the till is also the waitress. She tries to force tip even for takeout. Very grumpy, my goodness, abrupt with never a smile.
Recently picked up a large order and asked for them, in advance, to mark boxes that contained shell fish or anything that had oyster or other shell fish sauce; allergy concern request! Grumpy lady refused to do it. Couldn't believe her answer. After this last experience, I'm done. Will never be back!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Adrian Lee","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJRz_uEV8AM70-EugybmCMjVZLIi0OfMP3My2LKS1PidWwGuA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"One of the better Chinese restaurants on the North Shore. More authentic than most and surprisingly tasty. The dishes were not oily and they were well seasoned. Pricing is decent. We've been looking for a decent Chinese restaurant on the North Shore for the longest time and think we've found one. Will give their other dishes a try.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPDNs97RKuEcXWm2qJF2JGYM_dGQWjReLzKnjaj&fid=0x0:0xd2b940037a061558"],"When":"2021-5-18"},{"Name":"The Canadian Kiwibirb","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWARmdUVGjNiSIQ56E4hj34-9pERPD4zWAu0arXJDUm3CmO0Ks=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Got our order wrong. Phoned and told them. They tried to gaslight us into thinking the wrong order was ours.

They made us drive all the way back to show them the food. Guess what, we were right. For getting our order wrong, making us wait an extra hour to eat dinner, and being rude on the phone, they gave us no refund and no extra food as an apology

The food was also bad
Pork-extremely acidic
Lamb-extremely dry
Beef-bland and burnt","Images":null,"When":""}]
