[{"Name":"M. A","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXLCC1RNpkYVL_wmAKVl8CVTBHMM0HswNTdpuCsVi3nWEHRpCVa=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"To the manager of the Bridge deck. This is saturday & our first time trying Bridge Deck cafe, with my husband ! Of course we liked your breakfast & especially the coffee taste!, but I will definitely come back because of the very good vibes of the guy (I think his name was Connor ! )
Thanks for making the beginning of the day so nice ! I'll 100% recommend this place !","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNsehjm4joIGED6mGtDCNyDaeAbR34n9qeNjDMW&fid=0x0:0x391664a428171a81"],"When":"2024-8-31"},{"Name":"A.J. Canadian","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU0mITu_1OR_MuXzhVIkPjHjZnimy2Y-mI64r72OA1Zbucah6-N=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I enjoyed my visit to Lonsdale Bridgedeck in North Vancouver. Great burger, homemade ketchup, craft beers and craft soda. Spacious inside and patio seating. Games in great condition, friendly staff and clean. Recommended","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM9hZJXX2-jY6Do_jRcbJ4yUb4BoqZjwaBH0tfQ&fid=0x0:0x391664a428171a81"],"When":"2024-7-1"},{"Name":"Nasim Yousefi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXWtFJYE2BnCXlIXcLOK5rDCE2MeW-Fdmu3YQ2gy8dbEC6F7Ybt=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"The 3 star is for the quality of food specifically the size. The service and beer is great though. This was my second time trying to eat here. Last time I tried taco paid $19 for 3 very small size tacos. This time I wanted to try something different. I ordered a poutine for $14. Couldn't believe my eyes when it came to the table.
The poutine I ordered was too small like a side bowl and the gravy didn't taste good.
The food comparing to the price is way too small and low quality in comparison to the other places in the area.
Sorry guys the price of your food here doesn't match the quality and size. Not gonna come back. I got really disappointed","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPDlqKdpPiPfe6MfVIzNSHvzdHec3dQb27didS4&fid=0x0:0x391664a428171a81"],"When":"2024-5-4"},{"Name":"BC Traveller","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJI9D2BD1nsnrC6TinL97T52m1JaWPruzRIqU25ehpO-rSyZw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I found the pulled pork to be really watery rather than saucy. Luckily it didn‚Äôt make the bun soggy, though. The pretzel bun itself and the dirty fries were great!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNl5n6uQqgZQoQor6AC4CWqq74vZ6vMOmfRkqxH&fid=0x0:0x391664a428171a81"],"When":"2024-6-15"},{"Name":"Gary O","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKxoS-FbJ8vYZQUB8LNUflczBtAZOBGAS9Bg2psXfXB7JWk9sAi=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Tried the kolsch and it was very good. I didn‚Äôt try food but it did look good. Nice place to hang out and has an outdoor patio.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOs5NzzOT6IVbtOMrp-DTcTk42asE3AxXoqvDPS&fid=0x0:0x391664a428171a81"],"When":"2024-9-8"},{"Name":"Angela Jeffery","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUtGyld6d4wIU2Lb7oe7xsoiq4r77iaBdF6nkFQ8ek01eF1q7c=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"The grilled cheese pulled pork sandwich looked small but was filling. The beer flight was good and the Bourbon Blood Orange was my favourite.
There's 2 outside areas depending on if you want cover or to sit in the sunshine.
I'm guessing the server was having a bad day because I asked for salt for the fries and asked for water twice. I then asked the busser for water and used the napkins I kept in my bag.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPUzYhjnkCAh7TXlemjXPz2Q9T-JZmuMPDAKFah&fid=0x0:0x391664a428171a81"],"When":"2024-4-16"},{"Name":"J B","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUKMp8AHz4-iegPeAXqIy5qc5q8sjO4H0YTVQv9caCwqiZEl40eRg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I‚Äôve been a vegetarian for almost 10 years and in that time I have looked for the best vegetarian burger.  I got the decked out burger with an impossible patty and no bacon and it Was the best vegetarian burger I have ever had.  The fries are incredible.   My wife said the salmon burger was the best she has ever had.  We went back 3 times this week.  Incredible.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP04HwgxdhYnXHKyEjuOELfQYj0plO16fdzLv0z&fid=0x0:0x391664a428171a81"],"When":"2022-9-8"},{"Name":"Kyrstein Jean","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVOaxUBV8reRMDiup-yzQm-uPVfY054xNmTy67TeC-dKPSjINAu=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This place is the very best. Well I can only say how long my heart has desired the perfect hash brown. For almost ten years on the north shore no place can seem to get it right. Many disappointed times I have had the frightful experience trying to digest old grease from the grill. I have now tried their 8.00 $ breakfast. Yes you got that right ....I honestly would pay more but instead I can afford a pint  of their most delicious beer with my Sunday brunch.

And the service feels like coming home.

Thank you.
Kyrstein","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Y. Cherski","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK-7SLlKKRW0Rqcp9wRXFlvt6gbh0rtI7PMIroLgxETtGiPwQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I'm usually wary of mall eateries, thanks to a few past letdowns, but Sushi5 was a gamble that paid off. It didn't rewrite my culinary code, but it did deliver where it counts: good service, tasty food, and reasonable prices. Nothing earth-shattering, but solidly satisfying. They've got a mix-and-match lunch deal that caught my eye, so there's a good chance I'll drop in again next time I'm nearby.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPzNKnNv5VNU2hnTgk5sVrlYR3YOmaHpFhyBGe5&fid=0x0:0xf387c93dda46b926"],"When":"2024-6-28"},{"Name":"Ali Zohourian","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX4LNzU6KkPs6uY7j4P5E8uoyO7rOq4S4PXpvDnK-xmTLBWL0z_=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Great sushi spot!
Sushi5 was a great spot to grab a quick lunch. The staff was clean, fast, and respectful, making the atmosphere enjoyable. The lunch box was a fair price and packed with delicious sushi. I'll definitely be back!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPMRXIzWs541FKEPHJEMfX83hMB4GWIjeQ1mU5u&fid=0x0:0xf387c93dda46b926"],"When":"2024-10-21"},{"Name":"Leah","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVKarmcGZ1Js35SCZKS4LzTbiBHhnd6ukNdOqfbApRvwTocr3k=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Update of my review one year later, Sushi5 has bumped to my #1, and I base this on the level of service, consistency of the quality + quantity of food, and at a fair price point.

Service is outstanding! Staff make an effort to remember you, they‚Äôre always friendly, quick to serve, and make sure you have everything you need while you enjoy a meal.

Sushi5 is my first choice when I crave Teriyaki or Udon Soup. The Udon Soup is loaded with thick noodles, broth, a variety of veggies, and meat or tofu. Their broth is by far the best I‚Äôve had in comparison to other sushi places on the North Shore; it‚Äôs packed with flavor, yet not too salty. I‚Äôve tried all Teriyaki (beef, chicken, tofu), all are perfectly seasoned, loaded with veggies, rice, meat, and come with miso soup. Their tempura is above average (in my opinion), because it‚Äôs a thin batter, so while you enjoy the flavor of the prawns or vegetables, they aren‚Äôt heavy or greasy. The quality and quantity is better than many places, which is why I keep coming back!

Special Rolls here are a tad underwhelming, but the basics are delicious and fresh (Veggie Roll, Wild Salmon Roll, Spicy Wild Salmon, Wild Salmon Avocado, Prawn Tempura Crunch Roll).

Atmosphere: clean, inviting, not too loud even when busy, seats are comfy. Even though you‚Äôre in a mall, they‚Äôve done a great job of making it not feel that way.

Thank you Sushi5 for making delicious meals and for being so welcoming!

P.S. food here works great as takeout and sustainably packaged.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP3Dgw0vyiL7kwMf4EmZ3va42b9IlJE7BBsgCcZ&fid=0x0:0xf387c93dda46b926"],"When":"2023-12-22"},{"Name":"Jennifer Thornton","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXxGkwZGNAlwKbi0bc9qqTJZsWoyAsXFmtNcwgpfNCHexwdoC9z=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is a great little restaurant in the middle of Lynn Valley Mall. The food was really good and the serving staff are efficient and friendly. I took a picture of my chicken udon halfway through eating it so apologies it‚Äôs not pretty, but it sure was good. They seem to have a very regular Patrons coming in. I‚Äôll definitely go back again. I should also know that the chicken udon was definitely two meals so good value for your money.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOOxZc-ygb8jknq1yNMG92cO2HBBsgC2FUohY9H&fid=0x0:0xf387c93dda46b926"],"When":"2023-11-24"},{"Name":"Lidija Trailovic","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWIOBRYejUDV5a4GCd2eFBukZEJKQw38tbuL7AZ-w5pIYJwENf4=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I love eating at Sushi 5!
My favourite sushi place in Lynn Valley.
Nice atmosphere, friendly and fast service, very good and always fresh food and prices are decent. For me, they have so far the best and tastiest Chicken teriyaki dish I have eaten. I recommend this place to everyone who likes Japanese food!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN7QU-EOjbylVqW8sZuQtVHQof5GEkHI2b7hSkl&fid=0x0:0xf387c93dda46b926"],"When":"2023-8-19"},{"Name":"Nooshin Rad","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXCRSsu_hCZB2D9B0bj1XTahPYYqeDwC3j2ZoEgnHbqag4ZXIc=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"This place used to be my top choice in the neighborhood for good sushi, and I‚Äôve been going there for several years. However, it seems they‚Äôve changed management or something, because the food has gotten really bad recently. The new staff are also very rude. I ordered miso soup, and when it arrived, the server‚Äôs finger was inside the bowl. When I asked them to change it, they responded with a lot of attitude. The special rolls used to be delicious, but I think they‚Äôve lowered the quality of ingredients to keep prices down. I don‚Äôt want to eat bad food, even if it‚Äôs cheaper.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jeremy Baines","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW9ub4r0RccAiS3MIHxIwZjBcrhCG4hIrZGuRE56uoIhY6MqYbW=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Good and fresh! Very tasty, great service. Rainbow roll and Dragon roll.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNJ87z8IRx-CPHjFMu5hrIZH5EfH_0nvF8uUyxR&fid=0x0:0xf387c93dda46b926"],"When":"2024-8-18"},{"Name":"Lord Stanley (Lifepilot)","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWzQPaJP0C4QgYze9YWfcg4vOQGSlA7Fi1WI2IqpyzPqwuzcItLsg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"A nice little find for a quick lunch sushi üç£ bite. Staff are very friendly and service is great. Food literally came out within 2min. Food prep was very fast and fresh. Rice perfect temperature and rolls were all very fresh. Pricing is reasonable but overall pretty good.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMp806fCspcunIN-3Vt1PSGt_t94qnVkxQ3R_IJ&fid=0x0:0xf387c93dda46b926"],"When":"2022-4-26"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Sebastian Stowe","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU2xnlK9Ce1ogERJqFquICGLCS5BqgKIBOWyw0q8q6As_8NT1GEOA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"AFC Sushi is a culinary delight that has left me astounded with its incredible offerings and unwavering commitment to excellence. From the moment I stepped into the restaurant, I was enveloped in an ambiance of warmth and sophistication, setting the stage for an unforgettable dining experience.

Let's start with the star of the show‚Äîthe sushi itself. AFC Sushi showcases an impeccable display of skill and craftsmanship in every piece of sushi they create. Each bite is a testament to the fresh and high-quality ingredients used, resulting in an explosion of flavors that dance on the palate. The attention to detail is truly remarkable, from the perfectly seasoned rice to the precise cuts of fish. Whether it's the classic nigiri, the artfully rolled maki, or the delicate sashimi, every item on the menu is a testament to the mastery of the sushi chefs at AFC Sushi.

One aspect that truly sets AFC Sushi apart is their unwavering commitment to sourcing sustainable and responsibly harvested seafood. They actively partner with suppliers who prioritize eco-friendly fishing practices, ensuring that the delicate balance of our oceans is preserved. This dedication to sustainability not only showcases their environmental consciousness but also provides diners with the assurance that they are enjoying sushi that is ethically sourced.

The menu at AFC Sushi is a testament to creativity and innovation. While they have an impressive selection of traditional sushi options, they also introduce unique and exciting flavor combinations that push the boundaries of traditional sushi-making. From signature rolls to fusion-inspired creations, every dish offers a delightful surprise for the taste buds. The incorporation of fresh herbs, sauces, and inventive toppings adds an extra layer of complexity and excitement to the dining experience.

In addition to the exceptional sushi, AFC Sushi offers a range of appetizers and sides that are equally impressive. From the light and crispy tempura to the comforting and flavorful miso soup, each dish is thoughtfully prepared to complement the sushi offerings. The diverse menu ensures that there is something to please every palate, and the quality and taste of each dish are consistently outstanding.

The service at AFC Sushi is impeccable, with a staff that is not only knowledgeable but also genuinely passionate about sushi and ensuring that guests have a memorable experience. From the moment you enter the restaurant to the final goodbye, the attentive and friendly staff go above and beyond to make you feel welcomed and well-cared for. Their recommendations are spot-on, and they are always ready to provide any assistance or answer any questions you may have.

The restaurant itself is beautifully designed, with a modern and elegant aesthetic that creates a refined yet inviting atmosphere. The attention to detail in the decor is evident, from the sleek sushi bar to the comfortable seating arrangements. Whether you're dining alone, on a date, or with a group, AFC Sushi provides a comfortable and sophisticated setting that enhances the overall dining experience.

Lastly, I must highlight the incredible value that AFC Sushi offers. Despite the exceptional quality of the food and the attention to detail, the prices are incredibly reasonable. This allows diners to indulge in an extraordinary sushi experience without straining their wallets‚Äîa rare find in the world of sushi restaurants.

In conclusion, AFC Sushi is a true gem for sushi enthusiasts. The combination of exceptional sushi craftsmanship, sustainable sourcing practices, attentive service, and elegant ambiance create a dining experience that is second to none. I wholeheartedly recommend AFC Sushi to anyone seeking an unforgettable culinary adventure that will leave them craving more.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jinpyung Kim","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXffi-fBFqDsRHqnZVhEbIzQOU0otRrUFOzyB0vijm4TL68qO1O=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Really really great sushi and service was super cheerful and friendly.
(and reasonable price!)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNimaYNATgLRR1qebh-NYq903Gd6gbXHztJBMOI&fid=0x0:0xfd0eae1b1d306bec"],"When":"2021-7-17"},{"Name":"S C","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLHLCGPwY5YsLO8AT9mXCgGhw_r525VpEnc4AKKIDm42jxExQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Their sushi is top quality you can expect. Got to know the people and realized they are the new owners, acquired the business pretty recently. Something you won't expect at a grab and go quality and taste! I am already a repeat customer on my busy days at work. Def recommend!!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"T Chay (ÏµúÏßÑÏàò)","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUZpu2UV6ot7h9gFivrsWWQchs1208-FmUIzKO2Ejf7_7ED_auO=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The worker is very friendly and makes great sushi! Top quality and fresh ingredients. I am a regular customer on Sundays! The sushi always has me coming back more","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Dong Young Choi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKqoxibh6E5aEM5aqOr4wR75xreikKVi3aQbQPMMgM8y7OG=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Amazing sushi ~!
Everything tasted fresh and their kitchen was clean :)
They were pretty busy but efficient and friendly was the service we got.
We will definitely be coming back very soon!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Î≤ïÏÇ¨Ìã∞ÎπÑ","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU98OfvFMQI46HUPG8yaaJ_odAIyF7EUnz-lVDN0nluhIHoK5tp=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I didn't expect it... but it's awesome !!!
Best cost-effectiveness !!
U will have to try it :)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM4SQjIP92ymAJKhAkwYiCqgfzWsz49ISk2aYeF&fid=0x0:0xfd0eae1b1d306bec"],"When":"2021-7-7"},{"Name":"Dustin Morrison","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKGtKdQHz8QRzJZpNyMaH77GSSHfCxu4frEFyKj_J7SQQCULQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I was in a hurry and needed a quick bite to eat, AFC SUSHI was by far some of the best sushi I've ever had! A wonderful hidden gem that's Highly recommended.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"SW LEE","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjURAOwGgpr1Lp21q1Jr7s-ln73IP2siDNohueboLwDuXwNx0Js=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This was probably the best sushi I have had in 30 years.

[{"Name":"K H","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVo2hR2qKHBGSuFyVVc1kqvuNnr23GVLd19IdZCsiU8tz8tbtW-=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Very spacious and open indoors. Right next to Persia foods. Food is extremely great value for the amount you get, very fair prices. Chicken was moist, beef was delicious. It was a good place for a quick lunch. Only one thing was that service was a little slow, but we could see them working hard.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN98uZbT7nQPxBKV4L9MYd513rbCfJ4_aZMi1fq&fid=0x0:0x1cf36ecbcf7a4049"],"When":"2024-10-26"},{"Name":"Negar Moghtadaei","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLRIa5Kn-UGHOLy4LwrYa0lGw0Rwc6-By_aUzLCbfh_MdhvN1s=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"It has a nice and nostalgic atmosphere, with pleasant vibe. The food was good, though I wouldn‚Äôt say it was the best Persian food I‚Äôve had in Vancouver. The staff were polite and kind, but the service was very slow. We waited almost an hour for our food to be ready, which took away from the overall experience.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO7TPFtaOeLfgFOlrymjjRnRxO3Ix297IYEtlZy&fid=0x0:0x1cf36ecbcf7a4049"],"When":"2024-10-12"},{"Name":"Mehr Poulad","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKnMmsASCmXLOvaFhR1RoQ03vxNx7oVUBdwy_npEYvb7k7uZA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Food is decent and comes in large sizes. The steak kabob was a little dry but the loghmeh was juicy. Service can be improved as the wait staff aren't very attentive and need to confirm a lot of things with management. Also wait times can be ridiculous depending on how many pickup or delivery orders they have.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMLO-gTEhCrE7wmd1XdH4rAWOY7ONFaDpilMdeC&fid=0x0:0x1cf36ecbcf7a4049"],"When":"2024-8-20"},{"Name":"Alex MZ","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWFAZ3nTWliK_VtSenzw4uXoch_XcB3H6HxxbxlrUtcPTBIKY4A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Persian cuisine lovers, this place has a good variety of Persian dishes, a spacious dining area which allows good distance between tables.
I tried Kobideh with salad, the portions were good and were delicious. There are free parking spots in front of the restaurant which was great and convenient.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMBB7OerrRQ0fuIa3bGPPk-qy4yC4C9ycFHttae&fid=0x0:0x1cf36ecbcf7a4049"],"When":"2024-7-24"},{"Name":"Mariena Bui","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU6Nw1jeBXne8haJacgZytBHrMEqU2gmOMAF3l5QWK0CwO3rXPJ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The first thing I liked about this place was how chic it looked when I first came inside and I was really amazed by how tasty the food was here. I suggest you try anything at this restaurant, because it all taste delicious! One last thing the price here is better than most Persian restaurants","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipON9ksLhpJFjo_Lect_M8gPvsDcMQtHKdLkScPD&fid=0x0:0x1cf36ecbcf7a4049"],"When":"2024-6-30"},{"Name":"Alireza","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUFO8S_5bnJ1Gbxa0DrJ-JDnEI06M_5nz8TkqZ51KiwdQjq5mRr=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"I visited Chelo and had a pleasant experience overall. The atmosphere was cozy, and the staff were friendly. I tried the Kabab Torsh, Koobideh, and Joojeh Kabab. The Joojeh Kabab was definitely the best‚Äîit had better flavor than the Koobideh and Kabab Torsh, which were both a bit underwhelming in taste. Still, it‚Äôs a nice spot to visit with great service and a pleasant ambiance.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMUOrjfAwEZWAIbIp2_jtGk-jji1_nzj1cbDunQ&fid=0x0:0x1cf36ecbcf7a4049"],"When":"2024-12-3"},{"Name":"Abdelrahman Khalaf","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU2jHI4KfqcSaV3xQ_vuzOHPSCzM5tStwL7T9jnOX2wCZGamqfc=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Of course quantities are massive in general, however i ordered lamp shank and it was okay.. i felt meet should spiced more.
On a side note: our table wasn‚Äôt so clean
Reasonable pricing tho.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMBd26eFU_cbLJO1pCJ1dSjepiiv3J6ZxaKuhA4&fid=0x0:0x1cf36ecbcf7a4049"],"When":"2024-11-12"},{"Name":"shamim yousefi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX92T57_TCVyI4NjzNJe2M55CNmQS_1T0Oqk8MnNuxTqbRMvQk=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I recently visited Chelo Restaurant and I loved it! The food was so delicious and full of authentic Persian flavors. Their menu is super helpful, with beautiful photos of the dishes that make it easy to pick what you want.

The restaurant has colorful chandeliers, traditional Persian decorations, and a cozy, welcoming feel.

The staff were really friendly, and the service was quick and smooth. If you‚Äôre looking for great Persian food in North Vancouver, this is the place to go.","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"April Heyman","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUzhK8ZI-LCFNEN2-quYoNjfEii33Wm3ajB65Q4iGUbScPkyz7w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The fresh is Chinese food I've probably ever had. It's steaming hot when it comes out. Generous portions and beautiful display. Service is always amazing even when it's busy. Only thing I might say is that it's far less salty than other Chinese food places. This will be a plus for a lot of people who complain about salt. I put soy sauce on my food when we dine here. I think my favourite menue item is the Buddha's feast. My hubby likes the ginger beef (extra good here) and says the Singapore Style Vermicelli is fantastic.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMlBSXJ0YF5h4pVLFtZMyBXmawHFUxJ7NStgAXB&fid=0x0:0x3ef7c1869c373ac8"],"When":"2024-11-27"},{"Name":"Melanie E","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUR0bJcxqNkJt-i1wxCH3EaQXevncA86panZszfT__NAs_0KWRp=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"One of our go to places on the Shore. We ordered a few dishes for our dine in dinner.

Food: 4/5 - decent portions and tasty. We love the green beans. Still tasty after all these years
Service: 4/5 - server came over a few times asking if everything was all good
Atmosphere: 4/5 - the decor is nicer than it was a few years ago

We‚Äôll be back.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPeQgdze7B52canLSE11ldUAniT8C2JIH9fJbOH&fid=0x0:0x3ef7c1869c373ac8"],"When":"2024-7-23"},{"Name":"Tricia ‚ÄúGigi‚Äù Jackson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUwNSJncUFmfw4xR63i5k1g42tUTsrNZ3tpNgKGJMSlYdHD9Ah5=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Their food is very favourable, freshly made on demand. We ordered online through the website, and the food was delivered fresh and arrived well before the delivery window ended. No soggy over, sauced or small pieces of ingredients, just fresh, tasty and voluminous.¬† Each picture was taken of the meals after two large servings had been enjoyed.  If I estimate 6 to 8 servings, it's between 15 and 20 dollars a person, including delivery and tip!  A good value for freshness.  I think there are at least 4, maybe six servings. (We bought two ginger beefs, with one of each of the rest) 5 Stars for flavour, freshness and food for value. Give them a try!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNjs_GCRxumT_2TmDF77IOvs5bdARocH8TV-bl5&fid=0x0:0x3ef7c1869c373ac8"],"When":"2024-4-27"},{"Name":"Peter Cross","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUHmBXMXmX9-43PxxMc-vQWx8OaX3r8ByLsfhp1pyyCEQpdxmTkCA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Had a wonderful lunch today.  We popped by just after an early day.  Service was excellent and the food was too.  Nice to have decent Szechuan so close to home.  Will be back.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNRXxLiXUZx4cL7K9Hv5dOB7chpIBGlAdKocico&fid=0x0:0x3ef7c1869c373ac8"],"When":"2023-12-29"},{"Name":"Wendy Shay","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVM7rkgmOMkjrjUmvCt0TGJxM9Hb_ISvesiiwwn9PZfMcoomfRy=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Honestly my favorite thing to get from here is their chow fun with extra onion and fried chili squid it tastes heavenly with their tea and their portions are generation for their price in this economy","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPeJDQPzGcwsi6OVsBZp1PC6zFaHhY0nJeRzKms&fid=0x0:0x3ef7c1869c373ac8"],"When":"2024-9-29"},{"Name":"Lisa Stewart","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWo79veLnsCvDCjha0TJoTathwJUFPajJepLVXdR9rXYCLOAi7D6A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Very delightful food served up fast!  Loved the spring roll full of cabbage!  My husband loved his Hot & Sour soup‚Ä¶he said it was classic!  He also loved his eggplant dish.  We ordered off the Lunch Special menu which is $10.50 add $2.00 for soup.  Fresh and tasty!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOTYXgoF4lOmNtsGuFMVgzCqS4v-Wqc5GkKM6r3&fid=0x0:0x3ef7c1869c373ac8"],"When":"2022-4-15"},{"Name":"Jonny","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJShSgCHbmme6GLETHZczdb6MWGsJKCwpKUqZlkj3SXYWukfA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Decided to give One More Szechuan Chinese Cuisine a try. Mostly Cantonese with a handful of Szechuan dishes. Lunch specials are $12.50 to $15.95.

- Spicy twice cooked sliced pork ($17.95) - pork was a mixed bag of good to dry. Lacked bold flavours.
- Eggplant with hot garlic sauce ($12.50) - eggplant was tender, came out hot.
- Ma-po tofu ($12.50) - blandest mapo tofu I've eaten. Disappointing.

Nothing memorable at OMSCC. 2.5 stars.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOGo8VqIPoDa5a7z0rWquCL56dENM7M5pH5qSQV&fid=0x0:0x3ef7c1869c373ac8"],"When":"2024-1-21"},{"Name":"Colleen Shorter","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWe4pcpfIazgv67N5u0c7ar5AgnbPX964McRNwm0sD9JU7gfk6d=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Fresh & flavorful, hot & fast. This is my second go to lunch spot in Lions Gate Neighbourhood. Many good menu items, I got the sweet n sour pouk with pineapple green pepper & onion.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPP5GxgH7DqBAI5Wr9xl37e9YUF0X3rTsO1yuTr&fid=0x0:0x3ef7c1869c373ac8"],"When":"2023-9-23"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Jo-Anne Lodermeier","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLtPOeJ4LCMgl6Pb7aa1JrjQcuslbDpk7fgJTybJImHlEhldg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I recently dined at Captain Oven Pizza, and I have to say it was an absolutely delightful experience! The pizza was, as always, incredibly delicious, with the perfect blend of flavors and a crispy crust that keeps me coming back for more. The waitstaff were very attentive and friendly, ensuring that we had everything we needed throughout our meal.

One of my favorite features of this place is the unlimited parmesan and garlic sauce they offer. It adds a fantastic touch to the pizza and allows you to customize each slice just the way you like it. Plus, they have a variety of other condiments available, which is a nice bonus.

I also loved their selection of different pops from the USA and Italy. It‚Äôs great to have unique beverage options that you don‚Äôt find everywhere. The atmosphere is warm and inviting, making it a perfect spot for a casual meal with friends or family.

Overall, Captain Oven Pizza never disappoints, and I can't wait to return for another round of their amazing pizza and excellent service! Highly recommend this place to anyone looking for a great dining experience!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNscmIajcMNCWXoSMPObSlkaEzVEgnW15g9NZhd&fid=0x0:0x264e941621f4b11a"],"When":"2024-10-30"},{"Name":"Hassan Mk","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUn8XljJKUWtM5hZCcrws3Ntw3dFgRbwi5l6-83UHe5aX-z7xYA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Gathered with my family for a weekend lunch, we ventured into this quaint pizza shop eager to indulge in some cheesy delights. Opting for the Cheese Steak Pizza and the Chicken Pesto Pizza, we were pleasantly surprised by the culinary journey that unfolded. Both pizzas were expertly seasoned and cooked to perfection, with each bite bursting with flavor. The Cheese Steak Pizza boasted a perfect balance of cheese and tender steak, while the Chicken Pesto Pizza delighted with its fragrant pesto and succulent chicken. However, what truly stood out was the impeccable customer service. From the moment we walked in, the staff made us feel welcome and attended to our needs with warmth and efficiency. Overall, our experience at this pizza shop was nothing short of excellent, leaving us with satisfied stomachs and smiles on our faces.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNt_wZY9I3aYXWRJ3jf7QJMxEK6lNdkN9oHIh2E&fid=0x0:0x264e941621f4b11a"],"When":"2024-6-10"},{"Name":"Guilherme Ferreira","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWmThqeCWNrsyXJZjneih37EcEZEvnqUIFUcp2QP2xojnmpCVSq4g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"I‚Äôm really sad that I can‚Äôt give a five-star rating. I still remember driving all the way from downtown to Surrey just to grab a pizza that was absolutely the best. Even after almost 40 to 45 minutes, the pizza would still be hot and smell delicious. Unfortunately, the newer branches don‚Äôt live up to the reputation of that first location, which was worth the drive just for a fully loaded pizza with lots of toppings. This branch, however, takes forever to deliver, and the pizza arrives cold as a stone with barely any toppings. It‚Äôs disappointing, especially considering the high price and lack of commitment to quality.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOHFeWyxl4LvIWKbhg7BZkT6AxkHAIsnPC-_jnB&fid=0x0:0x264e941621f4b11a"],"When":"2024-10-10"},{"Name":"Mark Turnbull","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWb3y-xYzCVR6N_Ai49HYr4STDQ454gU7LeU-LpiQKvRGfVZTU=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great pizza. Fairly thin crust and good amount of toppings. They were friendly to order with and the order was delivered quickly","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNtCyYHdHnl89VF_N5UNIym46wNo79UJCeuSHzL&fid=0x0:0x264e941621f4b11a"],"When":"2024-10-1"},{"Name":"PAMELA DUE√ëAS ALDUNCIN","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWVdqiMMWZ7sYIG1zRQuU1SYec_Q8WGbvVaI8iiOXFFwIjXUZw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Amazing pizza with quality ingredients. Staff is super nice and friendly. Definitely recommend!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO_W_EG-76hw9sdIF7bKuiiuPWUfQlKrZs2IOZg&fid=0x0:0x264e941621f4b11a"],"When":"2024-10-6"},{"Name":"JordanBui","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVo8GFdRn_RC24vFLoO6QjB1b-KHZyGRZkfd4mpY1YKNrwvhCk=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Haven‚Äôt been around lonsdale long enough to try out restaurants and food options, decided I wanted pizza and this was what popped up, I‚Äôm so glad I tried it because the female worker (I do apologize I forgot her name) but was exceptional, customer service and answering my questions about the pizza since I‚Äôve never been there before and on top of that she threw in one of their sauce dips and that was also pretty delicious, try it out if you are in the area and are in the mood for pizza, I don‚Äôt think it‚Äôs too expensive 36 dollars for a XL 16‚Äù pizza that I did half & half with, if I‚Äôm craving for pizza and I am in the area, it will be my first choice.

Thanks again, I‚Äôll see you guys next time !","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Lea N","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWC5dNj4va57NmmwcANWtt0xAsy0IWKksbPPNzFMbeknpxkJzwf=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Ordered a large vegetarian pizza, 10/10. Staff is super friendly and quality of dough and toppings is super good. Pizza was giant! This is honestly the best place to get italian pizza for an affordable price on the North Shore.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPEiC32erLt8xRAm9ygVZmXkTt9YKx8z7YDcp5i&fid=0x0:0x264e941621f4b11a"],"When":"2024-3-27"},{"Name":"Alex Sanchez","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV-rI-pnfftFGHeGJz_1NlD5bWiCny8rcgWXbBF2zFQpbJjAi8c=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"People in Vancouver know very little about what a good pizza is and if you don‚Äôt believe me explain the 4.7 reviews at Fresh slide,
with that out of the way I can confidently say that this is a very average pizza! The pizza lacks sauce making it to dry, the dough is nothing special, no bubbles no special consistency or krisp and the sauce taste is nothing special. If you are in the area and have very little options for food go for it but if you want to eat a good pizza go elsewhere.","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Jaihoon Samizada","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVnZHRhx5ymDK8XJys6vp86gmtnh921AsAgdjqyI9kbgDqkhE54=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Absolutely amazing! The Persian halal pizza is a delightful fusion of flavors. The combination of perfectly spiced meat, fresh herbs, and creamy cheese creates an explosion of taste in every bite. The crust is crispy yet soft, and the ingredients are incredibly fresh. Highly recommend this unique and delicious pizza!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNlGTVzxZHy4sm6Ce3aKZxHDNC-mOr_9T96PtE&fid=0x0:0x16275516d4db4756"],"When":"2024-5-17"},{"Name":"Rosie","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXpCKZpLxgzjkRJCBS_N5zfkP1Zj2bxX57YdySagUsEtPJHeCI6=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The closest you‚Äôre going to get to authentic persian pizza in Vancouver! Even the vibe of the restaurant made me feel like I was in Tehran. Large portion for the amount you pay which is a bonus. The owner is very kind and accommodating, and took time to explain the various toppings.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPoXrk5e7NG7H1-Dn0bWUg4g8qxxRBQmJfZZqnp&fid=0x0:0x16275516d4db4756"],"When":"2024-4-30"},{"Name":"Nassim Z.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVCKClBCR3tdYgXbqwu8QjPtkDiPrgV4O4J0hWS_gwXJG-z-rcMrw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The food was amazing! If you‚Äôre searching for an Iranian taste of fast-food. We tried steak & garlic pizza and Cocktail Tanoori. The bread really tasted like Tehran bread. The thyme was good quality and generous.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOYbTwNa6VC9lp2CwyLlOKMLQhCWzcfq3mjiedq&fid=0x0:0x16275516d4db4756"],"When":"2024-1-1"},{"Name":"Elnaz Khanbabakhany","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWNoVDqcRvdEGrG9pV6BptKIkW4quuOO9zasPuGWQPa9OzfcF5oKw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Yesterday I ordered from Crispy via DoorDash and had an extremely disappointing experience. The Pizza I received was of very poor quality: half of it was overcooked while the other half was undercooked. It was clear that the ingredients were not fresh. To make matters worse, I ended up getting food poisoning from the meal. I would not recommend this restaurant to anyone.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNRWpIlNFRSPgNNvfwjvWJj4Bz1uBbkGwOcDhGW&fid=0x0:0x16275516d4db4756"],"When":"2024-6-3"},{"Name":"Hamed","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjViJ9EznENDd1HeEqpUkYuqmZFdKwptQI-w0AYNvWdb_l07iQpU7w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"It was after a few years that I tried this place. We ordered a large specialty pizza and ask them to do t half- half chicken /roast beef.
I have to say the specialty pizza was not that tasteful. And definitely lacking some cheese on topping as seen in the picture. But apart from that overall a good pizza place to try out that gives you that Persian style pizza experience","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNoY3O3VPp9eE4HeB0H6X-XGt3sFmpZAzXjc0pT&fid=0x0:0x16275516d4db4756"],"When":"2023-4-18"},{"Name":"Hatam Nazem","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI_YWxBJHA8XBqukb_wgAdbi3UM86qib8gos9ch4IqIMvbUc58=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Crispy Delight is a good option for those who miss Iranian-style pizza, but it‚Äôs only suitable for takeout. The restaurant has poor ventilation, so the kitchen smells linger in the dining area, and your clothes end up smelling greasy after you leave.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Fatemeh Sayadi (Tisha)","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUT0iXGjcmugjaf-sxnw_j5g7IpzISbK9kqKoWSQpUn_JCfvpEr=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Loved it there, definitely coming back. Everything was perfect, felt like home. The staff are super friendly.

Update: Just wanted update my review and mention that the quality and the taste is still the same. Every time we come here, we have great experience. Somehow the quality is better every time we come here.

The special house crispy is the best, if it is your first time trying their meals. Bandari is so good too, it has a special sauce which seems homemade to me and it‚Äôs perfect.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN7Cuvu83Eh_wGlg9ZEFdt5Dk4By8dLiyD6KUsX&fid=0x0:0x16275516d4db4756"],"When":"2022-6-12"},{"Name":"Amirhossein Behranginia","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIK1tkMd7Y84xzRzRDxP3Y1GNQGk9dk26qGLLQXkJ8XMBiGfA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The best Persian pizza in an entire usa and canada. Not comparable with any Persian pizza even in California!

The most important thing is that they kept their great quality!
Always enjoy eating here when travel to Vancouver!
Order house special with ground beef!","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Sunghyun Tjen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU8NjtnCn6iayqN9kMtlE0TjNKALkna0s1H0kGJem8L50wqpGdKCA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I recently visited here for their Wednesday pizza night, and it was a delightful experience. After a recent trip to Italy, I found myself missing the authentic pizza I had in Rome. Thankfully, I discovered they offer pizzas that rival those in Italy. The pizza was fresh, flavorful, and transported me back to the streets of Rome. If you're craving authentic Italian pizza, I highly recommend giving it a try.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPJ6pvyD7eP9aHLVXKeO8ebtvA7p8j-QdZ09_rw&fid=0x0:0xe1e08bd7104f1f97"],"When":"2024-4-25"},{"Name":"Âä†Ëó§ÁßÄÊòé","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWGcXg4ZLZjXbu2hPGA5FuZH13ZNqYV4KecUvSl1RGp7kFO3VuGVg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I came to Vancouver from Japan for having such a good pizza again actually. I've ever had pizza for million time in the World, I'd like to recommend pizza here as the best. ofc I had some appetizers, it also was awesome. Price was not expensive. If you search any restaurant in North Vancouver I'd recommend here strongly.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOVAozYxV1r3SPt-pd7MQFhPIUA7SxKJ__nDfvK&fid=0x0:0xe1e08bd7104f1f97"],"When":"2024-1-18"},{"Name":"maria jose covarrubias avila","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVaP-h5KtNb4dd2OJoMiXVHkAtD_COltX9Lp4d9pqjBbNmg3Vw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Amazing food, you have to try the sangria!! And Jasmine has the best energy! Good music too! üçùü§åüèº","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM1e6qsrRopaY6hRvmFzXsMNxvuArR6BeOQ2nxo&fid=0x0:0xe1e08bd7104f1f97"],"When":"2024-8-25"},{"Name":"toffy concepcion","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVYhf6f6Tr-b7ekbkXxFz9ueDreb1BCkopv3RQXbcpm54DeMfYl5g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is one of the few surviving Italian restaurants on the North Shore. I walked by and saw their linguine vongole as a special. It was extremely generous in clams. The sauce has many baby clams as well as many fat fresh ones. They were expertly cooked so they stayed tender and juicy.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM2lsoc2xHvIeri3k6-Q0cKavXJ9EFClgtMPg4R&fid=0x0:0xe1e08bd7104f1f97"],"When":"2024-6-11"},{"Name":"Jonathan Irving","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJcoPU9fAZDdaIaESSKgQ_6KzLAkEZt3ZadImppbegW94EmMA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Our server Tina was absolutely amazing! She was so attentive and made sure that we had the best experience. The food was great and had fantastic flavour! Tina didn‚Äôt just want to serve us our food, she made us feel like we were eating at her own restaurant! She deserves a raise! Pay this girl all the money and she will continue to bring back customers like myself! Thanks Tina","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Mahshid Mahdvar","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW-zctYTHsXRgZ4LkBA0JgKtGpSkKAiyGUkPENazIp-Fqc60BZP=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Delicious food and great ambiance. The wood-fired pizza was a standout, and the cannoli was the perfect way to end the meal. Will definitely be back","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOOU8G5vGRxI2U0x0_nkrg-NluXOf731LPAYYt5&fid=0x0:0xe1e08bd7104f1f97"],"When":"2024-9-22"},{"Name":"Hani Asadi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVkg4_WQg03i2L06xyxvs-sszQcz5lOxNBZqHO-VJzZFGmBuiZL=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I recently dined at Palermo Cucina, and I must say, it was an incredible experience! The atmosphere was warm and inviting, and the food was absolutely delicious. From the appetizers to the dessert, every dish was prepared with care and packed with flavor.

A special shoutout to Yasmin, our server, who made the evening even more enjoyable. She was attentive, friendly, and knowledgeable about the menu. Her recommendations were spot on, and she ensured that we had everything we needed throughout the meal.

I highly recommend Palermo Cucina to anyone looking for a fantastic dining experience. Thank you, Yasmin, and the entire team for a memorable night!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Aleksia","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIeEBYmqkH_6j8SIKNBs8TOjPSt-m-u0MnSLvcIgIZLkqEiww=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I came with my family for dinner on a Friday night. The service was great and super attentive. They had live music which really added to our dining experience. We ordered the prawns for an appetizer as well as a few of their pizzas which were great! The crust is amazing, you can really taste the difference with their wood burning oven. We got fresh focaccia without even asking which was lovely. Will come again :)","Images":null,"When":""}]

[{"Name":"Young Kim","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVpNM6WqgyVzwImloe26Ko9yV5KMEBx4K94CBDyme_CByRW3E3e=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Very friendly and a great place to quickly eat solo without breaking the bank. Large pho for 12 dollars, free parking and fast service. I like it!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOsViGRk9KZTnbP6li6Hezhg5BndmOkMalwZfSq&fid=0x0:0x426e014edd98b51b"],"When":"2024-9-19"},{"Name":"Maya Hawj","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVdiukAAS91dGdmV7h3MJWYA-dQ0VbqFr69PyniXN1PWofrSTvS=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"When we walked in the place seems dim. He gave us water with no ice. The portion was small and food was just ok. Very disappointed and not satisfying after driving 8 hours from banff and doing a strenuous hike up grouse mountain .","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPB8D6Gh6V9DQuzWn_lirAKHUXcFzvHLmmb6CbX&fid=0x0:0x426e014edd98b51b"],"When":"2024-9-2"},{"Name":"A H","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJT8z40fUvjQT9hIMOIyZ_AUsBstHaSnO1f5800Ra4Cjcaq3Q=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"We went in around 1:15pm thinking it would be a quick lunch but waited for 45 minutes for 2 orders of pho soup noodles. How is this possible? I would have walked out but my partner was too polite to leave. Don‚Äôt bother going since the pho were not very good either when they finally showed up.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Lord Stanley (Lifepilot)","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWzQPaJP0C4QgYze9YWfcg4vOQGSlA7Fi1WI2IqpyzPqwuzcItLsg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Really great quality and food was fresh and tasty. Great service and attentive. Place was clean and enjoyed our time. Price also reasonable. A good Pho spot in North Van and easy access and parking.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN3pB9TgyemYW8H_e808uQbmrjCCM9lhsybHfyz&fid=0x0:0x426e014edd98b51b"],"When":"2022-5-24"},{"Name":"Rylan Posehn","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJCX6xkshZODPCiOQCpXaqqZ4n5lc_a3qlrAyymgF5cvPI4F_s=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Came for lunch on the way to work with 3 of my colleagues. We noticed the hours are 11-8pm, but despite 2-3 calls to the restaurant that went unanswered, we had to wait until 11:30 for them to open up. Upon placing our orders for a large house special pho, a large rare beef and beef ball pho, vegetarian noodle soup, the grilled bbq chicken on fried rice, and finally 2 Vietnamese iced coffees. After a standard wait for the first 3 dishes, we each found our food bland and a much smaller portion than anticipated after ordering the large size. The rare beef and beef ball pho only had 3 pieces of beef ball and the house special had little to no tripe. The vegetarian noodle soup kind you we all tried and collectively agreed it was blanched vegetables and noodles in hot water. This was my friend‚Äôs first time trying Vietnamese iced coffee and after waiting 15min for it to finish dripping he was shocked at how little there was. The chicken and rice dish showed up after we had all gotten through about 60% of our food and he had the same reflections: small portion, bland and generally just mid.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jas L","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU-wGL0FxtKVRqhWyt6ye_cadaPSL0NRJhRuHwCOSwPQ9c-WwDm7A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Always a great place to eat, friendly staff and tasty Pho. Always my partner and my go to when it comes to Vietnamese. The meal in the photo is my favorite dish "BBQ pork with spring roll on noodle" it's the best thing since sliced bread! 10/10 would recommend.

Update: We still go here regularly, we never visit any other Pho place because they are just that good! The owner greets us every time and remembers who we are.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMYqJVy42mrPdNM4nJbSn9xAlnMxzLLmRKXAkLM&fid=0x0:0x426e014edd98b51b"],"When":"2017-8-11"},{"Name":"Lisa Stewart","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWo79veLnsCvDCjha0TJoTathwJUFPajJepLVXdR9rXYCLOAi7D6A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Very friendly staff and nice service!  Prices are good and food is flavourful!  Portions are not huge but are proportional to $.  Very nice stop for lunch on a snowy afternoon!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMDFvQntWkaUANrC4XQ2TKM5JAgS5kQWcft6Njr&fid=0x0:0x426e014edd98b51b"],"When":"2021-2-14"},{"Name":"thomas rafuse","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWmkxBa59YNvqDOpO5OTpT3qOEpUUl_Cj3W4o2UjyMZ93SvQ5at=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I like to think I give a pretty honest reviews overall,sometimes customer service or food will greatly influence my opinion and here its the food. I ordered the spring rolls for 6.50 and slightly worried because thats a very good price. After receiving them i realised why they are so cheap.
The #1 spring rolls were very small and very,very bland.
The soup I ordered was a #23 beef balls and rare beef.
The large was big enough but i got 3/4 of one beef ball and weird little growths on the sliced beef. Didnt finish my meal...
I definitely wont be returning again and hope you use discretion when choosing a place with 4.5-5 stars.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOUhNUPuoSkhXWN-ngbiLKcE7rUz_oVX6Z9Yr_J&fid=0x0:0x426e014edd98b51b"],"When":"2022-6-6"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Irma Beck","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIwg_2ay10Qs47qiiRJqQsDu6T-xc6ftG1n2yAoTt3ZyW2rhA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Oh what a disappointment.  We ordered from Mings for a special family dinner and the food quality was so disappointing.  The Sweet and Sour Pork and Beef and Broccoli had definitely been sitting for a long long time and was horrible.  Never again, please don't waste your money.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMi27xZNPvqZhryOjxET-MpWLFSLq4geCi_iqvh&fid=0x0:0x7cccd3e5bbc910bc"],"When":"2024-10-1"},{"Name":"Blaze Geraghty","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU_--m4mLqSa_yq2zP8T3maP5-HUNUjgIZ9k1PjbapSDyq72TZ5=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Ming‚Äôs Garden in North Vancouver is an absolute treasure and a personal favorite of mine for years, not to mention my grandmother‚Äôs all-time top pick! Walking into Ming‚Äôs is like stepping into a warm embrace of culinary delight and genuine hospitality. The staff here knows how to make you feel like family from the moment you walk in, greeting you with smiles that are as welcoming as the aromas wafting from the kitchen.

The crispy spring rolls are a crunch-tastic start, setting the stage for a meal that‚Äôs nothing short of spectacular. The sizzling hot plates are pure poetry on a plate‚Äîsucculent, flavorful, and an absolute must-try. Every dish is a vibrant masterpiece, bursting with fresh ingredients and rich flavors that keep you coming back for more.

Ming‚Äôs Garden isn‚Äôt just about the food; it‚Äôs about the experience. Whether you‚Äôre there for a bustling weekend dinner or a quiet weekday lunch, the quality and service remain top-notch. This place is quirky, cozy, and delicious‚Äîa triple threat that makes it the perfect spot for creating cherished memories. If you‚Äôre in North Vancouver, do yourself a favor and drop by Ming‚Äôs Garden. You‚Äôll leave with a full belly and a happy heart!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMQkXzbcgTiH0l_thrtruRv3nYGS2sjYu8SZI6a&fid=0x0:0x7cccd3e5bbc910bc"],"When":"2024-6-18"},{"Name":"Melisa Cecilia","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXsOywiiZ3W02HXLLCk9cIHylVJNujFJOz6-eB_DU63tYHWSz6A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The wonton soup here is definitely their specialty, its so good and I‚Äôll probably crave for it often. House special fried rice is really good also. Will come back to try other stuffs and more wonton soup.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMIzVzPBluRtVidZzds6GKmprzV0UO-_5tnPT4S&fid=0x0:0x7cccd3e5bbc910bc"],"When":"2024-6-10"},{"Name":"C U","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUzSPBMxEzsF_wRao-B0ehPm0Kpk-alk1Mkg9m47N6NCeIvQISE=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Sweet and sour was disgrace to the sweet and sour world ... It was like sour water
Chicken balls were decent with white meat so that's really what was saving this from 1 star.
Honey garlic pork is over cooked dry pork.. bad idea
Chicken chowmein is ok once you add soy sauce.
I won't ever be ordering from here again. Save your $$$","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPdyGj354uzO_1rdQKwKYUPenaAO4ph_9A4Xuhp&fid=0x0:0x7cccd3e5bbc910bc"],"When":"2024-5-6"},{"Name":"Josephine Ma","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW4ctBP8R2rm9S8Aa5NyuULMapTvyTQYakS6AvI9Cd025oSy86H=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Ming's Garden is just across from Capilano Mall on Marine Dr. in North Vancouver. We'd ordered some takeout food from here once before, and it was quite good back then. As we hadn't ordered from here in awhile, we decided to give it a try, just to have a bit of a change from any of our usual "go to" Chinese restaurants on the North Shore.

Scallops with Snow Peas
Deep Fried Fish Cod Fillet with Sweet & Sour Sauce
Seafood Chow Mein (crispy)
Shrimp Foo Young

Unfortunately the food was not as good this time as it had been the last time we ordered from here. The main issue we found with the food this time was that much of it was too salty. Flavors and textures were fine, but the excess salt made it difficult to enjoy the food. Might be awhile before we try coming back here again.

Service: Good
Parking: Parking at rear, according to their website (I got dropped off and went through the front to pick up our food, so I never actually saw the rear of the restaurant!)
Location: 965 Marine Dr., North Vancouver","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNxow5rZmK9jB6232g5k1rmDqc9fNcX0CmtJQOA&fid=0x0:0x7cccd3e5bbc910bc"],"When":"2023-5-24"},{"Name":"aleksandra","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX5hPxtHoRveqaKMGdV3iow-ktsMn5ivmwMApx0FiKVCv9S8isZ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I recently moved from Toronto (which has a really big China Town) to Vancouver and have been looking for my new fav Chinese restaurant. I found it with Ming s Garden! Please do not believe any of the bad reviews! THIS PLACE IS AMAZING! BEST CHINESE FOOD I EVER HAD!! I got food from here 3x already last week and it was all absolutely devine with amazing prices and huge portion size. I will be eating here at least once I week from now on","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPvl7-8QGRtO04bTALCx0exB_piqG0KIrBqepM_&fid=0x0:0x7cccd3e5bbc910bc"],"When":"2022-2-14"},{"Name":"Swati Nayak","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX7UqVooYMMF2Xo_3P_FWihXeFsCKRO0QNxL04r9P7NsptAjaEh=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"This place is a ripoff. The food you get is no where close to what the photo or recipe suggests. We ordered spicy chicken ( photo suggested chicken with red chillies) and Mongolian beef. This is what we got ( check photos ) - broccoli, mushroom and bell peppers in ‚Äúspicy chicken‚Äù. Onions in Mongolian beef. Just avoid this place. They save cost by adding veggies and not serving what you order.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPjJLF_PJwyjxx0rEAERttjmTYBycOIOzvABoaj&fid=0x0:0x7cccd3e5bbc910bc"],"When":"2023-7-2"},{"Name":"Attack Hamster","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVf5BXJTMQEzkSkG-jZSwZ94LHqi4FoNsCvcv_gzRCbj2V0cqkv=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"My daughter ordered from this restaurant after discovering that Ginger & Soy in West Van had permanently closed.  We had four dishes delivered and all were disgusting.  Think of the lowest quality food court Chinese you've ever had and this being worse!!!  The compost bin had a hefty serving!  Total waste of money.  Never again!","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Alireza","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUFO8S_5bnJ1Gbxa0DrJ-JDnEI06M_5nz8TkqZ51KiwdQjq5mRr=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Jade Garden offers an amazing dining experience! The service is quick and friendly, and the food is simply delicious. From the savory dishes to the fresh ingredients, every meal is on point. The vibe is relaxed and welcoming, and the restaurant‚Äôs location makes parking hassle-free, which is a big plus. Whether you‚Äôre dining in or taking out, the quality and taste never disappoint. Highly recommend this spot for anyone craving authentic Chinese cuisine with great service and a convenient location","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPVP_xmYcE4ktxzOCm2zvwxIv9K2dJL2SVHzCYW&fid=0x0:0x79d21849e0c84e9"],"When":"2024-10-10"},{"Name":"Steven Olmstead","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWtGPLsUg7ybhRCsA9-VeVYuyaFqArSeyzqddnDm9gdPpsZ3M0=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Good spot for lunch.  Service is friendly and prompt, room is functional.  Food is good and plentiful, reasonably priced.  Really enjoyed the eggplant with minced pork.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP1qAT6cjlX4sTFPlsflSPxz1h5aDBkfJOFB46g&fid=0x0:0x79d21849e0c84e9"],"When":"2024-8-14"},{"Name":"Cell","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUumVkWk9OSHdDq0vh5aJLKHd-YSC3EbOYPhqvZIyIqMUu8ha15=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Food, service, and atmosphere were all rather mid. Taste was bland and service was lukewarm. Not bad per say but certainly would not spend this much to eat here again.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMTI_jrAaQb5G6VicGBe829TdC92VzjKG7xQc9s&fid=0x0:0x79d21849e0c84e9"],"When":"2024-8-13"},{"Name":"Beth B","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ5rErAWzMfBvFD65OVhkvID7GdQ5VVYqO30JSBaqAlfl0O2A=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Tasty dinner at the Jade Garden - sweet and sour chicken and beef with broccoli. House Special Fried Rice needed a bit more moisture, but good once you added the other toppings. Reminded me of my favourite Chinese restaurant back home üòä","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP2PwaX3xwAqdLofeQW0T5N0eGTbzzqrhy6IHsd&fid=0x0:0x79d21849e0c84e9"],"When":"2024-5-24"},{"Name":"Ali Zohourian","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX4LNzU6KkPs6uY7j4P5E8uoyO7rOq4S4PXpvDnK-xmTLBWL0z_=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We had a great experience at Jade Garden

Excellent food quality
Excellent customer service
Clean and tidy restaurant
I invited my family for lunch, and we were all happy with the dishes we ordered","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNPY17FhhLqgEdkTiBJqYcNAj2eRrwO0HFE-O9D&fid=0x0:0x79d21849e0c84e9"],"When":"2024-8-12"},{"Name":"Josephine Ma","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW4ctBP8R2rm9S8Aa5NyuULMapTvyTQYakS6AvI9Cd025oSy86H=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"We used to order from Jade Garden quite often in the past. It had been quite awhile though since the last time we ordered from them, and even longer still since we'd actually dined inside the restaurant itself. Featured here:

Minced Beef & Parsley Soup
Peking Duck (2 courses)
Peking Pork Chop
Filet of Sole with Seasonal Vegetables
Prawn with Scrambled Egg Fried Flat Noodles
Pan Fried Salted Radish Minced Meat/ Egg

We were celebrating a birthday in the family and birthday boy was happy with his meal!

Service:¬†Good
Parking:¬†Free
Location: 1195 Marine Dr., North Vancouver","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOdAy_MukdB0RDLPa3pPtMqJCDdbXg88JXXGVrL&fid=0x0:0x79d21849e0c84e9"],"When":"2023-10-10"},{"Name":"Peter Cross","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUHmBXMXmX9-43PxxMc-vQWx8OaX3r8ByLsfhp1pyyCEQpdxmTkCA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"A great spot for dinner.  My wife and I stopped in for dinner on a whim.  We are glad we did.  Service was great and so was the food.  They have been at it for 10 years!  Wowza!  Cant believe I hadn‚Äôt been sooner.  Will be back.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO4mNs91VAA8EjfGXQDUT0sSVTjr3grBEbcHSHo&fid=0x0:0x79d21849e0c84e9"],"When":"2024-1-19"},{"Name":"TX Chung","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUpCQ2-BD3CX769Ug4m3gHonRbciSsqG5Ng_BPIq8WPrU4kJDpt=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We loved this restaurant!  Best Chinese food we've had in ages!!  The portions were generous, the food was delicious and the staff was excellent!  We had Szechuan Fish Pot, Snow Pea leaves in Garlic Sauce, Sweet and Sour Chicken, Hot & Sour Soup and Szechuan Beef.  We ate every bit of it!  The soup was full of vegetables and tofu with a truly hot and sour taste.  The chicken was very crispy with big chunks of white meat that held up to the sauce very well, the hot pot, which we ordered extra spicy, was wonderfully spicy and full of tender white fish and vegetables and the beef was very tasty.  We couldn't have had a better meal and are just sorry we don't live in the area or this would be our Go To Spot for sure!","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews: [{"Name":"Stephanie McLean","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXqkPwBw645p-tz9vezhFNKVn9g0tCJsiPZZaUkzz3IJ90nGQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I love hot pot. With a large group, it allows everyone to choose what they want, flavour wise.  Since covid, it gives people peace of mind by offering individual portions (your own pot vs sharing).","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMDb42ReXQ-zpDnNgIvPMRBp3E3vxCXfvg1ZRc\u0026fid=0x0:0x279f73b48868f4f7"],"When":"2024-11-9"},{"Name":"Ajanth","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUNW-Zk2YtWMoP3B4MhYISJOCZHaCNu-8GchF8nHYQ29uqUVA_I=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Amazing restaurant with great dishes. Tons of vegetarian and vegan options. I got braised tofu, stir-fried bok choy, and saut√©ed potatoes/eggplants. Everything was delicious. Definitely worth the visit. I do wish they had more vegan friendly entr√©es.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP8Mhyi_zWfdVm15oLqNYLeYqFQBBfYYc-zQMdM\u0026fid=0x0:0x279f73b48868f4f7"],"When":"2023-10-16"},{"Name":"Ted Bonazew","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUX7aHHx-zQ2JUqNEGCIV3V5kgH1xs0Nv1ykBEDYpPoLB5sBBRpNA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Finally got to try this little hidden gem, we've passed by this place for years and spoken about trying it out sometime, well last night was the night!! First of all, do not judge this place by the look of the exterior of the building, the interior is quite nice  and inviting. This was our first Hot Pot experience, so we were unaware on how the whole.process worked, but the server/owner walked us thru from start to finish :-) great first Hot Pot experience over all and  we look forward to our next visit. They have quite the extensive traditional Chinese stir fry dishes along with their Hot Pot menu","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMtRGKNJz9pdxX9VpmINVeoAyRtAzoPrn1_gvOD\u0026fid=0x0:0x279f73b48868f4f7"],"When":"2023-6-17"},{"Name":"Vj Grimes","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXEQq7UJV3_HYa2qJdPJuE4ubH5DEHwxUb-o_uX7LlEorSCJgMn=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Lunch, Sa Sep 21, 2024. Driving Marine, a 1HR parking in front but--partner notice a sign, PARKING IN REAR. Wanted to try Lion Hot Pot, errands today, nabbed a parking spot, for a GREAT lunch. Ordered with help of server--hot pot, and beef udon dish, exactly right amount for 2 of us. Flavour sauce was so good. You sprinkle meal items into the simmering hot broth, you remove and dip them, Mmm! Spicy was an option. The place was empty Saturday lunch; they deserve to do well. I figure an adventurous GROUP to take up half the place as a nice gathering place? Nice person serving, helpful, calm and efficient. They may do well by pickup and delivery, though hot pot is all fresh. A very nice lunch.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Ïã†ÏãúÏïÑ","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIQPszHjVvdwl5g8GOGVakLnqE7Kht1Vjv0Lyq5W6rAeMfXnA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"It was so expensive compared to its quality and quantity. Hotpot vegetables were not various and some part of cabbage was black since it's not fresh, beef was frozen, poor quality. I don't understand why it has to be this expensive even.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"pratyusha mungara","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVkm2dv403IcKF0xCEjJhDrz5Tz1_ZtuqBFtfap75jfQQP6r1Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We've gone here thrice. The food is excellent. We tried the mushroom and vegetarian hotpots, as well as the ala carte ordering for mapo tofu, friend rice and some cauliflower. All delicious!!! Highly recommend the place","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Robert Martin","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKPwkUzkCHz1nMszTewEpvCYQvX3EPEQ4cJhQQ8wz0ERTmkPQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Came in hungry after visiting Capilano Bridge. Was warmly greeted and helped with what to order. Wound up getting shrimp and beef hot pot and fried rice. Generous portions and authentic tasting.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Samantha Bacchus McLeod","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVYiRIvy_TuMch5JQY-yF_gsT_IZst0-J--PuSw8Il6loRANjyf=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Literally walked into this shady looking stand alone lil shop and was blown away by the interior, food and service! We did not have the hot pot (that will be soon with a big crowd). The place is clean, the service is great, and the food reminds me of Hong Kong food. Hot and Sour soup was tasty, spicy and just sour enough to keep us slurping it up. The fast fried noodles was so good we cleaned the plates. Loved it!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOkXfwaAHhD5FGKIHQzmA6cWrMrDSw9ldIcJ3Go\u0026fid=0x0:0x279f73b48868f4f7"],"When":"2018-11-30"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Hiba JR","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUUidXHMTvFcOjHD2MK5G-vQAbQc0w_NTuIA-UZ7fRQ2ASVL7GfGQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We‚Äôre visiting Vancouver and got here based on location and reviews.
Excellent quality of sushi rolls! Fresh ingredients. Welcoming staff. It felt like guests treated the owners as friends; loved that!
Tried the Udon and that was good too.
Would definitely recommend the place.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPIfU0hi9NY0Cl5MbDqhyZ0w3fXOEYKPckfWQZG&fid=0x0:0xf047fcfec8dbbeae"],"When":"2024-11-27"},{"Name":"Jerry Li","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUvknYN2jwl7VEJYKMhgQmGMBOkQWD80sxi2HQCGRP-hUHguAM=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"As an employee at Capilano Sushi, I can honestly say that working here has been an incredibly rewarding experience. The team is like family‚Äîsupportive, hardworking, and passionate about delivering the best sushi experience to our customers. Our chefs are highly skilled and take great pride in their craft, creating fresh, delicious, and beautifully presented dishes that never fail to impress.

The work environment is welcoming and inclusive, and it‚Äôs clear that customer satisfaction is our top priority. From the moment you walk through the door, you can feel the positive energy and the commitment to providing excellent service. Whether you‚Äôre a first-time guest or a regular, our goal is to make every dining experience memorable.

We offer a wide variety of authentic sushi and Japanese dishes, and everything is made with the finest ingredients. I‚Äôm especially proud of our signature rolls and the quality of the seafood we serve. It‚Äôs truly a pleasure to be part of a place where every customer leaves happy and full.

If you‚Äôre looking for an amazing sushi experience with a warm, friendly atmosphere, Capilano Sushi is the place to be. And, of course, being part of the team here is equally fantastic!

Thank you to all our loyal customers for your continued support!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOiqMxfy3UtFPsq8UufHC-1rh35DNivWz-rc1I5&fid=0x0:0xf047fcfec8dbbeae"],"When":"2024-11-16"},{"Name":"Howie Outerbridge","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXJ9H49itZHCe-8Dhwoh6HMFBASzu5T6UiZiB-T5Oe7Y_2E6aFPCg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Viva (owner) and John (head chef) have a good thing going here at Capilano Sushi. Almost 10 years into the business, many of their customers are regulars, which says a lot about the food, vibe and service.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMQMzvqumoQdfwyyOuwgBe90ppr-cMTi_Zr1usn&fid=0x0:0xf047fcfec8dbbeae"],"When":"2024-7-11"},{"Name":"Kenneth Alegria","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU2MmGAQDghKyaKs12kEhtbnELoXwkIut6ypLbgYPdq_f04ITJafw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Awesome service, food and atmosphere. Everything awesome. Also, they have a Teriyaki combo with california for around $14 which is amazing and delicious. üëçüèº","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNuiu2TB9w5BvfVJiadO6-ysznTDHTGm7hlidXa&fid=0x0:0xf047fcfec8dbbeae"],"When":"2024-7-16"},{"Name":"Adrian Lee","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJRz_uEV8AM70-EugybmCMjVZLIi0OfMP3My2LKS1PidWwGuA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"First time here and very pleasantly surprised. Sushi was fresh and tasty and well presented. Fried things are a highlight, the yam fries are delicious. Prices are very reasonable. Parking is plentiful.  Will definitely come back with the rest of the family. Great find and friendly service.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMZbxulAOXE3DyXMXu5Kkx_SnUq42P_c1GSxAJe&fid=0x0:0xf047fcfec8dbbeae"],"When":"2022-5-6"},{"Name":"Amanda Kanuka","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIqFtNCiQY0Yf6D9IhqnaS2dR9_jq7iFHAQAXUzALc41cKY=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is our go to sushi place. A nice spot altogether.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN7BzpSfi8UhjEBMBM80Nw4bOaYv4F8CE81mR0A&fid=0x0:0xf047fcfec8dbbeae"],"When":"2023-7-17"},{"Name":"Bradley Jones","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWQSjOdt_NCThfrgQQSPCAI9c1m2q4Cia70lWTZMyAGLNwKu8R3=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great lunch spot. [{"Name":"Pete On The Street","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVdCPmg937wv90tlRaBXtKDK-aCTAb7FrA83Y4igLR31Qw239o=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Always a pleasure at Sushi Kumo.

Prices are very good for the quality they always deliver.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNiuLaDu_-sjmG7h3GDiJTVmLoCXQfYaTdsO2AZ&fid=0x0:0x4208792eed890708"],"When":"2024-11-24"},{"Name":"Alexander Lee","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUFsUEPZNq4h8cBqaL42Gd2rh0aZi6fzay8o3wtjB86kaApSZtI=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Good variety.
