I didn't like the Chicken Karaage, but it was a fair amount (8 boneless pcs) for the price ($10.90).","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO8YpeBx6sYC8_mDreiiZg5DfUnasaAxK_nA3Fh&fid=0x0:0x4208792eed890708"],"When":"2024-9-4"},{"Name":"Blampin","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUe_Zl-7bsR_k4aPN0CDrFm3JxQQaY2wgkXgNPVdZQs9NDoFTA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Absolutely beautiful little restaurant.
Very nice service and the Japanese cuisine was amazing.
I loved how they offered the Tobiko Nigiri to come with a quails egg on there.

I definitely want to visit here again.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO3pThjVRXTRR_t6RmZ5S6f0-QAY6YSCORISBHj&fid=0x0:0x4208792eed890708"],"When":"2024-8-31"},{"Name":"Kat Z","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUEo-i39N__rpJH69CgrWcJ6RTEhnTJfwjlxxJLH4yrE-w015XZoA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Taste is good but they skimp on takeout portions. The takeout portions are significantly smaller than eat in. Service could use some adjustments, I feel bad going in and paying for my order it seems like I‚Äôm inconveniencing the staff.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMLDX6MoyGjghL_aKaFJejYzluMW3lIJiGUgIZQ&fid=0x0:0x4208792eed890708"],"When":"2024-7-5"},{"Name":"Legend Jeri","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV6MYkC-gehfX9m3YYJTQmTtqno291H98WwfQYtrJ5OQ5cDyOI=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Nestled near Lonsdale, Sushi Kumo promises a haven for sushi enthusiasts, including the adventurous vegetarians among us. As a fellow risk-taker in life's culinary adventures due to seafood allergies, I dared to venture into this quaint establishment, and I'm glad I did.

Food Quality (5/5):
Each bite of the Avocado roll, Cucumber Roll, and Veggie Roll was a testament to the chef's dedication to perfection. The rice, cooked to just the right consistency, cradled fresh, vibrant vegetables that were a delight to the palate. Not a hint of browning or toughness, a common pitfall in many rushed sushi joints.

Price-Value Ratio (4/5):
While prices may tilt towards the higher end compared to nearby alternatives, the superior quality justifies every penny spent. When it comes to sushi, I firmly believe that quality should never be compromised for the sake of savings.

Ambiance (4/5):
Simplicity meets style in Sushi Kumo's ambiance. Though modest, the decor exudes a certain charm that complements the dining experience.

Service (3/5):
Unfortunately, the otherwise stellar experience was marred by lackluster service. The pace was sluggish, with no check-ins to inquire about our needs. Water and tea remained unrefilled, a disappointing oversight that detracted from the overall enjoyment. It was disheartening to observe preferential treatment towards certain patrons, a stark contrast to the egalitarian spirit of hospitality.

Final Verdict:
Despite the service hiccup, Sushi Kumo remains a gem worth revisiting. For vegetarian sushi aficionados seeking impeccable quality, this is the place to be. Just be prepared to exercise patience and perhaps a gentle reminder for a refill on your drink.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMAAFLXypofXwTmZtzW2-QOdbIKtO4UIx5EjtS8&fid=0x0:0x4208792eed890708"],"When":"2024-5-16"},{"Name":"Raheem Merali","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWeLaFZt6ZP70nphRH5l2rTuJIePIpFBgyCuj7uBcbVkkkXxmFj9w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great place to celebrate an occasion of any kind. Particularly your birthday as we did! Perfect warm sake. Ice-cold beer. Fresh sushi. Fantastic service. Parking is a bit tricky but hey, it's well worth it.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPICcsxGbapY7WHx-4K8g3yD-UWk-xJN5YD5MJl&fid=0x0:0x4208792eed890708"],"When":"2023-11-9"},{"Name":"John Seong","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW0htFjeJaWzfoh1Wx3ky51rbanezwWv8SlRvcZ43DjNt3_9Xz8=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Pleasant, fast and responsive service here. The food quality was also very high (freshness, seasoning and portion size) and price was also very reasonable.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOzK0jg-BQkF1PtA9KZaNH6xljZLdV_L7hpIPwk&fid=0x0:0x4208792eed890708"],"When":"2024-5-6"},{"Name":"Kristy Chen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWEfZ2rjxNiODjhooQ3vu4wU52UFmMssx1nBEw-QrGtiP3D8nPb=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Definitely not impressed by the sushi here mainly because their quality is way below my expectations. Their soft shell crab had a fishy taste to it, which means that it is not fresh. The sashimi that we ordered was nothing special, I found that the pieces were cut a little larger than I would‚Äôve liked. The rolls that they have are passible, but I would not come here again.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMHpEYCIu7MpIj_iTNhtWVUmJdvlT2ntpjO1Z2Y&fid=0x0:0x4208792eed890708"],"When":"2024-1-2"}]

[{"Name":"Pedro Henrique Munhoz","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVHDgrUCRxsDI0QiyVrXSpD7YMiIjCu4Myp-mN5MwWyO4s-k5hcIg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"One of the best sushi I've ever eaten. The presentation of the dishes is beautiful, the quality and flavor are wonderful. The environment is clean and cozy, the service is also very good. I highly recommend visiting and tasting the dishes at Sushi Town, they are excellent.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOJaD9L8p8B3CfVtVoJs160f8arVr6Tw33wDq3u&fid=0x0:0xe90c924d72795abe"],"When":"2024-11-24"},{"Name":"Carrie Webb","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ_wCGq4XFUvXrcQe8zO0F3ep-PaRAZl_kBsm1h6Q0rrpQUfQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This place is great! The sushi was excellent for the prices we paid. There was plenty of different items to choose from, and our server was great.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNm-NpIoEe_XlvOQ9kBHdlls72Ki8qDGiwpzdYX&fid=0x0:0xe90c924d72795abe"],"When":"2024-11-7"},{"Name":"Nikoo Hanachi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJRTzlNHbEx2DreDSWZIc_YhvuJbsnSnS24b-Oh36y8Vlf5Jw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I used to really like their sushi but ordered a few rolls last week and didn‚Äôt enjoy it at all. Alaska roll was meh and the spicy salmon roll was terrible - salmon roll with lots of siracha on top!!!!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNea68650czk6KFEQF71VFxe0kquiGElZ92jS8n&fid=0x0:0xe90c924d72795abe"],"When":"2024-7-14"},{"Name":"Ava Fang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLga1s4NkqaMooM7OcRFxPYnk1HbRHKsSalAR610tB5058kGQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I ordered Mango Roll, Awesome Roll, Double Dragon Roll and a Avocado Roll. Everything squeezed together. I would like to pay extra for extra box if u need next time.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPjQO_q4YXSYHlB7hXT8APhvFYLYMkW4QlkexII&fid=0x0:0xe90c924d72795abe"],"When":"2024-9-24"},{"Name":"Arash Khalaj","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU0GXUSHl_8DCHyw4vHYdyppBcUqglv7HGLybyxYX7Z0_EKZR0BNg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"This was the second time we went to this restaurant with my friends, although I didn't like sushi at all the last time I tried it, but this time it was better.

I ordered fried shrimp with potatoes, but the shrimp was too raw and the potato was too sweet.

As I am used to Iranian food, I cannot understand how a dish can be without salt and very sweet.  Other than my taste, everything was fine except that the temperature inside the restaurant was very cold and I just wanted to eat my food and get out.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM8nvpwUqnHdaZML-JVXtdnnyiz3VApWgy3VShg&fid=0x0:0xe90c924d72795abe"],"When":"2023-8-14"},{"Name":"Shayan Emami","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWMRtVjgeF0Xa8B9cN17jFb1xX_jsiTrD6AvufKoea_Jc3WiF0j=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"As I remember sushi town north Vancouver was one of the first places that I tried spicy salmon sashimi for the first time. Their Alaska roll is also their signature. And vey middle class metro style restaurant, not so clean but very hospitable and fast. Their food quality is also good.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPGCBzgCxeTf-LlBbP9chdeb_icqkoFwKz87IO0&fid=0x0:0xe90c924d72795abe"],"When":"2024-2-27"},{"Name":"Justine H (Sunny)","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUmvMXm-P_-zaDju2DtLb4mJNuo8OiXNtbw6zPhVOcICWtiAOQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Sushi town used town used to be our favourite sushi restaurant, especially this location and we have been consistently coming back for years. However, the past couple of times we've come, it's been quite disappointing.

Their sushi rolls have been pretty consistent and the presentation of their food has honestly improved but we noticed their portions for their dishes such as the katsu and teriyaki chicken have greatly decreased in portion size from before. I also found a large fish bone in my tuna I choked on and not even the slightest compensation was attempted to be made! We aren't sure if it's just because we've tried so many other sushi restaurants at this point but their food just isn't as tasty in comparison anymore. It's a lot of little things as well such as the fact they charge for asking for extra sauce for their spicy salmon sashimi while some other places do not.

They still have easy parking, good service, waiters that check up on you often and comfortable spaces for both small and large groups alike but unfortunately that is not enough to convince us to come back again.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNr_edgmyVJ46LP1cKC345ht8wHLFKBRCBLCh0L&fid=0x0:0xe90c924d72795abe"],"When":"2024-5-13"},{"Name":"Kian Mousavi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ0e2Tw-oafpbUx3nxtSQkTZmJegjxdYO7vWGAb_iwDL7WyRdIY=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I‚Äôve been eating sushi town‚Äôs Alaska roll for years‚Ä¶ and it‚Äôs still amazing like the first time
Sashimi is fantastic and high quality
Godzilla is my new favorite
This is my go to spot","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNKPK0VKMO9nOkrEfihjPn2SjbvhnTHQjxd8R3J&fid=0x0:0xe90c924d72795abe"],"When":"2024-6-3"}]

[{"Name":"Anna Zynyuk","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVEVCHIKsKuiw97vIhmPPgXkG7HcaHaNb-3--o8aOWtKf0Jnbjo=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We‚Äôve been using Holly Food for our premade healthy meals for the family, and we couldn‚Äôt be more impressed! we have tried many Vancouver based meal prep companies and are super happy we stumbled upon Holly Food. The meals are absolutely delicious, with the perfect balance of fresh ingredients, rich flavors, and thoughtful nutrition. Each dish feels like it was crafted with care. The staff is always so friendly! üß° They go out of their way to ensure we‚Äôre always happy. Highly recommend!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Maryam Chatr Bahr","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVPa7sxDg58rm17dmy-pbxFfEZIPGCepjFAWkEuHzst_pK9vDxa=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"lots of super flavourful, healthy options!
I am grateful that I can get super delicious, healthy meals delivered to me on a weekly basis. This means that I don't have to waste money on buying ingredients where I'll only be using a small amount, then having the rest of it go bad in my fridge. I also save a ton of time on grocery shopping & trying to find new recipes to make each week.
even on a busy day when I'm feeling tired, it's really no effort at all to eat fresh instead of ordering takeout
Hollyfood has been also an absolute lifesaver during COVD-19 since at the beginning it was so hard to get out to get groceries. I have a huge appreciation for all of their staff who have continued to work through the pandemic to make sure that we're well fed.
Thanks Holly food! you guys are awesome!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPCUEw8EO39EKC-okQvhdACfWzGl2LeEs8TUYlt&fid=0x0:0x524a9f6056e73c23"],"When":"2020-11-20"},{"Name":"Hamid Payombarnia","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV6MVPaNkCJrzg_-V3-Y-jLaQRbGHfkSwlHzTveP8OrB-jM4DPsPA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We ordered a Turkey for our Thanksgiving party to Holly Food. It was an awesome experience. The Turkey was incredibly delicious. It was put in a high quality dish so we could use the dish itself on our table and didn‚Äôt have to change it. All of the side dishes were amazing too. Gravy was perfect. The roasted vegetables side dish was great too. My wife loved it. The bread pudding stuffing was very good. Cranberry sauce and mashed potato were lovely.
Everything arrived on time as we already had planned for and promised, warm and ready to be served in their own dishes.
All guests enjoyed and asked for the contact.
We became a loyal client to the Holly Food and for sure will order again.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Alireza Johari","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJBI-tSftmkFb2ak53uPg8MBZ7dzxO3_-ayEXvk16BL1YbUBQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I have been with Holly Food for more than 2 years and am very satisfied. I especially liked the fact that their food quality has improved even though it was good to begin with. Totally recommend.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Noosh Onedrive","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWstXouFoXaMko_XP8AYcx8U5TKxE-BnIqzPdOyjV2XtoBD3JkR=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I couldn‚Äôt be happier with choosing Holly food for my custom meal plans!  Food is always fresh, tasted great and came in great value. Customer service is exceptional. I highly recommend them to anyone and everyone looking for a meal prep service. It‚Äôs a great way to save time for you to focus on more important things in life.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Nicole Sedgwick Stewart","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXdfRvTBbAJAlAb274_voWaQvx9Fufqz5q48H6jPI9Ogdw8aiE=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We have been enjoying Holly's Food service for almost a year now and we couldn't be happier.  Healthy, organic, nutrient dense meals that taste great and are so convenient for our busy lifestyle!  Moji goes above and beyond to make sure we are always satisfied - we never get bored of the meal options as he is always providing new menu items for us to select from.  Highly recommend Holly Foods!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"88West Realty","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV0jU6vth74s1xyo8IT6Ct-fZSUjZtPOdCDzrQ9lKtkCDvwdoeX=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We had a perfect Thanksgiving feast with Holly food‚Äôs Thanksgiving Special combination of delicious roasted and juicy turkey, rich and silky gravy, stuffing loaded with flavour, creamy mashed potato, fragrant moist bread, flavourful veggies and citrus flavouring cranberry sauce.  All these were packed nicely and separately in nice containers.  We could not ask for a better feast.  Food was ready and delivered on time.  Holly food is highly recommended.  Huge thanks to everyone at Holly Food for delivering beyond our expectation.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Farzaneh asghari","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUV4rUe8oZNJIp5g1JR7apNBs6HaGmvEMYZsQEKcEBGRK8Ctvk=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Holly Food has been a life saver to my husband and I. We are two busy professionals that like to eat healthy. We used to spend 1 day every weekend meal prepping for the entire week leaving very little time for us to unwind and socialize. We felt that this was a cost to pay if we needed to stick to certain nutritional diet and and if we're on a budget. We did try other services that provide groceries and recipes and found those less efficient and more costly and not as healthy. For us the answer has been Holly food. The team is very flexible from customizing your orders to delivery method and time. The meals are always in good quality, fresh and healthy. They have lots of menu options, so if you are vegan, on a veto diet or a balanced diet you will always find the right choice for you on their menu, and even then if you get tired of it, they can customize for you to add an extra layer of variety...

I highly recommend that you give them a try.  you'll get your weekends back to do whatever you need to do to rest and enjoy!","Images":null,"When":""}]

[{"Name":"C O","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKtUAJkcCIICD5okDafvaHjszKQZQnkODFZDl4wGu7_ZdMa7v8=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I have been coming here for years (throughout my 20‚Äôs to now a 30+ new mom) and I never had bad service eating there unless you‚Äôre unkind to them first. People nowadays expect a luxury 5 star ‚Äúi‚Äôm a king so bow to me‚Äù service at a casual restaurant smh. Just order, eat, pay and then leave a decent tip. No bullshit

PS I love that ‚Äúloud‚Äù lady working there ü´∂üèº","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMkGWkYsetVA25SAehp_bPGWmEOm9OI4MHgJw23&fid=0x0:0x39edc979cd46f438"],"When":"2024-10-4"},{"Name":"Blessed&lovely Lily Lee","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVBpM_hXxO2W4mWo2Apy4_LV_Yb0NKCg_EJ1ElrK-yH2X18sOCG=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I was visiting a friend's gallery which is opposite of this sushi place. The service was prompt and food came quickly. I loved the generous amount of sauce over the rice. The server was very polite and patient when I came with 4 more people. Taking our order gotten quite complicated cos everyone had special request. I am happy with the vegetarian choices. We all truly enjoyed our dinner. Will be back for more!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Soefae Chen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWO7ZNgUf5Dwk1W_QTwOUDH5IE-lT_O8VF-ftw5oM5hbRZ-8oOz=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The servers were very attentive, and the sushi was very delicious too.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP5C7GZ5oIjEu2QqFZaMyOpKzMfo6QC2PnbE8LN&fid=0x0:0x39edc979cd46f438"],"When":"2024-6-29"},{"Name":"Daniel Zohourian","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLtwhHAxeP8JbqQhV0I-Yks2Vl1AJuW0oIgyr5B58utsNYy4Q=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I‚Äôve been eating from this sushi place for such a long time and i never have anything bad to say about the sushi. The service is really good and food gets ready in 10-15 minutes. Dining in is a fun experience and take out is also really good. Definitely recommend.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Janis Stephanie","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXzM2BKyrdi6QuxTe9rqasOOuZwESdHM-E6G7AptZ7As7rhvEgY=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"I suppose this is a long time favorite in North Vancouver's 20 years in the making is Sushi Man!  was impressed by the diversity, From moms to long time friends, to business men. I was taken back in benevolence. I tend to feel disappointed, biting in to sushi that's not cold. that could be on me since I arrived and used the rest room The taste was decently appetizing and the ginger had a nice fresh crunch. Upon arrival I requested a booth seat, I was denied, which really seems practical since business seems good. Overall experience was pleasant and left me in with a sense of community and feel good vibe.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNmOEg3fa6lkXVUhaGE9wlrPDJVIKndjDTZwE0N&fid=0x0:0x39edc979cd46f438"],"When":"2022-6-28"},{"Name":"J P","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK6MCX84P9Sa9erQM7930abDmjSxqp8Cq2c4W0Jw6O_zixAkg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"We‚Äôve been going here for almost a decade now. Food portion is great, tastes good and reasonably priced. My daughter likes their Teriyaki‚Äôs and she is a very picky eater. If you are looking for a fancier place to eat Sushi- for ambiance wise this is not your spot. We are an easy going family and care about how we are served and what kind of food is being served. We‚Äôve been a North Shore residents for over 14 years and even if we moved across the bridge we still come here once or twice a month to eat.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP4x8FxJ2e7ShwmqW4XSjii1OX_JCDR5RvubxwI&fid=0x0:0x39edc979cd46f438"],"When":"2023-10-18"},{"Name":"Rustin Soroushi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUzllMIvb9NdjZhqukfvq7kwzwz-fFz1FqyqKFzQUUgLuJSeFxr=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Everything is a really good price, but you definitely get what you paid for. Difficult to eat the rolls since they're not firm, and fall apart once you move them. Cups are cheap and slide around the table. The spicy salmon roll is quite literally spice and salmon, nothing else.

Overall,  alright for the price.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"ARJUN SOUNI","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUvVxMNX7ZjTU800Yu2ot2_yOBs9K5WriaOwOFuPU6ANPqWvulR=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Lady at the counter was very rude. Just asked her if I can sit and eat she since already paid for sushi she denied me to sit in the restaurant and said you didn't pay any tip. I usually leave a tip after I eat and after I experience the place but I felt it quite rude when being asked to pay tip upfront without even enjoying the food. Secondly being denied to sit in an restaurant that is all empty doesn't make sense.

Very rude and unwelcome people.
They mentioned you can only pick up the food but not eat still you pay advance tip like I am gonna run away with for $ 10 sushi.

Plz I would rather leave a $ 10 tip to another sushi place which serves their client the right way.

Never ever experienced this kind of rude experience before in Canada so far.
Well now I have.

Some family owned business need to learn etiquette and basic manners before they start their business.","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Brandon Collins","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXJftMou5k5OJyPtZPxUAjCRk0hWFHK-OghGtQJYsSNzGar9YlLzA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"I ordered the lamb donair it's was ok the meat was good I just wish that there was more available toppings rather then the basics but for 13 dollars you can't go wrong . The service wasn't the greatest I didn't feel all that welcomed maybe the cashier was having a bad day after you get your food make sure to ask for napkins as they don't leave them out . Would I come back? I'd consider trying other items on the menu such as their rice dishes.  If this establishment can up their customer service I'd change my review from 3 to 4 stars .","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPR3JgyVZuyJXTFH7MUQGWunvA-U5Js39lU8bV7&fid=0x0:0xfd497571b37e5d9"],"When":"2024-9-14"},{"Name":"Raif Weston - Real Estate Services","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXgo3Awp_AeJN_a9cowvplRMkyhJUWl-z6wC4NgW9IYMfv2A1HHtg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This place is consistently good. I've been coming here for about 10 years. I normally get a salad box and add chicken & lamb with greek salad and all the sauces. It's so good and it's always more food than I can eat and I'm bigger than the average person.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPiKBEDGaD71d26crP-z56JRuigvhCF2-CYx7Eg&fid=0x0:0xfd497571b37e5d9"],"When":"2024-7-8"},{"Name":"Mehdi Mashaykhi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKJltJjHUwj-9He6v6H2jjLPRoigTEMMJev-SsKHUT7wAOgMA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I recently dined at Yummy  Restaurant and was thoroughly impressed with the experience. The koobideh kebabs were exceptionally flavorful and juicy, cooked to perfection with just the right amount of seasoning. It‚Äôs clear that they use high-quality ingredients. The highlight of my meal was the local yogurt drink, which was incredibly refreshing and had a wonderfully authentic taste that perfectly complemented the kebabs. The service was prompt, and the staff was friendly and attentive. I highly recommend Yami Restaurant to anyone looking for delicious, authentic food.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMbGiFhmsqfz2QiAswBTa4tuUzs-dfF2ocpPUnT&fid=0x0:0xfd497571b37e5d9"],"When":"2024-8-15"},{"Name":"Mark V. Sinclair","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW6ve_wQQ4uxBt3cYQW8cTfAQRrRZkQ44mckIfxzATcnSTXi0wz=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I was first introduced to donair by a  Persian gym buddy who suggested this Northshore restaurant to tackle some major hunger after a Gym session. I'd heard of donair Mediterranean vertical barbecue before but had never been.

Always down for well-seasoned and spicy food, the first taste of Yummy's mixed beef and lamb donair made me an instant fan. Beyond the very generously sliced barbecued meat,  a wide choice of different vegetable ingredients and several sweet and spicy sauce options (garlic, tzatziki, or hot) can be added to the delicous pita bread -- which is very soft, fresh and doesn't break or leak. Many additional condiments are also available at-table for customizable taste: Frank's, Sriracha, Sriracha Mayonnaise, Ketchup etc.

A very well-stocked Cooler also  contains a ton of beverage choice: soft drinks domestic & imported, juices, bottled waters, iced teas + lemonade, red bull & sports drinks. Something for everyone.

The interior of Yummy Donair's very  ideal corner location on 16th Street is bright and clean with curving stone counters along window, several  individual tables for four, and new seating both inside and outside; the adjacent outdoor patio seating area  is surrounded by shady trees and shrubs along Hamilton Avenue, ideal for hot Summer weather. Cool Plants and Aquarium, colorful new  Mediterranean lighting, well-mixed Spotify playlists, and very Welcoming People make your visit a very  pleasant one.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNNE2KV2_6ee4k6PNlUyzPlFKUA-ePV1DxOff8H&fid=0x0:0xfd497571b37e5d9"],"When":"2024-5-24"},{"Name":"rouzbeh rezapour","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJzrANC4N0iSGQZriVJGw4S3NOttw8YmkMBaoUrX_ZMH2RP6g=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I had an amazing experience at Yummy ! The koobideh kebab was perfectly seasoned and grilled to perfection. Paired with their local doogh, it made for an unforgettable meal. The fresh bread, fragrant basil, and crunchy onions added just the right touch. Highly recommend for anyone craving authentic and delicious Persian cuisine!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPlgdXSLxr4yWt4vAuqSS27gVa814VV53viIQlJ&fid=0x0:0xfd497571b37e5d9"],"When":"2024-8-15"},{"Name":"Ursula Codd","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIbTVKz1_5mXZTG5SkYuRgG_dS0IZSXtmaOCSThJ35FD-IBPVgQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Excellent food and portions. It can get busy on a Friday night just with people ordering take out, but it‚Äôs always worth the wait. We‚Äôve never had a bad meal here. The quality is consistent each time and you can tell they take pride in their food. The ladies at the cash are always friendly and the guys at the back making everything are friendly despite being so busy. The restaurant itself could use a little makeover but my son loves watching the fish in the fish tank and beautiful videos on the tv while we wait for our food. We have ordered here more than 30 times. It‚Äôs always fresh and delicious!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Ben ku","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLe_PbVYRXBnXYYvqDtZlc57W3i50mp5S1l2YwNXcKVmgOJCA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"The food might be decent, but the staff is infuriating! That scrawny girl at the counter always has this miserable scowl on her face, like she can't stand anyone. There‚Äôs zero friendliness‚Äîno smiles, no thanks, nada! It‚Äôs like they despise their jobs and the customers too! What‚Äôs their problem?","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Dryden Bryson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXHO7aTHU-EcwxDAqOIva9YTtNfxTlCVHff3Fq9igXJm0DykUO-=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Got the lamb platter was very filling for only like 14$ or something. Tons of meat rice and hummus. The salad was ok but everything else was really good, lamb so juicy and the hummus tastes so good. Recommend the sangak bread, its like 16 sq ft of bread for like 4 bucks cant go wrong","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPlx-TIScC9LF0uPaoVrocunt8WLnp9RWCtBaTn&fid=0x0:0xfd497571b37e5d9"],"When":"2024-4-27"}]

[{"Name":"negar kheyrollah","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJiMHp3wHk2lGkmyAXXXYRz0ebdb9FZrRe9CsQ8zEyVBFlb6w=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Excellent environment, friendly service, great menu choices and really decent food and at affordable prices.üí´
Staff were so kindly. They works very clean.‚ù§Ô∏è
There is a lot of place for sitting.‚úÖ
Parking perfect.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPznAw2BK_O01qNeyIg2fg7UMeuhCrkmNnL0j-I&fid=0x0:0xb5f84ded44752cda"],"When":"2024-9-22"},{"Name":"Samiar Barzegar","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXdOWDD0ee_ra3H-qnygg7nys_RHQIfo2TPl9Meu9q4TEo2JJc=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I always get my donair from the Lonsdale Donair   Dude. This time I got it from the Capilano mall one. It was waist of money and time. As the portion of meat was half of the Lonsdale one.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN63YeoQoxMULFAKPqdTHdkWmM5fw-IUQG7mFu7&fid=0x0:0xb5f84ded44752cda"],"When":"2024-9-21"},{"Name":"Veronica Zayas","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVk1-w2Raq2PcAb5iN95y_5LwlmQ-l2AwWPcR8t9HUeNOqcdoFw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Good combo !
The fries were freshly fried, crispy and yumi üòã.
The pita donair was really delicious and the service was very quick and kind.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPfvyjkIHuWrmZwLp5QQfWD6w6x9kD3lpKzjuRQ&fid=0x0:0xb5f84ded44752cda"],"When":"2024-1-29"},{"Name":"Solmaz Dpr","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJeR4fNcMN8IApK8SwRdleXeXnZDeyIiXWS0gy-arhEbmUktQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I‚Äôve been a loyal customer at Donair Dude for over 6 years, and they never disappoint! Every visit feels like a step up from the last. The place is impeccably clean every time, which makes the whole experience even better. The owner and staff are incredibly friendly and welcoming‚Äîit‚Äôs rare to find such genuine hospitality these days. And the donair? Hands down the best I‚Äôve ever had! Every bite is delicious, fresh, and flavorful. If you‚Äôre looking for an exceptional donair, look no further than Donair Dude!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"STOKED ON EARTH","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXTbxNtQ0QWxTrBmRUDZ4ADjnQoHYgdAE-W9K69W7fUHcPrtKg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I used to order Donair dude at least three times a week and I loved it. They use to put so much protein in every dish and wrap. That‚Äôs why I use to order from them. They never skkkkrwd me over and it was always delicious. Ever since I saw the under new management I thought nothing of it, until my 3rd or 4th order I realized I was getting ripped off! Totally ripped off. I‚Äôd order extra protein and they didn‚Äôt add any extra multiple times. There was no way to prove it so I ended up getting 2 different proteins to finally prove they were a total scam. I‚Äôd order extra chicken and they put 1 tiny piece of chicken so if I complained on Uber eats they could contest it. So you know what I‚Äôll let you be the judge. How much chicken do you see? The new owners are a bunch of cheap pieces of garbage. They think this is worth $22?","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPUmnRuPFDmqIJeb7mjM721IqyHVk9giPJNzvg&fid=0x0:0xb5f84ded44752cda"],"When":"2024-3-2"},{"Name":"Andrea Baker","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKppKT8SUFGP7ALBCElo2M2ttopVdB-R3OE4i46HMNYikb21w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"i used to love this place but now they put one flat teaspoon of food in my pita, too cheap, too bad it used to be so good, no more buying my family food from here and they also jacked up the prices but give us little filling, no thanks for that amount of money i can get a full meal at a restaurant
P.s
I just ordered a large lamb pita for my son not for me and the guys put the exact small tiny scoops of ingredients as they did for my smaller pita and charge us $4.00 more and I  complained they didn't do a single thing. Watch out next time u order the reg and the large exact same amount of filling I'm never going back there and neither is my son","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"TE Alba B","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWja93ZRsxtwFym-fSrklsHeV99P939k3COcBDstnzDYN8CpFvF=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Delicious food !!! Very affordable, generous and succulent . We had the chicken box and lamb box plus falafel aside. Please don‚Äôt ask for cheese on top, not necessary and they will charge $1.25 CND more.
It is a very healthy food and no rice has to be  eaten or included.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP8GC_wSo4jAOC88DhdS1-LROcn8v9jsvUzUvW7&fid=0x0:0xb5f84ded44752cda"],"When":"2019-9-24"},{"Name":"Panteha Ebrahimii","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWp1neZmF9TAV9Mm2SPPocowHUnqOs_JTslv6MT8SBP5-H-Z0A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I had a bake potato that was a bit oily but very delicious. The samosas tasted great inside, with yummy fillings and spices. But the bread outside wasn‚Äôt fresh and crispy like it should be.

Apart from that, the rest of the food was good. They had lots of tasty dishes to choose from, like yummy curries and rice and different sauces. The people working there were nice . The place was also nice and the service was good, but I didn‚Äôt like the bread around the samosas.","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews: [{"Name":"Jennifer Thornton","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXxGkwZGNAlwKbi0bc9qqTJZsWoyAsXFmtNcwgpfNCHexwdoC9z=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Ack!! This is such a tough review! I hate to give such low stars but the owners need to PAY attention!! Starting from bad to good. The drinks, um no drinks list? No wine list? Come on! You have a beer and wine store right next door. I will add that the bartender (who is awesome btw and is in my pictures because I didn‚Äôt get his name) said he was redoing the wine list. The wine is yuck but hopefully they will bring in some options. The food, cringey‚Ä¶ if you can‚Äôt even get a hamburger figured out and you are a pub, there needs to be some changes!! The beef dip had a chance if it had some flavour like a horseradish mayo or something!! I will say the pork rinds on the appetizer list is surprisingly good! Parking sucks! Just walk, honestly. Now what you have been waiting for THE GOOD:  first off, the STAFF. They are great, super helpful and friendly. This was a busy hockey playoff night and they were great. 5+ stars for the staff!! (We have been here on a not as busy afternoon and the service was a bit questionable but the server was really friendly and sweet) all in all I really feel like the staff is so nice. LOCATION: this is a great location and a really nice atmosphere. The seats are comfortable, it‚Äôs a nice layout, lots of room, pool tables, darts, karaoke and lots of TVs for sports. COME ON OWNERS step up your game make the food and the drinks list better and you will get a better midweek crowd as well as a better weekend following. Add some live music, good North Shore Bands \u0026 not just karaoke, to this and it will be pure gold!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMA6465-BJxUnUU6i3NjZ7WO27O5Krb5MwG0xlh\u0026fid=0x0:0x4b43047cad7f80c2"],"When":"2024-5-1"},{"Name":"Munro Stuff","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWj0Wcuk6ox5dfAeJ4fAaMbhX_F-nzzt3p5oc_f0hBd0NpbGSM=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Had a pretty good visit here - amazing to have a pub with this view! A glut of TVs, but no beer menu or list of cost of wines by the glass? Tuna burger leaned towards cooked rather than seared, yam fries were way salty (but regular fries were good), and they messed up our order but obvs didn't know and we were in a bit of a rush. Decent, but not rushing back.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPWiOW_GW5lkjH1WRhq4RG_zJk56-1e1xDVY2k3\u0026fid=0x0:0x4b43047cad7f80c2"],"When":"2023-5-6"},{"Name":"Darwin Duncan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUfuYR2unwHM0nVtFpdeS3ZtfBsZPmFgqWkS-_0N-aKpvV3eXY=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Would not recommend. Went here for some food and drinks with some friends to celebrate a birthday, service was poor and the staff had the audacity to not only accuse a friend of doing drugs in the bathroom but just straight up kick him out. If you like your nights to be interrupted and false accusations made against you for drugs use, then this is the perfect place!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Ryan Werbowski","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLG4YIXeSWr_XBd9PJk4ohsNtjM7-qL9uX-bnyRDXZ-cqJVyQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Kicked my buddy out for doing coke in the washroom for no reason. He was with me the entire time and is drug free . Maybe talk to the person who accused before actually kicking the person out. Worst establishment in all of north van. Never go here","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"B","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWvbXoDaTTQqaNGH72Vjc7LhGkcJ2cK-6QxPSAbf3qIbytdUNZ5=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We went here for the first time on Canada Day to listen to a dj session.\nIt was a beautiful day outside, and I was surprised to see that many people. They have a nice patio and great friendly service, and I enjoyed their crispy tofu, with a side salad. So we listened to some great music and a good lunch.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOk9ROX4-wwKL56um8TaBmwbyIjF9t9Doep4k0m\u0026fid=0x0:0x4b43047cad7f80c2"],"When":"2024-7-4"},{"Name":"Jason G","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLaNUAa_T_nqroso9MaLPwRY19sM1q-EhVVs5gBQlqIOcftHA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"The way I was treated by the individuals at the door today. There is a good chance I won't be returning......... If you would like stuff stolen on from your table when you are in the bathroom, then come here all you want. I would spend my money in east Vancouver before I came back here....( The manager wasn't helpful either) ...... Be mindful of where you drink and eat........\"different people\" could be serving you\".... Customer service matters............ And I can tell the management doesn't give a rats A$$ about the reviews that are left here.....","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Makyla Slater","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVvx7tf05YoQpHVifufYSKoy5LPbvWqIpIa400XE1A3TzrvBsp6=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"They kicked my boyfriend out for doing drugs in the bathroom when he DID NOT do any. Do not come here. It is not worth it. The food is almost as bad as the drinks.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"possible dreams","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWxIa3BzWqnXDQUO8jtY20RLIc-e_dcFVWRfnXKg4PTTzFJReRSSA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My first time here and I really enjoyed my visit. They have an extensive pub menu that I chose nachos from...they were delicious though could have used more cheese :) There are lots if Tv's for the sports fans and a pool table , darts area . It has a great view from the back of the bar that spans over the inlet to Downtown Vancouver . I will visit their patio when summer returns to enjoy some friends, good food , cocktails and that beautiful view.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNZG5yVljRtp0IKr7kcR-PKJ9ZvfFRdo1_OiZwD\u0026fid=0x0:0x4b43047cad7f80c2"],"When":"2017-12-2"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Aagaard Pliego","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX21VwCIl5P3sNwxKGTiHeqwz_l5A8u8lHPTyohN8u0YYtIihI=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"It's so delightful to dine in this restaurant! The freshness of the food is beyond words. The vegetables are crisp and the meat is tender and juicy, tasting sweet and refreshing. What's more, the service is excellent. The staff are enthusiastic and attentive, always available when you need them. I'm extremely satisfied and must recommend it to people around me!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Lv bianco","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWSKn7K-ovoJnAaR0KhBbM0NovBxctUVcaXp0_6Yao9fFFml68P=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Order takeout on the night Trump was elected. Ordered from there a couple years ago. Food was horrible. Decided to give them another try.  Thegai lan  was crisp, tender, and fine with very tender, beautiful beef   The beef chow fun was delicious and the crispy noodle chicken chow mein was full of chicken and bean sprouts and everything had a wonderful flavour   I forgot to take pictures   Only have next-day  left over pic","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPe5mOgGQldC8wZtFDbQN3Kb0DEJ-gqAJhtv61x&fid=0x0:0x4d745c1c0e278101"],"When":"2024-11-6"},{"Name":"St W","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWTyBPVHL0NjHaFgsBUKBDVLR5ChGZUWEaHQPa5eEXGTN1C_sA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Solid Cantonese style cooking. No scrimping of ingredients on fried rice. Very good prices and quality in North Vancouver. Way better and cheaper than Westview Oriental which I would never recommend after the new owners took over. Ripoff pricing of $45 per dish for even vegetables.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMB04Pl03lVXZgfcpDlRFdoGWdZo3g84V2xIVtV&fid=0x0:0x4d745c1c0e278101"],"When":"2024-5-14"},{"Name":"mayumi c","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKeSPLwBkL_JaGbEDo5oVVWzPZ4MBEW0kd6-oEeSU99kjDF9A=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"While I can‚Äôt say much about the atmosphere as I ate out, I had a major quality issue with the food. While I was eating I noticed something weird in my mouth. When I took it out it turned out to be a dirty bandaid‚Ä¶ missing the white pad so I cannot be sure whether it‚Äôs still in the food or I accidentally ate it. I honestly felt nauseous after. To think I just about ate that cloth bandage.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPsKY8HVKIvERSEjUIW6mE44YIHpe8J1u8k8MxA&fid=0x0:0x4d745c1c0e278101"],"When":"2024-11-1"},{"Name":"yitong jiang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK0Ju3vFDqmadwiu-jD5Kguo00tMjogFCNv9fT6MXtaMtKmbA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"‚ÄúThe food is excellent. They currently have a promotion: if you love their food or dining experience, you can leave a review on Google to receive a free spring roll or a can of drink.‚Äù","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNWHMwxKlFgwawslLnisXSF2xCQDgjdII9nwny8&fid=0x0:0x4d745c1c0e278101"],"When":"2024-11-19"},{"Name":"DJ Devlin","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJAgX_FZkC2pQsBnEJM91GgebHBFnU5ClXC27Xw4q4idc6HoA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Even though we came in at 8:10 p.m., they were very welcoming.

We are from the Midwest, so possibly our Chinese food experience is not as refined.  But never have I had such delicious hot and sour soup with so many different ingredients and flavors.  We also had the  Szechuan shrimp and Chicken and cashew. The soup and the dishes contained whole shrimps. Great fresh ingredients and the flavors came through wonderfully.

We also had two beers.  So two entrees, the soup, the beer, the tip,  and we still ate for less than $36/person.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPvgj1pO1LuWE2b5WE54N3MmQ4BkUHnp1kELhwZ&fid=0x0:0x4d745c1c0e278101"],"When":"2023-7-23"},{"Name":"Ali Pardhan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVG2zznkReNC_gEI3lXaSh52RrojDhslhAND8kNaf6jju0X7BZyqw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Ginger beef: good (average)

Peppering chicken schezwan: BAD!, way too salty. My mouth is stinging from the salt (both first day, and 2 days after, today, because it sat in the fridge unwanted)

In person, id ask the waiter to try & confirm its a mistake, but I got takeout so I wasted $18

Portion size was good. If I re-try, we might just get 1-2 Ginger beef","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOPpCi5YGpheO05v7-iv8Zcj5UKgnjwwkA4iGGG&fid=0x0:0x4d745c1c0e278101"],"When":"2024-7-14"},{"Name":"Design Assistant","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWDh0C8Bn0OpVUpX3BlNeIRop2QFevNhtxljphK9a7wY-KGFCs=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I recently dined at Coral Court with my family, opting for their family menu designed for six people. The food was incredibly delicious, offering a variety of 7-8 dishes that easily satisfied seven people. The value for money was exceptional, and the service was attentive and friendly. Overall, we were very pleased with our experience and highly recommend it for large groups looking for a delightful dining experience.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMXxKGwYOf-e8-t-4qiFYa8pLzY3dgFhQZGoP9x&fid=0x0:0x4d745c1c0e278101"],"When":"2024-3-18"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Maria S. L.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXmNBRvqZkvr_0rAAHPKMgxMRZbZwg5l1CVjG0r_lmLNb7MARhw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"If I'm going to have Vietnamese food, I prefer traditional than fusion.  This restaurant is one of my favs.
Ordered no. 16 (Noodles Soup w. Briskets, Soft Tendons & Beef Tripes) & 18 (House Special Noodles Soup), large size.
Noodles Soups were both good as a whole, the broth was tasty (we didn't feel thirsty afterwards).  There were adequate amount of meats in the soups compared to the prices.
Service was attentive.
The restaurant inside was clean.  We were there at around 11:30 a.m..  Both washrooms were clean and tidy.
When you look from the outside, the restaurant building is really very old & dilapidated.  This may let you hesitate if you haven't visited it before.  The restaurant inside looks not bad though.
If you are looking for traditional Vietnamese food with very reasonable price, this restaurant is worth to visit.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPjjQgtvWSK4y-BEgNSuTPvUJCa2u9w6WrtKiCs&fid=0x0:0xd72efcb474855faa"],"When":"2024-8-13"},{"Name":"Hon Kit","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWdIvH4t8NIHXoFu1vQdySTf59peDKi0XLG7XL5_JUc97C4RKo=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I tried the Pork chop with spring roll dry noodle. Taste is very good and portion is big. Pork chop is thin slice and tasty. Service is good also. Price is average. The only issue is that from outside the restaurant, it looks shabby.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN_BrS1BkM1xpA30RQs48C7kVdpIu0IutV9apc9&fid=0x0:0xd72efcb474855faa"],"When":"2024-5-30"},{"Name":"Ally Lorenzo","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU-neTJDyEMluR-dNraSOHT3ii-9XxbydK6elMdQR0Wi8VhMrl4=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The food was delicious. I recommend getting their spring rolls. Also, the staff were friendly and very accommodating. We will likely be back.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPZSMztTLnEjJXTBuGOnXUQO1f0aR2mcDieNU93&fid=0x0:0xd72efcb474855faa"],"When":"2024-10-25"},{"Name":"Tiffany V","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJN05QxwHq5UqFc65zgS5OJi0DYD4Yn-_UBzyziCnyl3859icym=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Incredibly authentic Vietnamese food at a very unassuming storefront! One of fhe best pho broths I've had in recent memory!

5/5 #3 Pho Tai Nam
5/5 #70 Pork and Shrimp Vermicelli -- the grilled flavor on the shrimp, the marinade on the pork is so good!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPPzTLW-tGQDOHIu3QTrmpv5QhynAC_PM1IjJHj&fid=0x0:0xd72efcb474855faa"],"When":"2024-5-30"},{"Name":"Jithin","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjViafC5-g34jjPdEiWqV1T3yQfOLhNCbVtjsj9owgUOgUeHPTN0fA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I recently had the pleasure of dining at Pho Japolo Vietnamese Restaurant, and I must say, the experience was nothing short of delightful. From the moment we walked in, we were greeted with a warm and friendly atmosphere, setting the tone for what was to come.

The highlight of the entire experience was, undoubtedly, the food. The dishes we ordered were nothing short of amazing. Each bite was bursting with authentic Vietnamese flavors, leaving us all craving for more. The menu offered a wide variety of choices, catering to both meat lovers and vegetarians, and everything was cooked to perfection. Whether you are a fan of traditional pho or eager to try some exotic Vietnamese delights, Pho Japolo will not disappoint.

In addition to the fantastic food, the service was commendable. The staff was attentive and courteous, making sure our needs were met promptly. We didn't have to wait long for our orders to arrive, which is always a plus when you're hungry and eager to indulge in delicious cuisine.

The restaurant's ambiance was clean and comfortable, providing a cozy setting for a memorable dining experience. While it might not be the most opulent place, the simplicity and neatness added to the charm, allowing us to focus on what mattered most: the incredible food.

Affordability is another major plus point for Pho Japolo. Despite the high quality of their dishes, the prices were reasonable and did not burn a hole in our wallets. The value for money was exceptional, making it an excellent option for both casual outings and family gatherings.

Parking can be a headache in busy areas, but Pho Japolo had us covered. The presence of parking space in both the front and back of the restaurant made it convenient for us to find a spot without much hassle.

While the overall experience was fantastic, there was one minor downside that deserves mention. The area behind the restaurant seemed neglected, with puddles of dirty water and a lack of maintenance. It was a contrast to the cleanliness and attention to detail inside the establishment. A small effort in maintaining the outdoor space could go a long way in enhancing the overall impression of the restaurant.

In conclusion, Pho Japolo Vietnamese Restaurant is a gem for any lover of Vietnamese cuisine. The amazing food, good service, reasonable prices, and convenient parking make it a must-visit. With a bit more attention to the outdoor area, it would truly be an all-around exceptional dining destination. I would gladly return for another delightful meal and recommend it to others without hesitation.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOXenPPmkKaHO6IwYEiR4BmewuCLqqrDlAOlBb5&fid=0x0:0xd72efcb474855faa"],"When":"2023-7-31"},{"Name":"Josephine Ma","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW4ctBP8R2rm9S8Aa5NyuULMapTvyTQYakS6AvI9Cd025oSy86H=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Pho Japolo has been around for quite a number of years. They have several locations but for a long time the one in North Vancouver was the only one I knew of. After years of not trying it, I finally got around to trying it and wow...I'm hooked on Pho Japolo now!

Veggies marinated prawns and grilled chicken vermicelli bowl
Veggies and deep fried tofu vermicelli bowl
Grilled Lemongrass Chicken Vietnamese Submarine
Two sunny side up eggs with grilled lemongrass chicken rice plate

We all loved our food. The (Veggies and deep fried tofu with vermicelli) tofu in my bowl was incredibly crispy. When I bit into the tofu it made a "crunch" sound that was extremely audible and gave me goosebumps all over. Our daughter loved her Grilled Lemongrass Chicken Submarine; mu husband said that he had tried a different location of Pho Japolo and had been very happy with the food there already, but that the food at this location was even better.

Highly recommend this place!

Service: Good
Parking: Free
Location: 2070 Marine Dr., North Vancouver","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOrDUVJ1Pb-N_l3srDjaaNWGeEXGcP79MnHmxCl&fid=0x0:0xd72efcb474855faa"],"When":"2023-3-28"},{"Name":"Sok Bodian","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV50mXzzyZK1AvHWC4w8hRhC_hYkYPrm805jqbEAGi7h0USvTxW=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great pho lots of condiments to spice up your soup. user_reviews: [{"Name":"Shahab Mansouri","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWfNsKFTuisHdEjpZevCagGP1uYVxkb9Cy86brACCwv2fvrZR8=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Excellent pizza, especially the herb pizza. Additionally, the customer service was excellent. We also enjoyed the delicious Margarita pizza. You must try Wild Thing Blackberry Bourbon Ale.\n\nThe woody flavour of the pizza is a result of the use of oven wood which is nice. Also very affordable place. All in all, I had a nice experience here, and I would absolutely go again.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOaOjtgcl8Betmha3JQcsultEl5i6hXTdv7VHs\u0026fid=0x0:0x9c13843cffce5b9a"],"When":"2023-7-4"},{"Name":"Keith Zulu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJfcQKMsqcGuxJNaTeq9gtWBCFWA-jxga0PaBzufYuI0kxTkg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"An excellent local beer and pizza style place.  Of course there other drinks and food too.  Their hummus is great.  The pizza oven is the excellent one (put in by a previous owner who wanted to focus on the Forno) so its as real \"Italian made\" as one can get outside of Italy.  Their complete strength is that they offer a very large selection of local craft brews NOT from only a few breweries like most other local brew/pubs but from many.  Ambiance is \"street Vancouver\" but they are on a quiet side street instead of a main one like their competition.  They offer a good happy hour 2-6 for the early eaters - \"retired\" and the \"on the way home from work\" crowd.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Anahita Shams","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL41saLflok5Fy31QdcXsujuVXTroZqYGu68sqN7JcbK3j7qw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My family recently dined at Angry Otter, and the experience was truly exceptional! The food was delicious, crafted with fresh ingredients and vibrant flavors that made every bite memorable. Mr. Sina went above and beyond in providing top-notch service, ensuring our meal was enjoyable and all our needs were met promptly. If you're looking for great food and outstanding hospitality, Angry Otter is the place to go!\"","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Lee Van","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUkdc0b5WROtpnJCruJpetIegq6Snt_2bGm0A5pSa9cqY1SCXL5=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"My friends and I came here the other night for trivia. The wait staff were very kind and let us join 2 tables together as there was 10 of us. Between the 10 of us we ordered various dishes. I ordered the beyond meat burger with fries which was yummy. The trivia was great fun, the atmosphere was great and I can't wait for the next trivia night! I appreciate the wait staff being so kind and patient, thank you.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNauhY4WdwHCM3X0mz0nAl8lT2R9z5Ob4bPTfFV\u0026fid=0x0:0x9c13843cffce5b9a"],"When":"2023-10-28"},{"Name":"Pegah Azadeh","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXX1DdFwSk74wFtg1OoSdJ_7NlX1628lYKnC_rWE8a02NhqV3Mh=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"We loved the Truffle Fries and the Springboard Burger. Good luck in your new job and thanks for making our experience amazing!

Previous Review: I ordered takeout and it was great. I got the chicken katsu and thought it was good quality and tasty.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNp-aIRjLBCTXwoROuu2mJ0H83BykoHrxm5fSk7&fid=0x0:0xbf10e1836aaeb185"],"When":"2024-8-18"},{"Name":"nadia moiniyan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVrA-2JjxbqvKvB2uIVyr_6GbuV4AWA5-86PLEQzwEC6N32GZyj=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Food is so fresh

often with a crew of hungry friends in town.
And aside from a few minor missteps, this place has consistently delivered.
The sushi? Fresh, expertly prepared, and presented with pride.
But the real showstopper today was the Nagasaki Jjamppong - seafood stew .

Jordan Sushi isn't reinventing the wheel, but they're damn good at what they do. Consistency is key, and they've got it locked down.

Already planning the next visit.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNd8ZIW_Tf_NfV_nYvuFcHjLQ64r5liMQTMwLLN&fid=0x0:0xbf10e1836aaeb185"],"When":"2024-10-5"},{"Name":"Shayan Emami","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWMRtVjgeF0Xa8B9cN17jFb1xX_jsiTrD6AvufKoea_Jc3WiF0j=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Seems like a new sushi place inside and out. It‚Äôs worth the wait/trip and I‚Äôd totally recommend and go back for more when in the area!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMDnvBU7Gw5TIekkwBE0dRZCm3S7ER-P_kRWyv8&fid=0x0:0x66239fcea90e88d7"],"When":"2024-11-12"},{"Name":"Shinjini M","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUD-NflD4SuBnG8b2CLK4vFRUp76N2PF3vkj0rSOEFsK6cFdJ0QmA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Oh. My. God. The best Persian restaurant in town and I 10000% recommend the tandoori chicken with naan/rice. The best thing ever!! I love their Baghali Polo as well! Extremely quick service and very warm people. Please try this place out üòä","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPA1Q0WHK_QdsCjqndWvBaSJgXRWvbiU4laahf6&fid=0x0:0x66239fcea90e88d7"],"When":"2024-11-25"},{"Name":"KAUREEN MENDIS","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVLyN8E1hRGHsFD3sxl5TysphBJITv6qUWNQDBxqDr6eTnHtBcu=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Loved everything about this place !!! The ambience and vibe reminded me of a kebab place back home the same smell and almost identical seating arrangement. The food was the best there is so much quantity for a reasonable price. The kebab and naan combo was so huge I was scared I wouldn‚Äôt be able to finish it. Top it with the Chicken and rice and you have a real winner. The beef cutlet also was so flavourful. I will definitely be back to try desserts as I was so full this time I could not try them. 100\100 would definitely recommend!!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNN46n5X793-YzAB4oWAR2yjdp3RSorxggYWcwb&fid=0x0:0x66239fcea90e88d7"],"When":"2024-9-23"},{"Name":"Aqeel Rehman","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVmfTi4uSjCNG16nlnRxtjqUz6fJYHXNTc6GpJq6E66XM14O3lZ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Yaas Grill offers deliciously addictive kebabs but milder than traditional Pakistani or Indian spices, still packed with flavor. You will find the location on Lonsdale, facing a park, with a cozy ambiance that shines at night. I found the staff friendly and cooperative. Unmatched huge portions and affordable prices make it a must-try. Bonus tip: Be sure to explore their veggie options to kebabs and gravies‚Äîyou won‚Äôt be disappointed!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNLAm4Apopi2Wrx-S8Lf2e77dBxyYx56MSllx-5&fid=0x0:0x66239fcea90e88d7"],"When":"2024-11-3"},{"Name":"Aakanksha Mehra","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWuYdKCUfmzBWVi8hHJdEW0VQHgKBu9GL7pviB3VjBf3i4r2lDX=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Tried Yaas after a lot of recommendations. The food is just right. Its like any other Persian restaurant. It was way too crowded and loud for my liking but the service was moving despite the line up. The prices are a tad higher than other places in the vicinity. We orderd a side of salad along with chicken vaziri and to my surprise it was a box packed salad. Looked straight out of save on ! The kebabs were juicy. Got neither good nor bad to talk about it.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMenFwlcptr2mfZj8L5w2cPP-UwQqhhCx0fFA4M&fid=0x0:0x66239fcea90e88d7"],"When":"2024-9-3"},{"Name":"Sahara Shaik","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUZtM6omifZZNI85JZaEEVEW7MsHt3UoOOrEoWlPJ9SkkPoYKxJeA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My experience at Yaas Grill was absolutely delightful! The Persian cuisine here is exceptional ‚Äî from the aromatic kebabs to the flavorful rice dishes, every bite was a treat for the senses. The service was equally impressive; the staff was attentive, friendly, and knowledgeable about the menu. The ambiance was cozy and inviting, perfect for a relaxed dining experience. I highly recommend this restaurant to anyone looking to enjoy authentic Persian food with top-notch service. Siah is super friendly and excellent service!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN_0qitr3ErGxexHeQPaZx8dh_fUK5yvCbUPRiZ&fid=0x0:0x66239fcea90e88d7"],"When":"2024-6-30"},{"Name":"Shay","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVcjneWc_LCD45co2Cac8bHJnBcsw2HEfdzcQRnC4ndQPOjCkyC=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"üçΩFOOD -4   of  5

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"D S","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUiwZP5uC5CzBgSahQQVkTqGSd5rHWgB0GVCkCWen4FIy1S7JRp=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Only been here a month! And I'm glad they showed up. It's a great addition to Lonsdale. May be the best pizza in lower Lonsdale!

You can get the small, made to order  for a reasonable price. Their flavors are excellent, and the pizza dough is well made and proofed sufficiently to have a good chew and flavor profile.

The new slideout pizza is an amazingly priced personal sized deep dish pizza! Got the Sizzling Beef and it was delicious, will try all the other flavours in the future! Melted stringy cheese with plenty of toppings on deep dish pizza dough baked to perfection.

Highly recommended!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMvxclGdCVJ1qOBKK62NJowGPF_kdeUpzwhPSDH&fid=0x0:0x89143a65ad6675e8"],"When":"2024-6-29"},{"Name":"Amy Watt","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXtFx0Lt1_G_UCsXyvg1o5eSDevhehAM8wUiop0lPf09tXNft4k=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I‚Äôm really disappointed with what this place has become. The pizza used to be amazing when it was Bowen Island Pizza, but now it‚Äôs just greasy, deep-fried dough that doesn‚Äôt feel fresh at all. It‚Äôs not even cheap, and with so many other pizza spots like Boston Pizza and Fresh Slice around, there‚Äôs no reason to settle for this in the quay. I miss the quality and roots of Bowen Island Pizza‚Äîit‚Äôs sad to see what‚Äôs replaced it after all these years.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO_3qRyBSp6WovS0266hdJ8QPOj6VZTuuxXZcKv&fid=0x0:0x89143a65ad6675e8"],"When":"2024-10-2"},{"Name":"Ishan Sood","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVTqSPFUGzpCNOctTFzfYdo36lTA_VE4yc5ob2BUb3AF-STqn09=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This spot is a must if you‚Äôre near the Seabus. The owners are super friendly, and the pizza is delicious‚Äîcrispy crust, fresh toppings, and plenty of options for all tastes, including dietary needs.

The portions are generous, the prices are fair, and it‚Äôs perfect for grabbing a quick, tasty meal to enjoy on the go. Highly recommend!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Cherry Gill","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIKamr124W0f9E2NaH_IMs7olhVk3G-dh5PcGwM2hT5PPjuGQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I was trying to order for pickup from door dash and the order total for one extra large was 37.99. And when i got on the website the same order total was 25.99 and with the coupon it was 21.99.  Really are you guys kidding 37.99 for 1 pizza. Surprised with that. Its not worth for the 1 pizza . There‚Äôs alot more options nearby.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNNcHVY90cbQOFwos9CXNvO6_A0WgoX0pn_1exr&fid=0x0:0x89143a65ad6675e8"],"When":"2024-11-28"},{"Name":"George Sisic","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU8xRq5tLxwfdG4pEFGnnqtc66ThEbJD9YZ2thf5x1De4vHBJw_=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Wanted to check out there pizza and saw they have 2 on to good to go. Put order around 4 and wait until 5:30, when they put they will be ok to pick up.

As I come to Q, they just cancelled order and sad they don't have anything. So definitely don't believe that you will get anything if you put your order like this. Went to fresh slice as usual and will stick with them","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNa1vOdEUdBop0TYmDuAhAKhHfjt8bFa4etih3M&fid=0x0:0x89143a65ad6675e8"],"When":"2024-8-11"},{"Name":"detruiz2","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWs1po_rNgG0pY4uOMze7AndbSKQ_sVLvCmiEcK9joBCF2ImqQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Dough was pretty good
Sauce is alright
Pepperoni taste a bit commercial, definitely more salami ish than Pepperoni
Cheese is the usual mix of mozza and brick.
Would i re order it? Probably not
Am I disappointed that I tried it? Not at all
A step above Domino's ,but definitely not a good mom and pops pizza place.
It's ok pizza 6/10","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Lily LS","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUq-WwqJNcsEWyVMf8Yt4-JT3STj4c_Y3n1v_nhQoZ-fmZm053j=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We arrived with our toddler and the manager who was stocking the drinks offered him a free juice. user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Slim Shady","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVKrB6X2CF4mCx-XA0kVBj3nazPuJzsp8oTK7c7x0FSpzu_EJ3o=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I have now eaten here approximately 5 times and I really like it.

There are two V Nam locations, I believe, but this one has better portion sizes, accommodating staff, and excellent service.

Eating certain things is difficult for me, and they work around this with ease and grace. I truly appreciate their willingness.

Now about the food:
1. Very tasty
2. Authentic (I've been to vietnam)
3. Excellent portion size
4. Good price
5. Professional staff

I usually eat salad rolls, vermicelli bowl or plate, and lemon grass options.

I will continue to eat here and I do recommend with confidence.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPXuAmHnOQ5kMvItT8wL0Y5c_zNVrVkTdhgAEVo&fid=0x0:0xe4d946fb3517c9bc"],"When":"2024-9-28"},{"Name":"Cristina Kent","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLQjNO4wnEbCjloTHz-jx3xtVWo8RmMlReAzOnTTyeWxdxKdQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Amazing taste! Really nice staff! And The portions are really big! Don‚Äôt listen to the nei-sayers!!! Must try!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPcBGTKQnlrgehxezUc1QEm8drJKrMrvVZT0Jq8&fid=0x0:0xe4d946fb3517c9bc"],"When":"2024-10-17"},{"Name":"Green Green","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXvGkkQWLTgP6ZpLfyQFVTIZWmT7INBi5IdhvmkSI6w7pFFIwWw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"The menu was quite confusing. For the noodle soup, I could choose between rice and vermicelli. I thought it would be rice noodle because it was under the noodle soup section. However, I got the soup and rice on the side. The soup tasted good though. I also ordered the fried noodle which tasted like something I would get from a microwavable noodle pack.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN48Z6Z0OF3KdvN2tJUhKpt7R2NNtlp8ZC7-gdx&fid=0x0:0xe4d946fb3517c9bc"],"When":"2024-3-30"},{"Name":"Jeff Stychin","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX5dqdYBM0IgRaiqovl4yMwoaj48OZNEjr44HlisGu20tFtwg-x=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"When this location first opened the food and staff were great. Been going intermittently since then with only a decline in quality and service. Today the subs were filled with chunks of meat unsliced. Old sub buns and no sauce for the spring rolls which were also very oily. Overall quite displeased. It‚Äôs too bad because this place has direct competition with rice & noodle and I wish they cared more about their quality and service and attention to detail.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Bah Gom","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIIV2ykYYjO0izdxjk6f51k63jaeW8I90IOPpEgtxRszAN62g=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I‚Äôve ordered take out from this location before and if I ask for any adjustments like extra pickles they‚Äôre usually ‚Äòout‚Äô. And the server can‚Äôt stop giggling long enough to take the order and will need to call back to clarify.  He couldn‚Äôt get off his phone long enough to finish his order  with me last time.  Do not recommend.  Definitively not on par with their third street location.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"S Man","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLn28ZSzxsRWx-BXlwIwUrPV4yTq9Mq3Vc9B8eaa--gvAlCn6pq=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Mediocre at best and that goes for atmosphere, service and the food.
The Pho was very light, noodle tasted very bland compared to other places.
I can think of 2 dozens places with lower prices and higher quality.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Victor Huynh","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK-YB2O_RIH2LOdPnnJNXueg7yjtewMZfo-PiKCrXtOzJ477w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Just open 1 week ago. The place is very nice, and clean. Food was delicious, staff is very friendly and polite. Dine in and take out 6 times last week and each time was very satisfied. Highly recommend","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNk0OfGB0M4YSPY-PsTw27jzZhJYxSeYy04xnqa&fid=0x0:0xe4d946fb3517c9bc"],"When":"2023-10-28"},{"Name":"R. Bray","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXiqL1Wf5qkVuoL5Yui6sP7pz9EGeyUYtkWP7P-g-zCQ9izVc8=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Our first time eating there I ordered combo A which was a small skewer with 3 tiny dried out shrimp and some red peppers, one salad roll, a spring roll & some shredded pork on vermicelli with pickled veg. A huge bowl of noodles
With pork came out and it was cold, dry, very bland, no flavor.  I could t tell if it was the way it was supposed to taste.because I had never had it before but it wasn‚Äôt good.
Peanut sauce for the salad rolls tasted bottled and was overly sweet.
The spring roll was ok. .","Images":null,"When":""}]
