user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Gordon Kwong","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKKjDehFqHA5ZT74ZkeWTLjTUZu8GTq7uesQO3c1SQIt6zn0Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Excellent well seasoned and rich flavored dishes served up in a very comfortable and welcoming space. The eggplant dip was great, with a nice smoky taste with a touch of spice served with freshly baked flat bread. The roast lamb shoulder was a nice serving of tender juicy lamb with dilled rice. Service was good even though it was very busy. Well worth trying as the dishes are uniquely seasoned and a variety of dishes not found elsewhere..","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNpBvNnM4NQMWu0dD5uc9aObeD5eUEpp6VXxlXp&fid=0x0:0x751cb3e4264f22ce"],"When":"2024-10-23"},{"Name":"Mehran Ashtar","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVAz7FH5AU-TTeKD5FKqY_NfYxLSNjquYwQVHWnFQmsVYmyHs4=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Had a great time at this Persian spot! The food was super tasty‚Äîjuicy kebabs, flavorful stews, and the bread was fresh out of the oven. The vibe was cozy, and the staff were so nice and welcoming. Definitely a place I‚Äôd go back to for a relaxed and delicious meal!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO3tzXivkHfJ4fPZmlhIdvudEIpaMeS7msFvRMM&fid=0x0:0x751cb3e4264f22ce"],"When":"2024-11-24"},{"Name":"Shervino T","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV6zkqt2zKitqKAocpq4XdjLGLKYwV6h6SPfkXKLCO94ZOjBHOX=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This new branch is amazing as well. The owner really went above and beyond.
Great atmosphere great staff, great food and really accommodating. This is really a gem in whole Vancouver and must go to restaurant
Great food quality and portions

Must go to Persian restaurant. Make sure to order couple of dishes and it is so much that you can take a lot home.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPhOPMZHivsJH7vBsMjsbDtv69xU9efAVOnjEk_&fid=0x0:0x751cb3e4264f22ce"],"When":"2024-11-10"},{"Name":"Aakanksha Mehra","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWuYdKCUfmzBWVi8hHJdEW0VQHgKBu9GL7pviB3VjBf3i4r2lDX=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The new restaurant is classy and elegant and lives up to its authenticity! We are a regular at their 16th Ave location and this is the first we dined at this one. They have added new items to the menu. Ginormous but delectable portions as always! We ordered their Lamb Shoulder this time that came with jewelled rice! And what a sight they were to look at ! The owner was around and gave us a complimentary plum chicken(or quail, I cant recall) and it was wonderful. The prices have gone up a bit but so has everything so can‚Äôt really complain about it! Wonderful experience as always! Coming back to it in out next trip to North Van!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO406PjAO-2YFzAkUd487tSr2xjLioksGifeYgl&fid=0x0:0x751cb3e4264f22ce"],"When":"2024-10-29"},{"Name":"Shabnam Ghaffari","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKFh7qe4ymy_GyRCGsWjUSP4S6hiYybQrMso1wAnBhY_Ivw_Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We had an amazing dining experience at Akbar joojeh Lonsdale! This new location interior is beautifully designed, with traditional Persian elements.
The food was absolutely delicious, full of flavors, and beautifully presented.

the staff is friendly and attentive, making the whole experience even better. A ‚Äúmust-visit‚Äù for anyone looking for a great experience.
üåüüåüüåüüåüüåü","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN_lKt5lJDExow8QGtI4dnqmU6iHkh5T6zT5cK_&fid=0x0:0x751cb3e4264f22ce"],"When":"2024-10-20"},{"Name":"Arash Khajehnouri","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXHG45D_q8b_7UtVYm0KPUcWX0SlzYc_xpP7Y3YyN9433LRUhFf=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Akbar Joojeh in North Van offers an unforgettable experience of Persian cuisine! From the moment you step in, the elegant and thoughtful interior design shows how much care has gone into every detail. The menu is filled with enticing options, and the professional yet friendly staff make you feel truly welcomed.

What stands out the most is the glass kitchen, showcasing the cleanliness and high quality of the food. Every bite bursts with authenticity and flavor. If you‚Äôre looking for a restaurant with impeccable standards where every aspect is well-thought-out, Akbar Joojeh North Van is a must-visit!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMxr2W7zmhGRXS0iC7V11Ne9gpwEw-eVGUWI_Fp&fid=0x0:0x751cb3e4264f22ce"],"When":"2024-11-24"},{"Name":"Morteza Selseleh","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJRhYZGfEJwK9rc4mfONO969FFpFeH-20GVSV_NSccDEvHKuw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"If you‚Äôre searching for an unforgettable dining experience in Vancouver, look no further than Akbar Jooje. This hidden gem has quickly become my go-to for exceptional Persian cuisine. From the moment you walk in, you‚Äôre greeted with warm hospitality and a cozy, yet chic atmosphere. The d√©cor is beautiful, blending traditional Persian elements with modern design. The star of the show, however, is the food. Their Joojeh Kabab (grilled chicken) is tender and flavorful, served with aromatic saffron rice that complements the dish perfectly. Every bite is a testament to the care and passion they put into their cooking. The blend of spices is exquisite, balancing savory and subtle sweetness. Albar Jooje is truly a must-visit for anyone in Vancouver looking for authentic, high-quality Persian cuisine in a beautiful setting. Highly recommend!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNaW1r-wHP2CcD7ZujsiAgUvdR-R7PEPFqnsF3A&fid=0x0:0x751cb3e4264f22ce"],"When":"2024-11-13"},{"Name":"shayan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLYloSOdMCPNqPNTpdOmzHPzyoEuVG40079GC3stDyfpM_MaJE=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I ordered takeaway and was completely dissatisfied. The koobideh kebab had a terrible smell and was inedible. The lamb shoulder was not cleaned properly and was full of fat. On top of that, the fava beans in the baghali polo were very hard and undercooked. For such low quality, the price was extremely high, which is absolutely unfair. I do not recommend this place at all.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMxNGrT92zrPYijLHyAizTp0SvRIjnGGpwu2_Kf&fid=0x0:0x751cb3e4264f22ce"],"When":"2024-11-22"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Jae","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWBnY5ALUqXP9XFCoYrm3L7bdvuw1enJq4fKypDblkj0PVpfrtk=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The restaurant is clean and spacious, creating a comfortable and pleasant dining atmosphere. The menu is well-organized, making it easy to choose dishes based on personal preferences. I liked the variety of side dishes, which are perfect for adding a little extra if the ramen isn‚Äôt quite enough. The set menus are a great value, offering a satisfying meal at a reasonable price. While I didn‚Äôt try any drinks, they seem like a good option for those who enjoy having one with their meal.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPk4p6PJoGMqevtFGPST2CTxfq22lxDzQsVl0Z5&fid=0x0:0x1fe3b8fff88b81aa"],"When":"2024-11-19"},{"Name":"Sunny Yerra","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWwX9GsGvRD4Rmzpnxnt1YRL-Eg5T-wGNmWnsfNs3vgSTgJL4bc9Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The hot chicken karaage was an absolute delight‚Äîdevoured it in no time! I also want to give a big shoutout to the server, who confidently guided me through the dairy-free menu options, which I really appreciated given my allergy.

I decided to try the chicken jalape√±o paste ramen next. If you can handle the heat from the karaage, you‚Äôll find the ramen tangy and thoroughly enjoyable. However, I found it a bit odd that you‚Äôre required to finish every last drop of the broth to earn a stamp on the loyalty card. Is this tied to some Japanese tradition? I‚Äôm not sure, but it definitely caught me off guard.

The place itself has a neat, upscale, and intimate vibe that makes it perfect for a cozy meal. Honestly, I‚Äôm wondering how I‚Äôve missed out on the Kinton train for so long. Great job, team‚Äîkeep it up!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN-coKS9zNopX4NGFSKuHgk1GI7MiDzjRM5lgH6&fid=0x0:0x1fe3b8fff88b81aa"],"When":"2024-11-26"},{"Name":"Cheryl Chan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXKRqwGsiyntapcBOAHD9FtzNPiBoZCzUhMf_hjWst1Da_zYAf8=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Was in North Vancouver on Lonsdale Ave looking for lunch‚Ä¶ there were 4 of us & decided  to take the meal for 4. It does give you your choice of ramen plus 2 appys &  glass of pop. Service was good, so was the ramen. The layout of the restaurant was nice & clean. It was my first time trying Kinton ramen & I was not disappointed. Apparently they have different locations too.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM6RvJ5MfiNdIAYotbPvgUmVI9NLgB_fj53hT1F&fid=0x0:0x1fe3b8fff88b81aa"],"When":"2024-11-1"},{"Name":"E J","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUrvh4CbdP6FQQxMyj7Ing9kTE03rzh86JIpgFN_ZRhysfntmzi=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I haven't had much ramen, so I don't know how to properly rate kinto, but I enjoyed my meal.

Great vegetarian options I liked that there was multiple veg ramen too chose from.

I had the shoyu for the first time and I liked it a lot.

Personally, I wouldn't recommend the cold ramen.

Service was fast and efficient","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPN015yIVKSMbeEf28JtObUbSG_Y4KSuFxFtvM0&fid=0x0:0x1fe3b8fff88b81aa"],"When":"2024-9-5"},{"Name":"Verlandy Joseph","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUeqvz3epzGUYZUUg-TWLgp4N1xSJZSkd9AlLsRB5CMxapEDaHF=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The vibes here are really nice. A calm atmosphere with great customer service and amazing food is always a win in my book.
Definitely one of my fav ramen spots. Something I found super cute was that they had mouthwash and toothpicks in the washroom for you to freshen up. Everything was completely sanitary. Super clean place. Love it here.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPTJfN31PTDFexWncRNrcPzM_dwNJgCF9d5nFyt&fid=0x0:0x1fe3b8fff88b81aa"],"When":"2024-11-8"},{"Name":"Dharmendra Awasthi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIV4bH4pruWuwHwvFeVB2D5sgfuAyTLFuB7xlIyVnDZPxnWyw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I recently visited Kinton Ramen in Vancouver for a delightful Japanese brunch, and it was a fantastic experience! I tried their ramen, which was filled with flavorful tofu, a perfectly cooked egg, fresh sprouts, and deliciously long noodles that had just the right bite. Each ingredient added a unique layer to the dish, creating a harmonious blend of flavors and textures. Surprisingly, the ramen came with a side of fries, which was an unexpected twist but paired nicely and added a fun, crispy contrast to the meal. Kinton Ramen offers a welcoming ambiance and attentive service, making it a must-visit spot for anyone craving authentic ramen.
Highly recommend!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPoq5cZa2DikWhTaVUqmX6C0W5Hma_Qr1HqZFl3&fid=0x0:0x1fe3b8fff88b81aa"],"When":"2024-11-11"},{"Name":"Herb Hefner","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWreDgHZLLGDCSb7YTTpIlal0Wc_rVZaLCmSof2vTc315V93IdH=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Food-always great presentation, full of flavour and priced well. Can‚Äôt say anything negative and probably the best ramen I‚Äôve had in North Vancouver.

Service-staff are lovely, and always attentive.

Atmosphere-typical ramen spot with a great bar and small tables that do the trick.

This is by far, my favourite place for a ramen in NV.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPjjdDb0BofvipUjtJUcKuz8AcX5LXE0w-OXDe2&fid=0x0:0x1fe3b8fff88b81aa"],"When":"2024-11-6"},{"Name":"Fuzzy Nemo","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWMhjGNDhI-RZYgIiVRXnRDEQCiyyP-dsVjb7EhBkcymNr9MvYi0A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"This was not the typical ramen place.   It's a chain and certainly tasted like a chain.   I found that the soup base was a little bland and not very hot.  Although the meat was very tender.  Service was okay.  Was put at the bar, when there were plenty of empty tables and I didn't know why.  May not want to go back.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNhzE420bOoSlCLwati2pD45C6_OMfAGkEHjAr8&fid=0x0:0x1fe3b8fff88b81aa"],"When":"2024-7-5"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Blampin","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUe_Zl-7bsR_k4aPN0CDrFm3JxQQaY2wgkXgNPVdZQs9NDoFTA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"First time trying this place out. Searched Thai Food near me.
I asked for Tom Yum with no tomatoes 7 spice, got a curry dish it looked good had lots of spice but I said I asked for Tom Yum.

The other server was really nice about fixing it but when they brought the correct soup it had tomatoes in it and practically no spice!

Language barrier.

No one's perfect I guess.

I don't think I will come back especially when it felt like the cook just had to take a look at who got a wrong order.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPe52OiuQCrvbHzSIYyTFrfgzyohesSdwueIKrp&fid=0x0:0x25cbd361b7dc12dc"],"When":"2024-9-9"},{"Name":"Greg H","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLS42NOGEGDpuFyEpOVCT4MpAfYJRSGGJb74YYTSy7FNARaiA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Ordered take out. Food was on time and came as prepared.  But the quality of the food was really disappointing. Pad Thai was bland and dry, with the chicken being particularly dry. Chicken satay skewers were basically not edible - dry and hard. Green tofu curry had decent flavor but the tofu was dry and chewy. Overall not good enough food to ever order from here again","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNX5OupUQlYEyXIONuF9OrBEy6ps-rJAaIfpFiS&fid=0x0:0x25cbd361b7dc12dc"],"When":"2024-6-27"},{"Name":"josh e","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK5dtS7jwWUcCo5LyldIaL89f46l0vxEXDtqQKvp9YkWI_Lhg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great crew working the supper rush, super friendly and quick to help customers needs.
Dinner rush was mid swing and the team made my partner and I feel welcome, great tasting food with different spice levels for people who like spicy and not so spicy food. Definitely recommend trying the food out and the price is fair for the great food you get.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jayne Lim","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVehZJKmm_F-UVczi0tJH3Ltubk-03r3LMGoGyU5znQAzuxXdh4pw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We have now gotten take out 3x in a row from here so I feel like it‚Äôs safe to say that we love this place! It has been challenging to find good and reasonably priced South East Asian take out and this is so much better than what I was expecting! I feel like I‚Äôm eating the food of my childhood. So far, we‚Äôve had just the Pineapple Fried Rice and Coconut Curry Soup and both have been fantastic! The Gyozas are also very good! I took a point off for atmosphere because I don't think this is the kind of place that is intended for dine-in anyway, but it's clean and fairly spacious for the size should you wish to stay. The food was also ready right on time and the portion size was quite generous.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNpyfrXf63VfELGK8OdxqOsiSuK86yg6MVI1xEV&fid=0x0:0x25cbd361b7dc12dc"],"When":"2024-3-31"},{"Name":"Alexandra Grant","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXePX6GZpWSlrAO1xBHbmOVxKn0iHfKAD6ff-li37TjZNDhPDOG-w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Pad Thai was great! It didn't taste as fresh as I would have liked, but not bad. The service was very attentive.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMHz0224qGWrZXtogDyHcCmTT4_neYf5io79YEQ&fid=0x0:0x25cbd361b7dc12dc"],"When":"2024-10-26"},{"Name":"Jewel Bernal","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLoP8VLfOFXX4-I_VGJd5oFIg-A8RpcBTu5M8ZTJnh9P5nYTg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The ambiance of the store is impressive, and the crew is warm and welcoming. I thoroughly enjoyed my Laksa from Rice and Noodles Restaurant, which was packed with flavors and ingredients. It was delicious and provided a satisfying experience for the price. I always order here because of the quality they offer.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNP-O5IyKsfGS8GDA3TKmaWBSKSE20vzTmm1ovb&fid=0x0:0x25cbd361b7dc12dc"],"When":"2024-5-8"},{"Name":"Alexa Freudigmann","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW5lps1YQgh69OIDyJHo6S2Ebpvk8kqOmESG1I0nqMjhg1pNqc=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"First time happening upon Rice and Noodle and glad we decided to stop in. Super tasty fresh food, flavours are spot on. The counter service was friendly and prices are fair. I had the Laksa - spice level 3 was perfect. Definitely more flavorful than other Thai or noodle options on the Shore. We‚Äôll be back for sure!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNjgeKL_c2Bo607fkTEBeZDIROm3eyjXtCHdZVd&fid=0x0:0x25cbd361b7dc12dc"],"When":"2024-5-9"},{"Name":"Ayla Ramond","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVYjGJNn8380iEJTi8idgFUxbot55I1G0JL539IZWDvphbUeLbh=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I‚Äôve ordered from here a few times since they first opened and I haven‚Äôt had an issue until Sunday night. Some of the food was cold when it arrived, and the curry had barely any sauce - which I could‚Äôve looked past if I hadn‚Äôt gotten food poisoning. I haven‚Äôt been this sick in a long time and although I normally love Thai food, I won‚Äôt be ordering from here ever again.","Images":null,"When":""}]

[{"Name":"hania daaboul","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUQa8NWbYsOBdoHhTx2i-DSDGlyXV65A1FtkVJsxdPzsebGoIfdxA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"The food looked good , presentation was very nice but taste wise it wasn‚Äôt the best. I would consider it an average sushi. The price is high compared to the quality. Service was good and they were fast. However, I wouldn‚Äôt come back. For someone who tried top quality restaurants I can‚Äôt accept a lower quality sushi anymore.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPbXrPmQs1X4GEdssVnCpRznRBMEPLZwMeDR53E&fid=0x0:0x129964ec81b1af6c"],"When":"2024-9-24"},{"Name":"B.U. T","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIXl7Eo4CxkLXBYltusdSuGWvXJFunP-tcmzhop3RmY7E6mxw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My family dines at Mr.Sushi regularly. They are very accommodating with my mom's special diet and the server knows exactly how she orders her food. Everything we order is always perfect! This is our go to restaurant in North Vancouver. Never disappoints.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPIduP85sSgQ6mNsF3mXyMj3l3jWpECfSjldAum&fid=0x0:0x129964ec81b1af6c"],"When":"2024-7-8"},{"Name":"Blampin","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUe_Zl-7bsR_k4aPN0CDrFm3JxQQaY2wgkXgNPVdZQs9NDoFTA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Super great selection. Nice menu layout, good restaurant vibe with nice clean washroom. Had Nigiri Tobiko, Volcano special roll and tempura appetizer. So good. Could have that again for sure.

Can't wait to go back!!

Thanks guys","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMTX1gO3LT279m5aCm0LPUkk14X-8Tt5_IzyahN&fid=0x0:0x129964ec81b1af6c"],"When":"2024-7-23"},{"Name":"Thanh To","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVd1WYJP1UmnIbSg76XorhMDMrCl48AkAncBIVkE7p0lcIIllbB=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The lunch menu has some really good value. We got the sushi lunch special for $20 and the Oyako Don for $14. Both were very tasty.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPGkE5s1pyAr6YMD3h9H5xrUMKDw6jHSeFAcIs9&fid=0x0:0x129964ec81b1af6c"],"When":"2024-7-20"},{"Name":"Dulce","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWLHE_9tO2cwAVc1bgEryV8dn_IfC22lagkIAHF0C2T8UerBo1s=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Bento box was a big portion. I didn‚Äôt see that one coming. Overall experience with food was nice.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNLECJdRz_ieg6ILFOLbJ4neYOODsxCOsaD51AR&fid=0x0:0x129964ec81b1af6c"],"When":"2024-10-31"},{"Name":"Timm Dapp","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVrlrwCS17HT2XjBAmvRfCR3emJF-qBRAdJw8fyL9xIEsxcpiHO=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The legend continues on Lonsdale! I love the Mr Sushi in Lynn Valley, so trying this one out finally was a real treat.

Staff are very friendly, the food is excellent and maybe some of the best sushi for its price point in the area. The dining area is lovingly taken care of, accessible and very clean.

What can be said about Mr Sushi that isn't already said a hundred times? One of North Van's best sushi restaurants and in the great walking neighborhood of lower lonsdale.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPdKsx5-5qVx8bskRVHjC-s3rlEwUK0P-JVTvrm&fid=0x0:0x129964ec81b1af6c"],"When":"2024-4-1"},{"Name":"Tyler Mark","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWibLJJIi5TxlsNs8ZU4hGKMoyn16yOBcLgxqnRCXg_eeLkLjKyMQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Sushi tasted so fresh! Make sure to try the Oshi! Wild salmon is great!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP4bQ0IcorfIFoCrB5_EyMEo-JtFix3dBP2yGIk&fid=0x0:0x129964ec81b1af6c"],"When":"2024-11-17"},{"Name":"amir abbasgholizadeh22","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLZTaw5BG_rfSrG3flFlJDdZtwVzDvW3Mn-85WadvJeVrR0dg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My friend and I sometimes go to Mr. Sushi for lunch, the flavors are great, the quality is great, the prices are reasonable, I recommend you try it at least once.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMKz7c8cHKHXXp-0SqiGjjCHMi8nvyPnJHgTeVH&fid=0x0:0x129964ec81b1af6c"],"When":"2024-10-16"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Munro Stuff","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWj0Wcuk6ox5dfAeJ4fAaMbhX_F-nzzt3p5oc_f0hBd0NpbGSM=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Always happy to pop in and grab a slice. In the display case there are usually 8+ types of pizza ready to go, which they'll heat up in their oven. So good for a quick lunch on the go. Just had a chicken-mushroom-pesto which I think was my fav so far.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMWXr004n60gcGzc9AYp0GHx_Zdxpkp7lb48CUB&fid=0x0:0x795736b333e47ab1"],"When":"2024-11-30"},{"Name":"Nicole Pajak","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIiNxBC6btW6ExLFq38lkG8R07SlhfnhTI0LaALZc0l0Fp-vtAv=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I recently ordered two pizzas from Pizza Garden on Lonsdale: one Hawaiian for my husband and I, and one plain cheese (mozzarella only) for my very picky eater child. What arrived was a completely uncooked Hawaiian pizza and a cheese pizza topped with some kind of green-blue cheese that even I wouldn‚Äôt eat.

I called to ask for a refund for my son‚Äôs pizza since I could bake the Hawaiian a bit more myself, but the cheese pizza was simply not edible. They offered to send new pizzas, but it was already late and I had to prepare other food for my son. They refused to issue a refund for my son's pizza.

The manager was quite rude, which unfortunately brought out a rude side of myself, something I'm not proud of. I will never order from this location again and I urge others to avoid it as well.

Update: they replaced the pizzas rather than refund me for one. I appreciate that they did this but really don‚Äôt appreciate being told that the manager cut the pizzas herself and there was no green / blue cheese on the child‚Äôs pizza and that the Hawaiian was cooked properly when she checked. The original pizza was so soggy that it was leaking through the bottom of the box. That is not normal.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOxeGAf4_pz6Ji_2zL9ZRF_ByhGz_Pb0jj7Zm1i&fid=0x0:0x795736b333e47ab1"],"When":"2024-6-22"},{"Name":"Jasmine Kizilkaya","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjViAq0AwN_mcRX6CQC9qJrZthtN9bAt3YfEvW4fOgWwuI0AAcFR=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Decent pizza but nothing to write home about. Feel like the slices are better when you order them in store. The XL is a great portion though.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPv-3JDXoguh__aCLqVf9BRp_VqZwp_9qJcbuef&fid=0x0:0x795736b333e47ab1"],"When":"2024-11-19"},{"Name":"Fahim Panah","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXL033oeALzAceamDI0eA2UnYlWbW_lia7qSrSGxl1Vtk4LXhBThg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I was a regular at this place for a long time. It was a quality place. Today I ordered a Carne Piccante and got surprised with what I got.
The dough is nowhere what it used to be. I don‚Äôt know what was it. And it was charred. See it.

Update: I appreciate your quick response. I'd never heard of well-done and medium cooked pizza :) I didn't know that some people like their pizza charred and tastes awful!
and I pass on your generous offer. I didn't write it to get a free meal; It's for others to make informed decisions.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNZIJmhgmGAXyx4PxDie9xeQBd-n7xCH2Bw7YLx&fid=0x0:0x795736b333e47ab1"],"When":"2024-7-16"},{"Name":"Mariah Dars","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLLWe1vPLBtDFjPzz4RLRPwG6jz1QFaZc2HdOgmAoGsjkww7Q=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"A bad experience at Pizza Garden for the second time. They botched my order and tried to quietly remake it while I stood there, watching the whole thing unfold‚Äîwithout so much as a word of acknowledgment. They took ‚Äúmy order‚Äù and put it in the window to sell as slices. And if that wasn‚Äôt enough, they still managed to *miss an entire pizza* from my order, trying to show me that the order chit had one pizza on it, that‚Äôs not my problem. When ordering on the phone I repeated myself to the woman on the line‚ÄîTWO PIZZAS‚Äî multiple times but apparently that wasn't clear enough. The lack of basic competence and communication is frustrating. We left, with no pizza.

Mistakes happen, but own them, explain what went wrong, and apologize during the ordeal! This isn‚Äôt the first time the customer service here has been abysmal. It‚Äôs a shame because the pizza is decent, but not worth the frustration and inconsistency.

I won‚Äôt be back, and I‚Äôll be sure to tell others to avoid the headache too.

They did call and offer a free pizza if we return, but it‚Äôs not worth the bother.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Naz Behroyan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX0-X0w98PrmbWjwVpTFtKWlN4m_mE4kqknb-dm6r8rRXS1_X_g=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Pizza Garden offers an exceptional dining experience with its delicious Italian-style pizzas. The flavors are authentic, the ingredients are fresh, and the crust is perfectly crispy yet tender. Each bite is a testament to their dedication to quality and tradition. The ambiance is cozy and welcoming, making it an ideal spot for a casual meal or take away. Highly recommend trying their pizzas ‚Äì you won't be disappointed!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Amelie cote","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLXcvo666_-8lwcAqVpmb5mNkcq9hT22kq6P3WFe_5zHlZGHQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"This was by far the worst pizza experience I had in a while. I used to love pizza garden and I was excited for this treat  (I say treat because let's be honest they are on the pricey range of what pizza should cost)
first off, ordering was a bit chaotic, the girl on the phone seemed confused, forgot to tell me how long it would take for my pick up etc. but hey we all were new at some job sometime so i didn't think too much of it.
when we got there (at the time we were told the pizza was gonna be ready) we were rudely told it was not ready and that we would have to wait at least 15 minutes. so after talking with them (felt more like arguing) they realized they got confused in our order and it was indeed ready to pick up.
all this would have been a small inconvenience if the meal would have had worth it but unfortunately the whole inside of the pizza was soggy, i dont know if it wasn't cook enough or if they just put super wet ingredients on it but it was honestly really unpleasant to eat. half of every slice were wet. So for that price ill definitely go somewhere else next time im craving pizza.

EDIT : they offered us a free pizza which we ordered this weekend and it was a better quality. thank you for making it right","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Nafiseh Nouri","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLm9iqmZ4JZiovzRTGACAP-ZSLp6AmWPJiCT6sIbOsF2oJrGw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I tried their Quattro Formaggi many times. I‚Äôm not gonna lie, it is the best. I recommended it to all of my friends and they loved it. They are the best. Thank you for the high quality food, pizza gardenüëèüëè","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Leah","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVKarmcGZ1Js35SCZKS4LzTbiBHhnd6ukNdOqfbApRvwTocr3k=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"If you‚Äôre looking for oversized and unique rolls, this might be your place!

Service: staff are always welcoming and kind, promptly take food orders, and the food tends to arrive fairly quickly.

Personal Favorites: Salmon Cone, Yam and Mushroom Roll, John‚Äôs Roll, and the Spicy Mayo has a slight undertone of sweetness, which levels it up in comparison to others. They offer a large variety of vegan and vegetarian rolls, which is a nice change from typical veggie rolls.

Food Quality: I hate to say it, but I‚Äôve noticed the quality of their food has been inconsistent in recent months, which is why I procrastinated posting a review. One day, the salmon was great, then a week or two later, the salmon was chewy, and this has happened a few times now. I hope it was a temporary glitch and that things improve, because it‚Äôs a shame.

Overall: nice atmosphere, isn‚Äôt too loud; however, it can get packed during peak meal times, so be prepared! They offer outdoor dining, which is great on a nice day. This is a fun place to go with a large group to try a few different things since again, their rolls are noticeably larger than other places and very shareable!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMgUQZ6RA0tsrCsiGYtkejBXAhO5xTwxx1Dn4TN&fid=0x0:0xef013793d269ec09"],"When":"2024-6-20"},{"Name":"Ed Russel Tayag","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW_aofbQuZWRhfkFJz7db7dik8h255Wsqs2_K2tHqeXxfpsda4=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"All their specialty rolls are bomb! All the rolls taste fresh and very tightly packed with ingredients and flavour.

Service was really fast and friendly. They are very attentive to our table on a dinner rush. All our drinks never went empty.

The atmosphere makes you feel at home with the lighting and comfortable seating.

Another plus are the washrooms which is really clean.

Definitely will come back with friends and family.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPHDxxzMriodzuojJkZ8nYL5fpTPfLBB3fd2PXj&fid=0x0:0xef013793d269ec09"],"When":"2024-8-20"},{"Name":"Nicole DeWolf","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXr_WvxEmb1DNqQAXSBpR7UwBEO2ItOyTEPKKPKIyR9jE6MKQh9lQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Casual atmosphere... generous portions...very fresh fish. The shrimp was likely the low point...but no one goes to a sushi restaurant for the shrimp...Here, the tuna, salmon and uni were sublime. We had the sushi and sashimi platter and were blown away by the portions.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMzAMgxfLU9GCmoE1ZDb7MJnC1kEFzwfcbbCI2P&fid=0x0:0xef013793d269ec09"],"When":"2024-10-13"},{"Name":"andy Jahhan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKLoj5m5Vi1EbIOWL8pFRxYYgchz3-Llg9e1EMQSVX2NTsZ3Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"The food is delicious. The service is good, but the hostess was a bit overbearing. When we arrived, we were greeted by a hostess who insisted that we sit at the table closest to the restroom, as all other tables were reserved. We explained that we were unable to sit there and she continued to refuse, stating that only that table was available. As we began to leave the restaurant, she relented and told us to sit wherever we wanted, but her tone was quite rude. It was not a pleasant experience, but the food is excellent. Will I return? Probably not, but I will order takeout.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOMf-UlqtnzdGII8q0jWWlhrRIe3x87d5SRniZT&fid=0x0:0xef013793d269ec09"],"When":"2024-7-9"},{"Name":"Kasumi Okajima (Kas)","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW3m9Zzz5V40ZOlaImUkn3ZQp6STmmVav3AD_8yRA8CBB-Hy749=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Now I can tell everyone tell me this sushi place, huge portion with quality and great service. Each sushi has good enough amount so just let you know haha","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPu3qKOCyB-2bzCn8AY__WM4fkNpH6gcUzh18sL&fid=0x0:0xef013793d269ec09"],"When":"2024-8-7"},{"Name":"Karla Albarran","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLzUF87FlOHrkpXO3A-JkhcIJs5XyJ8It9hkIm_dNQh2fUbLQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The BEST sushi in north van.
The special rolls are huge and so good!
The service is fast, everything is so clean.
10000% must try!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOTFUBopa7nip332SDGubjIZbSqPeIox2aUBEYz&fid=0x0:0xef013793d269ec09"],"When":"2024-8-26"},{"Name":"Jay","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUMSBuPzluSoWnnNo1MNK2x6M66ep9pofz6iT0dmWr3wuV1Eps=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I highly recommend this restaurant. The food quality and atmosphere were both excellent, and the fried dishes were especially top-notch. The sushi was also very fresh. I‚Äôd definitely come back.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMFJMTnYMLd2476-Qoqv9kJQMVRMWB25hJB_Har&fid=0x0:0xef013793d269ec09"],"When":"2024-8-11"},{"Name":"DK","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKKZYekfDqO-37uBZ5ToTRdrdV8iR0ZbyK_Dbf6RqdiUCXTuA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is a Korean run sushi shop, and the quality of the rolls were pretty good.

We tried their special rolls and they did not skimp out on ingredients.
Party Tray C as you can see had good variety with the nigiri having big fish chunks on top.
Tempura was good, while not the best (could be more crunchy, flaky)

Overall I would visit this place again because the service was great and the price was incredibly cheap for the food portion we received.
Next time I would probably focus more on special rolls and nigiri&sashimi combo.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPnqMXm1C9u19IfWnhYb-1uWixMI7CaChl2MxET&fid=0x0:0xef013793d269ec09"],"When":"2024-6-24"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Rhodes Family","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVUlN1n3pAekvjp51e2hLJxijqWk6fkyD3R5wi0vtHWK6uqt4ItsQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The a√ßa√≠ bowls were really good and I would highly recommend. I was able to take them to go and were still cold and frozen when I got home. The cookies were way too sweet.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNz_3P-_EOoQi_3PyV7dwg6qyuG2TRaRiBu_NNb&fid=0x0:0x69f7141f6183455f"],"When":"2024-11-17"},{"Name":"Tsui-Fang Hu (Tracy)","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW_ro0txUL1mG25heVUuoyMTMpTlXMMMT4-dXmn5rgUocYrBx5y=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The portion of the food was good (I felt tired of chewing at the end üòÖ so healthy!!) The only downside was that tofu is an add on. Also the air was quite stuffy in there.
They got lots of interesting smoothies, maybe that‚Äôs the most popular thing?
Btw, the menu on the website still shows $14.5 for bowls which is $16.95 now I believe. https://www.buddha-full.ca/menu","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPWR65tgA7S7Aoxah5voMKnTbn71hMnlxM2d7on&fid=0x0:0x69f7141f6183455f"],"When":"2024-6-13"},{"Name":"Jamie Uzunkaya","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWx87Dr5B5JhvfGrD32_UzxRcSaHnY8uCRgMNjih7fUz1rzs3Xs=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I have been wanting to try this place out ever since my sister in law started working here! She had a lot of good recommendations for me to try! I tried the cherry smoothie and the peanut butter a√ßa√≠ bowl. Both were so delicious. I definitely want to go back and try their matcha and their coffee.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMYAi-l8d7-AEeRYYXHXfl3zClWoaHbLBFXpug_&fid=0x0:0x69f7141f6183455f"],"When":"2024-6-2"},{"Name":"Ruben Dias","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWRQm-dFG-t7_4ZY9xFC_uVe9KDx0B1GnM0fsF1XZmg0kLVJeIE=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"A Plant-Based Paradise at Buddha Full!

Oh, Buddha Full, where have you been all my vegan days? Walking into your cafe is like stepping into a vibrant garden of edible delights, and I must say, I'm still floating on cloud nine from my last visit!

Let's talk about the "Nut-thing Better Acai" bowl first. If this bowl were a movie, it would sweep the Oscars. Picture this: a heavenly heap of organic acai, with banana and blueberries so fresh you‚Äôd think they just took a dip in the Fountain of Youth. And the star of the show? That decadent organic peanut butter sauce cascading over an A-list cast of banana, strawberries, kiwi, with a cameo of chia pudding, cacao nibs, and homemade granola that deserves its own spin-off series. Each spoonful was a blockbuster hit in my mouth!

Moving on to the Tofuino Salad‚Äîthis isn't just any salad; it's a crunchy, colorful carnival of joy! The kale was so tender it must have been hand-reared from infancy, and paired with the smoky tofu, it was like a sultry tango of flavors. The supporting cast of carrots, radish, and purple cabbage added just the right amount of crunch, making every bite a standing ovation.

And let‚Äôs not forget the Grilled Please Sandwich. With its sunflower pesto and zen cheese, it's the kind of sandwich that brings peace talks to the table. It‚Äôs like if world leaders sat down and shared this sandwich, global harmony would be achieved before dessert.

Buddha Full, you‚Äôre not just a cafe; you're a culinary utopia. Your plant-based prowess is turning this meat-eater into a frequent leaf-eater. Bravo, and see you soon‚Äîmy taste buds insist on an encore!

Yours in veggie and fruit-filled delight,

Ruben","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP9SHoibPko_Itxrk79u3a907eXoAMmyrwogrr4&fid=0x0:0x69f7141f6183455f"],"When":"2024-4-29"},{"Name":"Chloe Genargue","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWcB97SzXsMD6panoq_G9yq28plXwWkj0h7AznJw7Xc37ypMfg5=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Something I don‚Äôt take for granted is this go-to place before I head to work a few blocks away. If I needed an extra lift of energy, this is the place I run to.
I always lean on my comfort flavors especially for a smoothie. However, today, I chose to try something different ( with the Server‚Äôs help, of course ) from my Happy Face üôÇ to their promotional smoothie QUI MON CHERRY smoothie üçí
Such a good call! Thank you to the Server who made my smoothie, it matched my aura üíó","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPf0_5CnDdqurPUR76OLntRXH-MS37yvtlO9mPd&fid=0x0:0x69f7141f6183455f"],"When":"2024-3-19"},{"Name":"Angelica Janis","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL5gDvAC55KlzxDvdOtNrGcMw0VLyeelctUyVHxm0UxhK4tlQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Horribly dry and chewy tofu. If this was supposed to be crispy than it was definitely not fresh. It was like eating rubber from the outside, at least the inside was soft enough. The vegan curry sauce was really strong in flavour, almost too strong for me. At least the steamed lentil is delicious! Kombucha on tap was not working. However, I will give this place another chance because I see the great reviews and the smoothies look and sound delicious. Perhaps I'll try a different bowl in hopes it will be better than the one I had the first time coming here. I feel a bit sorry to leave this review because the customer service was great and the place is beautiful. The bath bombs etc also look amazing, will definitely give those other products a try!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"World ‚ÄúWorld Explorer‚Äù Explorer","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWW-ckq9xRiAvj6L7wj9oir9Mf6czGNmdCmR57GytfYsDXbqcEk5g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"That was our first time going there although we‚Äôve been living close by!
Too bad. Now it‚Äôs one of our favourite places.
So cozy, unique atmosphere with healthy food, snacks and drinks options.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMlu0MqxYW--XW6DAO2U7_DPcac9p0Pex855zHp&fid=0x0:0x69f7141f6183455f"],"When":"2024-2-12"},{"Name":"KS B","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVKqq0ZtAALrLMssgmfCwo9aWLa4qTSgRyC34h7DL55r3d75RjV=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Want to eat healthy? Wanna feel healthy after eating? I bet you do :-) well you stumbled on the place to do just that. Great decor. Friendly stuff. And I mean look at those balls. That there is a bowl of goodness. A bowl of freshness. A bowl of tastiness. A bow of Buddha bowl. I mean the place is cool. Waters in the back if you want it. Easy to find. Easy menu. The only thing I don‚Äôt like. Is that tip thing for a counter service. I will I‚Äôll be back. You bet I will be.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMqQITyucm67EG4C0SHnuW5qFzn5SRrtulonpvm&fid=0x0:0x69f7141f6183455f"],"When":"2023-2-27"}]

[{"Name":"Al Sam","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWyWDrYTJxj1N6Rqx9nZs-pOAu62AcCWEITc9l3ja70uBqexzE=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"DO NOT ORDER FROM HERE THEY SCAM CUSTOMERS - I ordered 2 LARGE burritos for delivery, hoping to split it with some guests I had over, and ended up receiving 2 SMALL ones somehow even smaller than the regular size that I had previously ordered in person! I can‚Äôt believe they still charged me for a Large size even though I took plenty of pictures and even took the time to find a tape measure so it was factual evidence I did not receive what I payed for. I still have yet to receive my 2 large burritos or a refund. Really disappointing they do not care about quality or clients.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNKCj7fxMrya5RSLZW-M7tmdjcxZ37DOfHmA33l&fid=0x0:0x4a23488d136b15e5"],"When":"2024-10-9"},{"Name":"Josh","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV6cft2u4Whz7ttqtu2SYVZ7yY8wjqMxS1IH3qwJj0XS8CDIMl6=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Place is messy, chairs all over the place the tables not wiped, people aren‚Äôt really friendly. Odd but they don‚Äôt give you any meat maybe 5-10 pieces, charge you .25$ each for a tiny bag, no deals and hardly any rewards. Place has room to grow, but owner is hella greedy.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPRw65WgtB8uCzuudSB7jIUE22lGASKdQ5-woT_&fid=0x0:0x4a23488d136b15e5"],"When":"2024-6-2"},{"Name":"FERNANDO SUCRE","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL9FEi-nnkep7ef2VrFZ1WJpM0QbeL18-RwHKZg9k6jfew1NQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I recently had the pleasure of dining at this restaurant, and it exceeded my expectations in every way. The portions were generous, and the variety of dishes offered was impressive. The customer service was exceptionally hospitable, creating a warm and inviting atmosphere for lunch. Additionally, the cleanliness of the establishment added to the overall positive experience. I highly recommend this place for a satisfying meal with outstanding service in a delightful setting. I would certainly recommend this place for a great catering experience.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipObPnP5hIX9ZZDXT4SK6C1jaTpnp_irkQ_8R267&fid=0x0:0x4a23488d136b15e5"],"When":"2024-1-30"},{"Name":"Vansh Patel","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXCdCtiB-x8qspc8HpiDGGb9S58mEHVWnCzDhigkEmie0dV0uSD=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Really amazing place and the staff specially Deep was very helpful with my order.  Not to mention the food.  Overall experience was amazing and I loved the ambience as well. Would come here again.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNm_K4bYIBa1pHNjIQNP2CIN5qHMDECJ15Mf6HR&fid=0x0:0x4a23488d136b15e5"],"When":"2024-7-23"},{"Name":"Romy","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJV8-S3VeeKeT0pn9n2DdxFX14BmtdMp_HhzVdEx3f6OGeOaQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Got this large spicy chicken burrito made by parth, it was really good, no sauce or salsa dripping, perfectly made. Always greets everyone nicely.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMOpROzwo56FkaYIQeVJT_ufTGvJTqFwF3N9ico&fid=0x0:0x4a23488d136b15e5"],"When":"2024-10-25"},{"Name":"Tracy Graham","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIutf9g_PVH5ySnp4bzxMXKz4X2gJg-UAErhn99jDQbcVOWrxU=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Buyer beware.  Ordered a burrito bowl for delivery.  When it arrived the bowl had VERY little lettuce.  Very skimpy on all ingredients ordered.  The bowl was maybe half full. Felt very ripped off.  Will not order from the lower lonsdale franchise again.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"KAPIL KUMAR","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXH4qlIszrPHju5Ebe8reC8-fbv70hC7qsMg1va-G7HPvoX9wQW=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Dear Restaurant Manager

I hope this message finds you well. I am writing to express my disappointment with my recent dining experience at tucos and buritos.

I was excited to visit your restaurant as I had heard great things about your tacos and burritos. However, I encountered a significant delay that has prompted this feedback. I placed my order expecting it would take the usual of 5 minutes but I ended up waiting an additional 30 minutes before my meal was ready.

While I appreciate that unforeseen circumstances can arise, the lack of communication regarding the delay left me feeling frustrated and undervalued as a customer. A simple update or apology during the wait could have greatly improved my experience.

On a positive note, once the food did arrive, it was delicious and met my expectations in terms of flavor and quality. However, the enjoyment was somewhat overshadowed by the extended wait.

I hope that you can take this feedback into account to enhance your service, perhaps by improving communication with guests about wait times or finding ways to speed up the preparation process during busy periods.

Thank you for taking the time to read my concerns. I look forward to seeing how your establishment can improve in the future as I believe in the potential of tucos and buritos to deliver excellent dining experiences.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Cody Schmeling","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLeFrT7M5UvZ67SxfESGWcjtCDg9w2NLglLHjxLXskFXH6tsQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My experience was quite pleasant here. The employees were nice and helped me navigate the large menu. I got a big burrito and you can pick the ingredients to add. The burrito was huge but I ate the who thing because I'm an American and we are pigs. I would definitely eat here again. Cheers!","Images":null,"When":""}]

The crepe was prepared by the girl well and tasted good but ruined by the person that doesn't even prepare the food, just takes orders like a slug!

On top of all that the tip prompt starts at 18% !! üòµ‚Äçüí´
Greedy & Lazy!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMr7C26MQO_KPpi26Zp_wORPf6_JSaYE4VkApbS&fid=0x0:0x5b833fdea962f7b7"],"When":"2024-9-8"},{"Name":"N ....","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKPfZx_MEbzVKSYl-GHrgwpL3l9nXnbSnaC8sA22VG4guzX_Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Get the savoury crepes and avoid crepes with whipped cream. Got both - the cheese melts perfectly in the ham and cheese crepe. But for the sweet crepe, they added the whipped cream in the crepe while it's still hot. Turns into mush. I'd say savoury is 5/5 but the sweet one was 3/5.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Michael P","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVaPyiSHsM4ohoCGSYHHk-jCVDqj2kV58oYZN1D5GSrk9mBXHW6=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"I went to this place because it was one of few which didn‚Äôt have any line to them. Also, because I saw they have savory creeps on the menu.

Well‚Ä¶ Don‚Äôt order their crepes if you are looking for the food to fill you at any extent. They are thin as a napkins, with a few tiny decorative slices of salmon. It was more a joke than actual food for $18-20.

I decided to write this review only after I tasted their chamomile tea. What could be more simple than a tea bag and a cup of hot water?! The taste was strange. After opening the lid I discovered that water is not transparent, it had very milky color.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNju3M36lkRcMCVCqiXx35qHI8-0Oh6Mo6NYXtT&fid=0x0:0x5b833fdea962f7b7"],"When":"2024-1-29"},{"Name":"Amin Sameni","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVu7gOTJPCM-cxMdKwmmGT2dzn1GqI9KyFBzJ01UvZjTN1ONfqq=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"This local business absolutely is worth your support. This place is great overall
Lovely food, great in look as well as the taste which comes with a reasonable price.
I have tried different kinds of their savory and sweet dishes as well as the create-your-own which is an adventure itself.

some feedbacks to improve: (it could have been a 5 star)
- staff could be nicer. no one greets you and you could stand there in front of the cash register for 5 minutes without anyone approaches you
- no one asks or offers for water if you do not order any drink with your food
- they do not sanitize their tables when someone leaves","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPM2nkd-1Xjl_au9vAUyMjJ0xiIPqkgeQsa8TI4&fid=0x0:0x5b833fdea962f7b7"],"When":"2021-3-1"},{"Name":"Sally Nam","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUkPAfPlQHapPH5eeRRWf2bOJ5publzFmnKTSREzBnrlhFiXTeX=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I ordered sunrise crepe. Open kitchen was very clean. Portion was good to fill my morning stomach. Overcooked cheese was crispy and delicious. Perfect with a cup of coffee. It was a great meal for morning.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNZbP8q4fMnWV8Gm2T_AfYFVGKkZOSgVKq6In0z&fid=0x0:0x5b833fdea962f7b7"],"When":"2023-8-1"},{"Name":"alice w","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKfBFd5-MCz0iWhHQjADA6mFZoHPhSAyoSlVDQe971OUgYbxw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Very good ,The food is fresh and healthy also delicious","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNs4kSMdHrzd5kt36fT_mTiP2818YZVwjkUqXBK&fid=0x0:0x5b833fdea962f7b7"],"When":"2024-11-18"},{"Name":"Yanzhe Shao","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ3kww9_05pqfPJcWsbUeLuqQA9mqeB4MhNh1WT9wJBhev37g=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I recently had the pleasure of enjoying brunch at Craffles, and I must say it was an absolutely delightful experience! One dish that stood out and left a lasting impression on my taste buds was their Benedict Egg. It was simply phenomenal!
The Benedict Egg at Craffles is a true masterpiece. The perfectly poached egg rested upon a bed of fluffy Waffe, accompanied by a generous serving of savory ham and topped with a velvety hollandaise sauce. Every component was flawlessly executed, resulting in a harmonious blend of flavors and textures.
The presentation was also top-notch, with the dish elegantly arranged and garnished with a sprinkle of fresh herbs. It was evident that the chef took great care and attention to detail in preparing this culinary delight.
Note: This review is based on my personal experience and reflects my honest opinion.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN7xHDHGUCudModyTRUlPaD5SGZkulccrC_BSAx&fid=0x0:0x5b833fdea962f7b7"],"When":"2023-5-25"},{"Name":"Nina Feger","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVstF32wnUBiFqizzAZZRNkXQBN9_ykLYlveo99gT_ooxNGq-lX=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great place for breakfast or lunch! We took two crepes : Tex-mex and crispy chicken, we liked Tex-mex a little bit better. They were really tasty, very very generous with cheese inside, if you like it cheesy this is the place for you. The personal are very friendly and you get to see them make your crepes on a real bilig which is super entertaining. This is more a Brazilian food restaurant than a ¬´¬†cr√™perie¬†¬ª like in britanny (France), but still very delicious. I thought the sweet crepes where a bit over priced. I am used to a crepe costing 3‚Ç¨ max, but I am sure they are massive to make it up. Would like to come back and try there a√ßa√≠ bowl.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPzdD6VMwMA24V00GRxyRtV9IoFb5WnEoYwRdxB&fid=0x0:0x5b833fdea962f7b7"],"When":"2022-7-15"}]

[{"Name":"Maryam Koochari","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLtex8efNS5pPcX1TA082rwTbJD3TKY76phM94BtFRZ-uSe1Q=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I am truly sorry for this restaurant that has such a rude manager and doesn't care about customers' rights at all. I ordered food, and it was so
stale that it seemed like they were going to throw it in the trash. You might get food poisoning.I told them, "What if I get sick?" | said, "If that happens, I'll file a complaint against you and come with the police." They responded by saying, "No problem, bring the police." They behaved very rudely and acted as if I was lying.
They didn't care if I got sick. I will definitely file a complaint against this restaurant for their rude behavior and for not caring about the customer at all. They gave me another one, but it was even worse than the previous one.
I suggest you don‚Äôt buy from them at all, and don‚Äôt order through the app either.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNiaj5m5Nljdq-1Sxq_vhrBP7zsMFndO4jobc_P&fid=0x0:0x627c6d1104b1fab0"],"When":"2024-9-9"},{"Name":"marry jane","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKY3Ox6ctO6AKmaEdUub1vEsRCXMkMPGycM4DNROXO-kbStQA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I never leave reviews but after what I found on my pizza I had to create an account. The service from Uber eats was amazing but when I got my 2 boxes of pizza of course the first pizza I pick up has this **** on it‚Ä¶ no idea what happened in that kitchen but for real, nobody noticed this?? I threw that pizza out but ate the other box‚Ä¶. I don‚Äôt even want my money back but if I get sick I‚Äôll be coming through","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNQ96m6_NGYs9AhbvdyNpr0yY4V0foBHG6WjEBm&fid=0x0:0x627c6d1104b1fab0"],"When":"2024-9-21"},{"Name":"Dildeep Bhullar","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI4xeO6EEbHc-MJChfHi8L1_pKR2o5PqE_mXU7Jg0n0ft9bfw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"‚ÄúBest pizza in town! Perfect crust, fresh toppings, and delicious sauce. Great variety, including vegetarian and gluten-free options. Friendly staff, clean shop, and quick service. Reasonable prices‚Äîhighly recommend!‚Äù","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jeff Frewman","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXkkkeSSeKZFzpbV-MuI-Cp_yrfbX_NgQEya3Yi6ogVGO1wrSI=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Love the staff here, very friendly and accommodating, easy-going, lots of smiles and good energy, and the pizza is delicious pizza, What More Can I Say!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNm5L_JXCvaM_e59P18XHtIg-9KouwCvyVraEEj&fid=0x0:0x627c6d1104b1fab0"],"When":"2024-7-29"},{"Name":"sety bakhshi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJhcFicIhnGbVPI_lu7iw-CFyXWlDg-eEBpQZHe6m7czKLCtvo=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I recently ordered from Freshslice for my twin's Birthday at ‚ÄúGo Bananas‚Äù, and I was really impressed! The pizza was delicious, and the service was excellent. The delivery was prompt, and everything arrived hot and fresh. I‚Äôve had consistently good experiences with Fresh slice, and it‚Äôs become my go-to place for pizza. Highly recommended!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Ramin Mousaei","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI1nf08yOg_oIYlKMo6OODHc8BEjq31xQAc13AAHeDirZO-Nw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"A budget friendly option with good variety of topings.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP4KhVvpFNIl4fU9NhFK3OXA5hN_I0R3FcKelcf&fid=0x0:0x627c6d1104b1fab0"],"When":"2024-10-26"},{"Name":"jass dhillon","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWltzKIWqqQkyKEI3wzp6Wz6D-Bog_ceY67t4MhsZL7F0-Lgphm=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"There is one girl named Simrose she is very nice girl i like the way she take orders and give gud service and also their wide range of toppings, fresh ingredients, and affordable prices make it a go-to spot for pizza lovers. The crust is always consistently well-baked‚Äîcrispy on the outside yet soft on the inside‚Äîwhile the sauces and cheeses balance each pizza perfectly. Whether you're picking up a classic cheese pizza or trying one of their signature combos, every slice feels like a satisfying meal. Plus, their commitment to freshness and customer satisfaction ensures that every visit is a good one. It's no wonder Freshslice is a favorite for both quick lunches and family dinners.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Krishna D","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLnxr-AuKAp1UcyvQbuw3WiTVbPI_h6gI0W_KnZ3CK4qUO120oj=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"I visited the store first time to order for a party around 10 pizzas and have asked the employee if there are any discounts in store and employee promised for 20%. We went through the whole order that took them few minutes to take and after all the waiting, another employee comes and tells us we cannot give you the 20% off. We felt it is such a waste of time so I went back and saw few good offers online and have ordered from the store for delivery. I have specifically mentioned for plates and napkins which are not given even after me providing with generous tip. Our experience was not that good so far so which is why I am leaving 3 stars. Food is average.","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Christopher Suppa","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXzvGs8gP888XN9QfjfDACPqWfAi5-8OTC4hXwRRvcSZgqBGlCjTA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Warning. Sushi Bella is now advertising a discount for 5-star reviews‚Äî5% off your bill for inflated ratings.

I‚Äôve been coming to Sushi Bella for the last 5 years, but sadly, every visit has shown a noticeable deterioration in both food and service. They used to deliver exceptional meals with warm hospitality, but that‚Äôs no longer the case.

During my recent visit, the service was just okay but felt distinctly unwelcoming. Near the end of our meal, the sushi chefs began arguing loudly, followed by slamming plates, which made for an uncomfortable dining experience.

While the food itself was good, it took an unreasonably long time to arrive. Adding to the disappointment, the restaurant had a noticeable issue with fruit flies, which diminished the overall enjoyment.

To top it off, prices have continued to climb without any visible improvements in quality. I truly love this place and want to see it thrive again, but recent experiences have left me hesitant to return.

I hope management can address these issues and return Sushi Bella to its former glory.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPeGxx4Y8v2x8jPjiq-MWAkHfhBJKij4iZoLOW4&fid=0x0:0x6c5cee9b8594c884"],"When":"2024-12-1"},{"Name":"Max K√ºhl","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIa0_iHz_jRfnrTwtT2rOflKVLDDn5bhYHJk-oRJlL9wuBWjw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The food was absolutely amazing! Its expensive but worth the price.
Very slow service.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN3IE5YX3MIx3a7U7Bp4w2dN52gSYDOSArWWJ16&fid=0x0:0x6c5cee9b8594c884"],"When":"2024-6-27"},{"Name":"NGALINDA LE","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVEYLmHKqxcqP3LyLNkXRcHnrRmWUv9bQS81qdyBjlN7QlDjPJr7Q=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"There are limitations on certain items for the All-You-can-eat menu. The instructions are quite not clear on your order. Both waitresses were also not very good about explaining later nor apologetic about being more clear. Anything with "spicy" in the name of the fish is not your traditional sashimi seasoning. It's  a thicker and sweeter sauce. Think the sauce you would  put in your bibimbop bowl. Although not terrible, but when you crave for spicy  salmon - definitely you'll be in for a surprise.  The appetizers came out very inconsistent. Some rounds the tempura came out with the dipping sauce. Our first round did not. Same with our fried tofu. Not awful but probably i would not come back. So many more places to still try.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNg8MABv6LFR1587b0CYDFNoNHNXoN1Slh9Ma4P&fid=0x0:0x6c5cee9b8594c884"],"When":"2024-2-27"},{"Name":"Ivan Huang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK9QVp2sQq7F8a9VHjoAPostLyH-JarpGspI63InV2RctMgEA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Sat outside, food was very good, actually enjoyed the Sushi Pizza quite a lot. Shrimp tempura was great. Sashimi was very fresh. Will recommend the place!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMypgDYR3L-pxp_cVsC-Ui1gGm8dbRRRZShHhWK&fid=0x0:0x6c5cee9b8594c884"],"When":"2024-7-28"},{"Name":"Haidy Elswefy","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKeDtQX9zZWJQ_bgez-LC3qeK5HuIFH1t4BljevET9SbGhBXQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Disappointing Experience at Sushi Bella

We had dinner at Sushi Bella today, and unfortunately, the experience was quite disappointing. The service was poor, and when I asked about the 5% discount for leaving a review, I was informed that it doesn't apply to the "All You Can Eat" option. However, there was no mention of this exception anywhere in the promotion or on the picture they provided.

Additionally, the "All You Can Eat" menu had unexpected limitations. It's not truly "all you can eat," as there are restrictions on how much you can order, which wasn‚Äôt clearly communicated upfront.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMYnvktWQjH3tW9HCo4b8HgRliJLoDUfBB9GK66&fid=0x0:0x6c5cee9b8594c884"],"When":"2024-9-30"},{"Name":"Jeena Choi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW6xce568FNb1nvtgMQcSH6_L2QBKn5iwsXcC7qJ8VOzg5UHczPDA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"If you're from the GTA looking for an AYCE place, this is not it. Despite other people complaining about how their AYCE menu is limited, we decided to take a chance. Their spicy samon roll is slathered with Korean gochuchang sauce on top which doesn't taste good. It tastes like rice and gochuchang sauce - same with their hand roles. Their nigiri's come with SO MUCH rice, it's ridiculous. Their dynamite roll was made hastly, with lettuce in it?? Who puts lettuce in dynamite roll? And all the rolls were cut a different size. Their salmon sashimi had the skin left on it still, and their tuna was unbelievable unfresh. Food poisoning vibes - my poor friend. Their chicken teriyaki udon dish is a ketchup sauce. The only decent things on their menu was the chicken karage and shrimp and yam tempura.

We couldn't finish the food and wasn't opposed to paying the fee for not finishing the food (though there was barely any left over) but wasn't expecting them to include our toddler in this fee too. I understand rules are rules, but let's use some common sense.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM2_DSOtojzY7r2-ay9rO2eb47NClPR3UK9kKCw&fid=0x0:0x6c5cee9b8594c884"],"When":"2024-3-18"},{"Name":"Kayla Mizuki","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXcEGcj5JPeyIAIQJw3qGO8j1u7XbI927-7frVyMbwPWPc2pbjQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Alright folks, buckle up because I‚Äôve found the ultimate sushi spot in North Vancouver. This salmon donburi, priced at under $25, offers an abundance of freshness and flavor. Each bite is thick and bursting with freshness, making it worth every penny. Plus, the location is unbeatable, with the Lonsdale waterfront just down the road, you can enjoy a breathtaking sunset followed by a short stroll up the Lower Lonsdale hill for some incredible sushi. I highly recommend this place as the best bang for your buck, high-quality sushi spot in North Vancouver.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN9SvTvGjpIkQ4zjKsbKqr6bX9DVg9c22BGGtuD&fid=0x0:0x6c5cee9b8594c884"],"When":"2024-5-1"},{"Name":"Tony Neumeyer","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUUXdQgqHHRA0Xwn61cd9dSU65TN_lKM6TEuHYJTJ3WUWQ_kdtShw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Excellent food and wonderful presentation. Friendly staff but they have a very difficult time getting to delivery a bar order like a simple beer or Sake tasting flight, which was very good. Lastly I'll say they really need to cool their beer more. The draft wasn't cold or even cool. The bottled beer wasn't much better.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPABTpadquDsLmRtl7gLZaRbFSmp5oOrSc7lAur&fid=0x0:0x6c5cee9b8594c884"],"When":"2023-8-24"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Lisa McKenzie","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUuPyCP6A05WqFz-1BE2a0EDZwH4OOg4-kEwgWC74RXr_k_lNK8Mw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"The hot and sour soup had very large pieces of chicken in it (probably was meant for a stir fry dish and just dumped in the soup). It tasted alright but was cloudy and lukewarm. The ginger beef was cooked well but could have had a bit more sauce. We found a curly hair in the beef dish and a long hair in the soup. Going through the reviews, I can see we are not the only customers finding hair in their food.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jessie Goligher","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLVjo59csYqqPdEmOSv5bk_U8mf8kvV2As4T3Odt6PSGFmmaTA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I am so surprised that this place has such good reviews. My husband and I were very underwhelmed by the food. The chow mein was extremely salty. The pork fried rice was flavourless. The spring rolls were so bad that we each took a bite and then tossed them. The beef and broccoli was the only good item. I was excited for my fortune cookie hoping it would help redeem the meal and it was stale. It was also quite overpriced for the quality. Such a disappointing experience overall. I would not recommend eating here, there‚Äôs much better Chinese restaurants on the North Shore.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Sean O'Toole","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUHShQo-SVr1R2Va7NS5Z3WeC9L9GurfypnxlBArEGSnOcH-78p=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"These people are so nice and have the BEST Chinese food on the entire North Shore. We've been everywhere and nobody compares to Chilli Lee.Trust me on this and order their "War Won ton" and try and finish it, you will not be disappointed because you will be starched to your couch for the night if you do. So much good food. My only complaint is they should stay open till 11 on weekends and make a killing, they are that good.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jatin Sharma","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU8izz1sEcwEdW4S9MB2P4uYWW4u__aenq97ZmJp8JBkpw0RaA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We had lunch and it was the best lunch, amazing food best service. Food was sooo delicious and yum, highly recommended. Do go and try their food and they have a reasonable price also.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP-0KH-_dB1PMJQm3WRz1d6S5mTgMhjndhiHuyA&fid=0x0:0xe8c77d623ebab00c"],"When":"2024-5-9"},{"Name":"Elaine S","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXw0NZVlw-DYhg6yu3CwCqawu2sEc8yv_yDRJNRZHiHpXsjuXCx=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Food and service at Chilli Lee is excellent. Have been there many times eating in or take out - I had always assumed we lived too far away for delivery (Deep Cove), but on this Friday night I had a craving, and didn't feel like driving to Lonsdale - so I took a chance and inquired and so happy to discover that for only $6 delivery was possible. I'm sure it would have cost me more in gas to pick it up.

Thank you Chilli Lee, for making this happen - really needed a break and this treat after a very busy week! Family favourites include House Special Ginger Fried Beef, Mushu Chicken, House Special Chow Mein (Crispy), Cashew Nut Chicken. We tried the Orange Peel Chicken tonight and that was yummy too.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOAM0b77FFe6uqfUexyX8885xhHsIfOgqlf3hCJ&fid=0x0:0xe8c77d623ebab00c"],"When":"2020-1-25"},{"Name":"toffy concepcion","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVYhf6f6Tr-b7ekbkXxFz9ueDreb1BCkopv3RQXbcpm54DeMfYl5g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This place has traditional North American Chinese food from when Chinese food was economical and not as sophisticated as today. We ordered the fish congee which had a healthy serving of basa fish. We also ordered a single order combo of sweet and sour chicken and fried shrimps which was large enough for 2 people.
Covid update: They're closed for dine-in but it's one of the best deals for delivery or pickup Chinese food.  Now that old favorite Orange Door is closed,  this is the new Go to. Update: They're open for dine in again","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNBKTDWs4P5Sncw_n8wvQlASzDhu8LJskNG_3-Y&fid=0x0:0xe8c77d623ebab00c"],"When":"2021-1-11"},{"Name":"Jennifer Luther Thomas","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUchIqnFb8mvUNTLnaGIRYtVZqjsbl0iBvHd6i50D0_TQgP83aP=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"I ordered takeout through skip the dishes so I can‚Äôt comment on the service or atmosphere, but I can unequivocally say the food is ‚Äòaverage‚Äô.
Not necessarily in a bad way, but knowing that other Chinese takeaways on the north shore do the dishes we ordered better.
My boyfriend and I have been on a mission to try every Chinese takeout on the north shore, and Chilli Lee is the fourth Chinese we‚Äôve tried.
Sweet and sour pork and chicken wings have been our control variable, with chicken curry making a guest appearance depending on appetite.
The food wasn‚Äôt bad, but the sauce was lacking. Additionally, I feel like both the S&P pork and chicken curry were lacking in quantity of sauce. At first all the dishes look generous but the quality of meat is lower (more fatty, more batter) and the chicken curry had a lot of chunky pepper, onion and celery which come across as filler vegetables.
All in all I wouldn‚Äôt not order from here again, but it wouldn‚Äôt be my first choice.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Dee A","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXvhNiAYE_6MnzHM5YNVYF5AscAQs9X0cWkxxNTFIyWgSOVcUg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Last night I promised myself that THAT would be the very last time I order from Chilli Lee or go there to eat.
The Combo C was 85% noodles, whereas almost half the plate used to comprise of the beef  chicken, vegetables and sweet and sour pork.
Then, after my second mouthful, I found a long, black hair in my mouth amidst the noodles.  How utterly disgusting.
The fortune cookie was stale and had to be spat out.
And, to top it all off, I then got diarrhea and still have an upset stomach this morning.
I paid $25 for THAT experience.  NEVER again.
Something has drastically changed there over the past few years.
Be warned, people!","Images":null,"When":""}]
