user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Derek Worchel","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLYy-NN1bVp5F_b309nQYQ7HPmOxLMlVsftXEaYzW6Oibjesw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Really good. I‚Äôm not sure why this place is ranked below 4 stars. Peanut sauce was amazing and I‚Äôm a peanut sauce snob. The beef in the soup was a good grade of meat which was more like juicy brisket. The broth was fragrant. And the salad rolls were great A+","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOGIykkUEyDTFgU2ik07CCLPdYqYp8ysFRBOCZ0&fid=0x0:0x77d13be51dcb5dd4"],"When":"2024-8-13"},{"Name":"Kit Ming Lam","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI8lmjJfMTJ6-SyIQcpPEDYnmiAgSjEoxKymqZr8_LxCwPokw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Beef noodle soup and spring roll are yummy","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPBozZhsubB4oqPYkPLJbJhIxpCXiaVqSZhOhU8&fid=0x0:0x77d13be51dcb5dd4"],"When":"2024-7-10"},{"Name":"Garrick Byers","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL8pear0kHJPU_jYHmYI1w2I2y1doycD-bOaRHI79Oml0AlrQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Was driving down Lonsdale after hiking the GG with my partner. We were starving and stopped at the first Pho sign we saw. After sitting down and ordering, I checked the reviews for this place and became a bit worried. I wanted to leave this review because we were blown away by the food! My partner had vegetarian, and I had the #9 beef option. Both large size for $15 each. They came in massive bowls and were delicious. I feel this place deserves a better rating, and hope others will give it a chance.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"John Wallace","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX1Qpl2WZ7qLpGoGIHn3Ls-Qbmf0s0h7oUSTUhDmDrCNRNrRCg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Admittedly I have not had a lot of Ph√≤ in my life so as a novice I ordered the large noodle soup with eye of round steak for $9.45 (plus tax, and please tip; it's Covid times.)
I barely finished and then went into a flavor coma for a couple hours, it was so delicious! A Very well balanced deep flavored aromatic broth, plenty of noodles and lots of fresh toppings. Well worth the price for the amount of food you get!
The second time I ordered I was sporting a proper hangover too and it brought me back to life. There are magic restoration forces at work here...
This restaurant is amazing because it is tiny and the windows are always steamy when you walk by which means that delicious slow-cooked broth is being pumped out constantly and the whole vibe is that of a local's secret.
If this place were listed on Netflix it would be under Hidden Gems, and if you need some comfort food give 'em a try today!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNkoT94c2AiBj1w3sQLLyrDVDp5OuMBsTjITWvj&fid=0x0:0x77d13be51dcb5dd4"],"When":"2022-1-5"},{"Name":"Randall Alexander","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXxNPeMTfFPcsHyvb_vineNPRvDLUxOYLeYdVJxQjG4IcXNVE9QXA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great choice on the menu, fast service, awesome food! My go to in North Vancouver. Free parking on the street. Never been disappointed.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMYRda4urCSi4wcXJrVGMV4__Zno0tFuh2D_hLd&fid=0x0:0x77d13be51dcb5dd4"],"When":"2018-7-26"},{"Name":"Y O","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJKPodDO84tNjtdZMJZVJu3tURM8UCYi8hhNTihNwfRB_7lEw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I ordered a chicken Vietnamese sub it was really dry and supported to have marinated radish and carrots but it had just few piece of carrot which were not even marinated. Cucumber was dry i needed to throw away.
Chicken was salty and dry.
I wont come back.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNO97U-hoJjIQJ9hdAcpwoeNyz9ots7rVQZ9MQf&fid=0x0:0x77d13be51dcb5dd4"],"When":"2022-10-11"},{"Name":"George Hill","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXdvqySa8ySjEwBqVfpEbhQT22jr1mKp2H3q5rn291ecDv3uIc=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Lovely hole in the wall gem in North Van with classic Pho options for a great price. A regular size bowl is plenty big for even me as a tall guy. Would definitely recommend this place for a quick lunch or dinner when out and about doing errands.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Tracy","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUSBaMoAuMqrJgT6VIMU_LWigJz2k9RyKVHxJf4H6ddU7gTEdM8=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"The soup lacked flavour but the service was fast & they give free hot tea which is nice.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOxbdXDDpA7JDosktTPBms8FDHDXqcqACySZSHk&fid=0x0:0x77d13be51dcb5dd4"],"When":"2023-4-2"}]

[{"Name":"Dr. Mia Su Cary she, her","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVX0ay0WWh40rWSlPBlQhavq5E9g6PC56oWWaeoYgQcCQIXGnoS=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We had a grand time watching the Indiana Fever game over a yummy lunch. The goyza app was perfection. My chicken quesadilla and salad were delish as was the peachy mimosa. Highly recommend!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP6cKFaXPuQ6tsIqkmxIiFPeuWiWeGB1uCepUC_&fid=0x0:0xdc6f3ad65222ce07"],"When":"2024-9-22"},{"Name":"vanilla Sky","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLFihleD6g0S8KL6ZF2k0Fnh37Oy12Rwlsr4xLUEl4JNMjXbw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This location never disappoints. The happy hour is great. Roch and the team are awesome! The key lime pie is amazing.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMMDfRhOkg8SRuiG0ZK-A_T2k_xvIidcZaE6X8z&fid=0x0:0xdc6f3ad65222ce07"],"When":"2024-10-27"},{"Name":"Ferial Fahim","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUgwqxNvBQbJPV5Tl-uzRHmdKej1Bp0eSdLVDKXycTsty1bBtRl=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Honestly, we don‚Äôt come to Browns that often, but we should!
Their food is underrated.

The Dragon bowl with Tofu was so flavorful, and the Alfredo with blackened chicken was equally delicious.

Everything was fresh and tasty. We‚Äôll definitely go back again!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPIESlB5WopVKwk_ou2MHbgBecAOWVcAva2r2FP&fid=0x0:0xdc6f3ad65222ce07"],"When":"2024-1-20"},{"Name":"Mark Turnbull","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWb3y-xYzCVR6N_Ai49HYr4STDQ454gU7LeU-LpiQKvRGfVZTU=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Went here for dinner and sat on the patio since it was a nice day. It‚Äôs a covered patio with nice views of Lonsdale. The service was really good and friendly. The best bite of food we had was the fried chicken and pickles. Everything else was just okay. The sandwich bread could have been toasted or the cheese melted a little. It‚Äôs odd they don‚Äôt have a chicken burger. The music was kind of terrible and all over the place.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNeAZhslPWjTeSMOW54LGfgxWTjtlt5HwUDekxv&fid=0x0:0xdc6f3ad65222ce07"],"When":"2022-9-2"},{"Name":"Elham Shahbandy","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU8v0FqiWfwrKZlKpvymmkhzMYhJ-PBGxv_Ot_SbQhp9uNsQ3Yb=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"We ordered two appetizers and both was non presentable which was like we got some waste crumbs. The server asked us how the  food is and when we explained she said she will send a manager. I assume manager came to us( he did not even introduced himself, just look like a host or something) and he asked if the food taste good!!! The food was normal but the presentation was not right ‚Ä¶","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMf16gYlYFkDk9pec7YOsTrBUPOoWyITTlOTz3N&fid=0x0:0xdc6f3ad65222ce07"],"When":"2023-11-16"},{"Name":"Wendy Edwards","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX-X4n-9BA4OY2MGocgRTZKCroQzoGegHtdikAS50ZyBpi_ULw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My friend and I dropped into This Browns on lower Lonsdale after we had quite the long walk on the Spirit Trail. We sat at the bar and Araya the Bartender was right there always with excellent service and we had great conversations. They even bought us an appetizer of deep fried cauliflower which was excellent and thanks to her and the manager Rock ( if we caught his name right) we had the best afternoon.  We are regulars at the Browns in Lynn Valley as it‚Äôs close to home but we will definitely be back the this one.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"John S. Mai","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWY2Ep7ch7V2UQQStkfKRCyZc0k9VeqhcTlPhj83vVQx0-nqsPqiQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I recently came back to this browns randomly walking on Lonsdale for some late night happy hour on a Friday. Amazingly enough , browns had it going on. Order some food and it seemed to be slightly better than the last time I attended also there seemed to be a dj maybe playing at this location. It was so fun, kind of busy for a Friday night! Good place to be. I think they changed their menu up and it's amazing! Apparently they change it up every few months. Loved all appies! You must try the fiesta fries! Also got the most amazing carrot cake! I'm definitely going back here soon. Cheers!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPhYoAuc8lw9TPrtTLIZ84Ovpr5k2yaxJ3gC99C&fid=0x0:0xdc6f3ad65222ce07"],"When":"2022-12-17"},{"Name":"Alexander Schweigert","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVCk2cE22_TYb_kLG24LOetuxkUJwwMvyWCwoOUVr1J4UQMZ3g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Service was amazing, couldn‚Äôt catch the name of our server, and the Sommelier taught us some things about the wine and pairing. The steak and Fritz was cooked to medium rare beautifully as requested, and the yam sauce was very good as well. If in town should definitely stop by.","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Ali Zohourian","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX4LNzU6KkPs6uY7j4P5E8uoyO7rOq4S4PXpvDnK-xmTLBWL0z_=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I can't stop thinking about my next visit to Red Chilli Restaurant! They truly excel in quality and understand what it means to serve top-notch food.

The dishes tasted just like homemade cooking, and we were all thrilled with our choices. All three of us loved everything we ordered! We can't wait to return soon, as this place has quickly become a favorite of ours.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPaqncBDPYW3wZFrbEeKRRneeKM8gumnUTlghfB&fid=0x0:0x3d0832503640affd"],"When":"2024-8-21"},{"Name":"Same Same but Different","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKrH08Z6krYj5_NOu4GvMCmz0DZ7zTuEp7za7xa1qUXcotW7w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We ordered the ginger beef, sweet and sour pork, chow mein, and off the menu dumplings. Everything was amazing! I was sad when I left the leftovers at my sister's place, but she enjoyed it.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMAevy554PRsEzT66eGlNAKYA8RvoE2PzRsgaIe&fid=0x0:0x3d0832503640affd"],"When":"2023-11-18"},{"Name":"Moyez B","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW6Eamn5ca8yTbck8IWNLNrD9ZeZUGnCTcQ08dD3UxDg2X-UdoJ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Our experience at Red Chilli was nothing short of a disaster. We ordered the Mongolian beef and beans, which were supposed to come with garlic, but didn't. The beans tasted old and stale, like they had been sitting around forever before being served. It felt like they had been in exile, and someone finally decided to throw them on a plate. The beef was slimy and tasted awful, like it had been left out for days.The spicy chicken with spinach was equally terrible, as if whoever cooked it was in a bad mood and decided to take it out on the food.

The rice they served us looked like it had been scraped from the bottom of the pot‚Äîdry, scaly, and burnt. The spicy chicken with spinach was just as bad, clearly cooked by someone who didn‚Äôt care at all about what they were doing. It was far from authentic, despite what they might want you to believe.

When we spoke to the owner, Selena, about our concerns, she couldn‚Äôt have cared less. She rolled her eyes as if she was used to hearing complaints and just didn‚Äôt care. Her attitude was beyond dismissive‚Äîlike she thought she was above everyone else.

For the record, this place used to be packed on a Saturday night, and now, it‚Äôs almost empty. If you look at the reviews, it‚Äôs clear that Selena has issues and is in denial about the problems here. She refuses to fix what‚Äôs broken and bring the restaurant back to its former glory.

I wouldn‚Äôt recommend this place to anyone. In fact, I‚Äôll be filing a report with the health authorities because someone needs to hold this owner accountable. Running a restaurant means providing quality food and a decent dining experience‚Äîneither of which you‚Äôll find at Red Chilli. Avoid this place at all costs.

There‚Äôs nothing authentic about this restaurant. In fact, it‚Äôs far from it. The decor is low-class and pungent, and the owner? Let‚Äôs just say they should be ashamed. The only redeeming factor was our server, who was polite and clearly just doing their job. I‚Äôll be initiating a report with the health inspector because this place needs it. Avoid at all costs.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Farid Entezari","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV35QQyx2JmA30yOGa4kCXMTDZjBP0mMYjKzM0CL9HNh-FF7LAEEA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I ordered the house especial hot and sour soup from Red Chilli Szechuan Restaurant Ltd in North Vancouver. The soup was delivered very quickly, it was warm and delicious. The portion size was good, it was tasty as well.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPN2Eym5wxdwojdTNBY_wYRT1NX6jbS6CB_teJu&fid=0x0:0x3d0832503640affd"],"When":"2023-7-13"},{"Name":"Ji K (Chupa)","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWVpfz-rvsP7ZrCins4vo-dUB0Bbbz7a4XdRnawPlk3bN5HeFc=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Atrocious service. Good food.

I ate at Red Chilli today for the first time in a while, having had been a regular customer since 20 years ago, not exactly expecting spectacular service.

Still, what we experienced was still below what could have presumed. We needed to ask multiple times for water and chopsticks. But these happenings were minor and we were not too upset about them.

Some time after we ordered we had been told the wifi wasn‚Äôt working and therefore had to pay cash. Fortunately, my mother had some on her so this was no problem.
After eating, we paid with the limited cash we had, $105 dollars in total for a $95 order. This was what we had on us. When the server lady came to get the bill she counted the money at our table and said, ‚ÄúWhat? Only 10%?‚Äù She left clearly frustrated and angry. I don‚Äôt know what she expected given the situation of the restaurant and her subpar service, worsened by her broken English. Her actions upon payment both angered and appalled us.

We are shocked at the experience we had at this restaurant today. It was not our fault the restaurant was limited in payment options or that we found out after we ordered our food.
Seeing other reviews with similar experiences it seems to me that this lady is cutting down on this restaurant‚Äôs long-lasting fame. What a shame.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Shawn B","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIiLz_Fvu2Z_sAsud0kUXYcpIhrTzSkTDXj-dxi9MqAOVzC5A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Absolutely one of the worst resteraunts I have ever been to, if i could give a - star i would. Brand new to the area so we thought we walk down and try this place. Customer service is Absolutely horrible, walked in when literally 2 tables were occupied. We were told we have 30 mins to eat and leave!? Like Really!? We got up right there and left...Rather drive to west Vancouver or burnaby and go somewhere else. They need to change there attitude and not be rude to clients. Save your money, time and frustration and go elsewhere.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Shaun 2","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU_k79KBrfdy5MprqyyTtwEQof0v_1D7MJMKTabRSGyHGGO0x9I=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Terrible customer service. Not going to lie, the food was great, but not the customer service. For starters, we asked for straws as our cups had lipstick stains on them, and she said ‚Äúno straws.‚Äù Which wasn‚Äôt a big deal, but that was just the start. We then asked for some boxes for our food, in which they brought a big box to mix everything, but we told them we need separate boxes, because obviously we don‚Äôt want to mix our food. She then comes back with the bill, which we couldn‚Äôt read, she laughed and said it was in Chinese. We then figured, they were charging for boxes and sauces, and we had to ask for the English version of the receipt, which is when we found that out, so we think she didn‚Äôt give us the English version for that purpose. At this point we still didn‚Äôt think it was a big deal, as our waitress didn‚Äôt speak good English. We finally got the correct receipt, and when we received it, we found that we were charged for soy sauce, and chilli garlic sauce, which is not mentioned anywhere in the menu, nor by the waitress. Then, she charged us for 4 takeout boxes. At this point we were ready to argue, but figured that it was probably their stupid policy, and we won‚Äôt be able to change it, so we figured we wouldn‚Äôt tip. As we‚Äôre signing the receipt, without asking she looks at my sister and tells her you need to tip at least 15 percent, in which my sister replies first of all, I don‚Äôt have to tip, that‚Äôs my choice, and secondly, you charged us for soy sauces and boxes. She then had a childish outburst in the middle of the restaurant, yelling ‚ÄúWHATT? NO TIP?‚Äù Which everyone else in the restaurant saw. Then, she continues yelling out loud that it‚Äôs their policy, and we told her she should let us know before charging for something, to which she walked away angrily. We kept the receipt in case she tries to pull something, but beware of the service of this place, specifically the short haired Asian lady who is a server. Not to mention, rice is also a separate charge with your food.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"CHESKA DG","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWYkRRLDOVcoWwdHfar2qFxaApDBa5DSA3Gh-xuSP3d-6qbaBTj=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Food was good but service is okay but the old lady at the front did not return our change and took it as their tip without asking us permission even tho the tip was included in the bills!!

Warning: do not pay cash in this restaurant do debit and credit instead because they won‚Äôt return your change if you pay cash!","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Sarah Kosari","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWRKJF1Yntnp-zRLmumvc9e-i3Wwazxmkif9r_MkSiD9JZJ8ngfpA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The best doner kebab in North Vancouver! The store is impeccably clean, and the staff are incredibly friendly. We tried the lamb, beef, and chicken doner kebabs and enjoyed every bite. The dressings are fantastic, and the meat is succulent. Highly recommend! They offer both indoor and outdoor seating for a comfortable dining experience.Don‚Äôt forget to get fresh chocolate cookies to finish off your feast.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP-1D6X90nimE-lpwr1LOiLgO5gbeggRxLtgYOw&fid=0x0:0xb9650e974b8cf853"],"When":"2024-5-20"},{"Name":"Smokedoutmotions","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVoFOvi24k4rG06J_myJfKotur7-1AnJeQByYtl1P3iU61FVb5h=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I like their buy 1 get one free deals.. but it feels like lower portions. Still good though could be more worth the dollar. I say this as a Chef. Thanks for dinner tasty.

Edit: After seeing the message back from the management, I ordered again tonight. The Lamb Pita was packed. So so so good. Thank you for listening to feedback. 5/5","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM7uXIsOY9MQSVajI_PuKrQeOHiYUOVajd6qSFu&fid=0x0:0xb9650e974b8cf853"],"When":"2024-3-26"},{"Name":"Marc De Vinci","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXcOJ8mRMqlnBdsa6zASLgWNyKUnRRXZtxhrNdX2W80TpZxpOE=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I normally get a donair which are very good but tried the poutine with meat this time. As a Quebecer I can attest they make a respectable poutine. The fries were surprisingly good and they use the proper squeaky cheese. I can see myself ordering that again! It‚Äôs actually open until 2am which is also a big bonus for late shift workers.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNjVEcQGRWk2DPDIHdK9bnLpp9oCvMpZFBJbEG2&fid=0x0:0xb9650e974b8cf853"],"When":"2024-8-24"},{"Name":"Lord Stanley (Lifepilot)","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWzQPaJP0C4QgYze9YWfcg4vOQGSlA7Fi1WI2IqpyzPqwuzcItLsg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Drove 20min to order food as they were still open and then got bag of food and drove 30min home to lions bay from Lonsdale only to get home and discover they were so careless and apathetic to put both orders in the bag!! It‚Äôs so frustrating and then the Persian guy on phone still pulls attitude with us about why order not in bag!! Instead of apologising and offering refund and new meal so had to get back in car and drive another 45min there and back to get food and refund. CUSTOMER BEWARE!!  Check your bag and order thoroughly as they are clearly unconscious and apathetic to be professional and responsible to do their job properly and double check orders. CALLED CUSTOMER SERVICE!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMyF6yJRUJZVmG4u4-Uqv4IV9BowE9qGWlGQc4V&fid=0x0:0xb9650e974b8cf853"],"When":"2024-6-12"},{"Name":"Rohan Furtado","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJYZw8lc0S2Br67I57WIsV7OkU4U7cgOYQA17yZXN8s62lSjQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Here's a sample review you can use for Google:

‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê
Amazing Chicken Wrap and Exceptional Service by Gagan!

I had the chicken wrap at Donair Dude, and it was absolutely delicious! The wrap was packed with fresh ingredients, perfectly grilled chicken, and flavorful sauces that made every bite a delight. A special shout-out to Gagan, who provided top-notch service with a smile. He was friendly, attentive, and made sure my order was exactly how I wanted it. His great attitude really made the experience even better. Highly recommend this place for both the food and the fantastic customer service!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Alison T","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUUvMzWVuOrTe5-rPvsdMcs--FS6Zc5fEy51QxcQZxmt6wlm-hg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"The food is pretty decent but I don't recommend ordering for delivery. I ordered a large pita wrap with a ton of veggies but they only put a dusting of each, I think there were only 3 sprigs of cabbage. My partner's wrap had almost no spread. Don't really have this problem when you order at the store.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jesse Patterson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI6OxTL_qiPikwC3jIoJZpNzWeR7i65kznQvor24Lk7IzAlqQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"There is barely any meat in the wraps, it‚Äôs mostly veggies and bread. They used to be best bang for your buck but now the prices have gone up and the portion sizes have gotten massively smaller. They put like 5 strips of meat in there wraps. Massively disappointed with this place will not be eating there anymore","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"negar kheyrollah","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJiMHp3wHk2lGkmyAXXXYRz0ebdb9FZrRe9CsQ8zEyVBFlb6w=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"It was amazing. My order was delicious, aromatic, yummy, flavorful, appetizing, mouth-watering, luscious, tender, and scrumptious.
Unbelievably everywhere was so clean.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPqonFOLJnjWVVgjFBLrRin1XLFC3hwrlunBoBn&fid=0x0:0xb9650e974b8cf853"],"When":"2024-9-19"}]

title: Ramen DANBO Lonsdale
address: 1445 Lonsdale Ave, North Vancouver, BC V7M 2H9
about: [{"id":"service_options","name":"Service options","options":[{"name":"Delivery","enabled":true},{"name":"Takeout","enabled":true},{"name":"Dine-in","enabled":true}]},{"id":"parking","name":"Parking","options":[{"name":"Free street parking","enabled":true},{"name":"Parking","enabled":false}]}]
user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Marina Ernesto","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUQEvjM1AkMxzyZd3RsU6MTkoDKhjWiPFtexf9Vj_7eaudTzr5i=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"This ramen spot is a gem, especially for vegan ramen lovers. You can personalize as you like, so each visit can be a bit different. The vegan ramen here is outstanding, with a flavorful, umami-rich broth and a vegan egg that tastes as good as it looks.
In my stay I went two times and had two amazing experiences, with no line.

One small caveat: when ordering the vegan combo with two toppings and gyoza, it came with a regular egg instead of the vegan one‚Äîsomething that could use an update on the vegan menu for clarity. But overall, this is a go-to spot for those seeking a unique, tasty vegan ramen¬†experience.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM7R2rVt92B8-orP5pF9WugpcgadoE77_plVtHI&fid=0x0:0x73b5df837d5f7d21"],"When":"2024-11-12"},{"Name":"Lorilee Fedler","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXlJfBuDZdpQqERFlsTynBM7stZxYV7EZ2LVw39N6lRuNJCYMjsWg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Ordered 2xs from here. Do NOT do take out! You're lucky if you get a cup of broth. Charged me 53cents for hot sauce and got not even 1/8th of a tsp and they left out the one they were suppose to include!!!.. will not be back!

I searched top ramen places and this place popped up! If it's the top vancouver sucks for ramen.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPTbdx5MCSEG1LTK1ey4kD-1KTlDcFLtmWHhucv&fid=0x0:0x73b5df837d5f7d21"],"When":"2024-11-25"},{"Name":"Richie Simpson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXY4wUjlonS36CO_iMVM-sXqINdzArY0SeAXqSZf0FD4devpySxzA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Amazing Ramen which you can customize!

So flavorful, different thickness of noodles, and the gyoza were all the best!

I ordered the thin which was very thin ramen noodles.
My wife ordered thick noodles. They were good...a bit thicker than the usual ramen noodles but not like wide fat udon like noodles.
We both got the rich broth and mine had the spicy added...which wasn't spicy really.

The gyoza were amazing whether veggie or pork.

The staff were all perfect and sprung to life as I yelled "Oishii Desu" while leaving.

I really felt like we were back in Japan again! Till my Suica card couldn't be used to pay... The seating felt close but yet still had plenty of room to be comfortable. The service was top notch and really stands up to serving with pride and honor.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPiVJx5icf-37vEf4t_FVL40kZUsZEMrs2IZfhj&fid=0x0:0x73b5df837d5f7d21"],"When":"2024-10-8"},{"Name":"Lisa Z","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL5_DwXPW2cMAnYQ1fVX12DSBFu1M23iP6f-i_LIOZ0nHB6Xg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"I ordered a takeout through doordash online. It was shown that my order was ready to pick up, but my order was not in the paper bag when I arrived. They started to pack my order when I arrived.

After I brought back my takeout home, I found out there's only 2 ramens inside. They forgot to put my Soy Chashu & Takana Donburi in the bag. I only want the refund for the donburi in the beginning because I didn't want to waste my time and go out when it rains. However, I called them 3 times, but no one answered. So, I have to waste 30 minutes to go back to pick up the missed dish and come back home in the rain.

The ramen was good, and its soup has a smaller portion compared to other ramen restaurants, but it has rich and intense flavor. Rice is good as well, but the fried dumpling(Gyoza) is a bit dry and overcooked.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPqr_LlUJqNiuwerH3lTP87Hhul4O8559dhufy4&fid=0x0:0x73b5df837d5f7d21"],"When":"2024-9-27"},{"Name":"AdrianLee263","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXXAhMYzY2_PZAqB1pKWjI7kxSq9mPV0Ra40Vu_zkWmXxnpaX4kiQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"fast and friendly service and consistency of tasty and delicious ramen makes this place become one of my favourite, especially on winter!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPOIKOhFqiEhPxZ75tRlneY8q2-kZW2mUuW6bb_&fid=0x0:0x73b5df837d5f7d21"],"When":"2024-11-15"},{"Name":"Kanako Sakurada","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKYybgPjG_d3LYq66Ui47Ocd_2PMrfkKaju5V_L0IyVTR19lQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Danbo on North shore! No line up after 9:00pm on Saturday. Their ramen is simple everyday kinda ramen. Tonkotsu based broth with some variety such as miso and shio

Reasonably priced though it will add up if you choose add-ons. Small place but with quick turn overs.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOjPMpbNvUEV3dpIjKS6f_fHn1dhVLZFfQpPiV3&fid=0x0:0x73b5df837d5f7d21"],"When":"2024-10-21"},{"Name":"A B","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXCcuZOwKS-6B_U4QrjbIvS-wiVw0TRl7NfrZZxIIy1_MWzbVNKUg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Finally, a legit ramen spot in the north shore that isn‚Äôt catering to the neighbourhood (speaking of the ramen spot besides chipotle).

Simple and straight forward menu. You can customize the way you want your noodles and broth, and have the option for the red spices to be taken in or out.

The prices are very reasonable.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOxx24MFF2_2Wd4m0b1--Po1WPr6bBfWbsnxAbJ&fid=0x0:0x73b5df837d5f7d21"],"When":"2024-9-18"},{"Name":"Naman Mehra","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXqyHFTpE7RIHr--lG_q4QyYb_Mr043-EbuODelIBp3AguHK00l=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"How can I capture the taste of this Ramen in this post. The miso broth is out of this world umami and rich. The flavors are complex without being heavy handed. The noodles are perfectly thin and chewy. The chashu is delicate filling.

However, what blew my mind was the Chashu Pork Danburi. Basically just wood grilled pork on rice. Don't let the simplicity fool you. The charred and smoky pork is melt in your mouth rich and too good. This should be a menu item by itself.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMgdhEMF_Kpl2cIks8MMPjWh2oLxBq8TqhKoQQK&fid=0x0:0x73b5df837d5f7d21"],"When":"2024-10-22"}]

[{"Name":"Ash S","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL2CN5xxAMsX06vKwd5ojsEM_6x2BAAstbpJEk7IvtIe1L_kQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Wow! Seafood Chowder was the best I‚Äôve ever had. üòçVery generous serving of seafood and overall so flavourful. English Style Fish & Chips was tasty as well. Delicious fries, tartar and coleslaw. It would be nice if the restaurant was accessible without paid admission to the park‚Ä¶I would definitely go back. Mmmmmm üòã","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNZ4hEuM0knADUS3v7fjPrIhpiW6wsL7sAXVZ6O&fid=0x0:0xc8b36ac822f1632a"],"When":"2024-9-7"},{"Name":"Lanie Zulueta","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXIjacOZZNFIlv1T1yr25Te9nNNi1G78MhV6gOT7cCRO1Lr8sw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"It‚Äôs my second time here and as always, the Seafood Chowder was amazing! The fish and chips batter was crispy and light. The Burger was superb! Great food, friendly staff and relaxing patio ambiance.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOz0NqDmfWq-rY01zVE67LEsLWZBtTpzbWseR7x&fid=0x0:0xc8b36ac822f1632a"],"When":"2024-8-11"},{"Name":"Rebecca Martz","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVHlHjB9Es28asHvg2NDOaeYB0hyyEsLiAxs7wohxLy1feQ0Vw52g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We loved our dinner here. I had the salmon plate, which was Gluten free. It was cooked to perfection and the potatoes with the mustard sauce were absolutely divine. My husband had the Canadian AAA steak; mouthwatering!!

It was perfect for us that it was in the Bridge park, while it may have been more pricey for that reason, it was beyond convenient!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOm9v1kiYoE0_ikJfu5n7RVdEzbLQuQbhrTbTuH&fid=0x0:0xc8b36ac822f1632a"],"When":"2024-9-21"},{"Name":"Nikko Tuason","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUQFNwE4KoIZ8EJjhYiIzj_PpnavVx_BiZORY4m_VR-gqh2pk5NWg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Surprisingly delicious with great customer service. The fish and chips were full of flavour; the batter wasn't too oily, the fish was cooked perfectly, and the fries were nice and crispy. The seafood chowder was the best I've ever had. I just wish I could access the restaurant without needing to purchase a ticket for the Capilano Suspension Bridge. I'd be eating that Chowder every day.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOVLYztmN-0AxTsufrujRrtH4PnkPyzx4XOkKhL&fid=0x0:0xc8b36ac822f1632a"],"When":"2024-9-7"},{"Name":"Tatiana Bonilla","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLUwM34qC4BI_LVSi6iR4lSso-WMuPKo-IQVbuK4j_VQC3q1Q=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Unforgettable experience and we‚Äôre grateful to find such a wonderful place in the middle of nature, the food was amazing, Beatriz made our experience even more enjoyable, she recommended the grilled steak, butter chicken and salmon.

¬°All the staff was very friendly and professional!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOHk07b66TeqNWOFR9XTDkqCEXgBSOltv8RWPkY&fid=0x0:0xc8b36ac822f1632a"],"When":"2024-7-21"},{"Name":"Z M","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVR0hJ0y17JSQKYTIdhQEDWxPpRAy5q2nVVkZ3U0rwHirKPOlHG=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We had an incredible experience at the Cliff House Restaurant that included outstanding food, a beautiful atmosphere in the middle of a rainforest on an outdoor patio, and excellent service! The restaurant Manager, Shiva,  took great care of us with my life-threatening peanut allergy. The seafood chowder was outstanding! The brussel sprouts we're also excellent! Highly recommend this restaurant!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPgs0Jk5OF17UBUID3rssR-CUvL7lWyCXzxtKmJ&fid=0x0:0xc8b36ac822f1632a"],"When":"2024-8-6"},{"Name":"L","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJKArlY8pQgqcMTuj_CA5u8zpw7V9PuTzGmfPA5qHRKyLw2Kw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Fantastic environment and we are lucky to meet great staff! They are friendly and professional! One waiter was proactive to take a family photo for us, which we really appreciated! The dishes are quite decent and good prices. Really appreciate for the service!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP7h1qkxo15PZYtLkludjPVORrSkz6rUJ4C8YUL&fid=0x0:0xc8b36ac822f1632a"],"When":"2024-7-11"},{"Name":"Rick Lupert","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVyPQMGkOC5sKzpn9MkynA5sY_AGYWHZ7a7LvZ1o-htQ--t8IEycw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The Cliff House was exactly what we needed for a light lunch after exploring Capilano Suspension Bridge Park. It's nicer than the other dining options in the park and has several options perfect for vegetarians.

We were seated almost immediately upon arrival in the inside dining room. (Outside seating next to the park is available too. Service was fast and friendly.

My wife and I shared the Quinoa Salad with the salmon on the side (She eats fish and I'm a vegetarian.) For what it was, it was fresh and plentiful. I'd say for a salad that had "quinoa" as the first word in the name, there wasn't a whole lot of quinoa in it...it was more of a light addition to the main greens and arugula base. I would have liked the quinoa to have a more more significant presence. Despite that it tasted good and my wife enjoyed the salmon.

There are a few other vegetarian options on the menu including a Blistered Brussels Sprouts salad, an option to have their "Butter Chicken" dish with paneer instead of chicken, a house made black bean and corn patty for their burger, and a rice bowl. All are helpfully labeled on the menu (plus gluten free options) so you know right away if you have one of those diets that you are not a second class citizen.

If you're looking for a nicer, sit-down dining experience while visiting Capilano Suspension Bridge, you won't go wrong here.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMGA9kGEnliRhE1n3SMbGpMRNQDBSnVFc6n2pmA&fid=0x0:0xc8b36ac822f1632a"],"When":"2024-7-10"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Thomas Veith","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUz2H2nNQTUZcG23UncY_XB542E1_5yEC6bdS_uU9MERUN3nScZ1w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We dropped into Romers this evening to celebrate our anniversary and my wife's birthday and couldn't have been happier with the food and service. Thomas is the best waiter we've ever had - he was extremely attentive, personable, and so much fun! We never felt rushed as we took our time with cocktails, a bottle of wine, an appetizer, salads and mains. Time flew by with great conversation, food, and staff - by the time we left, it had been almost 3.5 hours. Thanks to everyone at Romers (especially our server Thomas) for a very fun and memorable evening! PS I have no idea why Romers only has 3.3 stars on average, food and service were 5 stars all the way!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPo2P-3xy5ua8AB1O9WpJuzMgj29DlfUA9WXDg9&fid=0x0:0x6873a338e98d6de5"],"When":"2024-11-18"},{"Name":"Stephanie","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV3GqteRMVn_eh_wgY4xlObzv4By8_wbTa6Xb-HfsP7dGcfmp5vfA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We are locals who decided to stroll down into Romer‚Äôs and were pleasantly surprised at the modern interior. It is a nice place to chill, hang out with friends or for a sneaky late night snack. They have happy hours which we definitely love. We have been here three times now and everytime has been great. We are lucky to have a local gem. We were served by the cheerful and informative waitress, Cinnamon, tonight. She always made sure our needs were met and is very considerate. The receptionist tonight was also very lovely. I would recommend :)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOVfhxggbV8kEpMO-x6II3FUGycwLda6EWcD6Ym&fid=0x0:0x6873a338e98d6de5"],"When":"2024-11-4"},{"Name":"Rose Thomas","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJOEMgNgamLz-yIKynQHgZ8OY3ivfxIbRIGkz3j6P7CxjWRzw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Nice decor and seating options both inside and out.  Staff were very friendly and helpful.  Disappointed with 2 plant based entrees, chicken fingers and beyond burgers.  Not worth the cost.  Recommend they try a different plant based chicken product. Also recommend they actually season their beyond patties. The toppings were fresh.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNmo69LGpcqMfMCnaafKYqb9_XZiG4j5G1v7SIv&fid=0x0:0x6873a338e98d6de5"],"When":"2024-6-22"},{"Name":"TE Alba B","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWja93ZRsxtwFym-fSrklsHeV99P939k3COcBDstnzDYN8CpFvF=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"It was our first time and it will  not be the last. The service offered by Casidy was very diligent, courteous and professional. The menu and culinary are excellent . We had delicious nachos with guacamole, oysters , cauliflower wings, and also two delicious pizzas : big Kahuna and arugula and truffle mushrooms.
The sippin Romer white wine is exquisite !!!!!
Hardly can wait to go back again!!!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNrWsCyHdoKjr_j4Vz2MJdBvVmuLLkBsCYH7fxO&fid=0x0:0x6873a338e98d6de5"],"When":"2024-10-29"},{"Name":"Melanie Dekker","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVZWOVby0mjxg_a0S6eqeAGCK2KQNcgM-5_mfCOxgIdTCNbKSq_=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"I want this place to be great!  It‚Äôs worth another try. It was Our Third visit today. Service was absurdly bad the first two times, so this time we were focusing on the good and not being so picky about the service‚Ä¶. Made it alright on this 3rd occasion. They have a fabulous dog friendly patio and are a fresh and nice alternative in Lynn Valley. Cauliflower wings did not disappoint and good beer üçª prices for happy hour. Photo- We used our menus as placemats for our one shared appetizer (3 people), as they were not removed from the table and this is our exit photo. Would have stayed longer but learned quickly there are NO heaters on the patio. Hmm‚Ä¶","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPbcDmEdQhrU5UPh86oWp-R1CXBqCensih70nPo&fid=0x0:0x6873a338e98d6de5"],"When":"2024-10-22"},{"Name":"Coca Tellez","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLtEWrd1P9Rramk51_gzz3SsiZ9TW1pw0BU00Gm7-Yx7OJRTw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"They decrease their quality, we had the California Benedict ‚Äúmedium‚Äù, one of them was hard as a rock and the other as liquid as water. The avocado was brown for both the avo toast and my eggs. There is no more Tabasco apparently. The server was not attentive at all. Sorry but this place is no longer recommended. Coffee tasted more like water than actual coffee.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPllgNErBHYAN3b2zXia_l0FHfsg5Hq7VujDJbP&fid=0x0:0x6873a338e98d6de5"],"When":"2024-11-2"},{"Name":"Kanako Sakurada","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKYybgPjG_d3LYq66Ui47Ocd_2PMrfkKaju5V_L0IyVTR19lQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Lots of patio seatings perfect for upcoming summer! Located in Lynn valley mall, it is more spacious than looks.

From burger, pizza to curry and sushi, they have wide variety of menu including vegan options. Foods overall were ok, a bit on the pricy side. Lots of goat cheese and hemp seeds use. Many things on the menu were not available.

Personable and efficient service!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPdgkvPInTh3m9DFT8dyK6y8WLupAWRgwJWOV3z&fid=0x0:0x6873a338e98d6de5"],"When":"2024-4-22"},{"Name":"Danyelle Burke","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUJKVL8K1B1hiDPlyekWdkrehAJECLDUr8oRvkhBFYkibYsYxg8aA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My daughter and I were in town visiting. We went to Romers twice while there, once for breakfast and once for dinner. Both times, I was super impressed with the staff, atmosphere, and  food. My daughter is a celiac, and both servers were very helpful with the foods she was able to have. They let me know that they do not have a separate fryer, so anything deep fried (I.e.  fries) will run the risk of cross contamination and gave us more options to choose from. I had their Lavender Gin Spritz as a cocktail at dinner, and it was absolutely amazing. Whether you sit inside or out, I would recommend this place for sure!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOedCe7gv9JEvU3E5DOUJV_ToQII4GnNTHBb72e&fid=0x0:0x6873a338e98d6de5"],"When":"2024-7-8"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Leah","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVKarmcGZ1Js35SCZKS4LzTbiBHhnd6ukNdOqfbApRvwTocr3k=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I was on the hunt for a different Vietnamese restaurant after having an unpleasant experience at a different restaurant, so my friend and I decided to order takeout from here, what a great find!

Again, we ordered takeout, so I can only speak to that aspect at this time, and not the atmosphere, service or dine-in experience. Food presentation was great, all items were separated (e.g. noodles for soup, veggies and garnish were all in separate containers, so they didn‚Äôt keep cooking or get mushy en route home). We shared Chicken and Chicken Ball Soup and added veggies, Grilled Chicken with Vermicelli and Spring Rolls, as well as Shrimp Salad Rolls. Salad rolls come with two, but were cut into four, which made sharing easy. Shrimp was fresh, had nice flavor, lettuce was clean and crisp. The peanut sauce had a very mild peanut flavor compared to others, it‚Äôs good, but I wish it had a touch more flavor. The grilled chicken with vermicelli was exactly what I‚Äôd hoped for from this dish since it‚Äôs a favorite; it was refreshing to the palate, had fresh ingredients, wasn‚Äôt greasy, and the house made fish sauce elevated it. I‚Äôd recommend getting the combo that comes with a Prawn Skewer, it‚Äôs similar in price, but takes the meal up a notch. Spring rolls were good; however, I wish they were veggie instead of pork, but that‚Äôs a personal preference. Had I realized they were pork, I could‚Äôve asked if they‚Äôd swap for veggie. They give generous soup portions, making it another shareable dish. The broth had nice flavor, while not being overly salty, and there was generous amount of chicken.

For the price we paid and the quality, quantity and presentation of the food we received, we were very pleased. I‚Äôll definitely order here again, and recommend it to others!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNHOkoVn4XZfCFXa7RXZEdt6uHBRkm5U_kBGp7z&fid=0x0:0x8c7c63b19d6d8886"],"When":"2024-7-3"},{"Name":"Emma Thornton","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWI_BaAn4CrW1eKWdj_Miaa_G8jS8tuZ47YPdISkXK5PJD63y4C=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I love this place. Been here twice and it‚Äôs soooo good. The owner is so kind and so quick with the orders. Everything tastes delicious and so full of flavor, amazing portions as well. 20/10 will always come back here for pho!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP0vegMZNrWVlqUdc3t6CbLW2780-WNxfgu2cny&fid=0x0:0x8c7c63b19d6d8886"],"When":"2024-9-2"},{"Name":"Alice","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLzC19kSmiE9LMQVrPFkpnCKW85yN5rBi4_fh629WzK3jq-88o=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"First time being here and I asked what‚Äôs the different between Small and large ,she ( the owner) no smile and told me everywhere is the same and walk away ! The soup is very salty ,and only give little of meat , for this portion of pho for $17 small size ?! won‚Äôt come back again","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPxanP7UTMPidy68OlHXl8dXNBzOoGdb2jhpEuG&fid=0x0:0x8c7c63b19d6d8886"],"When":"2024-7-24"},{"Name":"Karanee Paw","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKFN-803hsfM2Bsexuk_BbevblocCMvM6Age5R88Xvk-sFtOA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I don‚Äôt usually leave reviews, but I wanted to share my experience. Unfortunately, the customer service wasn‚Äôt great. We were the only customers in the restaurant, but the staff member who served us was on the phone the entire time and only interacted with us to take our order.

The food also didn‚Äôt meet my expectations. The pho noodles were falling apart, making it difficult to pick them up with chopsticks‚ÄîI had to use a spoon instead. The meatballs had a soggy, jello-like texture, which was very unappealing. While I love Vietnamese food, I couldn‚Äôt finish my meal because it didn‚Äôt taste fresh, and I felt uncomfortable continuing.

We ordered a bowl of pho, fried spring rolls, fresh rolls, and a side of white rice, and the bill came to $50. This felt overpriced considering the quality of the food and the lack of service. Unfortunately, I don‚Äôt see myself returning, but I hope this feedback helps improve the experience for other customers.

And yes, we went to the one on 14th street and was there around 6pm! I did not get the wrong restaurant.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"sage h","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVK4Jt7QyIuhlim-D4Bm9yr0SACUBzZl5VZRs1Jjfpq2PjxWBIXXg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"dined here and had an excellent bowl of veggie pho with peanut sate! staff were very helpful and quick","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNoELmbfNE5wRzQJ2W06-IYCgcMg_nSOBdInxb6&fid=0x0:0x8c7c63b19d6d8886"],"When":"2024-7-30"},{"Name":"Dooyi Kim","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXE04OH6QJwbK2otI-LkstRX0Vl5gtBCif5z_TRvh0lKaV_Koej=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Beef Noodle was so delicious, beautifully presented, with more bean sprout and herbs than I‚Äôve ever received at any other Vietnamese restaurant! Service was Quick.CLEAN .  Highly recommended  ‚ú®","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMfu8NFXzxLjFSQ4pNYMC-xDI7apZATo_y9w2pp&fid=0x0:0x8c7c63b19d6d8886"],"When":"2024-5-30"},{"Name":"Maggie Kean","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUvaVa8vDohsU9n2_Nm4lad8ww_BAp5wzc7b2lKP-mwgQiGYuPX=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"My go-to pho place on the North Shore. The staff is pretty quiet, but will bring whatever you need when you grab their attention.

Pho is always delicious and comes out super fast. I find their Chinese spring rolls (wonton wrapped) are better than their Vietnamese spring rolls (rice paper wrapped).

They don‚Äôt have a large beer selection, basically just the normal domestic light beer. Always get served hot tea.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOk9MAWHoBSl7L2yjj37Kw0qzWDCOttFBecenaN&fid=0x0:0x8c7c63b19d6d8886"],"When":"2023-4-13"},{"Name":"Jocelyn N","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXz9uz60ZnsqhJ2OYUYNOplp5PQnzPbBpBsh1IfApkel44zMlp8=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We hosted a birthday celebration recently and arranged catering through Pho North Vancouver. The food was absolutely delicious, juicy, and beautifully presented. Our experience with them was truly fantastic. We will certainly be using their catering services again for future events. I highly recommend giving this place a try. We thoroughly enjoyed everything, and by the end of the night, there wasn't a single crumb left.","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Saskia Asyari","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXOw-vGRppaZWH-87l0DTjRp6cH2-cGmCr2why8D5leomPAj1GywA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I came here at their grand opening to have my favorite spicy salmon poke bowl and unfortunately had some issues with the salmon chunks that I had (just tasted differently than what I usually have at their Metrotown‚Äôs branch). I‚Äôve always been a fan of Steve‚Äôs Poke Bar‚Äôs poke, and not even exaggerating, but I‚Äôve probably had more than 50 bowls of it so I know when irregular stuff happens. The customer service and the branch owner, Eddie, swiftly reached out to me to address my concerns and got me a complimentary bowl in response to it. The team welcomed me and handled the order superbly this time. Big props to Eddie and the team for the excellent customer service. Thanks so much for the kind gesture, this is what sets Steve‚Äôs Poke Bar aside from other Poke Bars. Fresh ingredients + great customer service. I really appreciate it and kudos again to the North Van branch folks!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP3HT08m6915inapSvu1bfri_CAw5MP7D69CR-j&fid=0x0:0x8cacfe3c8cae8249"],"When":"2024-8-26"},{"Name":"Dooyi Kim","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXE04OH6QJwbK2otI-LkstRX0Vl5gtBCif5z_TRvh0lKaV_Koej=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I‚Äôve tried a every poke places in north van. Today's my first time Steve‚Äôs Poke Bar.
Great selection of fresh ingredients, friendly staff, big size portions, Prices were reasonable compared to places in other poke bar. And server helped me explaining me how to order, New place , their have a seating area, very clean, very delicious!!
I will be back for sure üòÄ","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPomrnxsjw9O2loT3FCs896e3GIwVLwata90Gyd&fid=0x0:0x8cacfe3c8cae8249"],"When":"2024-7-6"},{"Name":"Anika Harvey","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVuGwdyjWhsTccQMhvOtJ5u464dMtAEnJriERMc01m6Cc88IpM=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I work in the area and got tired of the same old stuff I was having for lunch and decided to give this place a try after hearing great reviews from friends and coworkers! It did not disappoint! I‚Äôm not super into raw fish so I opted for the spam spicy musubi bowl and it was SO good!! Spicy, tangy and so fresh tasting. I love that I got to pick what goes in my bowl so I can skip what I‚Äôm not a fan of. I also had their Jasmine green fruit tea which was so refreshing on a hot day! Customer service was excellent and speedy and I will definitely be returning!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNW12Bw_tQzpKeRO46LAzzHYMb_8ypuWHjm2Qnh&fid=0x0:0x8cacfe3c8cae8249"],"When":"2024-9-9"},{"Name":"Tessa","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJLTrBK63gF5mD6rd78SWyqbE5OZmRIYlpdEu-uKyXeO6sO4Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Excellent service and food! The man that helped me was delightful and let me sample a couple of the options which really helped me choose what to get! Regular size is quite big so if you have a small stomach go with the mini unless you want leftovers. The Hawaiian fruit/green tea was very refreshing!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOwl_fRb22Do7ZTqipV2jX-pl_SUtnIpIXfAMlO&fid=0x0:0x8cacfe3c8cae8249"],"When":"2024-7-22"},{"Name":"Dylan Hendricks","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKQA2q_i_cbvFJmt5oGxZ7BA4GKrRPCLdlqYIQQi_N7sjF5Ew=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Finally! Steve's Poke Bar has come to North Van. Fresh ingredients, good ambience, helpful staff - one of the best Poke places around. Full marks to the food and the vibes. This establishment will be a hallmark of a quick and healthy meal in a jiffy!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMWy6M4i950fKpi9NUwPvpu4p-E-za6sv9pmVWU&fid=0x0:0x8cacfe3c8cae8249"],"When":"2024-7-1"},{"Name":"Pete On The Street","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVdCPmg937wv90tlRaBXtKDK-aCTAb7FrA83Y4igLR31Qw239o=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"First time trying Steve's Pok√© here in North Vancouver. Everything was nice and fresh and tasted great. I just with thier bowl was a little deeper but all in all great spot for a fresh healthy quick meal. And open reasonably late for North Vancouver.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOUF9Iy49chG9wai81VhrMHAt2p_hS2X5z7ChPS&fid=0x0:0x8cacfe3c8cae8249"],"When":"2024-11-12"},{"Name":"Yoonji Song","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJgAqAjGvvFqMVvCJnTpH6PIvpfnzQuGSOGa50auA73kP_r=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Fresh ingredients, vibrant flavors, and a modern, welcoming atmosphere make Steve's Poke Bar a must-visit. Friendly staff and delicious poke bowls. Highly recommended!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPwnJyFuVWvyMvHTna_npXAs7e-yrqQpf1G5W4&fid=0x0:0x8cacfe3c8cae8249"],"When":"2024-6-25"},{"Name":"David Le","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUYWwbbj5xYvMxtEEq5HNMw_xynPQLHyq4Oq1zkZVKlnUQ0hjx8=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Excellent service and portions. About $17 for a two scoop protein large, but they are very generous with the base mix (your choice of rice, mixed greens, or quinoa) and sauces. Selection of protein is mostly regular or spicy mayo sauces salmon or tuna. You can also get tofu or spam.  A lot of extra toppings to select from including edamame, pineapple, wakami, imitation crab meat, corn, onions and more. At the end they will give you seaweed flakes, fried onions and garlic, and extra sauce.

So good!  We will definitely be back.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP8FtO8b777usMS-sHVJM-oYF_kmnxQuaNswrb0&fid=0x0:0x8cacfe3c8cae8249"],"When":"2024-7-27"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Nazli","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI2aGlD-TZ0FiVGrVu_tf4SQkQQqOxZxh4T-z8wzuYYaFQxKA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Just had an amazing breakfast at Douce Diner! The Denver-inspired dish and Eggs Benny with Avocados were incredibly delicious. The hash browns stood out‚Äîlightly fried or grilled, perfectly crispy, and not heavy at all, one type made from freshly grated potatoes.
Every bite had a unique and delightful flavor. Highly recommend for a truly tasty start to your day!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOxuSbtRBN3gl_hVA3dsQWyzLfT6-ciTCqe566n&fid=0x0:0xa142e6cb6d2265ae"],"When":"2024-10-16"},{"Name":"Hye","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjULQQSi1mhNFty7n8ZPesKkMpD31jiIGazltx_wRmE-swaOwr4=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I had been pretty curious about this retro diner-style brunch restaurant for quite a while and finally got a chance to drop in. The place was quite a bit smaller than it looks in the photos.

We ordered the ‚ÄúPastrami Hash,‚Äù which was the special of the day‚Äîdon‚Äôt remember the exact name‚Äîand the ‚ÄúBreakfast Sammy with Avocado.‚Äù Both dishes were good, but in terms of taste, they didn‚Äôt stand out like at many other brunch places. We also wished the dishes had included more veggies. The portion sizes were decent‚Äînot too small or too big, which I liked. The service was very casual but helpful.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMrDgVlai20RpylcIr4YOx_dcHyp_ifWLk2E88&fid=0x0:0xa142e6cb6d2265ae"],"When":"2024-7-9"},{"Name":"Mehrnoosh Hadizadeh","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVKH8DmjlmAEMzEGUkWBQ2W9ZBtrP4ocUpsC3AgGIY-Jiy-R6o=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I recently returned to this place for brunch, excited to indulge in their famous French toast, as I had done on my previous visit. Unfortunately, my experience this time fell short of expectations.

Upon ordering the French toast, I was looking forward to the delightful combination of flavors, particularly the berries that were mentioned in the menu. However, I was disappointed to find out that they had run out of berries, and no one informed me before I placed my order. Instead, what arrived at my table was just the French toast topped with cream, lacking the vibrant and refreshing touch that the berries would have provided.

While the French toast itself was delicious, the absence of the berries made the dish feel incomplete and less satisfying. I had hoped for a more balanced and flavorful experience, so it was disheartening to miss out on that.

Overall, my second visit was not as enjoyable as the first. I understand that items can run out, but better communication would have been appreciated.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO1PHK9gO0C4LVljdmQwWRJvefYRaB4gYSypVU&fid=0x0:0xa142e6cb6d2265ae"],"When":"2024-11-23"},{"Name":"Edward Cheng","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWJ5t1luJWZ0TXirubqGJZ41s6LG2QmSjyD9Fyi7Z2m-eTjmKw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Serviceable (capable and adequate) establishment, with a nice selection of offerings...the food stands a little above 'middle-of-the-pack' in a very competitive market.  Our experience was marred by some misunderstandings placing our orders, but it was rectified in the end.   The food was enjoyable, plated in a pleasing manner, and I can see why they have positive reviews, but not what I would consider noteworthy.

Would we return?  If we were in the area, perhaps, but would not go out of our way.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMjgyTfQYXt95QTALsO1uo2a-wSiknGkFNAUzCo&fid=0x0:0xa142e6cb6d2265ae"],"When":"2024-9-1"},{"Name":"Kayte Lawrence","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKDiMEOTVmCK9krDKP9rBBt4qUkjON4zCJHeEO8GB93YfpY3w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Fantastic place for breakfast. They have gluten free buns, so they're able to make GF breakfast sandwiches, which was a huge bonus for me. Food was excellent, staff were great, and the tea was actually really good tea! I had English breakfast tea, expecting the usual red rose garbage, but instead, they had really nice organic tea that had colour and flavour! I'll definitely be going back again.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNHXwGq4nPs53vqmegD08K2Ml9AZTLL5BmCwT-d&fid=0x0:0xa142e6cb6d2265ae"],"When":"2024-10-9"},{"Name":"Caitlyn Mah","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU23oPs6bp630i4HnRsvlmDM8OHCc6tCmjkktp0TTzRYVRaKdEDRg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Loved the ambience and retro/diner style decor!! It was so cute and made the dining experience much more enjoyable! Lots of free parking nearby. We came around 1:30pm on a Sunday and were seated right away. All the dishes were delicious and would consider returning here again if in the area üòä","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOBrB5J2SfHQ4kOB9Edj3HPrkPU3Sw226Kp6Hco&fid=0x0:0xa142e6cb6d2265ae"],"When":"2024-7-2"},{"Name":"SMF","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocILHGy5XoEayVUsxXvSpofvuoFCeG7cVMRInUa4z3aBM9ALrQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Finally got to visit (the highly recommended) Douce Diner and loved everything about it. Their legendary buttermilk biscuits are incredible and everything else we ate was excellent and high quality. Love that it's all organic and seasonal. The decor is a classic retro vibe with character and the staff is lovely. Between the food and ambience, Douce Diner leaves you with a warm and cozy familiar feeling that will make you want to go back!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNobfSJMZ2MOVk4zgROZ5wmhsBhRKIdCkPhl4xg&fid=0x0:0xa142e6cb6d2265ae"],"When":"2024-9-7"},{"Name":"Farzam","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIooZPCPPfH5D4G1f5pX_06Fqf4UZb5reyqU1DQAFjZqgdcZ04=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Visited DOUCE for breakfast on a Saturday morning around 9 AM, and we were pleasantly surprised to find no wait. The food was absolutely awesome‚Äîdelicious and satisfying, with generous portions that offered great value for the price. The service was good, and the atmosphere was warm and inviting, making for a perfect start to the day. Overall, a wonderful experience at a fair price. Highly recommend!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP24U8-DNYxaB91SHsWYSb-sP6yXBs6ueTUqhpm&fid=0x0:0xa142e6cb6d2265ae"],"When":"2024-8-17"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Tony Neumeyer","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUUXdQgqHHRA0Xwn61cd9dSU65TN_lKM6TEuHYJTJ3WUWQ_kdtShw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"After hearing about this place for years, we finally were in the neighborhood and decided to give it a go. Given that we spend a lot of time in Arizona, we have some amazing Mexican food there. I found that the use of rice was a little overdone, so next time I'd ask for light rice. I wasn't a fan of the sliced beef in the beef burrito. The carnitas pork burrito was really good and I would order that again for sure. It would be great if they could get a license to serve beer and wine. Or even just beer. I think they would make more money and would make my burrito even more enjoyable. Very friendly staff that that bring your food to the table which is very nice. It's great if it's a nice sunny warm day okay. But there is seating inside for those rainy days of Vancouver. I really love the hot sauce. Next time I would ask for double because it wasn't enough.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNOB1nyDyPDP1ug-gDOW4xzDIWwXGfl1JYEe0cx&fid=0x0:0x6033725325ebee3a"],"When":"2024-9-10"},{"Name":"Regulus Coeur","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLfmMKXVwM1nwVLKcU28cij5TYOzOy8f7mjLhJGAYqaOp9UjA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"WOW!! After driving past this restaurant for month, my daughter and I decided to stop for a bite. Both ordered the 3-taco special: beef, seafood, prawn and cauliflower. Incredibly fresh live enzymes (fresh cilantro, garlic and everything wonderful), and bursting with flavor. Simply the best we've had to date. Definitely will re-visit soon and often!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Patrick Graham","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWPGn-0rnYhibroPawC7crdZgRFkVYU_Vh2ofycQ4wRGDS96B-5jg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My wife and I stopped by for lunch on a Saturday after a 45 minute walk for some exercise. Here were several people seated as it was early afternoon.

The person behind the counter was very friendly and asked what we would like. We both chose the 3 taco lunch special. My wife chose Asada (beef), Carnitas (pork shoulder) and Rajas Con Crema (poblano pepper) which she loved. The
Rajas Con Crema is one of her favourite foods they make!

I had Asada, Pastor (marinated pork) and Baja (fish). The beef and pork were very tender and tasty while the fish was fresh and had a nice light batter. The little corn tacos serving as the base of the tacos were cute and so amazingly good! We each had a lime Jarritos soda to go with the delicious food.

When you have the fresh ingredients they use along with the love they put into it, the food tastes amazing! They have added a little market section to the store so you can buy some food items to eat at home. One of my favourite places to eat and I‚Äôm so happy they are easy walking distance from my house!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOcfns25ll6JA17btqjzp9aVmn1yBuzQwlkCNkI&fid=0x0:0x6033725325ebee3a"],"When":"2024-5-23"},{"Name":"Allan Deutsch","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX-bKJhx5Lun6NqheC_qWYIY13cvxjAQVMtbCda9EEEfWhx7eeb_w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Tasty tacos across the board, with a unique tortilla made in-house.

The churros are particularly excellent, with a nice cream filling and Mexican caramel dipping sauce. The Horchata was also exceptional, and tasted like liquid churro!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOJSVA_FLQrbEmfmESmjpNuudPM_lmweWMT97nU&fid=0x0:0x6033725325ebee3a"],"When":"2023-9-28"},{"Name":"Jizelle Garcia","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJyzSeMMMmQJNd8WDethczxr3uXNdjORpbX-butxHOVp0pXxetz=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"The main highlight of my visit was the service! There was this one lady that was so sweet, attentive, and caring. It felt like I was eating at a family member's house! My boyfriend and I shared the guacamole and chips and we each had our own burrito. We were a little confused at first because we saw salsa on the menu for other items but they refused to serve it to us with the chips when we asked. So, my boyfriend just ate the chips plain because he doesn't like avocado, and cilantro in the pico de Gallo makes it taste like soap for him. That being said, the chips were both of our favourite parts of the meal. My cauliflower burrito was a little one note, even with the sauce, and could use some lime or freshness. Maybe I'll opt for the tacos next time. Also, some of their cups for tap water are a little dirty. In addition, the tap water isn't clear and looks almost milky. Because of this, I had to buy a bottle of water. If you like water like me I would recommend bringing your own if you don't want to pay and are trying to limit your plastic use. Still on the lookout for our favourite Mexican place!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPrLvhz2jKW8Em8B9ms6YAmbAe_A5N9jczvgpfu&fid=0x0:0x6033725325ebee3a"],"When":"2024-3-3"},{"Name":"Pam Delfino","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVou97WNj_X-lZ_I6WAUZr7ELzzqVVEd-LYy7ydp9dEDslErRA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Visited this place for lunch with a friend and had the shrimp tacos! So good! üíï","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMvf_Ka8KVa5s6Dy1ewiCBNzJs-W_3cqU0zQZIA&fid=0x0:0x6033725325ebee3a"],"When":"2024-10-21"},{"Name":"Dr. Josef A. Swetz D.C.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWpIKYIp7nH6sSm-VCqFiY9yqasMHTyqbYbVBdCTIuzDbJLA9a6=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Enjoyed the asada and carnitas tacos! üåÆ üåÆ  The staff are friendly and welcoming - service with a smile. ‚ò∫Ô∏è It's also quite clean here too! I'll be recommending this Taco Shop to my friends and family üòÑ and look forward to my second visit to try more of their delicious tacos! üòã","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOj1TCeQ-E9SjemdcSVC7saG5dOBrbB3r6eS32-&fid=0x0:0x6033725325ebee3a"],"When":"2023-2-10"},{"Name":"Gavin ‚ÄúGav V‚Äù","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLxcbsmst2ZQW1hsup2NY_Lme0E5fnoATcaapaTY73EVjP4qw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The best I have ever had.  I think what makes it so good is that your meat/fish is cooked fresh in front of you.  The other ingredients look much more fresh and less of ‚Äòmush‚Äô that you may find in a more expensive chain/franchise competitor not too far away.  The staff genuinely know and care about what they are doing and the food that they are serving, something that is completely reflected in the plate that you get.

First time there, got great advice on what was what and how I could avoid anything too spicy for me.  I returned 5 or 6 times in the 2 months I was in the area.  My only complaint is that they close at 6 pm!  During my several visits just after 5:30, you could see people making sure they got there before closing to get the family dinner in for the evening!","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Philip","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJGUq9ypAOu0w07TxOy_GCbqMqBoDm-D85TpF7Xuz_DAKbHhg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Did a pick up order of the "Nat's beef dip". It was very underwhelming. The beef itself was relatively tender, but "piled high" on the menu meant about 2 or 3 slices of beef which was underseasoned and flavorless. The beef itself was overcooked and dry (refer to picture) The au jus was okay. The garlic bread that it was made with didn't have any garlic flavor and was also dry to the point where I had to add some mayo.

I requested napkins and utensils but wasn't given any.

The side Caesar salad it came with was decent.

Overall, not worth the 24 bucks for a sandwich and a salad.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMP3YUgzus40tOAfFNX-__8uRTIIhyrBomvwTMI&fid=0x0:0x6d94cf6f3b8dcf79"],"When":"2024-12-4"},{"Name":"Sam Chang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVSeVO8E3yvku7uop8tLoVEGM_NaXzKBAia20QDNEQRDvXqDThPZA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Good quality food. Service is good and pleasant. Lot's of kids and family dining here so it must be good for a family outing or celebrate a kid's birthday I assume.  Wine could be served here. Plenty of free parking but White spot no longer bring meals to your parked cars like the good old days....giving away my age too haha.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOnYJ2feykcMJZSP6dGFiiQK3LNzrVq5p5IV_8Y&fid=0x0:0x6d94cf6f3b8dcf79"],"When":"2024-4-3"},{"Name":"AnooChi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX724gIupKTCShWzyZdsap_cJn15icjlO94DUGjIkT_Iy-gyYiV=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I recently dined at White Spot in Lonsdale, and it was a great experience! The atmosphere was casual and welcoming, making it perfect for a relaxed meal. The burger was juicy, packed with flavor, and came with all the classic toppings that made every bite satisfying. The fries were perfectly crispy on the outside and soft on the inside‚Äîa great complement to the burger.

The highlight of the meal, though, was the milkshake. I tried the chocolate shake, and it was thick, creamy, and indulgent, just like a milkshake should be. It had the perfect balance of richness without being overly sweet.

Overall, White Spot in Lonsdale delivered on both quality and comfort. It‚Äôs a fantastic spot if you‚Äôre looking for classic, well-made diner food with a cozy vibe!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Tania Mardani","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWggPCicA3a-P1_DPXV5NcQqXv6ocr6c9-SbjTTzkecRu3tHVu6=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"it was okay i ordered from the kids menu burger was just like mc donalds. but for the price it is worth it u get desert as well not the greatest service tho","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOGfQ8JIc-RivrxSJh6t4TOGwH0kj8wRYBK7TH2&fid=0x0:0x6d94cf6f3b8dcf79"],"When":"2024-8-22"},{"Name":"Right Smith","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLEoie8FQHGh3Ee1l_u1wdX91vpY5rCYbGoya0OWfzPrem4Uw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The medium-rare New York steak is delicious, it's $33 +tax.
There are a happy hour meals menu thats is yummy too from 3-5pm, fried prawn for $12.
They have kids menu too","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMHkp3ULI1tdPa4o_yDYJjFGdZuO3si2XUxwTFm&fid=0x0:0x6d94cf6f3b8dcf79"],"When":"2024-1-1"},{"Name":"Fraser Snelgrove","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU1T6ulVtelhMW2bWZjdjb6Mc4hyFg5iYfAr8yDMDdyjEJaNhwU=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Charlotte, Pedro and Mahdi took great care of us while we waited for our take out food. They also took extra precautions with my son‚Äôs peanut allergy. Super friendly staff and hyper aware with allergies. Makes choosing  a quick dinner stop easy!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Stephanie Scordino","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLkTG8VlajYWF1r8aOTXwmouWcT7KcZbAOapGwIs7hgS5DTRA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Our waiter was amazing. Food came out quickly. I had eggs Benedict and it was hot and yummy. I was even offered more shredded potatoes and accepted. That is something White Spot does.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Peyman Sadr","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVqWFn0ePe18uaG7kAYgUMrxS50pUSoy6sVewCdKiGzix56M_e-=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Had an excellent experience at White Spot Lonsdale. The food was great, and the staff were absolutely fantastic ( specially Lorna). Highly recommend!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOzPDzbXdI0ec4PVhFcF-3Vu9CDN6yvOLFwJhw_&fid=0x0:0x6d94cf6f3b8dcf79"],"When":"2024-9-2"}]
