user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Monica Glez","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI3YU5YCEHOH6RfLDdoBNeAfDdaY-PZ81kFz8bWoGFHRrolSA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"This is a secret spot in North Shore and I really like it!!
We tried the house sandwich which was really good and the paella (unfortunately it was not really good to be considered one of the best dishes on the menu). I love the decor, it makes me feel like in a homemade Canadian restaurant. The place was clean. The staff was friendly and they gave us time to talk and enjoy our meal. The price is good üëç quality is good!
I totally will visit again.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMP9eBOWDVkCuVIRk7Kku5oCYjr7_zPoDXOKW9i&fid=0x0:0xc891f5f18c9d8642"],"When":"2024-11-13"},{"Name":"Nolan John","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWL2zeQ54CzDkklcnwdlPtjuKC2fdbKcXUJP42hG___IAc1vQT5=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Place was busy and I can see why. The chef, Maria, came out to greet us because she was excited that we'd order two traditional Mexican dishes. Menu has a lot of the dependable staples but personally I really enjoy the Latin influence. The chilaquiles really hit the spot. Definitely would recommend BLVD Bistro and will share it with more friends whenever I'm in the area.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMUVzc8gW4KGT_t4q5TKJx1wYvH16_zLb3NpJ4U&fid=0x0:0xc891f5f18c9d8642"],"When":"2024-11-9"},{"Name":"Kieran Dhaliwal","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVCdskN_dRX2qKBCjex39_s7MByNj1N7yfIz0FafWXMQEF9DTq9=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"It absolutely awesome spot for brunch! The service was wonderful, the menu is perfect for variety, and the prices were also very reasonable! I‚Äôll definitely be back!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO3duVQerReotwX7H08ifwHQDfn8JbqOHe7gjgP&fid=0x0:0xc891f5f18c9d8642"],"When":"2024-11-7"},{"Name":"Naythan Rasquinha","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVvE2B428G9mm4S7ORqKOWfPtfOeyYdrOMRGE8Ng1kJvBb6v8g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The food at BLVD was amazing, definitely worth the visit, especially for the brunch menu. However, the service was just okay. Our server wasn‚Äôt very welcoming, didn‚Äôt ask how we wanted our eggs cooked (we ordered two egg dishes), and unexpectedly squared up the bill without warning. Despite the service hiccups, I'll be back for the food!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPDpUtX8Tw_pQUnoDS8QUfkzEJ7HzHJJ8wzfCSA&fid=0x0:0xc891f5f18c9d8642"],"When":"2024-8-7"},{"Name":"Don R Campbell","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUlaWij7xrbYcwkz7FscJMnAIxuYixNyVFja7O780zWpDE5h2f7rQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Wow, what a brunch/lunch find.

Unassuming location, but don't let that stop you.

The depth of flavours was the biggest surprise.

I had the Chilaquiles (GF) . Superb.  Like nachos only MUCH better .

She had the Smoked Brisket Benny and kept commenting on.how good it was.

The service is quick and friendly.  A special shout-out to our server Kyra. She read the people at our table perfectly.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP-9MrczPHpNhlpK6IIUT65AF_5w_aqDfmOtA3M&fid=0x0:0xc891f5f18c9d8642"],"When":"2024-10-24"},{"Name":"Farzam","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIooZPCPPfH5D4G1f5pX_06Fqf4UZb5reyqU1DQAFjZqgdcZ04=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"BLVD Bistro is a gem! I had such a fantastic experience there. The food was absolutely delicious, and the portions were just right. Even though it was busy, the weekend wait was only about 20 minutes, which was totally worth it. The service was excellent too‚Äîattentive and friendly. I highly recommend BLVD Bistro for a wonderful brunch experience!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP_uTBUlmuTk54mejFfKJ3T-4RILwLEugYXwwl0&fid=0x0:0xc891f5f18c9d8642"],"When":"2024-5-12"},{"Name":"Maria","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWvX1IhQihauEh0TpRgAYqOa4BtsB69cv5NLWaYYXYtOveKMpI=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Hey there! I had my first breakfast at BLVD Bistro  and it was amazing! The BLVD sandwich was so delicious and hearty + JJ bean coffee was perfect. You should definitely try it out, it's highly recommended! üíØü´∂‚ú®Ô∏èüòã Riquisimo üòã","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMvPyyujDx4IiVI1jCPIWza-bmX2zmx59KCvkE&fid=0x0:0xc891f5f18c9d8642"],"When":"2024-10-9"},{"Name":"Patrick Graham","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWPGn-0rnYhibroPawC7crdZgRFkVYU_Vh2ofycQ4wRGDS96B-5jg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We stopped by here on a Sunday afternoon on Father‚Äôs Day for the first time. It was later in the day after 1 pm. We  were hoping it was less busy as there was a 45 minute wait when we tried to visit here in the AM a previous time, which didn‚Äôt work out.

It is a small place but they did have room at the bar. All 4 of us were able to sit together. After ordering we were moved to a table that opened up.

For drinks our both our sons ordered chocolate milk, my wife ordered a coffee and I ordered the Kraken Punch, a drink special with Kraken Rum.

Our younger son ordered a Standard Eggs Benny with ham, our older son ordered a Blackstone Eggs Benny with maple bacon, my wife ordered an Upstream Eggs Benny with wild sockeye lox and I ordered a BBQ Brisket Poutine (more like a Benny) with brisket, poached eggs, potatoes, tater tots and some pickled onions I think.

We had heard how great their brunch food was and it did not disappoint. All of us loved our food, it was very fresh and tasted amazing! The service by Emma and others was great as well! We would come back here again!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNkSM7njh0uw2KHHF2uiukmG1aBWgtDg9UYlVAL&fid=0x0:0xc891f5f18c9d8642"],"When":"2024-6-22"}]

user_reviews: [{"Name":"Johnson Hsin","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJod1Ky8nWyo6bJwD11XbmtXok3a518fIFRBw8HjqKKYlhXqg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Great place to hang out. The Bomba shrimp tasted great with the bread. Both the Gull \u0026 Animal burger were great. The pork ribs was a bit salty and dry. The Greek yogurt with the ribs made it dryer, probably best to combine this with something lighter or saucy. Overall great place ro relax near the Quay.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN47awmP3_YGaNvg4fqZvFRZMqRTwuZyd7_YsOL\u0026fid=0x0:0xf6fb0203a92213eb"],"When":"2024-7-27"},{"Name":"Peter Cross","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUHmBXMXmX9-43PxxMc-vQWx8OaX3r8ByLsfhp1pyyCEQpdxmTkCA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"It will always be The Rusty Gull to me.  Great place.  Been several times and the service is always great.  Love the back deck on a sunny day.  Have the burger every time.  Because it is so good.  Can get busy, but worth the wait.  Local Legend!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNcHS0LCerWB7gDJdKLIP2dxtUzhB0EzuQxDKjL\u0026fid=0x0:0xf6fb0203a92213eb"],"When":"2024-1-20"},{"Name":"chris wealick","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJeKvENecQP2KeLHl2OqHcUdxcTy1qia7vM0WLOtVD3QxaKcQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"An amazing atmosphere with wonderful wait staff and a kitchen that more than knocks it out of the park time and time again. The chef takes extreme pride in their work and butchers all meat in house making the steaks, both the delmonico ribeye and zabaton some of the best I've eaten in my life! You can't beat the price to taste performance on any of the meals at the gull, from the burgers and chicken sandos all the way to the steak and salmon mains. Absolutely delicious every time! ü§§","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNl84y9HtALu2-AZvGkufU6S-1ALbDk6et7ogQ8\u0026fid=0x0:0xf6fb0203a92213eb"],"When":"2024-8-10"},{"Name":"Sarah Tran","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWwcDLl2llCRg0Yhu-61vVk2BvAjuPvMvr8pEO-6UJ2zh-0_1gy=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"A great spot and definitely one that we recommend to friends and family when they visit. We've been here a few times and I only remembered to take photos once before eating.  We love their Pork Belly Nugz, Steak \u0026 Potatoes, The Gull Style Burger,  and if you are considering dessert, definitely try their Birdie Bar! It's SO Good.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNrCLkZLAJjpDUdVttJoOTQzM61cgd3A35bChwd\u0026fid=0x0:0xf6fb0203a92213eb"],"When":"2023-4-21"},{"Name":"Talid Jalbout","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVXaUeHBH7AVJdkjB_vmutMGnZKiS_gwPrWTjeXNr8SoSvPSvNMCQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Cozy interior, local beers, friendly service and most importantly... Delicious food! The burgers are ground inhouse, so the beef paddy isn't scorched to death. Comes to you a little pink and mouth watering juicy! Highly recommended stop. One thing to note, they also do some seriously good cocktails, the bartender knows what they are doing.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNIBL1uGBiKjYDZRSii569V3zCcniJpvRuZ60ND\u0026fid=0x0:0xf6fb0203a92213eb"],"When":"2022-4-25"},{"Name":"Amy Watt","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXtFx0Lt1_G_UCsXyvg1o5eSDevhehAM8wUiop0lPf09tXNft4k=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I was pleasantly surprised by this place! It doesn‚Äôt look like much from the outside, but once you step in, it‚Äôs much more lively. I think they‚Äôve recently updated their menu with more local and higher-quality options, and the food is actually pretty good. Their wine list is solid too. Definitely recommend checking it out!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jennifer Thornton","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXxGkwZGNAlwKbi0bc9qqTJZsWoyAsXFmtNcwgpfNCHexwdoC9z=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Dropped by here on Wednesday night and it was quite busy. It looked like they had a free beer with a burger. We didn‚Äôt have the burger but it did look really good. We shared two appetizers and they were really excellent. This is a nice local establishment and used to be a very well known pub. I don‚Äôt know if I would call it a pub as much anymore because it has been quite modernized and the menu isn‚Äôt your regular pub fare. The service was excellent and the wine list had great options. You can also get off sales. Definitely worth checking out.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN2hI4hCDzC2HTArb6fVXJhU17GfVBEeT3G10oQ\u0026fid=0x0:0xf6fb0203a92213eb"],"When":"2023-4-12"},{"Name":"Sarah Grace","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX0P_FT3n0HZdmLMDEJ6UcRFNPyHbE7QJ8GW3gOL-SGGTFh-sFdQw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba8-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Awesome place!! Staff is great üëç, comfortable place to chill for lunch and dinner, alone or with company. Expect a good all around experience. Daily rotating soup option!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNsL8WwGet7Fxelup1oWWEvC6i-cgA15MmIOzXF\u0026fid=0x0:0xf6fb0203a92213eb"],"When":"2018-10-31"}]

user_reviews: [{"Name":"Sarah Kosari","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWRKJF1Yntnp-zRLmumvc9e-i3Wwazxmkif9r_MkSiD9JZJ8ngfpA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is a charming little shopping centre on Northshore! I regularly stop by for my groceries at Safeway, fresh baked goods at Westview Bakery, and local produce from Ken‚Äôs Market. The atmosphere is relaxed, and it's a convenient spot with friendly service and a nice variety of stores to meet your daily needs. Highly recommend for anyone in the area!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Del Davis","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKR-FzLD3s7G3EAGAWHBK2IFS2yPC6bqBQ_OWXv9oC7qmX8UA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I like it here always get parking and selection is really good, pleasant staff.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Aryan Kazimi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWvxbgdyiGIPxpIWKMat9228MKOdU6Y-R6FtCv4dwEtEMxQiEtz=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"All the food options here are great!\n\nI like the McDonalds, Oriental Restaurant, sushi place, and Fresh Pizza.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Fariborz Khademi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWE-TiAojD9xNDWkwZFyDnHT1E119YcH44DDLGFBC5PVu3W1ut6=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"A very nice store with a variety of different types of food but prices comparing to the other stores such as Walmart is a little bit different and considerably.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Dave Mueller","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLksq55O014B8RzwEnbCgG2WIdlgII8MOhmR4pNjYQAD1Xr5w=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Safeway liquor store haircut coffee is all great but why in the world would you park at dentistry in that big building? Obviously it's all about the rent not the people in the area we don't need another dentist we need places for people to shop ! Everyone that I've spoken with was disappointed that a dentist office is going in. This ancient shopping area needs to be leveled and rebuilt it's way too old.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Sean Mooney","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW2vmsDF40sC3yPP_ZKVGIPXUeqDv5wjonOK7Mi-PY1DUVRJP8T=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Quick trip in for last minute items before a drive .. ok prices yet North Van bridge Tax","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Dan Melanson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKJgJL2XlLa3y0Er0S9NticgBldKqM8yVh_hXPOuj4TdPHbguom=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Seems to have a decent collection of food and other neighborhood retail stores. Parking was easy to find and generally was a good experience.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Vahid Ghafarpour","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXQ-TC_s0BuRybj2AYy0KEYdS16aE6PWVkw_ELp715tX9qfnRmx=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The Westview Shopping Centre and adjacent professional building have over 101,600 square feet offering a variety of specialty stores and services from groceries to gifts, plus many services including medical and dental services plus a selection of dining options and entertainment which are conveniently and strategically located at Westview Drive and the Trans Canada Highway. The development fronts onto the Trans Canada Highway and has excellent access and egress as well as ample parking. Recently renovated, the Westview Shopping Centre is a neighbourhood shopping centre servicing the north shore community of Westview and surrounding areas with the anchor tenants: Safeway, BC Liquor Store, McDonald‚Äôs and Two Lions Public House.","Images":null,"When":""}]

title: Westview Seafood
address: 2601 Westview Dr, North Vancouver, BC V7N 3X4
about: [{"id":"accessibility","name":"Accessibility","options":[{"name":"Wheelchair-accessible entrance","enabled":true},{"name":"Wheelchair-accessible parking lot","enabled":true}]},{"id":"payments","name":"Payments","options":[{"name":"Debit cards","enabled":true},{"name":"NFC mobile payments","enabled":true},{"name":"Credit cards","enabled":false}]}]
user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Anna Rudik","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUfbzegQqF5GcYN6-eKvX0Ey0niTEU_D1xuXuuxqMsc1LJvRQPNdw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The best seafood place in North Vancouver and very kind people working there  Always have very fresh muscles and clams. Very delicious marinated herring. Call the store before coming to buy muscles and clams, as in different season they might receive fresh products in some days. In September they always have big fresh muscles. They also do fresh sushi, sashimi and have some korean and japanese frozen ready to eat food, like dumplings. Defenetly recommend this place.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPtg7ywXxP_WMsI_iEm-uCxjbEwRgCQv1Vr4lDM&fid=0x0:0x713b049da0bbf2dc"],"When":"2020-9-15"},{"Name":"Shanna G","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXn1ed2-WmcGkaH3fr3ht7b-_ql0o7eaSCN-YF_Z8VlLKP1mi60=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great sushi and lovely owners - would recommend!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Ryszard Krukowski","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUYNnlaevHV4qVuRJbLEJ3P5FFjCzl17u_ixfbj5izVAkH-st5I=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Have shopped here for multiple years. Excellent service, great food, very fresh fish and their homemade to-go sushi is really wonderful. Usually pick up an order to deliver to friends and family as I go past or to eat on the ferry on way home. I usually bring several of their shrimp√† and avocado rolls trays to potlucks (everyone loves them). Thank you so much for such excellent service and food. I highly recommend this shop.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"G Noonan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWAPVu5d5B0w2BH-2QLuUEHxL7ljOT3Y-KPk3BMDRCypFRm8GIWMw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Really tasty and always fresh sushi at a very reasonable price. A great little independent Seafood & Sushi vendor.  An enthusiastic thumbs up!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Nicole Haysom","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKsmzuqrKMNXZtukIw7JhUOSSm_YkmWl5I7V2baoawpTopruw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I always come here for the sushi and it does not disappoint. It‚Äôs so fresh and tastes so good , yes it is a bit pricey but the quality is amazing and the workers are always so friendly","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"rick langer","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLbc4npewJEZYyzYO4cbX_2WavKXhDBw-yYcKyFI1pZPNEBow=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We have ordered from here many dozens of times. The best take out sushi on the North Shore. Period. Best rice. Small rolls, ie not all rice. Super fresh. Great service. And the most reasonably priced !!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Audrey Kozak","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJBO_r4uvDUl4cvPtI07uF3t94UAK6NofWfpToZq8HYy3HU5w=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Always have a great selection of very fresh salmon. We have shopped here every week for a couple of years now, and have never found a single bone in the salmon we purchased. I can't say that for anywhere else that I have bought salmon. We're glad we discovered this shop. Very friendly and fast service too.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Elaine S","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXw0NZVlw-DYhg6yu3CwCqawu2sEc8yv_yDRJNRZHiHpXsjuXCx=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"A previous reviewer (Rick Langer) said it perfectly so I'm going to copy and paste! "The best take out sushi on the North Shore. Period. Best rice. Small rolls, ie not all rice. Super fresh. Great service. And the most reasonably priced !!"

Westview Seafood is not close to where I live but close to our orthodontist so I make a point of going there whenever I am in the area. Very fast, friendly service - really a wonderful shop and as mentioned above seriously the best sushi. I would go there all the time if I lived closer.

And soooo reasonably priced - I had the real crab California rolls and tuna and salmon maki today for ~$13 including tax - and there are several rolls in each package not just one! Can't beat the price for this quality sushi!","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Jay Comeau","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIVrf9b12J34nZx-DdW8nSeaWJQj9SC3YcCQDEx890aNltP1g=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Very generous older gentleman I came in not knowing he was closed but still put the effort in and made me a pizza! So blessed after a long travel from Ontario. Also gluten free pizza is awesome! Thank you for making my night.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPuljGwZMQchxs6BLBxSUov2UW8H58ySEMie6Bn&fid=0x0:0x9c6ec7bf78c7ff17"],"When":"2024-8-27"},{"Name":"Amy Ward","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK2FYbh6jAT0dtQ2K8QjhFkpyreBY8ujI1tnnW3dhjHun7FJQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My partner and I love Westview Fresh Pizza! So much so that we drive from Coquitlam to North Van to pick up pizza when we want it for dinner (even if traffic is bad). That‚Äôs how much we like it. The pizza itself is fresh and made with high quality, real ingredients (real cheese, good vegetables) and the dough is crispy yet soft; not too thick and not too thin. Ordering online is very quick and easy - I think our first ever online order didn‚Äôt go through, but the gentleman in the store was so great that he made our pizza right away when we showed up. Our next times ordering online had no issues, and he even asked us how our experience was ordering online. The gentleman is very friendly and cares a lot about his pizza and his customers. We are so happy to support such a great local business that offers delicious food and excellent customer service. We will be back many times in the future!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Sukhman Mangat","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJSolzUyXB4SmDrEs_B5cPcq73LT8w09l2riTw4iEV2yIE4hg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I recently visited Westview Fresh pizza.Staff and Owner treated me in very friendly way. They were really nice and informed me about all offers. Fast service is the positive point. I ordered 2 large pizzas and it took only 15 minutes to reach me. Waiting period is very short over here.
Westview Fresh pizza is very cost effective as prices are very reasonable . This place is very hygienic and clean. The taste of pizza is awesome with more amounts of cheese and crispy crust.This was the best pizza I ever had in Canada.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOdnZqCv0driCJ3upjGPi5x3lw0DEvsmRS1u_DG&fid=0x0:0x9c6ec7bf78c7ff17"],"When":"2023-7-13"},{"Name":"Sandeep Mehta","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXdAwiBobE4VP3s2Rz8oKJ4uFTiLPceFZZ13p-A8noIAEj7MRQ8=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I just want to share my experience in fresh view pizza the environment  ,food and customer service is excellent.  I tried yesterday fries and chicken wings it is totally amazing in taste it is very crunchy . One more thing the customer service they give everyone it is very friendly .I would like  to visit again again .","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Karanveer singh","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV1I2LliDgCekdXsYc1v0C8BJ_alWEVorME8p-RAO5w7olFabhv=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"So i was coming back from squamish and was very hungry , so i decided to eat the pizza and this plaza was nearby when i went inside i met the store owner and he was very generous and patient because it was very hard to decide wt to eat because everything was tempting so he guided me with their half and half pan so i tried vegi feast and cheese . Absolutely, the best pizza i had . Cant wait to eat from here again","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"SONYA MANHOUEI","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKgPV1_8w7HS4Hqtys2BPJwHrLjaRx7A0bodHeXeWfA96J6mFP0=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Hello everyone
I just had an experience with new taste of üçï
Trust me!!you won‚Äôt go anywhere else after trying this pizza, I got almost all kinds of pizza for my kid birthday yesterday,everyone asked about the place
So fresh,so delicious,so clean and affordable üçï
Don‚Äôt miss it
Thank you üòä for making our day üôè","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMeIYXO3XmiOJQD7CQ24MEsLyIiBxzsEoJRr5fX&fid=0x0:0x9c6ec7bf78c7ff17"],"When":"2022-6-5"},{"Name":"Chloe Sutton","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ0VIn_-ZslY_gRbVibv2vom_VSBuJzvkOwIaOmdPHAgjUigyw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"One of the best pizza spots on the north shore. Owner is incredibly nice, pizza is delicious, crust is crispy and fluffy, and the toppings are so fresh. Wish I tried this place sooner!!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPY3F-fzjvsDHksHJEV8G-bXJAmz-j0rvwyAnBd&fid=0x0:0x9c6ec7bf78c7ff17"],"When":"2023-1-26"},{"Name":"Reagan Veazey","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW1X4SyeQeuXpfp5JbBTd2zrKC7dTJtCEXoBYszXjkfwuEJz1s=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"EXCELLENT crust! Definitely recommend if you're looking for a quick snack or lunch/dinner.","Images":null,"When":""}]

How can this be this inexpensive?! The prices for the coffee and the cakes/bakery are way lower than I thought to be. The service is great, too. Next time I gotta try the Thai soup. (sorry for the bite on the cake, I couldn't wait)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO9qxYGzoHp7ozOG-TgFJXqgZVKNEpktrw9jBQn\u0026fid=0x0:0x84bd2a16d5e2a450"],"When":"2024-8-23"},{"Name":"Robert Kent DesRochers","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVhO7BC5YXmNAY6c7xl78-QcmZsR2FN7-Tg15vFet65LpjE5GRXGw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Loved this place. It's like the TV show Cheers \"where everybody knows your name and they're always glad you came\". Somehow, they know everyone's name, I'm amazed that they even remember people's usual order. They have a nice display, supporting artists from the community. I love that they have gluten free options, you can't go wrong.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Alyssa Logie","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJxFzUc2kEPpSSBh_83MgtGIZ3lypJYOsOtEpBoC7Gy10tPJA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This cafe is a hidden gem. Some of the best muffins I‚Äôve ever had.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Timothy Hill","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXUOuq_NjLMFbLe9fDi0QXLPJLys_PpMav43a0Y62cslCAvtsU2=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"One of these off the beaten path places .  . Good food at a great price served up by friendly people. Definitely recommend for lunch if you're in the area.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Robert Braun","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLlcW7ajJTVrm7xh2CgnY5bjcnfJml0VbCQEsn5l-G4iTKmkA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Nice little place for lunch \u0026 coffee.\nTasty sandwiches and soup and good atmosphere with nice classic music.\nVery friendly staff with passion for what they do.","Images":null,"When":""}]

[{"Name":"Law Rence H","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWX-gD_1eapEh74OqyTe0YNfW1L_Xu19R2dfxMN8tNFSt7HowTh1A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê
Capilano Market - A Hidden Gem!
Capilano Market in West Vancouver is an absolute hidden gem. This family-run deli and cafe offers some of the best sandwiches on the North Shore. The ingredients are always fresh and of the highest quality, making every bite a delight.
The atmosphere is warm and welcoming, perfect for a relaxing meal or a quick coffee break. The staff are friendly and attentive, adding to the overall positive experience. I highly recommend trying their signature sandwiches and freshly made pastries. The organic espresso is also a must-try!
Overall, Capilano Market is a fantastic spot for anyone looking to enjoy delicious food and great service","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMGNGx_c9rdRuHOd3oG0r68W7xrJ1KDAIYMeiMD&fid=0x0:0x162cf6f6d66cccff"],"When":"2024-10-17"},{"Name":"Jason Brawn","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXGJaU20iM-ZTxKU88Eh8aQ0G6FeQUBkbo4O84nuTWj3KUf3yIR=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This place is clean, adorable, has easy parking out back, warm n‚Äô friendly staff, a fantastic sandwich bar, and enough delicious baked treats to satisfy your craving. I forgot to take a photo of the baked treats, which included chocolate filled twists, their unique take on baclava, croissants, and delicious-looking squares. We shared the pesto pesto chicken sandwich, which was filled with delicious and fresh ingredients including arugula - my favourite green!

The chocolate chip cookies we got were a perfect way to wrap up the meal, and we‚Äôll definitely be back to try their breakfasts, or for another snack after a Grouse Grind. I can‚Äôt think of another spot in the whole area for food this good when you don‚Äôt have a lot of time.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNY9fS1EfbPe_CJ4nZVsiCuAGGXjd2J-FO8WpRi&fid=0x0:0x162cf6f6d66cccff"],"When":"2024-6-24"},{"Name":"Oscar Soto","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWidy40c-AxD-sN2WIt_5otWLDpyFVwukAS-5FK714GmPk1vpKO=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great, little place. [{"Name":"ÂàòGrace","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIyuqWXrYJAnzW447U9_ghl89U9Y-Cxa25_fv4r6yfJtTEHTA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I not will come back again. I got the Peach Fruit Slush and it was literally just sugar and ice + quality/taste is bad AND costed $10??? Do not recommend. (the place has a really weird smell as well)

PS apparently this place had changed owners so I cannot speak for the pervious reviews and pictures.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNt2nKi316tnGno9MjkP3DkdoXS7Tvc-axoT0t-&fid=0x0:0x4405ad0150b02f75"],"When":"2024-12-1"},{"Name":"Joey Banh","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX4NhZYXgYa5iR7gR6hqFu31ctKPmpaKEn4cTCVP4nJ0Y2RcyNE=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Not what I thought I was going to get. I got the Mango Frango and it literally is a $10 mango milkshake. Doesn't look like the other photos at all. But it looks like it had changed owners and now the care and attention just isn't there anymore. Doesn't taste anything worth $10. Will  not come back.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMkshLGWif8q_M7DxjktZRfm2fgQQ33kVkkUL7C&fid=0x0:0x4405ad0150b02f75"],"When":"2024-10-27"},{"Name":"Melisa Cecilia","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXsOywiiZ3W02HXLLCk9cIHylVJNujFJOz6-eB_DU63tYHWSz6A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Went for a quick snack break with my friends who have been coming to this place for their sweets. I got so excited seeing butter chicken poutine in the menu since its pretty hard to find them in a butter chicken place. So we ordered lemonade, butter chicken poutine and the lava cake.

Lemonade was made very generously with real likes and lemons, the sweetness balanced well with the acidity also. It‚Äôs a really good pairing for a rich food like the butter chicken poutine.

Butter chicken poutine was so good. The sauce was so rich with chunks of chicken and cheese melt. It pairs well on top of the crunchy starchy french fries. Its very my vibe of comfort food, spice and texture.

Lava cake was also good, portion was generous for the price and the lava melt was satisfying. It‚Äôs a bit on the sweeter side but the chocolate mix made it not so overly sweet.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNHKenMQltFgEsWuFwH2vuR0g4NkNQnghHXzLWT&fid=0x0:0x4405ad0150b02f75"],"When":"2024-3-24"},{"Name":"Charles Wang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW5lZN5knB2qSkj_yit5R1DmMmO9ctZ4Kan_8Aydp5VNcqpbH-R=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Got a slush, was more watery than it was slush. The pearls were mushy and came apart if you chewed them at all. They were stuck together and grainy. Did not taste good.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN8319qDJOKnl3yDlxnAefCB4BIV_QtVxJc9Rw6&fid=0x0:0x4405ad0150b02f75"],"When":"2024-6-23"},{"Name":"Iqbal Aytan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVJXuv8zHpJt-_sFuX8tXhrjE567B0C7P68Ht9lWpkvl2dXGDuX3w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Tacos were tasty

I bought lemon-grass Chicken tacos. Portion sizes were good. Fries on the side, what could go wrong?

It‚Äôs a good option since you will get full easily!!

Try it out, it‚Äôs a newly opened place","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNdHMTv_WSadDUm9KLNfyFCKLE5PZcwZnK87RQW&fid=0x0:0x4405ad0150b02f75"],"When":"2022-12-13"},{"Name":"Dewayne Perry","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWAk326YVUh0f7oxo94MDP2qWQy_9tzpOWt-aSYX0AIJB5WEZ6D=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"This place no longer sells desserts. They sell fries and Indian food. I would suggest they change their name. I went ahead and got their boba milk tea. It was the worse of all time. No ice, and the sweetness level was 300%.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Virginia Dee","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUWHr1jcEnRS8xQOysheuqBFaGaVNgYuc0bDF7KpmJMqaLLyPgv=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is a great addition to the Lonsdale area. It‚Äôs a fun and welcoming place with a big menu. Truffle fries are perfectly delicious and we enjoyed the drinks!  I will update here when we go back to try the yam fries!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN_O5FkmqIdu7cNoYXaLF3qDa9BRvBQIlcIW1w&fid=0x0:0x4405ad0150b02f75"],"When":"2023-1-22"},{"Name":"Josephine Ma","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW4ctBP8R2rm9S8Aa5NyuULMapTvyTQYakS6AvI9Cd025oSy86H=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Bobzaa is a dessert cafe in North Vancouver with an excellent bubble tea special that they offer between 10pm - 10:30pm. At this time everyday you can get a bubble tea drink for just $2.99! I don't normally buy drinks that late in the day but at that price, I just couldn't resist! I ordered the Brown Sugar Boba drink and it was fantastic! Their cafe is really cute too. It's got such an aesthetic quality to it. I will have to go back and eat dessert there sometime!

I had messaged them previously to find out if they accept reusable bubble tea cups at their store and it turns out that they do! When I went in for my $2.99 bubble tea, I had left my bubble tea cup at home but hopefully I'll remember to bring it with me next time!

I can't wait to go back and try some of their desserts. This is a most welcome addition to the North Shore where we really do need some more dessert places to go to!

Service: Excellent
Parking: Free parking on the street
Location: 107 E. 12th St., North Vancouver","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNoxfmTWtt8P538szCez5I9PI65QnQhBw2fkxhH&fid=0x0:0x4405ad0150b02f75"],"When":"2023-7-6"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Dylan Hendricks","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKQA2q_i_cbvFJmt5oGxZ7BA4GKrRPCLdlqYIQQi_N7sjF5Ew=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Well-run brunch establishment with great food, good vibes and fantastic, knowledgeable service!

The place is relatively new to North Van but has hit the ground running. The portions are surprisingly massive, and I had trouble finishing the Charley bowl I ordered. It was extremely tasty with a number of flavours and textures colliding into what that spikey haired guy calls FLAVOURTOWN.

10/10 will visit again. Perhaps even to slam back 5-10 mimosas and walk around the Shipyards day-drunk, yelling at the common-folk.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOhNKrsNhcYWWWga5c9oK9OGlSFBTIVw0ufltBj&fid=0x0:0x37a569df1e4b03aa"],"When":"2024-10-11"},{"Name":"Josephine Ma","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW4ctBP8R2rm9S8Aa5NyuULMapTvyTQYakS6AvI9Cd025oSy86H=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Our daughter had a Professional Day, so we were able to go out with my mom for breakfast on a Monday morning. We decided to try out the North Vancouver location of Jam Cafe.

From what I know, other branches of this restaurant tend to be super busy with lineups out the door. Not the case with this one. We walked in and got a table very easily! (Weekends might be a different story) It's a very spacious restaurant with a fun vibe to it; while there was no lineup to get into the restaurant, it was still quite busy inside.

Featured here:
Lavender Latte
Mocha
The Fat Elvis Waffle
Blueberry Hill Pancakes
The Gravy Coops

The Fat Elvis Waffle is supposed to have peanut butter drizzled on top but our daughter isn't a fan of peanut butter. Instead, the restaurant drizzled condensed milk on top. This was at my request as I had searched the menu to see what other ingredients might possibly be used as a substitute for peanut butter. I was very happy that they were able to grant my request.

My jaw dropped when the Blueberry Hill Pancakes arrived. Blueberry Hill? More like Blueberry Mountain! It was a ginormous stack of pancakes!  I managed to get through half the stack. The leftovers lasted us two more breakfasts before they were gone! If you like Blueberry Pancakes I highly recommend the Blueberry Hill Pancakes. These pancakes were not only huge, but they were covered with a very generous portion of blueberries & blueberry sauce. There's a bit of lemon curd on it too, but not quite as much of it as the blueberries. I wouldn't have minded a bit more lemon curd; however, the sparse amount of lemon curd still worked fine for me as it's the blueberries I was more interested in.

Very impressed with this place. We will definitely come back sometime!

Service: Good
Parking: Free parking on the street","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOKBFSdvFHzTgFFALhgQoDBn_NycT5297pVc76t&fid=0x0:0x37a569df1e4b03aa"],"When":"2024-7-6"},{"Name":"Farokh Shahabi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXjfr1Pm2FE2FXOzHV8UnUKLm3pbzpn1gGhVfzH6HRc5_1PEQ78=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Best brunch I had in Vancouver!

Amazing waffles, eggs Benedict dishs and super tasty hash browns.

Be aware that there‚Äôs usually a long queue but it‚Äôs worth it!

If I could, I would‚Äôve come every week.

Highly recommended.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOzDpSikZbZkpBq-iSPiRiC3_zG5GP7gE0Pwx9_&fid=0x0:0x37a569df1e4b03aa"],"When":"2024-10-13"},{"Name":"Devineah Prasad","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXX1DFa9bRk6bvv1_M-orvwe0-273w8OFGry_kkVxXgLnOAtjdI1w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is my second time in this restaurant and I love it. The place is so nice and clean. They have such cool decorations around the restaurant. The staff here are very nice and friendly. The food is to die for. So delicious. The atmosphere  is really chill and inviting. I would definitely recommend this place. Five out of five.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNBRzP_LSGYP5gaGhgjwKCupOSHXD_3c-_NEUwm&fid=0x0:0x37a569df1e4b03aa"],"When":"2024-8-9"},{"Name":"toffy concepcion","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVYhf6f6Tr-b7ekbkXxFz9ueDreb1BCkopv3RQXbcpm54DeMfYl5g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is one of the top breakfast places in the North Shore. I hope they break the string of bad luck for restaurants at their location. The breakfast choices balance between Canadian and Mexican inspired. I had the eggs in purgatory skillet. It was not only physically hot but spicy. Chorizo meatballs and eggs balance the brioche and fresh arugula. I just didn't think the radish enhanced the dish. A small slice of avocado would have been better. The free flowing coffee is good and the staff are really friendly.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOomzQEE82vNcC6j6-Jrce_1Zpwxk0yX_flT3rX&fid=0x0:0x37a569df1e4b03aa"],"When":"2024-6-20"},{"Name":"Veronica N","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKaEZZcukGThSmHA881UMjlshS09D0BtOAEz9vsdpXKxEW84w=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"The restaurant was not busy, but the service was very slow and inattentive. While the food tasted good, the portions have significantly decreased. I ordered the Old Town Breakfast, and the portion had shrunk considerably. The kids' pancakes were very small, about the size of three coffee cup lids, and cost $13.99 with unfresh fruit. The quality at Jam Cafe has noticeably declined. However, the Later Tater Bowl was good.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNV8QzN3JI5GncvOG7gRevgMymjVC1zkbtY7_uX&fid=0x0:0x37a569df1e4b03aa"],"When":"2024-8-9"},{"Name":"Ravinder","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLkPloS5guSgzrcPyY4emO5BrXTqYyFfYe_2yvQHJjiKU7UVFI=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Service at the bar top was incredible!

There‚Äôs a good reason all the locations of Jam Cafe are always so busy; they keep it simple and consistent.

I got a classic diner feel at the Lonsdale location with a bar top and some cool decor.

The only thing I didn‚Äôt like was the coffee. I take my coffee black and this one has that sour taste that I hate; you likely won‚Äôt notice if you add creme and sugar.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP93fVt4-cGBs8NCdGMTqkfli1gRo8VSraGvQ7X&fid=0x0:0x37a569df1e4b03aa"],"When":"2024-5-13"},{"Name":"Valkyrie Morningstar","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXlsZwQYAkw64EUhF8Nu1ddCB11NbS1QLSJ7YU2cqmsuvE3RGJs=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I have been to the kits' location, and it was amazing. Today, I went for a delightful brunch date with a perfect gentleman, and I have to say that I was not disappointed a single bit. The wait time was not bad. The service was exceptional, and the food was amazing, I ate every last bite of my chicken and waffles, the seasoning was on point, and was cooked to perfection. He had the fried chicken and French toast, and was thoroughly pleased with all of his first experience with jam.
Thank you jam, you catered my amazing date with perfect food
Much love ‚ù§Ô∏è","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPO26FTndk1OLKiJXvQJLHqMNQ4MDVMjL_qUCB8&fid=0x0:0x37a569df1e4b03aa"],"When":"2024-3-18"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Crystal Dean","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIfww0DI0g4uwD9aKvRAOIoLjw0fSPmahEBjDwU_muS4GAaHq4=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Only giving a 4 star because I only tried one thing and would like to come back and try some more of what they have to offer.

Stumbled upon this place with my partner on our walk after we had already gone to Lucky's donuts.

The inside smelled super yummy! - like the PNE mini donuts which I have always loved, but I can see that being an issue for some people.

Being that we had already had our lunch and donuts elsewhere but couldn't pass up getting something, we decided to take one donut to go for our ferry ride home. It was a vanilla donut with the pink vanilla glaze and sprinkles.

Boy did we regret not getting more than the one donut. It was super airy, light, soft, and balanced flavour. We wanted more! Not overly sweet either which is a major plus being we aren't mega sugar fiends but love us a good balanced sweet treat.

We appreciated how simple yet delicious the donut was. It's been two weeks and we still talk about it!

The staff person helping us was also super friendly and fun to talk to!

Look forward to coming back someday when we're back in North Van! Will have to give the fried chicken a taste!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNfYNYRu3_spA_Uthxj8aO0d-1jsXdg08WD_QGK&fid=0x0:0x9ff439158355ddd6"],"When":"2024-7-28"},{"Name":"Brian Zuzartee","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXPYrTmdQWyxA5qvIYcuku3MV3ItJ_Uaqa_uwwM67-7pa-vM-Th=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Fried chicken was crispy and moist on the inside! Pretty good flavors. Their doughnuts were light and airy and weren't too sweet! Loved it! I've been here a few times and have just been consistent and delicious. The combo/fusion of a bite of fried chicken and their glaze doughnuts is delicious. Will always come back for more! Don't judge me for the ketchup!! Lol","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPhxG1wF0zqTEnBea6GCAzWDUlpm01uQfP9FI7F&fid=0x0:0x9ff439158355ddd6"],"When":"2024-9-3"},{"Name":"Jordan Wong","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLFsjfnS-oiBTX7iRzPhMh-PXM_FEBemeI_C6-8CDhB4SzDFA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I was very happy that I found this place as I was searching for a place to eat nearby after work.

This hidden gem is definitely somewhere I'll be back to as the service, food and vibes are great.

I had the lunchbox special which runs from 11am to 1pm and got the Cajun Chicken Burger which was big and juicy. The only thing was it was a lacking a little on flavor but not to the point where I would take points off. The donut was fantastic though, light sweet and airy, would go back specifically for those!

When I went it was pretty quiet, I am not sure if it is always like that, but if it is, I can see this as a nice little cafe vibe getaway from the city within the city.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOTwWaE-ekNpM1OtUxTXAZ04ddSV9aWnMhhIe7e&fid=0x0:0x9ff439158355ddd6"],"When":"2024-10-8"},{"Name":"J√∫lia Fonseca da Costa","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUe-9XYi95Rrw95VLOd_wwZPz1LE1R239MH7zQNUdavZXb007i2=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Really good little coffee house that also serves.. uhn.. fried pickles? Interesting? Hahaha kind of a wild range for the menu, but the fried pickles and lemonade were really good. The donuts are also good, Ive found the boston cream a bit too sweet, and I came at 5pm, so no more drip coffee left ü•≤. It was overall a good experience and I will definetly be back for a pumpkin spice donut.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN70aKiR8ssCN9q7g5ss50Ec6yn5H4GVzh5kck3&fid=0x0:0x9ff439158355ddd6"],"When":"2024-10-15"},{"Name":"J D","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJEbZ2CIZTxWvqOM-K9XJJ32A2UebzBSHvuvBhDgVOxCsPUUg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I'm a sucker for good fried chicken and donuts, put the two together and I'm done for.

We came in Saturday towards the end of the day, no doubt the staff were tired but you couldn't tell, they were all bright and friendly.

The fried chicken was done perfectly, crisp on the outside, tender and juicy inside with great flavor. The sandwich combining a bit of spice on the chicken with the sweetness of the donut was delicious.

When we were done we couldn't help grabbing a few donuts to go.

10 out of 10 will return here the next time we visit Vancouver.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPlLIgs6lzmM4HU8fTCXgbCmM7kG3E_GxtAJmnB&fid=0x0:0x9ff439158355ddd6"],"When":"2024-7-15"},{"Name":"D S","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKuROdrsF7vogaT38uZexLigYz1e5VXiDiWb4Iq30REJ6CyNw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Coxy small interior. Only a few tables inside. There is seating across the lane in an area with patio tables and umbrellas. The fried chicken sandwiches were fresh, not greasy and tasty. Sandwich bread was soft and fluffy. There is some parking across the lane and in front of the eating area (see photos). Definitely worth the stop.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOUemH1Ajcdsbk7R8bO3f4kYYdYm4ijEVkxSMpK&fid=0x0:0x9ff439158355ddd6"],"When":"2024-8-19"},{"Name":"F M","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLiAuxCOUxOthoh8wyw2iAy6CmojcgUKL0veulsM0a6veQ3OQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Super friendly service, love the staff and wish I could eat this Nashville chicken burg on a glazed donut daily. The tots and garlic mayo will be in my dreams and bonus $5 for a nah of 5 day olds !! Bf loved the apple fritter too ( not pictured)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPOWv30AN2M11V3uWNnm7inr4QQqFUktX4sX0Mc&fid=0x0:0x9ff439158355ddd6"],"When":"2024-11-3"},{"Name":"Amy Watt","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXtFx0Lt1_G_UCsXyvg1o5eSDevhehAM8wUiop0lPf09tXNft4k=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We stopped by after receiving free doughnut cards at Lonsdale Quay and decided to check this place out. I tried the classic glazed doughnut, which was delicious, but the selection was quite limited. I had heard great things about their lemon curd and other flavors, but unfortunately, they weren't available‚Äîand it was only noon on a Saturday. The shop itself is cute, with a great vibe, so it's worth a visit if you're a doughnut lover, but be aware that the variety may be hit or miss","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMoBgIc69FHRSawyOdMKhXLNZQJ6oQ2iaQvmvgj&fid=0x0:0x9ff439158355ddd6"],"When":"2024-10-6"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Jamie L","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWIsaaODpzZi62wV-93lE__3OFGYxafaFgdJgxMDBfyIfS_ESBX0w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Cute place, amazing food. I can't get over how good their focaccia was. Everything was flavorful, great balance. We had the meatballs and mortadella, I loved the flavor and texture. They didn't stinge on toppings. We will come back to try their pasta. Other tables' pasta looked so yum.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOzu69VsXsxcFYAcXp-WBjqLeTJ_4Nzps9QpOkz&fid=0x0:0xb07e2dc25b90f81b"],"When":"2024-11-10"},{"Name":"Peter Li","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUjFHpMfr2lFzpF8LvaoCh0yxlwbevy7_F6KFcqn7xzMqEEB9ZK=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"This place was very close to Capilano suspension bridge so that‚Äôs why we decided to eat here. The food is not bad, but also not spectacular. The pizza sauce was good. However, the crust was severely burnt and left a burnt taste in my mouth. The pasta flavor is very good, but we could tell the pastas were not homemade and for the price I think they should have been. So I‚Äôm giving this place about two or three stars out of five I think they can make some improvements.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN5KKuu-hDZcsnwxjdbMKktLjrMhM9l5tr3nwBb&fid=0x0:0xb07e2dc25b90f81b"],"When":"2024-10-22"},{"Name":"Gary Nijjar","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU7c94uvfJu43Q9g5Q4ou_CpS8D1rxE9zejnN_FsDe8kU6ATCbp=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We found this restaurant by accident while looking for a pasta place.
The reviews had us wanting to try this little hidden gem.

Johnny was amazing as a waiter. Non rushed, super energetic and very passionate about the food and restaurant.

The food:
1 - focaccia was amazing. The bread was delicious and the oil/vinegar was perfect

2 - pesto pizza. Super flavorful and fresh.

3 - campanelle e funghi with chicken. Super creamy, delicious and made me wanting more.

Drinks:
Nicili lager. I am shocked this is not on the shelves in stores.  I will be back for this beer over and over.

Environment:
The restaurant is inviting and has an amazing ambiance when you enter and sit down.

The team working here clearly loves what they do and show their passion, not only in the food, but with their inviting attitudes about enjoying what they have created.

If you have not had a chance to visit here, I recommend this gem to everyone.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMGeLv_VC07ffjIkJp5vMHT72hV1UUSPe97Rt9E&fid=0x0:0xb07e2dc25b90f81b"],"When":"2024-10-16"},{"Name":"Philip Raymond Lim","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV5EIBAgpBLsauhPMdjXym7mJ4fA8mtryDtWQIJCZfJxYXxupU8=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Just had a lovely dinner with the family here at Nicli. Was helped by Michaela. Trust me, walking into this place is like in a Broadway house. They all have so much sense of humour plus good food, what can I ask for? I had a glass of wine and now I‚Äôm ready to go home. Happy. Will definitely come back when I‚Äôm in West Vancouver.

Recommending Il Bastardo Pizza, Burrata Classico, Campanella e Funghi, and Costamolino white wine that surely made my evening :)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMssfnrq6j5kiMmDl_5zlZjR3zVJZvBNX2RRL4m&fid=0x0:0xb07e2dc25b90f81b"],"When":"2024-8-12"},{"Name":"Lynne","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUZCsf97y3t-Ppi4xqcVMVpZ9qy3abZg0k-7Vz9rSFc5K4h7Apj=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The pizza was delicious, and the salad was refreshing. The tiramisu was just to my taste. Although the restaurant was quite busy during dinner, the service was excellent.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPkjBkmYcrarZm8AWW02fyRCHIkhm_dFRagx_bX&fid=0x0:0xb07e2dc25b90f81b"],"When":"2024-10-1"},{"Name":"hosein jalali","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUMRJ-zbypkRGZEGZDTSGd1l-_mo-EgMWxQxKDCxwplEVXPzYk=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I recently visited Nicli for the second time for lunch, hoping my previous bad experience was just a one-off. Unfortunately, I was wrong. I ordered two pizzas, and both were burned. I was so hungry that I ate them anyway, but when I politely mentioned the issue to the staff at the end, I was rudely kicked out. The staff showed no professionalism whatsoever.

To make matters worse, the tiramisu I ordered wasn't fresh either. I should have trusted my first experience, where they also burned the pizza. Giving them a second chance was a mistake on my part.

I don‚Äôt recommend this restaurant to anyone. If you go, you‚Äôll only be devaluing yourself, as they clearly don‚Äôt care about their customers.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNp98R9lxf0PN10xRXUrN4e7g6HT_zOwbqvnRws&fid=0x0:0xb07e2dc25b90f81b"],"When":"2024-9-15"},{"Name":"Alec Vancouver","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVghxK61m7rExpI9_8g5oyewtCy_sdYUT_RA_r_r5g2dKS0dVKr=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I visited last Saturday, and Kurt was absolutely amazing! üçï‚ú® He helped me choose the best pizza I‚Äôve ever had, and his beer recommendation was spot on. üç∫üëå I usually stick to one beer, but the pairing of the pizza and beer was out of this world. üåü Thank you, Kurt, for making my dinner truly unforgettable! üôåüòä","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Gemma Boothroyd","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUYT33iilC0hUrH_Kx1DApSbirTimOoVbSL3BKh-5kba7gU_FY=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great gluten free pizza base ‚Äî which is really saying something for anyone who knows the pain of a slice which doubles for burnt cardboard!

We had a great time here. The citrus arugula salad was a fantastic starter, wine was bright and spicy, pizza was tasty. Also really enjoyed being able to sit outside in the back.

Service was awesome. Genuine, warm, friendly and authentic. Would definitely recommend!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNu8QMLipR25ZgnfbcDce0ouS1T40Rb3NJmaJ_K&fid=0x0:0xb07e2dc25b90f81b"],"When":"2024-9-9"}]

[{"Name":"Munro Stuff","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWj0Wcuk6ox5dfAeJ4fAaMbhX_F-nzzt3p5oc_f0hBd0NpbGSM=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great visit here. Patio tables out front are on a quiet street and have good shade, so they're great even on a warm day. House white was very drinkable. Pasta special was excellent, and the pear/brie flatbread is always good.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipObxgELMIOomMVw9DvtIWsBT1ZzeGVNn_NICzcg&fid=0x0:0x110582240eab76b8"],"When":"2024-5-12"},{"Name":"Andrea Telfer","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUMZyDwIXqYSPKspkyfuFeDUK5Imol4YuwfyrXHbzawmTQg0ZEAkA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I love the food here - great salads, burgers, and appies. Great for cocktails and wine, not a prime spot for beer. The have a really lovely patio on a quiet street and a very funny, cozy interior.

Highly recommend the beet salad and power bowl!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPI6fKjuIegOA9pudwvfJqN90TAeXXJqWQFTLKR&fid=0x0:0x110582240eab76b8"],"When":"2024-7-26"},{"Name":"Alyssa Plausteiner","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWSRN5KPCLb6PEOVBqsmwQHDR-QQgi0HbyZ-kREl4LdT84JDkk=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My partner and I visited for the first time yesterday on our vacation. Overall, great atmosphere and food. As for service, our server with the short hair and glasses really went above and beyond well caring for our party. She was incredibly kind and attentive. I did notice that the dining room seemed short staffed, but our server really did her best despite it. Management should probably look at hiring more staff or maybe better support for their existing staff? Despite everything we will definitely be back and will recommend this place to our friends planning to visit Vancouver soon. Definitely a hidden gem, with great service.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Shannon Henderson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVdA9fI1D4sQbJdWkYLA0OO-hNdB9W9HBBN-of9Qaj-bl2HCFzy=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Such a great pub concept! Mediterranean style pub fare! Parking was a little difficult on a Friday night being close to a popular night life street. Music inside was a little loud for us so we sat on the patio. But atmosphere in and out were still great! And the drinks were fantastic!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Angela Jeffery","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUtGyld6d4wIU2Lb7oe7xsoiq4r77iaBdF6nkFQ8ek01eF1q7c=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The lamb burger was a little charred, which I dislike, but was still flavourful and quite filling. The cherry cocktail and sour beer were delicious.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOZslLfgQdIEGtyZ8g0mBvhQesIlfBBYcpbFp1p&fid=0x0:0x110582240eab76b8"],"When":"2024-4-12"},{"Name":"Daniel Silver","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJawI80c4qwvuA-pWmht_nhIypwFKNS8vUDHnZIepoqs0gJvft7=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I really enjoyed the Crispy Cauliflower and Sundried Tomato Hummus appetizers with the first being a pretty unique dish which should definitely be tried.

The Finch & Barley Burger was good and I highly recommend getting the yam fries with them as they are excellent. I wouldn't recommend the Grilled Halloumi Sandwich or Pear Brie flatbread as these were out least favorite dishes. Overall a good spot with friendly service despite a few hiccups.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPbLWE4ttndZKfsc76fXqujGV5i-T63oXKK7_n4&fid=0x0:0x110582240eab76b8"],"When":"2021-8-20"},{"Name":"Gary O","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKxoS-FbJ8vYZQUB8LNUflczBtAZOBGAS9Bg2psXfXB7JWk9sAi=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"One of the best meals of my life. I‚Äôll definitely be back. It‚Äôs a busy place and reservations are recommended. Tried some cocktails and food and all were delicious. Highly recommend","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP08DW8brojFQoBjMEPJGsYydJkVLbvNnYi3-VR&fid=0x0:0x110582240eab76b8"],"When":"2022-4-23"},{"Name":"Yasha Rassi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWqz4ToQPylLezD6zsRH5ZjvnGMN-QOlTlZvGWFvU6cyJaDXqQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We decided to find a quiet place to have a conversation and enjoy a small plate to share. We had no idea what we ware in for. Our waitress was absolutely awesome personable and so fun, the pulled lamb poutine was the best poutine I have ever had. The gravy has a slight citrus taste that just hit your pallet with all kinds of colourful flavours. If you decide to visit this little Gem you might just run into us, because in the immortal words of the terminator. I‚Äôll be back","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMdFbHdVRi9R6HLrV0o6Vk6Yxma6ZJXpcj5rGU&fid=0x0:0x110582240eab76b8"],"When":"2021-7-7"}]

[{"Name":"Cara Davies","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVVWK_B3jjxhr6lstB4rGeCPHrs_UvKcLWHS57Nn4qwiZ-7XXtcrw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Ordered take out for the first time on Friday.
Had garlic naan, popadom, chicken tikka masala and chicken korma.

Can honestly say it will be the first and last time here. The food was incredibly disappointing. The chicken korma not only tasted odd, and nothing like a korma, it also had a bad smell to it. We didn‚Äôt eat much of the korma in concern of it being bad (let alone due to it just not tasting nice.) The chicken tikka was decent, but doesn‚Äôt make up for the rest of the meal disappointment.

The naan was dry and tough in areas making most of it (which at first looked a decent size) inedible. The popadom were pretty uninspiring, flat and not the best flavour.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPlqNa9aZNOhvXxsFJA_tMfqVTQIkU47Fp33I-m&fid=0x0:0xdc8468a4b7dd0982"],"When":"2024-12-1"},{"Name":"Jaidev Pillarisetti","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU82QbonuVAPz6zCsOp5DD-Z-paSHOSMRGuhPgNEUT4jHdSgPve=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I ordered 'Vegetable Manchurian' for takeout. When I opened the box back home, it was 'Vegetable pakoras' tossed (perhaps?) in sauce. Such an act is extremely disappointing and brazen - to put it bluntly, it is a con job. Why can't they just say that the dish isn't available?

An experience like this makes me wish Google reviews allows zero stars.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN1Eb5o71PRWI_wUWEvi3OAOX33oQt_ubgYVfHi&fid=0x0:0xdc8468a4b7dd0982"],"When":"2024-9-21"},{"Name":"Chris Forbes","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUR-rHl7nXVXV47utIArzPuffhVpO2wgSoQapDshVtSSYVoIiA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"We stopped in after shopping because the aroma of the delicious food got to us. Really enjoyed the vegetable korma and coconut chicken that we had. We literally cleaned our plates and ate every ounce of our food. So good that we will be back next week.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Desmone Gregori","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLMUAg7AjaLM6ONr1ZN9TTqaYJaBg-89eIN28d1WOJU2rsiFg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We had the Thali dinner and it was such a treat!  The food was so fresh and we got to try a sample of so many wonderful dishes.  The warm naan bread was to die for! We also had a special mango yoghurt drink with our meal which was so tasty.  Anan our server was so lovely.  Thank you for this wonderful restaurant! We will definitely be returning in the future!!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Afreen J","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWL1ZeweaycOte33MDbmpSg8MtgerWXZP23M-ogg8fCZaa9zvz8=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Not the best Indian food I have had. Not to my liking.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM4XqCnlUwDeZWTAT6b79Tu7oGdwfCgg5dMGY0u&fid=0x0:0xdc8468a4b7dd0982"],"When":"2024-9-15"},{"Name":"L H","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocILQOcTAofbn1Rbf3sRZPFTE5tBF7obXxMJd84-EoIRsKr1aA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Really underrated place. Got the lunch special and it was perfect portion, variety and taste.  Really nice ambiance.  Glad to discover this little spot!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Randel Stillwater","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKKa91C8WFSqF6L-7ipR3hOCQ1NVDYPpVXIRbQ0n5z8e3IU8jg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Ordered the paneer pakora for take out. When I opened the box I was surprised to only find 8 pieces of pakora. for 17.27$ I expected more than a handful of food. Not that great of quality either. Will not be returning","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPrkcrhrZCFH5wl3PqRi207upGRfcGJZ3gJjOst&fid=0x0:0xdc8468a4b7dd0982"],"When":"2024-1-20"},{"Name":"Kelly Grehan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJUBDnZBboL2ZO0QuhF4u3A4eEt1wE3SNBgRq20YurJuCmIVw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Odered some papadoms (sorry wrong spelling) for starters and a chicken curry.

The popadoms arrived and they were clearly old as they were totally soft so I have them replaced with fresh brittle ones as they should be.

The chicken curry arrived and I could tell right away that this was not made fresh and the chicken just tasted old

The place is very quiet so I suspect that they just don‚Äôt get the food turn over","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Naved Noorani","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWrS70UBow9QThKWgYJnaOXXt1mAWZqA8Cw8TvH0FvoXNQ6H5ln=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"After a concert, my wife and I were hungry and wanted to find a place that served dinner. Of the two restaurants open - Brown's and Jack Lonsdale's, we chose Jack Lonsdale because we had great dining experiences in the past.

We got in to an empty restaurant, most patrons were seated at the bar counter. There were 2 servers who had a disinterested look, and asked us to sit "wherever".

After which they disappeared - one chose to have a very friendly chat with a patron and the other was nowhere to be found. Finally, my wife went to the side station and got our menus.

Again, no attention - not even water or a drink order.

Eventually, we had to wave our menus to attract one of the servers - a Persian lady with blonde curly hair. We expressed our disappointment with having to wait and getting our own menus. Didn't bother her in the least bit.

Halfway through taking our order - she said she had to check if the kitchen had closed! Apparently we were their last order - she "brought them back". On their website - restaurant closes at 11:00 pm!

10:29 Food arrives - the Nachos were burnt on the edges, the Beef dip sandwich - bread was COLD, beef had zero seasoning, and my wife's French Onion soup tasted like hot water!! Again, drops food off and disappeared.

We downed the food - thankfully I had asked for gravy, left the soup and again, did the wave to get our check. She asked "how was everything" and I calmly shared our experience and asked for my check.

She insisted on calling her manager, Mike, and I let him know just how terrible our experience was. He offered us a discount but I refused and paid full amount - no tip.

Having spent decades in the food service industry, I'm well aware of things going wrong, but that's why staff do quality checks!

It's hard for restaurants to keep up with competition and food delivery options, which one would expect establishments like this would work hard to deliver good service and food.

Post COVID, as restaurants opened, we came to this restaurants and generously tipped - knowing how hard it had been on operators and staff. They had a 2 for one brunch but I insisted on paying for both - just our way of supporting local business and staff.

Disinterested staff + appallingly bad food = poor management.

Well now they are on our NEVER AGAIN list.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN61jkZfquyEayxt8UbVeB1KHNyK-E8svRLuqes&fid=0x0:0xcede810f598babcb"],"When":"2024-11-11"},{"Name":"Pam Delfino","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVou97WNj_X-lZ_I6WAUZr7ELzzqVVEd-LYy7ydp9dEDslErRA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Large selection of craft beer! I had a flight and was very pleased to see Fat Tug on the menu! Our server was very friendly and we had a great experience!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMDRCczULkyIXy-hOEqaZgBAsmIKcWD5meE0BFo&fid=0x0:0xcede810f598babcb"],"When":"2024-10-14"},{"Name":"JOANNE KADIR","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK5FtQlTqwnaEemJG-2BJY5ImgYhsbRGNlAyMyitnPajXzAiw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The Bourbon Jack burger here is absolutely delicious, perfectly cooked with a rich bourbon-infused sauce that tantalizes the taste buds. And you shouldnt miss out on wing night every Tuesday, they have 15 delicious flavors that make it the perfect weekly treat for wing lovers!! Staff is always friendly and welcoming. I love this family owned business so much!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN861HiHJ3Sr0qAcvNSEi1i1obSlqiisFee8tGs&fid=0x0:0xcede810f598babcb"],"When":"2024-5-16"},{"Name":"Suzanne Shumyla","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJxAmlno7cfor-S1mx-lU8qlfQ0IIBRrxK6FK-NZ_yXpVp0Pg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Server was lovely but didn‚Äôt listen well. My husband asked for no sauce on his burger but it came with it. Sent it back, took way longer for a fresh one and the new burger was barely cook, the beef patty was pink inside. I had to ask for salt and pepper 3 times before she brought it. My chicken burger patty was tiny on a huge bun. Overall food was disappointing, lacklustre and overpriced. Service lacking and it wasn‚Äôt even busy.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"poohbear988","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLbLIdZezPv9MsdGOpSQZEpVfpqWopwHtO9YnfYoQmmKcbaNA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I saw a 2 for 1 brunch special on social media so my family decided to give it a try as none of us had been to this restaurant. There were 6 of us including one child and 2 seniors over 70yo. Upon sitting down, our server informed in order to receive the special, each guest had to order an alcoholic beverage. We asked if we could sub 3 with non alcoholic beverage for the minor and seniors as they could not have alcohol due to age and health reasons.

The answer was no. EACH GUEST had to order an alcoholic beverage and we needed to order 6 alcoholic beverages to get the special. So we decided to leave as 3 adults would not be able to drink 2 alcoholic beverages at noon and we had to drive after.

None of this information was mentioned on their wrbsite nor social media. We were not informed this until we were sat at the table which we felt unfair and borderline scam.

Besides, the attitude of the server was far from pleasant as well","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Susan Belcourt","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUecvlMLq60ZDGVDkEm0_MS0luLXegaa5pDAD8P22TVmvjgpnyi=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Waitress was lovely. I first asked for a cappuccino.  She doesn't know why it's on the menu, because they don't even have a machine! Next, black tea? No, only Earl Grey.
Got a burger. Pretty mediocre. Slightly above McDonald's. Fresh onions and greens, but beef patty pretty anemic and flavorless.
